40001001	Dawute naa, Abrahaame naa gidida Yesus Kirstoosa yeletetha zarkey hayssafe kaallizayssa;
40001002	Abrahaamey Yisaaqa yelides; Yisaaqi Yaqoobe yelides; Yaqoobey Yuhudanne iza ishata yelides;
40001003	Yuhuday Timaarippe Faareesanne Zaara yelides; Faareesay Esroome yelides; Esroomey Araame yelides;
40001004	Araamey Aminadabe yelides; Aminadabey Ne7asoone yelides; Ne7asooney Salomoone yelides;
40001005	Salomoonka Bo7eeze Era7aabippe yelides; Bo7eezey Urutippe Iyoobeede yelides; Iyoobeedey Isseye yelides;
40001006	Isseyey kawo Dawute yelides; Dawutey Ooriyo macheyfe Solomoone yelides.
40001007	Solomoonka Robi7aame yelides; Robi7amey Abbiya yelides; Abbiyayka Aasafe yelides;
40001008	Aasafey Yoosapixe yelides; Yoosapixey Iyooraame yelides; Iyooraamey Ooziya yelides;
40001009	Ooziyaney Iyoo7aatame yelides; Iyoo7aatamey Akaze yelides; Akazey Hiziqaase yelides;
40001010	Hiziqaasi Minaase yelides; Minaasey Amoxe yelides; Amoxeykka Yoosiyaasa yelides;
40001011	Yoosiyaasi Babiloone di7o layth Ikonyaanenne iza ishata yelides.
40001012	Babiloone di7oppe guye Ikonyaaney Salatiyaale yelides; Salatiyaaleyka Zerubaabele yelides;
40001013	Zerubaabeley Abiyoode yelides; Abiyoodey Eliyaqeeme yelides; Eliyaqeemey Azaare yelides;
40001014	Azaarey Saadooqe yelides; Saadooqey Akime yelides; Akimeykka Eliyoode yelides;
40001015	Eliyoodey Alazaare yelides; Alazaarey Maataane yelides; Maataaney Yaqoobe yelides;
40001016	Yaqoobeyka Kirstoosa geetettidayssa Yesusa yelida Maaramo ekkana giigissida Yoosefe yelides.
40001017	Hessa gish Abrahaameppe yiidi Dawute gakkanaas tammanne oyddu yeleteth; qasse Dawuteppe Babiloone di7o wode gakkanaas tammanne oyddu yeleteth; Babiloone di7oppe Kirstoosa yeleteth gakkanaas tammanne oyddu yeleteth gidees.
40001018	Yesus Kirstoosa yeletetha taarikey hayssafe kaalli dizayssa; iza aaya Maarama Yoosefes giigetta dishin izi izira gayttonta Xillo Ayanan qanthatada beettadus.
40001019	Izo giigissida Yoosefey xillo as gidida gish Maaramo asaa sinthan qonce kessonta qotara agganas ba woznara qachchides.
40001020	Hayssa izi qoppishin Xoossa kiitanchay agumora izas qoncidi “Dawute naa Yoosefe! Ne giigissida Maarama qanthatiday Xillo Ayanan gidida gish izo neso efanaas babbofa.
40001021	Iza attuma naa yelana; izi asa nagarappe ashshanadde gidida gish iza sunth ne ‘Yesusa’ ga sunthana” gides.
40001022	Goday nabe Isayaasa duunan “Hekko! Gela7oy qanthatana; attuma naakka yelana; naaza sunthayka Amanu7eela geetettana; hessa birsheththika ‘Xoossi nunara dees’ geetettidi xaafettidayssi polettana mala hayssi wurikka hanides” gides.
40001024	Yoosefeykka dhiskofe beeggidi Goda kiitanchay iza azazida mala Maaramo baso efides.
40001025	Gido attin baada iza koyro naaza yelana gakkanaas izo ekibenna. Yeletida guutha naaza suntha “Yesusa” gides.
40002001	Kawo Herdoosa wode Yesusi Beeteleme Yuhudan yeletidappe guye awa arshey mokkiza baggafe eranchati Yerusalame yiidi
40002002	“Yeletida Ayhuda kawoy awan dizee? Awa arshey mokkiza baggara iza xoolinteza beyidi izas goynnana yidos” giidi oychida.
40002003	Kawo Herdoosi hessa siydi daggammides; Yerusalamen diza asay wuri izara daggammides.
40002004	Izikka Qeeseta halaqatanne woga tamarsizayta ubba shiishshidi “Kirstoosi awan yelettanee?” giidi oychides.
40002005	Istika izas “Nabey ‘Yuhuda biittan dizaare hanne Beeteleme! Ta dere Isra7eele naagizadey neeppe kezana gish hanko Yuhuda haarizaytappe aazanka guuxakka’ giidi xaafida gish izi Beeteleme Yuhudan yelettana” giidi yootida.
40002007	Hessafe guye Herdoosi he eranchata geemara xeygisidinne ista hasayssidi xoolintezi istas bettida wodeyo shaakki erides.
40002008	Eranchata Beeteleme yeddidi “Biidi guutha naaza koyite, takka baada izas goynnana mala demmida mala ha taakko simmidi izi awan dizaakkon taas yootite” gides.
40002009	Eranchatikka kawoy istas gidayssa siyidappe guye simmi bida; awa arshey mokkiza baggara istas bettida xoolintey ista kaaleththidi guutha naazi dizaso gaththides.
40002010	Isti xoolinteza beyida wode daro ufayetida.
40002011	Keeththe gelidi guutha naaza iza aayo Maaramira demmidinne gulbatidi izas goynnida; ba saaxine saaxine dooydi worqa, exaanenne karbe giza miish izas immida.
40002012	Isti Herdoosakko simmonta mala agumon keehi naagettana mala geetettida gish hara ogera ba dere simmida.
40002013	Eranchati bidappe guye Goda kiitanchay Yoosefes agumora beettidi “Herdoosi guutha naaza wodhana koyiza gish ne simmana wode ta nena erissana gakkanaas dendada guutha naaza aayeyra ekkada duge Gibxe biitta baqatada heen daashsha” gides.
40002014	Hessa gish Yoosefey dendidi aayiyo naazara ekkidi gidoththara duge Gibxe biitta bides.
40002015	Herdoosi hayqqana gakkanaas heen de7ides. Hessanka “Ta naaza ta Gibxe biittafe xeeygadis” giidi Goday kase nabe duunan haasayidayssi polettides.
40002016	Eranchati iza baleththidayssa erida wode Herdoosi keehi hanqettides. Eranchati izas kase yootida mala ba as kiittidi nam7u laythanne nam7u layth kumontayta Beetelemeninne Beetaleme yuushon diza guutha attuma nayta ubba wodhisides.
40002017	Hessan “Yeehoynne gita waaso giirisay Eraaman siyettides; Ira7eela ba naytas yeekkadus; nayti wuri wurida gish minnanas dandayonta ixadus” geetettidi nabe Ermaasan yootettidays polettides.
40002019	Herdoosi hayqqidappe guye Goda kiitanchay agumora Yoosefes Gibxe biittan beettidi,
40002020	“Dendada guutha Naazanne iza aayiyo ekkada Isra7eele biitta simma; Naaza wodhana koyizayti hayqqida” gides.
40002021	Yoosefey dendidi naaza aayiyra ekkidi Isra7eel biitta simmides.
40002022	Gido attin Arkalawosi ba aawa Herdoosa soon Yuhudan kawotidayssa siydinne he baanas babbides; Goday agumora izi he boonta mala yootida gish Galila awurajja bides.
40002023	Naazirete geetettiza katamayo biidi heen duus oykkides. Hessanka kase nabetan “Naazirete as geetettana” geetettidi kasetidi sinthafes hasayettidayssi kumides.
40003001	He wode xammaqiza Yohannisi asaas “Salo kawotethi matida gish inte nagarappe simmite” gi sabakishe Yuhuda bazzora yides.
40003003	“Goda oge ooththite, wogga ogezakka lo7ethite gishe bazzo biittan waassiza qaala” geetettidi kase nabe Isayaasan yootetidayssi Yohannisa gishassa.
40003004	Yohannisi gaamella isikefe oosettida may7o may7ees. Ba xeessan dafo gixxees; izi miza qumay degera essanne boole.
40003005	Yerusalameppe, kumeththa Yuhudappenne Yordanoose shaafa matan diza dere asay wuri Yohannisakko wodhdhidi,
40003006	ba nagarakka izas paaxishe Yordaanoose Shaafan iza kushen xammaqettides.
40003007	Daro Farsaaweetinne Saduqaaweti izi xammaqizaso yishin beyidi Yohannisi “Inteno shooshato! Inte sinthara diza hanqofe attana mala intena ooni bessidee?
40003008	Inte inte nagarappe simmidayssa bessiza ooso ooththite.
40003009	‘Nu aaway Abrahaamey nuus dees’ gizayssan interka intena baleththofte; ta intes Xoossi hayta shuchchatappe Abrahaames naa ooththi denthanas dandayees gays.
40003010	Hekko kaltay qanxanaas mithata garsan giigeti uttides; hessa gish lo7o ayfe ayfonta mithi wuri qanxettananne taman yeggettana.
40003011	Tani maarotethas haaththan xammaqays; haray atto shin ta iza caamma tookkanas bessontadey taappe aadhdhiza minoy guyera yaana; izikka Xillo Ayananinne taman intena xammaqana.
40003012	Kath suragiza pithay iza kushen dees; izikka ba kaththa baleza pitti geeshshana; ba gistezakka kaththa di7en qolana; happa gidikko to7onta taman xuugana” gides.
40003013	He wode Yesusi Yohannisan xammaqettanas Galilappe Yordanoose shaafa bides.
40003014	Gido attin Yohannisi “Hayssi hanenna; tani nenan xammaqettana bessishin neni waanada taakko yay?” giidi izara marshettides.
40003015	Yesusikka “Aykkoy baawa, ero garkii? Hayssa ooththidi nuni xilloteth ubba polanas nuus bessees” gides. Yohansikka iza qofa ero gi ekides.
40003016	Yesusi xammaqetidi haaththafe kezida mala heerakka saloy doyettin Xoossa Ayanay haraphe kafo misatidi iza bolla wodhdhishin beyides.
40003017	Saloppekka “Tani izan ufayetiza Naazinne ta siiqiza ta Naazi hayssa” giza qaalay siyettides.
40004001	Hessafe guye Xillo Ayanay Xala7en paacettana mala Yesusa duge bazzo biitta efides.
40004002	Oyddu tammu gallassinne oyddu tammu qamma xoomidappe guye Yesusi gafides.
40004003	Paacizayssi Yesusakko shiiqidi “Ne Xoossa Naa gidikko ane hayta shuchchata uketh gidana mala azaza” gides.
40004004	Yesusikka “ ‘Asi Xoossa duunappe keziza qaalanpe attin kaththan xalla deenna’ geetetti xaafettides” giidi izas zaarides.
40004005	Qasseka Xala7ey Yesusa geeshsha katamayo efi Xoossa Keeththa quste bolla kessidi,
40004006	“Ne Xoossa Naa gidikko ane hayssafe duge guppa; ayssi giikko ‘Ne tohoy shuchchan dhuphetonta mala kiitanchati ba kushera nena oykki denthana mala ne gish Xoossi ba kiitancha kiittana’ geetetti xaafettides” gides.
40004007	Yesusikka “Geeshsha Maxaafan ‘Ne Goda Xoossa paacofa’ geetetti xaafettides” giidi zaarides.
40004008	Qasseka Xala7ey Yesusa keehi dhoqa zuma bolla kessidi salo gupanthon diza kawoteththa bonchozara ubba ehi bessidi,
40004009	“Ne kundada taas goynnikko hayssa ubba ta nees immana” gides.
40004010	Yesusi “Haysso Xala7e! Ta sinthafe haakka! ‘Neni ne Godas Xoossas goynna; izas xalala azazeta’ geetetti Geeshsha maxaafan xaafettides” gides.
40004011	Hessafe Xala7ey iza aggidi bides; kiitanchatikka yiidi iza maaddida.
40004012	Yesusi, Yohannisi qashetidayssa siydi gede Galila simmides.
40004013	Naazirete katama aggidi Zaabiloone Niftaaleme heeran abba matan diza Qifirnahoome kataman duus oykkides.
40004014	“Hessan Zaabilooneninne Niftaaleme biittan, Yordanooseppe he pinthan abba lanqera efiza oge matan diza Ayzaabe gidida Galila dere asay, dhuman diza derey wolqama poo7o beyides. Hayqo kuwa giddon diza deres poo7oy poo7ides” geetettidi nabe Isayaasa duunan kasetidi hasayettidayssi polettides.
40004017	Yesusi he wodeppe ha simmin “Salo kawotethi matides, maarota gelite” giidi sabbako oykkides.
40004018	Yesusi Galila Abba lanqera aadhdhishe nam7u ishanta; heytikka Phexroosa geetettiza Simoonanne iza isha Indiraasa beyides. Istika mole oykkizayta gidida gish mole oykkiza gite abban yeggishe deettes.
40004019	Yesusi ista “Haa yiite! Tana kaallite! Ta intena as oykkiza as kessana” gides.
40004020	Isti heerakka mole oykkiza giteza yeggi aggidi Yesusa kaallida.
40004021	Guuth sinthe bishe hara nam7u ishanta Zabidoosa naa nam7ata Yaqoobenne Yohannisa beyides; istika ba aawa Zabidoosara wogolo giddon mole gite lo7ethettes. Yesusikka ista xeygin;
40004022	isti heerakka wogolozanne ba aawa aggidi kaallida.
40004023	Yesusi Ayhudata ista Woosa Keeththan tamarsishenne kawoteththa Mishiraachcho qaala sabbakishe qasse dere giddon ay hargeyka sakizayta pathishe kumeththa Galilan yuuyides.
40004024	Hessa geedon lo7o nashoy kumeththa Sooriya biittan siyettides; dereyka dumma dumma sakon daro waayetizayta, daydanthi istan gelidayta, bollafe biittan yeggiza hargey dizaytanne silidayta izakko ehin ubbaakka pathides.
40004025	Hessafe dendidayssan Galilappe, tammu katamatappe, Yerusalameppenne Yuhudappe, Yordanoose shaafa pinthafe yida daro asay iza kaallides.
40005001	Daro derey shiiqidayssa beyidi Yesusi pude zuma bolla kezi uttides; iza kaallizaytikka izakko yida.
40005002	Izikka ista hizgi tamarso oykkides;
40005003	“Ayanan bana kawushshizayti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko Salo Kawoteth istassa.
40005004	Qadhetizayti anjettidayta, ayssi giikko isti minettana.
40005005	Ashketi anjettidayta; ayssi giikko isti biitta laattana.
40005006	Xilloteth gafetizaytinne saamotizayti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko isti kallana.
40005007	Asas lo7o ooththizayti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko istaska lo7oy oosettana.
40005008	Wozina xilloti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko isti Xoossa beyana.
40005009	Saroteth ooththizayti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko isti Xoossa nayta geetetti xeeygettana.
40005010	Xillotetha gish goodettizayti anjettidayta; ayssi giikko salo kawotethi istassa.
40005011	“Ta geedon asay intena cayikko, goodikkonne iita yo7o wordora inte bolla haasayikko inte anjettidayta.
40005012	Inte salon demmana waagay keehi gita gidida gish ufayssan guppite. Intefe sinthan diza nabetaka hessatho gooddida.
40005013	“Inte ha biitta asas maxine mala. Maxiney ba mal7otetha yeddiza gidikko gede kare yegettidi yedhetethafe attin, zaaridi demmanas dandayizee?
40005014	Inte deres poo7o. Zuma bolla diza katamaya qotetanas danda7ukku.
40005015	Asi xompe oythidi keeththan diza asaa kumeththas poo7ana mala dhoqason woththes attin geema soon woththi erenna.
40005016	Hessathoka asay inte lo7o ooso beyidi salon diza inte Aawa bonchana mala inte poo7oy asa sinthan poo7o.
40005017	“Tani Muse woganne nabeta qaala shaarana yida intes misatoppo; polanas yadis attin shaaranas yabeekke.
40005018	Ta intes tumu gays; saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana gakkanaas Muse wogay wuri polettana attin wogappe issi pidaleykka woykko qeerinyakka shaaretukku.
40005019	Hessa gish oonikka ha azazotappe guuxizaro gidikkoka ooththonta yeggi aadhdhikko, hankoytaka yedhi aadhdhana mala tamarsikko salo kawoteththan hessadey guuth geetetti xeeygettana; gido attin hayta azazota ooththi polishe hankoyta polana mala tamarsikko hessadey Salo Kawoteththan gita geetettana.
40005020	Ta intes gays, inte xillotethi Farsaaweetappenne Muse woga tamarsizayta xillotethappe aadhdhonta aggikko Salo Kawoteth gelana dandayekketa.
40005021	“Kase asatas ‘Wodhoppa; wodhidade bolla pirdettana’ geetettidayssa inte siyideta.
40005022	Ta qasse intes gizay ba isha bolla ogey baynda hanqettizade bolla pirdettana; oonikka ba isha ‘Nappay’ gizaddey duulata sinthan oyshettana. ‘Eeyay’ gizade Gaanname tama pirday naages.
40005023	Hessa gish neni yarsho shiishshizason Xoossas yarshana gishin ne ishay ne bolla mishetidazi nees qoppetikko,
40005024	ne yarshizayssa heen yarshoson aggagada koyro baada ne ishara giiga; hessafe guye simmada ne yarshoza Xoossas shiishsha.
40005025	“Nena mootida ne morkey ne bolla pirdisonta mala, pirdiza daannay qachizayssas nena aaththi immonta mala, qasho keeththan ne wodhdhonta mala buro oge bolla dashe ne morkera elela giigaycha.
40005026	Ta nees tumu gays; izi pirdisi wursida gidikko wursetha santiyo qanxana gakkanaas qashoppe birshetaka.
40005027	“ ‘Laymatoppa’ gizayssa inte siyideta.
40005028	Tani gidikko intena hizgays; macasa amo ayfera xeellidadey wuri ba woznan izira laymatides.
40005029	Nagara ooththanas ne ushacha ayfey nees gaaso gidikko neeppe kessa wora yegga; ne asatethay kumeth gede Gaanname taman yegetanappe ne asatethafe issina paccikko lo7o.
40005030	Ne ushachcha kushey nagara oosos gaaso gidikko neeppe qanxa digga; ne asatethay kumeth Gaannamen yegetanayssafe ne asatethafe issi billitey nees pacce gidikko lo7o.
40005031	“ ‘Macho anji yeddizadey pirma waraqata izis immana bessees’ geetettides.
40005032	Tani qasse intena hizgays, hara asara laymatishin beyonta dishe ba macho anjizadey wuri iza laymatana mala ooththes. Hessathoka anjettidaro ekizadeyka laymatida mala qoodetes.
40005033	“Kase asatas ‘Wordo caaqofa; Xoossa sinthan ne caaqidayssa naaga’ geetettidayssa inte siyideta.
40005034	Ta qas intena aykkokka caaqofte gays; saloy Xoossas uttiza alga gidida gish salon caaqofte.
40005035	Biittay Xoossa tohoy yedhizaso gidida gish biittanka caaqofte. Wogga kawo katama gidida gish Yerusalamenka caaqofte.
40005036	Inte hu7enka caaqofte; inte hu7e binanappe issineyokka booth woykko kareth histanas dandayekketa.
40005037	Hessa gish inte inte giddon haasayettishin inte haasayay “Ee” gaanaz gidikko “Ee” giite “Akay” gaanaz gidikko “Akay” giite; hessafe kare gididay wuri iita asappe yizaza.
40005038	“ ‘Ayfe gishas ayfe achcha gishas achcha’ geetettidayssa inte siyideta.
40005039	Ta qasse intes gizay iita ooththidadera eqetoppite; gido attin nees ushachcha shagala baqqizades hankoyssakka yuusha bessa.
40005040	Issi asi ne giddora may7idayssa neeppe ekkanas nena mootikko bollara may7idayssakka gujada izas imma.
40005041	Issi asi nena issi saate oge ne baana mala wolqathikko issife nam7u dakko gidana oge izara ba.
40005042	Nena woossizades imma; neeppe tal7e ekkanas koyizades zokko zaaroppa.
40005043	“ ‘Ne lagge siiqa; ne morke ixxa’ geetettidayssa siyideta.
40005044	Ta qas intena inte morketa dosite; intena goodizaytas woossite gays.
40005045	Inte hessatho ooththikko inte salo Aawas nayta gidana. Izi awa arshe iitatassinne lo7otas issi bolla gaththi imees. Irakka xillotassinne nagaranchatas issi bolla bukises.
40005046	Intena dosizayta xalala inte dosikko intes aaza go7ay dizee? Qaraxa qanxisizyti hessatho ooththetennee?
40005047	Inte ishata xalla inte sarotikko hankoytappe aazan lo7etii? Ammanontaytikka hessatho ooththetes.
40005048	Hessa gish inte salo Aaway wosoy bayndayta gidida mala inteka wosoy bayndade gidite.
40006001	“Asi intena beyana mala asa sinthan lo7o ooththonta mala naagettite; hessatho ooththikko inte salo Aawappe go7a demmeketa.
40006002	Inte manqotas maado immiza wode asi tana beyo giidi asa sinthan bonchetanas ogeninne Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan xurumba punisiza qoodheppe qommon hanizaytatho ooththofte. Ta intes tumu gays; isti ba waaga ubba haan ekkichida.
40006003	Inte manqotas immishin ushachcha kushey ooththiza hadirisa kushey eroppo.
40006004	Inte imoy geeman gido; qotan oosettidayssa beyiza inte Aawayka inte waaga intes immana.
40006005	“Inte woossishe qoodheppe qommon hanizayta mala hanoppite; isti asi beyana mala Ayhuda woosa keeththataninne oyddu oge bolla eqqidi woossanas dossettes. Ta intes tumu gays; isti kumeththa waaga ekichida.
40006006	Ne woossana geliza ne kifile gela; karekka ne bolla gordada geeman diza ne Aawakko woossa. Geeman oosettidayssa beyiza ne Aaway ne ooso mala nees immana.
40006007	“Ammanonta asay issi qaala zaari zaari woossikko istas siyetiza misatin isti zaari zaari gizayssatho inteka woossishe issi qaala zaari zaari gooppite.
40006008	Gido attin inte Aaway inte woossanappe kasetidi intes aazi koshshizakkone eriza gish inte ista misatoppite.
40006009	Inte woossishe ‘Salon diza nu Aawawu! Ne sunthi anjeto.
40006010	Ne kawotethi haayo; ne sheney salon gidida mala sa7anka hano.
40006011	Hachchis gidiza kath nuus hachchi imma.
40006012	Nu nuna qohidaytas atto giza mala nekka nu qoho nuus atto ga.
40006013	Iitappe nuna ashsha attin nuna paacen gelthofa; bonchoy merpe merna gakkanaas neyssa. Amiin’ gi woossite.
40006014	“Inte intena qohidaytas atto giikko inte salo Aaway intes atto gaana.
40006015	Qasse inte asa nagara atto gonta ixikko inte Aawayka inte nagara atto geenna.
40006016	“Inte xooma xoomishe qoodheppe qommora xoomizaytatho shullofte. Isti ba xoomizayssa asi erana mala ba ayfeso iissetes. Ta tumu gays; hessatho ooththizayti ba waaga kumeth ekkichida.
40006017	Neni xooma xoomashe ne ayfeso meeceta, ne hu7e tiyetta.
40006018	Hessatho ne xoomikko geeman diza ne Aaway xalala erizazinne asi oonikka eronta qotan gidana. Qotan oosettidayssa beyiza ne Aawayka ne waaga nees immana.
40006019	“Bilay mizason buuqidinne shiydi mooretizason kaysoy bookkidi kaysanas dandayizason, ha biitta bolla intes miishe shiishofte.
40006020	Gido attin bilay maanas, buuqidi woykko shiydi mooretontason, kaysoy bookki ekkana dandayontason heen salon intes miishi shiishshite.
40006021	Ne miishay dizason ne woznay heen dees.
40006022	“Ayfey asatethas poo7o; hessa gish ne ayfey paxa gidikko, ne kumeththa asatethayka poo7o gidana.
40006023	Ne ayfey hargancha gidikko, ne kumeththa asatethayka dhuma xalla gidana. Histikko nenan diza poo7oy dhuma gidikko, qasse dhumay waanida gird gida dhuma gidandee?
40006024	“Issi asi nam7u godas ooththana dandayenna. Issa ixidi nam7anthoza dosana; woykko issa bonchidi nam7antha leqqana; Xoossassinne miishas nam7atas gaththi ooththanas dandayettenna.
40006025	“Hessa gish ta intena inte duussa gish ay miinoo? Ay uyinoo? Ay may7inoo? giidi hirgofte gays. Shempoy qumappe, ashoy may7oppe aadhdhenee?
40006026	Ane salo kafota xeellite! Zerettenna, maxettenna, di7en qoletenna shin inte salo Aaway ista mizees. Inte istafe keehi aadhdheketii?
40006027	Ane intefe daro waayettidi baas imettida laytha bolla hara issi gallas gujana dandayiza asi dizee?
40006028	“Qasse may7o gish aazas hirgetii? Ane coo denban diza ciishshata xeellite; daaburetenna woykko suqetenna.
40006029	Hessa gish ta intena gizay haray atto shin kawo Solomoonikka ba bonchora ha ciishshatappe issiney mala lo7o may7ibenna.
40006030	Inteno pace ammanoy dizayto! Hachchi asa ayfen beettidi wonto taman wodhdhana maata hayssatho mayziza Xoossi intena hessafe lo7ethi aaththi mayzanas dandayenee?
40006031	Hessa gish nu ay maanee? Ay uyanee? Ay may7anee? giidi hirgofte.
40006032	Hanko ammanonta asay hayssa demmanas daro qoppees. Hayssi wuri intes koshshizayssa inte salo Aaway erees.
40006033	Harappe sinthatidi Xoossa Kawoteththa xilloteth koyite; hayti wuri intes gujettana.
40006034	Hessa gish wontos keehi qoppofte; wonto metoy wontos aqo; issi issi gallassay baassi gidiza metora dees.
40007001	“Inte bolla pirdetonta mala hara asa bolla pirdofte.
40007002	Inte pirdida mala inte bollakka pirdettana. Inte makkida miishara intes makettana.
40007003	Ne ayfen diza gita mitha beyonta dashe ne isha ayfen diza qeeri buura aazas xeellay?
40007004	Ne ayfen gita mithi dishin ne isha ‘Ane ta ne ayfeppe qeeri buurayo kessays’ gaanas waana dandayay?
40007005	Neno qoodheppe qommon hanizaysso kasetada ne ayfen diza gita mitha kessaycha. Hessafe kaallada ne isha ayfen diza buura kessanas lo7etha xeellandasa.
40007006	Ba tohon yedhonta malanne simmidi intena saxi daakerethonta mala anjettidayssa kanata sinthan yeggofte; qasse inte worqakka guddunthata sinthan yeggofte.
40007007	“Woossite intes imettana; koyite inte demmana; kare qoxite intes doyettana.
40007008	Woossida ubbas imettana; koyiza asi demmana; qoxizades karey doyettana.
40007009	Inte giddofe issades nay uketh woossikko shuch immiza aaway dandee?
40007010	Woykko mole woossikko shoosh immizadey dandee?
40007011	Histin inte iitata gidi uttidi inte naytas lo7o miish imo erizayta gidikko inte salo Aaway iza woossizaytas waanidi aadhdhiza lo7o miish imenee?
40007012	Hessa gish hara asi intes ooththana mala inte koyizayssa, inteka haratas ooththite. Muse wogaynne nabeti hayssan kuuyettes.
40007013	“Xuuntha pengera gelite; dhayoso efiza ogey gita; pengeykka aaho; daro asay he pengezara gelees.
40007014	De7os gaththiza ogey gidikko xuuntha; pengeykka xuuntha; gelanaytikka guuthata xalala.
40007015	“Istas giddo baggay Kana suyte mala gidi uttidinne dorsa ite may7idi inte giddo gelidi giddora ooththiza wordo nabetappe naagettite.
40007016	Inte ista, ista ooson erandeta. Aguntha worappe woyney, kindicho agunthafe balase ayfey maxetizee?
40007017	Hessathoka lo7o mithi wuri lo7o ayfees; iita mithika iita ayfe ayfees.
40007018	Lo7o mithi iita ayfe ayfanas dandayontayssa mala iita mithi lo7o ayfe ayfanas dandayenna.
40007019	Lo7o ayfe ayfonta mithi wurikka qanxetananne taman yegettana.
40007020	Hessa gish inte ista isti ayfiza ayfen shaakki erana.
40007021	“Salon diza ta Aawa shene polonta dishe tana ‘Godo! Godo!’ gizay wuri Salo Kawoteth gelenna.
40007022	He gallas daroti ‘Godo! Godo! Nuni ne sunthan tinbite yootibekonii? Ne sunthan daydanthi kessibekonii? Ne sunthan daro malata ooththibekonii?’ gaana.
40007023	He wode ta istas ‘Ta intena mulekka erikke! Inte iitati taappe haakkite’ gaada qoncera ta istas yootana.
40007024	“Histikko hayssa ta qaala siydi ooson peyshizadey ba keeththe zaalla bolla keexizade misatees.
40007025	Deexo iray bukkin; haroyka harottides; carkoyka carkides; keeththaka sugides shin zaalla bolla keexettida gish kundibenna.
40007026	“Hayssa ta qaala siydi ooththontadey gidikko ba keeththe ace bolla keexida eeya asa mala.
40007027	Deexo iray bukkin haroyka harottides; carkoyka carkides; he keeththaka sugides; keeththayka iita kundeth kundides” gides.
40007028	Yesusi tamarsi wursin asay iza timirtezan malalettides.
40007029	Gaasoyka Muse woga tamarsizayta mala gidonta izi godateththi diza asa mala tamarsides.
40008001	Yesusi zuma bollafe wodhdhin daro derey iza kaallides.
40008002	Issi inchiracha hargey dizaddey Yesusakko shiiqidi iza sinthan gulbatidi “Godo! Ne koykko tana pathanas dandayassa” gides
40008003	Yesusi ba kushe yeddidi “Ta dosadis; paxa!” giin addezi he hargezappe heerakka paxides.
40008004	Qasseka Yesusi addeza “Ne paxidayssa oonaska yootoppa; gido attin baada nena Qeeses bessa. Isti azazida yarshoza gaththa; hessika istas marka gidana” gides.
40008005	Yesusi Qifirnahoome gakkida mala mato halaqay izakko shiiqidi iza hizgi woossides.
40008006	“Godo! Ta ashkaray keehi sakettidi keeththan ichchidi dees” gides.
40008007	Yesusikka izas “Ta baada pathana” gides.
40008008	Mato halaqay izas zaaridi “Ta nena ta keeththe gelthanas bessizadde gidikke; gido attin ne haan daada issi qaala xalla giikko ta ashkaray paxana.
40008009	Taaska tana azaziza halaqati taappe bollara deettes; qasseka taas azazettiza wotadarati taappe garsara deettes; istafe issa ‘Ba!’ giikko bees; qasse issa ‘Haaya!’ giikko yees; ta ashkara ‘Hessa ooththa!’ giikko ooththes” gides.
40008010	Yesusi iza zaarozan malaletidi bana kaallizaytas “Ta intes tumu gays; haray attoshin Isra7eeleta giddon hayssa mala ammanoy dizadde issadeka demmabekke.
40008011	Ta intes yootays; daroti awa arshey mokkiza baggafenne wulliza baggafe yaana. Salo Kawoteththa maaddan Abrahaamentara Yisaaqantaranne Yaqoobentara issife uttana.
40008012	Salo Kawotethi istas gidana bessiza asati heen kare dhuman yegettana. Heenka yeehoynne achcha garcech gidana” gides.
40008013	Yesusikka mato halaqas “Ne ba ne ammano mala nees hano” gides; ashkarazi heerakka paxides.
40008014	Yesusikka buro Phexroosa keeththe gelshin Phexroosa bolloteya misho harge saketada ichchidaaro beyides.
40008015	Izi kushe Yesusi bochchin misho hargey aggides. Izakka dendada Yesusa mokkadus.
40008016	He gallasa omaris daydanthi oykkida daro asata Yesusakko ehida. Izikka tuna ayanata ba qaalara istafe kessides; harganchataka ubba pathides.
40008017	Isayaasi “Izi nu harge ekkides; nu sakokka tookkides” gida qaalay hayssan polettides.
40008018	Daro asay iza giddoththidayssa biyidi Yesusi asaa abbafe he pinth pinana mala azazides.
40008019	Hessa wode issi Ayhuda ammano tamarsizadey izakko shiiqidi “Astamaare! Ne bizaso awakka ta nena kaallana” gides.
40008020	Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Workanatas ollay dees; salo kafotas keeththi dees; taas Asa Naas gidikko hu7e gelthizasoy baawa” gides.
40008021	Iza kaalliza issi hara asi qasse “Godo! Koyro baada ta aawa moogoo?” gides.
40008022	Izi qasse “Hayqidayti ba hayqeth moogeto; neni gidikko tana kaalla” gides.
40008023	Hessafe guye Yesusikka wogolon gelin iza kaallizaytikka izara issife bida.
40008024	Qopponta abba giddon dambalay dendidi wogoloyo mittana gakkanaas ista waayssides. Hessi wuri hanishin Yesusi dhiskides.
40008025	Iza kaallizayti iza beegoththidi “Godo! Nu dhayoos; nuna ashsha!” gida.
40008026	Yesusikka ista “Inteno ammanoy paccidayto! Aazas hayssa mala babbetii?” gides. Hessafe dendidi carkozanne abba dambala izi hanqin heerakka sirph gides.
40008027	Istika “Hayssi abbaynne carkoyka izas azazettizaddey izi waanidadee?” giidi malaletida.
40008028	Izi abba pinnidi Gergesenoone geetettiza dere gakkida mala daydanthi oykkida nam7u as dayti ba diza dufoppe kezidi izara gaaggida. Asi he ogezara aadhdhanas dandayetonta mala asas daro keehi meto gidi deettes.
40008029	Istika “Xoossa Nawu! Nees nunara aaza issifeteth dizee? Nu wodey gakkonta dishin nuna xuugana yadii?” giidi waassida.
40008030	Heen istafe guuth haakkidi daro gudduntha wudey issi bolla heemetes.
40008031	Daydanthati Yesusa “Ne nuna kessana gidikko haytan daro guddunthatan nu gelana mala nuus piqaade imma” giidi woossida.
40008032	Yesusikka ista “Biite!” gides. Daydanthatikka istafe kezidi guddunthatan gelida. Guddunthati wurikka ba dizaso aafora bicharshe abban gelidi haaththan mitettidi hayqqida.
40008033	Gudduntha heemmizayti elelidi katamay dizaso biidi guddunthay hanoyssanne daydanthi ista oykkida asata bolla hanidayssa ubba asas yootida.
40008034	Katama asay wuri Yesusara gagganas kezides. Yesusa beyidinne ista dere yeddi baana mala iza woossida.
40009001	Hessafe guye Yesusi abba bolla wogolora pinnidi kase ba diza katama yides.
40009002	Heen issi gunda addeza, asay halara tookkidi Yesusakko ehides. Yesusikka ista ammano beyidi gunda addeza “Aykkoy ba; haysso naazo! Ne nagaray atto geetettides” gides.
40009003	He wode Muse woga tamarsizayti “Hayssi Xoossa cashsha” giidi ba woznan qoppida.
40009004	Yesusi ista qofa eridi “Inte woznan iita yo7o aazas qoppetii?
40009005	‘Ne nagaray atto geetettides’ guussafenne ‘Dendada ba!’ guussafe awayssi kawushshee?
40009006	Gido attin Asa Naas biitta bolla ase nagarappe maaranas sheney dizayssa erana malassa” giidi gunda addeza “Denda! Ne hala ekkada gede neso ba” gides.
40009007	Gunda addezikka dendidi baso bides.
40009008	Dereyka hessa beyidi malaletethaninne babon kumidi hayssa sire godateththi asas immida Xoossa galatides.
40009009	Yesusi heeppe dendidi bishe issi Matoosa geetettizadey qaraxa qanxisizason uttidayssa beyidi “Tana kaalla!” giin, dendidi iza kaallides.
40009010	Yesusi Matoosason maadda bolla dishin daro qaraxa qaraxizytinne nagaranchati izakko yiidi izaranne iza kaallizaytara issife maanas uttida.
40009011	Farsaaweeti hessa biyidi Yesusa kaallizayta “Intena tamarsizayssi qaraxa qanxisizaytaranne nagaranchatara wosti istara issife kath mizee?” gi oychida.
40009012	Yesusikka isti gizayssa siydi ista “Aakkimey koshshizay saketidaytas attin saketonta paxatas gidenna.
40009013	Hessa gish ‘Inte biidi yarsho gidonta maaroteth dosays’ giza qaala birsheth tamarite. Nagaranchata xeeygana yadis attin xillota xeeyganas yabekke” gides.
40009014	Xammaqiza Yohannisa kaallizayti Yesusakko yiidi “Nuninne Farsaaweeti xoomishin nena kaallizayti aazas xoometenee?” gi oychida.
40009015	Yesusi istas “Mishiraa laggeti mishirazi istara dishin muuzotana bessizee? Mishiray istafe ekettana wodey yaana; isti he wode xoomana.
40009016	“Gal7a may7o bolla ooratha woso woththi sikkiza asi deenna. Gal7a bolla oorath woththi sikkikko oorathazi gala7aza peedherethidi ha daassi darissanna.
40009017	Oonikka ooratha woyne cajje gal7a lukkamon gujenna. Gujiza gidikko lukkamozi dhuuqana; woyne cajjezikka gukkana; lukkamozikka go7ay bayndazi gidana. Gido attin ooratha woyne cajjey ooratha lukkamozan gujjetees. Hessa malara woyne cajjezinne lukkamozi lo7o naagettidi gam7ana” gides.
40009018	Yesusi asaa haasaysson dishin issi shuumey iza sinthan kundidi “Taas naa daara hayqqana gawus. Iza paxa daana mala yaada ne kushe izi bolla wotharkii?” giin,
40009019	Yesusi dendidi izara bides; Yesusa kaallizaytikka izara bida.
40009020	Tammanne nam7u layth kumeth izippe suuthi gukkiza issi macassi Yesusappe guyera yaada iza afala macara bochchadus.
40009021	Iza hessa ooththiday “Ta izas afaala macara bochidakko paxana” giza ammanoy izi woznan diza gish bochadus.
40009022	Yesusikka guye simmi xeelidi macasayo “Aykkoy ba, ta naye; nena ne ammanoy pathides” giin macasaya heerakka paxaagadus.
40009023	Yesusikka shuumeza so mata gakkishin derey zayeranne dinkera waassishe yeekkizayssa be7idi,
40009024	“Kichchite! Naya dhiskadus attin hayqqabeekku” giin isti iza bolla miicida.
40009025	Derey wuri keeththafe kezin izi keeththe gelidi nay kushe oykkides; nayakka denda eqadus.
40009026	Iza goobatethi he dere ubban seetettides.
40009027	Yesusikka heeppe bishin nam7u qooqeti “Dawute Nawu! Nuna maarariki!” giidi waassishe iza geedo kaallida.
40009028	Qooqetikka Yesusi gelida keeththa iza kaallidi gelida. Yesusikka ista “Ta inte ayfe pathana danda7izayssa ammanetii?” giidi oychides. Istika “Ee, Godo!” gida.
40009029	Hessafe guye Yesusi ista ayfe bochidi “Inte ammano mala intes hano!” gides.
40009030	Ista ayfeykka xeellides. Yesusikka “Hayssa oonikka eronta mala” giidi minthi yootides.
40009031	Gido attin isti biidi, heera ubbason Yesusa gish woresida.
40009032	Isti heeppe kezishin daydanthi oykkida issi duuna duude as Yesusakko ehida.
40009033	Daydanthazi kezidappe guye he duuna duude addezi haasaya oykkides; derezikka malaletidi “Hayssa mala hanoy Isra7eele biittan hanin nu beyi erokko” gida.
40009034	Gido attin Farsaaweeti zaaridi iza “Daydanthi kessizay daydanthata halaqanna” gida.
40009035	Yesusi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan Ayhudata tamarsishenne Xoossa Kawoteththa Mishiraachcho qaala yootishe qasseka harge ubbaafe asa paathishe gutatan gutatan yuuyides.
40009036	Asay wuri heemizadey baynda dorsa mala keehi metotettidi xeellizay bayndade gididayssa beyida wode istas daro mishettides.
40009037	Bana kaallizaytaska “Maxa gakkida kaththay daro shin maxi shiishshizayti guuthata.
40009038	Hessa gish kaththa Goday kaththako oosanchata yeddana mala woossite!” gides.
40010001	Yesusi bana kaalliza tammanne nam7ata baako xeygidi, isti tuna ayanata kessana mala qasseka sakoppenne hargefe pathana mala istas godateth immides.
40010002	Tammanne nam7u Hawaareta sunthay hayssafe kaallizayssa; koyro Phexroosa geetettiza Simoona, iza isha Indiraasa, Zabidoosa naa Yaqoobenne iza isha Yohannisa,
40010003	Piliphoosanne Bartelemoosa, Toomaasanne qaraxa shiishshiza Matoosa, Ilfiyoosa naa Yaqoobenne Tadoosa,
40010004	ba baggas mishetiza Simoonanne guyeppe Yesusa hayqos aaththi immida Asqoroonto Yuhuda.
40010005	Hayta tammanne nam7ata ubba “Gede Ayzaabeta gaath booppite; Samaariya asaa katama geloppite.
40010006	Gido attin Isra7eele deraa garsafe dhayida dorsatakko biite.
40010007	Biidinne ‘Salo kawoteth matides!’ giidi sabakite.
40010008	Harganchata paathite, hayqqidayta hayqoppe denthite, inchiracha hargizayta geeshshite; daydanthata kessite; inte mela ekidayssa mela immite;
40010009	worqa, bira woykko xarqimala gidin inte kiisen oykkofte.
40010010	Oosanchas hachchis hachchis gidizazi koshshiza gish inte oges giidi shinqe, koshshonta may7o, caamma woykko guufe eki booppite.
40010011	“Issi katama woykko issi guta inte geliza wode intena mokkanade koyi demmidi iza keeththan shempite; heeppe kezana gakkanaas heen diishshite.
40010012	Inte oona keeththika gelishe ‘Saro’ giite.
40010013	He keeththay sarotay bessiza keeththe gidikko inte sarotay he keeththas gido; sorotay bessonta keeththe gidikko inte sarotay aggidi intes simmo.
40010014	Ay asikka intena mokki ekkanasinne inte giza siyanas koyontade gidikko hessade keeththafe woykko he katamappe kezishe ista bolla yiza gomeppe inte attidayssas marka gidana mala inte toho bolla diza gudula pittidi kezite.
40010015	Ta intes tumu gays; pirda gallas he katamay bolla gakkana pirday Soddome bollan Gamoora bolla gakkida pirdafe deexo gidana.
40010016	“Ta intena dorsa mala kana suyteta giddora kiittays. Hessa gish shoosha mala cincatanne haraphe mala ashketa gidite.
40010017	Asay intena oykkidi pirdiza duulatas shiishana; Ayhudati ba Woosa Keeththan intena garafana; hessa gish istafe naagettite.
40010018	Ta geedon dere haarizaytakkonne kawotakko intena efana; ista sintheninne ammanonta asata sinthan inte marka gidana.
40010019	Intena isti oykkiza wode ‘Nu ay gi haasayinoo? Wozgi zaaro imminoo?’ gi hirgofte. He wode inte gaanazi intes imettana.
40010020	Intenan haasayanay inte Aawa Ayanappe attin intena gidekketa.
40010021	“Ishay ba isha hayqos aaththi immana; aaway ba naa bolla, nayti bana yelidayta bolla makalatethan dendidi hara asan wodhisana.
40010022	Ta gish asi wurikka intena ixana. Gido attin wurseth gakkanaas miqnni eqiday izi attana.
40010023	Asay intena inte diza heerappe gooddikko haraso kichchite! Ta intes tumu gays; inte Isra7eele katama ubba gakkonta dishin ta Asa Nay yaana.
40010024	“Ashkaray godappe woykko kaallizadey kaalethizadefe aadhdhenna.
40010025	Tamarey bana tamarsizayssa mala woykko ashkaray goda mala gidikko hessi izas gidana. Keeththa aawa ‘Bi7elizeebula’ giikko so asaa ayssi hessafe iita geetenne!
40010026	“Hessa gish istas babbofte; geemetiday qonconta qotetiday geesh kezonta attenna.
40010027	Ta intes dhumara yootidayssa poo7on haasayite; haythan siyidayssa qoncen haasayite.
40010028	Asho wodhikkofe attin shempo wodhanas dandayontaytas babbofte; hessafe ashonne shempo gathi Gaanname taman dhayssanas dandayizayssas babbite.
40010029	Issi santen bayzettiza nam7u siine kafotappe issiniyakka inte salo Aawa sheney baynda coo kunda attuku.
40010030	Haray atto shin inte hu7e binanaykka tayibon dees.
40010031	Hessa gish babbofte. Daro siine kafotappe inte waagay aadhdhi bonchettidaza.
40010032	“Asa sinthan taas markattizades takka salon diza ta Aawa sinthan izades markatana.
40010033	Qasse asa sinthan tana kadidade takka salon diza ta Aawa sinthan iza kadana.
40010034	“Ta biitta bolla saroteth ehanas yida intes misatoppo; mashsha ehanas attin saroteth ehanas yabeekke.
40010035	Tani yiday naa aawappe, maca naa aayippe, naa macho bollotippe shaakanassa.
40010036	Asas morkey so asa gidana.
40010037	“Taappe aaththidi ba aawa woykko ba aayo siiqizadey taas gidanas bessenna. Taappe aaththidi ba attuma naa woykko, maca naa siiqizadey taas gidanas bessenna.
40010038	Ba masqale tookkidi tana kaallonta asi taas gidanas bessenna.
40010039	Ba shempo aashshanas koyizadey dhaysses; ba shempo ta gish aaththi immizadey ashshees.
40010040	“Intena mokki ekizadey tanakka mokki ekkees. Tana mokki ekkizadey tana kiittidadekka mokki ekkees.
40010041	Issi nabe nabetethan mokki ekkizadey he nabeza waaga demmana. Xillo as iza xillotetha gish mokki ekkikko he xilloza waaga ekkana.
40010042	Hessa gish ta intes tumu gays; oonikka hayta guuthatappe tana kaallizade gidida gish issi xu7a irxa haath ushshikko hinniska waagay dhayenna” gides.
40011001	Yesusikka bana kaalliza tammanne nam7u asatas azazo immi wursidappe guye tamarsanassinne sabakanas Galilan diza katamata bides.
40011002	Yohannisi qasho keeththan dishe Kirstoosas ooththiza hanota siydi bana kaallizayta izakko yeddidi “Asi ashshizaddey yaana geetettiday neneyee? Hara naaginoo?” giidi oychides.
40011004	Yesusikka zaaridi “Biidi inte sidayssanne inte beyidayssa Yohannisas yootite.
40011005	Qooqeti xeellettes; wobeti hammutettes; inchracha hargizayti paxettes; tulleti siyettes; hayqidayti hayqoppe paxi dendettes; manqotas Mishiraachcho qaalay yootettes.
40011006	Tanan dhuphetontadey anjettidade” gides.
40011007	Yohannisa kaallizayti bidappe guye Yesusikka asas Yohannisa gish “Ay beyanas duge bazzo bidetii? Carkoy qaathiza shomboqo beyanas yidetii?
40011008	Woykko ay beyanas kezidetii? Lo7o may7o may7idi lo7i uttidade beyana yidetii? Lo7o may7o may7idi lo7izayti kawota keeththan deettes.
40011009	Histin ay beyana kezidetii? Nabe beyana kezidetii? Ee, ta intes gays nabeppe aadhdhizayssa beyanassa.
40011010	‘Ne bana oge nees giigissanadde neeppe kaseta ta nees kiittana geetettidi iza gish kase xaafettidadey izakko!’ gides.
40011011	Ta intes tumu gays; macasape yeletida asappe xammaqiza Yohannisa misatiza asi biitta bolla dendibenna. Gidikkoka Xoossa Kawoteththan as ubbafe laafa asi Yohannisappe aadhdhana.
40011012	“Xammaqiza Yohannisa wodeppe ha simmin ha7i gakkanaas Salo Kawoteththaya daro baaxeta bolla dawus. Mino asati xalla izo demmana.
40011013	Nabetikka Muse wogaykka wuri Yohannisa wode gakkanaas buroppe hananayssa yootida.
40011014	Histikko inte ekkana koykko izi yaana geetettida Elaasi izakko!
40011015	Siyiza haythi diza as siyo!
40011016	“Hayssa ha wode asaa aazan leemisoo? Giyan uttidi ba laggeta ‘Nu intes diiththi diixxin inte durbeekketa! Yeeho zilalth zilalin yeekkibeekketa!’ giza nayta misatetes.
40011018	Yohannisi muussafenne ushshafe naagetidi yida gish ‘Izi daydanthara dees’ gida.
40011019	Ta Asa Nay mashenne uyashe yiin ‘Hayssi miidi kallonta asa, ushshancha, qaraxa shiishshizaytassinne nagaranchatas laggekko!’ gida. Gido attin Xoossa eratethi ba ooson xilladus” gides.
40011020	Hessafe guye Yesusi izi malatata ooththida katama asay maarotethan gelonta aggida gish “Kuraziinenne Betesayda! Intena aayye ana! Inte bolla oosettida malatay Xiroose bollanne Sidoona bolla oosettidakko isti maaqa may7idinne bidinthan uttidi beni beni maarotethan gelanakoshin.
40011022	Hessa gish tani intes gizay pirda gallas intefe aadhdhi Xiroosessinne Sidoonas qixaatey kawuyana.
40011023	“Hanne Qifirnahoome pude salo dhoqu dhoqu gaanas koyadii? Gido attin neni duge Si7oole wodhandassa; ne bolla oosettida malatay Soddomen oosettidakko Soddomey hachchi gakkanaas daanakkoshin.
40011024	Hessa gish ta nena gizay pirda gallas qixaatey neeppe Soddomes kawuyana” gides.
40011025	He wode Yesusi “Salonne sa7a Godo! Ta Aawawu! Hayssa daro eranchataappene cincatappe qotada qeeri naytas ne qoncisida gish ta nena galatays.
40011026	Ta Aawawu! Ee hayssi ne sinthan lo7o ne shene gididi beettides.
40011027	“Wurikka ta Aawappe taas imettides; Aawappe attin Naaza gish eriza as baawa; qasse Naazappenne Naazi ba shenen qoncisida asappe haray aawa eriza as baawa.
40011028	“Toohoy deexxidayto, daaburidayto inte wurikka taakko ha yiite; takka intes shempo immana.
40011029	Ta qambara tookkite; taappekka tamarite; tani ta woznan aadanne ashke; inte shempos inte shempo demmana.
40011030	Ta qambaray shaykonne ta toohoy kawushsha” gides.
40012001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Sambata gallas kaththa giddora aadhdhi bides. Iza kaallizaytikka gafida gish tiya duuththidi shigechi muus oykkida.
40012002	Farsaaweeti hessa beyidi Yesusa “Hekko nena kaallizayti Sambata gallas ooththetanas bessontayssa ooththetes” gida.
40012003	Izikka istas zaaridi “Dawuteynne izara diza asati gafida wode izi ay ooththidakkone nababibeekketii?
40012004	Xoossa Keeththe gelidi Qeesetappe attin Dawuteynne izara dizayti bochchanas bessonta dummatida uketh mides.
40012005	Qasse Qeeseti Sambata shaaridi Xoossa Keeththa giddon ooso ooththikko mooro gidontayssa Muse wogappe nababibeekketii?
40012006	Gidikkoka ta intes gizay Xoossa Keeththafe aadhdhizadey haan dees.
40012007	‘Tani yarsho gidonta maaroteth dosays’ giza qaalay ay guussikkone inte erizakko xillota bolla pirdeketakkoshin.
40012008	Asa Nay Sambatas Goda” gides.
40012009	Heeppe izi gede aadhdhishe Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan gelides.
40012010	Henka issi kushe silidadey dees. Yesusa mootanas gaaso koydi “Sambata gallas pathanas bessizee?” giidi iza oychides.
40012011	Izikka ista “Intefe issade dorsi Sambata gallas ollan gelikko ba dorsa izi gelidi ollafe goochchi kessi erenee?
40012012	Histikko asi dorsafe keehi aadhdhenee? Hessa gish Sambata gallas lo7o oosoy digettenna” gides.
40012013	Qasseka addeza “Ne kushe piddisa!” gides; addezikka ba kushe piddisin hinko kusheza mala paxa gidides.
40012014	Gido attin Farsaaweeti heeppe kezidi, Yesusa wosti oykki wodhanakonne ba giddon zoretida.
40012015	Yesusi ista qofa eridi heeppe haraso sher7i gides. Daro derey iza kaallides; harganchatakka ubba pathides.
40012016	Izi oonakkone asas yootonta mala ista azazides.
40012017	Hessika haniday nabe Isayaasan “Ta dooridaynne ta izan ufayettiza ta nay hayssakko! Ta Ayanappe ta iza bolla wothana; izikka ammanonta deretas tumu pirda awajjana; marshettenna; woykko waassenna. Izas qaalaykka karen siyettenna; tuma pirda xoonos gaththana gakkanaas dincetti uttida shomboqokka menthenanne cuwattiza muqadakka toyssenna; Ayzaabeti iza ufayssan naagana” geetetti yootettida tinbite qaalay polettana.
40012022	Hessafe guye daydanthi oykkin xeellanassinne haasayanas dandayonta issi as Yesusakko ekki yida. Yesusikka iza pathin addezi xeellanassinne haasayanas dandayides.
40012023	Asay wurikka malaletidi “Hayssi addezi Dawute naashaa?” gides.
40012024	Gido attin Farsaaweeti hessa siyida wode “Hayssi addezi daydanth kessizay daydantha halaqa Bi7elizeebula wolqan xalla gidanas bessees” gida.
40012025	Yesusikka ista qofa eridi “Ba giddon issoy issafe shaakettiza kawotethi wurikka kundana; ba giddon shaakettiza katamay woykko keeththa asi minnenna.
40012026	Xala7ey Xala7e kessiza gidikko Xala7ey ba giddon shaakettides guussa. Hessatho hanikko iza kawotethi waani minnana dandayizee?
40012027	Tani Bi7elizeebula wolqan kessiza gidikko inte nayti aaza wolqan kessanee? Hessa gish inte nayti inte bolla pirdana.
40012028	Gido attin tani daydanth kessizay Xoossa Ayanan gidikko Xoossa Kawotethi inteko yides guussa.
40012029	“Woykko issi as wolqara dizadde keeththe gelidi miishe bonqana koyko kasetidi he wolqara diza addeza oykki qachonta wosti bonqanee? Qachidappe guye bonqana dandayees.
40012030	“Tanara gidontadey tanara eqettees; tanara issife shiishonta asi wurikka laalles.
40012031	Hessa gish ta intes tumu gays; nagara oosoynne cashshi wuri asas atto getettana shin Xillo Ayana cayidadey maarettenna.
40012032	Ay asikka asaa naa bolla haasayiza iita qaala gish maarettana shin, Xillo Ayana bolla haasayiza iita qaalay gidikko hayssa ha woden gidin woykko buro yaana woden gidin maaroy deenna.
40012033	“Mithi wuri ayfen eretizayssa mala inte lo7o ayfe demmanas intes lo7o mithi do; intes iita mithi diza gidikko inte iita ayfe ekkana.
40012034	Inteno mardzera diza shooshato! Inte iitata gidi uttidi wosti lo7o haasayanas dandayetii? Ulo giddon kumidazi duunara hasayettes.
40012035	“Lo7o asi ba woznan kunthi woththida lo7o qofappe lo7o haasayees; iita asikka ba woznan kunthi woththida iitatethafe iita yo7o kessees.
40012036	Gido attin ta intes gizay asay ba haasayida hada qaala ubba gish pirda gallas wurikka oyshettana.
40012037	Gaasoyka ne qaalappe dendidayssan ne xillada attananne ne qaalappe dendidayssan ne bolla pirdettana” gides.
40012038	Hessafe guye issi issi Muse woga tamarsizaytinne Farsaaweeti Yesusa “Astamaare! Nu neeppe malalisiza malata beyanas koyoos” gida.
40012039	Izi istas zaaridi “Ha iitanne layma yelettay malata oychees; gido attin nabe Yoonaasa malatappe attin hara malatay immetenna.
40012040	Yoonaasi gita mole ulo giddon heedzdzu qammanne heedzdzu gallas gam7ida mala Asa Naykka heedzdzu gallassinne heedzdzu qamma biitta garsan gam7ana.
40012041	Nanawe asay pirda gallas hayssa ha yelettara dendidi ha yeletta bolla pirdana; gaasoyka Nanawe asay Yoonaasa markatethan maaroteth gelida gishassa. Hekko Yoonaasappe aadhdhizadey haan dees.
40012042	Dugeha dere kawoya Solomoone erateth siyanas biitta gaxappe dendada yida gish pirda gallas iza hayssa yeletethara dendada ha yeletetha bolla pirdana. Hekko Solomooneppe aadhdhizadey hayssan dees.
40012043	“Tuna ayanay asappe kezidi shempo demmanas haaththi baynda mela biittan daaburees. Gido attin ba koyiza shempo demmenna.
40012044	Hessafe qasse kase ta dizaso simma baana giidi beeniso izi simmishin kase izi dizasoy aykkoynne baynda mela keeththe gididi geeyedayssanne giigeti dizayssa demmees.
40012045	Hessafe biidi hara baappe iitiza laapun iita ayanata banara ekkidi yees. Istika he addezan gelidi de7ana. He addezas kase duussafe guye duussay iita gidana. Hayssa iita yeletethaska hessa mala hanana” gides.
40012046	Yesusi asaas yootishin iza aayeyanne ishati iza yoochana koydi karen eqqida.
40012047	Issi asi “Hekko ne aayanne ne ishati nena haasayissanas karen eqqidi nena koyeettes” gides.
40012048	Yesusikka “Ta aaya oonee? Ta ishatich, isti oonantee?” gides.
40012049	Ba kushera bana kaallizaytakko malatidi “Ta aayanne ta ishati haytanta.
40012050	Salon diza ta Aawa shene ooththizayti wurikka taas isha, michonne aayo” gides.
40013001	He gallassi Yesusi keeththafe kare kezidi abba lanqen uttides.
40013002	Daro derey iza yuuyi aadhdhi giddoththida gish asaa abba gaxan aggidi wogolo gido geli uttidi,
40013003	daro yo7o leemisora “Issi goshshanchay zereth zeranas kezides.
40013004	Izi zerishin issi issi zerethi oge duunan wodhdhin kafoti yiidi maxi mida.
40013005	Issi issi zerethi melanne shuchchatiza biitta bolla wodhdhin biittay mela biitta gidida gish elle caarides.
40013006	Gido attin away awattin shullidinne xapho yeddonta aggida gish melides.
40013007	Issi issi zerethay aguntha giddon wodhdhides; agunthayka diccidi caarechcha cuullides.
40013008	Hara zerethikka lo7o orde biittan wodhdhidi ayfeka ayfides; issoy xeetu, issoy usuppun tammu issoy heedzdzu tammu ayfe immides.
40013009	Siyiza haythi dizadey siyo!” gi yootides.
40013010	Hessafe iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Aazas leemisora yootay?” gida.
40013011	Izikka istas “Salo Kawoteththa xuura eroy intes imettides; istas gidikko imettibenna.
40013012	Dizaddes dizayssa bolla gujettananne darana shin bayndadefe hinna dizaarakka eketaychana.
40013013	Ta hayssatho leemisora yootizay isti siyishe ezgonta gishshinne xeellishe demmoonta gishassa.
40013014	“Isayaasi ‘Inte sisa siyanashin yuushi qoppeketa; xeelo xeellana shin woznan wotheketa; dereza woznay muumides; ista haythayka siyenna; xeellonta mala ba ayfe qilm7ida; hessi bayndakko isti ba ayfera beyidinne ba haythara siydi ba woznan yuushi qoppidi taakko ha simmin ta ista pathana shin’ gida tinbite qaalay istan polettides.
40013016	“Inte ayfey xeelliza gishshinne inte haythati siyiza gish inte anjettidayta.
40013017	Ta intes tumu gays; daro nabetinne daro xillo asati ha7i inte beyizayssa beyanassinne ha7i inte siyizayssa siyanas amottida shin istas hanibenna.
40013018	“Histikko ha7i zeretha leemisoza birsheth siyite:
40013019	Kawoteththa qaala siydi yuushi qopponta ay asa woznappekka Xala7ey yiidi zerettida zeretha eeson maxichana. Hessika oge bolla wodhdhida zeretha.
40013020	Shuchcha bolla zerettidayssi qaala siyida mala ufayssan siydi heerakka ufayssan ekizade misatees.
40013021	Gido attin xapho yeddanas dandayonta aggida gish daro gam7onta qaala geedon metoynne goodeteththi yiza wode eleli dhuphetes.
40013022	Aguntha giddon zerettida zerethay qaala siydi hayssa ha alamezas daro metotethanne duretetha qofan balettidinne cuulettidi ayfe immoonta asa mala.
40013023	Lo7o biittan zeretida zerethay qasse qaala siydi yuushi qoppizade misatees; tummu ayfe ayfees; issoy xeetu, issoy usuppun tammu, issoy heedzdzu tammu ayfe immides” gides.
40013024	Yesusi qasseka hara leemiso istas “Salo Kawotethi ba goshsha gaden lo7o zereth zeridade misatees.
40013025	Gido attin asi wuri ichchida wode morkey yiidi gisteza giddon leeshsho zeridi bides.
40013026	Gistezi diccidi ayfe ayfiza wode leeshshoyka izara issife beettides.
40013027	“Katha goda ashkarati godazakko shiiqidi ‘Godo! Neni ne goshshan lo7o zereth zerabeekii? Hayssi leeshshoy awappe yidee?’ gida.
40013028	“Izikka istas ‘Hessa morkey ooththides’ gides. Ashkaratikka ‘Nu biidi leeshshoza shoddana mala koyay?’ gi oychida.
40013029	“Izikka istas, ‘Akay hanenna; gaasoyka inte leeshshoza shoddishe gistezara gaththi shoddana;
40013030	aggite! Maxa wodey gakkanaas issife dicco; he wode maxizayti leeshshoza kasetidi qori maxidi taman xuuganas mirqen mirqen qachite; gisteza qasse shiishshidi gootaran gelthite’ gaada ta intes yootana” gi yootides.
40013031	Hara leemiso istas “Salo Kawotethi issi asi ba gade giddon zerida barzaafe mitha ayfe mala.
40013032	Barzaafe mitha ayfey hara mitha ayfe ubbaafe daro laafa gidikkoka diccada mitha ubbaafe gita gidawus. Salo kafotikka izi hagga bolla keexxidi daana gakkanaas gita mithi gidawus” gides.
40013033	Ha7ikka hara leemiso istas “Salo Kawotethi macassi liixey dendana mala liixe giddon gujida guutha irsho misatawus” gides.
40013034	Yesusi hayssa ubba asas leemisora yootides. Leemisoy baynda issinokka yootibenna.
40013035	Hessanka kase nabe duunan “Ta duuna ta leemison doyana; alamey medhetosappe ha simmin qotetidayssa ta haasayana” geetetti yootettidays polettides.
40013036	Hessafe Yesusi asaa aggidi so gelides. Iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Katha giddon diza leeshshoza gish ne yootida leemisoza birsheth nuus yoota” gida.
40013037	Izikka istas zaaridi “Lo7o zereth zeriday Asa Naa.
40013038	Goshshay hayssa alameza; lo7o zerethay Kawoteththa nayta gididayssa bessees; leeshshoy qasse Xala7e nayta.
40013039	Leeshshoza zeridi bida morkey Daabuloosa. Maxa wodey alame wursethi gidishin maxizayti Xoossa kiitanchata.
40013040	“Leeshshoy qoretidi taman xuugetizayssa mala alame wursethan hessatho hanana.
40013041	Asa Nay ba kiitanchata kiittana; istika nagaras gaaso gididaytanne iita ooththizayta iza Kawoteththa giddofe ubba qori kessana.
40013042	Yeehoy dizasonne ach garcizason daro wolqama taman ista yeggana.
40013043	Hessa wode xilloti ba Aawa Kawoteththan awa arshe mala poo7ana. Siyiza haythi dizadey siyo!
40013044	“Salo Kawotethi gade giddon qotetida miishe misatees. Issi as he miishayo demmidi zaari qottides. Ufayssafe dendidayssan biidi baas dizazi ubba bayzidi he miishiya diza biitta shamides.
40013045	“Hessathoka Salo Kawotethi al7o worqa koyiza zal7ancha misatees.
40013046	Daro al7o gidida inqo giza shuchcha demmida mala biidi baas dizazi ubba bayzidi shamides.
40013047	“Qasseka Salo Kawotethi abba giddon yegettidi dumma dumma mole oykkida mole gite misatees.
40013048	Mole oykkizayti gitey kumin goochchidi abba lanqe kessida. Heen uttidi lo7o lo7o mole qoridi keeshen gujida. Iita moleta wora yeggida.
40013049	Alame wursethan hessatho hanana. Kiitanchati yiidi nagaranchata xillotappe shaakkidi yeekkizasonne ach garcizaso gede to7onta taman yeggana.
40013051	“Yesusi ista hayssi wuri intes gelidee?” gides. Istika “Ee” gida.
40013052	Izikka zaaridi “Hessa gish Salo Kawoteththa xuuray gelida Muse woga tamarsizadey oonikka izas minji woththida al7o miishafe oorathanne kase gal7a miish kessizade misatees” gides.
40013053	Yesusikka hayta leemisota yooti wursidi heeppe haraso bides.
40013054	Gede ba dere biidi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan asa tamarso oykkides. Istika malalettidi “Hayssi addezi hayssa eratethanne hayta malatata ooththana wolqa awappe demmidee?
40013055	Hayssi anaxeza naa dennee? Iza aayey sunthi Maaramo gidenee? Iza ishati Yaqoobe, Yoosefe, Simoonanne Yuhuda gidettennee?
40013056	Micheti nunara dizayta gidettennee? Histin hayssi addezi hayssa ubba awappe ekidee?” gida.
40013057	Hessa gish isti izi gizayssa ekkibeetenna. Yesusikka istas “Nabey ba dereninne ba keeththan bonchettenna attin harason bonchettes” gides.
40013058	Isti ammanonta aggida gish daro malatata heen ooththibenna.
40014001	He wode Galila dere haariza Herdoosi asay Yesusa nashizayssa siydes.
40014002	Herdoosi ba ashkaratas “Hessa gidikko, Xammaqiza Yohannisi hayqoppe dendidi yides guussakka! Hayssi wuri gita malatay iza kushen oosettizay hessassa” gides.
40014003	Herdoosi ba isha Piliphoosa macho Herodiyadi gaason Yohannisa oythidi qasho keeththan yeggides.
40014004	Gaasoyka Yohannisi Herdoosa “Ne izo ekkana mala woga gidenna gida gishassa” gides.
40014005	Herdoosikka Yohannisa wodhanas koyishin asay Yohannisa nabe mala xeelliza gish babbides.
40014006	Herdoosi ba yeletetha gallas Herodiyadi naya yethan iza ufayssida gish naya iza oychidaz ubba immanas izis caaqides.
40014008	Nayakka aayey zoren “Xammaqiza Yohannisa hu7e keren wothada ha7i hannin taas imma” gadus.
40014009	He wode kawozi izas mishettides. Gido attin caaqida gishshinne izara diza imathata gish giidi nay oyshoy polettana mala azazides.
40014010	Kiittidinne Yohannisa woyne keeththan dishin qoodhe qanxisides.
40014011	Qanxetida hu7eza keren woththidi nays immida. Nayakka ekkada ba aayeys immadus.
40014012	Yohannisa kaallizayti iza aha ekkidi moogidinne hanidayssa ubba Yesusas yootida.
40014013	Hessa siyida mala Yesusi kase ba dizaso aggidinne wogolon gelidi barka hara asi bayndaso bides. Dereyka hessa siydi katamay dizasoppe tohora iza kaallides.
40014014	Yesusikka wogolozappe wodhdhishe daro asa beyidi asas mishettides. Saketizaytaka pathides.
40014015	Gadey qammi qammi bizayssa beyidi iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Hayssi nu dizasoy bazzo; gadeyka qammi qammi biza gish gede gutatan gutatan biidi baasi maanaz shammana mala asaa yedda” gida.
40014016	Gido attin Yesusikka ista “Inte asas maanaz immite attin asay baanas koshshenna” gides.
40014017	Istika izas zaaridi “Hayssan nuus ichashu ukethinne nam7u moleppe attin haray baawa” gida.
40014018	Izikka ista “Ane heyta dizayta haa taas ekki yiite” gides.
40014019	Qasseka asay maata bolla uttana mala azazides. Ichashu ukethanne nam7u moleta ba kushen oykkidi ba ayfe pude salo dhoqu histi galatidi, uketha menthi bana kaallizaytas immides. Istika asaas immida.
40014020	Asay wurikka miidi kallides. Hessafe guye iza kaallizayti asaappe mishin attidayssa tammanne nam7u leemate kumeth shiishida.
40014021	Mida asay macasattinne guutha nayti gujettonta attumasay xalala ichashu shi gidana.
40014022	Heerakka iza kaallizayti wogolon gelidi gede pinth izappe kasetidi pinana mala azazidi asa moyzanas baassi guye attides.
40014023	Dereza moyzidappe guye woossa woossanas barka zuma bolla kezides. Gadey dhuminka yaan zuma bolla barka dees.
40014024	Hessa wode wogoloya abba kantha bishin dambalay dendidi daro metotho oykkides.
40014025	Qamappe koyro kuttoy baqqishin Yesusi abba bollara hamutidi iza kaallizayti dizaso yides.
40014026	Yesusa kaallizaytikka izi abba bollara hamuti yishin beyi babbida gish iza moytile giidinne waassida.
40014027	Yesusi heerakka “Aykkoy ba! Tanakko; babbofte!” gides.
40014028	Phexroosi “Godo! Nena gidikko ta abba bollara hamutada neekko baana mala tana azaza” gides.
40014029	Yesusi iza “Haaya!” gides. Phexroosikka wogolozappe wodhdhidi haaththa bollara hamutidi Yesusakko yides.
40014030	Gido attin carkoza wolqa biyidi babbida gish haaththan miteteth oykkidi “Godo! Tana ashsha!” gi waassides.
40014031	Yesusi heerakka ba kushe yeddi oykkidi “Neno, ammanoy paccidaysso! Aazas sidhadii?” gides.
40014032	Yesusinne Phexroosi wogolozan gelida mala carkoy sirph gides.
40014033	Hessafe guye wogolon dizayti “Neni tumu Xoossa Naa!” giidi izas goynnida.
40014034	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti abba pinnidi Gensereexe geetettizaso gakkida.
40014035	Heen dizayti Yesusa gididayssa eridi, he heeran yuuyi aadhdhanas diza asaas kiita yeddida. Asaykka harganchata ubba Yesusakko ehides.
40014036	Harganchati iza afala xeera xalala bochchana mala Yesusa woossida. Bochchidayti wurikka paxida.
40015001	Qasseka Yerusalameppe yida Farsaaweetinne Muse woga tamarsizayti Yesusakko shiiqidi
40015002	“Nena kaallizayti kase nu aawata woga aazas dhayssizoo? Quma maanas kushe mecetetenna” gida.
40015003	Yesusikka istas “Inte inte wogas giidi Xoossa azazo ays shaaretii?
40015004	Xoossi ‘Ne aayiyonne ne aawa boncha; ba aawa bolla woykko ba aayi bolla iita qaala haasayidaddey hayqo!’ gi azazides.
40015005	inte gidikko ay asikka ba aawa woykko ba aayo ‘Ta intes ooththanas bessizaz ay miishekka Xoossas yarsho ooththa shiishadis’ giikko,
40015006	‘He addezi ba aawa woykko ba aayo bonchides’ geeta; hessa gish inte woga gish Xoossa qaala shaareta.
40015007	Inteno, qoodheppe qommon hanizayto! Isayaasi inte gish yootishe ‘Hayssi derey tana duunan xalala bonchees; woznay gidikko taappe haakkides; mela hada tana goynnees; ista timirteykka asi woththida woga’ gididi sinthafe hananayssa yootidayssi tumakko” gides.
40015010	Yesusi asaa baako xeygidi “Siyite woznan woththite.
40015011	As tunisizay izaade duunara ha kezizayssafe attin duunara duge gelizay tunisenna” gides.
40015012	Qasse iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Farsaaweeti ne gidayssa siydi hanqettidayssa eradii?” gida.
40015013	Izi istas “Ta Aawa saloyssi tokkonta mithi wurikka dhoqallettana.
40015014	Ista aggagite isti qooqeti kaalethiza qooqeta gidida gish, qooqeti qooqe kaalethikko nam7ay issoy issara oyketidi aafon wullana” gides.
40015015	Phexroosi Yesusa “Ne yootida leemisoza nuus birsha” gides.
40015016	Izikka “Inte ha7i gakkanaska eribeekketa guussee?
40015017	Duunara gelizay wuri duge qanthe kanthidi gede kare kezizayssa ereketii?
40015018	Duunara kezizay gidikko woznappe pultees. As tunisizay hessa.
40015019	Iita qofay, shempo wodhoy, laymay, laymatanas qaaqatoy, kaysoy, wordo markatethinne asa sunth mooroy wuri woznappe pultees.
40015020	As tunisizay haytantafe attin kushe mecetonta muusi as tunisenna” gides.
40015021	Yesusi heeppe kezidi gede Xiroosenne Sidoona geetettiza dere bides.
40015022	Issi Kanaane macassi dizaara he heerappe kezada Yesusakko yaada “Godo, Dawute nawu! Taas miisheta! Ta naya tuna ayanay oykkin keeha waayawus” gaada waassadus.
40015023	Gido attin izi issi qaalakka izis zaaribenna. Histin he wode iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Nuna kaalla kaalla waayssiza gish ne izo moyzikkochii?” giidi iza oychida.
40015024	Izikka istas “Tani Isra7eele keeththafe dhayida dorsatakko xalala kiitetadis” gides.
40015025	Macasayakka Yesusa toho bolla kundada “Godo! Tana maaddarki!” gadus.
40015026	Izikka izis zaaridi “Nayta kath ekkidi kana butulatas yegganas bessenna” gides.
40015027	Izakka “Ee Godo; butalatikka ba goda maaddappe gaden wodhdhida kath maxi meettes” gadus.
40015028	Hizgin Yesusikka macasayo “Hanne macasaye, ne ammanoy gita! Ne koyda mala nees hano” gides. Macasay nayakka heerakka paxadus.
40015029	Yesusi heeppe dendidi Galila Abba lanqe biidi heen diza issi zuma bolla kezi uttides.
40015030	Qoodan daro derey wobeta, qooqeta, silata, haasayonta duudeta harataka daro harganchata ehidi iza sinthan woththides; izikka ista pathides.
40015031	Duudey haasayishin, toho silay paxishin, wobey siti giidi hamutishin, qooqey xeellishin beyidi asay malalettides; Isra7eele Godakka galatides.
40015032	Yesusi bana kaallizayta xeygidi “Asay tanara heedzdzu gallas gam7ida gishshinne maana kaththi baynda gish asay tana michees. Oge bollan gafan daaburidi kundonta mala mela ulora yeddanas koyikke” gides.
40015033	Iza kaallizayti “Hayssan aykkoykka baynda bazzo biittan hayssa keena dere mizanas gidiza quma nu awappe demmanee?” gida.
40015034	Yesusi ista “Intes aappun ukethi dizee?” gi oychin istika “Laapun ukethinne qii guutha moleti deettes” gida.
40015035	Izikka derezi gaden uttana mala azazides.
40015036	Laapun ukethanne moleza ba kushen oykkidi galatidappe guye menthidi bana kaallizaytas immides; istika deraas gishida.
40015037	Asay wurikka miidi kallides; Yesusa kaallizayti asaappe attidayssa laapun leemate kumeth shiishida.
40015038	Midaytikka naytinne macasay baynda addeti xalala oyddu shi gidida.
40015039	Yesusi dereza moyzidappe guye wogolon gelidi Megidoone geetettizaso bides.
40016001	Farsaaweetinne Saduqaawe geetettizayti Yesusakko shiiqidi iza paacanas “Saloppe malata bessa” giidi oychida.
40016002	Izikka istas “Omarsa wode saloy zo7ikko ‘Gadey awattana’ geeta.
40016003	Wonta bolla ‘Saloy deexikko deexides; hachchi iray bukkana’ geeta; salo medha xeelidi shaakki ereeta shin ta yaana wode malata shaakki eranas dandayekketa.
40016004	Hayssi iitanne layma yelettay malata koyees; gido attin Yoonaasa malatappe attin hara malatay izas imettenna” gides. Yesusi ista heen aggagidi haraso bides.
40016005	Abba pinnida mala Yesusa kaallizayti quma oykkanayssa balettida.
40016006	Yesusikka “Qoppite; Farsaaweeta irshofenne Saduqaaweta irshofe naagettite” gides.
40016007	Isti qasse ba giddon “Nuni kath oykkonta gish hessa gides” giidi issoy issara haasayettida
40016008	Yesusikka ista qofa eridi “Inteno ammanoy paccidayto! Kath oykkonta gish aazas issoy issara haasayetetii?
40016009	Ichashu ukethi ichashu shi asas gididi aapun leematey tirpin inte denthidakkonne yuushi qoppeketii?
40016010	Hessathoka laapun ukethi oyddu shi asas gididi aapun leematey tirpin inte denthidakkonne woznan woththibeekketa guussee?
40016011	Histin ta intes yootiday kaththa gish gidontayssa waandi yuushi qoppeketii? Ha7ikka Farsaaweeta irshofenne Saduqaaweta irshofe naagettite” gides.
40016012	Ha7i izi ista qofisizay bukeeso denthanas gujiza irsho gish gidonta Farsaaweetanne Saduqaaweta timirtefe naagettana mala gididayssi istas gelides.
40016013	Yesusi Qisaariya Piliphisiyoose geetettiza biitta gakkida wode bana kaallizayta “Asay tana Asa Naa oona gizee?” giidi oychides.
40016014	Istika “Issi issi asay ‘Xammaqiza Yohannisa’ gees; bagga asay ‘Elaasa’ gees; baggay ‘Ermaasa woykko nabetappe issade gidonta aggenna’ gees” gida.
40016015	Izikka ista “Inte tana oona geetii?” gides.
40016016	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi “Neni Kirstoosa de7o Xoossa Naa gidikkii?” giidi zaarides.
40016017	Yesusi “Yoona naa Simoona neni anjettidade! Nees hayssa qoncisiday salon diza ta Aawappe attin ashonne suuthi gidenna.
40016018	Neni zaalla; hayssa zaalla bolla tani ta Woosa Keeththe keexxana; Gaanname pengetikka izo xoonetenna.
40016019	Salo Kawoteththa qulpeta ta nees immana; neni biitta bolla hano gizay wuri salonikka hanana. Biitta bolla ne hanoppo gidayssi wurikka salonikka hanenna” gides.
40016020	Qasseka izi Kirstoosa gididayssa isti oonaska yootonta mala bana kaallizaytas lo7ethi yootides.
40016021	Hessafe ha simmin Yesusi Yerusalame baanayssa, heen dere cimatan, Qeeseta halaqataninne Muse woga tamarsizayta kushen waaye ekkanayssa, hayqqanayssanne heedzdzantho gallas hayqoppe dendanayssa bana kaallizaytas qoncisidi yootides.
40016022	Phexroosi Yesusa gede issi bagga zaaridi “Godo! Hayssi ne bolla gakkofo!” giidi hanqides.
40016023	Yesusi Phexroosakko shiiqidi “Haysso Xala7e! Hayssafe kichcha! Neni asazappe attin Xoossa yo7oy ne wozna giddon baynda gish ne taas dhuphe gidadasa” gides.
40016024	Qasseka Yesusi bana kaallizaytas “Tana kaallanas dosiza asi bana kado; ba masqale tookkidi tana kaallo.
40016025	Ba shempo ashshana koyiza asi wuri dhayssana; gido attin ba shempo ta gish dhayssizadey ashshana.
40016026	Asi alamen dizaz kumeth haarid ba shempo dhayssikko iza ay maaddanee? Woykko asi ba shempo gish qanxana dandayizazi aazee?
40016027	Asa Nay ba Aawa bonchoranne salo kiitanchatara yaana; issas issas iza ooso mala izaade waaga immana.
40016028	Ta intes tumu gays; hayssan eqqida asata giddofe Asa Nay ba kawoteththara yishin beyana gakkanaas hayqoy ista bochonta asati deettes” gides.
40017001	Usuppun gallassafe guye Yesusi Phexroosanne Yaqoobe qasseka Yaqoobe isha Yohannisa banara ekkidi istara xalala issi dhoqa zuma bolla kezides.
40017002	Isti heen dishin Yesusa medhay laamettides; iza ayfesoy Awa arshe mala poo7ides; iza may7oykka poo7o mala xolqides.
40017003	Heerakka Museynne Elaasi Yesusara haasayishe istas beettides.
40017004	Phexroosi Yesusa “Godo! Nu hannin dizaakko nuus lo7okko! Ne shene gidikko issi daase nees, issi daase Muses, issi daase Elaasas heedzdzu daase ooththoo?” gides.
40017005	Izi buro haasayan dishin poo7iza shaaray ista kammides; shaara gaaththara “Tani izan ufayettiza ta dosiza ta nay hayssa; izi gizaz siyite” giza qaala giiris siyettides.
40017006	Iza kaallizaytikka hessa siyida wode dagammidi biitta bolla gufannida.
40017007	Yesusi istako shiiqi ista ba kushen bochidi “Dendite; babbofte!” gides.
40017008	Isti dhoqu gi xeellishin Yesusappe attin izara hara as oonakka be7ibeetenna.
40017009	Isti zuma bollafe wodhdhishin Yesusi “Asa Nay hayqoppe dendana gakkanaas inte beyoyssa oonaska yootonta mala” gi azazides.
40017010	Yesusa kaallizayti “Histin Muse woga tamarsizayti, Elaasi kasetidi yaana bessees aazas gizoo?” giidi oychida.
40017011	Izikka istas “Tumakko; Elaasi yiidi wursikka giigissana giidi zaarides.
40017012	Ta intes gizay Elaasi yides; gido attin asay ba koyda mala iza bolla ooththides attin iza erbeenna; hessathoka Asa Nay ista kushen waaye beyana” gides.
40017013	He wode Yesusa kaallizayti Yesusi istas yootizays Xammaqiza Yohannisa gish gididayssa erida.
40017014	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti asaakko simmida mala issi asi Yesusakko shiiqidi iza sinthan gulbatidi “Godo! Ta naa dayssa bollafe yeggiza hargey daro waayssiza gish taas maarariki! Daro wode taman kundees; haaththanka gellees.
40017016	Tani naaza nena kaallizaytakko ehadis shin isti iza pathana dandayibeetenna” gides.
40017017	Yesusi “Neno ammanonta geella yelettazo! Ayde gakkanaas ta intenara daanee? Qasse ayde gakkanaas ta intena dandayanee? Ane naaza ha taakko ehite” gides.
40017018	Hessafe guye Yesusi daydantha seeridi naazappe kessides; naazikka he saateppe simmidi paxides.
40017019	Yesusa kaallizayti xalala izakko shiiqidi “Nuni daydantha kessanas aazas dandaybeykkonii?” giidi oychida.
40017020	Izikka istas “Intes ammanoy pace gidida gish dandaybekketa; ta intes tumu gays; qeeri gaashe ayfe mala ammanoy inte bolla dizaakko hayssa zuma ‘Hayssafe dendada gede ba!’ inte gidakko izi intes baana. Intena xoonanay deenna.
40017021	Hayssa malay gidikko xoomaninne woossan attin haran kezenna” gides.
40017022	Isti Galilan issife dishin Yesusi ista “Tana Asa Naa asas aaththi immana.
40017023	Istika iza wodhana; izikka heedzdzantho gallas dendana” giin iza kaallizayti keehi mishettida.
40017024	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti Qifirnahoome geetettizaso gakkidappe guye Xoossa Keeththa giira ekkizayti Phexroosakko shiiqidi “Inte astamarey Xoossa Keeththa giira nam7u dinareza ays qanxenee?” gida.
40017025	Izikka istas “Qanxees” gides. Phexroosi so gelida mala Yesusi kasetidi “Simoona dere kawoti giira gidin woykko qaraxa gidin ba naytappe ekkizoyee? Haratappe ekkiza misatizee?” gides.
40017026	Phexroosikka “Haratappe ekkettes” gides. Yesusi “Histikko nayta bolla accoy ba guussaka!
40017027	Histikkokka ista nu dhuphethonta mala ne mole oykkiza gite ekka baada abban yegga; koyro oykkida moleza duuna ne pooqada demmiza miisha ekkada ta suntharanne ne sunthara giira qanxa” gides.
40018001	He wode Yesusa kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Salo Kawoteththan nu garasan ubbafe aadhdhanadey oonee?” gi oychida.
40018002	Yesusi issi naa xeygi ehidi ista giddon essidi “Ta intes tumu gays; inte simmonta ixikkonne guutha nayta mala hanonta ixikko mulekka Salo Kawoteth gelekketa.
40018004	Hessa gish ha naaza mala bana ziqqisizadey Salo Kawoteththan ubbafe aadhdhana.
40018005	Hayssa mala guutha naa ta sunthan ekkizadey tana ekkees.
40018006	“Gido attin tana ammaniza guuthatappe issade dhuphethizay deexo woxa shuch ba qoodhen qashettidi abba ciimman yegettidi mitettikko izas lo7o gidana” gides.
40018007	Hanna alameya asi dhuphana gaaso gidida gish izis aayye-ana! Dhuphey yuus aggenna shin dhuphezas gaaso gidizaddes aayye-ana!
40018008	Ne kushey woykko ne tohoy nena dhuphanas gaaso gidikko neeppe qanxa digga! Ne nam7u kushera woykko nam7u tohora gede merna taman yegettanappe wobe woykko toho sila gidada he gede de7oy dizaso geloy nees lo7ana.
40018009	Hessathoka ne ayfey nees dhuphe gidikko neeppe kessa yegga! Nam7u ayfera gede Gaanname taman ne yegetanappe issi ayfera de7oy dizaso ne gelizaysi nees lo7o.
40018010	“Hayta guuthata giddofe issiniyoka inte kadhonta mala naagettite! Ta intes tumu gays; salon diza ista kiitanchati salon ta Aawa ayfeso ubba gallas xeelletes.
40018011	Asa Nay dhayidayta ashshanas yides.
40018012	“Ane taas yootite issades xeetu dorsi diikko qasse istafe issina dhaykko, hanko uddufun tammanne uddufunata zuma bolla yeggidi dhayidaro koyana bi erennee?
40018013	Ta intes tumu gays; hanko dhayonta attida uddufun tammanne uddufun dorsatappe aaththidi beettida dorsayn ufayetees.
40018014	Hessathoka ha guuthata giddofe issoy dhayana mala salon diza inte aawa shene gidenna.
40018015	“Ne ishay nena qohikko izakko baada iza xalala nenara ekkada iza mooro izas yoota; izi ne giza siyikko ne isha ne as ooththassa.
40018016	Izi ne gizayssa siyonta ixikko yo7oy wuri nam7u markan woykko heedzdzu markan ladhdhiza gish issade woykko nam7u as nenara ekka baada iza hasayssa.
40018017	Izi istaka siyonta ixikko Woosa Keeththas yoota; Woosa Keeththayokka siyonta ixikko izaade ne ammanontade malanne yootin simmonta iita asa mala qooda.
40018018	“Ta intes tumu gays; inte biitta bolla qachiday wurikka salonikka qashettida gidana; inte biitta bolla birshidazi salonikka birshettidayssa gidana.
40018019	Qasseka ta intes tumu gays; inte biitta bolla nam7u gididi ay miishikka ero ero giidi inte oychikko salon diza ta Aaway intes immana.
40018020	Nam7u woykko heedzdzu gididi ta sunthan inte shiiqizason heen inte giddon ta daana” gides.
40018021	Hessa wode Phexroosi Yesusakko shiiqidi “Godo! Ta ishay tana qohikko ta izas aapunto atto goo? Laapunto atto goo?” gides.
40018022	Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Laapun tammuto laapun attin laapunto xalala ga, giikke;
40018023	“Hessa gish Salo Kawotethi ashkara bolla diza miishe shiishana koyda kawo misatawus.
40018024	Miisha qooda oykkida mala iza ashkaratappe daro milone bira accoy iza bolla dizadde ekki yida.
40018025	Ashkaraykka iza bolla diza accoza qanxoy xoonda gish izikka iza machiyakka iza naytinne izas dizazi wuri bayzettidi miishay qanxettana mala iza goday azazides.
40018026	He wode ashkarazi godaza toho bolla kundidi ‘Tani ta bolla diza accoza wursi nees qanxana gakkanaas taas guutha wode immarki!’ giidi woossides.
40018027	Iza godayka izas mishettidi iza accoza wursi maaridi yeddides.
40018028	“He ashkaraykka ba goda achchafe kezida mala guutha accoy iza bolla diza ba lagge demmidinne ‘Ne bolla diza ta miishayo ha7i hannin qanxa’ giidi cuulli oykkides.
40018029	He iza lagge ashkaray ‘Taas guutha wode immarki! Ta nees qanxana’ giidi iza toho bolla kundidi woossides.
40018030	“Gido attin izas guutha wode immanas koyonta ixidi iza laggezi ba bolla diza accoza qanxana gakkanaas qasho keeththan yeggides.
40018031	Hessa izi ooththishin beyida asaynne hanko iza lagge ashkarati daro mishettida. Biidikka hanidayssa wursi ba godas yootida.
40018032	“He wode godazi he ashkara xeygisi ehidi, haysso neno! Iitazo, ne tana woossin ne bolla diza accoza ta nees aggadisishin ta nena maarida mala nekka ne laggeza maaranas bessenee?
40018034	Giidi iza bolla diza accoza izi wursi qanxana gakkanaas qachana mala qachizaytas aaththi immides.
40018035	Hessa gish inte issoy issa woznappe maaronta aggikko salon diza ta Aawayka intena maarenna” gides.
40019001	Yesusi yooti wursidappe guye Galila aggidi Yordanoose pinthan diza Yuhuda awurajja bides.
40019002	Daro derey iza heen kaallin izikka harganchata pathides.
40019003	Farsaaweeti iza paccanaas izakko shiiqidi ay gaasonka “Asi ba macho anji yeddana bessizee?” giidi oychida.
40019004	Izikka istas “Xoossi koyroppe macanne adde medhdhidayssa nababibeykketii? gides.
40019005	Qasseka ‘Asi aawanne aayo aggidi ba machira issife gides. Nam7aykka issi asho gidettes’ geetettidayssi hayssa geedon gidenee? gides.
40019006	Nam7ay issi asho attin sinthafe nam7u gidettenna. Hessa gish Xoossi gaththi waaxidayssa asi shaakkofo” gides.
40019007	Istika izas “Histin Musey ‘Asi ba macho anji yeddida anjo waraqata izis immi yeddo’ giidi aazas azazidee?” gida.
40019008	Yesusikka istas “Musey inte wozna muumeteth beyidi macheta inte anjana mala piqaade intes immides attin koyroppe hessa mala gidenna.
40019009	“Ta intes tumu gays; ba azinappe harara laymatonta dishin ba macho anjidi hara macho ekizadey wuri laymatees. Anjettidarokka ekkizadey izira laymatees” gides.
40019010	Yesusa kaallizayti izas “Machi wogaynne azina wogay hayssa mala gidikko macho ekkonta agoy lo7o” gida.
40019011	Gido attin Yesusi istas “Issi issi imettida asatappe attin hayssa timirteza oonikka ekkanas dandayenna.
40019012	Gaasoyka issi issi asay ba aayi uloppe yelettishe shuufa gididi yelettees; issi issi asay asa kushen qaaratettidi gundulees; issi issi asay Salo Kawoteththas giidi bana barka gundula ooththiza asikka dees. Hayssa ekkanas dandayizaddey ekko” gides.
40019013	He wode Yesusi ista bolla ba kushe woththidi woossana mala guutha nayta izakko ekki ehida; gido attin iza kaallizayti nayta ehida asata bolla hanqettida.
40019014	Yesusi “Nayti haa taakko yeeto; diggofte; Salo Kawotethi haytanta malassa!” gides.
40019015	Ba kushe nayta bolla woththidi anjidappe guye heeppe dendi bides.
40019016	Hessafe guye issadey Yesusakko shiiqidi “Astamaare! Merna de7o demmanas tani lo7o ooso ay ooththoo?” giidi oychides.
40019017	Yesusikka “Tana aazas lo7o gish oychay? Lo7oy issi Xoossa xalala; gede de7oy dizaso ne gelana koykko azazota naaga” gides.
40019018	Addezi “Azazoti awaytee?” giidi oychides. Yesusikka zaaridi “As wodhoppa; laymatoppa; kaysotoppa; wordo markatofa; ne aawanne ne aayo boncha; ne shooro ne mala siiqa” gides.
40019020	Naatethazi zaaridi “Hayssa wursa ta naagadis; haray aazi taas paccidee?” gides.
40019021	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ne mule xillana koykko baada ne haaridaz wursa bayzada miisha wursa manqotas imma; neni salon miish demmandasa; hessafe guye simma yaada tana kaalla” gides.
40019022	Addezi hessa siydi izas daro miishi diza gish keehippe mishetishe bides.
40019023	Yesusi bana kaallizayta “Ta intes tumu gays; dureti Salo Kawoteth gelanayssi daro meto.
40019024	Qasseka tani intes gizay durey Salo Kawoteth gelanayssafe gaamellay narpe lukkora aadhdhethi kawuyana” gides.
40019025	Hessa siyida iza kaallizayti daro qoppidi “Histin ooni attanas dandayizee?” giidi Yesusa oychida.
40019026	Yesusikka ista xeelidi “Hayssi asa achchan dandayettenna; Xoossa achchan gidikko wurikka dandayettes” gides.
40019027	Phexroosi izas zaaridi “Nu wursikka aggidi nena kaallidos; histin ha7i nu ay demmaneshaa?” gides.
40019028	Yesusikka istas “Ta intes tumu gays; Asa Nay buro yaana ooratha alamen ba boncho alga bolla uttiza wode inte tana kaallidayti tammanne nam7u alga bolla uttidi tammanne nam7u Isra7eele nayta bolla pirdana.
40019029	Ta suntha gish giidi ba keeththe, ba ishata, ba micheta, ba aawa, ba aayonne ba nayta, woykko ba biitta aggiza asi wuri xeetu kushe dakko ekkana; medhina de7okka laattana.
40019030	Gido attin daro sinthe gidida asati guye gidana; daro guyen diza asati sinthatana.
40020001	“Salo Kawotethi ba woyne atakilte giddon ooththiza oosanchata qaxaranas maaladora kezida issi atakiltey diza gadadde misatawus.
40020002	Issi gallasa damoza gidizaz hasayettidi giigidappe guye oosanchata woyne atakilte ooso oythides.
40020003	“Maalado heedzdzu saaten kezidi oosoy baynda mela giyay eqqizason eqqida hara asata demmides.
40020004	‘Inte biidi ta woyne giddon ooththite; ta intes bessiza miishe immana’ gides.
40020005	Istika bida. Qasseka gallassafe usuppun saateninne uddufun saate bolla kezidi hara oosanchata ooson gelthides.
40020006	Omarsa wode tammanne issi saate gidiza wode kezidi coo eqqidayta harata demmidi ‘Inte kumeththa gallas oosoy baynda aazas hayssan eqqetii?’ giidi oychides.
40020007	“Istika ‘Nuna ooththisiza asi dhayida gish eqqidos’ gida. Izikka ista ‘Inteka biidi ta woyne atakilte giddon ooththite’ gides.
40020008	“Gadey qammishin woyne atakilteza goday oosanchata alafezas ‘Guyeppe yidaytappe oykkada koyro yidayta gakkanaas diza oosanchata wursi xeeygada ista ooso waaga qanxa’ gides.
40020009	Tammanne issintha saate bolla ooson gelidayti yiidi issoy issoy kumeththa gallasa waaga ekkida.
40020010	“Koyro ooson gelidayti yishe ba woznara hinkoytappe bollara daro demmana gi qoppishin istaska hinkoytara gina immides.
40020011	Miisha ekkishe qanxizade bolla ‘Hayti wursethan ooson gelidi issi saate xalala ooththidayti kumeththa gallas ooson duuridinne awan xuugetidi pe7ida nuussara wosta istas issi gina qanxay?’ gida.
40020013	“Izikka istafe issades ‘Ta jalawu! Nena qohabeekke; issi gallassas gidiza damozan ooththanas tanara giigabeykii? Ha7i hehi ne gisha ekkada ba; nees immidayssa mala wursethan yidayssaska ta immana koyays.
40020015	Histin ta miishan ta dosidazi ooththanas danda7ikkinaa? Woykko ta kiya gididayssi nena qanatisizee?’
40020016	“Guyen dizayti sinthe, sinthen dizayti guye aadhdhana” gides.
40020017	Yesusi Yerusalame bishe bana kaalliza tammanne nam7ata dumma shaakki ekkidi
40020018	“Hiya nuni Yerusalame baana goos; Asa Nay Qeeseta halaqasinne Muse woga tamarsizaytas aadhdhi imettana; istika izi hayqqana mala iza bolla pirdana.
40020019	Iza bolla qidhi ka7anassinne garafana mala, wodhana malakka deretas aaththi immana; heedzdzantho gallas izikka hayqoppe dendana” gides.
40020020	Hessafekka Zabidoosa nayta aaya ba naytara Yesusakko shiiqada iza sinthan gulbatada Yesusi izis issi miish ooththana mala woossadus.
40020021	Izikka izo “Ay koyay?” gides; izakka “Hayti ta naa nam7ati ne kawoteththan issoy ne ushachara, issoy ne hadirsara uttana mala ooththarki!” gadus.
40020022	Yesusikka zaaridi “Inte woossizaz erekketa; tani uyiza xu7a inte uyana dandayanee?” gides. Istika “Ee dandayoos” gida.
40020023	Izikka “Ta xu7appe tumu inte uyanashin ta ushachaninne ta hadirsan utethi ta Aaway giigissidadentas attin tani immizaz deenna” gides.
40020024	Tammati hessa siydi nam7u ishata bolla hanqettida.
40020025	Yesusi ista issi bolla xeygidi “Ayzaabe halaqati ba haariza dere bolla godatizayssa mala godateththi dizayti wolqara haarizayssa inte ereeta.
40020026	Inte giddon hessa mala hananas bessenna; intefe gita gidana koyizadey intes ooththizade gido.
40020027	Intefe bolla gidanas koyizadey intefe gars gido.
40020028	Asa Nay asay izas ooththana mala gidonta asas ooththanassinne ba shempo darota gish aaththi immanas yides” gides.
40020029	Yesusi bana kaallizaytara Iyarkofe kezidi bishin daro derey iza kaallides.
40020030	Heen ayfey qooqida nam7u asati oge duunan utti deettes. Yesusi aadhdhi bizayssa siydi “Godo! Dawute nawu nuna maara!” giidi waassida.
