40020031	Derezi “Hayzite!” giidi hanqides; gido attin isti darsi waassishe “Godo! Dawute nawu nuna maara!” gida.
40020032	Yesusikka eqqidi ista xeygidi “Ta intes ay ooththana mala koyetii?” gides.
40020033	Istika “Nu ayfey xeellana mala koyoos” gida.
40020034	Yesusi istas mishettidi ista ayfetakka ba kushera boshechin heerakka xeelidi iza kaallida.
40021001	Isti Yerusalame matan Dabrazayte zuma bolla diza Betefaage geetettizaso gakkida mala Yesusi bana kaallizaytappe nam7ata kiittides.
40021002	“Hanno inte matan diza gutayo biidi inte he gakkida mala issi hare dizaara ba gutteyra qasheta dishin inte demmana. Birshidi ha taakko ekki yiite.
40021003	Oonikka intena ‘Ays hayssatho ooththetii?’ giikko ‘Goday ista koyees’ giite; intena oychizadey heerakka yeddana.
40021004	“Hayssika hanizay kase naben Xiyoonis hizgite ‘Hekko! Ne kawoy ashke gididi hareyonne harey gutteyo togidi neekko yaana’ geetettidayssi poletanassa” gides.
40021006	Iza kaallizayti Yesusi istas yootida mala ooththida.
40021007	Hareyo izi gutteyra ehidi ba may7o ista bolla woththin izikka hareta toggides.
40021008	Deraappe dariza baggay ba may7o oge bolla micides; bagga asay mitha bonco duuththi duuththi oge bolla aaththi aaththi yeggides.
40021009	Izappe sinthara biza dereynne guyera kaalliza dereyka ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Hoosana! Dawute nay galattetto! Goda sunthan yiday anjettidade! Xoossi galattetto!” gida.
40021010	Izi Yerusalame gelida wode katama asay wuri “Hayssi oonee?” giidi yark yarkides.
40021011	Iza kaallidi yida dereyka “Hayssi Galila giddon diza Naazireteppe yida Nabe Yesusa gidenee?” gides.
40021012	Hessafe Yesusi Xoossa Keeththa gelidi Xoossa Keeththa kare giddon gaaththan bayzizaytanne shamizayta goodides. Miish laammizayta xaraphezatanne haraphe bayizizayta oyde shiri shiri yeggidi “ ‘Ta Keeththay Woosa Keeththe geetettes’ geetettidi xaafettides; inte qasse bonqizayta gongolo histideta” gides.
40021014	Ayfe qooqetanne tohoy silida asata Yesusakko Xoossa Keeththe ehida. Izikka ista pathides.
40021015	Gido attin Qeeseta halaqatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti izi ooththida malatata beyidayssaninne guutha nayti “Woze kawo, galatay Dawute naas gido!” giidi waassizayssa siyida gish daro hanqettida.
40021016	Istika Yesusa “Hayti nayti gizayssa siyay?” gida; Yesusikka istas “Ee siyadis; nayta duunappenne dhammiza qeeri nayta duunan tani galata giigissadis gizaso mulerakka nababi ereketii?” gides.
40021017	Ista yeggi aggidi he katamappe kezidi Bitaaniya geetettizaso biidi heen aqides.
40021018	Yesusi wontetha gallas maalado guye katama simmishin iza gafisides.
40021019	Oge matan issi balase geetettiza mithi beyidi gede izikko shiiqishin hayth xalalappe attin ayfey bayndayssa beyidi “Hiyappe guye ne bolla ayfey dooppo!” giin balase mithaya heerakka meladus.
40021020	Yesusa kaallizayti hessa beyidinne malaletidi “Hanna balaseya waanada heerakka meladee?” gida.
40021021	Yesusikka ista “Ta intes tumu gays; intes ammanoy diikkonne inte sidhonta aggikko balase mithay bolla hanidayssa mala xalala gidonta hayssa zuma ‘Hayssafe dhoqalletada duge abban gela’ inte gidakkokka izi gelana” gides.
40021022	Intes ammanoy diikko inte woossan oychida miish wursikka ekkana.
40021023	Yesusi Xoossa Keeththe gelidi tamarsishin Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati izakko shiiqidi “Hayssa wursa oona shenen ooththay? Hayssa ooththanas shene nees ooni immidee?” giidi iza oychida.
40021024	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Takka intena issino oychays; inte taas zaarikko takka hayta ooththizayta oona shenen ooththizakkonne intes yootana.
40021025	Yohannisa xinqatey awappe yidee? Saloppe yideyee? Asappee?” gides. Istika “Nu ‘Saloppe yides’ giikko ‘Histin aazas ammanibekketii?’ gaana giidi ba giddon issoy issoy issara zorettida.
40021026	Qasse nu ‘Asappe’ giikko, asay wurikka Yohannisa nabe giidi ammaniza gish nu babboos” gida.
40021027	Hessa gish Yesusas “Nu erokko” giidi zaarida. Izikka istas “Hayta ta ooththizayta oona shenen ooththizakkonne takka intes yootikke” gides.
40021028	Yesusi ista “Intes ay misatizee? Nam7u attuma nay diza issadey dees; izikka koyro naazakko biidi ‘Ta naazo! Hachchi gede woyne mithaso baada ooththa’ gides.
40021029	Naazi qasse ‘Biikke!’ giidinne guyeppe muuzottidi bides.
40021030	“Nam7antho naazakka kaseyssathoka ‘Ba!’ giin naazi ‘Ero!’ giidi boonta aggagides.
40021031	Hayta nam7atappe aawa shene poliday awayssee?” giidi oychida. Istika “Koyro naaza!” gida. Yesusikka istas, “Ta intes tumu gays; qaraxa qanxisizaytinne laymatizayti Salo Kawotethi intefe sinthan gelana.
40021032	“Xammaqiza Yohannisi intena xillotetha oge bessanas inteko yides shin inte izi gizayssa ammanibekketa; gido attin qaraxa qanxisizaytinne laymatizayti gidikko ammanida; izi hanidayssa inte beyi simmidikka maarotethan gelidi ammanibekketa” gides.
40021033	“Hara leemisokka siyite; woyne mithi tokkizasoy dizaddey he woynezas birda yuushi aaththidi woyneza ayfe gum7anas olla bokkides. Woyneza naaganas mitha bolla shako giigissides. Hessafe guye gadeza woyne mithara goyzaytas kira immidi hara dere bides.
40021034	Boney gakkishin woyne mithaza ayfe ekkanas ba ashkarata gadeza goyzaytakko yeddides.
40021035	Gadeza goyzayti ashkarata oykkidi issa wodhida; issa qasse shuchchan caddida.
40021036	Gadaa goday kaseytappe aadhdhiza hara ashkarata yeddides. Goyzayti ha7ikka kaseyta bolla ooththidayssa malakka ista bollakka polida.
40021037	Wursethan ooni erize ‘Isti iza bonchanakkonne’ giidi ba naa aaththi yeddides.
40021038	Gido attin gadaa goyzayti naaza beyida mala ‘Hayssi iza laattanayssakko! Ane haa yiite, iza wodhidi gadaa laattoos’ gida.
40021039	Naaza oykkidi woyney tokkettidasoppe gede kare kessidi wodhida.
40021040	“Ero! Woyneza goday yiza wode he gadaa goyiza asata wostana intes misatizee?” gides.
40021041	Istika “Heytanta iitata daro waayssi wodhidi woyney tokkettiza gadappe bessiza woyne ayfe wodera izas immiza hara gade goyzaytas kirasana” giidi izas zaarida.
40021042	Yesusikka istas “Geeshsha Maxaafan ‘Gimbe keexxizayti iita giidi wora yeggida shuchchay keeththas maazanne bolla wodhdhiza shuch gidides; Xoossi hayssa ooththides; iza oosoykka nu ayfes malalisizaz’ geetetti xaafetidayssa nababibekketii?
40021043	“Hessa gish ta intes Xoossa Kawotethi intefe eketada ayfe ayfiza deretas imettana.
40021044	Hayssa shuchcha bolla kundizay meqana; shuchchay iza bolla wodhizadeykka liiqana” gides.
40021045	Qeeseta halaqatinne Farsaaweeti iza leemisoy ista gish gididayssa erida.
40021046	Gido attin isti iza oykki qachonta mala asay Yesusa nabe mala xeelliza gish babbida.
40022001	Qasseka Yesusi hara leemiso
40022002	“Salo Kawotethi ba naas sarge giigissida issi kawo misatawus.
40022003	Kawoykka diggissas yootidayta xeeyganas ba ashkarata yeddides; xeeygettidaytikka ‘Nu bookko’ gida.
40022004	“Qasseka hara ashkarata ‘Kase istas yootidayta hekko ta sanga booratanne modhida meheta shukada diggisa giigissadis; wurikka giigettida gish sargeso haa yiite!’ giidi yootite.
40022005	Xeeygettidayti gidikko iza xeeyssa wudan yeggonta aggidi issoy ba goshshaso, issoy ba zal7eso bides.
40022006	Hanko attidayta, ashkarati oykkidi daro waayssidi wodhida.
40022007	“Kawoykka hanqettidi wotadarata yeddidi ashkara wodhidayta dhayssides; ista katama xuugides.
40022008	Ba ashkarataka ‘Sargeza diggisey giigides; gido attin sargezaso xeeygettidayti sarges bessizayta gidibeetenna.
40022009	Gede oge bolla kezidi inte demmida as wursi ha sarge diggisses xeygite’ gides.
40022010	Ashkaratikka oge bolla kezidi ba demmidayta lo7otaka iitataka wursi shiishshidi sargezaso imath kunthida.
40022011	“Kawoykka xeeygettida imatha beyanas so geliza wode sarge may7o may7onta as demmides.
40022012	‘Haysso! Sarge may7o may7onta waanada hayssa gelanas dandayadii?’ gi oychin addezas zaarana qaalay dhayides.
40022013	Kawoykka ba ashkarata ‘Hayssa addeza tohonne kushe shiishshi qachidi heen karen diza dhuman kessi olite; heen yeehonne achcha garcech gidana.’
40022014	“Xeeygettidayti darota; doorettidayti gidikko guuthata” gi yootides.
40022015	Hessafe guye Farsaaweeti kezi bishe “Iza duunappe bala qaala wosti demmi oykkinoo?” giidi zorettida.
40022016	Bana kaallizayta Herdoosa asatara izakko kiittidi “Astamare! Neni tumanchanne Xoossa oge tumappe tamarsizade gididayssanne oonaska dumma maado ooththonta wursaka issi mala ne xeellizayssa nu eroos.
40022017	Nees ay misatizakkone ane nuus yootaa? Qeesares giira qanxanas bessizee? Bessenee?” gida.
40022018	Yesusikka ista gene qofa eridi “Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto tana yo7on baleththi oykkanas aazas koyetii?
40022019	Inte giira qanxiza miisha ane tana bessite” giin istika issi dinare geetettiza miish izas ehida.
40022020	Izikka “Hayssa miisha bolla diza misileynne xaafettida sunthay oonayssee?” gides.
40022021	Istika izas “Qeesareyssa” gida. Izikka istas zaaridi “Qeesareyssa Qeesares, Xoossayssa Xoossas immite” gides.
40022022	Hessa siyida wode malaletidinne iza aggi bida.
40022023	“Hayqqidaytas dendoy baawa” giidi ammaniza Saduqaaweti he gallas Yesusakko shiiqidi,
40022024	“Astamaare! Musey ‘Issadey macho ekkidi naa yelonta hayqqikko iza ishay hayqqidayssa macho ekkidi ba isha laattiza naa izas yelo’ gides.
40022025	Nu achchan laapun ishati deettes shin koyro ishay macho ekkidi naa yelonta hayqqida gish kaalo ishay iza macheyo ekides.
40022026	Nam7antho ishayka hayqqida ishaatho naa yelonta hayqqides; hessathoka hanishin macasaya laapuntha isha geladus.
40022027	Wursethan macasaya hayqqadus.
40022028	Hessa gish laapunati wurikka izo ekkida shin hayqoppe dentha gallas macasaya laapuntappe awayssa macho gidanee?” gida.
40022029	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Geeshsha Maxaafatanne Xoossa wolqa inte eronta gish baletteta.
40022030	Hayqoppe dendidappe guye asay salo kiitanchata mala gidana attin eketettenanne geletenna.
40022031	Hayqqidayta dentha gish gidikko Xoossi ‘Tani Abrahaame Xoossa, Yisaaqa Xoossa, Yaqoobe Xoossa’ giidi intes yootoyssa nababibekketii? Xoossi paxata Xoossa attin hayqethata Xoosse gidenna” gides.
40022033	Dereyka hessa siydi iza timirtezan malalettides.
40022034	Yesusi Saduqaaweta co7u histidayssa siydi Farsaaweeti issi bolla shiiqettida.
40022035	Ista giddofe issi Muse woga lo7ethi erizadey Yesusa paaccanaas koydi “Aastamare! Muse wogata giddon ubbafe aadhdhizay awayssee?” giidi oychides.
40022037	Izikka zaaridi “ ‘Ne Goda Xoossa ne kumeththa woznappe, ne kumeththa shempofe, ne kumeththa qofappe dosa.’
40022038	Hayssi koyronne ubbafe aadhdhiza azazo.
40022039	Nam7anthoykka iza misatees, hessika ‘Ne shooro ne hu7e mala dosa’ gizayssa.
40022040	Muse wogaynne nabeta timirtey wurikka hayta nam7u azazotan qashettes” gides.
40022041	Farsaaweeti issi bolla shiiqeti dishin Yesusi ista,
40022042	“Kirstoosa gish inte ay geetii? Izi oona naa?” gi oychides; Istika izas zaaridi “Izi Dawute naa” gida.
40022043	Izikka istas “Histin Dawutey Xillo Ayana wolqan ‘Xoossay ta Goda’ giidi waani xeygidee? ‘Ta ne morketa ne toho giddon gulbatissana gakkanaas ne ta ushachan utta!’ gides.
40022045	Hessa gish Dawutey iza ‘Ta Goda’ giidi xeygikko waanidi izas naa gidana dandayizee?” gides.
40022046	Izas issi qaala zaarana dandayida asi woykko he gallassafe simmin iza oysho oychana xalida asi oonikka bettibenna.
40023001	Qasseka Yesusi derezassinne bana kaallizaytas,
40023002	“Muse woga tamarsizaytinne Farsaaweeti Muse wombara bolla uttida.
40023003	Hessa gish isti intes yootizayssa wursi ooththitenne naagite; gido attin isti duunan haasayizayssa mala ooson bessonta gish inte ista ooso kaallofte.
40023004	“Hessathoka asi tookkanas dandayonta deexo tooho qachidi asa hashe bolla wothettes shin baassi gidikko biradhdhe xeeranka bochettenna.
40023005	Ista ooso wursi asi beyana mala ooththetes; ba ashenkitabe Geeshsha Maxaafa giddofa xaafi ekkida issi issi xiqiseta kitabe sikidi liiphe bolla woykko kushen qachizaz ooththetes. Ba may7o macara adussettes.
40023006	Diggisay dizason boncho so Ayhuda Woosa Keeththanka sinthara uttana doossettes.
40023007	Hessathoka giya giddon saro geetettanassinne asay ista ‘Astamaare!’ gaana mala koyettes.
40023008	“Inte gidikko ‘Astamaare’ geetetti xeeygetofte. Inte Astamarey issa xalala gidishin inte wurikka issoy issas ishanta.
40023009	Salon intes issi Aaway xalala diza gish biitta bolla oonakka ‘Aawawu!’ giidi xeeygoppite.
40023010	Inte astamarey issi Kirstoosa xalla gidida gish inte ‘Astamareto!’ geetetofte.
40023011	Inte giddon ubbafe aadhdhizaddey intes ooththizade gidana.
40023012	Bana dhoqisizadey kawuyana; bana kawushshizadey bonchettana.
40023013	“Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizayto, inteno Farsaaweeto! Asay Xoossa kawoteth gelonta mala asa bolla inte penge gordiza gish intena aayye-ana! Inte intes geleketanne gelanas koyizaytaka geltheketa.
40023014	Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizayto, qasseka Farsaaweeto! Intes aayye-ana! Azinay baynda macasata keeththa kallosishe asa ayfe sinthan adussa woossa inte woossiza gish inte iita pirda pirdettana.
40023015	“Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizayto, qasseka Farsaaweeto! Issi as Ayhuda ammanon gelthanas abba bollaranne biitta bollara yuuyi daburdinne ammanthida asa intefe nam7u kushe aaththidi Gaanname naa inte kessiza gish intena aayye-ana!
40023016	“Inteno! Intes qooqi uttidi harata kaalethizayto! Intes aayye-ana! ‘Oonikka Xoossa Keeththan caaqikko aykkoy ba’ gido attin ‘Xoossa Keeththa giddon diza worqan caaqikko caaqo gomey gakkana’ geeta.
40023017	Inteno qooqidayto! Balettidayto, worqafenne worqa dummasida Xoossa Keeththafe awayssi aadhdhizee?
40023018	Hessathoka ‘Oonikka yarsho yarshizaso bolla caaqikko aykkoy baawa; shin yarshizason diza yarsho bolla caaqikko caaqoy gomees’ geeta.
40023019	Inteno qooqeto! Yarshoppenne yarsho shiishshizasoppe awaysse aadhdhizay?
40023020	Hessa gish yarsho shiishshizaso bolla caaqizadey yarshosoza bollanne yarshizaso bolla diza ubba miishan caaqees.
40023021	Hessathoka Xoossa Keeththaza bolla caaqiday Xoossa Keeththaninne iza giddon aqizaysan caaqees.
40023022	Salon caaqizadeykka Xoossa alganinne alga bolla uttidayssan caaqqees.
40023023	“Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizayto, Farsaaweeto! Intena aayye ana! Aasutappe, aanugappenne katkal7afe tammafe issino immeeta shin wogatappe waannatizayta heytikka tuma pirda, maarotethinne ammanetteth gidikko kadhideta. Heyta aggonta dishe haytanta inte ooththanas intes bessees shin aggideta.
40023024	Inteno qooqi uttidi kaalethizayto! Uu7e gaccidi uyeeta shin gaamella muume mitteeta!
40023025	“Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizaytonne Farsaaweeto! Intes aayye-ana! Xu7assinne keres bolla bagga qucceeta shin iza giddon dizayssa inte bonqaninne uuzetethan shiishshideta.
40023026	Neno qooqe Farsaawezo! Koyrottada xu7assinne keres giddo bagga geeshsha! Hessafe guye kare baggay geesh gidana.
40023027	“Inteno qoodheppe qommon hanizayto, Muse woga tamarsizayto, qasse Farsaaweeto! Bolla baggay noorara meeshettidi lo7izayti giddoy gidikko hayqqidayta meqethinne daro tunanetethan kumida duufota misatiza gish intena aayye-ana!
40023028	Inteka bolla baggara asas xillo asata misateta; inte giddoy gidikko cimoninne iitatethan kumides.
40023029	“Inteno duunan cimmizayto! Muse woga astamareto, qasseka Farsaaweeto! Intes aayye-ana! Nabeta duufo lo7ethizayto, xillo asata duufo hawultera giigissizayto!
40023030	Nu aawati nabeta wodhiza wode nu dizakko istara zuppetokkokko shin,
40023031	inte nabeta wodhida asata nayta gididayssa inte duunara interka inte inte bolla markattetta.
40023032	Histikko oosettidi poletonta oge bolla diza inte aawata ooso polite.
40023033	“Inteno dukkiza iita shoosha nayto! Gaanname tama pirdafe inte waani attanee?
40023034	Hessa gish nabetanne eranchata astamaretaka ta intes yeddana. Inte ista giddofe issi issi asata wodhana. Baggayta inte kaqqana; baggayta inte Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan garafananne ha katamappe hara inte gooddana.
40023035	Hessa gish xillo Aabeele suuthafe ha simmin Xoossa Keeththaninne yarsho yarshizaso giddon inte wodhida Barakiyo naa Zakaraasa sutha gakkanaas biitta bolla gukkida xillota sutha ubbas inte oyshettana.
40023036	Ta intes tumu gays; kase aadhdhidaa yo7o ubbas hayssi ha yelettay oyshettana.
40023037	“Hanne Yerusalame! Nabeta wodhizare! Neekko kiitettidayta shuchchara caddizare! Hanne Yerusaleme kutto aaya ba ciyeta ba qefe giddo shiishshiza mala ta ne nayta shiishshanaas aapun wode koyadinashin ne gidikko koyabakka.
40023038	Hekko inte keeththi kays gidi attana.
40023039	Ta intes tumu gays; inte Goda sunthan yizadey anjettidade gaana wodey gakkanaas nam7antho tana beyekketa” gides.
40024001	Yesusi Xoossa Keeththafe kezi bishin iza kaallizayti Xoossa Keeththazi shuchchan keexxettidayssa bessana koydi Yesusakko shiiqida.
40024002	Izikka istas “Hayssa wursi xeelletii? Ta intes tumu gays; hayssi inte beyiza issoy issa bolla diza shuchchay laalettonta issi shuchchikka hayssatho deenna” gides.
40024003	Izi Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bolla utti dishin iza kaallizayti xalala izakko shiiqidi “Ane nuus yoota; hayssi ne gizayssi ayde hananee? Ne yussassinne wode wursethas malatay aazee?” gi oychida.
40024004	Yesusikka zaaridi “Oonikka intena baleththonta mala naagettite.
40024005	Buro daroti ‘Ta Kirstoosa’ gishe ta sunthan yaana; darotaka baleththana.
40024006	Olanne ola gish haasayettiza wore inte siyana. Ha yo7oti wurikka wolqara polettana shin wursethi buro gidida gish inte hayssan daggamonta mala naagettite.
40024007	Derey dere bolla, kawoy kawo bolla dendana; dumma dumma deren koshaynne biitta qaathi hanana.
40024008	Hessi wurikka miixas leesso mala.
40024009	He wode intena waayes aaththi immana; intena wodhana; ta suntha geedon dere ubban inte ixettidayta gidana.
40024010	“He wode daro asay dhuphettana; issoy issa aaththi aaththi immananne ba giddon ixettana.
40024011	Daro wordo nabeti dendananne darota baleththana.
40024012	Iitatethi dariza gish darotappe siiqoy irxana.
40024013	Wurseth gakkanaas minnidadey attana.
40024014	Dere ubbas marka gidana mala hayssi kawoteththa Mishiraachcho qaalay kumeththa alamen yootettana; hessafe guye wursethi yaana.
40024015	“Hessa gish nabe Daanelan yootettidayssa mala ‘Harassiza tunatethi’ anjettidason eqqidayssa inte beyiza wode nababizadey woznan wotho.
40024016	He wode Yuhudan dizayti pude zuma bolla gangetto.
40024017	Keeththa kaara bolla dizaddey oonikka ba miish keeththafe kessana giidi duge wodhdhofo.
40024018	Gade giddon dizaddey oonikka ba may7o ekkana giidi so simmofo.
40024019	He gallasatan qanthara diza macasatassinne naa dhanthiza aayetas aayye-ana!
40024020	Hessa gish inte gangoy balgo woykko Sambata gallas gidonta mala woossite.
40024021	He wode alamey medhetosappe hachchi gakkanaas hani eronta miishi sinthafekka iza misatizay baynda wolqama metoy hanana.
40024022	He gallassati qaammontakko asho may7ida asi wuri attenna shin doorettidayta gish he gallassati qaammana.
40024023	“He wode oonikka ‘Hekko Kirstoosi hayssan dees!’ Woykko ‘Hessan dees’ gizade ammanoppite.
40024024	Wordo Kirstoosanne wordo nabeti buro dendidi istas dandayettikko doorettidayta baleththanas giidi wolqama malatatanne kase oosetti eronta miish ooththana.
40024025	“Hekko hayssa ta intes kaseta yootays.
40024026	Hessa gish ‘Hekko hirki bazzon dees’ giidi intes yootikko he kezoppite; ‘Hekko ilpinen dees’ giikko ammanoppite.
40024027	Wolqanthi awa arshey mokizasora wolqamidi awa arshey wullizaso gakkanaas poo7izayssa mala Asa Naa yuussaykka hessatho hanana.
40024028	Ahay dizaso anko kafoy shiiqqees.
40024029	“Heerakka he iita meto gallassatappe guye awa arshey dhumana; aginay ba poo7o diggana; xoolinteti saloppe qoqofettana; salo wolqamatikka qaaxana.
40024030	He wode asa naa malatay salo bolla bettanna. Biitta bolla diza derey wuri yeekkana; Asa Naykka salo shaara bolla daro wolqaranne gita bonchora yishin asay beyana.
40024031	Kiitanchataka daro wolqama xurumba giirissara yeddana. Istika doorettidayta oyddu ma7izeneppe salos ha bagga gaxappe he gaxa bagga gaxa gakkanaas wursi issi so shiishana.
40024032	“Balase geetettiza mithafe hayssa tamarite; balase mithays unquloy cililiza wode iza hayth kessishin boney matidayssa inte ereeta.
40024033	Hessatho hayta inte beyiza wode izi penge matidayssa inte erana.
40024034	Ta tumu gays; hayssi wuri polettana gakkanaas ha yelettay aadhdhenna.
40024035	Saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana shin ta qaalay gidikko mulekka aadhdhenna.
40024036	“He gallassayonne he saateyo Aawappe attin salo kiitanchata gidinka Naaza gidinka oonikka erenna.
40024037	Nohe wode hanidayssa mala Asa Naa yuussi hessa mala gidana.
40024038	Dhayssiza haaththafe kase Nohey markaben geliza gallas gakkanaas asay mishenne uyishe, ekkishenne gelishe gam7ides.
40024039	He wodey gakkanaas aazi hananakkonne asay erontanne qopponta bashsha haaththay yiidi mitidayssa mala ta Asa Nay yiza wodeykka hessatho hanana.
40024040	“He wode nam7u asati issife goshshan pe7ana shin istafe issadey ekettana; issadey attana.
40024041	Nam7u macasati woxan issife gaaccana shin istafe issineya ekettana issineya attana.
40024042	“Histikko inte Goday yaana gallasa inte eronta gish beeggidi naagite.
40024043	Hayssa woznan woththite; kaysoy qammafe aafuntha saate bolla yaanakkonne erizakko iza miish kaysoy ekkonta mala keeththa aaway beeggidi naagana.
40024044	Asa Naykka inte qopponta saate bolla yaana; inteka hessatho giigettidayta gidite.
40024045	“Wodera so asa quma mizana mala goday ba keeththa asa bolla shuumida ammanettiza cinca oosanchay oonee?
40024046	Keeththa aaway simmidi yiza wode izas immida hadara ooththi polishe beettida oosanchay anjettidayssa.
40024047	Ta intes tumu gays; goday iza ba haarida ubba bolla shuumees.
40024048	Gido attin he oosanchay iita gididi ‘Ta goday gam7idi yaana’ gi qoppidi,
40024049	dendi hanko oosanchata wadha oykikko mathottizaytara miikkonne uyikko,
40024050	izi qopponta gallassaninne saaten iza goday yiidi,
40024051	iza qanxethi kaa7ana; iza exxa qoodheppe qommon hanizaytara ooththana. Henka yeehoynne achcha garcechi hanana.
40025001	“He wode Salo Kawotethi mishira mokkanas xompe oykkidi kezida tammu gela7ota misatawus.
40025002	He tammatappe ichashu gela7oti eeyata, hanko ichashati qasse cincata.
40025003	Eeyati kuraze xompe oykkida shin wurikko gujana hara naage lamba oykkibetenna.
40025004	Cincati gidikko ba kurazezara wurikko gujana lamba hara xarmusen oykkida.
40025005	Machiyo ekkana mishiray yoonta gam7in dhiskoy deexxin asay wurikka dhiskides.
40025006	“Leela gidoth gidishin ‘Mishirazi yees! Kezidi mokki ekkite!’ giza xeeyssa qaalay siyettides.
40025007	Hessa wode gela7oti wurikka dendidi ba xompe xompe oysethonne giigeteth oykkida.
40025008	Eeyati cincata ‘Nu xompey to7ana giza gish inte lambappe nuus immite’ gida.
40025009	“Cinca gela7oti istas zaaridi ‘Nuus diza lambay nuussaranne intessara gidonta gish biidi lamba bayzizaytappe intes shammite’ gida.
40025010	Isti lamba shammana bi kichchin mishirazi gakki wodhdhides. Kase giigeti uttida gela7oti bulachaso izara gelida; kareykka gordettides.
40025011	“Guuth gam7ishe hanko gela7oti yiidi ‘Godo! Godo! Kare nuus doya!’ gida.
40025012	Izikka zaaridi ‘Ta intes tumu gays; ta intena erikke!’ gides.
40025013	Hessa gish yaana gallasa woykko saateza inte eronta gish giigettidi naagite.
40025014	“Xoossa Kawotethi baassi dizazi wursi ba ashkaratas hadara immidi hara dere baana dendida issi as misatees.
40025015	Ashkaratas issas issas ista wolqa mala giigissidi issas ichashu shi bira, issas nam7u shi bira, hankoyssas qasse issi shi bira immidi bides.
40025016	Ichashu shi bira ekkida addezi heerakka miishan zal7e oykkidi hara ichashu shi bira wodhisides.
40025017	Qasseka nam7u shi bira ekkidayssi hara nam7u shi bira wodhisides.
40025018	Issi shi bira ekkidayssi ba goda bira biittan moogidi qottides.
40025019	“Ashkarata goday ba bidason daro wode gam7i simmidi miisha istara sala7ettides.
40025020	Ichashu shi bira ekkida ashkaray hara ichashu shi bira wodhisidayssa ekki yiidi ‘Godo! Ne taas ichashu shi bira immadasa shin hekko hayssa ta hara ichashu shi bira wodhisadis’ gides.
40025021	Iza godayka ‘Lo7o ooththadasa; neno lo7o ammanettida ashkarazo! Ne guutha miishan ammanettida as gidida gish ta nena daro miisha bolla shuumana; gede ne goda ufayssaso gela’ gides.
40025022	“Hessathoka nam7u shi bira ekkidayssi godazakko shiiqidi ‘Godo! Ne taas nam7u shi bira immadasa shin hekko hara nam7u shi bira wodhisadis’ gides.
40025023	Godazikka ‘Lo7ethadassa; haysso lo7onne taas ammanettida ashkarazo! Neni guuthan ammanettidade gidida gish ta nena daro miisha bolla shuumays; gede ne Goda ufayssaso gela’ gides.
40025024	“Issi shi bira ekkida ashkaray shiiqidi ‘Godo! Neni zerontasoppe maxizadenne laallontasoppe shiishshiza menxe iita as gididayssa ta erays.
40025025	Hessa gish ta babbada biitta bokkada ne bira bookkida ollan moogada qottadis; ne miish hessa beya!’ gides.
40025026	“Iza goday zaaridi ‘Haysso iita azalla ashkarazo! Tani zerontasoppe maxizade laallontasoppe shiishshizade gididayssa ne eray?
40025027	Histin ta simma yiza wode ta miisha yelora ta ekkana mala tirpisi zal7iza asas ne immanas besseeseshin’ gides.
40025028	“ ‘Ane ha7i izappe shi bira ekkidi tammu shi biray dizaddes immite.
40025029	Dizaddes gujettananne dari dari baana; bayndadefe he diza guuththayakka izappe eketaychana.
40025030	Hayssa go7ay baynda ashkara gede yeekkizasonne achchey garcettizaso hen karen diza dhuman kessi yeggite’ gides.
40025031	“Asa Nay ba kiitanchata ubbara bonchon yiza wode ba boncho alga bolla uttana.
40025032	Derey wuri iza sinthi shiiqana; izikka mehe heemmizadey deyshi dorsafe qori shaakkiza mala asa issa issafe qori shaakana.
40025033	Dorsata izas ushacha baggara, deyshata hadirsa baggara essana.
40025034	He wode kawoy ushacha baggara dizayta ‘Inteno! Ta Aaway intena anjidayti haa yiite! Alamey medhetosappe intes giigetida kawoteththa laattite! gaana.
40025035	Gaasoyka tani gafin tana mizideta; ta saametin tana ushshideta; ta imatha gidada yiin tana mokki ekkideta.
40025036	Ta kallottin tana mayzideta; ta sakettin tana hargisideta; ta qashetin tana oychideta’ gaana.
40025037	“Xillotikka zaaridi ‘Godo! Ne gafin nu nena ayde mizidonii? Woykko ne saamotin ayde beyidi nu nena ushshidonii?
40025038	Nu ayde nena beyidi imathateth mokkidonii? Woykko ayde ne kallottin beyidi nena mayzidonii?
40025039	Hessathoka ne saketin woykko qashetin ayde beyidi nena oychidonii?’ gaana.
40025040	Kawoykka zaaridi ‘Ta intes tumu gays; hayta laafa gidida ta ishatappe issades ooththidayssi inte taas ooththida mala’ gaana.
40025041	“Qasseka hadirsa baggara dizaytas; ‘Inteno qangetidayto! Taappe shaaketidi Dabulossassinne iza kiitanchatas giigetida merna taman biite gaana.
40025042	Gaasoyka ta gafin tana mizibeekketa; ta saamotin tana ushshibeekketa;
40025043	tana imathateth mokibeekketa; ta kallottin tana mayzibeeketa; ta sakettininne qashettin tana oychibeekketa’ gaana.
40025044	“Istika zaaridi ‘Godo, ne gafin woykko ne saamotin woykko ne imath gidin woykko ne kallottininne ne saketin woykko ne qashetin nu nena beyidi ayde nees gakkibekkonii?’ gaana.
40025045	“He wode izikka istas zaaridi ‘Ta intes tumu gays; hanta laafa ta ishatappe issades inte ooththonta aggidayssi taas inte ooththonta aggida mala’ gaana.
40025046	Heyti gede merna pirdan baana; xilloti gidikko merna de7okko baana” gides.
40026001	Yesusi hessa haasayi wursidappe guye bana kaallizaytas “Nam7u gallassafe guye Paaziga gididayssa ereetii? Asa Nay kaqettanas aadhdhi imettana” gides.
40026003	Hessafe guye Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati Qayaafa geetettiza Qeeseta halaqa gibben shiiqidi hiillara Yesusa oythidi wodhisanas maqettida.
40026005	Gido attin “Asa giddon ooshi dendonta mala ba7aale gallas gidoppo” giidi qachida.
40026006	Yesusi Bitaaniyan inchiracha hargera diza Simoona geetettizade soon dishin,
40026007	issi macassi dizaara waagay keehi al7o gidida albasxiroose geetettiza shitto bilqaaxe kumeth oykkada Yesusakko shiiqada izi maaddan uttidishin iza hu7e bolla shittoza guussadus.
40026008	Iza kaallizayti “Hessa beyidi hayssi aazas mela morettizee?
40026009	Shittozi daro waagas bayzettidi miishay manqotas imettizakkochii?” gida.
40026010	Yesusi hessa eridi “Hanno macasayo aazas waayssetii? Iza taas lo7o ooththadus.
40026011	Manqoti ubba wode intenara deettes; ta gidikko ubba wode intenara diikke gides.
40026012	Iza shittoza ta bolla gussidayssi tana moogos giigissanassa.
40026013	Ta intes tumu gays; hayssi Mishiraachcho qaalay sabakettiza alame yuushon awanka iza ooththidayssi izo qofisizaz gididi hasayettana” gides.
40026014	Hessafe guye tammanne nam7atappe issoy Asqoroonto Yuhuda geetettizayssi Qeeseta halaqatakko biidi,
40026015	“Ta intes iza aaththa immikko inte taas ay immanee?” gides. Istika izas heedzdzu tammu bira iza kushen tayibi immida.
40026016	He gallassafe simmidi Yuhuday Yesusa istas aaththi immanas inje wode naagishe gam7ides.
40026017	Uketha ba7aale geetettiza ba7aale gallas iza kaallizayti Yesusakko shiiqidi “Ne Paaziga maanaso awan giigissana mala koyay?” gida.
40026018	Izikka istas zaaridi gede katama biidi ebelo geetettiza as “Astamarey ‘Ta wodey matida gish tana kaallizaytara Paaziga ta ne keeththan bonchana gides’ giidi yootite” gides.
40026019	Iza kaallizaytikka Yesusi ista azazida mala Paaziga kawo giigissida.
40026020	Gadey omarsishin Yesusi tammanne nam7atara maaddan uttides.
40026021	Isti muussan dishin izi istas “Ta tumu gays; intefe issoy aaththi immana” gides.
40026022	Istika keehi muuzottidi taran taran “Godo taneshaa?” gida.
40026023	Izikka zaaridi “Tana aaththi immanaddey keren tanara kushe yeddizade.
40026024	Iza gish kase xaafettidayssa mala Asa Nay baana; gido attin Asa Naa aaththi immizades aayye-ana! Hessadey yeletonta attidakko izas lo7okkoshin” gides.
40026025	Iza aaththi immana Yuhuday “Astamaare! Taneshaa?” gides. Izikka “Ee, ne gida mala” gides.
40026026	Isti muussan dishin Yesusi miza qumappe ekkidi anjides. Menthidinne bana kaallizaytas immidi “Heyite miite; hayssi ta ashokko” gides.
40026027	Qasseka ushsha denthidi galatidinne bana kaallizaytas immidi “Wurikka hayssafe uyite;
40026028	daro asa nagarappe maarana gukkiza ta ooratha caaqo suuthay hayssa.
40026029	Ta intes gizay ta Aawa Kawoteththan ta intenara ooratha woynen ushshaza uyana gakkanaas hayssafe sinthan hayssa woyne ushsha intenara uyikke” gides.
40026030	Mazamure yexidappe guye pude Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bolla kezida.
40026031	Yesusi istas “Inte wuri hachchi omarsi tanan dhuphettidi tana yeggi baana; ‘Heemmizayssa ta shocana; mehetinne laalettana’ geetettidi kase xaafettides.
40026032	Gido attin tani dendidappe guye intefe sinthatada gede Galila baana” gides.
40026033	Phexroosi zaaridi “Hankoyti wuri ne geedon dhuphetikkokka tani mulekka dhuphetikke!” gides.
40026034	Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Tumu gays; hachchi qamma kuttoy waassonta kasetada heedzdzuto ne tana kadana” gides.
40026035	Phexroosi qasse “Nenara ta hayqqana koshikkokka mulekka ta nena kadikke!” gides. Yesusa kaalliza hankoytikka kumeth izayssathoka gida.
40026036	Hessafe guye Yesusi bana kaallizaytara gede Getesemaane geetettizaso bides. Istaka “He baada ta woossishin inte hayssan uttishiite” gides.
40026037	Phexroosara Zabidoosa nayta nam7ata banara ekki biidi muuzotethinne daro qofo oykkides.
40026038	Hessafekka “Ta shempoya hayqqana gakkanaas daro muuzotadus; tanara minnidi hannin takkite” gides.
40026039	Istafe guuth gede haakki bi gupandi “Ta Aawawu! Nees dandayettikko hayssi metoy taappe aadhdho; gido attin tani koyda mala gidonta neni koyda mala hano” gi woossides.
40026040	Hessafe simmidi bana kaallizaytakko yiidi isti dhiskishin demmides. Phexroosakka “Hayto asato! Inte tanara issi saatekkone minnanas xoonidee?
40026041	Paacen inte gelonta mala minnidi woossite; ayanay giigettides shin ashoy gidikko daburancha” gides.
40026042	Qasseka nam7antho biidi “Ta Aawawu! Hayssa uyanasi taas attonta miish gidikko ne sheney poletto” giidi woossides.
40026043	Qasseka izi yishin ista ayfen dhiskoy deexida gish ichchidayta beyides.
40026044	Ista aggidi qasseka biidi heedzdzantho kase woossida qaala zaari woossides.
40026045	Hessafe bana kaallizaytakko simmidi “Ha7ikka shempidi dhiskidetii? Hekko ha7i saatey matides; Asa Nay nagaranchata kushen aadhdhi imettana.
40026046	Dendite ane boos! Tana aaththi immizadey yuussa bolla dees” gides.
40026047	Izi haasayishin tammanne nam7atappe issoy Yuhuday yides. Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati yeddida daro asay tooranne durqa oykkidi Yuhudara issife dees.
40026048	Yuhudaykka “Ta yeerizadey iza gidida gish oykkite” giidi kase yooti woththides.
40026049	Siti gi Yesusakko biidi “Astamaare! Saro” gishe Yesusa yeerides.
40026050	Yesusikka “Ta lagge! Ne yida qofa pola” gides. Heerakka asay shiiqetidi Yesusa oykkidi qachides.
40026051	Yesusara dizaytappe issoy giththa mashsha shoddidi Qeeseta halaqaza ashkara hayth qanxides.
40026052	Yesusikka “Ane ne mashsha koohon zaara geltha; mashsha shoddizayti mashshan dhayana.
40026053	Koshshikko tani ta Aawa oychizakko daro shiyen qoodettiza oliza kiitancha taas yeddonta aggana misatizee?
40026054	Hessatho ooththikko qasse Geeshsha Maxaafatan hanana geetettidayssi waani poletanee?” gides.
40026055	He wode Yesusi asa “Panga oykkiza asatho mashshanne durqa ekkidi tana oykkana yidetii? Wontin wontin Xoossa Keeththan uttada ta tamarsishin kase oykkibeekketa shin.
40026056	Gido attin hayssi wurikka hanidayssi kase nabeti Geeshsha Maxaafatan yootidayssi poletanassa” gides. He wode Yesusa kaallizayti iza yeggidi dhayida.
40026057	He wode Yesusa oykkidi asati Muse woga astamaretinne dere cimati issife shiiqidason Qeeseta halaqa Qayaafakko efida.
40026058	Gido attin Phexroosi Qeeseta halaqa gibbe gakkanaas hahora Yesusa kaallides. Gibbe giddo gelidi hanizayssa wurseth beyanas, gibbe naagizaytara uttides.
40026059	He wode Qeeseta halaqatinne Ayhudata duulatay kumeth Yesusa wodhisanas wordo marka koyides.
40026060	Wordo markati daroti shiiqikkokka bessiza markateth demmibeetenna; gido attin guyeppe nam7u as dayti shiiqidi “Hayssi addezi ‘Ta Xoossa Keeththa laallada heedzdzu gallassara zaarada keexana dandayays’ gides” giidi markattida.
40026062	Hessa siyida Qeeseta halaqay utethafe dendi eqqidi “Hayti asati ne bolla markattizayssas aykkokka zaarikii?” gides.
40026063	Yesusikka co7u gides. Qeeseta halaqay “Ta nena de7o Xoossa sunthan oychays! Neni Kirstoosa, Xoossa naa gidikko taas yoota!” gides.
40026064	Yesusikka “Ne goyssakka mala; gido attin intes ubbas ta yootizay sinthafe Asa Nay Wolqamaza ushachan uttidi salo shaarara yiza wode inte beyana” gides.
40026065	He wode Qeeseta halaqay ba may7o daakkidi “Xoossa bolla cashsha qaala haasayides; nuus hayssafe aadhdhiza hara aaza marka koshshize! Xoossa bolla cashsha qaala izi haasayishin inte inte haythara siyideta.
40026066	Intes ay misatizee?” gides. Istika zaaridi izas “Hayqoy bessees” gida.
40026067	He wode Yesusa ayfeson cuttishe iccida; baggayti baqqishe,
40026068	“Kirstoosa! Ne nena nabe gaasashin nena baqqiday oonakkonne ane nuus yoota” gida.
40026069	Hessafe guye Phexroosi Qeeseta halaqa gibben utti dishin issi keeththa giddon ooththiza macas dizaara izakko shiiqada “Nenikka Galila Yesusara dizadde!” gadus.
40026070	Izi qasse “Ne ay gizakkonne ta erikke!” giidi ubba asa sinthan kadides.
40026071	Gibbezappe keziza penge izi bishin issi hara oosanchaya iza xeellada heen gadaan dizaytas “Hayssi addezi Naazirete Yesusara dizaddekko!” gadus.
40026072	Izikka “Ta iza erikke!” giidi nam7antho kadides.
40026073	Guuth gam7ishin heen eqqida asati shiiqidi Phexroosa “Ne haasayay ne haytara dizayssa qoncisees; tumappe ne ista bagga asa” gida.
40026074	Izikka caaqishenne amatishe hessa addeza “Ta erikke!” gides. Heerakka kuttoy waassides.
40026075	Hessa wode Yesusi kase Phexroosas “Kuttoy waassanas ne tana heedzdzuto kadana” giidi yootida qaalay qofetin, Phexroosi kare kezidi camo yeeho yeekkides.
40027001	Maalado wontara Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati wurikka Yesusa wodhana oge zorettida.
40027002	Yesusa qachi efidi gazhe Philaxoosas aaththi immida.
40027003	Iza aaththi immida Yuhudaykka Yesusa bolla pirdettidayssa beyidi “Aaththa immoonta aggarkina” giidi ba ekkida heedzdzu tammu bira Qeeseta halaqatassinne dere cimatas zaari immidi “Xillo as aaththa immida gish ta mooradis” gides. Istika “Histin nuus ay meto! Ne era ekka!” gida.
40027005	Hessa gish Yuhuday bira efidi Xoossa Keeththa giddon yeggidi kezi biidi cuuletti hayqqides.
40027006	Qeeseta halaqati bira denthidi “Suutha waaga gidida gish Xoossa Keeththa miishan gujanas bessenna” gida.
40027007	Ba giddon zorettidi imath gidida asatas duufo gidana mala issi urqa miish medhiza hiillaza gade shammida.
40027008	Hessa gish he gadey hachchi gakkanaas suutha gade geetettes.
40027009	Izas waaga gidana mala “Isra7eele nayti heregida heedzdzu tammu bira qoodi ekkida. Xoossi tana azazida mala urqa medhiza hiillaza gades immida” geetettidi nabe Ermaasa duunan yootettidayssi polettides.
40027011	He wode Yesusi dere haarizayssa sinth shiiqides. Dere haarizayssika “Neni Ayhuda kawoo?” giidi oychides. Yesusikka “Ne gida mala gido” gides.
40027012	Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati iza mootishin Yesusi istas aynne zaaribenna.
40027013	He wode Philaxoosi Yesusa “Aapun yo7on nena mootizakkonne siyikkii?” gides.
40027014	Dere haarizayssi keehi malalettana gakkanaas Yesusi issi qaalakka zaaribenna.
40027015	Dere haarizayssas ba7aale gallas derey qasho asappe “Ebeloy nuus birshetto!” gi oychikko issade birshiza wogay dees.
40027016	He wode gene ooson erettida Barbaane geetettiza issi qasho asi dees.
40027017	Derey shiiqida mala Philaxoosi “Barbaaneppenne Kirstoosa geetettiza Yesusappe ta intes oona birshana mala koyetii?” gides.
40027018	Philaxoosi isti coo qanates aaththi immidayssa erishe oychides.
40027019	Izi pirda alga bolla utti dishin iza macheya “Iza geedon hachchi tani agumora daro metotadis; hessa xillo addeza bolla ne aykkokka ooththonta mala” giza kiita Philaxoosas yeddadus.
40027020	Gido attin Qeeseta halaqatinne cimati istas Barbaaney birshettana malanne qasse Yesusa wodhana mala woossanas dereza qaalay gaaggana mala ooththida.
40027021	Dere haarizayssi “Nam7atappe oona birshana mala koyetii?” gi oychin, isti “Barbaane birsha!” gida.
40027022	Philaxoosikka “Histikko Kirstoosa geetettiza Yesusa wostoo?” gides. Wurikka “Kaqetto!” gida.
40027023	Philaxoosikka ayssii? “Ay iita ooththidee?” giidi ista oychides. Istika qasse keehi waassidi “Kaqetto!” gida.
40027024	Philaxoosi hanizayssi wurikka asay ba giddon bul7aketethafe attin hara ay go7ay bayndayssa yuushi xeelidi “Hayssa addeza suutha gomeppe ta geeshsha; hayssafe guye inte shene” giidi haaththi ehisidi dereza sinthan ba kushe mecettides.
40027025	Derey wuri “Iza suuthi nu bollanne nu nayta bolla gakko” giidi zaarides.
40027026	He wode Barbaane istas birshidi Yesusa garafissidappe guye kaqqana mala aaththi immides.
40027027	Hessafe wotadarati Yesusa gede dere haarizayssa gibbe ekki biidi wuri shiiqidi Yesusa giddo aaththida.
40027028	Iza may7o qaaridi hara zo7o may7o mayzida.
40027029	Aguntha aklile xaaxidi giigissida; iza hu7e bolla woothida; shomboqo guufe ushacha kushen oythidinne iza sinthan gulbatidi “Ayhuda kawo! Intes too!” giidi iza qidhida.
40027030	Iza bolla cuttida, shomboqo guufeza iza kusheppe ekkidi Yesusa hu7en zaari zaaridi shocida.
40027031	Iza bolla qidhi ka7idayssafe guye qasseka zo7o may7oza qaari ekkidinne kase iza may7oza zaari mayzidi kaqqanaso ekki bida.
40027032	Isti ekki bishin Qareena geetettizasoppe yida Simoona geetettizayssa demmidi masqaleza iza wolqara toossida.
40027033	Birshechay “Hu7e guuge” geetettiza Golgota gakkishin ciyera walakettida woyne cajje “Uya” giidi immida; gido attin izi gaanxi ekkidi uyana koybenna.
40027035	Iza kaqidappe guyen iza may7oza bolla saama yeggidi gishettida.
40027036	Heen uttidi iza naagida.
40027037	“Hayssi Ayhuda kawo Yesusa” giza mooto qaala iza hu7eppe bollara woththida.
40027038	Nam7u wombadetappe issoy Yesusappe ushacha baggara, issoy hadirsa baggara izara issife kaqettida.
40027039	Ogera aadhdhi biza asay cayishenne hu7e qaathishe “Xoossa Keeththa laallada heedzdzu gallassan hara keexana gizayso! Ane nena ashsha, ne Xoossa Naa gidikko ane masqale bollafe wodhdha” gida.
40027041	Qeeseta halaqati dere cimatara gididi iza bolla qidhishe;
40027042	“Hara asa ashshides shin bana ashshanas dandaybenna; izi Isra7eele kawo gidikko ane ha7i masqale bollafe wodhdho; nukka iza ammanana.
40027043	Xoossan ammanettides; bana Xoossa Naa gida mala Xoossi iza dosiza gidikko ane ha7i iza asho” gida.
40027044	Izara issife kaqettida pangatikka hessatho cashsha qaala iza bolla qoqofida.
40027045	Gallassafe usuppun saateppe biidi uddufun saate gakkanaas kumeththa biittay dhumides.
40027046	Uddufun saate gidishin Yesusi qaala dhoqu histidi “Eelohe! Eelohe! Lama sabaqitan” giidi waassides. Hessa guussas birsheththay “Ta Xoosso! Ta Xoosso! Tana ayssi aggadii?” guussa.
40027047	Heen gadaan eqqida asatappe issi issi asati iza waasoza siydi “Elaasa xeeygesko!” gida.
40027048	Istafe issadey woxxi biidi zandza misatiza sefinege geetettiza miish ekkidi caalida woyne cajjen yeggi caphisidinne shomboqo geetettiza mitha xeeran qaaphidi uyana mala Yesusa duunakko shiishshides.
40027049	Hanko asay qasse “Aggagite ane, Elaassi yiidi iza ashshin beyana” gida.
40027050	Yesusi qasseka dhoqa qaalan waassidi shempo kezides.
40027051	He wode Xoossa Keeththa magalashay bolla hu7era duge simmi daakkettidi nam7u kezides; biittay qaaxides; zaallati za77ida.
40027052	Duufoti doyettida; kase hayqqida Xoossa asappe daro baggay dendides.
40027053	Duufoppe kezidi Yesusa denthafe guye gede geeshsha katama gelidi darota ayfen bettida.
40027054	Mato halaqaynne izara issife Yesusa naagizayti biitta qaathanne hanidayssa wursi beyidi daro babbida. Qasse “Hayssi tumappe Xoossa Naakko!” gida.
40027055	Galilappe yiidi Yesusa koshshizazan ooththi maadanas kaalliza daro macasati hanizayssa wursikka hahora xeellishe heen deettes.
40027056	Ista giddon Magdaleppe yida Maaramiranne, Yaqoobenne Yoosefe aayo Maaramira, qasseka Zabidoosa nayta aayeyira issife deettes.
40027057	Gadey omarsishin Yoosefe geetettiza issi dure adde dayssi Armatiyasa geetettizasoppe yides. Izikka ba baggara Yesusa kaallizade.
40027058	Izi Philaxoosa sinthi shiiqidi Yesusa aha izas immana mala woossin Philaxoosikka izas immana mala azazides.
40027059	Yoosefey aha ekkidi geeshshiza moogo afalan xaaxides.
40027060	Shuch woocidi baassi giigissida duufon efi woththidi gita shuch gendersidi duufoza gordides.
40027061	Hessa wode Magdale Maaramiranne hara Maaramira duufoza ginan uttida.
40027062	Sambatas giigettiza wontetha gallas Qeeseta halaqatinne Farsaaweeti Philaxoosa sinth shiiqidi,
40027063	“Godo! He wordoy kase paxa dishe ‘Heedzdzu gallassafe guye ta dendana’ gida qaalay nu woznan turchu gides.
40027064	Hessa gish iza kaallizayti iza aha kaysoti ekkidi deres ‘Izi hayqoppe dendides’ giidi woresonta mala heedzdzantho gallas gakkanaas duufoy naagettana mala azaza; akay giikko kaseyssafe guye balay aadhdheth gidana” gida.
40027065	Philaxoosi “Intes naagizayti deettes; biidinne intes erettida mala naagisite” gides.
40027066	Istika biidi duufoza dunna maatamen gordidi naagana zabe essida.
40028001	Sambatay aadhdhidappe guye saamintappe koyro gallas buro saloy zo7ishin Magdale Maaramanne hara Maarama duufoza beyana bida.
40028002	Qopponta dishin gita biitta qaathi hanides; Goda kiitanchaykka saloppe wodhdhi duufakko biidi shuchcha gendersidi iza bolla uttides.
40028003	Kiitanchas medhay wolqantha poo7o mala; may7oykka shachcha mala bootha.
40028004	Duufo naagizayti kiitanchazas babbidi kokkoridinne hayqeth misatida.
40028005	Kiitanachay macasata “Babbofte; inte kaqettida Yesusa koyizayssa ta erays; izi ha7i haan baawa; izi kase yootida mala hayqoppe dendides; ha yiidi izi ichidaso beyte.
40028007	Ha7ikka eleli biidi iza kaallizaytas ‘Hayqoppe dendides. Intefe kasetidi Galila bees; inte iza heen demmana’ giidi yootite. Hi7a ta intes yootadis” gides.
40028008	Macasatikka baboninne ufayssan kumidi iza kaallizaytas yootanas elelidi wothan duufoy dizaso yeggi aggidi bida.
40028009	Heerakka Yesusi ista demmidi “Hayto saro” gides. Istika Yesusakko shiiqidinne iza toho oykkidi izas goynnida.
40028010	Yesusi ista “Babbofte! Biidinne isti Galila baana mala ta ishatas yootite. Isti tana heen beyana” gides.
40028011	Macasati buro oge bolla dishin naagizaytappe guutha baggati katama biidi hanidayssa wursi Qeeseta halaqatas yootida.
40028012	Qeeseta halaqatikka dere cimatara shiiqettidi zorettida; wotadaratas gidiza miish immidi “ ‘Nuni dhisikidaashin iza kaallizayti qammara yiidi kaysoti efida’ gite gida.
40028014	Hayssi worey dere haarizayssa matan siyetikkokka nuni izas lo7ethi yootana; aykko iitayka inte bolla gakkonta mala nu ooththana” gida.
40028015	Wotadaratikka miisha ekkidi isti gida mala ooththida; hayssi yo7ozi hachchi gakkanaas Ayhudata achchan daroson yootettishe dees.
40028016	Hessafekka Yesusa kaalliza tammanne issineti Yesusi ista bessida Galilan diza zuma bolla kezida.
40028017	Yesusa beyida mala izas goynnida, ista garasafe guuxiza baggati sidhida.
40028018	Yesusikka bana kaallizaytakko shiiqidi “Saloninne sa7an godateththi taas imettides. Hessa gish biidi dere ubba Aawa, Naazanne Xillo Ayana sunthan xammaqishe; tana kaallizayta ooththite; ta intena azazidayssa wursi naagana mala tamarsite. Takka alame wurseth gakkanaas ta intenara days” gides.
41001001	Xoossa Naa Yesus Kirstoosa koyro Mishiraachchoy hayssa;
41001002	nabe Isayaasa baggara “Hekko nees oge lo7ethanade ta kiittanade neeppe sinthara yeddana.
41001003	‘Godas oge giigissite; izi baana oge suurisidi ooththite’ gishe bazzo biittan waassiza giiris” geetetti xaafettides.
41001004	Hessathoka Xammaqiza Yohannisi asa xamaqishenne “Inte nagarappe simmidi xammaqettite, Xoossi inte nagara atto gaana” gi awajjishe bazzora kezi wodhdhides.
41001005	Yuhuda derey kumeth Yerusalame asay wuri Yohannisakko bi biidi ba nagara nagara paaxi paaxi Yordaanoose Shaafan Yohannisa kushen xammaqettides.
41001006	He wode Yohannisi may7izay gaamella isikeppe oosettida may7o; qasse ba xeessan dafo gixxees. Izi miza qumay boolenne degera eessa.
41001007	Izi “Tani hokkada iza caamma qasho birshanas bessontadey, taappe aadhdhizadey taappe guyera yaana.
41001008	Tani intena haaththan xammaqays izi gidikko intena Xillo Ayanan xammaqana” giidi sabakides.
41001009	He wode Yesusi Galila giddon diza Naazirete geetettiza katamaype Yordanoose Shaafa yiidi Yohannisa kushen xammaqettides.
41001010	Yesusi xammaqettidi haaththafe kezida mala saloy doyettin Xillo Ayanay iza bolla haraphe kafo misatidi wodhdhishin beyides.
41001011	Qasseka “Ta dosiza Nay nena, nenan ta ufayetays” giza qaala giirisi pude saloppe seetettides.
41001012	Heerakka Xillo Ayanay iza duge bazzo kaalethi efides.
41001013	Heen bazzonka oyddu tammu gallas gakkanaas Xala7era paacettishe gam7ides. Do7atara issife de7ides. Kiitanchatikka iza maaddida.
41001014	Yohannisi qasho keeth gelidayssafe guye Yesusi Xoossa Mishiraachcho qaala sabakishe gede Galila biidi “Wodey gakkides; Xoossa Kawotethi matides; nagarappe simmite, Mishiraachcho qaalan ammante” giidi sabakides.
41001016	Yesusi Galila Abba achchara aadhdhin Simoonaynne iza isha Indiraassi mole oykkizayta gidida gish isti mole oykiza gite abban yeggishin beyides.
41001017	Yesusi ista “Haa yite! Tana kaallite; inte mole oykki shiishshiza mala ta intena as oykkizayta ooththana” gides.
41001018	Isti heerakka mole giteza yeggi aggidi Yesusa kaallida.
41001019	Guuth gede sinthe aadhdhidi Zabidoosa naa Yaqoobeynne iza isha Yohannisi wogolon uttidi mole gite giigissishin beyidinne heerakka ista xeygides.
41001020	Istika ba aawa Zabidoosas qaxarettidi ooththiza asatara issife wogoloza giddon aggidi Yesusa kaalli bida.
41001021	Heeppeka Qifirnahoome bida. Heerakka Yesusi Ayhudata Sambata gallas Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelidi tamarso oykkides.
41001022	Xaafeta mala gidonta godateththara diza asa mala izi tamarsin asay wuri iza timirtezan malalettides.
41001023	He wode Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan diza tuna ayanay iza bolla diza issi addey
41001024	“Naazirete Yesusa ne nuuppe aazi koyay? Nuna dhayssana yadii? Ne oonakkonne ta nena erays; neni Xoossa geeshshaza” giidi waassides.
41001025	Yesuasikka tuna ayanaza “Co7u gaada izappe keza!” giidi hanqides.
41001026	Tuna ayanay addeza gendersidi izi qaketishin izappe waassishe kezides.
41001027	Derey wuri “Aso hayssi aaza palaa? Hayssi godateththara diza ooratha timirte; tuna ayanatakka azaazees; istika izas azazettetes” gi malalettishe asay ba giddon issoy issa oyshecho oykkides.
41001028	Heerakka iza ooso worey kumeth Galila yuushon diza dere ubban siyettides.
41001029	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththafe kezida mala Yaqooberanne Yohannisara issife gede Simoonasonne Indiraasaso gelida.
41001030	He gelida mala Simoona bolloteya misha harge sakettada ichchidayssa izas yootida.
41001031	Hessa gish Yesusi iziikko shiiqidi izi kushe oykidi denthides. Mishay aggin iza dendada ista mokkadus.
41001032	Awa arshey wullidappe guye gadey dhumishin asay harganchatanne daydanthi oykkida asaa wursi Yesusakko ekki yides.
41001033	He katamayin diza asay wuri keeththa karen shiiqides.
41001034	Izikka dumma dumma hargen sakettidayta darota pathides. Daro daydanthataka kessides. Gido attin daydanthati Yesusi oonakkonne eriza gish daydanthati haasayana mala Yesusi koybeenna.
41001035	Bazzoy zo7onta malado wontara Yesusi dendidi issi asi bayndaso biidi heen woossa oykkides.
41001036	Simooninne izara dizayti Yesusa koyana kezi bida.
41001037	Isti iza demmidi asi wuri nena koshshan dees gida.
41001038	Yesusikka “Ta yiday tamarsanas gidida gish ane Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas matan diza gutata boos” gides.
41001039	Hessa gish Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan geli geli sabakishenne daydanthi kessishe Galila kumeththan yuuyides.
41001040	Issi inchiracha hargizadey Yesusakko shiiqidinne iza sinthan gulbatidi “Ne shene gidikko ne tana paththana dandayassa” gi woossides.
41001041	Yesusikka addezas mishettidi ba kushe yeddi iza bochidinne “Ta ne paxana mala koyays; paxa!” gides.
41001042	Heerakka addeza inchiracha hargey aggin, addezi paxides.
41001043	Yesusikka addezas “Oonaska hayssa ne haasayonta mala naageta; gido attin baada Qeeses nena bessa. Derezas marka gidana mala ne paxxidayssas Musey azazida yarshoza shiisha” giidi keehi minth yootides.
41001045	Gido attin addezi kezi biidi ba bida ubbason wore darsi dharcides. Hessa geedon Yesusi ay katamanka qoncera gelanas dandaybenna. Hessafe dendidayssan katamappe karera asi bayndason duus oykkides. Asay gidikko dumma dummasoppekka izakko yides.
41002001	Guutha gallassafe guye “Yesusi Qifirnahoome simmidi soon dees” giza wore asay siyides.
41002002	Hessa gish keeththara karera uttizasoy dhayana gakkanaas daro derey shiiqides. Izikka Xoossa qaala asas sabakides.
41002003	Oyddu as dayti issi tohoy silida as tookkidi izakko ehida.
41002004	Asa daroteththafe dendidayssan Yesusi dizaso gaththanas dandayonta gish Yesusi diza ginara kaara qaaridi harganchaza izi ichida halara Yesusa sinth duge woththida.
41002005	Yesusi asata ammano beyidi tohoy silida addeza “Ta naazo! Ne nagaray atto geetettides” gides.
41002006	Heen gadaan uttida issi issi Muse woga xaafeti ba woznara hayssi addezi wosti hayssatho gizee? “Xoossa bolla cashsha qaala haasayees. Issi Xoossafe attin nagara maarana dandayizay oonee?” giidi qoppida.
41002008	Yesusi heerakka isti ba woznan qoppidayssa ba Ayanan eridi “Inte wosti hayssatho qoppetii?
41002009	Tohoy silida addeza, ‘Ne nagaray atto geetettides’ guussafenne ‘Dendada ne hala tookkada ba guussafe awayssi matizee?’
41002010	Gido attin Asa Naas biitta bollan nagara maarana godateththi dizayssa inte erana mala” giidi toho sila addeza;
41002011	“Dendada ne tookketta yida hala tookkada neso ba” gides.
41002012	Izikka dendidi asay wuri beyishin hala tookkidi bides. Heen gadaan diza asay wuri hanozan malaletidi “Kase hayssa malay hanin beybookko” giidi Xoosse galatides.
41002013	Qasseka Yesusi Galila Abba lanqe bides. Daro derey izakko yiin izikka yida asa tamarsides.
41002014	Izi ogera aadhdhi bishin Ilfiyoosa naa Lewey qaraxa shiishshizason uttidayssa beyidi “Haaya tana kaalla” gides. Izikka dendidi Yesusa kaallides.
41002015	Hessafe guye Leewe soon kaththa maaddan utti dishin qaraxa shiishshiza daro asatinne nagaranchati izara kaalli yida gish isti Yesusaranne iza kaallizaytara issife maaddan uttida.
41002016	Farsaaweeta baggafe gidida Muse woga tamarsizayti Yesusi nagaranchataranne qaraxa shiishshizaytara mishin beyidi iza kaallizayta “Qaraxa qanxissizaytaranne nagaranchatara aazas mizee?” giidi oychida.
41002017	Yesusikka isti gizayssa siydi “Aakimey harganchatas koshshes attin hargontaytas gidenna. Takka nagaranchata xeeyganas yadis attin xillota xeeyganas yabeekke” gides.
41002018	Yohannisa kaallizaytinne Farsaaweeti xooma xoomettes. Issi issi asati Yesusakko yiidi “Yohannisa kaallizaytinne Farsaaweeta kaallizayti xoomettes shin nena kaallizayti aazas xoomettenee?” gi oychida.
41002019	Yesusikka istas “Mishiray istara dishin mishira laggeti xoomi erizoo? Mishiray istara dishin xoomi eretenna.
41002020	Mishiray istafe ekettana wodey yaana. He wode isti xoomana.
41002021	“Gal7a may7o bolla ooratha woso woththi sikkizadey oonikka deenna; hessatho ooththikko oorathazi gal7a daakki daakki yeggees; daakkeththaykka kaseppe gede aadhdhi iitees.
41002022	Hessathoka ooratha woyne cajje gal7a lukkamon woththizadey deenna. Wothiza gidikko woyne cajjezi gal7a lukkamoza dhuussees; woyne cajjezinne lukkamozi nam7ay morettetes. Hessa gish ooratha woyne cajjey daanas bessizay ooratha lukkamonna” gides.
41002023	Yesusi Ayhudata Sambata gallas giste tiya giddora aadhdhishin iza kaallizayti izara issife bishe tiya xupho oykkida.
41002024	Farsaaweeti “Nena kaallizayti Sambata gallas diggettida miish aazas ooththizoo?” giidi Yesusa oychida.
41002025	Izikka istas “Dawutey gafidi miza miish koyda wode izara issife dizaytara izi ooththidayssa nabebibeekketii?
41002026	Abiyatarey Qeeseta halaqatethan dishin izi Xoossa Keeththe gelidi Qeeseti xalala maanas bessiza dumma kaththa baassi miidinne banara dizaytas immides” gides.
41002027	Qasseka Yesusi istas “Sambatay asas medhettides attin asi Sambatas medhetibenna.
41002028	Hessa gish ta Asa Nay Sambata goda” gides.
41003001	Hara gallas Yesusi Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe gelides. Henka kushey silidadey dees.
41003002	Yesusa mootanas gaaso koyiza asati izi Ayhudata Sambata gallas pathanakkonne giidi pathishin beyana koyda.
41003003	Izikka kushey silida addeza “Heen shiiqi uttida asa sinthan denda eqqa” gides.
41003004	Hessafe guye Yesusi asa “Sambata gallas bessizay lo7o oosoyee? Iita oosoo? Asa shempo ashoyee? Woykko shempo wodhoo?” giidi oychides. Istika co7u gida.
41003005	Ista wozna shuchchatethan mishetidi iza giddoththidi yuuyi aadhdhi eqqida asa hanqora xeelidi addeza “Ne kusheza piddisa!” gides. Addezikka ba kushe piddisin kushezi mulera pathides.
41003006	Farsaaweeti kezi biidi iza wosti dhayssanakkonne Herdoosa bagga gidida asatara zoretida.
41003007	Yesusi bana kaallizaytara abbako bides. Galilappenne Yuhudappe yida daro derey iza kaallides.
41003008	Izi ooththizayssa siydi asay Yuhudappe, Yerusalameppe, Edoomeppe, Yordanoose pinthan diza deretappe qasse Xirooseppenne Sidoona heerappe izakko yides.
41003009	Asay darida gish iza un7ethonta mala guutha wogolo isti giigisana mala bana kaallizayta azazides.
41003010	Izi daro harganchata pathida gish sakoy waayssizayti wuri iza ba kushera bochchanas dafettida.
41003011	Tuna ayanatikka Yesusa beyida mala iza sinthan kundidi “Neni Xoossa Naa” giidi waassida.
41003012	Gido attin izi oonakkonne tuna ayanati qoncisonta mala keehippe hanqides.
41003013	Yesusi pude zuma bolla kezidi ba koyizayta baako yaana mala xeygides, istika izakko yida.
41003014	Izara issife gidana malanne sabakanas yeddana mala tammanne nam7ata “Hawaareta” gi sunthides.
41003015	Asaappe daydanthata kessana mala istas godateththi immides.
41003016	Izi sunthida tammanne nam7ata sunthi hayssafe kaallizayssa; Phexroosa geetettida Simoona,
41003017	Bi7orinegeese woykko daada nayta geetettida Zabidoosa nayta Yaqoobenne Yohannisa,
41003018	Indiraasa, Piliphoosa, Bartelemoosa, Matoosa, Toomaasa, Ilfiyoosa naa Yaqoobe, Tadoosa, ba baggas mishettiza Simoona,
41003019	Yesusa aaththi immida Asqoroonto Yuhuda.
41003020	Hessafe guye Yesusi issi so gelides. Izinne iza kaallizayti kath maana wodey istas dhayana gakkanaas derey qasseka dari shiiqides.
41003021	Iza hanota siyida iza dabboti “Gooyonta aggenna” giidi banara ekki baanas izi dizaso gakkida.
41003022	Yerusalameppe yida xaafetikka “Bi7elizeebula geetettiza daydanthata halaqay iza bolla dees. Izi daydanthata kessizay daydanthata halaqa wolqanko!” gida.
41003023	Izikka ista xeygidi leemisora “Xala7ey asappe Xala7e wosti kessanee?
41003024	Ba giddon shaakoy diza kawotethi minnanas dandayenna.
41003025	Issi keeththa asikka ba giddon shaaketikko eqqanaas dandayenna.
41003026	Hessathoka Xala7ey ba garasan issoy issara shaakettikkonne ixettikko minni eqqanaas dandayenna. Hessika izas wurseth gidana.
41003027	“Hessa geedon issadey koyrottidi wolqama as qachonta dishe wolqamazaso gelanassinne iza miishe bonqanas dandayenna; iza aqo bonqanas dandayettizay wolqamaza qachikko xalala.
41003028	“Ta intes tumu gays; asa naytas nagaraynne cashshi wuri maarettana.
41003029	Gido attin Xillo Ayana bolla cashsha qaala haasayiza asa ubbas mernaas nagara acco gidana attin maarettenna” gides.
41003030	Hessa izi giday isti iza “Ne bolla tuna ayanay dees” gida gishasa.
41003031	Hessafe guye iza aayeyanne iza ishati kare yi eqqidinne ase izakko kiitti xeygisida.
41003032	Iza yuuyi aadhdhi uttida daro asay “Hekko ne aayeyanne ne ishati karen eqqidi nena koyeettes” gida.
41003033	Izikka zaaridi “Ta aaya oonee? Ta ishati oonantee?” gides.
41003034	Iza yuuyi uttida asaako xeelidi “Ta aayeyanne ta ishati haytantakko!
41003035	Xoossa shene ooththizay wuri izi ta isha, ta michonne ta aayo” gides.
41004001	Qasse Yesusi hara wode abba achchan tamarso oykkides. Izakko keehi daro derey shiiqida gish abba giddon diza wogolo dizaarin gelidi uttides; asayka wuri abba achchan shiiqides.
41004002	Izikka daro yo7ota leemiso hizgi tamarsides.
41004003	“Siyite! Issadey zereth zeranas kezides.
41004004	Izi zerishin issi issi zerethi oge bolla wodhdhides. Oge bolla wodhdhida zeretha kafoti maxi mida.
41004005	Baggay mela biittan wodhdhides. He biittay mela gidida gish heerakka caarides.
41004006	Gido attin awa arshey kezida mala shullidi xapho yeddonta gish melides.
41004007	Qasse issi zerethi aguntha giddon wodhdhides; agunthayka diccidi cuullida gish ayfibenna.
41004008	Hara zerethi qasse lo7o orde biitta bolla wodhdhida gish caaridi diccides; ayfeka ayfides; Issoy heedzdzu tammu, issoy qasse usuppun tammu, issoy qasse xeetu ayfides.”
41004009	Yesusi qasseka “Siyiza haythi dizadey siyo!” gides.
41004010	Yesusi barka dishin tammanne nam7atinne kase izara diza asay izi yootida leemisoza gish iza zaari oychida.
41004011	Izikka istas “Intes Xoossa Kawoteththa xuura eroy gelides shin karen dizaytas gidikko yo7oy wuri leemisora yootettes.
41004012	Hessika kase ‘Isti beyidi beyidayssa akeekonta malanne simonta mala, qasseka ista nagaray maaretonta malakko’ ” gides.
41004013	Qasseka Yesusi “Hayssi leemisoy intes gelibenee? Histin hara leemiso inte wosti erannee?
41004014	Zerizadey qaala zerees.
41004015	Issi issi asati oge bolla wodhdhida zeretha misatettes; isti qaala siyiza wode Xala7ey yiidi heerakka isti siyida qaala ista woznappe ekkichees.
41004016	Hessathoka harati mela biitta bolla wodhdhida zeretha misatetes. Isti qaala siydi ufayssan ekketes.
41004017	Gido attin isti xapho yeddonta gish guutha wode gam7ishin qaala geedon metoy woykko goodetay asata bolla yiza wode heerakka dhuphetetes.
41004018	Harati qasse aguntha giddon wodhdhida zeretha misatettes; isti qaala sisi siyeetes.
41004019	Gido attin ha biitta metoy, miisha siiqoynne hara amoy isti siyida qaala cuullidi ayfe ayfonta mala diggees.
41004020	Hankoyti lo7o biittan zeretida zeretha misatettes; heytikka qaala siydi ekkizadenne heedzdzu tammu ayfe, usuppun tammu ayfenne xeetu ayfe ayfizayta” gides.
41004021	Qasseka Yesusi “Xompe oythidi geemason woykko arsa giddon woththi eretii? Poo7ana mala qonceson wotheeta gidenee?
41004022	Hessa gish qotettidi qonce kezontay, poo7on kezonta geeman attanay baawa.
41004023	Hessa gish siyiza haythi dizaddey siyo!” gides.
41004024	Gujidikka “Inte siyizayssa woznan woththite; inte makkiza miishara intes makettana; hessafekka daroy gujettana.
41004025	Dizaddes gujettana shin bayndadefe izas dizaarakka ekketichana” gides.
41004026	Qasseka Yesusi “Xoossa kawotethi zereth zeriza issi as misatawus.
41004027	Zeridadey omars dhisikees. Wontishin dendees; gido attin izi eronta dishin zerettida kaththay mokkidi diccees.
41004028	Gadeyaka koyro caarech, kaalethada pudhe, qsseka pudheza bolla lo7o ayfe immawus.
41004029	Kathay kaxxidappe guye boney gakkin keeththa aaway heerakka maxa oykkes” gides.
41004030	Yesusi “Xoossa Kawoteth nu aazara ginisanee? Aazara leemisanee?
41004031	Biitta bolla ubbafe laafa gidida sanafice ayfe misatawus.
41004032	Zeretada diccidappe guye qas atakilteta ubbafe aadhdhiza gish kafoti yiidi he atakiltey haggata kuwa giddon shempeetes” gides.
41004033	Yesusikka asay ekkanas dandayizayssa keena hayta misatiza hara daro leemisora istas yootides.
41004034	Ay miish gidikkokka asas leemisoy baynda yooti erenna. Izinne iza kaallizayti xalla diza wode gidikko wursi birsh yootees.
41004035	He gallas gadey qammishin bana kaallizayta “Ane gede he pinth pinnoos” gides.
41004036	Isti asa heen aggagidi izi utti diza wogolozara Yesusa ekki bida. Hara wogolotikka istara issife deettes.
41004037	He wode wolqama dambalay abba bolla dendidi wogoloza haaththi kumana gakkanaas dambalay shocechides.
41004038	Gido attin Yesusi borkoth borkottidi wogolozas guye baggan ichides. Istika iza denthidi “Astamare! Nuni dhayishin nena metenee?” gida.
41004039	Izikka dendidi carkoza “Co7u ga!” abbaka “Woppu ga!” gides; carkoykka co7u gides; mulekka co7u gides.
41004040	Bana kaallizaytaka “Hayssatho aazas babbidetii? Hayssa gakkanaas intes ammanoy bawee?” gides.
41004041	Istika keehi babidi ba giddon issoy issara “Carkoynne abbay izas azazettizay hayssi oonee?” geetettida.
41005001	Abba pinnidi gede Gergesenoone geetettizaso bida.
41005002	Yesusi wogoloyippe wodhdhida mala tuna ayanay iza bolla dizaddey duufoppe kezidi Yesusara gaaggana izakko yides.
41005003	Hayssi addezi duufoson dizaddenne haray attoshin oonikka iza sansalatanka qachanas dandaybenna.
41005004	Daro wode toho birataranne sansalatara qashetees. Gido attin kushe sansalata duuththethi yegees; toho birataka mentherethi yeges; oonikka iza oykidi teqanas dandaybenna.
41005005	Gallassinne qamma duufota giddoninne zumata bolla yuuyi yuuyi waassishe ba bolla shuchchara qanxerethidi madunthees.
41005006	Izikka Yesusa hahon beyida mala wothan izakko yiidi iza sinthan gulbatidi goynnides.
41005007	Keehi waassidi “Haysso wogga Xoossa Naa Yesusa, nees tanara aazi dizee? Xoossa sunthan ta nena woossays tana waaysoppa” gides.
41005008	Izi hessa giday Yesusi kase “Neni tuna ayanay hayssafe keza” gida gishassa.
41005009	Hessafe qasse Yesusi iza “Ne sunthi oonee?” giidi oychides. Izikka “Nuni darota gidida gish ta sunthi Leegone geetettes” gides.
41005010	He dereppe kessi yeddonta mala Yesusa keehi woossides.
41005011	Heen matan zuma bolla daro guddunthi heemettes.
41005012	Tuna ayanati “Nu guddunthatan gelana mala nuus ero garkii?” giidi Yesusa woossida.
41005013	Izikka istas “Ero” gides. Tuna ayanatikka addezappe kezidi guddunthatan gelida. Nam7u shi gidida guddunthay wuri aafozara dugeththa genderetti wodhdhidi abban mitettida.
41005014	Gudduntha heemmizayti baqatidi hanidayssa katamaninne dere giddon yootida. Dereyka hanidayssa beyanas ba dizasoppe dizasoppe kezides.
41005015	Yesusakko yiidi daro daydanthi iza bolla diza addeza woznay izas simmin may7o may7idinne wogara uttidayssa yida asay beyidi babbides.
41005016	Hayssa beyida asay daydanthi iza bolla diza addeza gishshinne guddunthati hanoyssa derezas yootida.
41005017	Hessafe guye he dere asay Yesusi ista dere yeddidi baana mala woossides.
41005018	Yesusi wogolon gelishin daydanthati izappe kezida addezi Yesusara daanas woossides.
41005019	Yesusi qasse izi oychidayssa akay giidinne “Neni gede ne so ba, Goday nees ay mala gita miish ooththidakkonne izi nees ooththida maarotetha ne so asas yoota” gides.
41005020	Addezikka baso biidi Yesusi izas ooththida gita miish wursi tammu katama geetettiza deren yootin siyiday wurikka malalettides.
41005021	Qasseka Yesusi wogolon gelidi gede pinth pinnidi abba achchan dishin daro asay iza achchi shiiqidinne iza giddoththides.
41005022	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqatappe issoy Iya7iroosa geetettizayssi izi dizaso biidi Yesusa demmida mala iza toho bolla kundidi
41005023	“Taas guutha naa dizaara hayqqana gawus. Iza hayqqonta paxa daana mala ne ha yaada ne kushe izi bolla wotharkii?” giidi keehi woossides.
41005024	Yesusikka izara issife bides. Daro asay iza un7ethana gakkanaas kaallides.
41005025	Tammanne nam7u layth kumeth suuthi izi bollafe gukkiza macas dizaara heen asaara dawus.
41005026	Iza baassi diza miish wursa ongana gakkanaas akimeppe akime laamon daro daburadus. Gido attin sakoy izis gede darides attin aykkokka lo7ibenna.
41005027	Iza Yesusa gish siyida mala asa giddora Yesusa guyera kaallada iza may7o bochchadus.
41005028	Gaasoyka “Ta ay hanadakka iza may7o kushera bocho bochidakkoka ta paxana” gaada qoppida gishassa.
41005029	Gukkiza suuthay heerakka eqi aggides; izakka paxidayssa ba asatethan eradus.
41005030	Bappe wolqay kezidayssa Yesusi eridi gede asaakko simmidi “Ta may7o oone bochiday?” gides.
41005031	Iza kaallizayti qasse “Hayssi derey un7etidi sugetishin beyashe waanada ‘Tana bochiday oonee?’ gay” gida.
41005032	Yesusi hessa ooththiday oonakkonne beyanas yuushi xeellides.
41005033	Macasayakka baas aazi waanidakkone erada babbashenne kokkorashe yaada Yesusa sinthan gufannada hanida tuma wursa izas yootadus.
41005034	Izikka “Ta naye! Ne ammanoy nena ashshides. Saron ba! Ne waayeppe paxa!” gides.
41005035	Yesusi buro haasayan dishin Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe halaqa Iya7iroosa soppe yiidi Iya7iroosas “Ne naya hayqadus, Goda mela aazas daaburissay?” gida.
41005036	Gido attin Yesusi ista haasaya lepi histidi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqaza “Ne ammano xalla ammana attin babbofa!” gides.
41005037	Phexroosa Yaqooberanne Yaqoobe isha Yohannisappe attin haray oonikka iza kaallana mala koybenna.
41005038	Gede Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqa so gakkida mala asay waassishe camo yeeho yeekkizayssa beyides.
41005039	So gelidi “Hayssi wuri aaza waasonne aaza yeehoo? Naya dhiskadus attin hayqqabeykku” gides.
41005040	Qasse asay wuri iza bolla miicides; asa wursikka keeththafe kessidi nay aawanne nay aayiyo qasseka izara issife yidayta iza kaallizayta xalla kaaleththidi naya diza so gelides.
41005041	Nay kushekka oykkidi “Xaabita kum!” gides. “Xaabita kum” guussas birsheththi “Hanne naye, denda” guussa.
41005042	Nayakka heerakka denda eqqadus; heenne haane hamutadus. Iziska laythay tammanne nam7u laytha; asaykka he hanozan daro malalettides.
41005043	Yesusi hayssa oonikka eronta mala keehi minthi yootides; “Nays maana quma immite” gides.
41006001	Hessafe guye Yesusi heeppe dendidi gede ba dere bides. Iza kaallizaytikka izara bida.
41006002	Ayhudata Sambatay gakkin Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelidi tamarsishin siyida asay “Hayssi addezi hayssa wursi aawappe ekkidee? Hayssi izas imettida eratethay aazee? Qasse hayti izi ooththiza malatati waani iza kushen hanizoo?” gishe malalettida.
41006003	“Hayssi anaxeza gidenee? Maarami naa Yaqoobenta Yoosanta, Yuhudantanne Simoonanta isha gidenee? Iza micheti nunara haan nu matan dizayta detenee?” giidi hessafe dendidayssani izan ufayettibetenna.
41006004	Yesusikka istas “Nabey bonchettontay ba deren ba dabbota giddoninne baso asa achchan xalla” gides.
41006005	Heen guutha harganchata bolla kushe woththi pathorippe attin hara aykko malataka ooththanas dandaybenna.
41006006	Istas ammanoy bayndayssa beyidi malalettides. Hessafekka Yesusi gutan gutan yuuyi yuuyi tamarsides.
41006007	Tammanne nam7ata baako xeygidi nam7u nam7u histi kiittishe tuna ayanata bolla istas godateththi immides.
41006008	Izi “Oges gidiza guufe attin oge shinqe woykko korojo woykko miishe oykkofte.
41006009	Caamma aaththite gido attin laammana may7o oykkofte.
41006010	Issi keeththe inte gelikko he katamappe inte kezana gakkanaas he keeththan diite.
41006011	Awanka oonikka intena mokki ekkonta ixikko heeppe kezishe he dereta bolla marka gidana mala inte toho bolla diza gudulla qoqofte” giidi azazides.
41006012	Istika heeppe kezidi derey maarotethan gelana mala sabakida.
41006013	Daro daydanthata kessida; daro harganchata zayte tiyi tiyidi pathida.
41006014	Yesusa sunthi kaseppe ereti ereti bishin kawo Herdoossi hessa siyides. Issi issi asati “Hayssa mala malatata ooththiza Xammaqiza Yohannisi hayqoppe dendinikko” gida.
41006015	Baggayti “Elaasa” geettes; bagga asay qasse “Kase nabetappe issa misatees” geettes.
41006016	Herdoossi yo7oza siydi “Ta iza qoodhe qanxisida Yohannisi hayqoppe paxi dendides” gides.
41006017	Herdoossi ba isha Piliphoosa macho Herodiyado ekkida geedon oyketidi qashettana mala azazidi Yohannisa qasho keeththe gelthides.
41006018	Yohannisi Herdoosa “Ne isha macho ne ekkonta mala wogay nena diggees” gida gish qachides.
41006019	Herodiyada hessa gish hoollotada iza wodhisanas koyadus shin dandayabekku.
41006020	Gaasoyka Yohannisi xillonne geeshsha as gididayssa Herdoossi eriza gish Yohannisas babbessinne iza naagees. Yohannisi yootizayssa Herdoossi siydi hirgiza gidikkokka izi yootizayssa woznappe siyees.
41006021	Herdoosa yeletta gallas bonchanas dhoqa shuumetas; olla wotadarata azaziza waannatassinne Galila biittan keehi erettiza gita asatas gibira kessides; hessika Herodiyadis giiga gallas gidides.
41006022	Herodiyadi maca naya gelada asa sinthan yeth yexin Herdoosanne izi xeygida asa izi yethay ufaysidees. Kawoykka nayo “Ne koyiza miish wursa tana oycha ta nees immana” gides.
41006023	Qasseka ta kawoteththa bagga gididakkokka ne oychikko wursa ta nees immana giidi izis caaqides.
41006024	Nayakka elela kezada ba aayeyo “Kawo ay oychoo?” gadus. Aayiyakka “Xammaqiza Yohannisa hu7e qanxada imma ga” gadus.
41006025	Nayakka elela kezada kawozakko gelada “Xammaqiza Yohannisa hu7e keren wothada ne taas immana mala koyays” ga oychadus.
41006026	Kawoy he yo7ozan daro modhettides; gido attin xeeygetida imatha gishinne caaqida qaala gish izis akay gaanas koybeenna.
41006027	Hessa gish wotadaratappe issa eeson kiittidi Yohannisa qoodhe qanxidi iza hu7e ekki yaana mala azazides; izikka biidi qasho keeththa giddon Yohannisa qoodhe qanxides.
41006028	Hu7eza kerera ehidi nays immides; nayakka ba aayeyssi immadus.
41006029	Yohannisa kaallizaytikka hessa siyida mala yiidi Yohannisa aha ekki efidi moogida.
41006030	Hessafe guye Hawaareti simmidi Yesusa achchan yuuyi aadhdhi ba ooththidayssanne ba tamarsidayssa wursi izas yootida.
41006031	Daro asay yishenne bishe giza gish quma miza wodeykka bettibenna; “Ane inte xalla tanara asi bayndaso biidi ane guuth shempi ekkite” gides.
41006032	Hessa gish isti barka wogolon gelidi issi asi bayndaaso bida.
41006033	Isti bishin daroti beyidi tohora wothan istafe sinthe aadhdhida.
41006034	Yesusi wogolozappe wodhdhiza wode daro derey shiiqi uttidayssa beyides. Heemmizadey baynda mehe mala gidida gish asas qadhettides. Daro yo7okka tamarso oykkides.
41006035	He wode gadey qammi qammi biza gish iza kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Hayssi nu dizasoy bazzokko, gadeykka qammides.
41006036	Hayssa heeran asi dizaso biidi asay baas miza kath shami maana mala asa yedda” gida.
41006037	Izi istas zaaridi “Asaas miza miish inte immite” gides. Istika malalettidi “Nuni biidi nam7u xeetu dinarera kath shamidi hayssa asas immizakko gidandee?” gida.
41006038	Izikka istas “Intes ay lagge ukethi dizakonne ane biidi xeellite” giin isti bi xeelidi “Ichashu ukethinne nam7u moley dees” gida.
41006039	Hessafe kaallidi asaa cilila maata bolla oyddan oyddan uttisana mala azazides.
41006040	Asaykka xeetu xeetunne ichashu tammu ichashu tammu gididi oyddan uttides.
41006041	Izikka ichashu ukethanne nam7u moleta ba kushen oykidi pude salo xeelidi anjidinne uketha menthi menthi asas gishana mala bana kaallizaytas immides; nam7u moletaka ubba asas shaakerethides.
41006042	Asay wurikka miidi kallides.
41006043	Yesusa kaallizayti asay kalli miin attidayssa tammanne nam7u pitha kumeth shiishida.
41006044	Kath mida asaappe attumasay xalla ichashu shi.
41006045	Heerakka izi asaa moyzishe iza kaallizayti sinthatidi gede pinth Betesayda geetettizso pinnana mala azazides.
41006046	Heeppeka ista aggagidi woossanas pude zuma bolla kezides.
41006047	Gadey qammin wogoloy abba giddon dishin izi barka biitta bolla dees.
41006048	Abba bolla carkoy keehi metida gish iza kaallizayti abba shiri shiri wogolo laaggiza miishara baaxetishin Yesusi beyides. Wonta bolla istako yides; yiidinne ista achchara aadhdhi baanatho hanides.
41006049	Gido attin aadhdhi bana hanishin iza beyida mala moytile beyida misatin wurikka waassida.
41006050	Wurikka iza beyidi daggammida; izikka heerakka ista yoochidinne “Aykkoy ba; tanakko dagammofte!” gides.
41006051	Izikka wogolon istako gelin carkoy co7u gides, istika daro malalettida.
41006052	Kase izi ukethan ooththida malata birsheth isti eronta gish ista woznay doccides.
41006053	Abba pinnidi Gensereexe geetettizaso gakkida; wogolappe wodhdhidi wogoloza heen qachidi aggi bida.
41006054	Isti wogoloppe wodhdhida mala asay Yesusa erides.
41006055	Wurikka ba dizaso dizaso woxerettidi harganchata halan tookki tookki ekkidi Yesusi dizaso ehida.
41006056	Izi gakkida gutan woykko katama giddon woykko dere giddon gidin harganchati izi aadhdhishin iza woossidinne iza may7o bochidi paxana mala shiishshi shiishshi dubbushshay dizaason woththida. Izi aadhdhi bishin iza may7o bochidayti wuri paxida.
41007001	Hessafe guye Farsaaweetinne Yerusalameppe yida issi issi xaafeti Yesusa lanqen yuuyi aadhdhida.
41007002	Yesusa kaallizaytappe baggayti mecetonta qita kushera kath mishin beyida.
41007003	Farsaaweetinne kase cima Ayhuda asati kase dere woga naaganas kushe lo7ethi meecetonta kath mi erettenna.
41007004	Giya bi simmikkokka bolla meeceti geeyonta dishe kath mi erettenna. Hessathoka wancakka, otokka, kerekka, ichchiza hiithekka meecha malata hara wogatakka naagettes.
41007005	Farsaaweetinne xaafeti Yesusa “Nena kaallizayti kase aawata woga mala duus aggidi aazas kushe meecetonta kath mizoo?” giidi oychida.
41007006	Izikka istas “Isayaassi qoodheppe qommon haniza inte gish ‘Hayssi derey ba metershan xalala tana bonches; woznay gidikko taappe haakkides.
41007007	Taas mela hada goynnetes; ista timirteykka asi woththida woga xalla’ giidi yootidays tuma” gides.
41007008	Xoossa woga aggidi asi woththida woga naagettes.
41007009	Qasseka “inte wogas giidi Xoossa woga inte aggagiza cincateththa ogey intes dees.
41007010	Ays giikko Musey ‘Ne aayonne ne aawa boncha; ba aayonne ba aawa cayizaddey mulekka hayqqo’ gides.
41007011	Gido attin inte qasse ‘Issi asi ba aawa woykko ba aayo inte taappe demmanas koshshiza maado ta Xoossas immadis’ giikko;
41007012	Inte qasse hayssadey ba aawaska ba aayeyssi hara aykkokka ooththana mala koyekketa.
41007013	Hessa gish inte woga naagana giidi Xoossa qaala laammeta. Heytanta misatiza darota ooththeta.” gides.
41007014	Qasseka Yesusi asa baako xeygidi “Wurikka ta giza siyitenne woznan woththite.
41007015	Kareppe ulo gido gelidi as tunisiza issi miishikka deenna. Harappeka ase tunisizay keeththa aawappe gede kare keziza miisha.
41007016	Siyiza haythi dizay siyo!” gides.
41007017	Izi asa karen aggidi keeththe gelin iza kaallizayti izi yootida leemisoza birsheth Yesusa oychida.
41007018	Izikka ista “Inteska yo7oy gellenee? Kareppe gelidi ase tunisiza miishi aazikka deenna.
41007019	Kareppe gelizay gede woznan gidonta; duge qantha gido gelees qasse heeppe izaade asatethafe gede kare kezees.” Yesusi hessa giday asi miza kaththi wurikka geesh gididayssa qoncisanassa.
41007020	Kaalethidikka “Asappe kezizazi ase tunises.
41007021	Asa wozna giddofe kezizay iita qofata, layma amonne kaysoteth, ase wodho, laymateth,
41007022	Yiiqeteth, iitateth, baleththo, layma kaas, qanatetteth, asa sunth mooro, otoretethinne azalla.
41007023	Hayti iita hanoti wuri asappe kezeetessinne ase tuniseetes” gides.
41007024	Yesusi heeppe kezidi Xiroose geetettiza dere bides. Heen issade keeththe gelidi izi heen dizayssa asi eronta mala koyides. Gido attin izi heen iza duussay qotettanas dandayettibenna.
41007025	Heerakka issi tuna ayanay oykkida guutha naa dizaari aaya Yesusi heen dizayssa siyada izakko yaada iza toho bolla kundadus.
41007026	Macasaya Ayhuda gidonta Girike qaala haasayiza macasashin iza yelettidasoy Sirofinqe geetettes. Izakka Yesusi naype tuna ayana kessana mala woossadus.
41007027	Yesusi zaaridi izis “Nayta quma ekki kanas yegganas bessonta gish koyro nayti mi kalletto” gides.
41007028	Izakka zaarada “Ee Godo! Kanatikka maadda matan de7idi nayta kusheppe gaden wodhdhidayssa meetesikko” gadus.
41007029	Izikka “Histikko neni hessa gida gish ba! Daydanthay ne naype kezides” gides.
41007030	Iza simmada so bishin naya daydanthay yeddin paxada hiixan ichchidaro demmadus.
41007031	Hessafe Yesusi Xiroose biittafe dendidi Sidoona gizasora aadhdhi tammu katama gizasora kanthidi gede Galila Abbako gakkides.
41007032	Asay issi haytha tullenne ayfe qooqe asi izakko he ekki yiidi Yesusi iza bolla ba kushe wothana mala woossida.
41007033	Yesusikka iza asappe shaakki ekki biidi ba kushe biradhdheta addeza haythan gelthides; qasseka cuchch cuttidi addeza inxarsa bochides.
41007034	Pude salo xeelidinne tookki shempidi “Efita” gides. Hessika “Pogeta” guussa.
41007035	Heerakka addeza haythati pogettida; inxarsaykka birshettin geeshshi haasayides.
41007036	Yesusi hayssa beyidayti oonaska yootonta mala azazides; gido attin asay izi azazizadayssafe bollara keehi gujidi yootida.
41007037	Derezikka wogappe aaththi malalettidi “Izi ooththidayssi wuri lo7o; tulleti siyana mala, duuna duudeti haasayana mala ooththides” gida.
41008001	He wode qasse daro asi shiiqides. Shiiqida asas miza kaththi baynda gish Yesusi bana kaallizayta xeygidi,
41008002	“Hayti asati tanara heedzdzu gallas gakkanaas gam7ida gishshinne qasseka istas miza kaththi baynda gish tana miichetes.
41008003	Istafe issi issi asati hahoppe yida gish hayssa gafara ta ista so yeddikko daaburidi oge bolla kundana” gides.
41008004	Iza kaallizaytikka zaaridi “Hayssa bazzon hayssa mala dere mizana quma awappe demmanee?” gida.
41008005	Izikka ista “Intekon aapun ukethi dizee?” gi oychides. Istika “Laapun ukethi dees” gida.
41008006	Izikka asay gaden uttana mala azazides; laapun uketha ba kushen oyki galatidinne menthidi asas gishechana mala bana kaallizaytas immin istika derezas gishida.
41008007	Qasseka heen diza qeeri guutha moleta gish Xoossa galatidi guutha moleta asaas gishechana mala bana kaallizayta azazides.
41008008	Dereyka miidi kallides. Hessafekka iza kaallizayti maaddafe palahida kath laapun pitha kumeth denthida.
41008009	Hessa mida asay oyddu shi gidana. He asa moyzidi bana kaallizaytara wogolon gelidi gede Dalmanuuta geetettizaso bides.
41008011	Farsaaweeti yiidi Yesusara palameteth oykkida. Iza paacanas koyiidi bana saloppe malata bessana mala oychida.
41008012	Izikka tookki shempidi “Hayssi yelettazi aazas malata koyizee? Ta intes tuma gays; hayssa yelettas issi malataykka imettenna” gides.
41008013	Ista heen aggidinne wogolon gelidi he pinth pinnides.
41008014	Iza kaallizayti kath oykkonta balettida gish issi uketh attin wogolo giddon hara ay kaththikka deenna.
41008015	Yesusi ista “Farsaaweeta irshofenne Herdoosa irshofe naagetite” giidi azazides.
41008016	Isti qasse ba giddon issoy issara “Izi nuna hayssa gizay nuus kath baynda gishassa” gi yootettida.
41008017	Qasse Yesusi ista qofa eridi “Nuus kaththi baynda gish gaasa giidi inte giddon aazas hasayettetii? Ha7ikka yuushi qoppeketii? Woznanka wotheketii? Woykko inte woznay shuchchatidee?
41008018	Intes ayfey dees shin xeelleketii? Haythi dees shin siyekketii? Akeekekketii?
