41008019	Ichashu uketha ichashu shi asaas ta mentha immin aapun pitha kumeththa kath denthidetii?” gides. Istika zaaridi “Tammanne nam7u” gida.
41008020	Izikka “Laapun uketha oyddu shi asas ta mentha immin aapun pitha kumeththa kath denthidetii?” gi oychin istika “Laapun” gida.
41008021	Izikka ista “Histin ha7i gakkanaas yuushi qoppibeekketakka!” gides.
41008022	Hessafe gede Betesayda geetettizaso bida. Guutha asatikka issi ayfe qooqe asi Yesusakko ehidi Yesusi iza bochchana mala woossida.
41008023	Izikka he qooqeza kushe oykki goochchidi asi dizasoppe gede kare kessi addeza ayfen cuttidinne ba kushe iza bolla woththidi “Ha7i nees aazi bettizee?” gi oychides.
41008024	Izikka dhoqu gi xeelidi “Asay mith misatidi qaxettishe beettes” gides.
41008025	Qasseka Yesusi ba kusheta iza ayfeta bolla woththides; heerakka iza ayfeti xeellida; poo7oyka izas simmin wursikka geeshshi xeellides.
41008026	Qasse “Ha gutata giddo geloppanne oonaska yootoppa” giidi iza gede izaso yeddides.
41008027	Yesusi bana kaallizaytara Qisaariya Piliphisiyoose geetettiza dere achchan diza gutata bides; isti oge bolla dishin bana kaallizayta “Tana asay oona gizee?” giidi oychides.
41008028	Istika zaaridi nena “Xammaqiza Yohannisa gizaytikka deettes, baggati qasse Elaasa geettes, harati qas nabetappe issade geettes” giidi yootida.
41008029	Kaaleththidikka intech tana oona geetii? giidi oychides. Phexroosi “Neni Kirstoosa” gides.
41008030	Yesusikka ba gish oonaska isti yootonta mala minthi yootides.
41008031	Hessafe Yesusi bana kaallizayta, “Asa Nay daro waaye beyanayssanne dere cimatan, Qeeseta halaqaninne xaafetan kadhettanayssa asa kushen hayqqanayssa, hayqoppe heedzdzantho gallas dendanas bessees” giidi tamarso oykkides.
41008032	Izikka hessa istas qoncisi yootides, Phexroosikka iza dumma shaakki efidi “Hessatho gooppa!” giidi hanqides.
41008033	Yesusi qasse bana kaallizayta yuushi xeellishe Phexroosa “Haysso Xala7e ne taappe gede guye ba! Neni asazappe attin Xoossaz qoppakka!” giidi hanqides.
41008034	Hessafe guye asa bana kaallizaytara issife baako xeygidi “Tana kaallanas dosizadey diikko bana kaddo; ba masqale tookkidi tana kaallo.
41008035	Ba shempo ashshana dosizaddey dhayssana shin ta gishshinne ta Mishiraachcho qaala gish ba shempo dhayssizadey wurikka ashshana.
41008036	Asi alame kumeth haarikkonne ba shempofe dhayssiko iza ay go7anee?
41008037	Woykko asi ba shempo gish laame ekkanay aazi dizee?
41008038	“Hayssa laymanne nagarancha yeletta giddon dishe tananinne ta qaalan yellatiza asi wuri ta Asa Nay ta Aawa bonchoranne Geeshsha Kiitanchatara yiza wode izan yeellatana” gides.
41009001	Kaalethidikka Yesusi “Ta intes tuma gays; hayssan eqqida asappe Xoossa kawotethi wolqara yishin beyana gakkanaas hayqqonta gam7ana issi issi asati deettes” gides.
41009002	Usuppun gallassafe guye Yesusi Phexroosa Yaqoobenne Yohannisa banara kaalethi ekkidi issi gita zuma bolla kezides. Isti barka dishin ista sinthan iza medhay laameti wodhdhides.
41009003	Izi may7ida may7oy biitta bolla oonikka may7o meecidi hessa mala boothanas dandayonta booth boottides.
41009004	He wode Elaassinne Musey Yesusara hasayettishe istas beettida.
41009005	Phexroosi Yesusa “Astamare! Nuni haan hayssan dizaakko nuus lo7o; nees issi daase, Muses issi daase, qasse Elaasas issi daase, heedzdzu daaseta nu oothikkochii?” gides.
41009006	Daro babbida gish Phexroosi ba gizayssa eridi gibenna.
41009007	Heerakka shaaray ista kammin shaara giddora “Hayssi ta dosiza ta naazakko! Izi giza siyite” giza qaala giirisi yides.
41009008	Heerakka isti yuushi xeellin Yesusappe attin oonikka hara as istara deenna.
41009009	Isti zuma bollafe duge wodhdhishin Asa Nay hayqoppe dendana gakkanaas hayssa isti beyidayssa oonaska yootonta mala azazides.
41009010	Istika baas yootida qaala ba woznan oykkida shin “Hayqoppe dendo guussi ay guussakkonne” giidi ba giddon haasayettida
41009011	Qasse isti Muse woga tamarsizayti “Kasetidi Elaassi yaana koshshees aazas gizoo?” giidi iza oychida.
41009012	Yesusi istas “Tumukka Elaassi kaseti yiidi wursikka giigissana. Histinka Asa Nay daro waaye ekkanassinne kadhettanas bessees geetetti xaafettidayssi intes ay misatizee?
41009013	Gido attin ta intes gizay Elaassi gidikko yides shin asaykka iza gish xaafettida mala bana koshshida mala iza bolla ooththides” gides.
41009014	Duge giddon attida Yesusa kaallizaytakko isti simmi yishin daro asay ista giddoththin Muse woga tamarsizayti istara palamettizayssa beyida.
41009015	Derey iza demmida mala malalettidi sarokanas izakko woxxides.
41009016	Izikka ista “Inte istara aaza gish palametettii?” giidi oychides.
41009017	Asaa giddofe issadey “Astamare! Tuna ayanay izan gelin duuna duudida ta naa dayssa ta neekko ekka yadis.
41009018	Ayanazi dendiza wode bollafe yeggees; duunara gopponto kessi kessi yeggees; achchakka garcees; asatethakka zoodisses. Tuna ayana kessetto gaada nena kaallizayta ta oychin istika dandayibeetenna” gides.
41009019	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Inteno ammanonta yelettato, ayde gakkanaas ta intenara daanee? Qasse ayde gakkanaas ta intena dandayanee? Ane naaza ha ehite” gides.
41009020	Asaykka naaza izakko ehides, tuna ayanay Yesusa beyida mala naaza heerakka gaden gendersidi kokkorsidinne duunara gopponto coppu histides.
41009021	Yesusi naaza aawa “Hayssi hargey iza ayidesappe oykkidee?” gides. Naaza aawaykka “Naatethafe doommidi” gides.
41009022	“Iza wodhanas koydi daro wode tamanka haaththanka yeggees. Nees dandayettikko nuus mishetanne nuna maadda” gides.
41009023	Yesusi qasse “ ‘Nees dandayettikko’ gay? Ammanizades wurikka dandayettes” gides.
41009024	Naaza aaway heerakka “Ta ammanays shin ta ammanoy laafa, tana maaddarikii?” giidi waassides.
41009025	Asay wocamishe buuretti ekkidi izakko yizayssa Yesusi beyidi “Haysso tullenne duude ayanazo! Hayssa naazappe keza, ne qasse simmada gelonta mala ta nena azazays” giidi tuna ayana seerides.
41009026	Tuna ayanazikka keehi waassides; naazikka keehi qaketidappe guye naazappe kezides. Daroti hayqqides gaana gakkanaas naazi aha misatides.
41009027	Gido attin Yesusi naaza kushe oykki denthides. Naazikka dendi eqqides.
41009028	Yesusi so gelidappe guye iza kaallizayti “Nu izappe tuna ayana kessanas aazas dandayibeykkonii?” giidi iza oychida.
41009029	Izikka istas “Hayssa malay kezana dandayizay woossaninne xooman xalla” gides.
41009030	Heeppe dendi Galila baggara aadhdhi bida. Yesusi ba dizaso oonikka erana mala koybenna.
41009031	Gaasoyka Yesusi bana kaallizaytas “Asa Nay asa kushen aadhdhi imettana istika iza wodhana, heedzdzantho gallassafe guye izi dendana” giidi ista tamarsiza gishassa.
41009032	Gido attin izi gizayssi istas gelibenna; iza oychanaska babbida.
41009033	Hessafe guye Qifirnahoome bida. Izi keeththe gelidi “Inte yishe oge bolla aaza gish palametidetii?” gi oychides.
41009034	Isti qas oge bolla “Nu giddon nuuppe ubbafe aadhdhizay oonee?” giidi palametida gish wurikka co7u gida.
41009035	Izi uttidappe guye tammanne nam7ata xeygidi “Koyro gidana koyizadey ubbafe wursethinne ubbatas ashkara gido” gides.
41009036	Qii guutha naa ehidi ista giddon essides. Idimmidinne
41009037	“Hayta guutha naytappe issade ta sunthan mokki ekkizadey tanakka mokki ekkees. Tana mokki ekkizadey wuri tana xalala gidonta tana kiittidayssakka mokki ekkees” gides.
41009038	Yohannisikka “Astamare! Issadey ne sunthan daydanthi kessishin nu beydos. Izi nuna kaallonta gish kessonta mala diggidos” gides.
41009039	Yesusi qasse “Diggofte; oonikka ta sunthan malata ooththidi eesotidi ta bolla iita haasayanas dandayenna.
41009040	Nunara eeqettontay wuri nunara dees.
41009041	Ta intes tumu gays; inte tiyettida Kirstoosas gidida gish ta sunthan issi wanca haath intena ushshidadey wuri ba oosoys waaga dhayenna.
41009042	“Hayta tana ammaniza ha guuthatappe issades dhuphe gidizay wuri deexxo woxa shuchchi iza qoodhen qashetin duge abba gido olettidakko izas lo7o gidana.
41009043	Hessa gish ne kushey nena baleththikko neeppe qanxa yegga; nam7u kushera daada gede Gaanname taman ne baanayssafe kushe duuxa gidada gede de7on geloy nees lo7o gidana.
41009044	Gaannamen guxuney hayqqenna, tamaynne to7enna.
41009045	Nena ne tohoy baleththikko neeppe qanxa digga; nam7u tohora daada gede Gaanname taman yegettanappe ne wobe gidada gede de7oso geloy nees lo7o.
41009046	Gaannamen guxuney hayqqenna, tamaynne to7enna.
41009047	Nena ne ayfey baleththikko wooca kessada neeppe digga; nam7u ayfera daada gede Gaannamen yegetanappe issi ayfera Xoossa Kawoteth geloy nees lo7o.
41009048	Gaannamen guxuney hayqqenna tamaynne to7enna.
41009049	“Buro asi wuri taman paacettana.
41009050	“Maxiney lo7o; gido attin maxiney ba maxinetetha yeddiko inte wosti iza mal7o eranee? Inte asatethan maxiney de7o. Inte inte giddon dosettite” gides.
41010001	Yesusi heeppe dendidi gede Yuhuda geetettiza derenne Yordanoose shaafappe pinthan diza dere bides. Dereyka qasse iza yuuyi aadhdhin izi kase ba ooththiza mala asa tamarsides.
41010002	Issi issi Farsaaweeti izakko yiidi “Asi ba macho anji yeddanas bessizee?” giidi iza paace oysho oychida.
41010003	Izikka istas “Musey intena ay gi azazidee?” giidi zaari oychides.
41010004	Istika izas “Musey ta izo anja yeddadis giza waraqata xaafi immidi anjo gides” gida.
41010005	Yesusikka zaaridi ista “Musey hayssa mala woga xaafidayssi inte woznay minnida gishassa.
41010006	Gido attin koyro Xoossi medhishe macanne adde ooththi medhides.
41010007	Hessa gish asi ba aawanne ba aayo aggidi ba machira waaxettes.
41010008	Nam7ay issi asho gideettes; hessa gish isti nam7ay issinoppe attin nam7u deettenna.
41010009	Hessa gish Xoossi gaththi waaxidayta asi shaakkofo.” gides.
41010010	Qasseka isti so gelin iza kaallizayti he yo7oza gish zaari iza oychida.
41010011	Izi istas “Oonikka ba macho anji yeddidi hara macas ekkiko he macasay bolla layma ooththes.
41010012	Macasayakka ba azina aggada hara adde gelikko izakka laymatawus” gides.
41010013	Yesusi ba kushe wothana mala asay nayta izakko ehides. Iza kaallizayti qasse ehida asa bolla hanqettida.
41010014	Yesusi hessa beyi hanqettidi “Nayti taakko yeto; diggofte; Xoossa Kawotethi haytanta malassa.
41010015	Ta intes tumu gays; Xoossa Kawoteth hayssa guutha nayta mala ekkontadey izin mulekka gelenna” gides.
41010016	Nayta idimmidi ista bolla ba kushe woththidi anjides.
41010017	Heeppe buro oge kezishin issadey wooxishe izakko gakkidinne iza sinthan gulbatidi “Kiya astamareento! Tani merna de7o demmana mala ay ooththana taas bessizee?” gi oychides.
41010018	Yesusikka “Aazas tana kiya gay? Issi Xoossafe attin kiyay ba” gides.
41010019	“Neni azazota eray? ‘Wodhoppa; laymatoppa; kaysotoppa; wordo markatofa; as baleththofa; ne aawanne ne aayo boncha’ gizayta” gides.
41010020	Addezikka zaaridi “Astamare! Ta hayta wursa naatethafe oykkada naagadis” gides.
41010021	Yesusi iza xeelidinne dosidi “Histikko ha7i nees issi miishi paccees. Baadanne nees diza wursa bayza, miisha manqotas imma; neni salon shiiqida miish demmandassa; histadanne haaya tana kaalla” gides.
41010022	Addezikka hessa siydi daro yiillottides. Izas daro haroy diza gish muuzottishe bides.
41010023	Yesusi yuushi aaththi xeelidi bana kaallizayta “Duretas Xoossa Kawoteth geloy ay mala deexo!” gides.
41010024	Iza kaallizaytikka iza haasayan malalettida. Yesusi qasse zaaridi “Nayto! Xoossa Kawoteth geloy ay mala deexo miishe!
41010025	Durey Xoossa kawoteth gelanayssafe gaamellay narpe lukkora aadhdhanayssi kawuyana!” gides.
41010026	Iza kaallizaytikka darsi malalettidi ba giddon issoy issa “Histin ooni attana dandayizee?” gida.
41010027	Yesusi ista xeelidinne “Hayssi asas dandayettenna; Xoossa matan gidikko hessa mala gidenna. Xoossas wurikka dandayettes” gides.
41010028	Phexroosi qasse “Hekko; nuni wursikka aggidi nena kaallidos” gides.
41010029	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ta intes tumu gays; ta gishshinne Mishiraachcho qaala gish giidi ba keeththe, woykko ba ishata, woykko ba micheta, woykko ba aayo, woykko ba aawa, ba nayta, woykko ba gade aggida as wuri,
41010030	hayssa ha wodezan ha7i goodeteththara keeththata, ishata, micheta, aayeta, naytanne gadekka xeetu kushe aaththi ekontaynne buro yaana alamezanka merna de7o laattontadey deenna.
41010031	Gido attin sinthatida daroti guyettana; guyetidayti sinthatana” gides.
41010032	Isti Yerusalame efiza oge bolla dishin Yesusi istafe sinthe sinthe bees. Iza kaallizayti iza buussan malalettida. Hanko iza geedon diza asay qas izas babbides. Qasseka tammanne nam7ata derezappe dumma shaakkidi ba bolla aazi gakkanakkonne istas hizgi yootides;
41010033	“Nuni Yerusalame kezana; Asa Nay Qeeseta halaqatassinne Muse woga tamarsizaytas aadhdhi imettana; istika iza bolla hayqo pirda pirdananne dere asas aaththi immana.
41010034	Iza bolla qidhi ka7ana; iza bolla cuttana; izakka garafananne wodhana shin izi heedzdzu gallassafe guyen hayqoppe dendana.”
41010035	Qasse Zabidoosa nayti Yaqoobeynne Yohannisi izakko shiiqidi “Astamare! Nuni nena woossidayssa ne nuus wursa ooththana mala nu koyoos” gida.
41010036	Izikka istas “Ta intes ay ooththana mala koyetii?” gides.
41010037	Istika “Neni ne kawoteththa boncho wode nuuppe issadey ne ushachan issadey ne hadirsan uttana mala nuus ero garkii?” gida.
41010038	Yesusikka “Inte oychizayssa erekketa. Tani uyana ushsha uyanassinne tani xammaqettiza xinqata xammaqettanas dandayandetii?” gides.
41010039	Istika zaaridi “Ee, dandayoos” gida. Yesusikka “Ta uyiza ushsha inte uyananne ta xammaqettiza xinqata inte xammaqettana.
41010040	Gido attin ta ushachara woykko ta hadirisara utethi Xoossi istas giigissidaytas attin ta immana miish gidenna” gides.
41010041	Tammati hessa siydi Yaqoobenne Yohannisa bolla hanqettida.
41010042	Yesusikka issi bolla shiishshidi “Dere halaqa geetettizayti dere haarizayssa mala ista shuumeti ista bolla ba godateth bessizayssa inte ereeta.
41010043	Gido attin inte giddon gita gidana koyiza ubbay ashkara gido.
41010044	Sinthe aadhdhana koyizay wurikka ubbas aylle gido.
41010045	Asa Nay gidikko asas ooththanassinne ba shempo darota gish aaththi immanas yides attin ase oosisanaas yibenna.” gides.
41010046	Heeppe gede Yarko bida. Yesusinne iza kaallizayti hara daro asatara Iyarkofe kezishin Ximoosa naa Barxemoosa geetettiza ayfe qooqey oge bolla uttidi woosses.
41010047	Izikka yizay Naazirete Yesusa gididayssa siydi “Dawute naa Yesusa tana maara” giidi keehi waassides.
41010048	Daroti izi co7u gaana mala hanqida; gido attin izi “Dawuteno! Tana maara” giidi keehi waassides.
41010049	Yesusikka eqqidi “Iza ha xeygite” gides. Istika qooqeza “Aykkoy ba denda nena xeeyges” gida.
41010050	Izikka ba may7o qaari yeggidi pusukku gi dendi eqqidi Yesusakko yides.
41010051	Yesusikka “Ta nees ay ooththana mala koyay?” gides. Qooqezikka “Aastamareento! Ta xeellanawu koyays” gides.
41010052	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ba nena ne ammanoy pathides” gides. Heerakka iza ayfey xeellides. Izikka Yesusa kaalli bides.
41011001	Isti gede Yerusalamen Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma achchan diza Betefaagenne Bitaaniya geetettizaso matida wode Yesusi bana kaallizaytappe nam7ata hizgi kiittides,
41011002	“Gede inte sinthan diza gutayo biite. Inte he gelida mala heen asi togi eronta qashon diza hare gutte inte demmana; birshidi iza ha ekki yiite.
41011003	Oonikka intena ‘Hayssa ays ooththetii?’ giikko Godas koshshees giidi yootite; izikka intes eeson zaari yeddana” gides.
41011004	Istika biidi issi keeththa karen oge bolla qasheti diza hare gutte demmidi birshida.
41011005	Heen eqqida issi issi asati “Hare gutteza aazas birshetii?” gi oychida.
41011006	Yesusa kaallizayti Yesusi istas gida mala asatas yootin ero eki biite gida.
41011007	Guttezakka Yesusakko ehidi ba may7o iza zokko bolla yeggin Yesusi iza toggides.
41011008	Daro asay ba may7o kessi kessi oge bolla micides. Bagga asay cilila mitha hayth qanxi qanxidi oge bolla laallides.
41011009	Yesusappe sintharanne guyera diza asay qaala dhoqu histidi “Hoosana; Goda sunthan yizadey anjettidade.
41011010	Hanna yizara nu aawa Dawute kawoteththaya anjettidaro; hoosana! Bolla salon Xoossi bonchetto” gishe waassides.
41011011	Yesusi Yerusalame gakkidi hessafekka Xoossa Keeththe gelides. He heeran dizayssa wursi xeelidi gadey qammida gish tammanne nam7atara gede Bitaaniya kezides.
41011012	Wontetha gallas isti Bitaaniyappe kezi bishin Yesusi gafides.
41011013	Izi issi haythi cililida balase geetettiza mithi hahon beyidi ayfey daanakkonne giidi iziikko yides. Gido attin balase mithi ayfonta wode gidida gish haythafe attin issi ayfekka izippe demmibenna.
41011014	Hessa gish mithayo “Hannife guye mernas oonikka neeppe ayfe mooppo!” gides. Iza kaallizaytikka izi gizayssa siyida.
41011015	Gede Yerusalame bida; heeppeka gede Xoossa Keeththe gelidi heen bayzizaytanne shamizayta kessi goodo oykkides. Miishe laammizayta xaraphezanne haraphe bayzizayta oyde gufanthi gufanthi yeggides.
41011016	Oonikka ay miish tookkidi Xoossa Keeththe gibbe giddora aadhdhonta mala diggides.
41011017	Istaka tamarsishe “Ta keeththi dere ubbas Woosa Keeththe gidana geetetti xaafettibenee? Gido attin inte qasse kaysota gongolo kessideta” gides.
41011018	Qeeseta halaqatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti hessa siydi iza wosti dhayssanakkonne oge kosh oykkida. Gido attin dereyka iza timirtezan malalettida gish izas babbida.
41011019	Istika gadey qammin katamaype kezi bida.
41011020	Wontetha gallas maalado isti ogera aadhdhi bishin balase mithaya xaphoppe melidaro beyida.
41011021	Yo7ozi iza woznan akeeketin Phexroosi Yesusa “Astamare! Hekko, hanna ne qangida balaseya meladus” gides.
41011022	Izikka zaaridi “Xoossa ammante.
41011023	Ta intes tumu gays; ‘Oonikka hayssa zumaza ne dhoqalletada gede abban gela’ gizakkonne hessaka woznan sidhonta ammanidakko izaades hanana.
41011024	Hessa gish inte woossan oychidaz wursi ekkida mala ammanikko intes hanana.
41011025	Hessathoka inte woossas eqqiza wode inte Salo Aaway inte nagara atto gaana mala inteka intena qohidayta nagara wursi atto giite.
41011026	Inte atto goonta ixikko inte salo aawaykka inte nagara atto geenna.” gides.
41011027	Qasseka Yerusalame yida. Yesusi Xoossa Keeththe kare giddon gedene haane yuuyetishin Qeeseta halaqati, Muse woga tamarsizaytinne dere cimati izakko shiiqidi,
41011028	“Hayssa ne ooththizay ay godatetharaa? Hayta ne ooththana mala hayssa mala godateth nees ooni immidee?” gida.
41011029	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Ane takka intena issi oysho oychays inteka taas zaarikko takka ha yo7ota ay godateththara ooththizakkonne intes yootana.
41011030	Yohannisa xinqatey Xoossafeyee? Asappee? Ane taas zaarite” gides.
41011031	Istika ba giddon issoy issara “Nu saloppe giikko izi nuna ‘Histin aazas iza ammanibeyketii?’ gaana;
41011032	‘Nu asappe’ giikko” Yohannisi tumu nabe gididayssa derey wuri ammaniza gish hessatho gaana babbida.
41011033	Hessa gish “Nu erokko” giidi Yesusas zaarida. Yesusikka “Histikko ta hayta aaza godateththara ooththizakkonne takka intes yootikke” gides.
41012001	Qasse istas leemisora yootishe “Issadey ba woyne mith tokkides. Keela yuushi aaththi keelides; woyne mitha ayfe gum7ana olla bokkides. Naage keeththekka keexides. Hessafe goshshanchatas kira immidi hara dere bides.
41012002	Mithay ayfiza wode woyne mitha ayfe ekkada ya giidi ashkaratappe issade goshshanchatakko yeddides.
41012003	Goshshanchati ashkaraza oykki shocidi coo mela kushe yeddida.
41012004	Nam7anthokka hara ashkara yeddides. Goshshanchati ha7ikka ashkara oykkidi izas hu7etara qoo7idinne kawushshidi zaari yeddida.
41012005	Ha7ikka zaaridi hara ashkara yeddides. He yeddoyssakka wodhida; hara darota giddofe issi issi asata qoxida; baggayta wodhida.
41012006	“Ha7ikka kiittonta attiza haray dees; izikka aaway dosiza iza naaza. ‘Ta naaza isti boossana’ gi qoppidi wursethan ba naaza yeddides.
41012007	Goshshanchati qas ba giddon ‘Hayssi waanna iza laattana naaza; ha yiite nu iza wodhikko biittay nuus gidana’ gida.
41012008	Hessa gish heen oykki wodhidi woyne mithaya dizasoppe haraso kessi yeggida.
41012009	“Histin woyne mitha goday intes ay ooththana misatizee? Izi yaana; goshshanchatakka wodhana; woyne mitha haratas immana.
41012010	Geeshsha Maxaafan ‘Shuchcha keeththe keexizayti hanenna giidi wora yeggida shuchchay keeththa maazanes bolla hu7e gidides; hessaka Goday ooththides. Hessika nu ayfes malalisizaz geetettidi xaafettidayssa nabebibeekketii?’ ” gides.
41012012	Izi istas leemisoza yootiday ista gish gididayssa Ayhuda halaqati erida gish iza oykkanas koyda. Gido attin asas babbida gish aggi bida.
41012013	Yesusa yo7on qaxana mala Farsaaweetappenne Herdoosa baggatappe guutha asata dooridi izakko yeddida.
41012014	Istika izakko yiidi “Astamare! Neni mooroy baynda as gididayssa nu eroos; ne oonaska babbada wordo maaddakka; Xoossa oge xalala tumu tamarsassa. Oroome kawo Qeesares giira qanxanas bessizeyee? Bessenee? Nu qanxinoyee? Qanxofinoo?”
41012015	Yesusi ista oyshoy qoodheppe qommo gididayssa eridi “Aazas tana qaxana koyetii? Ane issi dinare hammite ta beyays” gides.
41012016	Istika miisha ehin “Hayssi iza bolla diza misilezi oona misilee? Iza bolla xaafetidayssi oona gizee?” gides. Istika “Qeesareyssakko” gida.
41012017	Yesusikka “Qeesareyssa Qeesares, Xoossayssa Xoossas immite” gides. Istika iza zaaron malalettida.
41012018	Hessafe guye hayqqidaytas hayqoppe denthi baawa giza Saduqaaweti izakko yiidi iza hizgi oychida.
41012019	“Astamare! Issi asi macho ekkidi naa yelonta hayqqikko hayqqidayssa ishay iza macheyo ekkidi izas laata naa yelana mala kase Musey nuus xaafides.
41012020	Gido attin laapun ishanti deettes; istafe bayray macho ekkidi naa yelonta hayqqides.
41012021	Kaalozi he macasayo ekkidi ha7ikka naa yelonta hayqqides; heedzdzanthoyka yelonta hayqqides.
41012022	Laapunatikka he macasayo ekkidi laata yelibeetenna wursethan macasayakka hayqqadus.
41012023	Histin laapunatikka izo ekkidashin hayqoppe dendoy diza gidikko ha macasaya istafe oona macho gidanee?” gida.
41012024	Yesusikka istas “Inte balettizay Geeshsha Maxaafatanne Xoossa wolqa eronta gishassa.
41012025	Hayqqidayti dendiza wode Salo Kiitanchata mala gidana attin ekkettettenanne gelettettenna.
41012026	Hayqqidayta dentha gishas gidikko Muse maxaafan hessika qeeri wora giddon eexxiza tama giddofe Xoossi ‘Tani Aabrahaame Xoossa; Yisaaqa Xoossa; Yaqoobe Xoossa’ gizayssa nababibeekketii?
41012027	Xoossi paxata Xoossa attin hayqethata Xoossi gidenna. Hessa gish inte daro balettideta” gides.
41012028	Isti palaman dishin xaafetappe issadey ista palama siydinne Yesusi oyshetidayssas lo7eth zaaridayssa akeekidi “Ero! Azazotappe ubbafe aadhdhizay awayssee?” giidi oychides.
41012029	Yesusi izas hizgides “Ubbafe aadhdhizay hayssa ‘Isra7eele siya! Goda Xoossi issi Goda,
41012030	Nekka Goda ne Xoossa ne kumeththa woznappe, ne kumeththa shempofe, ne kumeththa qofappe, ne kumeththa wolqafe dosa.’
41012031	Nam7anthoykka ‘Ne lagge ne hu7e mala dosa’ ha nam7atappe aadhdhiza azazoy baawa.”
41012032	Xaafezikka “Aastamare, lo7o gadasa, ‘Xoossi issino gididayssanne izappe haray bayndayssa’ ne yootidayssi likke.
41012033	Iza ne kumeththa woznappe ne kumeththa qofappe ne kumeththa wolqafe dosoy qasseka ne lagge ne hu7e mala dosoy xuugetiza yarshofenne hara yarsho ubbafe aadhdhees” gides.
41012034	Yesusikka addezi yuushi qoppidi zaaridayssa beyidi “Neni Xoossa Kawoteththafe hahon daakka” gides. Hessafe guye iza oychanas xalidadey bettibenna.
41012035	Yesusi Xoossa Keeththe gaaththan tamarsishe “Muse woga tamarsizayti aazas ‘Kirstoosa Dawute naa’ gizoo?
41012036	Dawutey Xillo Ayanan haasayishe ‘Goday ta Goda ne morketa ta ne toho gars aaththana gakkanaas ta ushachchan utta gides’ gees.
41012037	Histin Dawutey ba duunara iza ‘Goda’ giikko waanidi simmi izas naa gidanee?” gides. Daro dereyka izi gizayssa ufayssara siyides.
41012038	Izi tamarsishe “Muse woga tamarsizaytappe naagettite, gadera gooshettiza aduussa may7o may7idi yuush yuuyana doosettes; awanka aadhdhi aadhdhi asi istas boncho sarota immana mala koyettes.
41012039	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan dhoqaso, gibirasokka bonchoso koyeettes.
41012040	Isti azinay baynda macasa keeththa kallosettes; qasseka bana bessanas adussa woossa woossetes. Haytanti iita pirda pirdettana” gides.
41012041	Yesusikka asay muxuwata yeggizason uttidi daro asati immizayssa Xoossa Keeththa miisha shiishshiza saaxinen yeggizayssa xeellides. Daro dureti daro miish yeggida.
41012042	Issi azinay baynda am7e dizaara issi sikinafe daronta xarqimala biratappe oosettida nam7u miish yeggadus.
41012043	Yesusi bana kaallizayta xeygidi “Ta intes tumu gays; saaxinezan yeggida ubbafe hanna manqo am7eya aadhdheth yeggadus.
41012044	Hayti wuri baas diza tirpa miishafe yeggidashin hanna qasse ba manqotethafe baas dizayssa sinthafe izo koshizayssara wursa immadus” gides.
41013001	Izi Xoossa Keeththafe kezishin iza kaallizaytappe issoy “Astamare! Hayssi keeththaynne keeththay keexettida shuchchay ay mala lo7izakkonne hayssa beyay?” gides.
41013002	Yesusikka zaaridi “Hayta gita keeththata xeellay? Shuchchati issoy issa bolla diza mala deettenna; wurikka laalettana” gides.
41013003	Yesusi Xoossa Keeththa ginara Dabrazayte zuma bolla uttidishin Phexroosi, Yaqoobi, Yohannissinne Indiraassi xalla izakko shiiqidi,
41013004	“Hayssi ayde hananakkonne nuus yoota. Hayssi wursethan poletanas malatay aazee?” gi oychida.
41013005	Yesusikka istas “Oonikka intena baleththonta mala naagettite.
41013006	Buro daroti ‘Ta Kirstoosa’ gishe ta sunthan yaana; darotaka baleththana.
41013007	Inte olanne ola wore siyiza wode daggammofte. Hessi hananayssi attenna. Wursethi gidikko burona.
41013008	Derey dere bolla kawoy kawo bolla dendana, daroson biitta qaathinne koshay hanana; heyti wuri miixas leeso mala.
41013009	“Inte intes naagettite. Buro intena dere duulatan aaththi immana. Isti intena Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan garafana. Inte ta markata gidana mala ta gish dere daannata sinthaninne kawota sinthan eqqana.
41013010	Koyrottidi Mishiraachcho qaalay dere ubbas sabakettana bessees.
41013011	Inte oyketidi pirdas shiiqiza wode hinno he saateyin intes imettizaro haasayite attin biidi nu ay giinoo? giidi kaseti hirgofte. Haasayanay Xillo Ayanappe attin intena gidekketta.
41013012	“Ishay isha, aaway ba naa hayqos aaththi immana; nayti bana yelidayta bolla makalananne wodhana.
41013013	Ta geedon inte asa ubban ixettidayta gidana. Wurseth gakkanaas minni eqqidadey gidikko attana.
41013014	“Inte harassiza tunatethi izas bessontason eqqidashe beykko nababizadey woznan wotho; Yuhudan dizayti pude zuma bolla baqatetto.
41013015	Keeththa karen dizaddey so geloppo; ba miish kessana giidi keeththe geloppo.
41013016	Goshshason dizaddey ba may7o ekkanas guye simmofo.
41013017	He gallasatan shaara macasatassinne naa dhanthizaytas aayye-ana!
41013018	Hessika balgon gidonta mala Xoosse woossite.
41013019	Koyro Xoossi medhetetha wursi medhosoppe ha7i gakkanaas woykko hayssafe guye iza misatizay baynda gita metoy hanana.
41013020	Goday he gallassata qaanthontakko oonikka attenna shin baassi doorettidayta gish he gallassata qaanthides.
41013021	“He wode oonikka hekko Kirstoosi hayssan dees; giikko woykko hekko heen dees giikko ammanoppite.
41013022	Wordo Kirstoosatinne wordo nabeti buro dendidi malatatanne kase hani eronta pala miish ooththana. Istas dandayettikko haray atto shin doorettidaytakka baleththana.
41013023	Hessa gish naagettite; he wodey gakkonta dishin haara hayssa wursa ta intes yootadis.
41013024	“He wode he metozappe kaallidi awa arshey dhumana; aginaykka poo7usuku.
41013025	Xoolinteti saloppe qoqofettana, salon diza wolqamati qaaxana.
41013026	He wode Asa Nay gita wolqaranne bonchora salo shaarara yishin asay iza beyana.
41013027	Izikka kiitanchata yeddidi oyddu baggafe biitta gaxappe gaxa gakkanaas diza baas doorettidayta shiishana.
41013028	“Leemisoza balase mithafe tamarite. Unquloy cililiza wode haythi kessishin boney matidayssa inte ereeta.
41013029	Hessathoka hayti ta gidayti poletishin inte beykko wodey mati yiidi penge gakkidayssa erite.
41013030	Ta intes tumu gays; ha yo7oti polettana gakkanaas hayssi ha yelettay aadhdhenna.
41013031	Saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana shin ta qaalay gidikko aadhdhenna.
41013032	“Qasse he gallassay gish woykko he saatey gish ta Aawappe attin Salo Kiitanchata gidinka Naaza gidinka oonikka erenna.
41013033	Hessa gish wodey aydekkonne inte eronta gish nagettite, minnitenne woossite.
41013034	Hessika ba keeththe ashkaratas aggidi ashkarata issa issa ooso oythidi penge naagizayssi beggidi naagana mala azazidi bida asa misatees.
41013035	“Histikko keeththa aaway ayde yaanakkonne woykko qamma leela gidoth yaanakonne woykko koyro kuttoy baqishin yaanakkonne woykko wonta bolla bazzoy zo7ishin yaanakko inte eronta gish beggidi naagite.
41013036	Inte qopponta dishin izi yiidi inte dhiskidishin intena demmofo.
41013037	“Ta intes yootizayssa asa ubbas yootays; minnidi naagite! gays” gides.
41014001	Paaziganne uketha muussa ba7aale gallassay bonchetanas nam7u gallassi attishin Qeeseta halaqatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti Yesusa baleththi oykidi wodhana oge koyda.
41014002	Gido attin “Asay meto medhonta mala ba7aale gallasatan gidoppo” gida.
41014003	Izi Bitaaniya geetettiza soon issi inchiracha hargancha gidida Simoona soon quma bolla dishin waagay daro al7o gidida nardoose geetettiza shittoy kumi uttida albasxiroose bilqaaxe oykkida issi macasaya bilqaaxeza menthada shittoza Yesusa hu7e bolla gussadus.
41014004	Heen gadaan diza asatappe issi issi asati “Hayssi shittozi aazas wogay baynda gukkizee?” giidi ba giddon hanqettida.
41014005	“Shittozi bayzo bayzidakko heedzdzu xeetu dinareppe bollara bayzettidi manqotas imetteneshin” giidi macasayokka kadhida.
41014006	Gido attin Yesusi istas “Aggite! Hanno macasayo aazas waayssetii? Iza taas lo7o miish ooththadus.
41014007	Manqoti ay wodekka intenara deettes. Inte koyda wode aydekka ista maaddanaas dandayeta shin ta gidikko ubba wode intenara diikke.
41014008	Hanna ba ooththanas dandayizaari keena ooththadus. Taas moogos gidana mala ta asho kaseta tiyadus.
41014009	Ta intes tumu gays; hayssi Mishiraachcho qaalay alame kumeththan sabaketizason awanka iza ooththidayssi izo hassa7issizaz gididi hasayettana” gides.
41014010	Hessafe guye tammanne nam7atappe issoy Asqoroonto Yuhuday Yesusa aaththi immanas Qeeseta halaqatakko bides.
41014011	Istika hessa siydi ufayettida; izas miishe immanas izara giigida. Hessa gish Yesusa aaththi immanas inje wode naagishe gam7ides.
41014012	Paaziga dorsi shukettiza uketha muussa bonchiza koyro gallas Yesusa kaallizayti Yesusakko shiiqidi “Paaziga kawo maanaso awan giigisana mala koyay?” gi oychida.
41014013	Izikka bana kaallizaytappe nam7ata “Gede katama biite; inte bishin haaththe otora tookkida issadey intenara gaaggana.
41014014	Izi biidi gelizaso gakkanaas iza kaallite. Keeththadezas ‘Astamarey nena tana kaallizaytara Paaziga kawo maanas taas gidiza imatha shemposoy awayssee? gides’ giite.
41014015	Izikka bolla pooqe bolla diza giigi uttida aaho so intena bessana; heen izan giigissite” gi kiittides.
41014016	Iza kaallizaytikka kezidi gede katama bida. Wurikka Yesusi gida mala hani beettides; Paazigakka heen giigissida.
41014017	Gadey qammishin Yesusi bana kaalliza tammanne nam7atara gakkides.
41014018	Isti maaddan dishin “Ta intes tumu gays; inte giddofe issoy izikka tanara issife mizayssi tana aaththi immana” gides.
41014019	Istika muuzotidi “Taneshaa? Taneshaa?” giidi issoy issoy Yesusa oychida.
41014020	Izikka istas “Tammanne nam7atappe issoy tanara ba kushe keren yeddizade.
41014021	Kase xaafettida mala Asa Nay iza gish hayqqana shin asa naa aaththi immizades aayye-ana! Hessadey kase yeletonta aggidakko izas lo7okkoshin!” gides.
41014022	Isti mishin uketha ekki anjidinne menthidi bana kaallizaytas “Hayssa ta asho heyte” gi immides.
41014023	Ushshakka denthi galatidi istas immin isti wurikka uyida.
41014024	Qasse Yesusi “Hayssi darota gish gukkana ta ooratha caaqo suutha.
41014025	Ta intes tumu gays; ooratha woyneppe giigida ushsha Xoossa Kawoteththan ta uyana wode gakkanaas nam7antho hayssa uyikke” gides.
41014026	Hessafe guye mazamure issife yexidi pude Dabrazayte zuma bolla kezida.
41014027	Yesusi “ ‘Ta heemmizayssa shocana he wode iza dorsati laalettana’ geetetti xaafettidayssa mala inte wurikka tanan duphettana.
41014028	Ta dendidayssafe guye gidikko ta intefe kasetada Galila baana” gides.
41014029	Phexroosikka “Asay wuri dhuphetikkokka tani dhuphetikke!” gides.
41014030	Yesusikka “Ta nees tumu gays; hachchi qamma kuttoy nam7uto waassana gakkanaas neni tana heedzdzuto kadana” gides.
41014031	Phexroosi qas “Ta nenara hayqqizakkoka mulekka nena kadikke” giidi keehi minthi yootides. Hankoytikka wuri izayssatho gida.
41014032	Hessafe guye Getesemaane geetettizaso bida Yesusikka bana kaallizayta “Tani woossishin inte hayssan gam7ishshite” gides.
41014033	Phexroosa, Yaqoobenne Yohannisa banara ekki bides. Keehi qoppidessinne metottides.
41014034	Qasseka istas “Ta shempoya daro metottadus inte haan diishshite. Dhiskonta naagite” gides.
41014035	Ista achchafe guuth gede pooqidi biitta bolla gufannidi hanko he saateya izappe aadhdhana mala woossides.
41014036	“Ta Aawawu! Nees wuri dandayettes; hayssa waaye xu7a taappe haassa. Gidikkoka ne sheneppe attin ta sheney hanoppo” gides.
41014037	Izi heeppe simmi yishin iza kaallizayti dhisikkidayta beyides. Phexroosakka “Simoona dhiskadii? Haray atto shin issi saatekka minnada naagoy nena xoonidee?
41014038	Inte paacen gelonta mala beggidi woossitenne minnite. Ayanay giigeti uttides shin ashoy gidikko daburancha” gides.
41014039	Qasseka biidi koyroyssatho woossides.
41014040	Izi nam7antho simmi yishin ista ayfen dhiskoy deexxin dhiskidayta demmides shin isti izas ay zaaranakkonne eribetenna.
41014041	Heedzdzantho yiidi “Ha7ikka inte ichchidi shempetii? Ha7i gidana, saateyakka gakkadus; hekko Asa Nay nagaranchata kushen aadhdhi imettana.
41014042	Ane eqqite boos; tana aaththi immanaddey yides” gides.
41014043	Yesusi buro haasayan dishin tammanne nam7atappe issoy Yuhuday yides. Izara issife Qeese halaqatappenne Muse woga tamarsizaytappe kiitettida daro asay giththa mashshanne durqa oykidi yides.
41014044	Iza aaththi immana Yuhuday istas “Asa giddofe ta yeerizadey iza gidida gishas oykidi lo7ethi naagi efite” giidi kaseti malata immi woththides.
41014045	Gakkida mala Yuhuday Yesusakko shiiqidi “Astamare!” giidi yeerides.
41014046	Asatikka Yesusa oykkida.
41014047	Iza achchan eqqida issoy mashsha koohoppe shoddi Qeeseta halaqa ashkara hayth qanxides.
41014048	Yesusikka istas “Panga mala tana oykkana mashshanne durqa oykidi yeetii?
41014049	Wontin wontin Xoossa Keeththan tamarsashe ta intenara dishin oykibeekketa shin kase xaafetidayssi polettana mala hayssi hanides” gides.
41014050	Hessa wode iza kaallizayti wuri iza yeggi aggi bida.
41014051	Ba kalloteth qeeri naxalan kammida issi nay Yesusa kaallishin asay iza oykin,
41014052	Naazi naxala yeggidi kallo kichchides.
41014053	Yesusakka gede Qeeseta halaqakko efida. Qeeseta halaqati, dere cimatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti heen issife wuri shiiqida.
41014054	Phexroosikka Yesusa hahora kaallishe Qeeseta halaqa gibbe gakkanaas bides. Izi heen uttidi hara asatara tama ho7ishin,
41014055	Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimati wuri Yesusa wodhanas markattana as koyda shin demmanas dandayibeetenna.
41014056	Daroti iza bolla wordora markattikkokka markata qaalay oykketibenna.
41014057	Issi issi markati dendidi wordora,
41014058	“Hayssi addezi ‘Ta asa kushen keexettida Xoossa Keeththa laallada asa kushey bochontaz hara Xoossa Keeththa heedzdzu gallassara ta keexxana’ gishin nu siyidos” gi markattida.
41014059	Gido attin ista markatethi issi bolla wodhdhibenna.
41014060	Qeeseta halaqayka ista sinthan eqqidi “Hayti ne bolla markattizaysi aazee? Ne aazas duuna zaarikii?” giidi Yesusa oychides.
41014061	Gido attin Yesusi istas aykkokka zaaronta co7u gides. Qeeseta halaqay qasseka “Anjettida Xoossa Nay Kirstoosi nenee?” gi oychides.
41014062	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ee; tanakko! Asa Nay wolqama Xoossa ushachchan uttishininne salo shaarara yishin inte iza beyana” gides.
41014063	Qeeseta halaqay ba may7o daakkidi “Nuus hara aaza marka koshshizee?
41014064	Izi cashsha qaala Xoossa bolla hasayshin inte siyideta; ha7ich intes ay misatizee?” gides. Istika “Izas hayqoy bessees” giidi wurikka issi qaalan pirdida.
41014065	Hessa wode issi issi asati iza bolla cuch cuttida; iza ayfe goozi oykidi iccishe “Ane tinbite yoota” gida. Baggayti qasse shagalan baqqishe efida.
41014066	Phexroosi duge baggara heen gibbe giddon dishin Qeeseta halaqa garadetappe issiniya yadus.
41014067	Phexroosi tama ho7ishin tishshi hista xeellada “Neni Naazirete Yesusara daassa gidikkii?” gadus.
41014068	Izi qas “Ne gizayssade ta erikke; ne gizyssi taas gelenna” giidi kadides. Hessafe gede penge pooqi eqqi dishin heerakka kuttoy waassides.
41014069	He garadeya iza beyida mala heen eqqida asatas “Hayssi addezi izara diza asatappe issadekko!” gaada qasseka haasayadus.
41014070	Izi qasseka kadides. Guutha wode gam7ishin heen eqqida asati Phexroosa “Neni Galila asa, hessa gish tumappe ne istafe issade” gida.
41014071	Gido attin izi qas “Inte gizadde ta erikke!” gishe caaqonne bana qangeth oykkides.
41014072	Heerakka kuttoy nam7antho waassides. Phexroosikka “Kuttoy nam7a waassanas ne tana heedzdza kadana” gida Yesusa qaalay izas qofetin hiqqimidi yeekkides.
41015001	Maalado wontara Qeeseta halaqati, dere cimatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti kumeththa shango alafetara issife zoretidi Yesusa qachi ekki efidi Philaxoosas aaththi immida.
41015002	Philaxoosikka Yesusa “Ne Ayhudata kawoo?” gi oychides. Yesusikka “Ee, ne gida mala” giidi izas zaarides.
41015003	Qeeseta halaqatikka daro yo7o iza bolla shiishshi mootida.
41015004	Philaxoosi qas “Ne aazas oysha zaarikii? Hekko nena daro yo7on mootetes” giidi qasseka oychides.
41015005	Gido attin Yesusi ha7ikka izas aykkokka zaaro immonta gish Philaxoosikka malalettides.
41015006	Paaziga ba7aale gallas Philaxoosi derey birshana mala oychidade birshi yeddiza wogay kase dees.
41015007	Iita ooson dere bolla dendidi shempo wodhida asatara issife qashettida Barbaane geetettiza issadey dees.
41015008	Dereyka yiidi kase lose gididayssa izi ooththana mala Philaxoosa woossides.
41015009	Philaxoosikka istas “Ta intes Ayhuda kawo birshana mala koyetii?” gi oychides.
41015010	Philaxoosi hessatho oychiday kase Qeeseta halaqati Yesusa qanaten aaththi immidayssa eriza gishassa.
41015011	Qeeseta halaqati qas “Iza exa Barbaaney birshetto!” gi oychana mala dereza dentheththida.
41015012	Philaxoosi “Histikko inte Ayhuda kawo giza addeza wostana mala koyeti” gides.
41015013	Isti qasseka “Kaqqa! Kaqqa!” gi waassida.
41015014	Philaxoosikka “Ay iita ooththidee?” gi ista oychides. Isti qas “Kaqqa! kaqqa!” giidi kaseppe aaththi waassida.
41015015	Philaxoosikka dereza ufayssana giidi Barbaane istas birshides. Yesusa garafidi kaqqanas aaththi immides.
41015016	Wotadarati Yesusa dere haarizayssa gibbe ekki biidi attida wotadarata wursi shiishida.
41015017	Yesusa zo7o may7o mayzida; aguntha aklile xaaxidi iza hu7en woththida.
41015018	Hessafekka “Ayhuda kawo saroy nees gido!” gishe iza sarothida.
41015019	Iza hu7e guufera shocida; iza bollakka cuttida gulbatidi izas goynnida.
41015020	Iza bolla qidhi ka7idappe guye kase mayzida zo7o may7oza qari ekkidi kase iza may7oza zaari mayzidi kaqqanaso eki bida.
41015021	Alakisandrosanne Ruufoosa aawa Simoona geetettiza issi Qareena dere asi dereppe katama yizayssa Yesusa masqale wolqara oykki toossida.
41015022	Hessafe guye Yesusa Golgota geetettizaso efida; izas birsheththay “Asa hu7e guuge” guussa.
41015023	Karbe geetettiza camora walaketida woyne cajje uyana mala izas immin izi ekkonta ixxides.
41015024	Hessafe guye iza kaqqida, iza may7o issade issade awayssi gakkanakkonne giidi saama yeggidi gishettida.
41015025	Isti iza kaqishin wontafe heedzdzu saate gidides.
41015026	Isti masqale bolla xaafi shiishida mooto qaalay “Ayhuda kawo” giza qaala.
41015027	Izara issife nam7u pangata issa izappe ushachara issa hadirsara kaqqida.
41015028	Hessanka kase maxaafay “Iitatara issife taybettides” gida tinbite qaalay polettides.
41015029	Ogera aadhdhi bizaytikka ba hu7e qaathishe “Oy! Oy! Xoossa Keeththa laallada heedzdzu gallassan keexxanay nenee?” giidi iita cashshe cayishe;
41015030	“Ane ha7i masqale bollafe wodhdhada nena ashsha” gida.
41015031	Hessathoka Qeeseta halaqatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti ba giddon issoy issas “Harata ashshides shin bana ashshana dandaybenna” giidi iza qidhida.
41015032	“Nu iza beyidi ammanana mala ane hayssi Kirstoosi Isra7eeleta kawoy ha7i masqaleppe wodhdho” gida. Izara kaqettidaytikka iza bolla cashshe korida.
41015033	Usuppun saateppe oykkidi uddufun saate gakkanaas biittay wuri dhumides.
41015034	Uddufun saate bolla Yesusi “Eelohe! Eelohe! Lama sabaqitane” giidi qaala dhoqu histidi waassides. Hessas birsheththay “Ta Xoosso! Ta Xoosso! Ne tana aazas aggadii?” guussa.
41015035	Heen gadaan eqqida asappe issi issi asati hessa siydi “Elaasa xeeygesko” gida.
41015036	Hessafe issi asi eleli biidi caalida woyne cajje isponje mala miishan gelthi kessidi mitha xeeran oythidi uyana mala Yesusas shiishshides. Hessafe qasse “Ane aggagite; Elaassi yiidi iza kaqqoppe woththishin nu beyana” gides.
41015037	Hessafe Yesusi qaala dhoqu histi waassidi shempo kezides.
41015038	Xoossa Keeththe magalashay hu7era duge nam7u kezi daakkettides.
41015039	Yesusa ginara eqqida issi mato halaqay Yesusi hessatho gita qaalara waassidi shempo kezishin beyidi “Hayssadey tumu Xoossa naakkoshin” gides.
41015040	Hessa wode macasati hanizayssa hahon diidi xeellida. Ista giddofe Magdaleppe yida Maaramanne kaalotiza Yaqoobenne Yoosa aayo Maaramira qasseka Saloomira issife deettes.
41015041	Heyti macasati Galilan Yesusa kaallishenne izas ooththishe gam7idayta. Istarakka issife hara daro macasati Yerusalame bida.
41015042	Gadey qammi qammi bishin Sambatas giigettiza gallassi gakkides.
41015043	Dere cimata giddon bonchettida issi Armatiyasa dere as Yoosefe geetettizayssi Xoossa Kawoteth naagishe dizaddey babbonta Philaxoosakko biidi Yesusa aha woossides.
41015044	Philaxoosikka izi hinni wode ellera hayqqidayssa siydi malalettides. Mato halaqa xeygisdi “Izi hayqqi gam7idee?” giidi oychides.
41015045	Izi hayqqidayssa mato halaqay geeshshi eridappe guye Yesusa aha Yoosefes immides.
41015046	Yoosefekka moogo may7o shamidi aha masqaleppe woththidi moogo may7on xaaxidi shuchchafe woocetida duufon moogides. Duufa duuna shuchchara gordides.
41015047	Magdaleppe yida Maaramiranne Yoosefe aayo Maaramira Yesusa aha awan moogidakkone beyida.
41016001	Sambatay aadhdhidappe guye Magdale Maarama, Yaqoobe aayo Maaramiranne Saloomira issife biidi Yesusa aha tiyanas shitto shammida.
41016002	Saamintafe koyro gallas maalado wontara buro awa arshey kezida mala Yesusa duufokko buro bishin,
41016003	“Duufoza duunappe shuchcha nuus ooni gendersanee?” giidi ba giddon haasayettida.
41016004	Isti dhoqu gi xeellishin daro gita shuchchay duufoza duunappe genderidayssa beyida.
41016005	Gede duufoza giddo gelida mala issi bootha may7o may7ida paanthi ushachcha baggara uttidayssa beyidi dagammida.
41016006	Izi qas istas “Dagammofte! Inte kaqettida Naazirete Yesusa koyeeta; izi dendides haan deenna, isti iza woththidaso hayssa beyte.
41016007	Gido attin inte biidi iza kaallizaytassinne Phexroosas kase intes yootida mala intefe kasetidi izi Galila baana. Inte iza heen demmana giidi istas yootite” gides.
41016008	Macasatikka malalettishenne kokkorshe duufappe kezi baqattida. Babbida gish oonaska aykkokka qaattibetenna.
41016009	Saamintafe koyro gallas Wogga wonta maaladora izi hayqoppe dendidappe guye Yesusi izippe laapun daydanthi kessida Magdale Maaramis koyro beettides.
41016010	Izakka baada kase izara dizayti kayotishenne yeekkishe dishin demmada yootadus.
41016011	Isti Yesusi paxa dizayssanne iza ta Yesusa beyadis gidayssa siydi ammanbeetenna.
41016012	Hessafe guye iza kaallizaytappe nam7ati gede dere gars bishin Yesusi istas hara as misati beettides.
41016013	Istika simmidi hessa iza kaallizaytappe attidaytas yootida. Gido attin iza kaallizayti siydi ammanbeetenna.
41016014	Hessafe guye tammanne issineti maadda bolla dishin Yesusi istas qoncides. Izi hayqoppe dendin iza beyida asati istas yootin siydi ammanonta aggida gish istas ammanoy bayndayssanne ista wozna muumetetha gish ista borides.
41016015	Istasika “Alame ubbaso biite, Mishiraachcho qaala medhetetha ubbas sabakite.
41016016	Ammandaynne xammaqettiday attana. Ammanontay gidikko pirdettana.
41016017	Tana ammanizayta hayti malatati kaallana. Isti ta sunthan daydanthata kessana, ooratha qaalanka haasayana.
41016018	Isti shooshata ba kushera oykkana; wodhiza marze uyikkokka ista qohenna. Ba kushe harganchata bolla woththi woossikko harganchati paxana” gides.
41016019	Goda Yesusi hessa yootidappe guye pude salo dendi biidi Xoossa ushachan uttides.
41016020	Iza kaallizayti hessafe kezidi ubbason aadhdhi aadhdhi sabakida. Godayka istara ooththides. Ista timirteza ekkidi ooththizaytas ba yootida qaalakka malata ooththi ooththi minthides.
42001001	Boncho Tofilosa nu achchan hanida yo7ota gish daro asati baassi hanida mala xaafida.
42001002	He taarikezikka koyroppe denthidi ba ayfera beyida markatinne Xoossa qaala yootidayti nuus aaththidayssa.
42001003	Takka ta baggara xaphoppe denthada keeha naagetadanne paaca xeellada taarikeza wursa sinthe xaafetanas bessizayssa sinthasada kaallidi xaafetanas bessizayssa kaalethada naagetada nees xaafana mala taas lo7o gidi beettides.
42001004	Hayssa wursisa ta ooththizay ne tamaridayssi tuma gididayssa nena ero guussassa.
42001005	Herdoossi Yuhuda biittan kawotida wode Aabiya geetettiza Qeeseta halaqa baggafe Qeesetetha ooso taray iza gakkida Zakaraasa geetettiza issi Qeesey dees. Iza macheyakka Elisabeexo geetetawus, izakka Aarone bagga asa. Nam7atikka Goda azazonne iza woga wosoy baynda naagidi dizaytanne Xoossa sinthan xillo asa.
42001007	Gido attin Elisabeexa naa yelonta makkara gidida gish istas nay baawa; nam7atikka wodey sugetida asa.
42001008	Zakaraassi Xoossa sinthan Qeesetetha ooso taray iza gakkin izi ooththishin
42001009	Qeesetas diza woga mala Xoossa Keeththan gelidi exane cuwassana mala exay iza gakkides.
42001010	Exaney cuwattishin asay wurikka karen diidi woosses.
42001011	Goda kiitanchay exaney cuwattiza soppe ushachcha baggara eqqidi Zakaraasas beettides.
42001012	Zakaraasikka iza beyidi keehi daggammidi babbides.
42001013	Kiitanchay Zakaraasas “Babbofa! Ne woossay seetettides, ne macheya Elisabeexa nees attuma naa yelana iza sunthaka ne Yohannisa gaada sunthana.
42001014	Iza yelettan neni daro ufayettana; Daro asaykka ufayettana.
42001015	Goda sinthan izi gita gidana. Woyneppe oosettida cajje gidinka hara mathosiza ushsha gidinka izi uyenna; izi buro ba aayey qanthan dishe Xillo Ayanan kumana.
42001016	Isra7eele asappe darota ista Xoossako zaarana.
42001017	Aawata wozna ista naytaakko, azazetontaytikka gede Xillota cincateththakko zaarana malanne Godas bessiza dere giigissana mala Elaasa Ayananne iza wolqan Godappe sinthara izi baana” gides.
42001018	Zakaraassi kiitanchas, “Tani cima; ta macheyakka cimmadus; tani hayssa aazan eranee?” giidi oychides.
42001019	Kiitanchaykka zaaridi “Tani Xoossa sinthan eqqiza Gabrelle. Tanikka ha Mishiraachchoza nees gaththanas kiitetada yadis.
42001020	Hekko neni ba woden polettana ta qaala ammanonta ixida gish ne duunay duudana, nenikka haasayana dandayakka” gides.
42001021	He wode derey Zakaraassi “Xoossa Keeththafe kezonta aazas gam7idakko” giidi modhetishe naagides.
42001022	Izi Xoossa Keeththafe kezidi asa haasayissanas dandaybenna. Malati malati besoppe attin haasayanas dandayonta aggin asay izi Xoossa Keeththan Xoossafe ooratha miish beyidayssa erides.
42001023	Zakaraasikka ba ooso taray poletidappe guyen baso simmides.
42001024	Hessafe kaallin iza macheya Elisabeexa naa qanthatadus, ichashantho aginay gakkanaas asi bana beyonta mala qotetadus.
42001025	Izakka Goday ba maarotan ta leqettidayssa asa giddofe digganas ha wodezan hayssa taas ooththides gadus.
42001026	Elsabeexa qanthatida usuppuntha aginan, Xoossi ba kiitancha Gabrelle, Galila biittan diza, Naazirete giza katama yeddides.
42001027	Izikka kawo Dawute zereth gidida Yoosefe geetettiza asas giiga uttida Maaramo geetettiza geela7oykko kiitettides.
42001028	Yiidinne iza dizaaso gelidi “Hanne Xoossi nena anjidare saro Xoossi Goday nenara dees nenka anjettidaaro” gides.
42001029	Maarama kiitancha haasayan keeha daggammada, “Hayssi ay giza sarotaa?” gaada yo7oza keeha qoppadus.
42001030	Kiitanchaykka Maaramo “Xoossi nenan ufayetiza gish babbofa!
42001031	Neni qanthatana; attuma naaka yelana, sunthaka Yesusa gaada sunthana;
42001032	Izikka gita gidana; ubbafe bolla Xoossa naa geetettana, Goda Xoossi iza aawa Dawute kawoteththa izas immana.
42001033	Izi Isra7eele nayta bollan mernas kawotana; iza Kawotethasikka wursethi deenna” gides.
42001034	Maaramakka kiitanchas “Tani adde gelabeekke, shin hayssi waani hananee?” gaada oychadus.
42001035	Kiitanchaykka Maaramisi “Xillo Ayanay ne bolla wodhana wursofe bolla Xoossa wolqay ne bolla kuwasana; Hessa gish yelettana naazi Geeshsha Xoossa naa geetettana.
42001036	Asi yeluku iza makkara giidi haasayiza ne dabboya Elisabeexa cimateththan attuma naa qanthatada yelanas usuppuntho agina oykkadus.
42001037	Xoossassi hanonta miishi baawa”
42001038	Maaramakka zaarada “Hekko tani Xoossa aylle diikkina; ne gida mala taas hano” giin kiitanchay izippe shaakatidi bides. Maarama Elisabeexo beyana badus.
42001039	Maaramakka he wode matara eesota dendada pude gezze deren diza issi Yuhuda katama badus.
42001040	Zakaraasa keeththe gelada Elisabeexo sarotadus.
42001041	Elisabeexa Maarami sarotha siyida mala qanthan diza naazi izi qanthan guppides, Elisabeexinka Xillo Ayanay kumides.
42001042	Izakka ba qaala dhoqu ooththada “Macasa ubbafe ne anjettidaaro; Ne qanthan diza naazikka anjettidayssa.
42001043	Ta Goda aaya taakko yaada tana oychanas tani oonee?
42001044	Ne saroka qaala ta siyida mala ta ulo giddon diza nay ufayssa guppides.
42001045	Polettana giidi Goday izis yootidayssa ammanidara iza anjettidaro” gadus
42001046	Maaramakka “Izi ba aylle kawushshatetha xeellida gish ta shempiya Goda dhoqu ooththada bonchawus. Ta Ayanaykka tana ashshiza ta Xoossan ufayetawus. Wolqama Goday taas gita miishe ooththida gish hachchife sinthan asi wuri tana anjettidaro gaana. Iza sunthaykka geeshsha.
42001050	Iza maaroy izas babbizaytas naa naa gakkanaas daana.
42001051	Ba wolqan daro mino ooso ooththides; ba wozna qofan otoretizayta laallides.
42001052	Kawota kawoteththafe woththides, ashketa qasse dhoqu dhoqu histides.
42001053	Gafidayta lo7o miishan kalthides; dureta gidikko mela kushe yeddides.
42001054	Kase nu aawatas Abrahaamessinne iza qommotas gida qaala naaganas ba maaretetha yuushi qoppidi ba aylle Isra7eele maaddides” gadus.
42001056	Maaramakka Elisabeexi achchan heedzdzu agina sire gam7ada baso simmadus.
42001057	Elisabeexis yelo gallassay gakkin attuma naa yeladus.
42001058	Izi gutatinne dabbottikka Goday izis gita maaretetha ooththidayssa siydi izira issife ufayetida.
42001059	Yeletida ospuntha gallas qaxxaras yida. Iza aawa sunthan Zakaraasa giidi sunthana koyda.
42001060	Gido attin aaya “Hanenna, iza sunthi Yohannisa geetetto” gadus.
42001061	Istika izis “Ne dabbotappe Yohannisa geetettidi xeeygetida asi oonikka baawa” gida.
42001062	Aaway Zakaraassi “Naaza oona giidi sunthana koyidakkonne” malatan oychida.
42001063	Zakaraaska xaafiza miishe izas immana mala oychi ekkidi sunthay “Yohannisa” giidi xaafin asay wurikka malalettides.
42001064	Heerakka Zakaraasa duunay pogetidi inxarsi birshettin Xoossa galata oykkides.
42001065	Iza gutati wuri daro babbida. Hayssi wurikka dhoqa gezze biittan Yuhuda deren, ubbason haasayettides.
42001066	Hayssaka siyida asi wurikka “Ha guutha nay ay hananeshshaa?” giidi hanoza wursikka ba woznan oykkides. Goda kushey tumappe izara issife dees.
42001067	Naaza aaway, Zakaraassi Xillo Ayanan kumidi tinbite haasayishe
42001068	“Yiidi ba asa ashshida gish Isra7eele Xoossi galattetto.
42001069	Beni wode ba geeshsha nabeta duunan haasayettidayssa mala ba aylle Dawute keeththan ashshiza wolqa nuus denthides.
42001071	Izi nuna nu morketappenne, nuna ixizayta kusheppe ashshees.
42001072	Hayssa izi ooththiday nu aawatas ba maaretetha bessanassa, ba geeshsha caaqqoza yuushi qoppanassa.
42001073	Kase nu aawa Abrahaames caaqidayssa qoppana malanne nu morketa kusheppe izi nuna kessin nuni izas babboy baynda ooththanassinne nu diza wode ubban ba sinthan nuna geeshshatethanne xillotethan essanassa.
42001076	Goda oge giigissanas ne izappe sinthara biza gish ta naazo neni woga Xoossa nabe geetettana.
42001077	Asay ba nagarappe maarettida gish deres atotetha erateth ne immana mala
42001078	nu Xoossa lo7o maaretethafe dendidayssan Saloppe nuus away kezides.
42001079	Hessika dhuman dizaytassinne hayqo kuwa giddon dizaytasikka poo7isana malanne nu tohotakka sarotetha oge kaalethanassa” gides.
42001080	Guutha naazikka diccides; Ayananikka minnides. Isra7eele asas qoncen beettana gakkanaas bazzo biittan de7ides.
42002001	He wode biitta bollan diza asi wurikka tayibettidi xaafettana mala Oroome kawo Awuggisxossappe awajjay kezides.
42002002	Hessika Qerenewoosa geetettizayssi Sooriya geetettiza dere haariza wode hanida koyro dere taybo.
42002003	Hessa gish asi wuri xaafettanas ba dere dere bides.
42002004	Yoosefeykka asho dabboteththan Dawute baggafe gidida gish Galila awurajja giddon diza Naazirete katamappe Yuhuda awurajja Beeteleme geetettiza Dawute katamappe yides.
42002005	Izi xaafettana bishin izas giigetta dashe yelana matida Maaramira bides.
42002006	Istika heen dishin izis yelo wodey gakkides.
42002007	Izakka koyro attuma naa yelidayssafe guye imaththi aqiza keeththan aqizasoy baynda gish naaza carqara xaaxada miiza sinthan ishissadus.
42002008	Beetaleme achchan dorsa heemiza asati dorsa naagishe qammara karen aqizayti deettes.
42002009	Goda kiitanchaykka istako yides; Goda boncho poo7oykka ista lanqen yuuyi aadhdhanas poo7ides. Istika keehi dagammida gish,
42002010	Kiitanchay ista “Babofte! Tani asa ubbas gidiza gita ufayssa mishiraachcho ekka yadis.
42002011	Hach kawo Dawute katama Beetalemen shempo dhaley yelettides. Izikka Goda Kirstoosa geetettes.
42002012	Carqara xaaxeti ichchida gacino naa demmandeta hessika intes malata gido” gides.
42002013	Izarakka hara daro salo kiitanchati beettida. Xoossa galatishe,
42002014	“Bolla salon Xoossas bonchoy gido sarotethika biitta bollan izi dosiza asa ubbas gido” gida.
42002015	Kiitanchati istafe shaaketidi salo simmin dorse heemizayti ba giddon issoy issa “Ane ha yiite Goday nuus qoncisidayssanne hanidayssa Beeteleme katama biidi beyoos” gida.
42002016	Istika elelli biidi Maaramira, Yooseferanne miiza sinthan ichchida naaza demmida.
42002017	Beydayssafe guyen Goda kiitanchay naaza gish istas yootidayssa wursi zaari yootida.
42002018	Heemizayti yootidayssa siyida asay wuri keehi malalettides.
42002019	Gido attin Maarama yo7oza wursa ba woznan wotha dentha qoppashe gam7adus.
42002020	Heemizaytikka handays wurikka kiitanchay istas yootida mala gididi beettida gish siydayssassinne beyidayssas ubbas Xoossa galatishenne bonchishe simmida.
42002021	Naazi yeletin ospuntha gallassan qaxxarettiza wodey gakkin aayeya iza qanthatanappe kase kiitanchay gida mala Yesusa geetettidi summides.
42002022	Muse woga mala isti geeyiza wodey wurin Yoosefeynne Maarama guutha naa Yesusa Goda Xoossa sinthe shiishshanaas ekkidi Yerusalame kezida. Hessika Goda wogan koyro yeletiza attuma nay wuri Godas dumma gidana geetettidi xaafettidayssa polanassinne
42002024	qasseka Goda wogan nam7u haraphphe kafotanne woykko nam7u haraphphe kafo ciyeta geetettiddayssa mala yarsho shiishshanaassa.
42002025	He wode Yerusalame kataman xillonne Xoossa babbiza issi Simoona geetettiza asi dees; izikka Isra7eele nayta atotetha naagiza asanne Xillo Ayanay iza bolla shempida asa.
42002026	Qasseka Kirstoosa beyonta dishe hayqqonta mala Xillo Ayanay izas qoncides.
42002027	Izikka he wode Xillo Ayanay kaalethin Xoossa Keeththe lasha gaath gelides. Naaza aayeyiranne aawara Muse wogan bessizayssa polanas guutha naa Yesusa ekkidi gelida wode,
42002028	Simooni naaza ekki idimmidi Xoossa galatishe,
42002029	“Godo! Ne caaqida qaala mala ha7i tani ne aylley ne ashshizayssa ta ayfera beyida gish hi7a tana saron ekka; asa ubba sinthan ne giigissida atotetha ha7i tani ta ayfera beyadis.
42002032	Hayssika ubba deres geemmettidayssa qoncisiza poo7o, ne dere Isra7eelesikka boncho” gides.
42002033	Iza aawaynne aaya iza gish haasayettida yo7ozan malalettida.
42002034	Simoonikka ista anjides; Maaramokka “Daro asa wozna qofay qoncana mala hayssi Isra7eelen diza darotas dhayossinne atotethassa; Iza ixizaytas qasse malata gidana mala doorettides.
42002035	Qasseka darota wozna qofay qoncana mala naaza mishay qara mashsha mala ne wozna phalqana” gides.
42002036	Qasseka Aasseere baggafe Fanu7eele naa Haana geetettiza cimmida nabey dawus; izakka ba koyro azinara laapun layth kumeth de7adus.
42002037	Laythay izis osupun tammanne oyddu layth gidana gakkanaas qammanne gallas xoomashenne woossashe Xoossa Keeththafe shaaketonta am7etethan gam7adus.
42002038	He wodekka shiiqada Xoossa galatadus. Yerusalame wozeteth naagishe dizaytas ubbas guutha naaza gish yootadus.
42002039	Yooseferanne Maaramira Goda wogan azazettidayssa polidi Galila awurajjan diza baso Naazirete katama simmida.
42002040	Guutha naazikka diccidi minni minni bides; aadhdho eratethan kumides; Xoossa aadhdho kiyatethayka iza bolla dees.
42002041	Iza aawaynne aaya laythan laythan Paaziga bonchanas Yerusalame beettes.
42002042	Naazas laythay tammanne nam7u layth kumida wode kase lose gididayssa mala Paaziga bonchana kezida.
42002043	Paaziga ba7aaleza bonchidi baso simmishin Yesusi Yerusalamen attides. Yelidaytikka izi attiddayssa eribeyttenna.
42002044	Banara issife biza oge asara dees gishe issi gallassa oge bida. Gido attin izi istara bayndayssa eridi ba dabbota achchaninne laggeta achchan dizaakkonne giidi koyda.
42002045	Koyi koydi beettonta ixin Yerusalame simmida.
42002046	Heedzdzu gallassafe guye Xoossa Keeththan tamarsizayta giddon uttidi siyishe, asata oychishenne ista oysha zaarishe Xoossa Keeththan dishin demmida.
42002047	Siyidayti wuri Yesusa akeekkaninne iza zaarozan daro malalettida.
42002048	Yoosefeynne Maarama iza beyida wode malalettida. Maaramakka “Ta naazo ays hayssa mala ooththadii? Ne aawaynne taninne nena koyishe keehi metottettidos” gadus.
42002049	Izikka zaaridi “Tana ays koyidetii? Tani ta aawa keeththan daanas bessizayssa eribeekketi gides.
42002050	Gido attin istas izi yootidayssi gelibenna.
42002051	Heeppe simmin istara issife Naazirete wodhdhidi istas azazettishe de7ides. Iza aaya Maaramakka he hanida miisha wursa ba woznan naagashe gam7adus.
42002052	Yesusi aadhdho eratethan, geesaninne saban Xoossa sinthaninne asa sinthan diccides.
42003001	Xibiraadoose geetettizays Qeesarey kawotida tammanne ichashantho laythan Phanxoosa Philaxoosa gizayssi Yuhuda biitta haariza wode, Herdoossi Galila biitta haariza wode, iza ishay Piliphoosi, Ixuriyaasanne Xirakondoose biitta haariza wode, Lisanoosikka Abloone biitta haariza wode,
42003002	Haanaynne Qayaafay Qeeseta halaqa gidida wode Xoossa qaalay bazzo biittan diza Zakaraasa naa Yohannisakko yides.
42003003	Yohannisi Yordanoose shaafa achchan diza dereta “Inte nagara atto gaanas nagarappe simmidi xammaqetite” giidi yootides
42003004	Hessika qasse nabe Isayaassi “Bazzon hizgidi waassiza asa kooshinchi ‘Godas oge giigissite baasidikka lo7ethite.
42003005	Shoobba biittay wuri kumana; zumatinne zumbullati wuri ziqqi gaana; geella ogey sitti gaana; moorettida ogey lo7o gidana.
42003006	Asa zereth ubba ashshiza Xoossa wolqa beyana’ giidi bazzon waassiza asa qaala giiris” giidi ba maxaafan xaafida mala.
42003007	Yohannisikka iza kushen xammaqettana yiza asas “Inteno ha shoosha nayto! Yaana diza Xoossa hanqofe haakkana mala ooni intena zoridee?
42003008	Inte nagara oosoppe simmidayssa erisiza ooso ooththite ‘Nu aaway Abrahaamey nuus dees’ guus aggite gides. ‘Xoossi baas giikko ha shuchchatappe Abrahaames naa ooththi denthanas danda7izayssa erite’
42003009	Kaltay mith qanxanas mitha xaphon dees. Lo7o ayfe ayfonta iita mithi wuri qanxettidi taman yeggettana” gides.
42003010	Asaykka “Histin ay ooththonii?” giidi oychides.
42003011	Yohannisikka asas “Nam7u may7oy dizay issi may7oy baynda asas immo; qasseka qumay dizayka bayndades shaakkidi immo” gides.
42003012	Qaraxa shiishshizaytikka xammaqetanas yiidi “Astamaare! Nu ay ooththinoo?” gida.
42003013	Izikka “Inte azazettidayssafe bollara qaraxa shiishoppite” gides.
42003014	Wotadaratikka “Nuni qasse ay ooththinoo?” giidi oychida. Izikka “Oona miishekka gidin wolqan ekkofte; qasseka oonanne wordon mootoppite; inte damozay intes gidana” gides.
42003015	Asay Yohannisa beyidi “Hayssi Kirstoosee?” giidi ba woznan sidhides.
42003016	Yohannisikka ubbas “Tani intena haaththan xammaqays; gido attin ta iza caamma birshanas bessonta taappe aadhdhizaddey yaana. Izi intena Xillo Ayananinne taman xammaqana.
42003017	Balezan diza kathaa gafezappe geeshshaas kath suragiza pithay iza kushen dees. Baleza kumeththa geeshshana; gisteza qasse di7en qolana; gafezakka to7onta taman xuugana” gides.
42003018	Yohannisi asa hara dumma dumma zore qaalara minithethi zorishe Mishiraachcho qaala yootides.
42003019	Gido attin Galila biitta haariza Herdoossi ba isha macho Herodiyado ekkida gishshinne hara daro iita ooththida gish Yohannisi iza hanqida gish,
42003020	kase mooro bolla hara gujjidi Herdoossi Yohannisa qasho keeththan yeggides.
42003021	Asay xammaqettidappe guye Yesusikka xammaqettides; izi woossishin saloy doyettides.
42003022	Xillo Ayanaykka haraphe misatidi iza bolla wodhdhides. “Saloppe ta dosiza nay nena; Nenan tani ufayettays” giza qaalay yides.
42003023	Yesusi Xoossa ooso oykkishin laythay izas heedzdzu tammu laytha mala gidana. Asaykka izi Yoosefe naa, Eelle naa,
42003024	Maate naa, Lewe naa, Milka naa, Yuhuda naa, Yoosefe naa,
42003025	Matotiyo naa, Amoxe naa, Naahoome naa, Isilime naa, Naage naa,
42003026	Maate naa, Matotiyo naa, Semeye naa, Yoosefe naa, Yuhuda naa,
42003027	Yoonane naa, Reese naa, Zerubaabele naa, Selatiyaale naa, Neere naa,
42003028	Milka naa, Hade naa, Yoosa naa, Qoosaame naa, Elimodaame naa, Eera naa,
42003029	Iyaaso naa, Eli7azaare naa, Yoorame naa, Maate naa, Eele naa,
42003030	Simoona naa, Yuhuda naa, Yoosefe naa, Yoona naa, Eliyaqeeme naa,
42003031	Meeliya naa, Maynaane naa, Maxaate naa, Naatane naa, Dawute naa,
42003032	Iseeye naa, Iyoobeede naa, Bo7eeze naa, Solomoone naa, Naasoone naa,
42003033	Amnadaabe naa, Aarame naa, Aarone naa, Esroome naa, Faareese naa, Yuhuda naa,
42003034	Yaqoobe naa, Yisaaqa naa, Abrahaame naa, Taara naa, Naakoore naa,
42003035	Seerohe naa, Raaguwe naa, Faaleqe naa, Abeere naa, Saala naa,
42003036	Qayineme naa, Aarfakiside naa, Seeme naa, Nohe naa, Laamehe naa,
42003037	Matusaala naa, Henooke naa, Yaareede naa, Malali7eele naa, Qayiname naa,
42003038	Henoose naa Seete naa Addame naa, Xoossa naa, misatides.
42004001	Yesusi Xillo Ayanan kumidi Yordanoose shaafappe simmida mala Xillo Ayanay iza kaaleththidi bazzo biitta efides.
42004002	Heenka Xala7en oyddu tammu gallas paacettides. He paacettiza gallassatan aykkokka moonta gish wursethan gafides.
42004003	Xala7eykka Yesusa “Ne Xoossa naa gidikko ane hayssa shuchcha kath gidana mala azaza” gides.
42004004	Yesusikka zaaridi “Asi kaththan xalla deenna geetettidi xaafettides” giidi Xala7es zaarides.
42004005	Hessafe kaallidi Xala7ey Yesusa issi dhoqa zuma bolla kessidi salo gufanthon diza kawotetha qiphida ayfey xeellanas bessidinne,
42004006	“Hayssi ne beyiza biitta kawota godateththaynne bonchoy wurikka taas imettides; takka ta dosizaddes immanas dandayiza gish neeska immana.
42004007	“Hessa gish neni kundada taas goynnikko hayssi wurikka nees gidana” gides.
42004008	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ne Goda Xoossas kundada izas xalla goynna geetettidi xaafettides” gides.
42004009	Hessafekka Yesusa Yerusalamen Xoossa Keeththa xeera kessi essidi Xoossa Maxaafan “Nena naagana mala Xoossi ne gish ba kiitancha azazana; ‘Ne tohoy shuchchan dhuphetonta mala kiitanchati ba kushera nena dhoqu histi oykkana’ geetettidi xaafettida gish ane ne Xoossa Naa gidikko hayssafe duge kunda” gides.
42004012	Yesusikka “Ne Goda Xoossa paacofa” geetettides giidi zaarides.
42004013	Xala7eykka ba paacanayssa wursidappe guyen hara baas inje wodey bettanashshe Yesusappe shaakettides.
42004014	Yesusikka Xillo Ayana wolqan Galila simmides. Iza goobateththay Galila achchan diza deretan siyettides.
42004015	Izikka Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan tamarsishin iza timirtey lo7in asay wurikka iza galattides.
42004016	Heeppe ba yelettida katama Naazirete yiidi kase Sambata gallas Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe geliza mala gelidi Xoossa Maxaafa nababanas dendi eqqides.
42004017	Nabe Isayaasa Maxaafay izas imettin maxaafa doyida mala.
42004018	“Goda Ayanay ta bolla dees; manqotas Mishiraachcho qaala yootana mala tana tiyides; qashetidaytas birsheteth, qooqeti xeellana oge ta awajjana mala, metotettidayta aashshana mala, q2 dossettida Goda laytha awajja ta yootana mala tana kiittides” giza so demmi nababidinne.
42004020	Maxaafakka gordidi Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe naagizayssas zaari immidi uttides. Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan dizayti wurikka iza tishshi ooththi xeellida.
42004021	Izikka istas “Hayssi inte inte haythara siyida maxaafa qaalay hachchi polettides” gides.
42004022	Asay wurikka iza gish lo7o xalala hasayeettes. Qasseka iza duunappe keziza lo7o qaalappe dendidayssan malalettidi “Hayssi Yoosefe naa gidennee?” gida.
42004023	Izikka “Dhale Godo nerka nena patha. Qifirnahoomen neni ooththishin nu siyidayssa hayssan ne katamanka ooththa giza leemiso inte ta bolla malatanayssas sidhey baawa” giidi istas yootides.
42004024	Qasseka “Ta intes tuma gays nabey ba yeletida deren bonchetti erenna.
42004025	“Gido attin ta intes tuma gays heedzdzu laythinne bagga gakkanaas saloy gordettin wolqama koshay biitta bolla hanida Elaasa wode he laythatan azinay baynda daro macasati Isra7eele biittan deettes shin Elaasay istafe issineykkoka kiitettibenna. Gido attin Sidoona geetettiza biittan Seraphita geetettiza kataman diza issi azinay baynda macaseykko kiitettides.
42004027	Nabe Elisa7e wode Isra7eele deren daro inchiracha hargizayti deettes shin Sooriya biitta asa gidida Ni7imaaneppe attin he darotappe oonikka inchiracha hargefe paxibenna” gides.
42004028	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan dizayti wurikka hessa siydi daro hanqettida.
42004029	Ba uttidasoppe dendi eqqidi Yesusa katamappe kare kessidi duge zaari yeddanas ista katamaya oosettida zuma bolla aafotizason oosettidaso ekki efida.
42004030	Gido attin izi ista giddora shaakki yeggidi aadhdhi bides.
42004031	Heeppeka Galila awurajjan diza Qifirnahoome geetettiza katama wodhdhides. Heenka Sambata gallas daro asa tamarso oykkides.
42004032	Izi Godateththara haasayiza gish iza timirtezan malalettida.
42004033	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan tuna ayanay oykkida addey dees. Izikka ba qaala dhoqu histidi
42004034	“Naazirete Yesusa ha7i ta waanoo? Nenara tana aazi gaththidee? Ne yiday nuna dhayssanasee? Ne oonakkonne ta erays ne Xoossa Xillo gidikii?” giidi waassides.
42004035	Yesusikka tuna ayanaza ha addezappe “Co7u gaada keza” giidi seerides. Tuna ayanayka daro asa sinthan addeza bollafe yeggidi issi qohokka gathonta yeddidi kezides.
42004036	Asay wurikka malalettidi ba giddon issoy issara “Aso hayssi ay giza timirtee? Godateththaranne wolqara iita ayanan azazes; istika kezeettes” giidi haasayettides.
42004037	Yesusa goobateththayka ubbas gakkides.
42004038	Hessafe guye Yesusi Ayhuda Woosa Keeththafe kezidi Simoona keeththe gelides. Simoona bolloteya wolqama misho hargey oykin saketada dishin Yesusa izo patharkii” giidi woossida.
42004039	Yesusikka izikko shiiqidi misho hargeza seerides. Misha hargeykka yeddin heerakka denda eqqada imathata mokadus.
42004040	Awa arshey wullana gishin dumma dumma hargey oykkida asa wursi izakko ekki yida. Izikka hargiza asata ubba bolla ba kushe woththidi pathides.
42004041	Tuna ayananti qasseka Yesusa “Neni Xoossa naa” gishenne waassishe daro asatappe kezida; gido attin izi ista seerides; tuna ayananti izi Kirstoosa gididayssa eriza gish isti issinoka haasayana mala koybenna.
42004042	Gadey wonitishin Yesusi issi asi bayndaso bides. Daro asaykka iza koyishe izi diza so gakkides. Izi istafe shaakatidi boonta mala digganas koyda.
42004043	Gido attin istas “Gede hara katama baada Xoossa Kawoteththa Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas taas bessees; tani kiitettida gita qofay hessakko” gides.
42004044	Izikka Yuhudan Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan qaala gujji yootides.
42005001	Yesusi Gensereexe Abba lanqen eqqidi Xoossa qaala tamarsishin siyiza asay iza un7ethides.
42005002	He wode nam7u wogoloti abba achchan dishin Yesusi beyides. Mole oykkizayti wogolotappe wodhdhidi mole giteta meceettes.
42005003	Yesusi wogolotappe Simoona wogolon gelidi biittafe gede abba gido shiishana mala oychidinne wogolo giddon uttidi asaa tamarsides.
42005004	Tamarsi wursidappe guye Simoona “Abbay ciimmatizaso shiiqa mole oykkanas inte giteza abba gido yeggite” gides.
42005005	Simoonay Yesusas zaaridi “Godo! Qamma kumeth daaburi aqqidi issinokka oykkibookko; gido attin ne qaalan giteza yeggana” gides.
42005006	Yeggida wode daro mole oykkida. Giteyka daakkettides.
42005007	Hara wogolon dizayti yiidi ista maaddana mala kushera wutti xeygida. Istika yiidi nam7u wogolota mole kunthida. Wogolotikka duge mitetteth oykkida.
42005008	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi hessa beyidi Yesusa toho bolla kundidi “Godo! Ta nagarancha gidida gish ta achchafe kichcha” gides.
42005009	Izi hessa giday izinne izara dizayti oykkida daro molezan malalettida gishassa.
42005010	Qasseka Simoona laggeti Zabidoosa nayti Yaqoobeynne Yohannisikka wuri malalettida. Yesusikka Simoona “Babbofa! Hayssafe guye ne as oykkizade gidana” gides.
42005011	Istika wogolota biittakko shiishshidi wursikka yeggi aggidi Yesusa kaallida.
42005012	Yesusi katamatappe issineyin dishin inchiracha hargey bolla wursi oykkida issi asi he kataman dees. He addezikka Yesusa beyidi iza sinthan kundidi “Godo! Ne koykko tana pathana dandayassa” giidi woossides.
42005013	Yesusi ba kushe yeddi bochchidi “Ta dosadis, paxa” gides. Inchiranchay heerakka dhayides.
42005014	Yesusi izas “Hayssa oonaska yootoppa; Gido attin baada nena Qeese halaqas bessa; istas marka gidana mala ne geeyidayssas Musey azazida yarshoza shiisha” giidi azazides.
42005015	Gido attin iza gish asay haasayiza worey kaseppe aakki aakki bides. Keehi daro asay iza haasaya siyanassinne bana sakiza hargefe paxanas izakko shiiqides.
42005016	Yesusi daro wode asi bayndaso biidi woossides.
42005017	Yesusi tamarsishin asay Galilappenne Yuhudappe qasseka Yerusalameppe yida Farsaaweetinne woga tamarsizayti heen uttida. Izi pathana mala Goda wolqay izara dees.
42005018	He wode asay issi kumeththa bollay silidi qaaxonta hargancha halara tookki ekki yiidi keeththe gelthidi Yesusa sinthan wothanas paacida.
42005019	Asa daroteththafe dendidayssani keeththe gelthanas xoonettida gish pude keeththa kaara bolla kezidinne kaara qaaridi hargancha halara tookki ehidi asa giddora Yesusa sinthan woththida.
42005020	Yesusi ista ammano beyidi “Haysso neni ne nagarappe maarettadasa” gides.
42005021	Muse woga xaafizaytinne Farsaaweeti “Hayssi Xoossa bolla xalatethan hayssatho haasayizay izi oonee? Issi Xoossafe attin nagara maaranas ooni dandayizee?” giidi qoppida.
42005022	Yesusi ista qofa erida gish “Inte inte woznan ays hessatho qooppetii?
42005023	‘Neni nagarappe maarettadasa’ guussafenne ‘Dendada ba’ guussafe awayssi kawushee?
42005024	Gido attin ta hayssa giday asa naas biitta bolla asa nagarappe maaranas godateththi dizayssa inte erana mala” gides. Qasseka he sila addeza “Nena gays! Denda eqqa! Ne hala tookkada ba!” gides.
42005025	Izi heerakka ista sinthan dendi eqqides. Kase ba ichida hala tookkidi Xoossa galatishe baso bides.
42005026	He wode asi wuri malalettides. Xoossa galatishe “Hach malalisizaz beydos” giidi daro babbida.
42005027	Hessafe guye Yesusi heeppe kezi bides. Lewe giza issi qaraxa qanxisizayssi qaraxa qanxizason uttidayssa beyidi “Tana kaalla” gides.
42005028	Izikka wursi aggidi iza kaallides.
42005029	Leweykka Yesusasi ba keeththan gita diggisa diggisides. Qaraxa qanxisiza daro asatinne hara asatikka istara issife maaddan uttida.
42005030	Farsaaweetinne ista Xaafeti “Qaraxa qanxisizaytaranne nagaranchatara issife aazas meetii?” giidi Yesusa kaallizayta bolla zuuzumetida.
42005031	Yesusikka istas “Harganchatas attin paxa asas aakkime koshshenna.
42005032	Takka nagaranchata maarotethakko zaaranas yadis attin xillota xeeyganas yabeekke” gides.
42005033	Istika zaaridi “Yohannisa kaallizayti daro wode xoomettessinne woossettes. Farsaaweeta kaallizaytikka izatho ooththettes. Nena kaallizayti gidikko ubba wode meettessinne uyeettes” gida.
42005034	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Mishiray issife dishin diggissas xeeygettidayta xoomisanas bessizee?
42005035	Gido attin mishiray istafe shaakettana wodey yaana isti he wode xoomana” gides.
42005036	Istas “Oorath may7oppe qanxi ekkidi gal7a may7o bolla woththi sikkizadey deenna; woththi sikkikko oorathazi gal7ara gaaggonta gish gal7aza daakkanna.
42005037	Woyneppe oosettida ooratha cajje gal7a lukkamon kunthidi woththiza asi oonikka baawa; woththiza gidikko woyneppe oosettida ooratha cajjey gal7aza daakkana. Woyne cajjezikka biittan gukkana; gal7a lukkamoy sinthafe go7ontaz gidana.
42005038	Hessa gish ooratha woyne cajjey ooratha ogoron gujettanas bessees.
42005039	Histikko caala woyne cajje uyidappe guye caalontazi uyana koyizay ooninne deenna gaasoyka caalay lo7o giza gishassa” gides.
42006001	Issi Sambata gallas Yesusi kaththa giddora aadhdhi bishin iza kaallizayti tiya xuphi ekkidi ba kushen shigichi mishin,
42006002	Farsaaweetappe issi issi asati “Sambata gallas ooththanas bessontayssa ayssi ooththetii?” gida.
42006003	Yesusikka istas “Dawutey izara diza asati gafida wode izi ooththidayssa nababibeekketii?
42006004	Izi Xoossa Keeththe gelidi Qeeseti xalla maana mala azazettida dumma uketha baassi miidi banara dizaytas immides” giidi zaarides.
42006005	Qasseka Yesusi “Asa Nay Sambata Goda” giidi istas yootides.
42006006	Yesusikka hara Sambata gallas Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe gelidi tamarsishin ushacha kushey silida issi asi heen dees.
42006007	Muse woga tamarsizaytinne Farsaaweeti Yesusa mootanas gaaso koydi ane izi Sambata gallassan addeza pathiko beyana giidi naagishe gam7ida.
42006008	Yesusikka ista wozna qofa eridi kushey silida addeza ubba sinthan “Denda eqqa” gides. Addezikka dendi eqqides.
42006009	Yesusikka ista “Ta intena issi miish ane oychays; Sambata gallas ooththanas bessizay lo7o oosoyee? Iita oosoo? Shempo asho woykko dhayssoo?” giidi oychides.
42006010	Qasseka Yesusi ba yuushon diza wursi yuushi xeellidappe guyen addeza “Ne kushe piddisa” gides. Addezikka Yesusi gida mala ooththides. Iza kusheykka paxides.
42006011	Gido attin asati hanqettida; Yesusa bolla ay ooththanas koshshizakkonne ba giddon zoretida.
42006012	He gallassatappe issi gallas Yesusi woossanas zuma bolla kezidi qamma kumeth Xoossa woossishe aqides.
42006013	Gadey wontishin bana kaallizayta xeygidi istafe tammanne nam7ata doorides. Istaka “Hawaareta” giidi sunthides.
42006014	Istika Phexroosa giidi sunthida Simoonanne iza isha Indiraasa, Yaqoobe, Yohannisa, Piliphoosa, Bartelemoosa,
42006015	Matoosa, Toomaasa, Ilfiyoosa naa Yaqoobe, ba baggas mishettiza Simoona,
42006016	Yaqoobe naa Yuhudanne Yesusa aaththi immida Asqoroonto Yuhuda.
42006017	Yesusikka istara issife zuma bollafe duge wodhdhidi denbason eqqides. Iza kaallizaytappe daro asay heen dees, Yuhudappenne Yerusalameppe, qasseka Xirooseppenne Sidoona Abba achchafe yida keehi daro asaykka heen dees.
42006018	Istika yiday Yesusi gizayssa siyanassinne hargefe paxanassa. Tuna ayanaykka waayssizayti wuri paxida.
42006019	Wolqaykka izappe kezidi darota pathiza gish asay wuri iza bochchanas yides.
42006020	Yesusikka bana kaallizaytas “Xoossa Kawoteththay intes gidida gish inteno manqotoo! Inte anjettidayta;
42006021	Inte guyeppe kallana gish ha7i gafizayto! Inte anjettidayta; inte guyeppe miicana gish inteno ha7i yeekkizayto! Inte anjettidayta;
42006022	asay ta gish intena ixishin ba giddofe shaakkishin, borshininne intena iita sunthara xeygishin inte anjettidayta;
42006023	“Intes salon gita woytoy diza gish he wode ufayssan guppite; ays giikko ista Aawati nabeta bolla hessatho ooththida.
42006024	Gido attin inteno dureto inte ha7i ufayettida gish intena aayye-ana!
42006025	Inteno ha7i kallidayto intena aayye ana! Inte guyeppe gafana; inteno ha7i miicizayto! Intes aayye ana! Inte guyeppe mishetananne yeekkana.
42006026	“Asi wuri inte gish lo7o haasayiza wode intens aayye-ana! Ays giikko ista aawati wordo nabetas hessa mala ooththida.
42006027	“Gido attin ta yootizayssa siyizayto tani intes yootizay inte morketa siiqite; intena ixizaytas lo7o ooththite;
42006028	intena qangizayta anjite; intena qohizaytas woossite;
42006029	Issi shagalan baqqikko, nam7antho shagala gujja bessa; ooninne ne bollara may7idayssa qaari ekkikko gaaththara may7idayssakka diggofa.
42006030	“Nena woossiza ubbas imma; ne miisha ekkida asi zaari immana mala oychofa.
42006031	“Asi intes ooththana mala inte koyizayssatho inteka hara asas ooththite.
42006032	“Nagaranchatikka bana siiqizayta siiqiza gish inte intena siiqizayta xalla siiqikko intes ay dumma anjoy dizee?
42006033	Inte intes lo7o ooththizaytas xalala lo7o ooththikko intes ay dumma anjoy dizee? Ayssi giikko nagaranchatikka hessatho ooththiza.
42006034	Tal7e ekkidi zaarana dandayettes gizaytas xalla inte tal7ikko inte hara ay dumma anjo demmanee? Ayssi giikko nagaranchatikka isti tal7idayssa sire zaaridi ekkanas nagaranchatas tal7etes.
42006035	Gido attin Xoossi bana galatontaytassinne iitatas kiya gidida mala inte morketa siiqite; lo7o ooththite; guyeppe zaaridi ekkanas qopponta dishe tal7e immite; hessanka intes kushe zaaroy gita gidana; qasseka inte wogga Xoossa naa gidana.
42006036	Inte aaway kiya gidida mala inteka kiyata gidite.
42006037	“Inte harata bolla pirdofte inte bollakka pirdetenna; inte bolla pirday daronta mala harata bolla pirda darsofte; Asas atto gite inteska atto geetettana.
42006038	Immite! Inteska imettana; intes inte makida miishan simmidi makettana; harappeka naaqi baqqettidi yiggeti kumidi wora gukkanashe lo7o makiza miishan makettidi intes imettana” gides.
42006039	Qasseka Yesusi istas leemison “Qooqey qooqe kaalethanas dandayizee? Kaalethikkokka nam7ati issoy issara oyketidi ollan gelettennee?
42006040	Tamarey bana tamarsizadefe aadhdhenna, gido attin lo7ethi tamarida asi wuri ba astamare mala gides.
42006041	“Ne ayfe giddon diza tuussa xeellonta dashe ne isha ayfe giddon diza buura ays xeellay?
42006042	Ne ayfen diza tuussa beyonta ne isha ‘Tani ne ayfen diza buura ane kessays gaanas wosta dandayay?’ Neno qoodheppe qommon hanzaysso koyrottada ne ayfen diza tuussa kessa; hessafe guye ne isha ayfen diza buura kessanas lo7etha xeellandassa.
42006043	“Lo7o mithi iita ayfe ayfenna; qasseka iita mithi lo7o ayfe ayfenna.
42006044	Mithi wurikka ba ayfen ayfen erettes; Agunthafe Balase geetettiza mitha ayfey maxettenna; laadeppe woyne ayfey qanxetenna.
42006045	Lo7o asi ba wozna kumida lo7o miish kesses; iita asikka ba wozna kumida iita miishafe iita kesses; asi wurikka ba wozna kumi palahidayssa ba duunan haasayees.
42006046	“Tani gizayssa ooththeketa shin ays tana ‘Godo! Godo!’ geetii?
42006047	Taakko yiidinne ta qaala siydi polizay wuri oona misatizakkonne ta intena bessana; keeththe keexanas ziqqi ooththi bookkidi shuchcha bollan ba keeththa keexida asa misatees. Haro haaththi yiidi he keeththa sugides; gido attin minni keexettida gish qaathanas dandaybenna.
42006049	Gido attin ta qaala siydi polonta asi ba keeththe lo7ethi baasontanne giddon shuch yeggonta keexida asa misatees; haroyka keeththa sugin keeththay heerakka kundidi iita laaleth laalettides” gi yootides.
42007001	Yesusi hessa wursikka dere sinthan yooti wursidayssafe guye Qifirnahoome gizaso bi gelides.
42007002	Heen Qifrnahoomen mato halaqay dees; he addezas izi siiqiza ashkaray hargidi hayqos shempo bolla dees.
42007003	Izikka Yesusa gish siydi “Ba ashkara pathana mala Yesusa woosseriketii!” giidi issi issi Ayhuda bagga asatappe cimata Yesusakko yeddides.
