42007004	Kiitettidi bida asati Yesusakko yiidi “Hayssa addeza gish ne ashkaraza pathana bessees.
42007005	Ays giikko hayssi addezi nu asa daro dosees; Nuuska Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe keexisiday iza” giidi minthi woossides.
42007006	Yesusikka istara bides. Yesusi addeza keeththakko matiza wode addezi ba laggeta Yesusakko yeddidi “Godo! Ne ta keeththe gelanaas bessenna; takka nena ta keeththe gelthanas bessiza asi gidonta gish haa yashe daaburoppa.
42007007	Tani ne sinthan beettanas bessonta asa gidida gish neekko babeykke; hessa gish neni heen daada qaala xalla giikko ta ashkaray paxana.
42007008	Taaska tana azaziza asi taappe bollara dees. Taappe garsara tani azaziza wotadarati deettes. Issa ‘Haaya!’ giikko yees; issa ‘He ba!’ giikko bees; ashkkaraykka ‘Hessa ooththa!’ giikko azazettidayssa ooththes” gides.
42007009	Yesusikka addezi gidayssa siydi addeza hanotethan malalettides. Guye simmidi bana kaalliza deraas “Ta intes gizay hayssa mala gita ammano haray atto shin Isra7eele nayta giddonka demmabekke” gides.
42007010	Yesusakko kiitettida asati guye kiittida halaqaso simmida wode ashkaraya paxidayssa beyida
42007011	Hessafe guyen Yesusi gam7onta dishe Nayne geetettiza katama bana kaallizaytaranne daro derera issife bides.
42007012	Izi biidi katama geliza miixa gakkishin he katamaype daro asay aha tookki ekkidi kezi wodhdhides. Hayqqidays ba aayeys izi mexi issino. Aayeyska azinay baawa; katamappe daro asay izira issife dees.
42007013	Godayka izo beyida wode izis michetidi “Aykkoy baawa; yeekkofa!” gides.
42007014	Shiiqidinne aha tookkida hala bochchin aha tookkidayti sitti gi eqqida. Yesusikka “Haysso naazo nena gays denda!” gides.
42007015	Hayqqida naazikka suuri uttidi haasaya oykkides. Yesusikka naaza aayeys efi immides.
42007016	Asay wurikka keehi babbidi Xoossa galatishe “Gita nabey nu giddofe dendides; Xoossikka hayssa dereza yiidi beydes” gides.
42007017	Hayssi Yesusa gish haasayettiza lo7o haasayay kumeththa Yuhudaninne Yuhuda yuushon diza deretan kezides.
42007018	Xammaqiza Yohannisa kaallizaytikka hayssa wursi Yohannisas yootida. Yohannisikka ista giddofe nam7ata xeygidi,
42007019	“Izi yaana geetettidi haasayettizays neneyee? Hara as naaginoo? gi oychite” giidi Godakko yeddides.
42007020	Bida asati Yesusakko gakkidi “Xammaqiza Yohannisi ‘Izi yaana geetettidi haasayettizayssi neneyee? Hara as naaginoo?’ giidi neekko nuna yeddides” gida.
42007021	He wode Yesusi daro asa waayeppe, hargefenne tuna ayanatappe pathides. Daro qooqeta ayfeykka xeellees.
42007022	Yohannisi kiittin izakko yidayta “Biidi inte inte ayfera beyidayssanne siyidayssa Yohannisas yootite. Ayfe qooqeti xeelletes; toho wobeti suure hamutettes; inchiracha hargizayti paxida; tulleti siyida; hayqqidayti hayqoppe dendida; manqotas Mishiraachcho qaalay yootettes.
42007023	Tanan dhuphetonta asi wurikka anjettidayssa” gides.
42007024	Yohannisi kiittida asati Yesusa achchafe bidayssafe guye Yesusi daro asas Yohannisa gish “Inte ay beyanas bazzo kezidetii? Carkoy heenne haane qathethiza shomboqo beyanassee?
42007025	Ay beyanas kezidetii? Lo7iza may7o may7ida as beyana kezidetii? Lo7o may7o may7idi warix gizayti ishalo duussa dizayti kawo keeththan deettes.
42007026	Histikko ay beyanas kezidetii? Nabe beyanassee? Ee ta intes tuma gays; inte keziday nabeppe aadhdhizadde beyanassa.
42007027	Xoossa qaalan ‘Ne baana oge nees baasi lo7ethana kiitettida as ta neeppe sinthara yeddana’ geetettidi iza gish xaafettidays izakko.
42007028	“Tani intes gizay macasappe yeletida asa giddon Yohannisappe aadhdhizadey oonikka deenna; Xoossa Kawoteththan gidikko asa ubbafe guuth geetettida asi Yohannisappe aadhdhana” gi yootides.
42007029	Qaraxa qanxisizaytikka attonta hayssa Yesusa qaala siyidayti wurikka Yohannisa kushen xammaqettidi Xoossas bessiza boncho immida.
42007030	Farsaaweetinne Muse woga eranchati Yohannisa kushen xammaqettonta gish Xoossi istas waanna qofa ooththidi shiishidayssa hiraayssida.
42007031	Qasseka Yesusi zaaridi “Histikko ha7i yeletta aazan leemiso? Isti ay misatizoo?
42007032	Giyan uttidi ba giddon issoy issara xeeygettidi ‘Intes nuni diith diixxidos shin duribeekketa; zilalis zilalidos shin yeekkibeekketa; giza nayta misateetes’ gides.
42007033	Ays giikko Xammaqiza Yohannisi kath moontanne woyneppe oosettida cajje uyonta yiin ‘Daydanthi iza bolla dees’ gideta.
42007034	Asa nay qasse mishenne uyishe yiin ‘Ganjamanne ushshancha; qaraxa shiishshizaytaranne nagaranchatara laggetees’ gideta.
42007035	Hessa gish eratetha tumatethay izi nayta ubbata achchan ammanettides” gides.
42007036	Hessafe guye Farsaaweetappe issi asi Yesusa quma maanas ba keeththe xeygin Yesusi xeygida Farsaawe keeththa biidi uttides.
42007037	He kataman diza issi nagarancha macas dizaara Yesusi Farsaawe keeththan quma maadda bollan dizayssa siyada issi albasxiroose bilqaaxe shitto ekka yadus.
42007038	Yaadanne Yesusappe guyera iza toho achchan eqqada yeekkashenne ba afunthan iza toho caphisada ba hu7e binanara quccashenne yeerashe shitto tiyadus.
42007039	Yesusa qumas xeeyssida Farsaaweykka hessa beyidi “Hayssi addezi nabe gididakko hanna iza bochchida macasaya iza oonakkonne ay ooththiza asakkone eranakko shin; iza nagaranchakko shin” giidi ba woznan qoppides.
42007040	Yesusi “Simoona! Nees ta yootanazi dees” gides. Simoonaykka “Astamaare! Ero yoota” gides.
42007041	Yesusi zaaridi “Issi miishe tal7e immizaddefe tal7e ekkida nam7u asati deettes; istafe issa bolla ichashu xeet dinarey dees; nam7anthoza bolla ichashu tammu dinarey dees.
42007042	Istas qanxiza miishi dhayin tal7e immidayssi nam7ata accoza wursikka maarides. Histikko ha nam7atappe ha tal7e immidayssa darsi dosanay awayssee?” gides.
42007043	Simoonaykka zaaridi “Daro acoy maarettidayssa gaada qoppays” gides. Yesusikka “Tumu pirdadassa” gides.
42007044	He macasaykko yuuyidi Simoona “Hanno macasayo xeellay? Ta ne keeththe gelin ne ta tohos haaththe shiishabeekka; iza gidikko ta toho ba afunthan caphisada ba hu7e binanara quccadus.
42007045	Neni ubbakka tana yeerabeekka; iza gdikko ta gelosoppe oykkada ta toho yeero aggabeekku.
42007046	Ne ta hu7e zayte tiyabeekka shin iza gidikko ta toho shitto tiyadus.
42007047	“Hessa gish ta nena gizay iza tana keeha dosida gish iza ba daro nagarappe maarettadus; guuthara maarettiza asa siiqoykka guutha” gides.
42007048	Yesusi macasayo “Ne nagarappe maarettadasa” gides.
42007049	Izara issife maaddan uttida imathatikka “Hayssi nagara maarizay izi oonee?” giidi ba woznara qoppida.
42007050	Yesusikka macasayo “Nena ne ammanoy ashshides; saron ba!” gides.
42008001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Xoossa Kawoteththa Mishiraachcho sabakishe dumma dumma katamata giddoranne gutata giddora aadhdhides. Aadhdhidi biza wode iza kaalliza tammanne nam7ati izara deettes.
42008002	Qasseka tuna ayanappenne iita hargefe paxida issi issi macasati izara deettes. Istika laapun tuna ayanay izippe kezida Magdale getettiza dereppe yida Maaramo,
42008003	Kawo Herdoosason ooththiza Kuza macho Yohaano qasseka Soosinonne hara daro macasati deettes. Istika baas diza miishara Yesusas ooththizayta.
42008004	Daro derey issife shiiqidi dishin qasseka asay dumma dumma katamappe izakko wodhdhiza wode Yesusi leemisora tamarsishe,
42008005	“Issi goshshanchay zerethi zeranas kezides; izi zerishin baggay ogen wodhdhidi asa tohon yedhettides; salo kafotikka yiidi maxi mida;
42008006	Issi zerethay shuchcha gaden wodhdhidi heerakka caarides; gadezikka mela gade gidida gish elle melichides.
42008007	Qasseka hara zerethi aguntha giddon wodhdhides; agunthayka izara issife diccidi caarechchaykka dicconta mala cuullides.
42008008	Qasseka hara zerethay lo7o aradda gaden wodhdhides; caarida wodekka xeetu kushe ayfides” gides. Yesusi haasaya wursidi qaala dhoqu histidi “Siyiza haythi diza asi siyo!” gides.
42008009	Yesusa kaallizayti “Zeretha leemisozas birsheth imma” giidi oychin,
42008010	Izikka istas “Xoossa Kawoteththa xuura eroy intes imettides; haratas gidikko leemisora yootays qasseka harati beyidi woznan woththonta malanne siydi yuushi qopponta mala hanides.
42008011	“Zeretha leemisoykka hayssa; zereth geetettidaysi Xoossa qaala.
42008012	Oge lanqen wodhdhidayssi qaala siyizayta; giddo attin isti ammanidi attonta mala Xala7ey yiidi qaala ista woznappe ekkichizayta.
42008013	Shuchcha bolla wodhdhidaytikka qaala siydi ufayssara ekkizayta; istika ha7is ammanettes attin metoy ista bolla gakkiza wode xapho yeddonta gish ellera ammano kaddizayta.
42008014	Aguntha giddon wodhdhidayti qaala siyizayta; heytikka hayssa ha alame qofaninne aqotan, hayssa biitta bolla duussa lo7etethan cuulettidi lo7ethi ayfe imettenna.
42008015	Aradda biittan wodhdhidayssi qaala suureninne lo7o woznan siydi naagizaytanne dandayan minnidi ayfe ayfizayta.
42008016	“Poo7o poo7isidi baatha giddon woykko arsa giddon woththiza asi baawa; gido attin keeththe geliza asas poo7ana mala qonceson wothettes.
42008017	Qotettidi qonce kezontay; poo7on kezidi eretontta geeman attana miishi deenna.
42008018	“Hessa gish inte siyizayssa naageti siyite; diza asas gujettana bayndades ubbafe izas diza misatizarakka ekettaychana” gi zarides.
42008019	Hessafe guye Yesusa aayanne iza ishati Yesusakko yida. Gido attin asa daroteththafe dendidayssan izakko shiiqanas dandayibeetenna.
42008020	He wode asay Yesusas “Ne aayeyanne ne ishati nena beyanas koydi karen eqqida” giidi yootida.
42008021	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ta aayanne ta ishati Xoossa qaala siydi naagizayta” gides.
42008022	Issi gallas Yesusi bana kaallizaytara wogolo giddo gelidi “Abbafe he pinth pinnoos” gides.
42008023	Istika pinnishin abba bolla dambalay dendidi waayssiza wode Yesusi dhiskides. Haaththayka wogoloza giddo gelin asay daro metotettides.
42008024	Yesusa kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Godo! Godo! Nu wurana hanoos” giidi Yesusa dhiskofe denthida. Izikka beeggidi carkozanne abba dambala seerin carkoynne abba dambalay co7u gides.
42008025	Izikka bana kaallizayta “Inte ammanoy awa bidee?” gides. Istika ba giddon babbishenne malalettishe “Carkonne haaththe azazizay; istika Izas azazettizay izi oonee?” gida.
42008026	Izappe guye Galilappe he pinthan diza Gergesenoone geetettiza dere wogolora pinnida.
42008027	Yesusi wogolozappe gaden wodhdhida wode daydanthi iza bolla diza issadey katamappe kezidi iza demmides. He addezi daro wode may7o may7onta kallo dizaddenne keeththan aqonta duufo baas aqoso ooththida asa.
42008028	Yesusa beyida wode waassishe Yesusa sinthan kundides; qaala dhoqu histidi “Boncho Xoossa Naa Yesusa! Taasinne nees ay gaytoteththi dizee? Ne tana waayssonta mala ta nena woossays” gides.
42008029	Tuna ayanay hessa gaanas dandayiday addezappe kezana mala Yesusi azazida gishassa. Tuna ayanazikka woden woden dendiza gish addezi sansalataninne biratan toho qachchi naaginka qashetida sansalata duuthereththidi iza bolla diza daydanthay iza duge bazzo zaari efees.
42008030	Yesusi “Ne sunthi oonee?” giidi oychides; izikka daro daydanthati izan gelidi diza gish ta sunthi “Leegone” gides.
42008031	Daydanthatikka bana wursethi baynda ciimma ollan yeggonta mala minthidi woossida.
42008032	Henka zuma bolla daro guddunthi heemettes; daydanthatti “Gudduntha wudezan gelite” giidi azazana mala woossin Yesusi “Ero gelite!” gides.
42008033	Daydunthati addezappe kezidi guddunthatan gelida. Guddunthati aafoza dugunthara bicharshe biidi abban gelidi abban mitettida.
42008034	Heemizayti hanidayssa beyida wode beerotti biidi katama asassinne dere asas yootida.
42008035	Handayssa beyana giidi asay ba dizasoppe Yesusakko yides. Daydanthay izappe kezida addezikka woznay kahay simmin afala ma7idi Yesusa toho giddon uttidayssa beyidi babbida.
42008036	Daydanthan oyketida addezi paxishin beyidayti izi waani paxidakkonne derezas yootida.
42008037	Gergesenoone matan diza asay keehi babbida gish Yesusa “Hayssafe kichcha!” giidi woossida; Izikka wogolozan gelidi simmi bides.
42008038	Daydanthay izappe kezida addezi Yesusara issife daana mala woossides.
42008039	Gido attin Yesusi iza “Neso simmada Xoossi nees ooththida gita miish yoota” giidi moyzides. Addezikka Yesusi izas ooththida gita miish ba kataman diza asas ubbas qoncen yootishe bides.
42008040	Asay wuri Yesusa yuussa naagishe gam7ida gish izi simmishin ufayssan mokki ekkida.
42008041	He wode Iya7iroosa geetettiza Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe halaqay yiidi Yesusa toho bolla kundidi baso baana mala woossides.
42008042	Izi hessatho oychiday izas tammanne nam7u layth kumida issi maca nay sakettada shempo bolla diza gishassa. Izi hee buussan dishin derey daridi ba giddon sugettidi iza keehi un7isides.
42008043	Tammanne nam7u layth suuthi izippe gukkishin diza issi macasaya baas diza miisha wursa dhale eriza asatas imma wursin izo pathanas dandayida asi issadeyka baawa.
42008044	Izakka guyera shiiqada Yesusa afala macarata bochchadus; izippe gukkiza suuthay heerakka eqqi aggides
42008045	Yesusikka “Tana bochchiday oonee?” gides. Wurikka nuni bochchibeekko gi kadida wode Phexroosi zaaridi “Godo! Asi wuri yuuyi aadhdhidi nena suggerethidi un7isees” gides.
42008046	Gido attin Yesusi “Asi tana bochchides; wolqay taappe kezidayssa ta erays” gides.
42008047	Macasaya eretonta qotettada baanas dandayontayssa erada kokkorashe yaada Yesusa sinthan kundadus. Izakka Yesusa waana bochchidakkonne qasseka ellera waana paxidakko ubba asa sinthan yootadus.
42008048	Izikka “Ta naye! Ne ammanoy nena pathides; saron ba!” gides.
42008049	Yesusi buro macasays haasaya bolla dishin Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe halaqa Iya7iroosa keeththafe issi asi Iya7iroosas “Ne naya hayqqadus; hessa gish hayssafe guye astamareza mela daabursofa!” gides.
42008050	Yesusi hessa siydi Iya7iroosa “Aykkoy ba; babbofa! Ammana attin ne naya paxana” gides.
42008051	Yesusi Iya7iroosa keeththe geliza wode Phexroosa, Yohannisanne Yaqoobe qasseka nay aawappenne aayeyippe attin haray oonikka izara gelana mala koybenna.
42008052	He wode asay wuri nays “Wuu wuy!” gi waassi yeekkishin Yesusi “Yeekkofte iza ichchadus attin hayqqabeekku” gides.
42008053	Asaykka naya hayqqidayssa eriza gish Yesusa bolla miicides.
42008054	Gido attin izi nay kushe oykkidi “Ta naye! Denda!” gides.
42008055	Nays shempoykka simmides. Heerakka denda eqqadus; Yesusikka izis miza miish immana mala azazides.
42008056	Nayo yelidaytikka malalettida. Gido attin izi hanidayssa oonaska yootonta mala azazides.
42009001	Yesusikka tammanne nam7u Hawaareta issife xeygidi daydanthata kessana malanne hargefe pathana mala istas wolqanne godateth immides:
42009002	Qasseka Xoossa Kawoteththa yootanassinne hargizayta pathanas ista kiittides.
42009003	Istas “Oge bishe guufe woykko, qaraxite woykko, quma woykko, miishe woykko nam7u may7o oykki baanas koshshenna.
42009004	Inteka he katamaype kezana gakkanaas koyro gelida oona keeththanka gidin heen gam7ite.
42009005	Katama asay intena mokki ekkonta ixikko he katamaype kezidi intena mokkontaytas marka gidana mala inte tohon diza gudulla pittidi kezite” gides.
42009006	Istika Goday gida mala kezidi Mishiraachcho qaala yootishenne harganchata pathishe gutan gutan yuuyida.
42009007	He wode issi issi asati “Yohannisi hayqoppe dendides” baggayti “Elaassi kezidi beettides.” Qasse baggayti “Beni nabetappe issoy hayqoppe dendides” giidi haasayettiza gish Yuhuda biitta haariza Herdoossi hessa siydi haniza miishan ba woznan metotettides.
42009009	Herdoosikka “Tani iza qoodhe qanxida Xammaqiza Yohannisi hayqides. Histin iza gish hayssa mala haasayettishin ta siyizays izi oonee?” giidi iza ba ayfera beyana koydes.
42009010	Hawaaretikka simmidi isti ooththidayssa wursi Yesusas yootida. Izikka ista xalla banara ekkidi Betesayda geetettiza pooqethan diza katama bides.
42009011	Gido attin daro asay hessa eridi ista kaallides. Izikka ista mokki ekkidi Xoossa Kawoteththa gish yootides. Qasseka hargefe pathanas bessizayta pathides.
42009012	Gadey lem7ishin tammanne nam7u Hawaareti izakko shiiqidi “Nuni dizay bazzo biittan gidida gish asay biidi baas aqanasonne miza miish koyana mala asa moyza” gida.
42009013	Gido attin izi istas zaaridi “Inte istas mizaz immite” gides. Istika “Nuus ichashu ukethafenne nam7u moleppe haray ba. Ha asas gidiza kath koshshikko shammanaas bessees” gida.
42009014	Yesusikka bana kaallizayta “Asa ichashu tammu, ichashu tammu histi shaakki shaakki utisite” gides. Heenka ichashu shi gidiza attumasay dees.
42009015	Yesusa kaallizaytikka Yesusi azazida mala asa wursi utisida.
42009016	Yesusikka ichashu ukethanne nam7u moleta oykidi pude salo xeelidi Xoossa galatides. Izikka uketha menthidi asa gaththana mala bana kaallizaytas immides.
42009017	Asay wurikka miidi kaallides. Yesusa kaallizaytikka asappe attida tammanne nam7u leemate kumeth maaddafe denthida.
42009018	Issi gallas Yesusi barka woossishin iza kaallizayti izakko yida. Izikka ista “Asay tana oona gizee?” giidi oychides.
42009019	Istika izas “Issi issi asay Xammaqiza Yohannisa; baggayti Elaasa; harati qasse beni nabetappe issoy hayqoppe dendides geetes” gida.
42009020	Izikka ista “Intech tana oona geetii?” giidi oychides. Phexroosikka “Neni Xoossafe kiitettida Kirstoosa” giidi zaarides.
42009021	Yesusikka ista “Hayssa oonaska yootoppite” giidi minthi yootidi
42009022	Qasseka “Asa Nay daro waaye ekkanas bessees; dere cimatan, Qeese halaqataninne Muse woga xaafizaytan ixettananne ista kushen hayqqanassinne heedzdzantho gallassan hayqoppe dendana” gides.
42009023	Qasseka ubbas “Ba shempo ashshana giza asi wuri dhayssana shin ba shempo ta gish giidi dhaysiza asi ashshana. Hessa gish tana kaallana koyiza asi diikko bana kaddo; ubba gallas ba masqale tookkidi tana kaallo.
42009025	Asi alame go7a mule demmidi ba shempo dhayssikko aaza go7ay dizee?
42009026	Oonikka tananinne ta qaalan yeelattikko Asa Nay ba bonchora, Aawa bonchoranne Geeshsha kiitanchata bonchora yiza wode tani izan yeelatana.
42009027	Ta intes tumu gays; hayssan eqqida asappe hayqqanappe sinthan Xoossa Kawoteth beyana issi issi asati deettes” gides.
42009028	Yesusi hessa gida osupun gallassa malappe guye woossanas zuma bolla kezides. Bishe banara Phexroosa, Yohannisanne Yaqoobe ekki bides.
42009029	Izi woossishin iza ayfesoy laamettides. Iza medhaykka wolqantha mala xoliqidi boottiides.
42009030	Nam7u asati Museynne Elaassi izara haasayettida
42009031	Istika bonchora qoncidi Yerusalamen polettana diza Yesusa hayqo gish haasa7ettida.
42009032	Phexroosanne izara dizayta deexo dhiskoy oykkides. Istika dhiskofe beeggidi Yesusa bonchonne nam7u asi izara eqqidayta beyida.
42009033	He nam7u asati Yesusappe shaaketi bishin Phexroosi Yesusa “Godo! Issi daase nees, issi daase Muses, issi daase Elaasas ooththidi haan dizaakko nuus lo7okko! Shin” gides. Gido attin Phexroosi ba gizayssa eronta gides.
42009034	Izi hessa haasayishin shaaray yiidi ista geenthides. Shaara giddo gelidi babbida.
42009035	Shaara giddofekka “Tani doorida ta nay hayssa; iza siyite” giza qaalay seetettides.
42009036	Qaalay seetettida wode Yesusi xalla beettides. Yesusa kaallizaytikka hanida miisha wursi ba woznan oykkida attin oonaska yootibeetenna.
42009037	Wontetha gallas isti zuma bollafe wodhdhin daro asay yiidi Yesusara gaaggides.
42009038	He wode asa giddofe issadey qaala dhoqu histidi “Tamarisizaysso! Taas issi nay xalla diza gish iza ne xeellana mala ta nena woossays.
42009039	Iza iita ayanay oykkishin hassa7ay baynda waasses; qaketishe duunara gopponto kessees; qoho gaththidappe guye daro waayssidi aggees.
42009040	Nena kaallizayti naazappe kessana mala ista ta woossadis; gido attin kessana dandayibeetenna” gides.
42009041	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Ammanonta ha wode wobe asato! Tani intenara ayde gakkanaas daanee? Intenaka ayde gakkanaas dandayanee? Naaza ane ha eha!” gides.
42009042	Naazi yishin iita ayanay iza bollafe yeggin qaketides. Yesusikka iita ayanaza seeridi naaza pathidi naaza aawas immides.
42009043	Asaykka wuri Xoossa gitateththan malalettides. Izi ooththidayssan asay wuri malaletishin Yesusi bana kaallizayta
42009044	“Asa nay asa kushen aadhdhidi imettana; inteka ha yo7oza baloppite” gides.
42009045	Gido attin izi gizayssi istas gelibeenna. Ays giikko isti akeekkonta mala yo7ozi istafe geemettides; zaaridikka oychonta mala babbida.
42009046	Iza kaallizayti “Ooni oonappe aadhdhizee?” giidi ba giddon palamettida.
42009047	Yesusikka ista wozna qofa eridi guutha naa ekki yiidi ba matan essidi
42009048	“Ha guutha naa ta sunthan ekkizaddey oonikka diikko tana ekkees; tana ekkizaddeyka tana kiittidayssa ekkees. Inte ubbafe guutha asi izi ubbaafe aadhdhees” gides.
42009049	Yohannisikka “Godo! Issi asi ne sunthan daydanth kessishin beydos. Gido attin izi nunara kaallonta gish digganas koydos” gides.
42009050	Yesusikka “Intena ixonta asi wuri inte bagga gidida gish diggofte” gides.
42009051	Yesusi salo biza wodey matida gish Yerusalame baanas dendides.
42009052	Izikka sinthathidi ase kiittides. Istika koshshiza miish giigissanappe kasetidi Samaariya biittan diza issi guta bida.
42009053	Gido attin derey izi Yerusalame bizayssa erida gish mokki ekkibeetenna.
42009054	Iza kaallizaytappe Yaqoobeynne Yohannisi hanizayssa beyidi “Godo! Elaassi ooththoyssatho ‘Tamay saloppe wodhdhidi ista dip histo!’ giidi azazana mala koyay?” gida.
42009055	Gido attin Yesusi Istako yuuyidi “Intes ay mala ayanay dizakkonne erekketii? Asa Nay yiday asa shempo ashshanas attin dhayssanas gidenna” giidi ista seerides.
42009056	Isti wurikka hara guta bida.
42009057	Istika birshin issi asi istako shiiqidi “Tani neni biza ubbaso nena ta kaallana” gides.
42009058	Yesusi “Workenatas aqiza ollay, kafotas qasse aqiza kafo keeththi dees; gido attin asa naas ba hu7e ayssizasoykka baawa” gides.
42009059	Yesusikka hinkoyssa “Tana kaalla” gides. He addezikka “Godo! Ta kaseta baada ta aawa moogoo?” gides.
42009060	Yesusikka “Aggaga, hayqqidayti hayqqidayta moogeto. Neni gidikko baada Xoossa Kawoteththa asas yoota” gides.
42009061	Qasseka hara asi “Godo! Ta nena kaallana shin koyro soo baada ta keeththa asa saro gaada yo7oo?” gides.
42009062	Gido attin Yesusi “Boora kaso oykkidi goyishe guye zaari xeellizadey oonikka Xoossa Kawoteththas bessenna” gides.
42010001	Hessafe guye Goday hara laapun tammanne nam7u as dooridi sunthides. Istaka nam7u nam7u histidi izi baana sohotanne katamata wursikka isti kasetidi baana mala kiittides.
42010002	“Maxa gakkida kaththay daro; kaththa maxi shiishshizayti guuthata hessa gish kaththa Goday kaththa maxidi shiishshizayta kaththay dizaso yeddana mala woossite.
42010003	Hessa gish biite dorsati kana suyte giddora biza mala ta intena yeddays.
42010004	Korojo woykko qaraxite woykko caamma ekkofte; oge bolla oonakka saro gooppite.
42010005	“Inte oona keeththika geliza gidikko koyrottidi ‘Keeththa aso saro!’ giite.
42010006	He keeththan saro dosiza asi diikko inte sarotay he keeththan shempana; saro dosiza asi doonta aggikko inte sarotay intes simmana.
42010007	Intes maana shiishida kath wursi miishenne uyishe he inte gelida keeththan uttite; ooththizades ba wolqa waaga ekkanas izas bessees. Ha keeththafe he keeththe yuuyoppite.
42010008	“Inte ay katamakka gakkiza wode asay intena mokki ekkikko isti intes aaththida quma miite.
42010009	He kataman diza harganchata pathidi Xoossa Kawotethi inteko matides giidi yootite.
42010010	Gido attin inte biidi issi katama gelishin he katama asay intena mokki ekkonta ixikko he katama asay shiiqiza dubbushsha kezidi;
42010011	‘Nu toho bolla diza inte katama gudulla intes marka gidana mala nu toho bollafe pittoos shin Xoossa Kawoteththay inteko matidayssa erite’ giite.
42010012	Ta intes yootays pirda gallas he katama pirdafe Soddome katama pirday kawushshe gidana.
42010013	“Kuraziine nena aayye-ana! Betesayda nena ayye ana! Intenan oosettida malatati Xirooseninne Sidoonan oosettidakko istika may7o may7idinne bidinth gorpettidi he wode beni maarettanashin.
42010014	Gido attin pirda wode intefe Xiroosessinne Sidoonas kawuyana.
42010015	Hanne Qifirnahoome pude salo dhoqu dhoqu gadii? Neni duge Si7oole wodhdhana,
42010016	“Inte gizayssa siyiza asi tana siyees; intena ekkonta asi tanakka ekkenna; tana ekkontaykka tana kiittidayssa ekkenna” gides.
42010017	Laapun tammanne nam7atikka ufayetishe simmidi “Godo! Haray atto shin daydanthatikka ne sunthan nuus haarettida” giidi yootida.
42010018	Izikka istas “Xala7ey wolqantha mala saloppe kundishin ta beyadis.
42010019	“Histikko shooshanne masimaso inte yedhana mala morke wolqa ubba bolla intes godateth immadis; intena qohiza issi miishika deenna.
42010020	Inte sunthay salon xaafettida gish ufayettite attin tuna ayanati intes haarettida gish ufayettofte” gides.
42010021	He wode Yesusi Xillo Ayanan ufayettidi “Salossinne sa7as Goda gidida abbo hayssa wursaka aadhdho eranchatappenne erachatappe qottada qeeri guutha naytas ne qoncisida gish tani nena galatays; ee, ta Aawawu! Hayssi ne lo7o sheney hanides.
42010022	“Wuri ta Aawa matappe taas imettides; qasseka iza nay oonakkonne Aawappe attin erizay baawa. Aaway oonakkonne Naazappe attin woykko Naazi izas qoncisanas dosidadeppe attin erizadey baawa” gides.
42010023	Bana kaallizaytakko simmidi istas dumma “Inte beyizayssa beyiza ayfeti anjettidayta.
42010024	Ta intes tuma gays daro nabetinne kawoti inte ha7i beyizayssa beyanas koydi beybeetenna; inte ha7i siyizayssakka siyanas koydi siybeetenna” gides.
42010025	Issi gallas Muse woga tamarsiza issi asi Yesusa paacanas koydi “Tamarisizaysso tani merna de7o laattanas ay ooththoo?” giidi oychides.
42010026	Yesusikka zaaridi “Woga maxaafan ay geetetti xaafettidee? Izappe nees geliday aazee?” giidi oychides.
42010027	Addezi zaaridi “Ne Goda Xoossa ne kumeththa woznappe, ne kumeththa shempofe, ne kumeththa wolqafenne, ne kumeththa qofappe siiqa; ne laggeka ne hu7e mala siiqa gees” giidi zaarides.
42010028	Yesusikka “Lo7o zaaradasa. Nenikka hessatho ooththikko merna de7o demmana” gides.
42010029	Addezi bana xillisanas koydi “Histin ta laggey oonee?” giidi Yesusa oychides
42010030	Yesusikka zaaridi “Issi addezi Yerusalameppe Iyarko wodhdhishin pangati demmidi iza may7o qaari ekkida; keehi qoxerethidi hayqoppenne paxappe giddon yeggi aggidi bida.
42010031	Issi Qeesey he ogera baassi duge wodhdhishe aamunsonta he qoxettida addeza demmidi pooqethara yeggi aadhdhides.
42010032	Qasseka issi Lewe bagga asappe issi addezi he ogera aadhdhishe qoxetida addeza beyidi ha7ikka pooqidi aadhdhides.
42010033	Issi Samaariya biitta asi he ogera aadhdhi bishe qoxettida addeza bolla gakki wodhdhides; Addeza beyidinne keehi mishettides.
42010034	Addezakko shiiqidinne maduntha dhallana mala wogara mitha zaytenne woyne caje maduntha bolla gussidi qachchides; Addeza ba Hare togisidi imaththi shempizaso efidi lo7ethi xeellides.
42010035	Wontetha gallas imaththi shempiza keeththa godas nam7u dinare immidinne ‘Nena hara miisha kessisikko ta simmashe nees immana; neeppe kessada lo7etha naaga’ gides.
42010036	“Histikko ha heedzdzu asatappe pangatan qoxettidi hayqoppenne paxappe giddon yegettidades keehi mata laggey nees awayssa misatizee?” gides.
42010037	Muse woga tamarsizaysikka “Heesi ne michetidayssanne maaddidayssa!” gides. Yesusikka izas “Nekka baada izayssatho ooththa” gides.
42010038	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti oge bishin Yesusi issi guta gelides; Marta geetettiza issi macasiya bason Yesusa mokka ekkadus.
42010039	Izis Maaramo geetettiza issi micheya dawus. Maaramakka izappe qaala siyashe Goda toho garsan uttadus.
42010040	Gido attin Martay ooso daroppe dendidayssan daaburada Yesusakko shiiqada “Godo! Ta michiya ooso wursa ta bolla aggada uttishin neni co7u gay? Iza tana maaddana mala izis yoota attin” gadus.
42010041	Gido attin Goday “Hanne Martane! Neni daro miisha gish qofa daraasa; dirbataasa; tuggataasa.
42010042	Koshshizay gidikko issi miish xalla; Maaramakka lo7o exa dooradus; hessika izippe ekettenna.”
42011001	Issi gallas Yesusi issison woossides; izi woossa wursishin iza kaallizaytappe issoy “Godo! Xammaqiza Yohannisi bana kaallizayta woossa tamarsidayssatho nekka nuna woossa tamarsa!” gides.
42011002	Izikka istas “Woossishe ‘Nu Aawawu! Ne sunthi anjetto; ne kawotethi haayo;
42011003	hachchis gidiza quma nuus imma;
42011004	nuna qohidayta nu maariza mala nuna maara; paacenka nuna gelthofa’ gi woossite” gides.
42011005	Qasseka “Intefe issaddes laggey diikko leela gidoth he laggezaso biidi ‘Taas issi imaththi ogeppe yiin mizana kath baynda gish heedzdzu solloy diikko taas tal7arikii?’
42011007	Laggezikka zaaridi ‘Tana waaysoppa; kareykka gordettides; tanikka naytara ichchadis. Ha7i dendada immanas dandaykke’ gaandee?
42011008	Takka intes yootays laggetetha gish dendidi immonta aggikkokka izi oychon salethida gish dendidi koyizayssa wursi immides.
42011009	“Hessa gish tani intes gizay; woossite intes imettana; koyite inte demmenna; kare qoxite intes doyettana.
42011010	Ays giikko woossizay wuri ekkana; koyizaykka demmenna kare qoxizadeska doyettana.
42011011	“Intefe aawa gidi uttidi izi yelida nay mole oychikko shoosh immizay daandee?
42011012	Woykko phuuphulle oychikko masimaso immizay daandee?
42011013	Inte iitata gidishe inte naytas lo7o imota imo erikko; salon diza inte Aaway bana woossizaytas Xillo Ayanan wosti darsi immenee?” gides.
42011014	Issi gallas Yesusi haasayssonta duude daydanth kessides. Daydanthazikka kezidappe guye duuna duude addezi haasaydes; beyida asatikka darsi malalettida.
42011015	Gido attin issi issi asati “Bi7elizeebula geetettiza daydanthata halaqan daydanthata kessees” gida.
42011016	Issi issi asay iza paacanas “Saloppe malata bessa” giidi oychida.
42011017	Gido attin Yesusi ista qofa eridi “Ba giddon shaakettiza kawotethi wuri dhayana; ba giddon sigay baynda keeththikka kundana.
42011018	Inte tana ‘Bi7elizebulan daydanthata kessees’ giidi haasayeta shin Xala7eykka ba giddon issoy issafe shaaketikko iza kawotethi waani minnanee?
42011019	Histikko tani daydanthata Bi7elizeebula kessikko inte nayti oonan kessandetoo? Hessa gish inte nayti inte bolla pirdizayta gidana.
42011020	Gido attin tani daydanthata kessizay Xoossa wolqan gakkides; Xoossa Kawoteththay inteko matidaro erite.
42011021	“Mino asi lo7ethi gixxettidi ba keeththe naagikko keeththan diza miishi lo7on naagettes.
42011022	Gido attin izappe hara mino asi yiidi xoonikko izi ammanettida ola miishata woththi ekkidi izas diza haarozakka wursi haras gishanna.
42011023	“Tanara gidontay tanara eqettes; tanarakka shiishontadey laalles,
42011024	“Tuna ayanay asappe kezida wode shemposo koyishe haaththi baynda mela soon waayetees; shemposoy dhaykko ‘Tani kase kezidaso guye simmana’ gees.
42011025	Izappe simmidi yishin kase izi aggi bida keeththay pitettidinne giigi uttidayssa demmees.
42011026	Hessafe simmi biidi baappe iitiza hara laapun daydanthata banara ekkidi yees; istika gelidi heen daana; Hessadeska koyroyssafe guyeyssi keehi iita gidana” gida.
42011027	Yesusi hessa haasayiza wode asa giddofe issi macas dizaara ba qaala dhoqu ooththada “Nena tookkida qanthinne ne dhammida dhanthati anjettidayta” gadus.
42011028	Gido attin izi “Anjettidayti Xoossa qaala siydi azazettizayta” gides.
42011029	Daro derey Yesusakko shiiqida wode Yesusi “Hayssi yelettay iita yeletta; gita malata beyanas koyees. Gido attin Yoonaasa malatappe hara dumma malatay imettenna.
42011030	Gaasoyka Yoonaassi Nanawe asas malata gidida mala asa nay tani ha yelettas malata gidana.
42011031	Dugeha dere maca kawoya Solomoone erateth beyanas biitta gaxappe dendada yida gish pirda wode iza ha yelettara dendada pirdana; hekko Solomooneppe aadhdhizaddey haan dees.
42011032	Yoonaassi sabakishin siydi Nanawe asay ba nagarappe maarottida gish ha yelettara issife dendidi pirdana. Gido attin Yonaasappe aadhdhizay haan dees.
42011033	“Xompe oythidi kareppe geliza asas poo7ana mala qonceson wothetes attin geemason woththiza asi deenna.
42011034	Ne asatethas poo7oy ne ayfe; ne ayfey paxa gidikko ne kumeththa asatethay po7o gidana. Ne ayfey saketikko ne kumeththa asatethay dhuma gidana.
42011035	Hessa gish nenan diza poo7oy dhumonta mala naagetta.
42011036	Histikko ne asatethay poo7o gidikko dhumida asatethi deenna aggikko ne kumeththa asatethay xompe lo7ethi poo7iza mala lo7i beettanna” gides.
42011037	Yesusi haasaya wursida mala issi Farsaawey banara quma maanas Yesusa xeygides.
42011038	Yesusi quma maana kushe mecetonta aggidayssa beyidi malalettida.
42011039	Goday izas “Ha7i inte Farsaaweeti xu7assinne keres bolla bagga meeci geeshsheta; inte gido baggazi uzetethaninne iitatethan kumides.
42011040	Inteno eeyato! Kare bagga medhdhiday gido bagga medhibenee?
42011041	Yo7on gidikko giddon dizayssa muxuwata immite; he wode wurikka intes geesh gidana.
42011042	“Inteno Farsaaweeto! Intes ayye ana! Anugappenne xalotappe qasseka dumma dumma kathafe tammafe issino kesseeta; gido attin tuma pirdanne Xoossa dosanayssa aggi aadhdheta. Yo7on gidikko inte aggi aadhdhanas bessenna. Hankoyssa aggonta inte ooththana bessizaytikka hayta.
42011043	“Inteno Farsaaweeto! Intes aayye-ana! Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan uttanas boncho oyde koyeeta; giya giddonka asay inte sinthan hokkana mala doseeta.
42011044	Asi eronta iza bollara biza qotetti diza duufo inte misattiza gish intena aayye-ana!” gida.
42011045	Muse woga erizaytappe issoy zaaridi “Astamaare! Ne hessatho haasayiza wode nunakka cayaassa” gides.
42011046	Yesusikka zaaridi “Inteno Muse woga erizaytto inteska aayye-ana! Asi tookkanas dandayonta deexo tooho asa toosseta. Inte gidikko intes biradhdhe xeeranikka bochchekketa.
42011047	“Inte Aawati wodhida nabeta duufo inte lo7ethiza gish intes ayye ana.
42011048	Histikko inte inte aawata ooso minthiza markata; isti nabeta wodhida; inteka ista duufo lo7etheeta.
42011049	“Hessa gish Xoossa erateth hizgadus ‘Nabetanne Hawaareta ta istas yeddana; istika istafe issa issa wodhana; haratakka gooddana.
42011050	Hessa gish ha yelettay biittay medhettosoppe ha7i gakkanaas gukkida nabeta ubba suutha gish oyshettana.
42011051	Aabeele suuthafe oykkidi yarshizasoppenne Xoossa Keeththa giddon gukkida Zakaraasa suutha gakkanaas koyeettes.’ Ee ta intes gizay ha yelettay hayssas oyshettana.
42011052	“Inteno woga erizayto! Intes aayye-ana! Eratetha penge qulfe wolqara woththi ekkidi inteska gelibeekketa; gelanaytaka diggeeta” gides.
42011053	Yesusi heeppe kezidappe guye Xaafetinne Farsaaweeti eqettishe oyshan shempo diggida.
42011054	Iza duunappe keziza qaalan iza qaxanas naagettida.
42012001	He wode daro derey ba giddon issoy issara yedhettana gakkanaas shiiqi uttidashe Yesusi bana kaallizayta “Farsaaweeta irshofe naagettite; hessika qoodheppe qommo hano.
42012002	Qonconta kamettidi attanaynne erettonta qotan attana miishi deenna.
42012003	Hessa gish inte geeman haasayidazi wuri qonce kezana; qasseka inte qol7an haythan sasuketi haasayidazi wuri dere sinthan yootettana.
42012004	“Ta laggeto! Ta intes gizay asho xalla wodhanappe attin hara aykkokka ooththanas dandayontaytas babbofte.
42012005	Gido attin inte babbanas bessizay oonakkonne ta intena bessana; asho wodhidappe guye ashonne shempo issife gaththi Gaanname taman yegganas dandayizayssas babbite. Ee izas babbite gays.
42012006	“Siine kafo ichashati nam7u santes bayzettetes; gido attin istafe issiniyoka Xoossi dogenna.
42012007	Inte hu7e binanay kumeth taybon dees. Hessa gish babbofte; daro Siine kafotappe inte aadhdheta.
42012008	“Ta intes yootays ta gish asa sinthan markattiza asa ubbas Asa Nay qasseka Xoossa kiitancha sinthan iza gish markattana.
42012009	Gido attin asa sinthan tana kaadidadey Xoossa Kiitancha sinthan kaadettana.
42012010	“Asa Naa bolla kawushsha qaala haasayizades nagaray wuri maarettana shin Xillo Ayana cayizadey maarettenna.
42012011	“Asay intena oykkidi dere haarizaytakkonne godattizaytakko, Ayhuda Woosa Keeththe oykki efikko ‘Ay gi zaarinoo? Ay giinoo?’ giidi hirgofte.
42012012	Ays giikko inte haasayanas bessizayssa Xillo Ayanay he wode intena tamarsana.”
42012013	Daro asa giddofe issadey “Astamaare! Ta ishay nu aawa laata miishafe tana gakkizayssa taas immana mala izas yoota” gides.
42012014	Yesusikka “Haysso! Tana inte bolla pirdiza daanna ooththiday oonee?” gides.
42012015	Qasseka istas “Asas daro miish diikkokka shempoy he duretethan doonta gish naagettite; yiiqetethafe intena keehi naagite” gides.
42012016	Zaarethidikka istas “Lo7ethi kath immiza gade goda gidida issi dure asi dees.
42012017	He addezikka ba woznan ‘Ta kaththa shiishada woththizassoy baynda gish ay ooththoo?’ giidi qoppides.
42012018	“Addezikka ‘Taas diza gootarata laallada hara aakkizaz keexana; histada taas diza kathaanne taas dizaz wursa izan shiishana.
42012019	Ta shempoyokka ta shempoye! Daro wodes gidiza kath shiishida gish shempa uttada ma; uya; ufayeta’ gaana gides.
42012020	“Gido attin ‘Xoossi haysso eeyazo! Ne shempoyo hachchi omars neeppe ekkana koyeettes; hessa gish ne nees shiishidays oonas gidanee?’ gides.
42012021	“Hessa gish Xoossa achchan dure gidonta baas miishe shiishshiza asa wursethikka hessa mala” gi leemison yootides.
42012022	Hessafe guye Yesusi bana kaallizaytas “Intes ta yootays inte duussas ‘Ay maanakkonne woykko inte bollas ay may7anakkonne’ giidi ceecoppite.
42012023	Ays giikko shempoy kathafe asatethi qasse may7oppe aadhdhees.
42012024	Quurota xeellite zeretenna; maxetenna; kath shiishshiza gootaray istas baawa shin Xoossi ista mizees. Histikko inte istafe keehi aadhdheketii?
42012025	Gido attin intefe darsi qoppidi ba laytha bolla issi gallas gujjana dandayizay oonee?
42012026	Histikko guutha miish oosoy intes dandayettontashe ays hara miishas keehi qoppetii?
42012027	“Ciishshati waanidi diccizaakkonne ane xeellite; waayettenna; suqetenna; gido attin ta intes yootays; Solomooneykka gita asa shin istafe issineytho may7ibenna.
42012028	Histikko Xoossi hachchi beettidi wonto taman wodhdhana maata hayssatho mayziza gidikko inteno ammanoy paccidayto! Intena wosti aaththi mayizenee?
42012029	“Hessa gish ‘Ay miinoo? Ay may7inoo?’ giidi inte woznay darsi qoppofo.
42012030	Biitta bollan diza asi wuri hayssa koyees; gido attin hayssi wuri intes koshshizayssa inte Salo Aaway erees.
42012031	Ubbafekka koyrothidi Xoossa kawoteth koyite; hayssi wuri intes gujeti imettana.
42012032	“Inteno guutha wude mehe mala gididayto! Kawoteth intes immanas inte Aawas lo7o qofa gidida gish babbofte.
42012033	Intes dizayssa bayzidi manqotas immite; kaysoy ekkontason, bilay moontason, cimmoonta korojon wuronta miish salon shiishshite.
42012034	Inte woznay inte miishi dizason daana” gides.
42012035	“Qanthan gixxidi giigetite, inte poo7oykka poo7o,
42012036	Ista goday bulacha diggisappe simmidi yaanashe naagetizaytanne izi yiidi penge qoxishin elle doyanas giigi uttida asata misatite.
42012037	Ista goday yiza wode dhiskonta naagidi uttida ashkarati isti anjettidayta; ta intes tumu gays; ista goday baas qanthan gixxi eqqidi ista maaddan uttissidi muzana.
42012038	Omars woykko leela gidoththan yiidi isti dhiskonta dishin demmikko he ashkarati anjettidayta.
42012039	Kaysoy ay wode yaanakkon eriza gididakko keeththa goday kaysoy bookkishin co7u giidi bessontayssa erite.
42012040	Asa Nay inte qopponta woden yaanayssa eridi inteka giigettidi naagite” gides.
42012041	Phexroosikka “Godo! Hayssa leemiso ne yootizay nuus xallayee? Ubba asassaraa?” gides.
42012042	Godayka “Histikko baso asas koshshiza woden quma immana mala keeththadey keeththa asa bolla woththiza ammanettida woznama asi oonee?
42012043	Goday simmishin hessatho ooththishe beettizaddey izi anjettidade.
42012044	Ta intes tumu gays; baas diza miish ubba bolla hessade godassana.
42012045	Gido attin ‘Izadey ta goday elle yeenna gam7ana’ giidi qoppidi adde ashkaratanne maca ashkarata bukkikko, qasseka koyda mala miidinne uyidi mathotikko,
42012046	hessade goday izi qopponta gallassan yaana giidi ezugonta saaten yaana. Yiidikka iza qanxerethi yeggidi iza exa ammanontaytara issife ooththana.
42012047	“Ba goda qofa eridi giigetontaynne goda shene ooththonta ashkaray iita shoch shocettana.
42012048	Gido attin eronta dishe shochas bessiza mooro ooththida ashkaray guuthara shocettana. Daro imettida asa ubbafe daroy koyeettes; daro hadara ekkidadefe daroy koyeettes.
42012049	“Tani yiday biitta bollan tama eethanassa. He tamay ha7i eexxi kezidakko tana daro ufayssana.
42012050	Gido attin tani xammaqettana xinqatay dees; he xinqatay polettanashe tani keeha metottettadis.
42012051	Intes tani biitta bolla saro ehana yida misatizee? Gidenna; ta intes yootays tani yiday issa issafe shaakanassa.
42012052	Hayssafe sinthan issi keeththan ba giddon shaaketida ichashu asati daana. Nam7ati heedzdzata bolla heedzdzati nam7ata bolla dendidi ba giddon shaakettana.
42012053	Aaway ba attuma naa bolla, attuma naykka ba aawa bolla, aaya ba maca nay bolla maca nayakka ba aayey bolla, bollota ba naa mach bolla, naa machaka ba bolloti bolla dendidi ba giddon shaakettana” gides.
42012054	Qasseka derezas “Inte awa arshey mokiza baggara shaaray kezishin beyidi ‘Elleraka iray yaana’ gees geeta; inte gida malaka hanees.
42012055	Dugeha baggara pudeha carkishin gallassay ho7o gidana geeta; inte gida malaka hanees.
42012056	Inteno! Lo7o misatiza iitato; saloyssanne sa7a medha beyidi hananayssa ereeta shin histin ha wodeza eroy intena waani xoonizee?” gides.
42012057	“Histikko inte ays tuma pirdeketii?
42012058	“Ne morkera daanna sinthan eqqana bishin buro oge bollan dashe izara giigana oge koya; ne histonta aggikko izi nena goochchidi daanna sinth efana; daannaykka nena aaththidi halaqas immana; halaqayka nena woynen yeggana.
42012059	Ta nees yootays; daannay pirdida wursetha santimeyo qanxa wursana gakkanaas heeppe kezakka.”
42013001	He wode issi issi asati Yesusakko yiidi “Philaxoosi ista suuthi ista yarshora gaththi walakkida Galila asata” gish Yesusas yootida.
42013002	Izikka zaaridi “Histin hessa mala metoy ista bolla gakkida asati hanko waayey gakkonta attida Galila asa ubbafe aadhdhida nagarancha gidida gish giidi qoppetii?
42013003	Gidenna! Ta intes yootays inte maaretonta ixikko inte wurikka he asata mala dhayana.
42013004	Woykko Salhoomen gimbey ista bolla kundin hayqqida tammanne osupun asati Yerusalamen diza asa ubbafe nagarancha gidida gish giidi qoppetii?
42013005	Gidenna! Ta intes yootays inte maaretonta ixikko inte wurikka he asata mala dhayana” gides.
42013006	Qasseka istas “Issi asi woyne tokkizason tokkettida issi Balase giza mithi dawus; he balase mithaykko ayfe koyana yiidi issi ayfeka demmibenna.
42013007	Woyine atakilte ooththizayssas ‘Hekko tani ayfe demmanna gaada hachchira heedzdzu layth ha Balaseykko simereta yaada issi ayfeka demmabeekke; hessa gish izo qanxa digga; aazas coo biitta xunxazee?’ giidi leemiso yootides.
42013008	Izikka zaaridi ‘Godo! Tani izi xaphon osha yeggada oosetha xeellana mala halaythas aggaggarkii?
42013009	Yiza laythas iza ayfikko lo7o; ayfonta ixikko qanxandassa’ ” gides.
42013010	Yesusi Sambata gallas issi Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan tamarsishin;
42013011	tammanne osupun layth kumeth iita ayanay oykkidi asateth paccisida issi macasaya heen dawus; izakka zokkoy quunnida gish mulekka dhoqu gaanas danda7ukku.
42013012	Yesusi izo beyidappe guye xeygidi “Hanne macasaye! Neni nena sakkiza hargezappe paxadasakko” gides.
42013013	Yesusi ba kushe izi bolla woththin iza heerakka siti gaada eqqadus; Xoossakka galatadus.
42013014	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqazikka Sambata gallas pathidayssas Yesusa bolla hanqettidi izakko yiza dereza “Oosos bessiza usuppun gallassati diza gish he ooso gallassatan yiidi paxite attin Sambata gallas yooppite” gides.
42013015	Godayka zaaridi “Inteno qoodheppe qommon haasayizayto! Inte giddofe issadey ba boora woykko ba hare Sambata gallas bason qashetidasoppe birshidi haaththe ushshanas efi erennee?
42013016	Histin hanna macasaya Abrahaame naa gidada tammanne osupun layth kumeth Xala7ey qachchin dizasoppe Sambata gallas birshettanas izis bessennee?” gides.
42013017	Yesusi hizgi oychida wode izara eqettizayti wurikka yeellatida; gido attin derey wurikka izi oychida malalisiza oyshan ufayettides.
42013018	Qasseka Yesusi zaaridi “Xoossa Kawotethi ay misatizee? Izo aazara leemisoo?
42013019	Issi asi Sanafice geetettiza mitha ayfe ba gaden tokkin mokka diccada gita gidin kafoti izi hagga giddon duussaso giigissana gakkanaas diccida sanafice mith misatawus” gides.
42013020	Qasseka “Xoossa Kawotethi aazara leemiso?
42013021	Issi macassi munuqa caalisanas daro dhiillera walakkida guutha irsho misatawus” gides.
42013022	Hessafe guye Yesusi Yerusalame bishe kanthi biza katamaninne gutatan asa tamarsishe aadhdhishin,
42013023	issadey izakko shiiqidi “Godo! Pirdafe guutha asati xalla attanee?” giidi oychides. Izikka zaaridi “Xuuntha pengeyra gelanas baaxetite; daroti gelanaas koyeettes shin istas hanenna.
42013025	Keeththa goday dendidi ba kare gordi gidin inte karen eqqidi ‘Godo! Kare doyarki!’ giidi penge qoxana shin izi zaaridi ‘Inte oonakkonne awappe yidakkonne ta intena erikke’ gaana gides.
42013026	“Intenikka izas zaaridi ‘Nuni nenara issife midossinne issife uyidos; nu dubbushshan nuna ne tamarsadassa’ gaana.
42013027	“Izikka zaaridi ‘Intena inte oonakkonne inte awappe yidakko ta intena erikke; inte makalati wurikka taappe haakkite’ gaana gides.
42013028	“Inte Abrahaame, Yisaaqa, Yaqoobenne nabeta ubbata Xoossa Kawoteththan beyiza wode inte karen yegeti attikko he wode intes yeehonne achcha garcech gidana.
42013029	Asay awa arshey mokkiza baggafenne wulliza baggafe pudehappenne dugehappe yiidi Xoossa Kawoteththa maaddan uttana.
42013030	Hekko guyen dizaytappe baggayti sinthe aadhdhana sinthan dizaytappe baggati guye aadhdhanayti deettes” gides.
42013031	He wode Farsaaweetappe issi issi asi yiidi “Herdoossi nena wodhanas koyiza gish hayssafe denda kichcha” gida.
42013032	Yesusi istas “Tani buro ‘Hachchinne wonto daydanthata asappe kessana; hargizaytaka pathana; heedzdzantho gallas ta qofaso ta gaththana’ gides giidi he workanas yootite.
42013033	Gido attin nabey Yerusalameppe karen hayqqanas bessonta gish hachchinne wonto wontoppeynka ta sinthe buus gujjana.
42013034	“Hanne Yerusalame nabeta wodhizare neekko kiitettidayta shuchchara caddizare! Kuttoy ba ciyeta ba qefe gars shiishshiza mala ne nayta shiishshanaas aappun wode koyadinashin ne gidikko akay gadasa.
42013035	Hekko inte keeththay kayzides; ta intes yootays, ‘Goda sunthan yizadey anjettides’ inte gaana wodey gakkanaashe nam7antho tana beyekketa” gides.
42014001	Issi gallas Yesusi quma maanas Farsaaweeta halaqatappe issa so gelida wode asay wuri Yesusa ay ooththanakkonne giidi ayfe iza bolla tokki xeellides.
42014002	Heenka asatethay izas puurin waayettiza issi asi iza sinthan dees.
42014003	Yesusikka Muse woga erizaytanne Farsaaweeta “Sakettizade Sambata gallas pathanas koshshizeyee? Koshshennee?” giidi oychides.
42014004	Istika co7u gida; izikka addeza bochchidi pathi yeddides.
42014005	Qasseka “Intefe issi asas Sambata gallas nay woykko booray kundidi ollan gelikko eeson heerakka kessontadey oonee?” gides.
42014006	Istika oyshas aykko zaaroka demmanas dandayibetenna
42014007	Xeeygettida asati uttanas boncho so koyishin Yesusi beyidi leemisora istas,
42014008	“Issi asi nena sarges xeeyssikko bonchoson uttofa; neeppe bollara bonchettizaddey xeeyssetikko;
42014009	intena nam7ataka xeygidadey yiidi ‘Ne uttidasoza hayssades yedda’ gaana; nenikka yeellatashe ziqaso baandasa.
42014010	Gido attin ne xeeyssettida wode ziqaso xeellada utta; nena xeygidadey yiidi ‘Ta laggezo! Haaya dhoqason utta’ gaandes; nenikka he wode nenara maaddan uttida asa ubba sinthan bonchettana.
42014011	Ays giikko bana dhoqu histizaddey wuri ziqqi gaana; bana ziqqi histizaddey wuri dhoqu gaana” gides.
42014012	Yesusikka xeygidadeza “Quma woykko kawo mizanas xeeyssikko neyssatho nena xeeyssidi mizonta mala ne laggeta woykko ne ishata, ne dabbota woykko dureta woykko dure gutata xeeygoppa.
42014013	Gido attin asa xeeyssada mizana koykko manqota, kushey, tohoy baynda wobettanne qooqeta xeeyssa; neni anjettana.
42014014	Xeeyssettidayti kushe zaaranas dandayonta gish xillota dentha wode nees kushey zaarettana” gides.
42014015	Maaddan Yesusara issife uttidaytappe issoy hayssa siydi “Xoossa Kawoteththan shiiqidi maaddafe miza asi anjettidade” gides.
42014016	Yesusikka “Issi asi wolqama diggise giigissidi daro as xeygides.
42014017	“Diggise maana wodeykka gakkin xeeygettida imathata, ‘Wurikka giigida gish haa yiite!’ giidi xeeygana mala ba ashkara yeddides.
42014018	Gido attin wurikka baasi hara gaaso shiishshidi issoy ‘Ha7i gade shamadis; ta baada beyanas bessees; hachchis tana lancofa’ gides.
42014019	“Hankoysikka ‘Tani ichashu waaxa boora shamadis. Ista paaca xeellana gish hachchi tana lancofa’ gides.
42014020	“Qasse hara issadeykka ‘Tani buro mishiratethan days; baanas dandaykke’ gides.
42014021	“Oosanchayka kiitettidasoppe simmidi heedzdzati gidayssa ba godas yootides. He wodekka diggisa giigissidayssi hanqettidi oosancha ‘Elella oyddu oge kezada manqota, kusheynne tohoy baynda wobeta qomaxatanne ayfey baynda qooqeta ha geltha’ gides.
42014022	“Oosanchazikka zaaridi ‘Ta Godo! Ne tana azazidayssa wursa poladis; ha7ikka hara utethasoy dees’ gides.
42014023	“Godazikka oosanchaza ‘Gede oyddu oge kezada ta keeththe kumana mala pudenne duge aadhdhizayta wolqara ha geltha.
42014024	Tani tuma gays; diggisa maana xeeyssetidaytappe issadeykka duunan gelthenna’ ” gides.
42014025	Daro derey izara issife bizayssa Yesusi beyidinne guye simmi
42014026	“Taakko yizay wuri ba aawa, ba machonne nayta, ba ishatanne micheta, ba shempo gidin ixonta aggikko tana kaallizade gidanas dandayenna.
42014027	Ba masqale tookkidi tana kaallontay tana kaallizade gidanas dandayenna.
42014028	“Intefe issi asi keeththe keexanas koykko polanas dandayanakkonne dandayontakko koyrottidi baas diza bira qoppontay oonee?
42014029	Keeththa keexana doommidi wursanas hanonta ixikko beyida asi wuri iza bolla miicana.
42014030	Istika ‘Hayssi addezi keeththe keexo oykkides shin polibenna’ gi miicana.
42014031	“Woykko issi kawoy hara kawora olas giigettidi nam7u tammu shi asi ekki yiza kawo zaaranas tammu shi ola asara zaaranakkonne uttidi qoppontay oonee?
42014032	Ola zaaranas dandayetonta misatidi beettikko buro hahon dishin maqaynanas gaana yeddees.
42014033	Hessathoka intefe oonakka gidin baas dizayssa aggontay tana kaallizade gidanas dandayenna.
42014034	“Maxiney lo7oshin ba maxinetetha mal7o yeddikko zaaridi waani mal7ana dandayizee?
42014035	Gaden yeggin aradisonta gish coo kare wora yegettes; siyiza haythi diza asi siyo!” gides.
42015001	Issi gallas qaraxa shiishshizaytinne nagaranchati wuri Yesusappe siyanas iza achchi shiiqida.
42015002	Farsaaweetinne Xaafeti “Hayssi addezi nagaranchata ixenna; istarakka mees” giidi ba giddon zuuzumetida.
42015003	Yesusikka istas leemiso hizgi yootides;
42015004	“Inte giddofe issades xeetu dorsi diikko he xeetu dorsatappe issina dhaykko attida uddufun tammanne uddufunata denban yeggidi dhayidayssa demmana gakkanaas koyana boontay oonee?
42015005	Demmidi ufayssara hashen tookki ekkidi,
42015006	baso simmes, ba laggetanne guta asata issi bolla xeygidi ‘Dhayida ta dorsayo demmadis; tanara issife ufayettite’ gaana.
42015007	Ta intes yootays ‘Hessathoka maaroteth koshshonta uddufun tammanne uddufun xillotappe maaretethan geliza issi nagaranchan salon ufays gidana.’
42015008	“Woykko issi tammu bira santimey diza macasaya he tammafe issineya dhaykko xompe oythada demmana gakkanaas keeththa gars pittada lo7etha koyonta macas oonee?
42015009	Izakka demmida wode ba laggetanne ba gutata issife xeeygada ‘Taappe dhayda bira santimeyo demmida gish tanara issife ufayettite’ gaandus.
42015010	Ta intes yootays ‘Hessathoka maarotan geliza issi nagarancha asan Xoossa kiitanchata achchan ufays gidana.’
42015011	“Issides nam7u nayti deettes.
42015012	Istafekka kaalo naazi ba aawa ‘Aabo! Nees diza miishafe ta gisha taas imma’ gides. Aawaykka baas diza miisha ba naytas gishides.
42015013	“Daro wode gam7onta dishe kaalo naazi ba miisha wursi shiishshi ekkidi haaho biitta bides. Heenka baas diza miisha go7ay baynda coo mela dhayssides.
42015014	Izikka baas dizayssa wursi dhayssidappe guyen he biittan iita koshay dendin daro waayettides.
42015015	Hessa gish he deren diza asappe issaadekko shiiqides. Izaadeyka ba guddunth heemmana mala gudduntha heemizaso yeddides.
42015016	Naazikka guddunthati miza harqozappe maanas amottides shin hessaka immizadey beettibenna.
42015017	“Gido attin iza woznay simmida wode ‘Ta aawa ashkarata aappunatappe kathi tirpize shin tani hayssan gafan hayqqana matadinaa?
42015018	Dendada ta aawa so baada, aabo! Salon Xoossa, sa7an ta nena qohadis.’
42015019	Hayssafe guye ‘Tani ne naa geetettada xeeygettanas taas bessenna; ne ashkaratappe issa mala tana qooda’ gides.
42015020	Hessa gish dendidi ba aawakko bides. Gido attin buro izi hahora yishin aaway beyidi mishettidinne izakko woxxi biidi idimmi oykkidi yeerides.
42015021	“Naazikka ‘Aabo! Salon Xoossa, sa7an ta nena qohadis; hayssafe guye ta ne naa geetettada xeeygettanas taas bessenna’ gides.
42015022	“Gido attin aaway ashkaratas ‘Eesottidi ubbafe doorettida may7o ehidi mayzite; iza biradhen migda, iza tohonka caamma aaththite.
42015023	Modho mirgo boora ehidi shukite; miidi ufayetoos.
42015024	Hayssi ta naazi hayqqides shin paxides; dhayides shin beettides’ gides; hessafe guyen ufayeteth oykkida.
42015025	“Hessi haniza wode bayra naazi goshshason dees; heeppeka simmidi so matida wode diiththa duris siydes.
42015026	Izikka ashkaratappe issa xeygidi ‘Hessi aazee?’ gi oychides.
42015027	Ashkarazikka ‘Ne ishay yides; izi saroninne lo7on simmida gish ne aaway modho mirgo boora shukides’ gides.
42015028	“Bayra ishazikka hanqettidi so gelanaska koybenna. Aawaykka kare kezidi izi so gelana mala woossides.
42015029	Gido attin izikka zaaridi aawas ‘Hekko tani hayssa gakkanaas nees aylle mala ooththadis; ne azazoppe issinokka paccisabeekke; gido attin tani ta laggetara ufayettana mala ne taas issi deysha laaqakka immabeekka.
42015030	Gido attin hayssi ne naazi nees dizayssa wursi laymatizaytara wursidi yishin modho mirgo boora izas shukadasa’ gides.
42015031	“Aawaykka ‘Ta naazo ne ubba wode tanara daasa; taas gididay wurikka neessa.
42015032	Hayssi ne ishay hayqqides shin paxides; dhayides shin beettides; hessa gish nuni ufayetanas bessees’ ” gides.
42016001	Yesusi bana kaallizaytas “Issi dure adde dayssas iza keeththa ayssiza issi asi dees; izi he dure addeza miisha ogey baynda laallizayssa worey ha dure addeza haythan wodhdhides.
42016002	Dure addezi he addeza xeygidi ‘Haysso ta siyzayssi hessi aazee? Hayssafe doommada ne ta keeththas ayssizadde gidanas dandayonta gish ne alafetetha giddon diza miisha oykkida mazgaba taas zaara’ gides.
42016003	“Keeththa ayssiza addezi ba woznara ‘Ta goday tana ta alafetethafe gooddana gees; goya maanas taas wolqay baawa; woossanas yeellatays; hessa gidida gish ay ooththoo?’ giidi,
42016004	tani alafetethafe kezikko asay tana mokki ekkana mala ooththana oge ta erays.
42016005	“Hessa gish iza goda accoy ista bolla diza asata issa issa xeygides. Koyro yidayssa ‘Ne bolla goda acoy aapunee?’ gides.
42016006	“ ‘Issi xeetu xaaro kumeththa zaytey ta bolla dees’ gides. Alafezi zaaridi kase ne faramida waraqata heyi ekka uttada elle ichashu tammu xaaro gaada xaafa gides.
42016007	“Kaallidi hankoyssa ‘Nech ne bolla aappun dizee?’ gides. ‘Xeetu ogoro gistey dees’ gides. Alafezi zaaridi ‘Kase ne tal7ashe faramida waraqata hey osupun tammu ogoro gaada xaafa’ gides.
42016008	“Godazikka shocechiza alafezi ooththida cincateththa gish iza nashshides. Ha alame nayti bana misatizaytara diza gaaggoteththan poo7o naytappe aadhdhida cincata.
42016009	“Hessa gish tani intena gizay ha biitta miishay wurida wode merna keeththan inte ekettana mala ha7i intes diza miishara intes lagge medhite gays.
42016010	Guutha miishan ammanettizadey daro miishanka ammanettana; guutha miishan ammanettontadey daro miishanka ammanettenna.
42016011	Histikko inte ha biitta miishan ammanettonta ixikko tuma miisha hadara oykkite giidi ooni intes immanee?
42016012	Asa miishan inte ammanettonta ixikko intes buzo gidana miish ooni immanee?
42016013	“Nam7u godas issito issi bolla azazettana dandayizadey oonikka deenna; woykko issa dosidi issa ixees woykko issakko shiiqidi hankoyssa leqqees. Xoossasinne miishas issife gaththi haarettanas dandayekketa” gides.
42016014	Miish darsi siiqiza Farsaaweeti hessa wursi siydi Yesusa qidhida.
42016015	Yesusikka istas “Inte intena asa achchan xilliseta; gido attin Xoossi inte wozna erees. Asa achchan bonchettidadey Xoossa sinthan tuna” giidi istas yootides.
42016016	“Muse wogaynne nabeti Yohannisi yaana gakkanaas yootishe gam7ida. Hessa kaallidi qasse Xoossa Kawoteththa Mishiraachcho qaalay sabakettides. Asi wurikka hee gelanas wadhettes.
42016017	Gido attin Muse wogappe issi qeerina kunda attanayssafe saloynne sa7ay aadhdhanayssi kawushsha gidana.
42016018	“Ba macho anji yeddidi hara macho ekkiza asi wurikka laymattes; ba azinappe anjetta bidaro ekkidayssikka laymattes.
42016019	“Qasseka Yesusi istas ‘Lo7o may7o may7idi gallas gallas lo7o duussa ufayssan diza issi dure asi dees’ gides.
42016020	He addeza pengen kumeththa bollay madunth xalla gidida issi Alazaare geetettiza manqo adde dizayssi ichchidi dees.
42016021	Izikka he dure addeza keeththan asay kath mishin maaddafe gaden wodhdhiza suupa maxi maanas amottes. Kanatikka iza maduntha laacettes.
42016022	“Ha manqo addezi hayqqin Salo Kiitanchati Abrahaame ki7o ekki bida; qasse dure addezikka hayqqidi moogettides.
42016023	Izi Si7oolen waayettishe dhoqu giidi haahon Abrahaame xeellides; Alazaarekka ba ki7on oykki dishin beydes.
42016024	“Dure addezi ‘Aawa Abrahaame! Hayssan waayettiza taas michettarkii! Gi Alazaarey ba biradhe xeera irxa haaththan bochchidi ta inxars irxisana mala ha yeddarki!’ giidi waassides.
42016025	“Gido attin Abrahaamey ‘Ta naazo neni biitta bolla dashe lo7o duus de7idayssa mala Alazaarey kase waaye beyidayssa ne qoppa; gido attin ha7i izi ufayettishin neni waayetasa’ gides.
42016026	Hessi wuri hanishin haan diza asi haappe hee inteko aadhdhonta mala qasseka intekon dizay haa nuukko aadhdhana koyizadey haa aadhdhonta mala intessinne nuus giddon gita aafoy giigettides gides.
42016027	“Dure addezi qasse ‘Aabo! Hessi hessa gidikko neni Alazaare duge ta aawaso yeddana mala ta nena woossays; taas ichashu ishati deettes; hayti hayssa ha waayeso yoonta mala biidi istas lo7ethi yootana mala Alazaare yeddarkii?’ gides.
42016029	“Abrahaamey izas zaaridi ‘Museynne nabeti heen ista achchan diza gish istafe siyeto’ gides.
42016030	“Izikka zaaridi ‘Aawa Abrahaame hessa mala gidenna; hayqida asappe issidey hayqoppe dendi biikko isti Xoossa maarotethan gelana’ gides.
42016031	“Abrahaameyka zaaridi ‘Museynne nabeti gizayssa siyonta ixikko hayqqida asappe issadey dendidakkokka isti amanettenna’ ” gides.
42017001	Yesusi bana kaallizayta “Asa dhuphidi nagaran yeggiza miishi yoonta aggenna; gido attin yaana dhuphezas gaaso gidizaddes aayye-ana!
42017002	He addezi ha guuthatappe issas dhuphe gidanappe woxa shuchchi iza qoodhen qashetin abba gido izi yegetizakko izas lo7o gidana.
42017003	Hessa gish inte hu7es naagetite. ‘Ne ishay nena qohikko hanqeta; izi ba mooro eridi simmikko maara.’
42017004	Issi gallassan laapunto zaari zaari qohidi laapun tokka zaari zaari ‘Maara giikko maara’ ” gides.
42017005	Hawaaretikka “Godo! Nuus ammano gujja” gida.
42017006	Godaykka “Gaashe ayfe lagge ammanoy intes diikko hayssa ‘Eththa dhoqalleta baada abban gela tokketa’ inte giikko izi intes azazettana” gides.
42017007	Qasseka Yesusi “Inte giddofe issi asas goshshanchay woykko dorsa heemiza ashkaray diikko izi goshshasoppe simmishin ‘Taas maana kawo giigissa; ta maada uyana gakkanaas gixetada taas ooththa; hessafe guye baggan maandassanne uyandassa’ gees attin ha7i quma maana ha aadhdha gizee?
42017009	Histikko he ashkara goday izi iza azazo polida gish iza galati erizee?
42017010	Hessa gish intenikka inte azazettidayssa wursi polida wode ‘Nuni go7ay baynda oosanchata nuus ooththanas bessizayssa poli ooththidos’ gite” gides.
42017011	Hessafe guye Yesusi Yerusalame bishe Samaariyaranne Galila achchara aadhdhides.
42017012	Issi guta gelida wode inchiracha hargiza tammu asati iza demmida. Istika haahon eqqidi;
42017013	ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Yesusa! Godo! Nuus mishetarki!” gida.
42017014	Izikka ista beyidi “Biite! Intena Qeesetas bessite” gides. Istika buro bishe oge bolla paxida.
42017015	Istafe issoy ba paxidayssa beyidi ba qaala dhoqu histidi Xoossa bonchishe simmides.
42017016	Izaadeyka Yesusa toho bolla kundidi galattides; izikka Samaariya biitta asa.
42017017	Yesusikka addeza “Paxidayti tamm as deettenee? Histin uddufunati awa bidoo?
42017018	Hayssa dumma dere addezappe attin Xoossa galatizay baawa guussee?” giidi oychides.
42017019	Addezakka zaaridi “Dendada ba! Nena ne ammanoy pathides” gides.
42017020	“Xoossa Kawotethi ayde yaanee?” giidi Farsaaweeti Yesusa oychida wode Yesusi “Xoossa kawotethi beettiza malatatan yuukku.
42017021	Asay Xoossa kawotethi haan dawus woykko heen dawus gaanas dandayettenna; Xoossa kawotethi inte giddon dawus” giidi zaarides.
42017022	Bana kaallizaytaska “Asa Naa gallassatappe issi gallassayo beyanas inte amottana wodey yaana; gido attin inte beyekketa.
42017023	Asay intes ‘Haan dawus’ woykko ‘Heen dawus’ gaana shin inte ista kaallidi booppite.
42017024	Gaasoyka wolqanthi wolqamidi ha gaxappe he gaxa gakkanaas poo7isiza mala Asa Nay yiza gallas iza mala hanana.
42017025	Gido attin hayssi wuri hananappe koyro Asa Nay daro meto ekkanasinne hayssa ha yeletethan kadhettanas bessees.
42017026	“Nohe wode hanidayssa mala Asa Naa wodenka hessatho hanana.
42017027	Nohey markaben gelana gallas gakkanaas asay mishininne uyishin; ekkishininne gelishin dhaysiza haaththi yiidi wursikka dhayssides.
42017028	“Looxe wodekka iza mala hanides; asay meessinne uyees; bayizessinne shamees; tokkizaz tokkees; keeththika keexetes.
42017029	Gido attin Looxey Soddomeppe kezida gallas shuchinne mith qoronta diine tamay saloppe bukkidi wursi dhayssides.
42017030	“Asa Nay qonciza gallas hessatho hanana.
42017031	He wode ba keeththa bolla dizaddey oonikka keeththa giddon diza miish ekkana giidi duge wodhdhofo; hessathoka goshsha soon diza asi guye so simmofo.
42017032	Looxe macho qoppite.
42017033	Ba de7o gam7isana koyizay wuri dhayssana; ba shempo aaththi immizaddey gam7isana.
42017034	Ta intes gizay he wode omars nam7u asi issi hiixan ichchana; issoneya ekettana; issoy attana.
42017035	Nam7u macasati issife gaaccishin issineya ekettana; hankoora attana.
42017036	Nam7u asi issife goshshason daana; issoy ekettana; issoy attana.
42017037	“Istika zaaridi ‘Godo! Isti awa ekettanee?’ gida. Izikka ahay dizason ankoti shiiqana” gides.
42018001	Bana kaallizayti azallonta ubba wode woossanas bessizaysa erisanas Yesusi ha leemisoza istas yootides.
42018002	“Issi kataman Xoossas yayonta asinne bonchonta issi daannay dees.
42018003	He katamanka issi am7e macassi dawus. Izakka “Ta balgarara taas mootoy diza gish pirdarkii?” gashe izakko simeretadus.
42018004	Daannazikka daro wode gakkanaas izis pirdibenna; gido attin guyeppe ba woznan “Xoossas yayonta asekka bonchonta aggikko,
42018005	hanna am7e macasaya tana waayssiza gish ta izis pirdana’ Hessa histonta aggikko ubba wode simeretada iza tana daabbursana” gides.
42018006	Godayka “Makalancha daannay gidayssa siyite;
42018007	Xoossi qamma, gallasinne omars izakko waassiza doorettidaytas pirdeneyee? Tana ay metide! giidi ba maado gam7issandee?
42018008	Ta intes gays; istas elle pirdana; gido attin Asa Nay yiza wode biitta bolla ammano demmandeshaa?” gides.
42018009	Bana xillo asa mala qoodidi ceeqettizaytassinne harata leqo ayfen xeellizaytas leemisora,
42018010	“Nam7u asati woossanas Xoossa Keeththe bida; issoy Farsaawe, hinkoyssi qaraxa shiishshizade.
42018011	Farsaaweezikka eqqidi ba gish ‘Xoosso! Tani hara asa mala bonqizadde, makalizade, laymatizade harappeka hayssa qaraxa shiishshizadde mala gidonta aggida gish ta nena galatays.
42018012	Saamintan nam7a xoomays; taas diza tammafe issa immays’ giidi woossides.
42018013	“Gido attin qaraxa shiishshizaddezi haahon eqqidi pude salo dhoqu giidi xeellanas koybenna; gido attin ba tira iccishe ‘Xoosso! Tana nagaranchaza maararki!’ gides.
42018014	“Ta intes yootays; Xoossa sinthan Farsaawezi xillotethi demmibenna shin hayssi qaraxizayssi xillidi baso simmides. Bana dhoqusizay wuri ziqqi gaana; bana ziqqisizay gidikko dhoqu gaana” gides.
42018015	Yesusi bosherethana mala asay guutha nayta izakko ehides. Iza kaallizaytikka hessa beyidi hanqettida.
42018016	Gido attin Yesusi guutha nayta baako xeygidi “Guutha nayti taakko yaanayssa diggofte; Xoossa kawotethi haytanta malatassa.
42018017	Ta intes tumu gays; Xoossa kawotethi guutha naa mala ekkontay wuri izin gelenna” gides.
42018018	Ayhudata halaqatappe issoy “Kiya astamare! Merna de7o laattanas ta ay ooththoo?” giidi oychides.
42018019	Yesusikka “Aazas tana kiya gay? Issi Xoossafe attin hara kiyay deenna.
42018020	‘Laymatoppa; wodhoppa; kaysotoppa; wordo markattofa; ne aawa boncha’ giza azazozata ne eraasa” gi zaarides.
42018021	Addezikka “Hayta gidikko guutha natetethafe doomada naagadis” gides.
42018022	Yesusikka hessa siydi “Histikko nees issi miishi paccees; nees dizazi wursa bayizada manqotas imma; salo mazgaban demmandasa; izappe guye yaada tana kaalla” gides.
42018023	Gido attin addezi hessa siyida wode daro haaroy izas diza gish keehi mishettides.
42018024	Yesusikka addeza xeelidi “Daro miishi diza asati Xoossa kawotethi gelanayssi ay mala meto!
42018025	Durey Xoossa kawoteth gelanayssafe Gaammelay narpe lukkora aadhdhanayssi matana” gides.
42018026	Hessa siyida asay “Histin ooni attana dandayizee?” gides.
42018027	Yesusikka asa achchan dandayetontay Xoossa achchan dandayettes gides.
42018028	Phexroosikka “Hekko nuni nuus dizaz ubba aggidi nena kaallidos” gides.
42018029	Yesusikka istas “Ta intes tumu gays; Xoossa Kawoteththa gish giidi ba keeththe, ba macho, ba ishanta woykko bana yelidayta woykko ba nayta aggidadey,
42018030	ha7i wode daro dakko kushe ekkontaynne yiza wode qasse merna de7o ekkontay oonikka deenna” gides.
42018031	Yesusikka bana kaalliza tammanne nam7ata dumma efidi “Ha7i nuni Yerusalame kezana goos; nabeti asa naa gish xaafidayssi wuri polettana.
42018032	Dere asas aaththi immana; istika iza qidhi ka7ananne waayssana; iza bolla cuttana.
42018033	garafana; hessafekka zaaridi wodhana; Izikka heedzdzantho gallas hayqoppe dendana” gides.
42018034	Iza kaallizayti gidikko hessa ubbafe issinoka eribeyttenna. Iza gizayssikka istas gelibenna. Izi aaza gish haasayidakkonne eribeyttenna.
42018035	Yesusi Iyarko geetettizaso matida wode issi qooqe addey oge duunan uttidi woosses.
42018036	He qooqe addezikka daro asay ogera aadhdhizayssa siydi “Hessi aazee?” gi oychides.
42018037	Istika izas “Naazirete Yesusi hayssara aadhdhees” giidi yootida.
42018038	Izikka “Dawute naa Yesusa taas qadheta” gi waassides.
42018039	Yesusappe sintheti bizayti “Co7u ga!” giidi hanqettida. Gido attin izi “Dawute nawu! Taas qadheta” giidi darsi waassides.
42018040	Yesusikka eqqidi addeza izakko ehanna mala azazides; izikka izakko shiiqida wode
42018041	“Ta nees ay ooththana mala koyay?” giidi oychides. Qooqezikka “Godo xeellanas koyays” gides.
42018042	Yesusikka “Nena ne ammanoy pathides xeella” gides.
42018043	Addezi heerakka xeellides; Xoossakka bonchishe Yesusa kaallides. Hessa beyida derey wuri Xoossa galattides.
42019001	Yesusi Iyarko geetettizasora aadhdhi bishin,
42019002	Zekkiyoosa geetettiza issi asi heen Yesusi biza oge bolla dees. Izikka dere qaraxa qanxisizaytas halaqanne keehi dure asa.
42019003	Izi Yesusa geetettizayssi awayssakkonne beyanas koyishin qaantha asa gidida gishshinne daro derey Yesusa kaalliza gish Yesusa beyanas dandaybenna.
42019004	Yesusi he ogera aadhdhishin sinthe aadhdhidi oge bolla diza issi eththa mitha bolla kezides.
42019005	Yesusi eththa gars gakkidi dhoqu histi xeelidi “Zekkiyoosa! Hach ta ne keeththan pe7anas bessees. Elela wodhdha” gides.
42019006	Izikka elle wodhdhidi ufayssan mokki ekkides.
42019007	He wode heen izara diza asay hessa beyidi “Nagarancha asa keeththan imato maana gees” giidi wurikka ba giddon zuuzumettida.
42019008	Gido attin Zekkiyoossi eqqidi “Godo! Tani taas diza miishe ubbafe bagga shaakada manqotas immana; tani oonappekka wordora bonqa ekkidazi diikko oyddu kushe gujjada izaades immana” gides.
42019009	Yesusikka “Ha addezi Abrahaame naa gidida gish hach ha keeththas paxatethi yides” gides.
42019010	Hayssas gaasoyka Asa Nay haa yiday dhayidayssa koyanassinne ashshanassa.
42019011	Asay hayssa siyishin leemisora haasaya oykkides; gaasoyka izi Yerusalame gakkanaas matida gishshinne asatas Xoossa Kawoteth qoncana haniza misatida gishassa.
42019012	Hessa gish “Issi kawo nay ba kawoteththa shuumeteth ekki yaanas haaho biitta bides.
42019013	Ba ashkarata giddofe tammata xeygidi tammu minane istas immidi ‘Ta simmada yaana gakkanaas hayssa miishan zal7ite’ gides.
42019014	“He dere asati qasse iza ixida gish ‘Hayssi addezi nu bolla kawotana mala koyokko’ giidi as iza geedora kiita aaththi yeddida.
42019015	“Gido attin ha kawo naazi kawo gididi guye ba dere simmides. Kase bishe tammu minane immida tammu ashkarati izi immida biran zal7idi ay keena tirfisidakkonne eranas ista xeygides.
42019016	“Istafe koyroy shiiqidi ‘Godo! Ne taas immida tammu minaney hara tammu yelides’ gides.
42019017	“Godazikka iza ‘Ne ammanettida ashkara; lo7o ooththadasa. Ne guutha miishan amanettida gish tammu katamata ne haarana mala nees immadis’ gides.
42019018	“Nam7anthozikka izakko shiiqidi ‘Godo! Ne taas immida minaneppe hara ichashu minaney wodhdhides’ gides.
42019019	“Iza godazi izas zaaridi ‘Neni ayssana mala tammu katamati nees imettida’ gides.
42019020	“Qasseka hanko oosanchay shiiqidi ‘Godo! Neni woothontasoppe ekkizadde; zerontasoppe maxizadenne menxe iita as gidida gish ta nees babbada curqan xaaxa woththida ne minaneyo hey ekka’ gides.
42019022	“Iza godazi zaaridi izas ‘Haysso iita oosanchazo! Ta ne qaalan nena zaara pirdays. Tani wothontasoppe ekkizaddenne zerontasoppe maxiza menxe iita as gididayssa eraasashin tani ta miisha yelora ekkana mala he miishan ooththana asatas aazas immabeekii?’ gides.
42019024	Iza “Godazikka heen eqqida asata ‘Iza kusheppe minaneza ekkidinne tammu minaney dizayssas immite’ gides.
42019025	“Istika zaaridi ‘Godo! Izas tammu minaney deessikko’ gida.
42019026	“Izikka zaaridi ‘Dizades ubbas haray gujjettana; bayndades kase dizayssi izappe ekettichana. Gido attin tani ista bolla kawotonta mala koydayta hayta ta morketa taakko haa ehidi ta sinthan shukite’ ” gides.
42019028	Hessa haasayi simmidi Yesusi Yerusalame kezanas istafe sinthati bides.
42019029	Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bolla diza Betefaagenne Bitaaniya geetettiza katamatako matida wode bana kaallizaytappe nam7ata “Heeni inte sinthan diza qeeri katamayo biite; biidi katamayo inte gelishin oonikka togi eronta issi qasheti diza Hare gutte inte demmenna; iza birshidi haa taas ekki yiite; intena oonikka ‘Aazas birshetii?’ giidi oychikko ‘Godas koshshees gite’ ” gi kiittides.
42019032	Kiitetidaytikka biidi izi istas yootida mala hare gutteza demmida.
42019033	Isti gutteza birshin gutteza godati beyidi “Aazas birshettii?” giidi oychida.
42019034	Istika “Godas koshshees” gida.
42019035	Hare gutteza Yesusakko ehidi ba may7o wursi gutteza bolla yeggidi Yesusa Hare gutteza togisida.
42019036	Asay wurikka ba afala Yesusi biza oge bolla micides.
42019037	Dabrazayte zuma bollara duge woththiza ogezakko matida wode qooday baynda derey ba beyida malata gish wurikka ufayssara ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Goda sunthan yiza kawoy anjettidayssa; saroy salon bonchoy saloppe bolla salon gido” gides.
42019039	Deretappe issi issi Farsaaweeti Yesusa “Astamaare! Ha nena kaalliza asay gizayssa goonta mala hanqa” gides.
42019040	Izikka istas zaaridi “Hayti co7u gidakkonne shuchchatikka waassana” gides.
42019041	Yesusi Yerusalame matishe katamayo beyidi izis yeekkides. “Nees saro gidizaz hachchi ne eridakko aaze dizay? Ha7i ne ayfeppe qotettida gish ne morketi heera haara nena giddoththidi un7ethana wodey yaana.
42019044	Nenanne ne gibbe giddon nenara diza ne nayta wursi biitta kessana. Shuchchakka shuchcha bollafe laalonta aggettenna. Hessi wurikka Xoossi nena koyishin neni eronta aggida gishassa” gides.
42019045	Hessafe kaallidi Yesusi Xoossa Keeththe gelidi Xoossa Keeththa giddon zal7izayta kessides.
42019046	Qasseka “Ta keeththay Woosa Keeththa gidana geetettidi xaafettides; inten gidikko pangay diza gongolo histideta” gides.
42019047	Wontin wontin Xoossa Keeththan izi tamarisishin Xaafetinne dere halaqati iza wodhanas koyda.
42019048	Gido attin derey wurikka izara oyketidi izi tamarsizayssa kaalliza gish ooththanazi istas kirqi gides.
42020001	Issi gallas Yesusi asaa Xoossa Keeththan tamarsishinne Mishiraachcho qaala sabakishin Qeese halaqati Xaafetinne dere Cimati shiiqettidi izakko yida.
42020002	“Hayssa ne ooththizay oona shenenee? Nees shene immiday oonee?” giidi iza oychida.
42020003	Izikka istas “Takka intena issi oysho oychays; ane taas zaarite.
42020004	Yohannisa xinqatay saloppeyee? Asappee?” gides.
42020005	Istika ba giddon issoy issara “Nu ‘Yohannisa xinqatay saloppe’ giikko izi nuna ‘Histin aazas ammanibeekketii?’ gaana.
42020006	‘Asappe’ giikko asay wuri Yohannisi nabe gididayssa ammaniza gish nuna shuchchara caddana” gi zorettida.
42020007	Hessa gish “Izi awappekkonne nu erokko” giidi zaarida.
42020008	Yesusikka histikko “Takka aaza wolqan ooththizakkonne intes yootikke” gides.
42020009	Qasseka Yesusi asaas leemisora “Issadey woyne mith tokkides; gade goyizaytas kira immidinne hara dere biidi heen gam7ides.
42020010	Kaxiza bone wode kathafe ekki yaana mala ba ashkaratappe issade gadeza goyda asatakko yeddin gadaa goyizayti kiita bidayssa qoxidi mela kushe yeddida.
42020011	Kaalethidikka hara ashkara yeddin goshshanchati ha7ikka oykki qoxidinne kawushshidi mela yeddida.
42020012	Ha7ikka kaaleththidi heedzdzantho ashkara yeddin goshshanchati izakka qoxerethi madunthidi gede kare kessi yeggida.
42020013	“Woyne mitha goday ‘Ha7i ay ooththoo? Oone erizay ta keeha siiqiza ta naaza yeddidakko iza bonchandettoshaa?’ gides.
42020014	“Gido attin biitta goyizayti naaza beyida mala ba giddon ‘Hayssi iza laattana naaza gidennee? Haa yiite iza wodhidi biitta laattoos’ giidi zoretida.
42020015	Woyine mitha tokkidasoppe gede kare kessidi naaza wodhida. Histikko ha7i woyne mitha goday ha asata wostanee?
42020016	Yiidinne he goshshanchata dhayssana; woyne mitha tokkizasoza haratas immana” gides. Dereyka hessa izi gidayssa siydi “Hayssa malay hanoppo” gides.
42020017	Yesusikka “Istako xeelidi ‘Histin shuchchan keeththe keexiza asati leqqi aggida shuchchay keeththas waanna hu7e gidana” geetettidi xaafettida leemisozas birsheththay aazee?’ gides.
42020018	Ha shuchcha bolla kundiday wuri shuchchan qoxettana; shuchchaykka iza bolla wodhdhidadey wurikka liiqana” gides.
42020019	Xaafetinne Qeeseta halaqati hessi leemisozi ista bolla haasayettidayssa eridi heerakka iza oykkanas koyda shin derezas babbida.
42020020	Yesusa wolqara haarizaytas aaththi immanas iza duunappe keziza bala qaala demmidi oykkanas kaalli kaalli naagidanne xillo asa misatidi iza kaalli iza duunappe yo7o naagiza asata izakko yeddida.
42020021	Iza duunappe yo7o koyiza asati Yesusa “Astamare! Neni tuma haasayizayssanne tuma tamarsizayssa qasseka Xoossa oge ne tumu tamarsizayssanne oonakka shaaka maadontayssa nu eroos.
42020022	Gido attin Qeesares giira giiranas bessizee? Bessennee?” giidi oychida.
42020023	Izikka istas diza gene qofa eridi,
42020024	“Ane issi dinare tana bessite, hayssi iza bolla diza medhazinne Xaafetoyssi oonayssee?” gides. Istika “Qeesareyssa” gida.
42020025	Izikka zaaridi istas “Qeesareyssa Qeesares, Xoossayssa Xoossas immite” gides.
42020026	Hessa gish izi haasayida qaalappe ekkidi asa sinthan iza qaxanas dandaybeetenna; izi immida qaalan malalettidi co7u gida.
42020027	Hayqqidayta denthi baawa giza Saduqaawetappe issi issi asati Yesusakko yiidi oysho shiishida.
42020028	“Godo! ‘Issadey macho ekkidi naa yelonta hayqqikko he hayqqidayssa macheyo iza ishay ekkidi ba isha laattana naa izas yelo’ giidi Musey nuus xaafides.
42020029	Histin laapun ishati deettes shin istafe bayray machidi naa yelonta hayqqides.
42020030	Iza kaalozikka izatho hayqqides;
42020031	heedzdzanthozikka izo ekkidees; laapunati wurikka he macasayo ekkidi wurikka naa yelonta hayqqida.
42020032	Wursethan macasaya hayqqadus.
42020033	Laapunatikka ha macasayo ekkida shin ha macasaya wursethan hayqqidayti dendiza wode iza awayssa macho gidanee?”
42020034	Yesusi istas “Ha dere nayti geleettessinne ekkettes.
42020035	Buro yaana alamen hayqqidayta dentha demmanas bessizayti gidikko gelettenanne ekkettenna.
42020036	Isti Kiitanchata mala gidana gish hessafe guye hayqqettenanne hayqoppe dentha nayta gidida gish isti Xoossa nayta.
42020037	Musey qeeri wora gish xaafettida taarikezan Goda ‘Abrahaame Xoossa, Yisaaqa Xoossa Yaqoobe Xoossa’ guussan hayqqidayti dendanayssa bessees.
42020038	Wurikka izas de7oy diza gish izi paxata Xoossafe attin hayqqethata Xoosse gidenna” gides.
42020039	Issi issi xaafeti “Astamare! Lo7o gadasa” gida.
42020040	Hessafe guye ay asikka iza oychanas xaalibeenna.
42020041	Hessafe guye Yesusi “Asay Masihe waanidi izi Dawute naa gizee?
42020042	Gaasoyka Dawutey ba xaafida mazamure maxaafatan ‘Ta ne morketa ne toho gars aaththana gakkanaas Goday ta Goda ne ta ushachan utta’ waanidi gidee?
42020044	Histikko Dawutey iza ‘Goda’ gi xeygishe waani izas naa gidanee?” gides.
42020045	Derey wuri siyishin bana kaallizaytas
42020046	“Gooshettiza aduussa qamse may7idi yuushshe dosizaytappenne giyay dizason saroketeth koyizaytappenne Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan dhoqa oydenne diggisason bonchoso koyizaytappe xaafetappe naagettite.
42020047	Haytanti am7eta keeththa kallosizayta. Asi ista beyana mala woossa aduussetes; heytanta iita pirday naages” gides.
42021001	Yesusi dhoqu gi xeellishin dure asati Xoossa Keeththen muxuwata izan shiishshizayssa giddon muxuwata yeggishin beydes.
42021002	Qasseka issi am7o dizaara nam7u sikina gidiza nam7u xarqimala he muxuwata izan shiishshizayssan yegishin xeelidi,
42021003	“Ta intes tumu gays; hanna am7eya ubba asappe bollara aadhdheth immadus gides.
42021004	Hayti asati immiday baas diza tirpafe gidishin iza gidikko baas baynda wolqafe baas dizaronne ba duussas koshshizaro wursa yeggadus” gides.
42021005	Iza kaallizaytappe issi issi asati Xoossa Keeththay lo7o shuchchaninne asay immida imotan ay mala lo7i keexettidakko giidi ba giddon haasayettishin Yesusi siydi “Hayssi inte beyizayssi wuri laalettonta shuchchi shuchcha bolla keelettida mala attonta wodey yaana” gides.
42021007	Istika iza “Astamaare! Hayssi wuri ayde hananee? Qasse hayssi hananayssas malatay aazee?” giidi oychida.
42021008	Izikka istas “Inte balettonta mala naagettite; daroti bana ‘Ta Kirstoosakko! Wodeykka matides’ gishe ta sunthara yaana shin inte ista kaallofte.
42021009	Ola gishshinne dere makalatetha gish siyiza wode daggamofte. Hessi wuri kasetidi hananas bessees; wursethi gakkides; gido attin heerakka hanenna” gides.
42021010	Qasse “Derey dere bolla, kawoy kawo bolla dendana.
42021011	Biittay wolqama qaath qaaxana; koshaynne boshay dumma dummason hanana; daro babissizazinne saloppe gita malatay beettanna.
42021012	“Hessi wuri hananappe kasetidi asay intena oykkananne gooddana; Ayhuda Woosa Keeththinne qasho keeththe gelthana; kawota sinthinne daannata sinth shiishana. Hessi wuri ta suntha gish inte bolla gakkana.
42021013	Hessi wurikka markattanas lo7o qaada gidana.
42021014	Hessa gish nuna oychizaytas nu ay zaarinoo? giidi kasetidi hirgonta mala hayssa woznan woththite.
42021015	Inte morketappe oonikka intenara eqettanassinne baleththanas dandayonta qaalanne cincateth ta intes immana.
42021016	Intena yelidaytinne inte ishati, inte dabbotinne inte laggeti wuri intena aaththi immana; intefe baggata wodhana.
42021017	Ta suntha gish ubba asa achchan inte ixettana.
42021018	Gido attin inte hu7e binanatappe issinaka dhayukku.
42021019	Inte minni eqqikko inte shempo inte ashshana.
42021020	“Ola asay Yerusalame giddoththishin beykko izis dhayiza wodey matidayssa erite.
42021021	He wode Yuhudan dizayti pude zuma bolla gangetto; kataman dizaytikka katamappe kezite; dere giddon dizaytikka he katamayo geloppetto.
42021022	Xaafettidays wuri polettanas hanna halo kessiza wode.
42021023	Biitta bolla gita metoy hanana; hayssa dereza bolla hanqoy yaana; hessa gish he wode qanthara diza macasatassinne dhanthiza aayetas aayye ana!
