42021024	Bagga asay mashshan hayqqana; ba dereppe hara dere di7ettana; Yerusalameykka Xoosse eronta dereta wodey polettana gakkanaas, Xoosse eronta asatan yedhetidaro gidana.
42021025	“Awa arshe bolla, agina bollanne xoolinte bolla malatay beettana; Abbafenne abba dambala giirissafe dendidayssan biitta bolla diza derey hirgananne metottettana.
42021026	Salo wolqamati qaaxiza gish asay biitta bolla aaze hananesha guussaninne naagon xalla daaburana.
42021027	He wode Asa Nay wolqara, gita bonchoranne shaarara yishin beyana.
42021028	Inteka hayti ha ta gidayti poleteth oykkishin intes atetha wodey matida gish siti gi eqqite; inte ayfe pude dhoqu histite” gides.
42021029	Kaalethidi “Balase mithinne hara mithata wursi xeellite; he mithati haythe kessishin inte beyiza wode boney matidayssa inte ereeta.
42021031	Hessathokka haytanti geetettidayti polettishin inte beyiza wode Xoossa Kawotethi inteko matidayssa erite.
42021032	“Ta intes tumu gays; hayssi wuri polettana gakkanaas ha yelettay aadhdhenna.
42021033	Saloynne sa7ay aadhdhana shin ta qaalay aadhdhenna.
42021034	“Histikko wogay baynda duussan, daro ushshaninne duussas hirgan inte woznay daaburopo; hessa ooththonta ixikko he gallassay inte qopponta narxa mala inte bolla gakkonta mala naagettite.
42021035	Hayssi biitta bollan diza asa ubba bolla gakkana.
42021036	Hessa gish buro yaanayssafe inte kessi ekkana malanne Asa Naa sinthan eqqanas dandayana mala ubba gallas minnidi woossite” gides.
42021037	Yesusi gallas gallas Xoossa Keeththan tamarsi tamarsidi omars omars Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bolla kezi kezi aqqees.
42021038	Asay wurikka izappe siyanas maalado wontara Yesusakko Xoossa Keeththe yees.
42022001	He wode Paaziga geetettiza ukethara bonchettiza ba7aaley mati uttides.
42022002	Qeeseta halaqatinne Xaafeti hanko dere asaas babbiza gish Yesusa dhayssana oge koyda.
42022003	Yesusa kaalliza tammanne nam7atappe Asqoroonto dere asa Yuhuda geetettizayssan Xala7ey gelides.
42022004	Yuhudaykka Qeeseta halaqatakkonne Xoossa Keeththa alafetakko biidi istas Yesusa wost aaththi immanakkonne istara haasayettides.
42022005	Istika hessan ufayettidi miishe immanas izara giigida.
42022006	Yuhudaykka ista qofa dossides; Yesusa istas asi beyonta aaththi immanas inje wode naagishin Paaziga dorsa shukidi ukethara bonchiza ba7aale gallas gakkides.
42022008	Yesusikka bana kaallizayta “Paaziga kawo maanas biidi nuus giigissite” giidi Phexroosanne Yohannisa kiittides.
42022009	Istika “Nu awan giigissana mala koyay?” gida.
42022010	Izikka zaaridi “Inte gede Yerusalame katama gelishin haaththa oto tookkida asi intena demmenna; inteka izi biidi geliza keeththe gakkanaas iza kaallite.
42022011	Keeththadezas ‘Astamarey tana kaallizaytara Paaziga kawo maanas imatha keeththi awan dizee?’ gees giite.
42022012	Izikka imathas giigettida aahoso intena bessana; izi bessiza soon giigissite” gides.
42022013	Istika biidi Yesusi gida mala keeththa demmidi Paaziga heen giigissida.
42022014	Wodey gakkida mala Yesusi Hawaaretara quma maaddan uttidi “Ta waaye beyanappe kasetada hayssa Paaziga intenara issife maanas keehi amottadis.
42022016	Ta intes tumu gays; Xoossa Kawoteththan hayssa birsheththi polettana gakkanaas hayssa Paaziga nam7antho ta intenara miikke” gides.
42022017	Woyneppe oosettida ushsha xu7ara ekkidinne Xoossa galati simmidi “Heyte; wurikka izappe uyte” giidi istas immides.
42022018	“Ta intes tumu gays; hayssafe guye Xoossa Kawotethi yaana gakkanaas nam7antho ha woyne ushshafe uyikke” gides.
42022019	Uketha ekkidi Xoossa galatides. Izappe istas menthi immidi “Hayssi inte gish imettana ta asho leemiso gidiza gish hayssa ubba wode tana qoppanas ooththite” gides.
42022020	Izathoka kawoppe guye ushsha xu7a denthidi “Hayssi ushshay inte gish ta suuthan hanana oorath caaqo woga.
42022021	“Gido attin tana aaththi immanade kushey ta kushera issife maaddan dees.
42022022	Asa Nay kasetidi iza gish hananayssi wuri uttida mala izi baana; gido attin iza aaththi immizades aayye-ana” gides.
42022023	Istika hessa ooththanay oonee? giidi ba giddon issoy issa oysherethida.
42022024	Qasseka “Ooni oonappe aadhdhizakkonne” giidi ba giddon issoy issara palamettida.
42022025	Yesusikka ista “Dere haariza kawoti ba dere asa wolqara haarettessinne istika lo7o kawota geetettidi xeygettetes.
42022026	“Inte gidikko hessatho hanoppite; intefe gita gididadey woykko ta ooppekka aadhdhays giza asi ubbafe qeeri naa mala gido; haarizaddey haarettizade mala gido.
42022027	Quma eqqidi mizidadefenne uttidi mizadefe ooni aadhdhizee? Uttidi mizade gidennee? Tani qasse inte giddon ashkara mala days.
42022028	“Inten gidikko taappe shaaketonta ta waayishin ta matan eqqidayta.
42022029	Ta Aaway tana kawothidayssa mala tanikka ta kawoteththan intena kawoththana.
42022030	Hessika ta kawoteththan ta maaddafe inte maana malanne uyana mala. Qasseka ta kawoteththa algan uttidi tammanne nam7u Isra7eele nayta bolla pirdanassa” gides.
42022031	Qasseka Yesusi Simoona xeygidi “Simoona! Xala7ey intena giste mala suraganas woossides.
42022032	Gido attin tani neeppe ammanoy dhayonta mala ne gish Xoossa woossadis; nekka simmida wode ne ishata minthetha” gides.
42022033	Simoonikka zaaridi “Godo! Ta nenara qashettanassinne hayqqanas giiga uttadis” gides.
42022034	Yesusikka zaaridi “Phexroosa hach kuttoy issito waassanas ‘Ta iza erikke’ gaada heedzdzuto ne tana kaadana” gides.
42022035	Qasseka Yesusi ista “Ta intena kase caammay, korojoynne qaraxite baynda kiittida wode intes aazi paccidee?” giidi oychides. Istika “Aykkoykka paccibenna” gida.
42022036	Izikka zaaridi “Ha7i gidikko korojokka qaraxiteyka dizadey oykko; giththa mashshay bayndadey ba may7o bayzidi shamo.
42022037	Ta intes tuma gays ‘Makalatara izi issife taybettides’ geetetti kase xaafettida qaalay ta bolla polettana bessees; ta gish xaafettidayssas poloy tumappe gakkides” gides.
42022038	Iza kaallizayti qasse “Godo! Hekko nam7u giththa mashshati hayssan deettes” gida. Izikka iza gish “Hayssi gidana” gides.
42022039	Kase izas lose gidida mala pude Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bolla kezi bides. Iza kaallizaytikka iza kaalli bida.
42022040	Hee gakkida mala “Inte paacen gelonta mala woossite” gides.
42022041	Yesusi bana kaallizaytappe asi shuch olidi gaththanaso mala haakki biidi gulbati woossides.
42022042	“Ta Aawawu! Ne shene gidikko hanno metoyo taappe digga; gido attin ne sheney hanoppe attin ta sheney hanoppo” giidi woossides.
42022043	Saloppe Kiitanchay qoncidi Yesusa minthethides.
42022044	Izikka keehi xuugettidi woossishin iza asatethafe caway suutha mala gukkides.
42022045	Woosappe dendidi bana kaallizaytakko bides. Istika izas mishetidi qoppishin dhiskoy efidashe Yesusi istako yiidi,
42022046	“Ays dhisikeetii? Inte paacen gelonta mala ha7i dendidi woossite” gides.
42022047	Izi buro haasayan dishin Yesusa kaallizaytappe issoy Yuhuda geetettizayssi banara daro asa kaalethi ekki yiidi Yesusa yeeranas izakko shiiqides.
42022048	Gido attin Yesusi iza “Yuhuda! Tana Asa Naa yeeron aaththa immay?” gides.
42022049	Yesusa yuuyi aadhdhi diza asay hanoza lo7ethi xeelidi “Godo! Haytanta mashshara buththinoo?” gida.
42022050	Istafe issoy Qeeseta alafe ashkara ushacha haythe mashshara qanxides.
42022051	Yesusi ista “Inte ha7i taas aggite!” giidi ashkara haytha bochchidi pathides.
42022052	Qasseka iza oykkana yida Qeeseta halaqata Xoossa Keeththa alafetanne cimata “Panga oykkiza asa mala giththa mashshanne durqa ekkidi yidetii?
42022053	Gallas gallas ta intenara Xoossa Keeththan dishin ta bolla kushe woththibeekketa; hayssi dhumay kawotida inte wode” gides.
42022054	Hessafe guye Yesusa oykki ekkidi Qeeseta halaqaso gelida; Phexroosikka Yesusa hahora kaallides.
42022055	Asay Qeeseta halaqa gaathan tama eethidi ho7ishe issi bolla uttidashe Phexroosikka istara issife uttides.
42022056	Issi garadeya Phexroosi tama ho7izaytara uttidayssa beyadanne tishshi ooththa xeellada “Hayssi addezikka Yesusara dees!” gadus.
42022057	Phexroosikka “Hanne macasaye! Ta iza erikke” giidi kadides.
42022058	Guuth gam7ishin hara issadey iza beyidi “Nekka izara dizaytappe issa gidikii?” gides. Phexroosikka “Haysso tani istara diikke!” gides.
42022059	Issi saate mala gam7ishin hara asi qasseka “Galila as gidiza gish sidhey baynda hayssi izara dees” gides.
42022060	Phexroosikka qasse “Haysso ne gizadde ta erikke!” gides. Hinno gi kessonta dishin kuttoy waassides.
42022061	Godayka Phexroosakko yishe xeellin Phexroosi “Hach kuttoy waassanas ne tana heedzdzuto kaadana” giidi Goday kase yooto qaalay iza woznan karp gides.
42022062	Phexroosikka kare kezidi hiqqimidi yeekkides.
42022063	Yesusa qachchidi naagiza asatikka iza bolla qidhi qidhi kaa7ishe shocerethida.
42022064	Iza ayfe goozidi “Ne nabe gidikko nena shociday oonakkone ane era!” giidi oychida.
42022065	Hara daro cashsha qaalara kawushshida.
42022066	Gadey wontin dere Cimati, Qeeseta halaqatinne Muse woga tamarsizayti duulata shiiqidi Yesusa duulatakko shiishida.
42022067	Istika Yesusa “Ne Kirstoosee? Ane nuus yoota” gida. Yesusikka “Ta intes yootidakkokka tana ammanekketa.
42022068	Ta intena oychidakko taas zaarekketa.
42022069	Gido attin ha7ippe doommidi Asa Nay wolqama Xoossa ushachan uttana” gides.
42022070	He wode wurikka “Histin ne Xoossa Naa?” giidi oychida. Izikka “Ta Xoossa Naa gididayssa inteka geeta” gides.
42022071	Istika “Hekko izi ba duunara markatishin nu haythara siydos; hayssafe hara marka aazas koshshizee?” gida.
42023001	Heen shiiqida asay wuri dendidi Yesusa Philaxoosakko ekki bides.
42023002	“Ays nu asay Qeesares giira giironta mala baleththishenne bana ‘Tani Kirstoosi kawo’ giidi baleththishin hayssa addeza demmidos” giidi mootida.
42023003	Philaxoosikka Yesusa “Neni Ayhudata kawoo?” giidi oychides. Yesusikka zaaridi “Ne gida mala” gides.
42023004	Philaxoosikka Qeeseta halaqatassinne shiiqida asas “Hayssa addeza bolla iza mootisiza iita yo7o demmabekke” gides.
42023005	Isti zaaridi “Hayssi addezi Galilappe hayssa gakkanaas kumeththa Yuhuda waayiso bolla dees” giidi minthi yootida.
42023006	Philaxoosi asay gizayssa siydi “Yesusi Galila asakkone giidi lo7ethi eranas” oychides.
42023007	Yesusi Herdoosa Kawoteththa giddon dizayssa shaakki eridi he wode Herdoossi Yerusalamen diza gish izakko Yesusa yeddides.
42023008	Herdoossika kase Yesusa beyanas daro koyishe diza gish Yesusa beyidi keehi ufaydes. Iza gish kase siydi izi ooththishin beyanas koydi ufayettides.
42023009	Daro oyshataka iza oysherechides shin Yesusi iza oysha zaaribenna.
42023010	Qeese halaqatinne Xaafeti heen iza matan eqqidi keehi wordo mooto mootida.
42023011	Herdoosikka ba wotadaratara issife iza kadhida; kawo may7o mayzidi gede Philaxoosakko zaari yeddides.
42023012	Herdoossinne Philaxoosi kase ba giddon issoy issara oosha shin he gallas giigida.
42023013	Philaxoosi Qeeseta halaqatara, dere daannataranne dere asa shiishshidi,
42023014	“Hayssi addezi asay wuri makalana mala dentheththes giidi inte taakko ehin ta qorn iza oythiza issi iita miishikka demmabekke.
42023015	Qasseka Herdoossi issi iita miishikka iza bolla demmonta aggida gish ha nuukko zaari yeddides. Ha7i inte beyiza mala iza hayqos gaththiza issi iita miishikka ooththibenna.
42023016	Hessa gish qaxayada ta iza yeddana” gides.
42023017	Izi hessa giday ista ba7aale gallas qashettida asappe issade birshiza wogay diza gishassa.
42023018	Derey wurikka issi bolla “Barbaane birshada hayssa addeza digga!” giidi waassides.
42023019	Barbaaney katama giddon asa makala yo7on dentheththidi as wodhi qashettida asa.
42023020	Philaxoosikka Yesusa birshanas koyda gish qasseka zaaridi oychides.
42023021	Asay zaaridi iza “Kaqqa! Kaqqa!” giidi waassides.
42023022	Philaxoosi heedzdzanthokka “Aazas kaqqoo? Hayssi addezi ay iita ooththidee? Tani iza hayqos gaththiza iita ooso iza bolla beyabeekke; hessa gish qaxayada ta iza birsha yeddana” gides.
42023023	Asaykka qaala dhoqu histidi Yesusi kaqqettana mala Philaxoosa keehi woossishe waassida.
42023024	Hessa gish Philaxoosi ista oyshoy polettana mala azazides.
42023025	Asa makalisidi shempo wodhdhida gish qashettidayssa birshana mala isti woossidade birshidi qasseka Yesusa isti dossida mala ooththeto giidi deraas aaththi immides.
42023026	Istika Yesusa oykkidi ekki bishin Qareena geetettiza katamappe issi Simoona geetettiza addey hahoppe yizayssa demmida Yesusi kaqqettana masqale koca izi tookkidi Yesusa kaallana mala wolqathida.
42023027	Daro derey ba tira icci icci yeekkiza macasati,
42023028	Yesusappe guyera iza kaallida. Yesusi istako simmi xeelidi “Inte Yerusalame macasay intessinne inte naytas yeekkite attin taas yeekkofte.
42023029	‘Sinthafe inte hekko makkara gidida macasati, yelonta ulotinne nay dhammonta dhanthati anjettidayta!’ gaana wodey sinthara yees.
42023030	He wode asay ‘Zumato! Nu bolla woddite; qeeri zumatikka nuna qottite!’ gaana.
42023031	Histin qaye mitha bolla hayssatho ooththidayti mela mitha bolla wostaneshaa?” gides.
42023032	Izara issife hayqqana mala hara nam7u iita ooththida asata izara efida.
42023033	Qaaraaniyo geetettizaso gaththidi kaqqida. Iita ooththidaytappe issa ushacha baggara issa hadirsa baggara kaqqida.
42023034	Yesusikka “Ta Aawawu! Hayti ba ooththizayssa eridi ooththonta gish istas atto ga!” gides. Istika iza may7oza saama yeggidi ba giddon gishetti ekkida.
42023035	Hessi hanishin asay wuri eqqi xeellides; daannatikka “Izi hara asa ashshides shin Xoossafe doorettida Kirstoosi iza gidikko ane ha7i bana asho” giidi qidhida.
42023036	Wotadaratikka shiiqidi woyneppe aggettida caala ushsha ushshidi iza qidhida.
42023037	“Neni Ayhuda kawo gidikkii? Ane ha7i nena ashsha” gida.
42023038	Iza hu7eppe bolla baggara masqale koca bolla “Hayssi Ayhudata kawo” giza qaala xaafi qaaphida.
42023039	Iita ooththidi kaqqettida asatappe issoy cashsha qaala Yesusa bolla qoqofides. “Ne Kirstoosa gidikii? Ane nenakka nunakka ashsha” gides.
42023040	Iita oosidaytappe issoy “Neni nees bessiza pirda ekkashe Xoossas babbikkii?
42023041	Nuni nu ooththida iita oosos bessizayssa ekkoos; hayssi addezi gidikko issi iitakka ooththibenna” gides.
42023042	Yesusa “Neni ne kawoteththara yiza wode tana qoppa!” gides.
42023043	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ta nees tumu gays; hach ne tanara Gannaten daana” gides.
42023044	Hessa wode gadey seeta gallas shin biidi uddufun saate gakkanaas kumeththa biitta bolla dhumay dhumides.
42023045	Awa arshe poo7oy diggettides. Xoossa Keeththa magalashaykka dakkettidi nam7u kezides.
42023046	Yesusikka keehi waassidi “Ta aawawu! Tani ta shempo ne kushen immays” gida mala shempo kezides.
42023047	Mato halaqay hessa beyidi “Hayssi addezi tumappe xillo asakkoshin” giidi Xoossa galatides.
42023048	Hessa beyanas heen shiiqidi derey wuri he hanidayssa beyidi tira icci icidi simmides.
42023049	Gido attin Yesusa kase lo7ethi erizayti wuri qasseka Galilappera iza kaalliza macasati hessa xeellishe haakki eqqida.
42023050	Ayhudata duulata asappe issoy izikka Yoosefe geetettizayssi issi daro kiyanne xillo asa.
42023051	Izikka kase asay Yesusa bolla duulatishin he duulatan deenna; izikka issi Armatiyasa geetettiza Ayhudata katama asa shin Xoossa Kawotethi yaanayssa naagishe gam7ides.
42023052	Izikka Philaxoosakko biidi Yesusa aha baas immana mala Philaxoosa woossides.
42023053	Philaxoosi izas ero gin Yoosefey aha masqale kocappe woththida mala xaaxidi shuchchafe woocettida kase hara asi moogettonta duufon efidi woththides.
42023054	He gallassay asay Sambatas giigettiza gallas gidida gish Sambatay gelana hanees.
42023055	Galilappe dendidi Yesusara yida macasatikka Yoosefe kaalli biidi duufoza beyida. Yesusa aha wost woththidakkone beyida.
42023056	Heeppe simmidi shittonne tiyiza miish giigissida. Wogay giza mala Sambata gallas shempida.
42024001	Wogga wonta maaladora macasati ba giigissida shittoza ekkidi Yesusa woththida duufozakko bida.
42024002	Shuchchaykka duufoza duunappe genderidi dizayssa beyida.
42024003	Gido attin giddo gelidi Yesusa aha demmonta aggida gish,
42024004	istas hanzaazi dhayin isti tollu gidashe qopponta xoliqettiza may7o may7ida nam7u asati ista achchan eqqida.
42024005	Macasatikka keehi babbidi duge biitta xeellishin “He asati paxidi dendidayssa hayqqethata giddon ays koyetii?
42024006	Izi dendides! Haan baawa. Qasseka izi Galilan dishe intes kase ay gidakkonne ane qopite.
42024007	Asa Nay nagaranchata kushen aadhdhi imettanassinne kaqettanas, hayqoppeka heedzdzantho gallas dendanas bessees” giidi yooti woththides.
42024008	Macasatikka he wode kase izi gida qaala haasayida.
42024009	Macasati duufosoppe simmidi hessa wursi Yesusa kaalliza tammanne issinetassinne haratas yootida.
42024010	Hessaka Hawaaretas yootiday Magdale gizasoppe yida Maaramonne Yohaano geetettizarira Yaqoobe Maaramonne istara issife diza hara macasata.
42024011	Gido attin istas macasati yootidayssi agumo misatin ammanibeetenna.
42024012	Gido attin Phexroosi wothan Yesusa duufokko gakkidinne hokkidi duufo giddo xeellishin iza aha xaaxida may7oy xalla dizayssa beyidi keehi malalettishe baso simmides.
42024013	He gallas iza kaallizaytappe nam7ati Yerusalameppe tammanne issi kilometire haakkiza Emahoose geetettiza katama beettes.
42024014	Bishe isti he wode hanida Yesusa hayqo gish ba giddon haasayetettes.
42024015	Isti haasayettishin Yesusi istako shiiqidi istara issife bishin,
42024016	isti iza eronta mala ista ayfey oykettides.
42024017	Yesusi ista “Hayssi oge hamuttishe inte inte giddon haasayettizayssi aazee?” gides. Istika dagamara modhettishe siti gi eqqagida.
42024018	Ista giddofe issoy Qaliyoopha geetettizayssi zaaridi “Ha mata gallassatan Yerusalamen hanidayssa eronta imatha asi nena xallaa?” gides.
42024019	Izikka istas zaaridi “Aazi hanidee?” giin isti qasse zaaridi ‘Xoossa sinthaninne ubba asa sinthan oosoninne qaalan mino nabe gidida Naazirete Yesusa gish’ gida.
42024020	Izakka Qeeseta halaqatinne daannati hayqo pirdas aaththi immidanne kaqqida.
42024021	Nuni gidikko “Isra7eele woznay iza’ giidi ufayettidosishin harappeka hessi hanin qasse hach heedzdzantho gallassa.
42024022	Qasse nu giddofe issi issi macasati nuna keehi malalisida; istika maalado wontara gede iza duufokko biidi,
42024023	iza ahay beettonta ixin yiidi izi paxa dizayssa istas yootin Kiitanchata beyidayssa nuus yootida.
42024024	Nuupekka issi issi asi iza duufokko biidi macasati gida mala beyida attin Yesusa demmibeetenna” gida.
42024025	Izikka istas “Inte woznan wothontayto! Inte woznay kase nabeti yootidayssa ammananappe takkidayto!
42024026	Xoossafe kiitettidayssi ha metoza ekkanassinne gede ba bonchoso gelanas bessennee?’ gides.
42024027	Museppenne nabetappe doommidi Geeshsha Maxaafatan iza gish xaafettidayssa istas lo7eth yootides.
42024028	Isti ba bizaso matida wode Yesusi aadhdhi biza misatides.
42024029	Istika qasse “Gadey qammiza gish nunara aqa” giidi iza keehi woossin istara aqanas gelides.
42024030	Istara issife maaddan uttidi uketh ba kushen oykkidi istas menthi menthi immides.
42024031	Hessa wode ista ayfey doyettin iza gididayssa erida; izikka ista ayfeppe geemides.
42024032	Istika “Nu yishe oge bolla dishin nuna haasayisidi Geeshsha Maxaafataka qoncisidi nuus gelanashe yootin nu woznay tama mala xuugettibenee?” giidi issoy issara haasayettida
42024033	Heerakka dendidi Yerusalame simmi bida. Tammanne issinetinne istara issife dizaytikka issi bolla shiiqi dizayta demmida.
42024034	Istika ba giddon issoy issas “Goday tumu dendides! Simoonaska beettides” gida.
42024035	Iza kaallizaytappe nam7ati oge bolla hanidayssanne Yesusi uketha menthi menthi immida wode isti wost eridakko istas yootida.
42024036	Hessa gish isti ba giddon haasayettishin Yesusi ista giddon eqqidi “Saroy intes gido!” gides.
42024037	Gido attin isti moytile beyida misatin keehi daggamida.
42024038	Izikka istas “Aazas daro qoppetii? Aazas inte woznara sidheetii?
42024039	Ta kushetanne ta tohota haa xeellite tanakko; qasseka tana oykki beyite; tana inte beyizayssa mala moytiles ashoynne meqethi deenna” gides.
42024040	Hessa gi simmidi ba tohotanne ba kusheta ista bessides.
42024041	Istika ufayssa daroppenne malaletethafe dendidayssan buro ammanonta dishin Yesusi ‘Hessan aykko mizazi dizee?” giidi ista oychides.
42024042	Istika mole xiixa issi bars izas immida.
42024043	Izikka ekkidi ista sinthan mides.
42024044	Izikka “Intenara ta diza wode ‘Muse wogan nabetaninne Mazamure Maxaafatan ta gish xaafettidayssi wurikka polettanas bessees’ gaada ta intes yootida ta qaalay hayssakko” gides.
42024045	He wode Geeshsha Maxaafata isti erana mala wozna istas doyides.
42024046	Istaska “Kirstoosi waaye beyana; heedzdzantho gallas hayqoppe dendana geetettidi xaafettides.
42024047	Yerusalameppe doommidi ubba deres nagarappe simoynne maarotethi iza sunthan yootettana.
42024048	Inteka hayssas markata.
42024049	Takka ta Aaway immida ufayssa intes yeddana; inte qasse wolqa bollafe may7ana gakkanaas Yerusalame kataman takkite” gides.
42024050	Hessafe guye ista ekkidi Bitaaniya geetettizaso kezides. Ba kushetaka denthidi ista anjides.
42024051	Ista anjishe istafe shaakattidi pude salo bides.
42024052	Istika izas hokki goynnida; keehi ufayettishe Yerusalame simmida.
42024053	Ubba wode Xoossa Keeththan Xoossa galatishe gam7ida.
43001001	Qaalay kase koyro dees. Qaalaykka Xoossa achchan dees. He qaalaykka Xoossa.
43001002	Izi koyro Xoossa achchan dees.
43001003	Medhetethi wuri izan medhettides. Medhettidazan izi baynda medhettiday issinaka duukku.
43001004	De7oy izan dawus. Hanna de7oya asas poo7o.
43001005	Poo7oy dhuman poo7ises. Dhumay poo7o mulekka xoonenna.
43001006	Xoossafe kiitettida Yohannisa geetettiza issadey dees.
43001007	Iza markatethan asi wuri ammanana mala Poo7os marka gidi yides.
43001008	Izi poo7o gish markattana yides attin izi ba hu7es poo7o gidenna.
43001009	Asa ubbas poo7o immiza tumu poo7oy hayssa ha alamezan Yesusan dees.
43001010	Qaalaykka kase alamen dees. Alameyka medhettiday izanna. Gido attin alamey iza eribenna.
43001011	Izi ba baggatakko yiin iza baggati iza ekkibeetenna.
43001012	Gido attin iza ekkidayti iza sunthan ammanidayti isti Xoossa nayta gidana mala maata istas immides.
43001013	Istika Xoossa nayta gididay Xoossafe yelettida gish attin asa zerethafe hessika asa wogan woykko asho shenen gidenna.
43001014	Qaalaykka as gidides. Xoossa kiyatethaninne tuman kumidi nunan aqides; issi naas aawa matan diza boncho misatiza iza boncho nu beydos.
43001015	Yohannisikka “Taappe guyera yizayssi taappe aadhdhees. Gaasoyka izi taappe kasekka dees gaada ta intes yootidayssi hekko hayssi izakko!” gi markattides.
43001016	Iza kumeththa kiyatethan nu wuri kiyatetha bolla kiyateth ekkidos.
43001017	Wogay Muse baggara imettides; kiyatethinne tumay gidikko Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus yides.
43001018	Xoosse beyiday oonikka baawa. Gido attin Xoossa Aawa matan diza Xoossa Naa issoy xalala iza qoncisides.
43001019	Ayhudata daannati Yerusalameppe Qeesetanne Lewe nayta Yohannisakko kiittidi “Ne oonee?” giidi oychishin,
43001020	Yohannisi “Tani Kirstoosa gidikke” giidi geeshshi markattides attin markattanas ixibenna.
43001021	Istika “Histin ne oonee? Ne Elaasaa?” giidi oychida. Izikka “Gidikke” giidi istas zaarides. Istika “Izi yaana geetettida nabey nenee?” gida. Izikka “Akay tana gidikke” gides.
43001022	Isti qas “Histin ne oonee? Nuna kiittida asas nu yootana mala ne nena oona gay?” gida.
43001023	Izikka “Nabe Isayaassi yootida mala tani ‘Xoossa oge suurisite’ gishe bazzo biittan waassizade qaala giirisa” gides
43001024	Farsaaweetappe kiitettida issi issi asati
43001025	Hessa gish “Ne Xoossi kiittidade woykko buro yaana geetettida nabey nena gidonta gidikko histin aazas nuna xammaqay?” giidi iza oychida.
43001026	Yohannisikka istas “Ta haaththan xammaqays; gido attin inte erontaddey inte giddon eqqides.
43001027	Taappe guyera yaanayssi iza. Ta iza caamma qasho birshanas bessizade gidikke” gides.
43001028	Hayssi wuri haniday Yohannisi xammaqiza Yordanoose shaafappe he pinthan diza Bitaaniya geetettiza katamanna.
43001029	Wontetha gallas Yohannisi Yesusi baako yishin beyidi “Dere nagara biittafe diggana Xoossa dorsi hekko hayssich!
43001030	‘Taappe guyera yaanayssi izi taappe kasekka diza gish taappe aadhdhees’ gaada ta intes yootizay hayssich!
43001031	Takka ta baggara iza erabeekke shin gidikkokka izi Isra7eele deres qoncana mala ta haaththan xammaqashe yadis” gides.
43001032	Kaalethidikka Yohannisi hizgi markattides “Xillo Ayanay haraphe kafo misatdi saloppe wodhdhishininne iza bolla uttishin beyadis.
43001033	Ta ta baggara iza erike shin ta haaththan xammaqana mala tana kiittidadey ‘Xillo Ayanay iza bolla wodhdhi shempishin ne beyanaddey Xillo Ayanan meecanay iza’ giidi taas yootides.
43001034	Takka hessa beyadis. Hessa gish izi Xoossa naa gididayssa ta markatays” gides.
43001035	Wontetha gallas Yohannisi bana kaalliza nam7atara heen eqqides.
43001036	Yesusi iza achchara aadhdhishin Yohannisi beyidi “Xoossa dorsi hekko hayssich!” gides.
43001037	Yohannisa kaalliza nam7ati hessa siydi Yesusa kaallida.
43001038	Isti iza kaallishin Yesusi guye yuuy xeelidi “Ay kooyetii?” gides. Istika “Astamare! Ne duussasoy awaa?” gida.
43001039	Izikka ista “Ha yiidi beyte” gides. Hessa gish biidi izi awan dizaakko beyidanne he gallas izara issife pe7ida. Wodeykka gede tammu saateso bides.
43001040	Yohannisi yootida qaala siydi Yesusa kaallida nam7atappe issoy Simoona Phexroosa isha Indiraasa.
43001041	Indiraassi koyro ba isha Simoonakko biidinne “Xoossi kiittida Kirstoosa nu demmidos!” gides.
43001042	Hessafe guye Indiraassi Simoona Yesusakko ekki yides. Yesusikka iza tishshi histi xeelidi “Haysso! Ne Yoona naa Simoona; hayssafe guye ne Keefa geetettana.” Keefa gussi Phexroosa guussa woykko zaalla shuch guussa.
43001043	Wontetha gallas Yesusi Galila baanas koydes. Piliphoosakka demmidi “Tana kaalla” gides.
43001044	Piliphoosikka Indiraasa malanne Phexroosa mala Betesayda katama asa.
43001045	Piliphoosi Natina7eele demmidi “Musey woga maxaafan qasse nabetikka buroppe hananayssa yootiza ba maxaafatan iza gish xaafida addeza nu demmidos. Izikka Yoosefe naa Naazirete Yesusakko!” gides.
43001046	Natina7eeley qas “Naazireteppe lo7o miishi beetti erizee?” gi oychin Piliphoosi iza “Haa yaada beya” gides.
43001047	Natina7eeley Yesusa beyana yishin Yesusi beyidi iza “Hekko! Geney baynda tumu Isra7eele asa!” giidi iza gish yootides.
43001048	Natina7eeleykka zaaridi “Tana wosta eradii?” gi oychin Yesusikka “Piliphoosi nena xeeyganappe kase balase mitha garsan ne dishin ta nena beyadis” gi zaarides.
43001049	Natina7eeley “Astamare! Ne Xoossa naa; Ne Isra7eele kawo” gides.
43001050	Yesusikka izas “Ne ammaniday; ta nena ‘Balase mitha garsan beyadis’ gida gishee? Ne buro hessafe aadhdhiza daro miish beyana.
43001051	Gujidikka ta intes tumu gays; buro saloy doyettin Xoossa Kiitanchati Asa Naa bolla wodhdhishininne kezishin inte beyana” gides.
43002001	Heedzdzantho gallas Galila giddon diza Qaana geetettiza Kataman sargey dees. Yesusa aayeyakka heen dawus.
43002002	Yesusinne iza kaallizaytikka sargezaso xeeygettida.
43002003	Sargezason woyneppe agettida ushshay wurin Yesusa aaya Yesusa “Woyne ushshay wurdes” gadus.
43002004	Yesusikka izo “Aaye! Taas nenara aazi dizee? Ta wodey gakkibeenna” gides.
43002005	He wode Yesusa aayeya Maarama heen gadezan diza oosanchata “Izi intena gizayssa ooththite” gadus.
43002006	Ayhudatas geesho wogay diza gish usuppun shuchchafe medhettida baathati heen gadan deettes. Istika issoy issoy nam7u oto woykko heedzdzu oto haaththe oykketes.
43002007	Yesusi oosanchata “Baaththata haaththe kunthite” giin istika baaththata duuna gakkanaas silti histi kunthida.
43002008	Hessafe qasseka oosanchata “Ane ha7i duuqqidi sargeza alafezas izappe immite” gides. Istika duuqqi duuqqi immida.
43002009	Alafezikka woyne ushshan laamettida haaththa gaanxi xeelidi izi awappe yidakkonne eribeenna. Haaththa duuqqidayti gidikko ereetes. Hessa gish sargeza alafey mishiraza xeygidi,
43002010	“Asi wuri sargeson koyro lo7o ushshi shiishshees; asay mathotidappe guye iita ehees; gido attin ne gidikko lo7o ushshi hanno gakkanaas wothagadassa” gides.
43002011	Yesusi hessa malalisiza malata ubbafe koyro Galila geetettiza deren Qaana kataman ooththides. Ba bonchoka hessa malan qoncisides. Iza kaallizaytikka izan ammanida.
43002012	Hessafe guye Yesusi ba aayeyra ba ishataranne bana kaallizaytara duge Qifirnahoome wodhdhidi heen guutha wode takkida.
43002013	Ayhudata Paaziga ba7aaley matida gish Yesusi Yarusalame bides.
43002014	Xoossa Keeththa gibbe giddon boorata, dorsatanne harapheta bayzizayta qasseka miishe laammizayti miishe laammishin demmides.
43002015	Hessa beyidi wodoro xurqafeppe dooqqi ekkidi asanne booratakka Xoossa Keeththa gibbefe kessides; miish laammizayta miishakka dharcidi ista xaraphezatakka shiri shiri yeggides.
43002016	Haraphe bayziza asaaka “Hayssa wursi gede diggite! Ta aawa keeththa zal7e keeththe histofte” gides.
43002017	He wode iza kaallizayti “Ne keeththa miishay tana tama mala xuugees” geetetti xaafetida qaala haasayida.
43002018	Hessafe guye Ayhuda asa halaqati Yesusa “Ne hayssa wursa ooththanas sheney nees dizayssa qoncisanas ne nuna ay malalisiza malata bessanee?” gi oychida.
43002019	Yesusikka istas “Ane hayssa Xoossa Keeththa laallite; ta iza heedzdzu gallassara zaara keexana” gi zaarides.
43002020	Istika iza “Hayssa Xoossa Keeththa keexanas kase oyddu tammanne usuppun layth ekides; histin neni heedzdzu gallassara keexa kunthanee?” gi oychida.
43002021	Gido attin Yesusi “Xoossa Keeththa” giday ba asatetha gishassa.
43002022	Hessa gish Yesusi hayqqi dendin iza kaallizayti he yo7oza yuushi qoppidi eridanne hayssa kase maxaafan xaafetidaysanne Yesusi istas kaseti yootida qaala ammanida.
43002023	Paaziga ba7aale gallas Yesusi Yerusalamen dishe ooththida malatata beyidi daro asay iza ammanides.
43002024	Qasse Yesusi asa wursi eriza gish oonakka ammanibenna.
43002025	Izi asa woznan diza wursi eriza gish oonikka izas asa gish yootanas koshshibenna.
43003001	Farsaaweeta bagga as gidida Ayhudata halaqatappe issi Niqodimoosa geetettiza asi dees.
43003002	Izi qamara Yesusakko biidi “Astamare! Xoossi izara dizadde gidikkofe attin hayta ne ooththiza malalisiza malatata ooththanas dandayizaddey deenna. Hessa gish ne Xoossa achchafe yida astamare gididayssa nu eroos” gides.
43003003	Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Ta nees tumu gays; asi nam7antho yeletonta aggikko Xoossa kawoteth beyanas dandayenna” gides.
43003004	Niqodimoosikka zaaridi “Histin asi cimmidappe guye waanidi nam7antho yelettana dandayizee? Qasseka gede ba aayi ulon simmi gelidi yelettanee?” giidi oychides.
43003005	Yesusikka izas “Ta nees tumu gays; asi haaththafenne Xillo Ayanappe yeletonta dishe Xoossa kawoteth gelanas dandayenna.
43003006	Asappe yeletiday asa. Ayanappe yeletiday Ayana.
43003007	Hessa gish ‘Inte nam7antho yelettanas koshshees’ ta nena gida gish malaletofa.
43003008	Carkoy ba koyda bagga carkees. Ne carkos giiris siyasa attin izi awappe yizakkonne awa bizakko erakka. Ayanappe yeletidaykka hessa mala” gides.
43003009	Niqodimoossi “Hayssi waani hanana danda7izee?” giidi oychides.
43003010	Yesusikka izas “Isra7eele astamare gida uttada hessa ne erikii?
43003011	Ta nees tumu gays; nuni nu erzayssa yootoos. Nu beyidayssa markattos gido attin inte nu markateth ekekketa.
43003012	Ta intes hayssa ha biitta yo7o yootin ammanonta ixikko salo miish yootikko wosti inte ammananee?
43003013	Saloppe duge wodhdhida asa Naappe attin pude salo keziday haray oonikka deenna.
43003014	“Bazzo biittan Musey shoosh dhoqu histi kaqqidayssatho hessathoka Asa Nay dhoqason kaqettanas bessees.
43003015	Hessika izan ammanizadey wurikka merna de7o demmanassa.
43003016	Xoossa Naa ammanizay wuri merna de7o demmanappe attin dhayonta mala Xoossi hayssa alameza daro siiqida gish ba mexi issi naaza immides.
43003017	Xoossi ba naaza ha duge alame kiittiday alame asay izan ammanidi attana malasa attin izi alame asa bolla pirdanas gidenna.
43003018	“Iza ammanizade bolla pirdetenna. Iza ammanontadey gidikko Xoossa Naa issinezan ammanonta gish kasekka pirdeti uttides.
43003019	Pirdayka hayssa mala, poo7oy ha alame yides shin asas oosoy iita gidida gish asay poo7oppe daro dhuma dosides.
43003020	Iita ooththizadey wurikka poo7o dossenna. Izi ooththiza iita oosoy qonci kezonta mala izi ba hu7es poo7oy dizaso kezenna.
43003021	Tumu ooththizadey gidikko poo7oy dizaso yees. Izi poo7oy dizaso yiza gaasoy Xoossa azazo mala izi ooththida oosoy qoncana malassa” gides.
43003022	Hessafe kaallidi Yesusi bana kaallizaytara Yuhuda dere bides; henka asa xammaqishe istara guutha wode gam7ides.
43003023	He wode Saalime achchan Henoone geetettizason daro Haaththi diza gish Yohannisi asa xammaqishin asikka izakko biidi xammaqetides.
43003024	Hessa wode Yohannisi buro qasho keeththe gelibenna.
43003025	He wode Yohannisa kaallizayta giddoninne issi issi Ayhuda asata giddon Ayhudata geesho woga gish gita palamay dendides.
43003026	Yohannisa kaallizayti izakko shiiqidi “Astamare! Nenara Yordanoose shaafa pinthan issife dishin ne iza gish markatto addezi hekko xammaqees; asikka izakko bees” gida.
43003027	Yohannisikka istas “Oonaska Xoossafe imettonta dishin aykkoykka daana dandayenna.
43003028	“Tani izappe sinthata kiitetadis attin yaana gida Kirstoosi tana gdikke’ gaada ta intes yootoyssas inte inte hu7era ta markata.
43003029	Sarge wode ekkana mishiray dizaddey izikka mishira. Mishira laggey gidikko mishiraza achchan eqqidi mishirazi gizaz siyees. Mishiraza xalla siydi ufayetes. Hessa gish ta ufayssi ha7i polettides.
43003030	Izi dhoqu dhoqu gaana mala takka ziqqi ziqqi gaana koshshees.
43003031	“Pudeppe yizadey ubbafe bolla. Garsa Biittafe yidadey izi biittafenne biittazi yootees. Saloppe yizadey izi ubbafe bolla.
43003032	Izi ba beyidazinne ba siyidaz markatees. Gido attin iza markateth ekkizadey deenna.
43003033	Iza markateth ekkizadey gidikko Xoossa tumancha gididayssa qoncisees.
43003034	Xoossi kiittidadey Xoossa qaala yootees. Xoossika izaades ba Ayana makki immenna.
43003035	“Aaway ba naa dosees. Haniza yo7o wursi iza kushen aaththi imees.
43003036	Naazan ammanizades merna de7oy dees. Naazan ammanontay gidikko Xoossa hanqoy iza bolla daana attin de7o demmenna” gides.
43004001	He wode Yesusi Yohannisappe bollara daro asa bana kaallizadey ooththizayssanne xammaqizayssa Farsaaweeti siyida.
43004002	Gido attin xammaqizayti iza kaallizaytappe attin izi xammaqibenna.
43004003	Iza gish haasayettizayssa Farsaaweeti siyda Yesusi eridi Yuhuda dere aggidi Galila dere simmi bides.
43004004	Izi hee bishin Samaariyara aadhdhi baanayssi izas attontaz gidides.
43004005	Hessa gish Sikaaro geetettizaso Samaariya katama bides. Sikaara Yaqoobey ba naa Yoosefes immida biitta achchan dawus.
43004006	Henka Yaqoobe haaththa ollay dees. Yesusi oge hamutti daaburida gish he ollay achchan uttides. Wodeykka gallassafe usuppun saate mala.
43004007	Hessa wode issi Samaariya dere macas dizaara haaththe duuqqanas he haaththa ollakko yadus. Yesusikka izo “Tana haaththe ushsha” gides.
43004008	Hessi hanishin Yesusa kaallizayti quma shammana katama bida.
43004009	Hinna Samaariya macasaya Yesusa “Ne Ayhuda as gida uttada waanada tana Saamariya macas ‘Haaththe ushsha’ ga oychay?” gadus. Iza hessa giday Ayhuda asassinne Samaariya asas gaaggoteththi doonta gishassa.
43004010	Yesusikka Izis “Xoossa immotaynne nena ‘Tana haaththe ushsha’ gizadey izi oonakkonne ne erizakko ne iza woossanas bessees. Izikka nees de7o haaththe immanakkoshin” gides.
43004011	Izakka izas “Godo! Nees haaththe duuqqiza miishi deenna; haaththa ollayka daro ciimma; histin ne de7o haaththi awappe demmanee?
43004012	Ne hayssa haaththa ollaza nuus immida nu aawa Yaqoobeppe aadhdhay? Izinne iza nayti iza mehetikka hayssa ha ollafe haaththe uyida” gadus.
43004013	Yesusi izis “Hayssa ha haaththafe uyizay wuri nam7antho saamotidi zaari hara uyanashin.
43004014	Ta immiza haaththe uyizadey gidikko mernas mulekka saamotenna. Gaasoyka ta immiza haaththe uyizades merna de7os pultiza pulto haaththe gidana” gides.
43004015	Macasayakka “Godo! Hayssafe guye tana haaththe saamonta malanne qasseka ta haaththe duuqqana ha yoonta mala hessa ne giza haaththa mala haaththe taas immarkii?” gadus.
43004016	Yesusikka izo “Baadanne ne azina xeeyga ekkada ya” gides.
43004017	Macasayakka zaarada “Taas azinay deenna” gadus. Izi hizgin Yesusi “ ‘Ne taas azinay deenna’ guussay tumukko.
43004018	Gaasoyka kase nees ichashu azinati deettes. Qasse ha7i nenara dizayssi ne azina gidenna. Hessa gish ne tumu gadasa” gides.
43004019	Macasaya izas “Godo! Neni nabe gididayssa ta ha7i eradis.
43004020	Kase nu Aawati hayssa zuma bolla goynnida. Inte qasse ‘Asay goynnanas bessizasoy Yerusalamenko!’ geeta” gadus.
43004021	Yesusikka izis “Hanne macasaye, Xoossa aawas hayssa zuma bolla woykko Yerusalamen inte goynnonta wodey yaanayssa ammana;
43004022	Inte inte eronta Xoossas goynneta. Nu gidikko asas atotethi Ayhudappe gidida gish nuni nu eriza Xoossas goynnoos.
43004023	Gido attin tumu goynnizayti Xoossa Aawas Ayananinne tuman goynniza wodey buro yaana. Haray attoshin ha7ikka yides. Xoossa aawayka koyizay hessa mala goynnizayta.
43004024	Xoossi ba hu7es Ayana; iza goynnizayti aynaninne tuman goynnanas bessees” gides.
43004025	Macasayakka “Kirstoosi yaanayssa ta erays; izi yiidi hanizaz wursi nuus yootana” gadus.
43004026	Yesusikka izis “Ha7i nenara haasayizay ta iza” gides.
43004027	Hessi hanishin iza kaallizayti ba bidasoppe simmida. Yesusi Macasara haasayizayssa malaletida. Gido attin “Hanne ay koyay? Woykko hannira aazas haasayay?” giidi oonikka oychibenna.
43004028	Hessafe guye macasaya otoza heen aggagada gede katama baada asas;
43004029	“Ta ooththidaz wursi taas yootidade haa yiidi beyte. Oone erizay Xoossi tiyida Kirstoosi izakkone!” gadus.
43004030	Aska katamappe kezidi Yesusakko bides.
43004031	He wode Yesusa kaallizayti Yesusa “Astamare! Quma ma” giidi woossida.
43004032	Izi qas “Inte erontay ta miza qumay taas dees” gides.
43004033	Hessa gish iza kaallizayti “Aykko miza kath asi izas ehideshaa?” giidi ba giddon haasayettida
43004034	Yesusikka istas zaaridi “Ta qumay tana kiittida ta Aawa shene oosonne iza ooso polo.
43004035	Inte qas ‘Kaththa maxay gakkanaas buro oyddu aginay attides’ geeta gidekketii? Qas ta gidikko intena ‘Dhoqu giidi kaththay maxa gakkidayssa xeellite’ gays.
43004036	Maxizadey ba damoza ekkana. Mernas gidiza ayfe shiishana. Hessa gish zerizadeynne maxizadey issife ufeyettana.
43004037	Hessa gish issadey zerana; Hara asi maxana geetettiza leemisoy tuma.
43004038	Ta intena inte daaburontayssa maxana mala yeddadis. Harati ooson daaburida.Gido attin inte ista daabursan go7ettideta” gides.
43004039	Macasaya “Ta ooththidazi wursi taas izi yootides” gaada asas markattida mala katamappe daro Samaariya asay izan ammanides.
43004040	Hessa gish Samaariya asay Yesusakko yiidinne izi istakon gam7ana mala woossida. Izikka nam7u gallas heen gam7ides.
43004041	Iza qaala siydi daro asay iza ammanides.
43004042	Macasayokka “Ha7i nu iza ammanizay ne yootida qaala gish xalla gidonta nukka nu baggara izappe siyida gishshinne tumappe izi dere ashshizade gididayssa erida gishassa” gida.
43004043	Yesusi Samaariyan nam7u gallas gam7idappe guye Galila bides.
43004044	Izi ba baggara “Nabey ba deren bonchettenna” gi yootides.
43004045	Gido attin izi Galila biin Galila asay iza lo7ethi mokki ekkides. Gaasoyka Paaziga ba7aale bonchana Yerusalame bidason heen dishin izi ooththidaysa wursi beyida gishassa.
43004046	Hessafe guye Yesusi haaththe woyne cajje ooththida Galila dere giddon diza Qaana geetettiza katama nam7antho bides. He wode Qifirnahoomen izas nay saketida issi kawo shuumey dees.
43004047	Izikka Yesusi Yuhuda dereppe gede Galila yidayssa siydi Yesusakko bides. Yesusi duge Qifirnahoome wodhdhana malanne daro saketidi hayqqana giza naaza pathana mala Yesusa woossides.
43004048	Yesusikka izas “Inte gita malatatanne malalisizaz beyonta aykkokka ammanekketa” gides.
43004049	Shuumezikka zaaridi “Godo, ta naazi hayqqonta elela wodhdharki!” gides.
43004050	Yesusikka iza “Neni neso ba! Naazi paxides” gides. Addezikka Yesusi izas yootida qaala ammanidi so simmi bides.
43004051	Izi so bishin iza ashkarati izara ogen gaaggidi “Ne naazi paxides” giidi izas yootida.
43004052	Shuumezikka naazi ay saaten paxidakkone ista zaari oychides. Istika izas “Qamma gallassafe laapun saaten iza michizayssi aggides” gida.
43004053	Naaza aawayka Yesusi “Ne naazi paxides” giday he isti izas yootiza wode gididayssa erides. Hessa gish he gallassafe oykkidi izinne iza so asay wuri Yesusa ammanida.
43004054	Hayssi malatay Yesusi Yuhudappe Galila yiidi ooththida nam7antho malata.
43005001	Hessafe kaallidi Ayhudata ba7aaley diza gish Yesusi Yerusalame bides.
43005002	Yerusalamen dorsi geliza penge achchan Ibraaweeta qaalara “Betesayda” geetettiza issi pultofe shiiqidi eellida haaththi dees. Izappe bollara kamay diza ichashu ogeti deettes.
43005003	Daro harganchati, ayfe qooqeti, toho wobetinne toho silati oge bolla ichchidi haaththay qaaxettana gakkanaas naagetes.
43005004	Issi issi wode Goda kiitanchay haaththan wodhdhidi haaththa qaathees. Haatha qaathafe kaallidi koyrottidi haaththan geliza harganchay bana sakiza ay hargefekka paxees.
43005005	Heen gadaan heedzdzu tammanne osupun layth kumeth saketida issadey dees.
43005006	Yesusi addeza heen ichchidayssa beyidinne izi daro layth saketidayssa eridi “Ne paxana koyay?” gides.
43005007	Harganchazikka zaaridi “Godo! Haaththay qaaxetiza wode tana haaththan gelthiza asi deenna; ta buro baana gishin haray taappe kaseti haaththan geeles” gides
43005008	Yesusikka iza “Denda! ne ichchida alga tookkada ba!” gides.
43005009	Addezikka heerakka paxides. Ba alga tookki ekkidi bides. Hessi haniday Ayhudata Sambata gallassa.
43005010	Hessa gish Ayhudata halaqati paxida addeza “Hach Sambatara ne alga tookkana mala Muse wogay azazenna” gida.
43005011	Izikka istas “ ‘Ne ichchida alga tookkada ba’ gi yootides” gides.
43005012	Istika “Nena alga tookkada ba giday oonee?” gi oychida.
43005013	Derey darida gishshinne Yesusi heeppe haakki bida gish iza ooni pathidakkonne addezi eribenna.
43005014	Hessafe guye Yesusi addeza Xoossa Keeththan demmidi “Hekko ha7i ne paxadasa; kaseyssafe aadhdhiza iita miishi ne bolla gakkonta mala nam7antho nagara ooththofa” gides
43005015	Addezikka biidinne iza pathiday Yesusa gididayssa Ayhudata halaqatas yootides.
43005016	Addeza Sambata gallas pathida gish Ayhudata daannati Yesusa oykkana yedethida.
43005017	Yesusikka istas “Ta Aaway ubba wode ooththes, takka ooththana” gides;
43005018	Hessa gaason Ayhudata daannati Yesusa wodhana mala kaseppe aaththi dentheththida. Qasse izi Sambata moorida gish xalla gidonta “Xoossi ta Aawa” gida gishshinne bana Xoossara ginisida gishassa.
43005019	Yesusi istas “Ta intes tumu gays; Aaway ooththishin beyidayssa oosoppe attin naazi ba shenen aynne ooththenna. Aaway ooththizayssa iza nay hessathoka ooththes.
43005020	Gaasoyka Aaway naaza dossees. Ba ooththizayssakka wursi iza bessees; inte malalettana mala hayssafeka aadhdhiza ooso buro bessana.
43005021	Aaway hayqqidayta denthizayssathonne de7o immizayssatho naazikka hessatho ba koyidades de7o immana.
43005022	Aaway oona bollaka pirdenna. Gido attin pirda maata wursi ba naazas immides.
43005023	Izi hessatho ooththiday asay wuri Aawa bonchana malanne qasseka naazakka bonchana malassa. Naaza bonchontay naaza kiittida Aawakka bonchenna.
43005024	“Ta intes tuma gays, ta qaala siyizadessinne tana kiittidaden ammanizades merna de7oy dees. Izaadey hayqoppe gede de7on pinnides attin iza bolla pirdetenna.
43005025	Ta intes tuma gays, kase hayqqida asati Xoossa naa qaala siyiza wodey yaana; he wodeyakka hanno; siyizayti wuri de7on deana.
43005026	Gaasoyka Aaway ba baggara de7oy diza mala naazikka ba baggara de7oy daana mala ooththides.
43005027	Izi asa naa gidida gish pirdana mala godateth izas immides.
43005028	Hayssan aykkokka malalettofte. Gaasoyka buro kase hayqqidi duufon dizayti wuri iza qaala giiris siyiza wodey yaana.
43005029	Lo7o ooththidayti hayqoppe dendidi paxana. Gido attin iita ooththidayti hayqoppe dendidi pirdettana.
43005030	“Ta ta shenen aykkokka ooththanas dandayikke; gido attin ta aawappe ta siyida mala pirdays. Tana kiittidayssa shene ooththays attin ta shenen ta ooththonta gish ta pirdan balay baawa.
43005031	Tani ta gish tarka markattikko ta markay tumu gidenna.
43005032	Gido attin ta gish markattizadey haray dees. Izikka ta gish markatizade markatethay tumu gididayssa ta erays.
43005033	Inte Yohannisakko ase kiittideta shin izikka tumu markatides.
43005034	Ta hayssa gizay inte attana mala attin taas hara markateth koshshida gish gidenna.
43005035	Yohannisi eexidi poo7isiza poo7o mala. Inteka guutha wode iza poo7on ufayettana koyideta.
43005036	Taas gidikko Yohannisa markatethafe aadhdhiza markay dees. Ta markaykka ta Aaway taas immida ooso. Hessika ta ooththiza oosoy ta Aaway tana kiittidayssa taas markatees.
43005037	Tana kiittida ta Aawayka ba hu7era taas markatides. Inte gidikko iza qaala giiris mulekka siybeeykketa. Izas medhaaka mulera beybeekketa.
43005038	Izi kiittidaden inte ammanonta gish iza qaalay inte achchan deenna.
43005039	Intes Geeshsha Maxaafatappe merna de7o demmanas misatin maxaafata piligeeta; maxaafatikka ta gish markattettes.
43005040	Gido attin inte de7o demmanas taakko ha yaana koyekketa.
43005041	“Ta asappe boncho koyikke.
43005042	Ta intena erays; Xoossa siiqoy intenan bayndayssakka erays.
43005043	Tani ta Aawa sunthan yadis shin inte tana mokki ekkibeekketa. Hara asi qasse ba sunthan yiikko inte iza mokki ekkeeta.
43005044	Inte inte giddon issoy issafe boncho koyizayto! Issi Xoossafe beettiza boncho koyontayto inte waanidi tana ammanana dandayetii?
43005045	Ta Aawa sinthan intena mootanay intes tana misatoppo. Intena mootanay inte iza hidota ooththiza Muse;
43005046	Musey ta gish xaafidayssa ammanidakko inte tana ammanana.
43005047	Izi xaafidayssa inte ammanonta aggikko qasse ta qaala inte waani ammananee?” gides.
43006001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Xibiraadoose geetettizaso Galila Abbafe he pinth pinnides.
43006002	Yesusi harganchata pathida malata beyida gish daro asay iza kaallides.
43006003	Yesusi bana kaallizaytara pude zuma bolla kezi uttides.
43006004	He wode Ayhudata Paaziga ba7aaley mati uttides.
43006005	He wode daro derey izakko yizayssa Yesusi dhoqu gi xeelidi Piliphoosa “Hayssa deraas gidana quma awappe shammana dandayizonii?” gides.
43006006	Yesusi Piliphoosa hessatho oychiday iza paacanas giidippe attin izi ba ooththanayssa erees.
43006007	Piliphoosikka izas “Issi issades issi bars gidiza kath shamizakkokka nam7u xeetu dinaren shammida kaththikka hayssas gidenna” gides.
43006008	Yesusa kaallizaytappe issoy Simoona Phexroosa isha Indiraassi,
43006009	“Ichashu banga ukethinne nam7u mole oykkida issi nay hayssan dees. Gido attin hanna hayssa ha derezas ay gidanee?” gides.
43006010	Yesusikka zaaridi “Asa ubba uttissite” gides. Heen gadaan daro maatay diza gish asay uttides. Asa qoodaykka ichashu shi gidizaza.
43006011	Hessafe guye Yesusi uketha ekkidi galata woossa woossidi uttida asas gishides. Molezakka hessathoka gishechchides. Asay wurikka baas gidizaz demmides.
43006012	Asay wurikka kalli min Yesusi bana kaallizayta “Maaddan attida kaththa issinoka ashshonta shiishshite” gides.
43006013	Istika asay mishin ichashu ukethafe attida tammanne nam7u leemate kumeth shiishida.
43006014	Asatikka Yesusi ooththida malata beyidi “Hayssadey tumappe ha alame yaana nabezakko!” gides.
43006015	Asay qasse wolqara Yesusa kawoththana qoppidayssa eridi Yesusi qasseka istafe haakki biidi zuma bolla kezides.
43006016	Gadey qammishin Yesusa kaallizayti duge abbako wodhdhida.
43006017	Wogolon gelidi Qifirnahoome baana kezida. Isti kezishin gadey dhumides. Yesusi hessa gakkanaasikka istako yibenna.
43006018	Wolqama carkoy carkiza gish abbay keehi qaaxides.
43006019	Iza kaallizayti bagga saate oge mala wogoloza laagidappe guye Yesusi abba bollara tohora hamutti wogolozakko matishin demmidi babbida.
43006020	Izikka istas “Tanakko! Babbofte!” gides.
43006021	Istika iza ufayssara gede wogoloza giddo ekkana koyda. Heerakka wogolozikka isti baanaso gakkides.
43006022	Abbafe he pinthan attida asay wontetha gallas abba bolla issi wogoloy xalla dizaaro beyides. Yesusa kaallizayti kase barka bidayssanne Yesusi istara wogolon gelontayssa erida.
43006023	Gido attin hanko wogoloti Xibiraadooseppe dendidi Yesusi galata woossa woossin asay kaththa midaso yida.
43006024	Asatika Yesusi woykko iza kaallizayti heen bayndayssa beyidi he wogolotan gelidi Yesusa kosh Qifirnahoome bides.
43006025	Abbafe he pinthan iza demmidi “Astamare! Ne ayde hayssa yadii?” gida.
43006026	Yesusikka istas “Ta intes tuma gays inte tana koyizay kath mi kaallida gish attin malata beyida gish gidenna.
43006027	Dhayana kaththas ooththofte. Gido attin hessafe aaththidi Xoossa aaway ammanthiza maatame iza bolla shocida gish Asa Nay intes immiza merna de7os gidiza kaththas ooththite” gides.
43006028	Istika iza “Histin Xoossa ooso ooththanas nu ay ooththinoo?” gida.
43006029	Yesusikka “Xoossa oosoy Xoossi kiittida iza naazan ammano” giidi istas zaarides.
43006030	Istika izas “Nu beyidi nena ammanana mala ne nuna ay malata bessanee? Qasseka ay ooththanee?
43006031	‘Isti maana mala istas quma saloppe immides’ geetetti xaafetida mala kase nu aawati bazzo biittan manna geetettiza kath mida” gida.
43006032	Yesusi istas “Ta intes tumu gays; saloppe wodhdhida quma intes immiday Muse gidenna. Tumu quma saloppe intes immizay ta Aawa.
43006033	Gaasoyka Xoossa qumay saloppe wodhdhidi alames de7o immizayssa” gides.
43006034	Hessa gish asay “Godo hessa mala quma nuus ubba wode immarki!” gides.
43006035	Yesusikka istas “De7o qumay tana; taakko yiza asi mulekka gafettenna; tana ammanizadey aydekka saametenna.
43006036	Kase ta intes gida mala inte tana beydeta shin ammanibeeyketa.
43006037	Ta Aaway taas immizay wurikka taakko yaana. Taakko yizade ta gede kare goodikke.
43006038	Gaasoyka ta saloppe wodhdhiday tana kiittidayssa shene ooththanas attin ta shene ooththanas gidenna.
43006039	Tana kiittidayssa sheney taas immidaytappe issadeka dhayssonta wursetha gallas ta denthana.
43006040	Ee ta sheney naaza beyidi iza ammanizadey wuri merna de7o demmanassa. Tanikka wurseththa gallas iza hayqoppe denthana” gides.
43006041	Hessa gish Yesusi “Saloppe wodhdhida qumay tana” gida gish Ayhudati iza bolla zuuzumettida.
43006042	“Hayssi Yoosefe naa Yesusa gidenee? Iza aawanne iza aayo nu erokkonii? Histin ha7i izi ‘Saloppe wodhdhadis’ waani gizee?” gida.
43006043	Yesusikka istas “Inte inte giddon zuuzumeta.
43006044	Tana kiittida ta Aaway xeygidadefe attin taakko yaana dandayizaddey oonikka deenna. Barka taakko yaana dandayizay oonikka deenna. Taakko yizadekka wursetha gallas ta iza hayqoppe denthana.
43006045	Nabeta maxaafatan asay wuri Xoossafe tamaridade gidana geetetti xaafetides. Hessa gish Aawappe siydi tamarida asi wuri taakko yaana.
43006046	Hessa gussi aawa beyida asi dees gussi gidenna. Aawa beyiday Xoossa achchafe yidayssa xalla.
43006047	Ta intes tuma gays; tanan ammanida asas merna de7oy dees.
43006048	Tani de7o quma.
43006049	Kase inte aawati bazzo biittan manna mida. Gido attin wurikka hayqqida.
43006050	Saloppe wodhdhida qumay hayssa. Hayssa mizadey mulekka hayqqenna.
43006051	Saloppe wodhdhida de7o qumay tana. Hayssa ha qumappe mizadey wurikka mernas daana. Alames de7o gidana mala ta immiza qumay ta ashoza” gides.
43006052	Hessa wode Ayhudati “Hayssi addezi nu iza asho maana mala wosti immanee?” giidi ba giddon palametida.
43006053	Hessa gish Yesusi ista “Ta intes tumu gays; Asa Naa asho inte moonta aggikko, iza suuthikka uyonta aggikko intes de7oy deenna.
43006054	Ta asho mizadessinne ta suuth uyizades ubbas merna de7oy dees. Takka izaade wursetha gallas hayqoppe denthana.
43006055	Gaasoyka ta ashoy tumu quma. Ta suuthaykka tumu ushsha.
43006056	Ta asho mizaynne ta suuth uyizay wuri tanan daana. Takka izaaden daana.
43006057	De7o Aaway tana kiittida malanne takka izan de7on diza mala hessathoka ta asho mizadey wuri tanan de7on daana.
43006058	Hessa gish saloppe wodhdhida qumay hayssa. Izikka kase inte aawati midayssa mala gidenna. Gaasoyka he quma midayti hayqqida. Ha quma mizayti gidikko mernas daana” gides.
43006059	Yesusi hayssa Qifirnahoomen Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan tamarsiza wode yootides.
43006060	Iza kaallizaytappe darizayti hessa siydi “Hayssi yo7ozi deexxo; hayssa ooni ekkana dandayizee?” gida.
43006061	Yesusikka iza kaallizayti hessa yo7oza gish zuuzumetidayssa ba woznan eridi “Hayssi intena deexizee?
43006062	Asa Nay Kirstoosi ba dizaso simmi kezishin beykko inte ay gaanee?
43006063	Asas de7o immizay Xoossa Ayanakko! Asa wolqay qasse ayne go7enna; ta intes yootida qaalay de7o immiza ayana.
43006064	Gido attin inte giddon issi issi ammanonta asati deettes” gides. Yesusi istas hessa giday koyroppe doommidi ista giddon ammanontayti oonantakkonne qasse iza aaththi immanaddeyka oonakkone eriza gishassa.
43006065	Kaalethidikka Yesusi “Aawa sheney baynda taakko ha yaana dandayizaddey deenna gaada ta intes yootiday hessassa” gides.
43006066	Hessafe dendidayssan iza kaallizaytappe daroti guye simmida. He gallassafe doommidi Yesusa kaallo aggida.
43006067	Hessa gish Yesusi bana kaalliza tammanne nam7ata “Inteka baana kooyetii?” gides.
43006068	Hessa wode Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi “Godo nees merna de7oy qaalay dishin nu oonakko baanee?
43006069	Ne geeshsha Xoossa naa gididayssa eridi nuni ammanidos” gides.
43006070	Yesusikka ista “Ta intena tammanne nam7ata doorabeekkinaa? Histin intefe issoy Xala7e” gides.
43006071	Izi hessa giday Simoona naa Asqoroonto Yuhuda gishassa. Ayssi giikko Yuhuday tammanne nam7atappe issa gididakkokka Yesusa aaththi immanay iza gidida gishassa.
43007001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Galila giddon yuuyetides. Gido attin Yuhudan yuuyanas koybenna. Gaasoyka Ayhudati iza wodhdhana koyiza gishassa.
43007002	He wode Ayhudata daase ba7aaley mati uttides.
43007003	Hessa gish Yesusa ishati izakko shiiqidi “Nena kaallizayti ne ooththiza oosoza beyana mala ne hayssafe dendada Yuhuda dere ba;
43007004	gaasoyka qoncen erettana koyizadey ba ooso geeman ooththenna. Nekka haytanta wursa ooththashe nena alamen qoncisana koshshees” gida.
43007005	Isti hessa gida gaasoy iza ishataka gidin izan ammanontayta gidida gishassa.
43007006	Yesusikka istas “Ta wodey buro gakkibeenna; inte wodey gidikko ubba wode intes giigakko.
43007007	Derey intena ixana dandayenna. Tana gidikko ixees; gaasoyka ta alame oosoy iita gididayssa izas markattiza gishassa.
43007008	Ha7i inte gede ba7aalezaso biite. Taas wodey gakkonta gish hayssa ha ba7aalezaso ta biikke” gides.
43007009	Hessa giidi Yesusi Galilan attides.
43007010	Gido attin iza ishati ba7aalezaso bidappe guye Yesusi qoncera gidonta qotara ba7aalezaso bides.
43007011	Ayhudati “Izi awan dizee?” gishe ba7aalezason koyda.
43007012	Dereyka iza gish giddora sasuki haasayettides. Issi issi asati “Izi lo7o asa” gishin baggay qasse “Lo7o gidenna. Izi dere baleththees” gida.
43007013	Gido attin Ayhudata daannatas babbiza gish oonikka iza gish qoncen haasaybenna.
43007014	Ba7aalezi wurana bagga gakkishin Yesusi Xoossa Keeththe biidi tamarso oykkides.
43007015	Ayhudati “Hayssi addezi tamaronta dishe hayssa wursi wosti eridee?” giidi malaletida.
43007016	Hessa gish Yesusi “Ta tamarsiza timirtey tana kiittida ta Aawappe taas imettides attin taappe gidenna.
43007017	Tana kiittidayssa shene ooththana koyizadey diikko hayssi ha timirtey Xoossafe beettidayssa woykko ta taappe hasaydayssa gidikkokka erana.
43007018	Bappe haasayizaddey ba boncho koyees. Kiittidade boncho koyizadey gidikko izi tumancha. Wordoy iza bolla deenna.
43007019	Musey intes woga immides gidennee? Gidikkoka inte giddon woga naagi polidadey oonikka deenna. Inte aazas tana wodhana koyetii?” gides.
43007020	Dereyka iza “Ne bolla daydanthi dees! Nena wodhana koyizay oonnee?” gides.
43007021	Yesusikka istas “Ta issi ooso ooththadis; inte wurikka hanno ha oosoyn malaleteta.
43007022	Musey intes qaxara woga immides; he wogaykka imettiday kase aawatappe beettides attin Museppe gidenna. Histin hekko inteka Sambata gallasikka as qaxxareta.
43007023	Histikko Muse wogay shaaretonta mala asi Sambata gallas qaxxaretizaz gidikko histin ta Sambata gallas asas kumeththa asateth pathin aazas ta bolla hanqettetii?
43007024	Suure pirda pirdite attin asa ayfeso xeelidi maado pirda pirdofte” gi zaarides.
43007025	Yerusalame asappe issi issi asati “Isti wodhana koyiza addezi hayssa gidenee?
43007026	Hekko izi qoncen hasayes shin isti iza aykkokka gibeetenna. Hays Xoossi kiittidade gididayssa daannati tumu erizoshaa?
43007027	Histin hayssi addezi awa asakkone nu eroos. Xoossi kiittidadey yishin qasse izi awappekkonne erizadey oonikka deenna” gida.
43007028	Hessa gish Yesusi Xoossa Keeththan tamarsishe ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Inte tana tumu ereeta. Ta Aawappe yidakkonne inte ereeta. Qasse tani ta shenen yabeekke. Tana kiittidayssi izi tumancha. Gido attin inte qasse iza erekketa.
43007029	Ta gidikko iza achchafe yida gishshinne izi tana kiittida gish ta iza erays” gides.
43007030	Hessa wode iza oykkanas koyda; Gido attin buro wodey gakkibeenna gish oonikka oykkibeenna.
43007031	Gidikokka derezappe daroy izan ammanides. Asay “Xoossi kiittidadey yiza wode hayssi addezi ooso malatappe bollara hara ooththanee?” gides.
43007032	Asay Yesusa gish garsara sasuketi haasayettishin Farsaaweeti siyida. Hessa gish Qeeseta halaqatinne Farsaaweeti Yesusa oykkanas Xoossa Keeththa penge naagizayta yeddida.
43007033	He wode Yesusi “Ta intenara guuththa wode daashshana; Hessafe guye tana kiittidayssako ta simma baana.
43007034	Inte tana koyana shin demmekketa. Inte ta dizaso yaanas dandayekketa” gides.
43007035	Hessa gish Ayhudata daannati ba giddon issoy issara “Hayssi addezi nu demmonta mala awa baaneshaa? Oone erizay Giriketa giddo laaletti diza Ayhudatakko biidi Giriketa tamarsaneshaa?
43007036	Izi ‘Inte tana koyana shin demmekketa; Ta dizaso inte yaanas dandayekketa’ gishin hessi ay guussee?” gida.
43007037	Gita ba7aaleza wursetha gallas Yesusi dendi eqqidinne ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Haath saamettidadey diikko ha taakko yiidi uyo.
43007038	Geeshsha Maxaafay gida mala tana ammanizadefe de7o haaththa pultoy pultana” gides.
43007039	Izi hessa giday izan ammanizayti buroppe ekkana Xillo Ayana gishassa. Gaasoyka Yesusi bonchettiza wodey buro gakkonta gish Xillo Ayanay imettibenna.
43007040	Hessa gish derezappe issi issi asati he qaala siydi “Yaana giza nabey tumappe hayssa” gida.
43007041	Harati “Hays Xoossi kiittidade” gida. Baggayti qasse “Xoossi kiittidadey Galilappe waani yaanee?
43007042	Xoossi kiittidadey Dawute zerethafe yelettanayssanne Dawute katama Beetelemeppe yaanayssi kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetibenee?” gida.
43007043	Hessa gish iza gaason derey ba giddon shaaketi wodhdhides.
43007044	Istafe issi issi asati iza oykkana koyda. Gido attin oonikka iza oykkibeenna.
43007045	Hessafe guye Xoossa Keeththe naagizayti Qeeseta halaqatakkonne Farsaaweetakko simmidi bida. Istika “Aazas iza ekkonta yidetii?” gida.
43007046	Wotadaratikka zaaridi “Ha addezi haasayizayssa mala ay asikka haasayi erenna” gida.
43007047	Farsaaweeti ista “Inteka balettidetii?
43007048	Daannatappe woykko Farsaaweetappe iza ammanidayti dizoshaa?
43007049	Hayssi Muse woga eronta derey tumappe qangetidayssa” gida.
43007050	Hayssafe kase Yesusakko bida Farsaaweetappe issa gidida Niqodimoossi istas
43007051	“Nu wogan issi mootetizadey ba mootos zaaro immin siyontanne izi ay ooththidakkone eretonta dishin pirday pirdeti erizee?” gides.
43007052	Istika “Nekka Galila asee? Galilappe nabey dendontayssa pilgada gakka era” gida.
43007053	Hessafe guye issoy issoy baso bides.
43008001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Dabrazayte bides.
43008002	Wontetha gallas maalado wontara Xoossa Keeththe simmi yides. Dereyka wuri izakko yiin izi uttidi ista tamarso oykkides.
43008003	Muse woga tamarsizaytinne Farsaaweeti issi laymatashe oykkettida macas dizaaro ekki yiidi dere sinthan essida.
43008004	Yesusakka “Astamare! Hekko hanna macasaya laymatashe oyketadus.
43008005	Hanni mala macassi shuchchan cadeta hayqqana mala Musey nu wogan nuna azazides; Nenich hanni gish ay gay?” gida.
43008006	Isti iza hessa giday iza bolla mootos gidiza gaaso demmanassinne iza paacana koyda gishassa. Gido attin Yesusi hokkdi biitta bolla ba biradhdhera xaafo oykkides.
43008007	Isti iza zaari zaari oychin dhoqu giidi “Inte giddofe nagaray baynda asi koyro shuchchi izi bolla olo” gides.
43008008	Hessafe qasseka hokkidi biitta bolla xaafides.
43008009	Istika hessa siydi cimatappe oykkidi wurikka issoy issoy bides. Hessa gish Yesusi heen eqqida macasayra xalla attides. “Mootizayti awan dizoo? Ne bolla pirdiday oonikka dennee?” gides.
43008011	Izakka “Godo oonikka baawa” gadus. Yesusikka “Takka ne bolla pirdikke; ba! Nam7antho nagara ooththofa” gides.
43008012	Qasse Yesusi “Tani alames poo7o. Tana kaallizadey wuri de7o poo7o demmana. Dhuman simeretenna” giidi istas yootides.
43008013	Farsaaweeti “Neni ne gish markattasa; Ne markay tumu gidenna” gida.
43008014	Yesusikka istas “Tani ta gish ay markattikkokka ta awappe yidakkonne qasse ta awa baanakkonne ta eriza gish ta markateth tuma. Inte gidikko ta awappe yidakkonne qasse awa baanakkonne erekketa.
43008015	Inte asho qofa mala pirdeeta. Ta gidikko oona bollaka pirdikke.
43008016	Ta pirdikkokka ta pirday tumu pirda. Gaasoyka ta tarka pirdikke; Tana kiittida ta Aawayka tanara dees.
43008017	Nam7u asata markay tumu gididayssi inte wogan xaafetides.
43008018	Hessa gish tani ta gish markatays; tana kiittida ta Aawayka taas markattes” gi zaarides.
43008019	Istika “Ne Aaway awan dizee?” giidi iza oychida. Yesusikka istas “Tana gidin ta aawakka gidin inte erekketa; inte tana erizako ta Aawakka eranakoshin” giidi istas zaarides.
43008020	Yesusi hessa istas yootiday Xoossa Keeththa gibben miishe woththiza saaxine achchan tamarsishe yootides shin izas oyketiza wodey gakkonta gish oonikka iza oykkibeenna.
43008021	Yesusi qasseka “Ta baana shin inte tana koyananne inte inte nagarara hayqqana attin ta bizaso baana dandayekketa” gides.
43008022	Ayhudatikka ba giddon issoy issara izi “ ‘Ta bizaso inte baana dandayekketa’ gizay barka bana wodhanaseshaa?” geetettida.
43008023	Izi qasse ista “Inte garsa asa; tani bolla asa; inte hayssa alame asa; tani ha alameppe gidikke.
43008024	Inte ta oonakkonne eridi ammanonta aggikko inte inte nagarara hayqqana gish ta inte inte nagarara hayqqana giday hessa gishassa” gides.
43008025	Istika iza “Ne oonnee?” gida. Yesusikka istas “Ha7i gakkanaas ta intes iza gish yootizadey tana.
43008026	Ta inte bolla haasayanayssinne pirdaza yo7oy daroy dees. Gido attin tana kiittidadey ammanettidade; takka izappe siyidayssa ha alamezas yootays” gides.
43008027	Izi istas Aawa gish yootizayssa akeekibettena.
43008028	Hessa gish Yesusi “Inte Asa Naa dhoqu histidi kaqqida wode tani iza gidadey tana gididayssa inte erana. Aaway tana tamarsidayssa yootadis attin tani ta shene mala aykkokka ooththontayssa inte akeekana.
43008029	Tana kiittidayssi izi tanara dees. Ay wodekka ta ufayssizaz ooththiza gish izi tana xalala yeggi aggibenna” gides.
43008030	Izi hessa yootida mala daro asay izan ammanides.
43008031	Yesusi bana ammanida Ayhudata “Inte tumu ta qaalan diikko inte tumappe tana kaallizayta gidana.
43008032	Tumay aazakkone inte erananne tumaykka intena wozana” gides.
43008033	Istika izas zaaridi “Nuni Abrahaame naytakko! Nu oonaska aylleti erokko. Histin ne nuna waanada inte wozettana gay?” gida.
43008034	Yesusikka istas “Ta intes tumu gays; nagara ooththizadey wuri nagaras aylle;
43008035	Ay wodekka aylley soon luxi dee7enna. Yeloy gidikko aydekka soon dees.
43008036	Histikko naazi intena wozikko inte wozetidayta gidana.
43008037	Inte Abrahaame nayta gididayssa ta erays. Gido attin ta qaala inte ero gi ekkonta gish tana wodhanas koyeeta.
43008038	Tani ta Aawa achchan beyidayssa intes yootays. Inte qasse inte aawappe siyidayssa ooththeta” gides.
43008039	Istika izas “Nu aaway Abrahaame” giidi zaari yootin, Yesusi istas “Inte Abrahaame naa gididakko Abrahaametho ooththana.
43008040	Inte gidikko ta Xoossafe siyida tuma intes yootin tana wodhanas gixxi dendideta. Gido attin Abrahaamey hessatho ooththibeenna.
43008041	Inte inte aawatho ooththeta” gides. Istika zaaridi “Nu layman yeletida naa gidokko. Nu aaway issi Xoossa xalala” giidi izas zaarida.
43008042	Yesusi istas “Inte Aaway Xoossa gididakko takka Xoossafe keza yida gish inte tana dosanakkoshin; tana izi kiittides attin ta tarka ta shenen yabeekke.
43008043	Ta yootizayssa ays yuushi qoppeketii? Gaasoyka inte ta qaala siyana koyonta gishassa.
43008044	Inte inte aawa Xala7e nayta; Inte aawa amo polana koyeeta; izi kasekka shempo wodhidade. Iza achchan tumay doonta gish izi tuman eqqibenna. Izi ba hu7es wordanchanne wordo aawa gidida gish izi wordo haasaya bappe medhi ekkidi haasayees.
43008045	Ta qasse tumu haasayiza gish inte tana ammanekketa.
43008046	Inte giddofe tana ne hanno nagara ooththadasa giidi markara laththanas mootana dandayizadey dizee? Ta tumu haasayizade gidikko histin aazas tana ammanekketii?
43008047	Xoossafe gidida asi Xoossi giza siyees. Inte gidikko Xoossafe gidonta gish Xoossa qaala siyekketa” gides.
43008048	Ayhudatikka zaaridi “Nu nena ne ‘Samaariya asa; ne bolla daydanthi dees’ gidays tumu dennee?” gida.
43008049	Yesusi istas “Tani ta Aawa bonchays attin daydanthi ta bolla baawa. Inte gidikko tana kawushsheeta.
43008050	Tani taas boncho koykke. Ta bonchettana mala koyizadey qasse dees. Izikka pirda pirdanade.
43008051	Ta intes tumu gays; oonikka ta qaala naagikko hayqo mulekka hayqqenna” gi zaarides.
43008052	Ayhudati iza “Ne bolla daydanthi dizayssa ha7i nuni eridos. Abrahaamey hayqqides; nabetikka izatho hayqqida. Ne qasse ‘Oonikka mule hayqo beyenna’ ga yootasa.
43008053	Ne nu aawa Abrahaameppe aadhdhay? Izi hayqqides; nabetikka hayqida histin ne nena oona gaana koyadii?” gida.
43008054	Yesusikka istas “Ta tarka tana bonchikko ta bonchoy hada. Tana bonchizaddey gidikko inte ‘Izi nu Xoossa’ gizay ta Aawa.
43008055	Inte iza eronta aggikkokka ta qasse erays. Ta iza erike giikko, takka inte mala wordancha gidays. Ta qasse iza erays, iza qaalakka naagays.
43008056	Inte aawa Abrahaamey ta gallas beyanas amottidi beydessinne ufayetides” gides.
43008057	Ayhudati qasse “Nees buro ichashu tammu layth kumonta neni Abrahaame beyadii?” gida.
43008058	Yesusikka “Ta intes tumu gays; Abrahaamey yelettanappe kasekka tani days” gides.
43008059	Ayhudati heerakka iza caddanas wuri shuch denthida. Gido attin Yesusi ista matappe qotettidi Xoossa Keeththafe kezi bides.
43009001	Yesusi ogera aadhdhi bishe ba aayey uloppe yeletosafe ayfe qooqidade beyides.
43009002	Iza kaallizayti iza “Astamaare! Hayssi addezi qooqe gidi yellettana mala nagara ooththiday oonnee? Iza yelidayti ooththidoyee? Izi ooththidee?” giidi Yesusa oychida.
43009003	Yesusikka istas “Iza gidinka iza yelidaytikka nagara ooththibetenna. Izi hessatho haniday Xoossa oosoy iza bolla qoncanassa.
43009004	Gallassara tana kiittidade ooso ooththanas taas bessees. Buro oonikka ooththanas dandayonta qammay yaana.
43009005	Ha biitta bolla diza wode ha Biittas poo7oy tana” gides.
43009006	Hessa gi simmidi biitta bolla cuch cuttidi ba cuchchan urqa shugisidi addeza ayfeza he urqa tiyidi,
43009007	“Baada Selihoomen asay xammaqettizason meeceta” gides. Selihoome guussi kiitettidayssa guussa. Addezikka biidi meecettidinne xeellishe simmi yides.
43009008	Iza dooththatinne kase izi heen woossishin beyida asay “Hayssadey kase uttidi woossiza addeza dennee?” gida.
43009009	Istafe issi issi asati “Ee izakko” gida. Baggayti “Iza deenna” gida. Izi qasse “Ta izakko” gides.
43009010	Istika “Histin ne ayfey waani xeellidee?” giidi oychida.
43009011	Izikka zaaridi “Yesusa geetettiza asi biitta bolla urqa munuqidi ta ayfeza he urqa tiyidinne tana ‘Baada Selihoomen meeceta’ gi yootin ta baada meecetada xeellanas dandayadis” gides.
43009012	Istika “Histin hessadey ha7i awan dizee?” gida. Izikka “Ta erike” gides.
43009013	Istika he kase ayfe qooqe addeza Farsaaweetakko efida.
43009014	Yesusi urqa munuqidi addeza ayfe pathida gallassay Ayhudata Sambata gallasa.
43009015	Hessa gish Farsaaweeti addeza izi wosti xeellidakkonne iza oychida. Addezikka zaaridi “Izi ta ayfen urqa tiyides; takka meecetadis; hekko ha7i xeelladis” gides.
43009016	Farsaaweetappe issi issi asati “Hayssi addezi Sambata bonchontadde gidida gish izi Xoossafe gidenna” gida. Baggay qasse “Nagaranchay hayssa mala malata waani ooththana dandayzee? gida. Hessa gish ista giddon palamay medhettides.
43009017	Histin kase ayfe qooqe addezako simmidi “Ha ne ayfe pathida addeza gish ne ay gay? gida. Addezi zaaridi “Izi nabekko!” gides.
43009018	Ayhudati addeza yelida aayeyranne aawara xeygisi ehisana gakkanaas addezi kase qooqe gididayssa ammanibetenna.
43009019	Istika yelidayta “Inte ‘nuus qooqe nay yeletides’ giza naazi hayssee? Histin ha7i waanidi xeellana dandayidee?” gida.
43009020	Yelidaytikka hizgi zaarida “Izi nu naa gididayssanne qooqe gididi yeletidayssa eroos.
43009021	Ha7i qasse izi waani xeellana dandayidakkonne iza ayfe ooni pogidakkonne nu erokko. Izi bana dandayiddade gidida gish izi ba gish yootanas Dandayees; iza oychite” gida.
43009022	Iza yelidayti hessatho giday oonikka Yesusa izi Kirstoosa giidi markattiday wuri Ayhudata woossa keeththafe goodettana mala Ayhudati kase seera ooththida gish Ayhudatas babbidi gida.
43009023	Hessa gish “Iza yelidayti izi bana dandayiddade gidida gish iza oychite” gida.
43009024	Kase qooqe addeza qasseka xeygidi “Haysso ne tumayo yootada Xoossa boncha. Hayssi addezi nagarancha gididayssa nu eroos” gida.
43009025	Izikka “Izi nagarancha gidin ta erike. Gido attin ta kase qooqe gididaronne qasse ha7i ta xeellizaro hanno xalla erays” gides.
43009026	Isti qasse iza “Izi nees ay ooththidee? Ne ayfeza wosti pogidee?” giidi oychida
43009027	Izikka “Ta intes kase yootin woznan woththi siybekketa shin ha7i qasse aazas zaarethi siyana koyetii? Inteka iza kaallizayta gidana koyetii?” gides.
43009028	Hessafe guye iza “Nu Muse kaallizadenta; ne iza kaallizade gida.
43009029	Kase Xoossi Musera haasayettidayssa nu eroos. Hayssi addezi awappe yidakkonne nu erokko” gida.
43009030	Addezikka istas “Izi awappekkonne inte erontayssi malalises. Gido attin ta ayfe xeelisidadey iza.
43009031	Xoossi baas yayyizadessinne iza shene ooththizades attin nagarancha as siyontayssa nu eroos.
43009032	Ayfe qooqidi yeletidade ayfey xeellides gizayssa alamey medhetosappe oonikka siyi erenna.
43009033	Hayssadey Xoossafe gidontakko hayssa ooththanas dandayenna” gi zaarides.
43009034	Istika iza “Neni nees mule asatethay nagaran munuqetin yeletidayssi nuna tamarsana waana xaladii?” giidi iza goodida.
43009035	Addeza goodidayssa Yesusi siydes. Iza demmidinne “Ne Asa Nan ammanay?” gides.
43009036	Addezikka “Godo! Ta izan ammanana mala izi oonnee?” giidi oychides.
43009037	Yesusikka “Ne iza beyadasa; ha7i nenara haasayizay izakko!” gides.
43009038	Addezikka “Godo! Iza ammanadis” giidi izas hokki goynnides.
43009039	Yesusikka “Qooqeti xeellana malanne xeellizayti qooqana mala pirdanas ta hayssa ha alame yadis” gides.
43009040	Izara diza Farsaaweetappe issi issi asati hessa siydi “Hessi ay guussee? Histin nukka qooqee?” gida.
43009041	Yesusikka ista “Inte qooqeta gididakko intes nagara gidenna shin inte ha7i ‘Nu xeelloos’ giza gish inte nagarancha gidida mala daana” gides.
43010001	Yesusi, “Ta intes tumu gays; dorsata yire pengerappe attin hara baggara guppi gelizay kaysonne bonqizade.
43010002	Pengera gelizadey izi dorsata heemmizade.
43010003	Penge naagizadey izas pengeza doyees. Dorsatikka iza qaala siyeetes. Ba dorsata sunthara sunthara xeygi kessees.
43010004	Bayta wursi kessidappe guye ista sinth aadhdhidi kaaleththees. Dorsatikka iza qaala eriza gish iza kaallettes.
43010005	Imatha asa qaala eronta gish izappe baqattettes attin mulekka iza kaallettenna.
43010006	Yesusi hessa leemisoza istas yootides shin isti qasse izi istas yootidayssa aykkokka eribetenna.
43010007	Hessa gish Yesusi qasseka istas “Ta intes tumu gays; dorsata pengey tana.
43010008	Taappe kase yidayti wuri kaysonne bonqizayta. Dorsati gidikko isti giza siybetenna
43010009	Pengey tana. Ta baggara gelizadey wuri attana; gelananne kezana; heemmetizasoka demmana.
43010010	Kaysoy kaysotana, wodhanassinne dhayssanas xalla yees. Ta gidikko intes de7oy daana malanne intes keehi darana mala yadis.
43010011	“Ta lo7o heemmizade; lo7o heemmizadey ba shempo ba dorsata gish aaththi imees.
43010012	Miishera qaxarettidi heemmizadey gidikko dorsati izas gidonta gish kana suytey yiza wode dorsata yeggidi baas baqatees. Kana suyteykka dorsata dafi dafi meessinne laalles.
43010013	Baqatizaddey miishan qaxarettidade gidida gishshinne dorsatas mishetonta gishassa.
43010014	“Lo7o henthanchay tana. Tani ta dorsata erays; Istika tana erettes.
43010015	Hessika Aaway tana erizayssa mala tani ta shempo dorsata gish aaththa immana.
43010016	Hayssa ha dorsa yiren gelontayti taas hara dorsati deettes; ta istaka haa ehanas taas bessees. Istika ta qaala siyananne issi mehe gidana. Heemmizayssika issade gidana.
43010017	Ta zaarada denthanas ta shempo ta aaththa immiza gish ta Aaway tana dosees.
43010018	Tani ta shempo ta dosara aaththa immadis attin oonikka taappe woththi ekkenna; ta aaththa immanas gidin woykko zaara denthanas gidin sheney taassa; hessa he azazoza tani ta Aawappe ekkadis” gides.
43010019	Hessa he qaalappe dendidayssan Ayhudata giddon qasseka shaaketethi medhetides.
43010020	Daro asay “Iza bolla daydanthi diza gishshinne goosh gidida gish inte izi gizayssa ays siyeetii? gida.
43010021	Baggayti qasse “Daydanthi dizaddey hayssa mala deenna. Daydanthi qooqida ayfe pathi erizee?” gida.
43010022	Yerusalamen Xoossa Keeththa ooratho ba7aale boncho wodey gakkides; he wodeykka balgo.
43010023	Yesusi Xoossa Keeththa gibbe giddon Solomoone simeretethasora aadhdhishin,
43010024	Ayhudati iza giddo aaththidi “Ne ayde gakkanaas nu wozna hirgan gam7isanee? Ne Xoossi kiittidade gidikko nuus qoncisa yoota” gida.
43010025	Yesusikka istas “Ta intes yootadisko shin inte qasse ammanibeyketa. Ta Aawa sunthan ta ooththiza malatati ta gish yootetes.
43010026	Inte qasse ta dorsata gidonta gish tana ammanekketa.
43010027	Ta dorsati ta qaala siyeetes. Takka ista erays; istika tana kaallettes.
43010028	Ta istas merna de7o immana; mulekka ista dhayetenna; ista ta kusheppe woththi ekkanas dandayanaddey oonikka deenna.
43010029	Taas ista immida ta Aaway ubbafe aadhdhees. Ta Aawa kusheppe ista oonikka bonqanas dandayenna.
43010030	Taninne ta aaway nu issino” gides.
43010031	Ayhudati iza caddanas qasseka shuch denthida.
43010032	Yesusikka “Aawappe gidida daro gita malatata ta intena bessadis. Histin ha ta bessidaytappe awaari gish tana shuchchara caddetii?” gides.
43010033	Ayuhudatikka “Nu nena shuchchara caddizay ne coo as gida uttada nena nerka Xoosse kessada cashsha qaala ne haasayida gishassafe attin ne lo7o ooththidaysa gish deenna” giidi izas zaarida.
43010034	Yesusikka istas “Inte woga giddon ‘Ta intena Xoossata gadis’ geetetti xaafetibenee?
43010035	Xoossa qaalay istas yida asata ‘Xoosse giikkone Maxaafay shaaretanas dandayonta gidikko’
43010036	histin ‘Ta Xoossa naa’ gida gish Aaway ba shaakki dummasidayssanne ha duge alame kiittidayssa inte ‘Ne cayadassa’ giidi tana wordora aazas mootetii?
43010037	Ta Aaway ooththizayssa ta ooththonta aggikko tanan ammanoppite.
43010038	Ta izatho ooththiza gidikko inte tana ammanonta aggikkokka ta Aaway tanan dizayssa takka izan dizayssa inte erana malanne yuushi qoppana mala izi ooththida malatan ammanite” gides.
43010039	Qasseka isti iza oykkanas koyda shin izi ista kusheppe kessi ekki bides.
43010040	Hessafe guye Yesusi, Yohannisi kase xammaqizaso gede Yordanooseppe he pinth simmidi heen gam7ides.
43010041	Daro asay izakko yides; Isti qasse “Yohannisi issi malataka ooththibenna; gido attin hayssa addeza gish izi yootidayssi wurikka tumuko” gida.
43010042	Henka daro asay Yesusan ammanides.
43011001	Bitaaniya geetettizason Maaramanne Martay diza gutan Alazaare geetettizadey sakettides.
43011002	Izi isha Alazaarey saketida Maarama kase Yesusa toho bolla shitto gussada Yesusa toho ba hu7e binanan quccidarokko.
43011003	Michetikka “Godo! Ne dosizayssi saketides” giidi as Yesusakko kiittida.
43011004	Yesusi hessa siydi “Ha sakoy Xoossa nay izan bonchettana malanne Xoossi bonchettanassafe attin iza hayqos gaththizaz deenna” gides.
43011005	Yesusi Marta izi micheyo Maaramonne Alazaare siiqees.
43011006	Gido attin Alazaarey saketidayssa siyi woththidi heen ba dizason nam7u gallas gam7ides.
43011007	Hessafe guye bana kaallizayta “Ane Yuhuda biitta simmi boos” gides.
43011008	Istika “Astamare! Guutha wodeppe kase asay nena shuchchara caddana koyetteskoshin; ne qasse ha7i he simma baanee?” gida.
43011009	Yesusi istas “Issi gallassan tammanne nam7u saatey dees denee? Gallasara hamuttiza asi ha alameza poo7on simeretiza gish dhuphetenna.
43011010	Dhuphetizadey gidikko izi qamara hamutizade. Gaasoyka poo7oy baynda gishassa” gides.
43011011	Hessa istas yootidappe guye “Nu lagge Alazaarey dhiskides; takka iza dhiskofe denthana bays” gides.
43011012	Iza kaallizayti iza “Godo! izi dhiskida gidikko dendana” gida.
43011013	Yesusi istas hessa yootiday Alazaare hayqo gishassa shin iza kaallizaytas qasse dhisko gish yootida misatides.
43011014	Hessa gish qoncera istas “Alazaarey hayqqides.
43011015	Inte ammanana mala ta heen doonta aggidayssi inte gish tana ufaysses; ha7i gidikko ane gede izakko boos” gides.
43011016	Qasse Didimoosa geetettiza Toomaassi hanko Yesusa kaallizayta “Ane nukka biidi izara issife hayqos” gides.
43011017	Yesusi bi gakkishin Alazaarey hayqqi moogetin oyddu gallas gidides.
43011018	Bitaaniyay Yerusalameppe bagga saate oge haakkees.
43011019	Ista ishay hayqida gish Maramonne Marta minthethanas daro Ayhuda asay istako shiiqides.
43011020	Yesusa yuussaa Martay siyada iza mokka ekkana badus; Maarama gidikko soon uttadus.
43011021	Martay Yesusa “Godo! Ne haan dizaakko ta ishay hayqqenakkoshin.
43011022	Ha7ikka gidikko ne woossida wursi Xoossi nees immanayssa ta erays” gadus.
43011023	Yesusikka izis “Ne ishay dendana” gides.
43011024	Martay qasse “Wursethan dentha wode izi dendanayssa takka erays” gadus.
43011025	Yesusikka izis “Dendoynne de7oy tana; tana ammanizadey hayqqikkoka paxa daana.
43011026	Tanan dizaddeynne tana ammanizadey mulekka hayqqenna; hessa ne ammanay?” gides.
43011027	Izakka zaarada “Ee Godo! Neni duge ha alameza kiitettida Xoossa Naa gididayssa ta ammanays” gadus.
43011028	Hessa gaadanne simmada ba micheyo Maaramo dumma xeeyga kessada “Astamarey nena koyees” gadus.
43011029	Maaramakka hessa siyida mala elela dendada izakko badus.
43011030	Hessa gakkanaas Yesusi Martara gaaggidason dees attin gede guta giddo gelbenna
43011031	Maaramo minthethishe izira soon diza Ayhudatikka Maarama pusuku ga denda eqqada kezidayssa beyidi iza Alazaare duufo achchan yeekkana biza misatin izo kaallida.
43011032	Maarama Yesusi dizaso gakka iza demmida mala iza toho bolla gufannada “Godo! Ne haan dizaakko ta ishay hayqqenakkoshin” gadus.
43011033	Izanne izo kaalli yida Ayhudati yeekkizayssa Yesusi beyidi daro mishetidi
43011034	“Iza awan moogidetii?” giidi oychides; Istika “Godo! Haa yaada beya” gida.
43011035	Yesusikka afunxides.
43011036	Ayhudatikka “Izi iza ay mala siiqizako beyte” gida.
43011037	Ista giddofe issi issi asati “Hayssi qooqe addeza ayfe pogdayssi hayssadey hayqqonta mala ooththanas dandayenee?” gida.
43011038	Yesusi iza woznay mishetin gede duufokko bides; duufozikka shuchchara gordettida gongolo.
43011039	Izikka ista “Shuchchaa denthite!” gides. Hayqqidayssa micheya Martay “Godo! Izi hayqqin hachchi oyddu gallas gidida gish xinqanakko!” gadus.
43011040	Yesusikka “Ne ammaniza gidikko Xoossa boncho beyandasa gaada nees ta yootabeykkinaa?” gides.
43011041	Hessa gish shuchcha denthida; Yesusikka pude salo xeelidi “Ta Aawawu! Ne ta gizaz siyida gish ta nena galatays.
43011042	Ne ubba gallas ta gizaz siyizayssa ta erays; gido attin ta hessa giday hayssan eqqida asati ne tana kiittidayssa ammanana malassa.
43011043	Yesusi hessa gidappe kaalethidi qaala dhoqu histidi “Alazaare! Ha keza!” giidi xeygides.
43011044	Hayqqida Alazaareyka kumeththa asatethay moogo may7on xaaxettida mala duufoppe kezides. Yesusikka “Birshi yeddite bo!” gides.
43011045	Hessa gish Maaramo minthethana yida Ayhudatappe daro asay Yesusi ooththidaysa beyidi izan ammanides.
