43011046	Istafe baggati biidi Yesusi ooththidaysa Farsaaweetas yootida.
43011047	Hessa Qeeseta halaqatinne Farsaaweeti Ayhudata duulata shiiqana mala xeygidi “Ha addezi daro dumma dumma malatata ooththidade gidida gish nu ay ooththikko lo7oo?
43011048	Nu co7u giikko asi wuri izan ammanananne Oroome asikka yiidi hayssa nu biittanne nu asa nuuppe ekkana” gida.
43011049	Ista giddofe issadey he layth Qeesetas waanna halaqa Qayaafay “Inte aykkokka erekketa.
43011050	Derey wuri dhayanappe dere gish issi asi hayqqikko lo7o gidanayssa gish yuushi qoppeketii?” gides.
43011051	Izi hessa bappe gidonta he layth izi Qeesetas halaqa gidida gish Yesusi Ayhuda dere gish sinthafe hayqqanayssa yootides.
43011052	Izi hayqqanay he dere asas xalala gidonta kase laalettida Xoossa naytaka issi bolla shiishshanaassa.
43011053	He gallassafe haa simmin iza wodhanas maqettida.
43011054	Hessa gish Yesusi he gallassafe haa simmin Ayhudata giddon qoncera simeretibenna. Gido attin duge bazzo biitta matan diza Efireeme geetettiza katamay dizaso biidi bana kaallizaytara heen takkides.
43011055	Ayhudati Paaziga ba7aaley matida mala ba7aaley gakkanappe kase geesho woga ooththanas daro asay dumma dumma dereppe Yerusalame yides.
43011056	Asay Yesusa koyishe Xoossa Keeththan eqqidi ba giddon issoy issara “Intes ay misatizee? Ba7aalezas yeenneshaa?” gides.
43011057	Qeeseta halaqatinne Farsaaweeti qasse Yesusa oykkanas izi awan dizaakkonne erizadey istas malatana mala kase azazi woththida.
43012001	Paaziga ba7aales buro usuppun gallassi attishin Yesusi hayqoppe denthida Alazaarey dizaso Bitaaniya bides.
43012002	Heen Yesusas kawo kaththidi Martay iza kawo mizishin izara issife maaddan uttidaytappe issoy Alazaare.
43012003	Maarama daro al7o waagara shametida bagga litro gidiza geeshsha nardoose shitto ekka yaada Yesusa toho bolla guussada tohoza ba hu7e binanara quccadus. Keeththakka shitto sawoy kumides.
43012004	Yesusa kaallizaytappe issoy Yesusa aaththi immana Asqoroonto Yuhuday,
43012005	“Hayssi shittozi heedzdzu xeetu dinares bayzettidi miishay aazas manqotas imettibenee?” gides.
43012006	Izi hessa giday miisha shiishshiza karaxite oykkizadey iza gidida gish shiiqiza miishafe baas shiishshidi go7ettizade gidida gishassa attin manqotas mishetidi gidenna.
43012007	Yesusi qasse “Hayssi shittozi taas moogo gallassas qofetidaz gidida gish he wode gakkanaas iza ba achchan naagu, bochchofte.
43012008	Manqoti ay wodekka intenara deettes. Gido attin inte tana ubba wode demmekketa” gides.
43012009	He wode daro Ayhuda asati Yesusi heen dizayssa eridi izakko yida; yidaytikka Yesusa xalala kosh gidonta Yesusi hayqoppe denthida Alazaareka beyanassa.
43012010	Hessa gish Qeeseta halaqati Yesusara Alazaareka gaththi wodhanas ba giddon zoretida.
43012011	Hessika Alazaare geedon daro Ayhuda asay Yesusakko bi biidi iza ammaniza gishassa.
43012012	Wontetha gallas ba7aaleza bonchana yida derey Yesusi Yerusalame yizayssa siydes.
43012013	Zamba hayth ekkidi Yesusa mokkana kezides; derey qaala dhoqu histidi “Hoosana! Goda sunthan yiza Isra7eele kawoy anjettidayssa!” gides.
43012014	Beni “Hanne! Xiyoone naye, babbofa! Hekko ne kawoy Hare gutte togidi yees” geetetti xaafetida mala Yesusi Hare gutte demmidi togides.
43012016	Iza kaallizayti hessa wursi koyro woznan woththibettena. Iza gish xaafetidaysanne izas oosettida hanokka wursi Yesusi hayqoppe dendidappe guye erida.
43012017	Alazaare duufoppe xeygidi hayqoppe denthida wode izara issife diza asay iza dentha gish markattida.
43012018	Daro asikka izi hessa mala gita malata ooththidaysa siydi iza mokkana kezides.
43012019	Hessa gish Farsaaweeti ba giddon issoy issa “Histin nuni ay ooththana dandayizonii? Beyte! Kumeththa derey attonta iza kaallees” gida.
43012020	Goynnanas ba7aalezas shiiqida asa giddon Girike dere asatikka deettes.
43012021	Istika Galila giddon diza Betesayda geetettiza dere as Piliphoosa geetettizadeko biidi “Godo! Nu Yesusa beyana koyoos” gida.
43012022	Piliphoosikka Indiraasas yootides. Indiraassinne Piliphoosi biidi Yesusas yootida.
43012023	Yesusikka istas “Hekko Asa Nay bonchettiza saatey gakkides.
43012024	Ta intes tumu gays; giste ayfey biittan wodhdhada hayqqonta co7u ga uttikko barka attawus. Iza hayqqiza gidikko hara daro ayfawus.
43012025	Ba shempo dosizaddey dhaysses. Hayssa Biitta bolla ba shempo ixizadey gidikko merna de7o demmees.
43012026	Taas ooththana koyizadey tana kaallo; Taas ooththizadey ta dizason daana; Taas ooththizade ta Aaway iza bonchana” gides.
43012027	Qasseka Yesusi “Hekko ta shempoya metotadus ‘Ta Aawawu! Ha saateype tana ashsha gooshaa?’ Ta hizgonta mala ta yiday hanno ha meto saateyssa.
43012028	“Ta Aawawu! Ne ne suntha boncha” gides. Hessafe kaallidi “Tani ta suntha bonchadis; qasseka gujja bonchana” giza qaalay saloppe yides.
43012029	Heen gadaan eqqida asay hessa siydi “Daday dadates” gida. Baggayti qasse “Kiitanchakko haasayizay” gida.
43012030	Yesusi “Hayssi giirissay yiday inte gishassa attin ta gish gidenna.
43012031	Hayssi alamey pirdettana wodey hayssa; hayssa dereza haariza Xala7ey ha7i gede kare yegettana.
43012032	Tani dhoqu gaada kaqettiza wode asa wursa taakko zaarana” gides.
43012033	Yesusi hessa yootiday izi ay mala hayqo hayqqanakko erissanassa.
43012034	Asay qasse “Nu wogan xaafetiday ‘Xoossi kiittidadey mernas daana’ gees; Histin ne qasse waanada ‘Asa Nay dhoqu gi kaqqettana bessees’ gay? Ne giza Asa Nay awayssee?” giidi oychida.
43012035	Yesusi istas “Ha7i guutha wodes intenara poo7oy dees; gadey dhumonta poo7ora hammuttite; Qamara hamuttizaddey izi awa bizakkonne erenna.
43012036	Inte poo7o nayta gidana mala poo7oy dishin poo7on ammanite” gides. Yesusi hessa gidappe guye biidi ista ayfeppe geemmides.
43012037	Yesusi istas hessa mala malata ista sinthan ooththinka Ayhudati izan ammanibeetenna.
43012038	Hessi haniday nabe Isayaassi “Godo! Nu markatetha ammaniday oonnee? Xoossa qaalay oonas qoncidee?” gida mala.
43012039	Hessa gish ammananas dandaybetenna; gaasoyka nabe Isayaassi kase,
43012040	“Isti ba ayfen beyidi, ba woznan yuushi qoppidi, simmonta malanne izi ista pathonta mala Xoossi ista ayfe qooqisides; ista woznakka muumisides” gi xaafida gishassa.
43012041	Isayaassi hessa giday Xoossi kiittidade boncho beyida gishassa; Hessa gish Yesusi yootides.
43012042	Gidikkoka Ayhudata halaqatappe daro asay Yesusa ammanides. Gido attin ista Ayhudata Woosa Keeththafe goodonta mala Farsaaweetas babbidi ba ammano qoncen markatibeetenna.
43012043	Isti hessatho haniday istas Xoossafe imettiza bonchofe aaththidi asappe imettiza boncho dosida gishassa.
43012044	Yesusi ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Tana ammanizadey tanan xalala gidonta tana kiittidayssanka ammanees.
43012045	Tana beyidaddey tana kiittidayssakka beyana.
43012046	Tana ammanizay wuri dhuman doonta mala ta poo7o gidada hayssa ha alameza yadis.
43012047	Ta qaala siydi ooththontade bolla pirdanay tana gidikke. Gaasoyka ta yiday alame ashshanas attin alame bolla pirdanas gidenna.
43012048	Tana koyontadenne ta qaala ekkontade bolla pirdanadey dees; ta izas yootida qaalay wurseththa gallas iza bolla pirdana.
43012049	Gaasoyka tani coo ta shenen yootabeykke; ta gizayssanne ta yootiza azazo taas immiday tana kiittida ta Aawa
43012050	Iza azazoy merna de7o gididayssa ta erays; Hessa gish ta yootizay wuri Aaway taas yootidayssa” gides.
43013001	He wodeykka Ayhudata Paaziga ba7aaleppe kase Yesusi hayssa alameza yeddidi Aawakko baana saatey gakkidayssa erides; hayssa alamezan diza ba baggata wursi siiqides. Wursethi gakkanaasikka dosides.
43013002	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti issife kawo miishin Simoona nay Asqoroonto Yuhuday Yesusa aaththi immana mala Xala7ey iza woznan iita qofa gelthides.
43013003	Yesusi Aaway izas godateth wursi immidayssanne izi Xoossa achchafe kezidi yidayssa, qasse simmidi Xoossako baanayssa erees.
43013004	Hessa gish maadda bollafe dendidinne may7o qaari woththidi pooxa ekkidi xeessan gixxides.
43013005	Toho meeciza gongen haaththe gujjidi bana kaallizayta toho meeche oykkides; Ba gixxida pooxanka meecida tohoza quccides.
43013006	Yesusi Simoona geetettiza Phexroosakko shiiqin Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi iza “Godo! Ne ta toho meecanee?” gides.
43013007	Yesusikka “Tani ooththizayssa ne ha7i eraka guyeppe qasse ne erandasa” gides.
43013008	Phexroosikka “Ne ta toho mulekka meecakka” gides. Yesusi qasse “Ta ne toho meeconta aggikko neessinne taas issifetethi deenna” gides.
43013009	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosikka zaaridi “Godo hessa gidikko taas toho xalala gidonta kushera hu7era wursa meeca” gides.
43013010	Yesusi qasse “Ba asatethi meecettidades kumeththa bollay geesh gidida gish izas toho meechafe attin hara koshshenna. Inte geeshsha shin ubbata deekketa” gides.
43013011	Yesusi “Inte ubbatikka geesh deekketa” giday iza aaththi immanaddey oonakkonne eriza gishassa.
43013012	Ista toho meecidappe guye ba may7o ekki may7idi kase ba uttidason simmi uttides. Qasse istas “Ta intes ay ooththidakkonne woznan woththidetii?
43013013	Inte tana Astamarenne Goda geeta; Ta qas Astamarenne Goda gidida gish inte guussay tumukko.
43013014	Histikko ta intes Godanne astamare gidashe inte toho meeciza gidikko inteka inte giddon issoy issa toho meecana bessees.
43013015	Ta intes ooththidaysa mala inteka ooththana mala ta intes leemiso bessadis.
43013016	Ta intes tumu gays; ashkaray godappe aadhdhenna; kiitettidadey kiitidadefe aadhdhenna.
43013017	Inte hayssa eridi ooson peyshshikko inte anjettidayta.
43013018	“Ta hayssa gizay inte ubbata gish deenna. Tani ta dooridayta wursa erays; gido attin ‘Ta kath midadey ta morke gididi ta bolla dendides’ giza maxaafa qaalay poletanas koshshees.
43013019	Ta hayssa ha7ira intes yootizay izi poletiza wode ta oonakkonne inte ammanana mala.
43013020	Ta intes tumu gays; ta kiittidade ekkizadey tana ekkees; tana ekkizadey tana kiittidade ekkees” gides.
43013021	Yesusi hessa gi simmidi keehi qofan gelidinne “Ta intes tumu gays; inte giddofe issadey tana aaththi immana” giidi qoncen yootides.
43013022	Iza kaallizayti hessa izi oona gish gidakkonne eronta gish ba giddon issoy issara xeeletida.
43013023	Iza kaallizayta giddofe Yesusi siiqiza issoy Yesusa achchan uttides.
43013024	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi Yohannisa som7i bessidi “Izi oona gish gizakkonne ane iza oycha” gides.
43013025	Hessa gish izi ba qoodhe gede Yesusa haythako shiishshidi “Godo! Izi oonnee?” giidi oychides.
43013026	Yesusikka zaaridi “Izaadey ta ha7i budena woxen dhim7ada barsizadde” gides. Hessa gi simmidi budena woxen dhim7i ekkidi Asqoroontofe yida Simoona naa Yuhuda barsides.
43013027	Yuhuday iza baadhida mala heerakka Xala7ey izan gelides. Yesusikka Yuhuda “Ne ooththanas qoppidayssa elela ooththa” gides.
43013028	Yesusi hessa aazas gidakkone maaddan uttida asappe yo7oy gelidadey oonikka deenna.
43013029	Yuhuday miish oykkizade gidida gish Yesusa kaallizaytappe baggati Yesusi Yuhuda “Ba7aalezas koshshizayssa shama woykko manqotas muxuwata imma” gida misatides.
43013030	Yuhudaykka budena baadhida mala heerakka kezidi bides. Izi bishin gadey qamakko.
43013031	Yuhuday kezi bidappe guye Yesusi “Asa Nay ha7i bonchettides; Iza gaason Xoossika bonchettides.
43013032	Xoossi iza gaason bonchettiza gidikko Xoossika iza bonchana; heerakka gam7onta bonchana.
43013033	Ta nayto, ta intenara daro wode gam7ikke; inte tana koyana, ta kase Ayhudata halaqataska ‘Ta bizaso inte yaana dandayekketa’ gaada yootida mala ha7ikka inteska hessatho yootays.
43013034	Inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqettana mala ta intes ooratha azazo immays. Ta intena siiqida mala inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqetite.
43013035	Inte inte giddon siiqetikko inte tana kaallizayta gididayssa asi wuri erana” gides.
43013036	Hessafe guye Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi Yesusa “Godo! Ne awa baanee?” giidi oychides. Yesusi qasse “Ta bizaso ne ha7i tana kaallana dandayakka shin guyeppe ne tana kaallana” gides.
43013037	Phexroosi “Godo! Ta nena ha7i kaallanas ays dandayikkinaa? Haray attoshin tani ta shempoka ne gish aaththa immana” gides.
43013038	Yesusikka zaaridi “Neni ne shempo ta gish aaththa immanee? Ta nees tumu gays; hach kuttoy waassanappe kasetada ne tana heedzdzuto kadana” gides.
43014001	Kaaleththidka Yesusi “Inte woznay metotoppo; Xoosse ammanite; tanaka ammanite.
43014002	Ta Aawa achchan daro duussasoy dees; hessa gidontakko ‘Intes daanaso giigissanas ta baana’ gaanashin.
43014003	Baada ta intes so giigissidappe guye inte ta dizason daana mala ta simma yaada intena ekkana.
43014004	Ta biza oge inte ereeta” gides.
43014005	Toomaassi “Godo! Ne awa bizakkonne nu erokkoshin, ogeza nu wosti eranas dandayizonii?” gides.
43014006	Yesusikka izas “Ogeynne, tumay, de7oyka tana; ta baggara gidikkofe attin oonikka Awakko baana asi deenna.
43014007	Inte tana erizako ta Aawakka eranakoshin; ha7i hayssafe guye inte iza erana; iza be7okka beydeta” gi zaarides.
43014008	Piliphoosi “Godo! Ne nuna Aawa bessikko nuus gidana” gides.
43014009	Yesusikka izas “Piliphoosa! Hayssa gakkanaas ta intenara de7inka ne tana erikii? Tana beyidadey Aawakka beydes; histin neni waanada ‘Nuna Aawa bessa gay?
43014010	Tani ta Aawan, ta Aawayka tanan dizayssa ammanikkii? Ta intes yootiza qaala yootizay ta shene mala deenna; gido attin oosoza wursi ooththizay tanan diza ta Aawa.
43014011	Tani Aawan diza mala, Aawayka tanan dizayssa inte ammanite; akay giikko ta ooththiza oosota gishikka tana ammanite.
43014012	Ta intes tumu gays; tana ammanizadey ta ooththiza ooso ooththana; hessafeka aaththi ooththana; gaasoyka tani Aawakko baana.
43014013	Aaway naaza gaason bonchettana mala inte ta sunthan woossidayssa ta intes wursa ooththana.
43014014	Inte ay miishika ta sunthan woossidayssa ta wursa ooththana.
43014015	“Inte tana dosiza gidikko ta azazoyo naagite.
43014016	Tani Aawa woossana; Izikka intenara mernas daana mala hara intena minthethanade intes immana.
43014017	Hayssi minthethiza Ayanay dere asay iza beyi eronta gish alamey ekkanas dandayonta Tumu Ayana; gido attin inte iza ereeta; gaasoyka izi intenara diza gishshinne izi inte gaaththan diza gishassa.
43014018	“Aawaynne aaya baynda nayta mala ta intena xalala aggikke; ta simmada ha inteko yaana.
43014019	Guuththa wodeppe guye dere asay tana beyenna shin inte gidikko beyandeta; tani de7on diza gish inteka de7on daandeta.
43014020	Tani ta Aawan diza mala inteka tanan dizayssanne takka intenan dizayssa inte he wode erandeta.
43014021	“Ta azazo ekkidi ooththizadey tana dosees; tana dosizaddekka ta Aaway doosees; Takka iza dosana; Tanaka izaades qoncisana” gides.
43014022	Asqoroonto Yuhuda gidonta hanko Yuhuday “Godo! Neni alame asas gidonta nuus wosta qoncisanee?” gides.
43014023	Yesusikka izas “Tana siiqizadey ta qaala naagana; ta Aawayka iza dosana; nuni izakko yaana; yiidikka izaadera issife daana.
43014024	Tana dosontaddey ta qaala naagenna; hayssi inte siyiza qaalay tana kiittida ta Aawa qaalappe attin ta qaala gidenna.
43014025	“Tani ha7i intenara dashe hayssa intes yootadis.
43014026	Aaway ta sunthan yeddana minthethiza Xillo Ayanay qas haniza wursi intena tamarsana; ta intes yootoyssaka wursi inte woznan wothana mala maaddana.
43014027	“Ta intes saroteth gido aggada bays; ta sarotethikka ta intes immana; ta intes immiza sarotethi alamey immiza sarotetha mala deenna. Inte woznay hirgofonne babbofo.
43014028	“ ‘Ta baana; Baadakka inteko simma yaana’ gaada ta intes kase yootidayssa siyideta; inte tana dossizakko tani ta Aawakko bizayssi intena ufayssanakkoshin. Gaasoyka Aaway taappe aadhdhees.
43014029	Hayssi haniza wode inte ammanana mala hayssa intes kaseta yootadis.
43014030	Hayssa alameza haariza Xala7ey yiza wodey gakkida gish ha7i ta intenara daro haasaykke; izi ta bolla aykkokka ooththanas izas wolqay deenna.
43014031	Gido attin tani Aawa dosizayssa alamey erana mala Aaway tana azazidayssa ta wursa polana. Ane hayssafe boos; dendite” gides.
43015001	Qasseka Yesusi “Tumu woyne mitha anoy tana; atakilteza oosanchay ta Aawa.
43015002	Ta bolla dishe ayfe immonta hagga wursi ta Aaway qanxi diggana; ayfiza hagga gujji ayfana mala qirxi geeshshana.
43015003	Ta intes yootida qaala gaason inte ha7i geeshshata.
43015004	Tanan diite; takka intenan daana; haggay woyne ano bolla doonta aggikko barka ayfe ayfana dandayontayssa mala inteka tanan doonta aggikko ayfe ayfanas dandayekketa.
43015005	“Tani woyne mithas ano; inte qas haggata; daro ayfe ayfizadey tanan dizaddenne takka izan dizadde; gaasoyka ta baynda inte aykkokka ooththanas dandayekketa.
43015006	Tanan bayndadey qanxettidi wora yegetida hagga mala kare yegettidi heen melana; heyta mala haggati issi bolla shiiqidi taman yeggetananne eexana.
43015007	Inte tanan diikko ta qaalayka intenan diikko inte koyidayssa oychikko demmana.
43015008	Daro ayfe inte ayfishin ta Aaway bonchettes; inte tana kaallizayta gididayssi hessan erettana.
43015009	“Aaway tana dosidayssatho takka intena dosadis; hessa gish inte ta siiqon diite.
43015010	Tani ta Aawa azazo polada iza siiqon dida mala inteka ta azazo polikko ta siiqon daana.
43015011	Hayssa ta intes yootizay ta ufayssi intenan gidana malanne inte ufaysika kumeth gidanassa.
43015012	Ta intes immiza azazoy ta intena siiqida mala inteka inte giddon issoy issara siiqetanassa.
43015013	Asi ba lagges ba shempo aaththi immoppe aadhdhiza siiqoy deenna.
43015014	Ta Intena azazizayssa ubba inte polikko inte ta laggeta.
43015015	Ashkaray goday ooththizayssa eronta gish hayssafe guye ta intena ashkarata giikke. Gido attin tani ta Aawappe siyidayssa wursa intes qoncisida gish ta intena ta laggeta gadis.
43015016	Ta intena dooradis attin inte tana dooribekketa; inte biidi daro ayfe ayfana mala inte ayfey eqqi daana mala ta intena wothadis; hessa gish inte ta sunthan woossidayssa wursi Aaway intes immana.
43015017	Hessa gish inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqettana mala ta intena azazays.
43015018	“Kaalethidikka Yesusi intena alamey ixikko intefe kase tana ixidayssa erite.
43015019	Inte ammanonta alame asa gidikko alame asay ba bagga gididadde dosees. Gido attin inte alame bagga gidonta gish ta intena alameppe shaakada doorida gish derey intena ixees.
43015020	‘Ashkaray godappe aadhdhenna’ gaada ta kase intes yootoyssa yuushi qoppite; isti tana goodizayti intenaka gooddana; Isti ta qaala naagizakko inte qaala naagana.
43015021	Isti tana kiittidade eronta gish ta gaason inte bolla hessa wursi ooththana.
43015022	Ta yaada istas yootontakko istas nagara gidenna. Ha7i qas ista nagaras hanno giza gaasoy baawa.
43015023	Tana ixizadey ta aawakka ixees.
43015024	Hara asi ooththonta ooso ta ista giddon ooththontako istas nagara gidennashin; ha7i isti hessa wursi beyidappe guye tanaka ta Aawakka ixida.
43015025	Hessika haniday kase ‘Tana gaasoy baynda dishin ixida’ geetettidi ista wogan xaafetida qaalay poletanassa.
43015026	“Gido attin Aawappe kezidi yaanays takka ta Aawa achchafe intes yeddanays Tuma Ayanay minthethizays yiidi izi ta gish markattana.
43015027	Inte koyroppekka tanara diza gish taas inteka markatandeta” gides.
43016001	Qasseka Yesusi “Hekko hayssa wursa ta intes inte ammanoy yark yarkofo gaada yootadis.
43016002	Isti intena ba keeththafe gooddana; haray attoshin intena wodhizadey wuri Xoossas ooththizade misatiza wodey yaana.
43016003	Isti hessatho ooththizay tanaka ta Aawakka eronta gishassa.
43016004	Ta hayssa intes hara yootiza wode inte ta intes gidayssa qoppanassa” gides. Kaaleththidika Yesusa “Hayssa wursa ta intes yootonta aggiday ta intenara issife diza gishassa.
43016005	“Ha7i qasse tana kiittidayssako baana gays; gido attin intefe oonikka ‘Ne awa baanee?’ giidi oychanay baawa.
43016006	Gido attin hayssa wursa ta intes yootida gish inte woznay muuzotes.
43016007	Ta qasse intes tumu gays; ta buussi intes go7a gidana; gaasoyka ta boonta aggikko minthethiza Ayanay inteko yeenna. Ta bidappe guye iza inteko yeddana.
43016008	Izi yiidi asa nagara gishshinne xillotetha gish qasseka pirda gish erisana.
43016009	Asa nagara gish izi erisanay asay tana ammanonta gishassa.
43016010	Xillotetha gish izi asa erisanay tani ta Aawakko biza gishshinne qasse nam7antho inte tana beyonta gishassa.
43016011	Pirda gish izi erisanay hayssa alameza haarizayssa bolla pirdetida gishassa.
43016012	“Ta intes buro yootana daro yo7oy dees; gido attin ha7i intena deexxana.
43016013	Tuma Ayanay yiidi intena tumay dizaso kaaleththana; gaasoyka izi siyidayssa yootana attin bappe gidonta gish izi sinthafe hanana yo7ota intes yootana.
43016014	Taas dizayssafe ekkidi izi intes yootiza gish tana bonchana.
43016015	Aawas gididay wurikka tayssa, ‘Taas gididayssafe ekkidi izi intes yootana’ ta giday hessassa” gides.
43016016	Yesusi gujjidi “Guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyekketa; qasseka guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyana” gides.
43016017	Iza kaallizaytappe baggati ba giddon “ ‘Hayssi nuus guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyekketa; qasseka guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyana; Qasse ta Aawakko baana’ guussi ay guussee?” gida.
43016018	“Histin hayssi ‘Guuththa wodeppe guye’ gizayssi izi aazee? izi yootizayssi nuus eretenna” giidi ba giddon zaari zaari oyshettida.
43016019	Isti iza oychanayssa Yesusi eridi istas hizgides “Inte inte giddon issoy issara oyshetizay ta intes ‘Guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyekketa; qasseka guuththa wodeppe guye inte tana beyana’ gida gishassee?
43016020	Ta intes tuma gays, inte waassananne yeekkanashin alamey gidikko ufayettana. Inte muuzotishin inte muuzoy ufayssan laamettana.
43016021	Macassi yelo wodey gakkishin miixas hirgawus shin naa yela yeggidappe guye biitta bolla nay yeletida gish ufayssafe dendidayssan kase ba waaydayssa zaara qopuku.
43016022	Hessatho inteka ha7i muuzoteta; qasse ta intena beyana inte woznaykka ufayettana; inte ufaysa zaari ekanadey deenna.
43016023	“Inte he wode taappe aykkoka woosseketa; Ta intes tumu gays; ta sunthan ta aawa woossikko izi intes wursikka immana.
43016024	Hanno gakkanaas inte ta sunthan aykkokka woossi erekketa; woossite inte ekkana; inte ufayssaykka kumeth gidana.
43016025	“Ha7i gakkanaas ta intes leemisora yootadis shin hayssafe guye ta leemisora yootonta wodey yaana. Gido attin Aawa gish intes wursa qoncisa yootana.
43016026	He wode inte ta sunthan woossana; Takka ‘Aawa inte gish woossana’ giikke.
43016027	Gaasoyka Aaway ba baggara intena dosiza gishassa. Aaway intena dosizay inte tana dosiza gishassinne ta Xoossa achchafe yida inte ammanida gishassa.
43016028	Tani Aawa achchafe kezada hayssa ha alame yadissinne qasseka ha alameza aggada Aawakko ta simma baana” gides
43016029	Iza kaallizayti “Hekko ne ha7i leemiso gidonta nuus qoncera yootadasa.
43016030	Ne wursa eriza malanne oonikka nena oychanas koshshontayssa ha7i nu eridos. Hessa gish ne Xoossa achchafe kezidayssa nu ammanoos” gida.
43016031	Yesusi istas “Inte ha7i ammanideta;
43016032	gido attin inte inte baggara baggara laalettidi tana xalla aggana wodey gakkides; he saateyakka ha7i gakkadus. Gido attin Aaway tanara gidida gish ta tarka diikke.
43016033	Ta hayssa intes yootizay inte tanan de7in intes sarotethi daana mala gaada yootays. Inte ha alamen dishin intes waayey dees; gido attin aykkoy ba ta alame xoonadis” gides.
43017001	Yesusi hessa gidappe guye pude salo dhoqu gi xeelidi “Ta Aawawu! Hekko ha7i saatey gakkides; ne nay nena bonchana mala neni ne naaza boncha.
43017002	Ne bonchanaykka ne izas immidaytas izi merna de7o immana mala ne izas asa ubba bolla godateth immida gishassa.
43017003	Merna de7oyka ne xalala tumu Xoossanne Ne kiittida Yesus Kirstoosa ero guussa.
43017004	Ne taas immida ooso tani wursada ha biitta bolla nena bonchadis.
43017005	Ta Aawawu! Alamey medhetanappe kase taas nenara diza bonchon ha7ikka tana ne achchan boncharki.
43017006	“Hayssa alame asappe ne taas doorada immida asatas ne oonakkonne ta istas nena qoncisadis; isti kasekka neyta shin ne taas immadasa; istika ne qaala naagida.
43017007	Ne taas immidayssi wurikka neeppe gididayssa isti ha7i erida.
43017008	Ne taas immida qaalataka istas immadis; istika ekkida; ta ne achchafe yidayssa isti tumappe erida; ne tana kiittidayssakka isti ammanida.
43017009	“Ta istas woossays; heyti ne taas immidayti isti neyta gidida gish ta istas woossays; gido attin hanko alame asas woossikke.
43017010	Taas gididay wurikka neyssa; neyssi wurikka tayssa; takka istan bonchettana.
43017011	Hayssafe guye tani hayssa alame bolla diikke; isti gidikko ha alame bolla deettes. Ha7i ta neekko bays; Geeshsha ta Aawawu! Hayta ne taas immidayta isti nu mala ba giddon issino gidana mala ne taas immida ne sunthan ista naaga.
43017012	Ta istara issife dashe ne taas immida ne sunthan ta ista naagadis; hessa gish kase xaafetida Geeeshsha Maxaafa qaalay polettana mala izi kasekka dhayoos diza naazappe attin istafe oonikka dhaybenna.
43017013	Ta qasse ha7i neekko bays; ta ha alameza bolla dashe hayssa yootizay ta ufayssi istan polettana mala gaada yootays.
43017014	Tani ne qaala istas immadis; tani ha alame as gidontayssa mala istika ha alame as gidettenna. Hessa gish ha alame asay ista ixxides.
43017015	Ne ista iitappe naagana mala ta nena woossays attin ne ista ha alameppe dentha efana mala ta nena woossikke.
43017016	Tani alame as gidontayssa mala istika ha alame as gidettenna.
43017017	Ne ista ne tuman nees shaaka; ne qaalayka tumu qaala.
43017018	Ne tana ha alame kiittoyssatho takka ista alameza bolla kiittadis.
43017019	Isti tumappe nees dumma as gidida mala tanikka tana ista gish dummassays.
43017020	“Ista qaala markatethan tana ammananayta gishara ta nena woossays attin ta nena ista gish xalala woossikke.
43017021	Ta woossizay isti wurikka issino gidana malassa. Ta Aawawu! Qasseka ne tanan diza mala istika nunan gidana malanne ne tana kiittidayssa ha alamey ammanana mala ta nena woossays.
43017022	Nuni nu giddon issino gidida mala istika ba giddon issino gidana mala ne taas immida bonchoza takka istas immadis.
43017023	Ta nena woossizay ta istan; nekka tanan gidida mala istika kumeth issino gidana malassa. Qasseka neni tana kiittida malanne tana ne siiqida mala istaka ne siiqidaysa alame asay eranaassa.
43017024	“Ta Aawawu! Ne tana hayssi alamey medhetanappe kase dossida gish ne taas immida ta bonchoza isti beyana mala hayta ne taas immidaytikka ta dizason tanara daana mala dosays.
43017025	Xillo gidida ta Aawawu! Nena alamey eribenna; Ta gidikko nena erays; haytikka ne tana kiittidayssa erida.
43017026	Ne tana siiqida siiqoy istan gidana malanne takka istan gidana mala istikka nena erana mala ooththadis. Qasseka isti erana mala ooththana” gides.
43018001	Hessa wursi yootidappe guye Yesusi bana kaallizaytara Qediroone geetettiza shoobba pinnidi atakilte giddo gelides.
43018002	Yesusinne iza kaallizayti kasekka he gadeyin daro wode issife shiiqiza gish Yesusa aaththi immida Yuhuday he gadeyo kasekka erees.
43018003	Hessa gish Yuhuday wotadarata, Qeeseta halaqatanne Farsaaweetappe kiitetti yida ashkarata wursi kaalethi ekkidi he isti shiiqizaso yides. Izara yida asay paanose, xompe, mashshanne toora oykkidi yides.
43018004	Yesusi ba bolla gakkanayssa wursi eridi yida asaakko biidi “Oona koyetii?” gides.
43018005	Isti qasse “Naazirete Yesusa koyoos” gida. Izikka istas “Tani iza” gides. Istas aaththi immida Yuhuday istara issife eqqides.
43018006	Yesusi “Ta iza” gida mala asati guye gandigaridi biitta bolla kundida.
43018007	Yesusi ha7ikka “Oona koyetii?” giidi oychin isti zaaridi “Naazirete Yesusa koyoos” gida.
43018008	Izikka zaaridi “Tani izakko! Histin inte koyizay tana gidikko hayti betto bochchofte” gides.
43018009	Hessi haniday “Ta Aawawu! Ne taas immidaytappe issadekka ta dhayssabeykke” gida qaalay polettana malassa.
43018010	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi giththa mashsha oykkida gish mashsha koohoppe shoddidi issi Qeeseta halaqa ashkara dizayssa haythe mashshara qanxi yeggides. He ashkaraza sunthi “Malkoosa” geetettes.
43018011	Yesusi qasse Phexroosa “Ne mashsha gede koohon zaara geltha. Aaway taas immida waaye ushsha ta uyonta aggana misatizee?” gides.
43018012	Hessafe guye wotadarati, ista azazizayssinne Ayhudata ashkarati Yesusa oykkidi qachida.
43018013	Koyro he laythan Qeesetas halaqa Qayaafa bollo Haannakko efida.
43018014	Qayaafay “Dere gish issadey hayqqikko lo7o” giidi Ayhudata daannata kase zoridade.
43018015	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosinne Yesusa kaallizaytappe issadey Yesusa kaallida. Hessadey Qeeseta halaqa achchan keehi eretidade. Hessa gish Yesusara issife Qeeseta halaqaza gibbe gelides.
43018016	Phexroosi gidikko pengefe kare baggara eqqides. Qeeseta halaqa achchan keehi eretidi Yesusa kaallizayssi yiidinne pengen diza garadeya Phexroosa gibbe giddo gelthana mala yootidi Phexroosa ekki gelides.
43018017	Penge naagiza garadeya Phexroosa “Nekka hessa addeza kaalliza asatappe issa diikkii?” gadus. Izi qasse “Tani iza kaallizade gidikke” gides.
43018018	Wodey meeggiza wode gidida gish oosanchatinne ashkarati tama eththidi eqqon ho7ettes. Phexroosikka istara eqqidi ho7ees.
43018019	He wode Qeeseta halaqay Yesusa iza kaallizayta gishshinne izi tamarsida timirte gish oychides.
43018020	Yesusikka izas “Ta asa ubbas qoncen yootadis; Ayhudati shiiqiza ista Woosa Keeththan gidinka Xoossa Keeththan tamarsadis; ta qotan haasayidazi aykkoykka deenna.
43018021	Histin ne tana oychizay aazee? Ta yootishin siyidayta oycha; ta yootidayssa isti ereetes” gides.
43018022	Yesusi hessa gida mala heen eqqida ashkaratappe issoy “Qeeseta halaqas hayssatho wosta zaaray” gishe Yesusa shagalan baqa shaayides.
43018023	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ta iita haasayida gidikko ane ta gooyssa ne markata; Ta yootiday likke gidikko tana aazas baqqay?” gides.
43018024	Hessafe guye Haannay Yesusa qachida mala Qeeseta halaqa Qayaafakko yeddides.
43018025	He wode Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi eqqidi tama ho7ishin hanko asay iza haysso! Ne Yesusa kaallizaytappe issa diikkii?” gida. Izikka zaaridi “Ta iza kaallizade diikke” giidi kadides.
43018026	Kase Phexroosi iza hayth qanxidayssa dabboy Qeeseta halaqa ashkaratappe issoy “Wona ta nena atakilteson istara dishin beyabekkinaa?” gides.
43018027	Phexroosi qasseka kadides; heerakka kuttoy waassides.
43018028	Hessafe guye Yesusa Qayaafa keeththafe dere ayssiza kawoza gibbe malado wontara ekki bida. Ayhuda asas Paaziga ba7aale dorsa asho miza wode gidida gish bana tunisonta mala giidi maladora dere ayssizayssa gibbe giddo gelibetenna.
43018029	Hessa gish Philaxoosi gede istako kezidi “Hayssa addeza inte aazas mootetii?” giidi oychides.
43018030	Isti qasse “Hayssi addezi iita ooththontade gididakko nu iza nees aaththi immokkoshin” gida
43018031	Philaxoosika “Inte iza ekki biidi inte woga mala pirdite” gides. Ayhudata ayssizayti qasse zaaridi “Nu asi wodhana mala nuus piqadey imettibenna” gides.
43018032	Hessika haniday Yesusi kase istas izi waani hayqqanakkonne yootida qaalay polettana gishassa.
43018033	Philaxoosi qasseka guye gibbe giddo gelidi Yesusa xeygisidi “Ne Ayhudata kawoo?” giidi oychides.
43018034	Yesusikka zaaridi “Ne hessa gizay neeppeyee? woykko hara asati ta gish nees yootidoo?” gides.
43018035	Philaxoosikka “Ta Ayhuda asee? Nena taas aaththi immidayti ne baggatanne Qeeseta halaqatakko; ne ay ooththadii?” gides.
43018036	Yesusikka “Ta kawotethi hayssa ha alame bolla gidenna. Ta kawotethi hayssa ha alame bolla gididakko Ayhudata daannata kushen ta kundonta mala ta ashkarati ta gish olettanakkoshin ta kawotethi gidikko ha alame bolla gidenna” gides.
43018037	Philaxoosika “Histin ne kawoo?” gides; Yesusi qasse “Tani ne gidayssa mala ee kawo; ta yeletidaynne ha biitta yiday tuma gish markattanassa. Tumappe gididay wuri ta qaala siyees” gides.
43018038	Philaxoosikka “Tumay aazee?” gides. Hessafe guye Philaxoosi nam7antho Ayhudatakko kezidi “Ta iza bolla aykko bala beyabekke.
43018039	Gido attin kasekka ta intes Paaziga ba7aale gallas issi qasho asi birshiza mala hayssa Ayhudata kawo intes birshana mala koyeetii?” gides.
43018040	Isti gidikko “Nuus Barbaane birsha attin hayssa deenna!” giidi waassida. Barbaaney ba hu7es panga.
43019001	Hessafe guye Philaxoosi Yesusa efidi garafissides.
43019002	Wotadaratikka aguntha zawude xaaxidi Yesusa hu7en woththida; zo7o kaabaka mayzida.
43019003	Izakko shiiqi shiiqidi “Ayhuda kawo saro! saro!” gi giidi iza shagalan baqqida.
43019004	Philaxoosi qasseka kare kessidi “Hekko ta iza bolla aykko mooroka demmontayssa inte erana mala ta iza intes haa kare kessana” gides.
43019005	Hessa gish Yesusi aguntha zawude hu7en woththi ekkidinne zo7o kaaba may7idi kare kezides. Philaxoosika istas “Hekko addezi hayssich!” gides.
43019006	Qeeseta halaqatinne ista ashkarati Yesusa beyidi “Ne iza kaqqa! Kaqqa!” gishe waassida. Philaxoosi qasse “Ta ta baggara iza bolla issi mooroka demmabekke; koykko inte efidi kaqqite” gides.
43019007	Ayhuda asati qasse “Nuus wogay dees; hayssi addezi bana Xoossa naa giza gish nu woga mala izas hayqoy bessees” gida.
43019008	Philaxoosi hessa isti gizayssa siydi daro babbides.
43019009	Gede gibbe gelidi Yesusa “Ne awappe yadii?” giidi oychides. Yesusi qasse izas ay zaaroka immibenna.
43019010	Hessa gish Philaxoosi “Ne taas yootikii? Ta nena kaqqanas woykko birsha yeddanas godateththi taas dizayssa erikii?” gides.
43019011	Yesusikka izas zaaridi “Sheney nees Xoossafe imettontako nees ta bolla ay godateththika deennashin; gido attin tana nees aaththi immidade bolla gita nagaray dees” gides.
43019012	Philaxoosi hessa Yesusa haasaya siyidappe guye iza birshi yeddana koyides shin Ayhudatas babbida gish isti “Ne hayssa addeza birshikko Oroome Kawo Qeesare bagga gidakka; gaasoykka bana barka kawothizadey wuri Qeesares morke” gishe wurikka waassida.
43019013	Philaxoosi hessa siyida mala Yesusa gede kare kessidi “Lochcha shuch” geetettiza soon pirda womboran uttides. He pirdasoy Ayhudata qaalara “Gabata” geetettes.
43019014	He wode gadey asi Paaziga ba7aales giigettiza gallassa. Wodeykka gallassafe usuppun saate mala gidides. He wode Philaxoosi Ayhudata “Hekko inte kawoy hayssich!” gides.
43019015	Gido attin isti qas “Gede digga! Gede digga! Kaqqa!” gishe waassida. Philaxoosika “Ta inte kawo kaqqoo?” gides. Qeeseta halaqati zaaridi “Nuus Qeesareppe hara kawoy deenna” gida.
43019016	Hessafe simmidi Philaxoosi Yesusa kaqqana mala istas aaththi immides. Istika Yesusa oykki ekki efida.
43019017	Hessafe guye Yesusi ba kaqqettana masqaleza tookkidi “Asa hu7e guuge” geetettizaso kezides. Hesoy Ayhudata qaalara “Golgota” geettettes.
43019018	Iza heen kaqqida. Yesusa giddo gelthidi hara nam7u asata izatho hadirisaranne ushachara kaqqida.
43019019	Philaxoosi “Naazirete Yesusi Ayhudata kawo” giza qaala xaafidi iza masqale bolla izas hu7esora qaaphides.
43019020	Yesusi kaqqettidasoy katamas mata gidida gish daro Ayhuda asay Philaxoosi xaafidayssa nabebides. Xaafetidaysikka Ayhudata qaalara, Laatine geetettiza qaalaranne Girike qaalara.
43019021	Ayhudata Qeeseta halaqati Philaxoosa “Ne iza Ayhudata kawo” gaada xaafoppa. Gido attin “ ‘Hayssi addezi bana ta Ayhudata kawo gides’ gaada xaafa” gida.
43019022	Philaxoosi qas “Ta xaafidayssa xaafadis” gides.
43019023	Wotadarati Yesusa kaqqidappe guye iza may7oza ekkidi wotadarata issa issa gakkana mala oyddu kessi shaakerethida. Garsara may7iza may7ozakka hessatho shaakerethida. Gido attin giddora may7iza may7ozi siketonta pudeppe duge gakkanaas coo yeda dees.
43019024	Hessa gish wotadarati ba giddon “Gishan oona gakkanakkonne erana mala iza bolla saama yeggana attin daakkokko” gida. Hessika haniday kase “Ta may7o isti gishetti ekkida, ta bollara may7iza may7oza bolla saama yeggida” geetettida Geeshsha maxaafa qaalay polettana malassa. Wotadaratikka hessa ooththida.
43019025	Yesusa masqale achchan iza aayeyanne aayeyi micheya Qaliyoopha macha Maaramanne Meg dale geetettizasoppe yida Maarama heen eqqida.
43019026	Yesusi ba aayeyonne izi siiqiza iza kaallizayssi ba achchan eqqidayta beyidi, ba aayeyo “Aayee! Ne naaza hessa beya” gides.
43019027	Hessafe kaaleththidi bana kaallizayssa “Ne aayo hinno beya” gides. Hinno he saateyppe simmin he iza kaallizayssi aayeyo baso efides.
43019028	Hessafe guye Yesusi ha7i wurikka poletidayssa eridi Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetidayssi polettana mala “Tana saamees” gides.
43019029	Heen gadaan caala phanqida ushshi kumi uttida issi xaaro malay dees. Hessa gish heen gadaan dizayti he caala ushsha zandza misatiza safnage geetettizayssara hisophe geetettiza mitha xeeran qaaphidi iza duunakko shiishida.
43019030	Yesusi he caala ushsha xunxi xeelidi “Polettides!” gides. Ba hu7e duge ziqqisidi shempo kezides.
43019031	Hessafe guye Ayhudata daannati kaqettida asata meqeth wodirappe menthidi isti iza masqale bollafe wothana mala Philaxoosa woossida. Isti hessa ooththiday Ayhudati sambatas giigettiza gallas gidida gishshinne he sambataykka daro gita ba7aale gidida gish Sambata gallas ahay masqale bolla gam7onta mala koyda gishassa.
43019032	Hessa gish wotadarati biidi Yesusara kaqettida asata meqeth wodirappe wodirappe menthida.
43019033	Isti Yesusakko biin izi kasetidinne hayqqidayssa beyidi iza wodira meqeth menthibeetenna.
43019034	Gido attin wotadarata giddofe issadey toorara iza millen caddin heerakka suuthinne haaththi gukkides.
43019035	Hessa beyidaddey inte izan ammanana mala markattides. Iza markaykka tuma. Izi yootizaykka tumu gididayssa izi erees.
43019036	Hessika haniday “Iza meqethafe issinaka meqquku” geetettida Geeshsha maxaafa qaalay poletanassa.
43019037	Qasseka Geeshsha Maxaafan harason “Isti ba cadidade beyana” gees.
43019038	Ayhudata daannata babbidi qotan Yesusa kaalliza Armatiyasa geetettizasoppe yida Yoosefey Yesusa aha ekkanas Philaxoosa woossin Philaxoosikka izas ero gides. Hessa gish Yoosefey biidi Yesusa aha ekkides.
43019039	Kase Yesusakko qamara yida Niqodimoosikka bagga kilo gidiza karbenne godare uuthara walaketida shitto ekki yides.
43019040	He nam7u asati Yesusa aha ekkidi Ayhudati aha xaaxiza mala shiito puukkidi lee7e may7ora xaaxida.
43019041	Yesusi kaqqettidason issi atakiltesoy dees. He atakiltezason oonikka moogetonta ooratha duufoy dees.
43019042	Ayhudata sambatas giigetiza gallas gidida gishshinne duufoykka matan diza gish Yesusa aha heen moogida.
43020001	Wogga gallas wonta malado buro bazzoy zo7ishin Magdale Maarama Yesusa duufokko badus. Iza he gakkishin kase Yesusa duufo izara gordida shuchchay duufoza duunappe dendidi genderidayssa beyadus.
43020002	Hessa gish iza Yesusa kaallizaytappe Simoona geetettiza Phexroosakko Yesusi dosiza hanko iza kaallizayssako woxxa baada “Goda duufoppe kessi ekkidi awan woththidakkone nu erokko” gadus.
43020003	Heerakka Phexroosinne Yesusa kaalliza hinko issoy kezidi gede duufoy dizaso bida.
43020004	Nam7aykka issife woxxida. Gido attin Yesusa kaalliza hinkoyssi Phexroosappe pilati woxxidi kaseti duufoy dizaso gakkides.
43020005	Duufoza hokki xeelidi ahay izan xaaxettida may7oy xalla dizayssa beyides; gido attin gede duufoza giddo gellibeenna.
43020006	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosikka iza kaalli gakkidi duufoza giddo gelides; ahay izan xaaxettida carqay heen dizayssa beyides.
43020007	Yesusa hu7ey xaaxettida carqay hanko xaaththa carqatara gidonta dumma harason xaaxetti dizayssa beyides.
43020008	Koyrotti gakkida Yesusa kaallizayssika duufoza giddo geli beyidi ammanides.
43020009	Gaasoyka “Izi hayqoppe dendana bessees” giza maxaafa qaala isti buro haasayibeetenna.
43020010	Hessafe guye nam7atikka simmidi baso baso bida.
43020011	Magdale Maarama yeekkashe Yesusa duufoppe karera eqqada hokka duufoza giddo xeelladus.
43020012	Yesusa ahay dizason bootha may7o may7ida nam7u kiitanchatappe issoy hu7eson issoy tohoson uttidayta beyadus.
43020013	Istika Maaramo “Hanne macasaye! Aazas yeekkay?” gida. Izakka “Isti ta Goda efidi awan woththidakkone ta erike” gadus.
43020014	Iza hinno gaada guye yuuyishin Yesusi eqqidayssa demmadus shin izi Yesusa gididayssa erabeyku.
43020015	Yesusi izo “Hanne macasayee! Aazas yeekkay? Qasse oona kooyay?” gides; izikka izis atakilte naagizade misatin “Godo! Ne ekkida gidikko ne woththidaso taas yootarki; Ta iza taas ekkana” gadus.
43020016	Yesusi izo “Maarame!” gides; izakka gede izakko simmada Ayhudata qaalara “Rebuune!” gadus; Hessa birsheththi “Astamaree!” guussa.
43020017	Yesusi qas “Ta buro pude ta Aawakko kezabeekke; tana bochofa; gido attin ne ha7i ta ishataako baada ‘Tani ta Aawakkone inte Aawakko, ta Xoossakkonne inte Xoossako kezana gides’ gaada istas yoota” gides.
43020018	Hessa gish Magdale Maarama Yesusa kaallizaytakko baada iza Yesusa beyidayssanne izi izis yootidayssa istas yootadus.
43020019	He gallas wogga omars Yesusa kaallizayti Ayhudata daannatas babbidi kare ba bolla goordidi keeththa giddon shiiqon dishin karey doyettonta Yesusi iza kaallizayti shiiqi diza keeththa gelides; ista giddon eqqidi “Saroy intes gido!” gides.
43020020	Hessa gi simmidi ba kushetanne ba mille ista bessides; iza kaallizaytikka Goda beyidi keehi ufayetida.
43020021	Hessafe guye qasseka Yesusi ista “Intes saroy gido! Ta Aaway tana kiittida mala takka intena kiittays” gides.
43020022	Hessa gi simmidi ista bolla ufu giidi “Inte Xillo Ayana ekkite.
43020023	Inte asa nagara atto giikko istas atto geetettana; inte asa nagara atto goonta ixikko qas intes atto geetettenna” gides.
43020024	Yesusi bana kaallizaytakko yida wode tammanne nam7atappe issoy Didimoosa geetettiza Toomaassi istara deenna.
43020025	Hessa gish hanko Yesusa kaallizayti Toomaasa “Nu Goda beydos” gida. Toomaassi qas “Misimaaren cadettida iza kusheta tani ta ayfera beyonta dashe, qasseka ta biradhdhe misimaarey gelidason geltha xeellonta dashenne ta kushe iza mille madunthan geltha xeellonta dashe ammanikke” gides.
43020026	Hessafe kaallin osupun gallassafe guye iza kaallizayti qasseka keeththa giddon dishin; Toomaaska istara issife dishin; kareykka gordan dishin Yesusi yiidi ista giddon eqqidi “Saroy intes gido!” gides.
43020027	Hessafe guye Toomaasa “Ne biradhdhe ha ehada ta kusheta beya. Ne kushe ha ehada ta millen geltha ammana attin ammanontade gidoppa” gides.
43020028	Toomaassi “Ta Godo! Ta Xoosso!” gides.
43020029	Yesusikka Toomaasa “Neni tana beyida gish ammanadasa; tana beyonta ammanizayti gidikko isti anjettidayta” gides.
43020030	Hayssa maxaafan xaafetonta daro malatata bana kaallizayta sinthan Yesusi ooththides.
43020031	Gido attin Yesusi izi Masihe, Xoossa naa gididayssa inte erana malanne inte iza sunthan ammanidi de7o demmana mala hayssi xaafetides.
43021001	Hessafe guye Yesusi Xibiraadoose Abba achchan bana kaallizaytas qasseka beettides.
43021002	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi, Didimoosa geetettiza Toomaassi, Galila Qaana as gidida Natina7eeley, Zabidoosa naytikka Yesusa kaallizaytappe hara nam7atikka wuri issife dishin
43021003	Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi istas “Ta mole oykkana bays” gides; istika izas “Nukka nenara baana” gida. Izara kezi biidi wogolon gelida shin he gallas omars issi molekka oykkibetenna.
43021004	Gadey wontishin Yesusi abba achchan eqqides; iza kaallizayti qas izi Yesusa gididayssa eribeetenna.
43021005	Yesusi ista “Nayto moley dizee?” gides; istika “Aykkoyka baawa” gida.
43021006	Izikka “Giteza wogolozappe ushacha baggara abban yeggite; inte demmana” gida gish giteza abba giddo yeggidanne daro moley oyketida gish giteza molezara goochana dandaybeetenna.
43021007	Hessa wode Yesusa kaallizaytappe izi siiqiza issoy Phexroosas “Hessi Godakko!” gides. Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi “Hessi Godakko!” giza qaala siyida mala kase ooso diggofo giidi may7o qaari woththidi kallo diza gish heerakka may7o ekki may7idi abba giddo guppi gelides.
43021008	Yesusa kaalliza hankoyti qas biittafe xeetu metre mala haakki diza gish moley kumi diza giteza goochchi ekkidi wogolora gakkida.
43021009	Isti wogolozappe wodhdhishin moley iza bolla diza bonqo tammanne ukethi beyida.
43021010	Yesusi ista “Ha7i inte oykkida molezappe ane ha ekki yiite” gides.
43021011	Hessa gish Simoona geetettiza Phexroosi wogoloza giddo gelidi xeetanne ichashu tammanne heedzdzu wogga gita moleti kumida giteza abbafe gede gade bolla goochchides. Hessa mala daro molera diinka gitezi daakkettibenna.
43021012	Hessafe guye Yesusi ista “Ha yiidi miite” gides. Izi Goda Yesusa gididayssa wuri erida gish iza kaallizaytappe issadeykka “Ne oonnee?” gi oychanas xalidadey baawa.
43021013	Yesusi yiidi ukethanne moleza ekkidi istas immides.
43021014	Yesusi hayqoppe dendin iza kaallizayti iza beyishin hayssi heedzdzantho.
43021015	Isti mi giigishin Yesusi Simoona Phexroosa “Yoona naa Simoona! Haytantafe ne tana aaththa tana dosay?” gides. Izikka “Ee ta Godo! Ta nena dosizayssa nekka eraasa” gides.
43021016	Yesusi iza “Ta dhammizayta heemma” gides; nam7anthokka “Yoona naa Simoona! Ne tana dosay?” gides; Izikka zaaridi “Ee Godo! Ta nena dosizayssa nekka eraasa” gides; Yesusi qasseka “Laaqqata naaga” gides.
43021017	Heedzdzantho “Yoona naa Simoona! Ne tana dosay?” gides. Izi heedzdzantho “Ne tana dosay?” gida gish Phexroosi michetidinne “Godo! Ne wursa eraasa ta nena dosizayssakka ne eraasa” gides; Yesusikka qasseka “Ta dorsata heemma.
43021018	Ta nees tumu gays; ne naatethan dashe ne giththe nerka gixxada ne koyidaso baasashin; ne cimmiza wode gidikko neni ne kusheta piddisin hara asi nena gixxisananne ne dosontaso nena efana” gides.
43021019	Yesusi iza hessatho giday Phexroosi ay mala hayqon Xoosse bonchanakkone izas erisanassa; hessafe guye Phexroosa “Ne tana kaalla” gides.
43021020	Phexroosi yuushi xeelidi Yesusi dosizayssi iza kaallishin beyides; hessadey kase isti kawo miishin Yesusa haythako shiiqidi “Godo! Nena aaththi immanadey izi oonnee?” gi oychides.
43021021	Phexroosi iza beyidi “Godo! Hayssadey waanandee?” giidi Yesusa oychides.
43021022	Yesusikka izas “Ta ha simma yaana gakkanawu ta iza paxa woththikko nena aazi gaththidee? Ne tana kaalla” gides.
43021023	Hessa gaason ishata giddon “Izi hayqo hayqqenna” giza worey laalettides. Gido attin Yesusi “Ta yaana gakkanaas paxa daana mala ta koykko nena aaze gaththiday?” gides attin “Hayqqaka” gibenna.
43021024	He yo7ota gish markattidaynne xaafiday ha Yesusa kaallizayssa; iza markatethikka tumu gididayssa nuni eroos.
43021025	Yesusi ooththida hara daroti deettes. Taas misatiza mala izi ooththida miishata wursi issi bolla xaafizakko xaafetiza maxaafata hayssi alamey tookkana dandayenna.
44001001	Tofiloosa, Yesusi ooththanassinne tamarsanas oykkidayssa wursa ta nees koyro maxaafan xaafadis.
44001002	Hessika izi pude dentha gallas gakkanaas ba doori kiittidaytas Xillo Ayana baggara izi istas immida azazokko.
44001003	Izi daro waaye beyidappe guye Istako shiiqidi hayqoppe dendanayssa istas daro markara qoncisishe oyddu tammu gallas gakkanaas istas gallas gallas beettishe Xoossa Kawoteththa gish yootides.
44001004	Istara issife maaddan utti dishe ista “Yerusalameppe kezoppite; gido attin ta intes yootishin inte siyidayssa ta Aaway immida ufayssa naagite.
44001005	Yohannisi haaththan xammaqides shin inte qas guuththa wodeppe guye Xillo Ayanan xammaqettana” giidi azazides.
44001006	Istika issi bolla shiiqeti dishe “Godo! Ne Isra7eeleta kawoteth zaarada ha7i essanee?” gi oychida.
44001007	Izikka istas “Aaway ba shenen woththida wode eroy intes imettibenna.
44001008	Gido attin Xillo Ayanay inte bolla wodhdhida wode inte wolqa ekkana. Yerusalamenka, Yuhudanikka, Samaariyanka ubbason biitta gaxa gakkanaas inte taas markata gidana” gides.
44001009	Hessa gi yootidappe guye isti xeellishin pude salo dendides. Salo shaaraykka ista ayfeppe iza geenthides.
44001010	Izi bishin isti iza tishshi histi pude salo xeellishin booththa may7o may7ida nam7u asati qopponta ista achchan eqqidi;
44001011	“Inteno Galila asato! Inte pude salo xeellishe hayssan aazas eqqidetii? Hayssi inte matappe pude salo dendishin inte beyiza Yesusi salo kezishin inte beyida mala hessathoka izi ha simmi yaana” gida.
44001012	Hessafe guye Dabrazayte geetettiza zuma bollafe wodhdhidi Yerusalame simmida. He zumaykka Yerusalameppe issi kilo metre mala haakkees.
44001013	Gede katamayo gelida wode kase ba diza keeththa Pooqe bolla kezida; heytikka Phexroosa, Yohannisa, Yaqoobe, Indiraasa, Piliphoosa, Toomaasa, Bartelemoosa, Matoosa, Ilfiyoosa naa Yaqoobe, ba bagga maaddizade geetettiza Simoonanne Yaqoobe naa Yuhuda.
44001014	Heyti wurikka macasatappe Yesusa aayo Maaramira hessathoka iza ishatara issi woznan issi bolla qanxonta minni woossida.
44001015	He gallasatan Phexroosi xeetanne nam7u tammu ammaniza asa giddon eqqidi,
44001016	“Ta ishato! Yesusa oykkida asata kaalethi ehida. Yuhuda gish Xillo Ayanay kasetidi Dawute duunan haasayida Geeshsha maxaafa qaalay polettana koshshees.
44001017	Izikka nuuppe issade mala taybettidi hayssa ha oosozan gellanas qaada demmides” gides.
44001018	Gidikkoka hayssadey ba iita ooson demmida miishan gade shamides; henka ba liiphen gufanni kundin iza asatethay giddofe phalqeti wodhdhides; iza maracey biitta bolla zaazetides.
44001019	Hessika Yerusalamen diza asas ubbas siyettides. Biittaykka ista qaalara “Akeldama” geetettides; hessas birsheththayka suutha biitta guussa.
44001020	Gujjidikka Phexroosi “Mazamure maxaafan ‘Iza gadey mela atto, izan ay asikka dooppo; qasseka iza daannateth hara asi ekko’ geetetti xaafettides.
44001021	“Hessa gish Goda Yesusi nunara diza wode ubban nunara issife dizayta giddofe nu issade dooranas koshshees.
44001022	Hessika Yohannisa xinqateppe haa simmin Yesusi nuuppe shaaketi dendi baana gakkanaas nunara dizadde gidanas bessees. Gaasoyka ha asatappe issadey nunara Yesusa denthas marka gidana koshshees” gides.
44001023	Hessa gish Barsabaasa woykko Yosxoosa geetettiza Yoosefenne Maatiyaasa nam7ata shiishshidi,
44001024	“Godo! Ne asa ubba wozna eraasa; hayta nam7ata giddofe ne oona dooridakko issade nuna bessa.
44001025	Yuhuday yeggi bidason ha oosa ooththanadenne Hawaare gidanadde ne doora” gi woossida.
44001026	Hessafe saama yeggin saamay Maatiyaasas kezides. Izikka tammanne issi Hawaaretara issife tayibettides.
44002001	Phenxaqoste geetettiza ba7aale gallassi gakkida wode asay wurikka issi soon shiiqi dishin;
44002002	qofay baynda daro mino gote carko mala giirissi yides; asay diza keeththakka kumides.
44002003	Tama laco inxarsa malay asas beettidi shaaketi shaaketi issi issi asa bolla uttides.
44002004	Ammanizayti wuri Xillo Ayanan kumidi Ayanay istas haasayanas immidayssa keena hara qaalara haasaya oykkida.
44002005	He wode salo gufanthon diza dereppe yida Xoossas babbiza Ayhudati Yerusalamen deettes.
44002006	He giirissa siydi derey shiiqides. Issi issi asay ba qaalara haasayizayssa siydi malalettida.
44002007	Malaletidinne gaanazi dhayin “Hayti haasayizayti wurikka Galila as deettenee?
44002008	Histin nuni nu yeletida nu dere qaalara isti haasayishin wosti siyizonii?
44002009	Nuni Pharteena asay, Meede asay, Eelaame asay, Mesopotoomiyan, Yuhudan, Qophodooqiyan, Phanxoosan, Iisiyan,
44002010	Firgiyan, Phinfiliyan, Gibxen, Qareena achchan diza Liibiyappenne Oroomeppe yidayti
44002011	Ayhudatinne gede Ayhudatethan gelida Qarxeese asanne Araabe asata gidishin Xoossa wolqama oosoza hayti nu qaalara haasayishin nu siyoos” gida.
44002012	Wurikka keehi malalettidinne gaanazi dhayin ba giddon “Hayssi aazeshaa?” geetettida.
44002013	Bagga asay “Hayti daro woyne cajje uyida” giidi ista qidhida.
44002014	He wode Phexroosi tammanne issinetara eqqidinne ba qaala dhoqu histidi deraas hizgides “Inteno Yuhuda asato! Yerusalamen dizayto! Inte wurikka hayssa issi miish eritenne ta gizayssa siyite.
44002015	Ha7i gadey wontin buro heedzdzu saate gidida gish inte qoppiza mala hayti asati mathotibeetenna.
44002016	Gido attin hayssi kase nabe Iyu7eelen hizgi yootetida qaalay poletanassa,
44002017	‘Xoossi Wursetha gallas ta Ayana asho may7ida ubba bolla ta gussana; inte maca naytinne inte attuma nayti tinbite haasayana; yelaga nayti ajjuta beyana; Cimati agumo agumettana.
44002018	He wode ta maca ashkarata bollanne ta attuma ashkarata bolla ta Ayanappe ta gussana. Istika tinbite haasayana.
44002019	Bolla Salon malalisiza hanota ta bessana, garsa sa7an malatata ta bessana; suuthi, tamaynne tulalay hanana.
44002020	Gitanne boncho gidida Goda gallassi yaanappe kasetidi awa arshey dhumana; Aginaykka suuth misatana.
44002021	Goda sunth xeygizay wuri attana’ gides.
44002022	“Isra7eele nayto! Hayssa qaala siyite; inte inte baggara erizayssa mala inte giddon malatanne asi siyi eronta miishata iza kushen ooththidi Xoossi Naazirete Yesusas markatides.
44002023	Xoossi kase ba qachidayssa izas beni eratetha mala hayssade inte kushen aaththi immides. Inteka iita asata kushen kaqeti hayqqana mala ooththideta.
44002024	Gido attin Xoossi iza bollafe hayqo wolqa diggidi hayqoppe denthides. Hayqoyka iza oykki ashshanas dandaybenna.
44002025	Dawuteykka iza gish ‘Tani Goda ubba wode ta sinthan beyays; izi ta ushachan dees; mulekka hirgike.
44002026	Hessa gish ta woznay ufayetees; ta duunaykka galatees; ta ashoy ufayssan daana.
44002027	Ne ta shempoyo Duufon aggaka; ne naa geeshshaza wooqana mala aggaggakka.
44002028	Ne de7o oge ta erana mala ooththadasa. Ne tanara diza gish ta ufayssay kumeththa’
44002029	“Ta ishato! Beni aawatappe Dawutey hayqqi moogetiddayssanne iza duufoy hach gakkanaas nu achchan dizayssa babbonta ta intes yootana danda7ays.
44002030	Izi nabe gidida gish Xoossi iza zerethafe issade iza kawoteththa alga bolla wothanayssa kase caaqo qaalan yootidayssa erides.
44002031	Hessa kasetidi erida gishshinne iza ashoy wooqi Duufon attonta doorettida Kirstoosa dentha gish haasayides.
44002032	He Yesusa Xoossi hayqoppe denthides. Nukka wuri hayssas markata.
44002033	Hessa gish izi Xoossa ushachchan dhoqu dhoqu gidappe guye Xillo Ayana ufaysa ba aawappe ekkidi ha7i inte beyizayssanne siyizayssa duge gussides.
44002034	Dawutey pude salo kezibenna; izi ba duunan ‘Goday ta Godas “Ta ne morketa ne toho garsan yedhissana gakkanaas ta ushachchan utta” gides.’
44002036	“Hessa gish Xoossi inte kaqqida Yesusa Godanne Kirstoosa histidayssa Isra7eele asay wuri lo7ethi ero” gides.
44002037	Derey hessa siyida mala woznay boshettides. Phexroosanne hanko Yesusi kiittidayta “Nu ishato! Histin nu ay ooththinoo?” gida.
44002038	Phexroosikka “Maarotethan gelite; inte nagaray maarettana mala intefe issi issi asi Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan xammaqettite; izi immiza Xillo Ayana inte ekkana.
44002039	Ufayssa qaalay intessinne inte naytassa; qasseka Goda Xoossi baako xeygiza haahon dizaytassara ubbassa” gides.
44002040	Hara daro qaalara istas markatishe “Hayssa geella yeletethafe intena ashshite” giidi ista qofisides.
44002041	He gallas qaala ekkidaytinne xammaqetidayti heedzdzu shi mala asay kaseyta bolla gujettides.
44002042	Istika Hawaareta timirten, issife quma muussaninne woossan minnida.
44002043	Hawaareta kushen daro malatati oosettida gish asi ubbay istas babbides.
44002044	Ammanidayti wurikka issife de7ida; baas dizazikka ubba issi bolla go7ettida.
44002045	Baas diza miishenne mehe bayzi bayzi ba giddon koshshida mala gishechchida.
44002046	Gallas gallas Xoossa Keeththan issife shiiqetes. Ba keeththanka quma issife ufayssaninne suure woznara meetes.
44002047	Isti Xoossa galatishe dere sinthan bonchettida. Godayka ista bolla gallas gallas oorath ammanizayta gujjides.
44003001	Issi wode gallassafe uddufun saate bolla Phexroosinne Yohannisi woossa saaten Xoossa Keeththe baana kezida.
44003002	Issi yeletosappe doommidi tohoy silidade Xoossa Keeththe geliza asappe miishe woossana mala asay gallas gallas tookki efidi woththin issi “Lo7o” geetettiza Xoossa Keeththa pengen woossizadey dees.
44003003	Izikka Phexroosinne Yohannisi Xoossa Keeththe gelishin beyida istafe miishe woossides.
44003004	Phexroosinne Yohannisi iza tishshi histi xeellida. Phexroosikka iza “Ane haa nuna xeella” gides.
44003005	Addezikka istafe aykko demmana giidi ista tishshi histi xeellides.
44003006	Gido attin Phexroosi izas zaaridi “Taas biraynne worqay deenna; gidikkokka taas dizaz ta nees immays; Naazirete Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan dendada ne tohora hamuta” gides.
44003007	Izas ushachcha kushe oykkidi denthides. Heerakka addeza tohoynne toho qirphey minnides.
44003008	Guppi dendi eqqidi hamuth oykkides. Yaanne haanne hamutishenne guppishe Xoossaka galatishe istara issife Xoossa Keeththa gibbe gelides.
44003009	Izi Xoossa galatishe yaanne haane simerettishin asay beyides.
44003010	Hayssadey hannife kase “Lo7o” geetettiza Xoossa Keeththa pengen uttidi miishe woossizay iza gididayssa erides. Iza bolla hanidayssafe dendidayssan asay keehi malaletides.
44003011	Ha paxida woossanchay Phexroosakonne Yohannisakko shiph giidi istara oykketi dishin derey wuri malaletidi istako “Solomoone simeretethaso” geetettizaso wothan yides.
44003012	Phexroosi he asa beyidi “Inteno Isra7eele dereto! Hayssan aazas malaletetii? Qasseka hayssa addeza nuni nu wolqan woykko nuni nu xillotethan pathidi hamutissida mala qoodidi nuna aazas tishshi histi xeelletii?
44003013	Nu aawanta Abrahaamenta, Yisaaqanta, Yaqoobenta Xoossi ba naaza Yesusa bonchides. Inte qas iza hayqos aaththi immideta; Philaxoosi izi birshana koynka inte ‘Koyokko’ gideta.
44003014	Geeshshanne xilloza inte kadidi shempo wodhizayssi birshettana mala woossideta.
44003015	De7o immizade inte wodhideta; gido attin Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthides; hessas nuni marka.
44003016	Hayssi inte beyizayssinne inte erizayssi minni eqqiday Yesusa sunthan ammanida gishassa. Inte wurikka beyiza mala izi kumeththa paxa demmiday Yesusa sunthaninne iza sunthan beettiza ammanona.
44003017	“Ha7ikka ta ishato! Inte hessa ooththiday inte halaqata mala eronta gididayssa ta erays.
44003018	Gidikkoka Kirstoosi waaye ekkanayssa Xoossi kase nabeta duunan haasayidayssa polides.
44003019	Hessa gish inte nagaray qucceti dhayana mala maarotethan gelite. Inte biza ogeppe simmite; Goda matappe inte ooraxana wodey intes yaana.
44003020	Qasseka Xoossi kase intes doori woththida Yesus Kirstoosa izi intes yeddana.
44003021	Xoossi kase geeshsha nabeta duunan haasayidayssa mala hanizayssa wursi ooraxissana wodey gakkanaas izi salon gam7anas koshshees.
44003022	Museykka ‘Inte Goda Xoossay inte giddofe ta mala nabe intes denthana. Izi intes yootizayssa siyite.
44003023	He nabeza siyonta ixida shempoy wuri dere giddofe shaaketi dhayo’
44003024	“Tumappe Sameelappe ha simmin dendida nabeti wuri hayta wodeta gish haasayida.
44003025	Inteka nabeta nayta. Qasseka Xoossi Abrahaames ‘Ne zerethan biitta asi wuri anjettana’ giidi izi caaqida caaqoza inte laattana.
44003026	Xoossi naaza denthida wode intena issa issa inte iitatethafe zaaridi anjana mala kasetidi inteko kiittides” gides.
44004001	Phexroosinne Yohannisi asas haasayan dishin Qeeseta Halaqatinne Xoossa Keeththa naagizayta halaqay qasseka Saduqaaweti akekonta istako yida.
44004002	Yiidinne Hawaareti asa tamarsizayssassinne Yesusa baggara bettida hayqqidayta dentha gish sabakizayssas keehi hanqettida.
44004003	Phexroosanne Yohannisa gadey qammishin oykidi wontana gakkanaas qasho keeththan ayssida.
44004004	Gido attin qaala siyida asappe dariza baggay ammanides. Ammaniza attuma asata qooday gede ichashu shi gakkanaas dhoqu gides.
44004005	Wontetha gallas ista halaqatinne cimati qasseka Muse woga tamarsizayti Yerusalamen shiiqida.
44004006	Ista Qeeseta halaqa Haanaynne Qayaafay, Yohannisi, Iskindirosinne Qeeseta halaqaso asay wuri he gadaan bettida.
44004007	Istika Phexroosanne Yohannisa ba giddon aaththi essidi “Hayssa inte ooththizay aaza wolqanee? Woykko oona sunthanee?” giidi oychida.
44004008	He wode Phexroosi Xillo Ayanan kumidi “Inteno dere halaqato! Dere cimato!
44004009	Inte hach ha toho sila addezas oosettida lo7o oosoy waani izi paxidakko inte nuna oychiza gidikko,
44004010	inte kaqqin Xoossi hayqoppe denthida Naazirete Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan izi paxidayssanne inte sinthan izi eqidayssa inteka Isra7eele dere asay wuri hayssa erite.
44004011	Izikka inte keeththa hiillati leqqi aggida shuchchay ginbe keeththas gula bolla bollara woththiza shuch gidides.
44004012	Atotethi hara oonanka ba; saloppe garsa baggara nu asa nayti attana mala nuus imettiday hayssafe hara sunthi deenna” gides.
44004013	Ayhudata duulata asaykka Phexroosinne Yohannisi hessatho xali haasayizayssa beyidi isti tamaronta as gididayssa eridi malaletidanne isti kase Yesusara dizayta gididayssa akeekida.
44004014	He paxida addezi istara eqqidishin beyida gish istas hara ooththanas gaasoy dhayides.
44004015	Hessa gish ista duulatappe kessana mala azazida. Hessafe qasseka shiiqetidi ba giddon zoretida.
44004016	Ba giddon “Hayta asata wostinoo? Yerusalamen diza asay wuri ista kushen hanida gita malata erides. Hessa gish nu ha yo7oza asa baleththanas dandayokko.
44004017	Gido attin hayssi yo7ozi dere giddon keehi aakkonta malanne hayti asati nam7antho hayssa ha sunthan hara oonaska yootonta mala istas lo7ethi yootana” gida.
44004018	Ista xeygidinne mulekka Yesusa sunthan haasayonta malanne tamarsonta mala azazida.
44004019	Phexroosinne Yohannisi qasse zaaridi “Nuni Xoossafe bollara intes azazettanas bessizakonne ane inte Xoossa sinthan pirdite.
44004020	Nuni nu beyidayssanne nu siyidayssa haasayanappe guye gookko” gida.
44004021	Qasseka ista bolla mandidi yeddida. Gaasoyka hanko derey wuri hanida yo7oza gaason wurikka Xoosse galatiza gish ista qaxayanas dandaybetenna.
44004022	He gita malatan paxida addezas laythi oyddu tammafe bolla.
44004023	Phexroosinne Yohannisi qashoppe birshettidi gede ba asatakko simmidi Qeeseta Halaqatinne Dere cimati ista gidayssa wursika yootida.
44004024	Istika hessa siyida mala ba qaala dhoqu histidi issife Xoossakko “Wogga Godawu! Neni salonne sa7a, abbanne abba giddon dizayta wursa medhadassa.
44004025	Ne ashkara nuus aawa Dawute duunara Xillo Ayanan ‘Dere asay aazas hanqetti dendidee? Derey aazas mela maqetizee?
44004026	Biitta kawoti issife gaaggidi biitta haarizayti issi bolla shiiqettidi Goda bollan ne dooretti tiyettidayssa bolla duulatida’ giidi waassida.
44004027	“Tumappe Herdoossinne Phanxoosa Philaxoosi Isra7eelataranne hara dere asara hanno katamayn ne doora tiyida geeshsha naaza Yesusa bolla yo7o qachanas shiiqetida.
44004028	Hayssanka ne wolqaninne ne shenen kase ne qoppidayssa isti polida.
44004029	Godo! Ha7ikka ista mandeza ne beya; nuni ne aylleti ne qaala babbonta kumeththa xalatethara yootana mala dandayissa.
44004030	Pathanas ne kushe micca. Ne naa geeshshaza sunthan gita malata ooththa” gida.
44004031	Isti woossidappe guye isti dizasoy qaaxides. Wurikka Xillo Ayanan kumidi Xoossa qaala xalatethan yootida.
44004032	Ammanizayti wurikka issi woznaninne issi qofan gaaggi deettes. Istas dizay wuri issi bolla dees attin baas dizaz “Hayssi taas buzo miisha” gizaddey deenna.
44004033	Hawaaretikka Goda Yesusa dentha gita wolqan markateth oykkida. Ubba bolla gita Xoossa kiyatethi dees.
44004034	Ista giddon metotanchay issadeykka baawa. Gaasoyka gade gidin keeththe gidin baas diza wursi bayzi bayzi shiishida miish
44004035	Hawaareta kushen woththidi issi issades izas koshshiza mala gisheettes.
44004036	Qophiroose geetettizason diza Yoosefe geetettizadey issi Lewe bagga asi dees. Izikka Hawaaretan “Barnabaasa” geetetti summides. Hessas birsheththay “Minthetho naa” guussa.
44004037	Izikka ba gade bayzida miisha ehidi Hawaareta kushen woththides.
44005001	Issi Hananiya geetettiza asi Saphphira geetettiza ba macheyra ba gade bayzides.
44005002	Macheya Saphphiray lo7etha erishin gadeza bayzida miishafe bagga shaakki ashshidi bagga ehidi Hawaareta kushen immides.
44005003	Qasse Phexroosi “Haysso Hananiya! Neni Xillo Ayana bolla wordotanassinne gade miishafe ashshana mala Xala7ey ays ne woznan gelidee? Bayzanappe kase gadezi neyssa gidenee? Ne bayzidappe guye qasse miishay ne kushen deenee? Histin ne hayssa mala wosta ne woznan qoppadii? Ne Xoossa bolla wordotadassa attin asa bolla gidenna” gides.
44005005	Hessa siyida mala Hananiyay kundi hayqqides. Hessa siyida asay wuri daro babbides.
44005006	Attumasay dendidi aha xaaxidinne heerakka efidi moogides.
44005007	Heedzdzu saateppe guye macheya izi waanidakkonne eronta dashe yadus.
44005008	Phexroosikka “Ane taas yoota; inte gadeza bayzida waagay hanno xallaa?” gides. Izakka “Ee hanno ha waagayn bayzidos” gadus.
44005009	Phexroosikka “Inte Xoossa Ayana paacanas aysi issi duuna gididetii? Hekko ne azina moogida asati moogi simmidi karen penge bolla deettes. Isti nenakka kessi ekki efana” gides.
44005010	Iza siyida mala heerakka iza toho bolla kundada hayqqadus. Attumasaykka soo gelida mala hayqqidaro beyidi kessi efidi izi azina achchan moogida.
44005011	Kumeththa Woosa Keeththa asaynne hessa siyida asay wuri daro babbides.
44005012	Hawaaretikka dere giddon daro malatanne malalisiza miish ooththida. Ammanizayti wuri “Solomoone simeretethaso” geetettiza pengen shiiqeetes.
44005013	Istas babbida gish oonnikka istara walakketanas koyibenna. Gido attin derey ista keehi bonches.
44005014	Daro macasattinne addeti wodeppe woden Godan ammani ammani ista bolla gujettida.
44005015	Hessa gaason Phexroosi aadhdhishin haray attin iza eeshoy harganchatappe bagga harganchata bolla wodhdhana mala hargizayti ichchiza alga bollanne hala bolla karen ishiseetes.
44005016	Yerusalame yuushon diza katamatappe hargizaytanne tuna ayanay waayssizayta ehin wuri paxida.
44005017	Hessa wode Qeeseta Halaqaynne izara diza Saduqaaweta baggati wurikka qanate qanatizayta xalla gidida.
44005018	Hawaareta oykkidi qasho keeththe gelthida.
44005019	Gido attin Goda kiitanchay qamara qasho keeththa kare doyidi ista kessidi,
44005020	“Biidi Xoossa Keeththa gibbe giddon eqqidi hayssa de7o qaala ubba deres yootite” gides.
44005021	Gadey wontida mala istas yootidayssa Xoossa Keeththa gibbe gelidi dereza tamarso oykkida; Qeeseta halaqaynne izara dizayti yiidi Ayhudata duulatanne Isra7eele dere cimata kumeth issi bolla shiishida. Hawaareta qasho keeththafe ekki yaana mala as yeddida.
44005022	Kiiteti bida asati biidi ista qasho keeththan demmibeetenna; simmidinne
44005023	“Qasho keeththay lo7ethi qulfeti dees; naagizaytikka penge bolla eqqi dishin beyidos; gido attin nu doy gelishin qas keeththan oonikka ba” gida.
44005024	Xoossa Keeththi naagizayta halaqaynne Qeeseta Halaqatika hessa siyida mala hanozan daro malaletidanne istas hanoy wuri tikki gides.
44005025	Heerakka issi asi yiidi “Hekko inte qasho keeththe gelthida asati Xoossa Keeththa gibbe giddon eqqidi dere tamarson deettes” gides.
44005026	Xoossa Keeththe naagizayta halaqay ba oosanchatara biidi ista oykki ekki yides. Oykki ehidaytti asay bana shuchchara caddonta mala babbidi wolqathonta loddara ehida.
44005027	Hawaareta ehidi Ayhuda duulata sinthan essida. Qeeseta halaqaykka ista “Hayssa ha sunthan inte tamarsonta mala intes lo7ethi yootidoskoshin inte inte timirteza Yerusalame ubban kuntheta. Qasse nunakka ha addeza suuthas oyshetizayta histanas gixxi dendideta” gides.
44005029	Phexroosinne hanko Hawaaretikka zaaridi “Nuni asappe aaththidi Xoossas azazettanas bessees.
44005030	“Inte iza mitha bolla kaqqi wodhida Yesusa nu aawanta Xoossay iza hayqoppe denthides.
44005031	Izikka Isra7eele naytas nagarappe simmidi maarettana mala Xoossi iza ubbafe bollanne ashshizade histidi ba ushachchan dhoqu dhoqu histides.
44005032	Nunikka hayssas markata. Qasseka Xoossi baas azazettiza oonaska immida Xillo Ayanaykka marka” gida.
44005033	Asati hessa siydi iita hanqo hanqettida. Wodhanakka koyda.
44005034	Gido attin dere achchan keehi bonchettida issi woga astamare, izikka Gamalyaale geetettiza Farsaaweeta baggay dere cimata giddon dendi eqqidi Hawaareti guuththa wode karen gam7ana mala azazides.
44005035	Dere cimatas hizgides “Isra7eele asato! Inte hayta asata bolla ooththanayssa daro akeekkara ooththanas bessees.
44005036	Hayssafe kase issi Tewoodaasa geetettizadey bana gita as histi qoodi dendin oyddu xeetu derey iza kaallides. Gido attin izi asa kushen hayqqides. Iza kaallizaytikka coo laalettin iza hanoy coo mela attides.
44005037	Izappe guyekka derey taybetiza wode Galila Yuhuday dendidi daro dere banara kaalethides. Bana kaallizaytaka demmides shin izikka dhayides. Iza kaallizaytikka wuri dhayida.
44005038	“Hessa gish ta ha7i intena gizay hayta asata aggite, bochchofte. Ista qofay woykko ista oosoy asappe gidikko dhayana.
44005039	Xoossafe gidikko qas inte ista teqanas dandayekketa. Oone erizay inte Xoossara oyeetishe beettanakkonne” gides.
44005040	Istika iza zoreza ekkidi Hawaareta xeygidi garafissida. Nam7antho Yesusa sunthan haasayonta mala azazidi yeddida.
44005041	Hawaaretikka iza suntha gish kawuyanas bessiza gish daro ufayetishe dere cimata achchafe kezi bida.
44005042	Gallas gallas Xoossa Keeththaninne issa issa keeththan Yesusi izi Xoossi dooridade gididayssa tamarsofenne sabakoppe mulekka guye gibeetenna.
44006001	Ammanizayta qooday dari dari biza wode Girike biittafe yida Ayhuda asati Yuhudan diza Ayhuda asa guyera zigirettida. Gaasoyka ubba wode miza kath gishishe am7eta wudetonta aggida gishassa.
44006002	Hessa gish nu tammanne nam7u Hawaareti ammaniza harata issi bolla shiishshidi “Nuni kaththa gishon gelidi Xoossa qaala tamarso agganas bessenna.
44006003	Hessa gish nu ishato! Inte giddofe eranchata, Xillo Ayanan kumidaytanne lo7o markateth diza laapun asata doorite; hayssa alafeteth nu istas immana.
44006004	Nuni gidikko woossaninne qaala yooton minnana” gida.
44006005	Isti gida yo7oy siyidayta ufaysides; Ammanoninne Xillo Ayanan kumidayti Istifanoose, Piliphoosa, Phirosqoroosa, Niqaroona, Ximoona, Pharmenanne Yuhudatethan gelida Anxokiya dere as Niqoloosa doorida.
44006006	Heyta ehidi Hawaareta sinth shiishida. Istika ba kushe ista bolla woththidi istas woossida.
44006007	Xoossa qaalay akki akki bides. Ammanizayta qooday Yerusalamen dari dari bides. Qeesetappe daroti ammanida.
44006008	He wode Istifanoossi Xoossa immotethaninne wolqan kumidi dereza giddon gita malalisiza malatata ooththides.
44006009	Wozeti kezida geetetti xeeygetizasoppe Ayhudata Woosa Keeththafe yida as gidida Qareenappenne Iskindiriyappe; qasseka Kilqiyappenne Iisiya awurajjatappe yida asatikka wuri Istifanoosera marshetida.
44006010	Gido attin eratethan izi haasayiza haasayanne izan diza Ayana eqqetanas dandayibeetenna.
44006011	Hessa gish “Istifanoossi Musenne Xoosse cayishin nu siyidos” giza asata guyera giigissida.
44006012	He wode dereza, dere cimatanne woga tamarsizayta dentheththidine Istifanoose oythidi dere duulatakko shiishida.
44006013	Iza bolla “Hayssi addezi hayssa Xoossa Keeththa bollanne woga bolla cashsha qaala haasaya mulekka aggibenna.
44006014	Gaasoyka hayssi addezi ‘Naazirete Yesusi hayssa Xoossa Keeththa dhayssana’ gishininne ‘Nu Museppe ekkida woga laammana’ gi haasayishin nu siyidos” gi wordora markattiza asata shiishshidi markasida.
44006015	Duulata uttida asay wuri Istifanoose tishshi histi xeellishin iza ayfesoy istas kiitancha ayfeso misati beettides.
44007001	Qeeseta halaqay Istifanoose “Hayssi ne bolla shiiqida yo7ozi tumee?” gi oychides.
44007002	Istifanoossika hizgides “Ta ishato! Ta aawato! Ta gizayssa siyite! Nu aawa Abrahaamey Kaarane geetettizaso yaanappe kase buro Mesopotoomiyan dishin boncho Goday izas qoncidi,
44007003	‘Ne dereppenne ne dabbofe shaaketada ta nena bessizaso ba’ gides.
44007004	Izikka Kaldaweta biittafe kezidi Kaarane geetettiza biittan uttides. Iza aaway hayqqidappe guye inte ha7i dizaso ha dere iza ehides.
44007005	Haray attoshin issi tohoy eqqiza gadey izas hayssafe immetibenna. Gido attin he wode izas issi naykka baynda dishin izinne izappe guyen iza zerethi Biittayo laattana mala Xoossi izas caqqides.
44007006	Qasseka Xoossi izas hizgi yootides ‘Ne zerethi allaga biittan bete as gidana. Oyddu xeetu layth aylletetha qambara giddon waayettana.
44007007	Gido attin ista aylle mala haariza dere ta qaxayana. Hessafe guye isti he biittafe kezidi hanno ha soyn taas goynnana’ gides.
44007008	Hessafe guye qaxxara woga caaqo izas immides. Abrahaameyka Yisaaqa yelidi iza ospuntha gallas qaxxarides. Yisaaqaykka Yaqoobe yelides. Yaqoobeykka tammanne nam7u qommota yelides.
44007009	He qommota aawati Yoosefe bolla qanatidi iza aylletethas duge Gibxe bayzida. Gido attin Xoossi izara dees;
44007010	meto ubbafe iza ashshides. Gibxe kawo Paaroone sinthan boncho immides. Paarooney iza Gibxe biittaninne ba keeththa asa ubba bolla alafetethan shuumides.
44007011	“He wode Kanaaneninne Gibxen daro meto ehida gita koshay dendides. Nu aawataska miza kaththi dhayides.
44007012	Yaqoobey Gibxe deren kaththi dizayssa siydi nu aawata koyro Gibxe yeddides.
44007013	Isti nam7antho biza wode Yoosefey izi oonakkonne bana ba ishatas qoncisides. Paarooneykka Yoosefe ishata erides.
44007014	Hessafe guye Yoosefey kiittidi ba aawa Yaqoobenne laapun tammanne ichashu gidiza ba dabbota kumeth ehisides.
44007015	Yaqoobey duge Gibxe wodhdhides. Izikka nu aawatikka wuri heen hayqqida.
44007016	Ista ahaykka Seekeme geetettizaso efin Abrahaamey Eemoore naytappe ba miishan shammida duufon moogetides.
44007017	“Xoossi Abrahaames caaqida qaalay poletiza wodey matishin Gibxen diza nu asa qooday dari dari bides.
44007018	Hessafe guye Gibxe biittan Yoosefe eronta hara kawoy kawotides.
44007019	Izikka nu asa ba gene ooson metothides. Buro yelettida guutha nayti hayqqana malanne yelida nayta kare kessi wora yeggana mala wolqathides.
44007020	He wode Musey yeletides. Izikka Xoossa achchan dosettida mala lo7o naa gidides. Ba aawa keeththan heedzdzu agina al7isson diccides.
44007021	Izi gede wora yegetida wode kawo Paaroone maca naya demmada baas ekkadus. Ba naa mala ooththada dichchadus.
44007022	Museykka Gibxeta aadhdho eratetha wursi tamarides. Yo7on era; oosonka mino gidides.
44007023	“Muse laythi oyddu tammu gidida wode Musey ba ishata Isra7eele nayta beyanas ba woznan qoppides.
44007024	Izikka issi Gibxe asi Muse bagga asappe issade bolla qoho gaththishin beyidi ba bagga addeza maadides; he Gibxe addeza wodhidi he qohetidayssa halo kessides.
44007025	Muses Xoossi iza kushen ista wozanayssa iza asay akeekkiza misatides. Gido attin isti hessa yuushi qoppibetenna.
44007026	Wontetha gallas qasseka Isra7eele naytappe nam7ati ba giddon oyeetishin gakkidi oyeetizayta giigissanas koydi ‘Hayto! Asato inte inte giddon ishantakko; inte waanidi issoy issa qoheetii?’ gides.
44007027	“Ba laggeza bolla qoho gaththidayssi Muse sugi yeggidi ‘Nena nu bolla nuna haarizadenne nu bolla pirdizade ooththi shuumiday oonee? Woykko qamma Gibxe addeza wodhoyssatho tanakka wodhana koyay?’ gides.
44007029	Musey hessa siyida mala Midiyaame biitta beettidi heen bete as gidi de7ides; Yaanka nam7u attuma naa yelides.
44007030	“Hessafe oyddu tammu laythafe guye Siina zuma achchan diza bazzo biittan qeeri wora giddon eexiza tama lacon kiitanchay izas beettides.
44007031	Museykka iza beyida mala malaletides. Azakkonne shaakki eranas izi heen izakko shiiqishin Goda qaalay ‘Tani ne aawanta Xoossa Abrahaame, Yisaaqanne Yaqoobe Xoossa’ gishin siydes. Museykka daro daggamides; xeellanaska xalibenna.
44007033	“Godayka izas ‘Hayssi ne eqqidasoy geeshshaso gidida gish ne tohoppe caamma shodda. Gibxen diza ta dereta waaye ta tumappe beyadis; isti waassiza waaye waasoza ta siyada ista ashshanas wodhdhadis. Ne ha7ikka haaya; ta nena duge Gibxe zaarada kiitana’ gides.
44007035	“Histin heyti ‘Nu bolla nena haarizadenne pirdizade histi ooni shuumidee?’ giidi asay kase kadhida Muse Xoossi qeeri wora giddon izas bettida kiitancha baggara ista haarizadenne ashshizade histidi istako zaari yeddides.
44007036	Izikka ista kaalethidi Gibxeppe kessides. Gibxen, Zo7o Abbaninne bazzo biittan oyddu tammu laythi daro malalisiza miishatanne gita malatata istas ooththides.
44007037	“Isra7eele naytas ‘Ta mala nabe Xoossi inte giddofe denthana’ gidayssi hayssa Musekko!
44007038	Izikka Siina zuma bolla haasayida kiitancharanne bazzo biittan nu aawatara dere duulata giddon dees. De7o qaalakka ha nuus aaththanas ekkides.
44007039	“Nu Aawati gidikko izara eqqetida attin izas azazettanas koyonta gish ba woznara guye Gibxe simmida.
44007040	Aaroneska ‘Nu sinthara biza eeqa nuus giigissa! Nuna Gibxeppe kaalethi kessida Musey waanidakko nu erokko’ gida.
44007041	He wode mara misile medhidi eeqas yarsho shiishida. Barka medhdhida ba kushe ooson ufayetidi guppida.
44007042	“Gido attin Xoossi istas zokko zaarides. Isti salo xoolintetas goynnana mala aaththi immides. Hessika nabeta maxaafan ‘Inteno Isra7eele nayto! Inte bazzo biittan oyddu tammu layth diza wode intefe yarshonne muxuwata taas shiishshi eretii?
44007043	Harappeka inte goynnanaso ooththida eeqa Molooke dunkananne inte eeqa Rafaanne xoolinte misileza dhoqu dhoqu histi oykkideta. Hessa gish ta intena inte dizasoppe denthada Babiloonera aaththa yeddana’ geetettidi xaafettides.
44007044	“Xoossi Muse bessida leemisoza malanne azazidayssa mala oosettida Xoossi asara gaaggiza dunkaneya nu aawatara bazzo biittan de7adus.
44007045	Nu Aawati dunkaneyo ekkidayssafe guye Xoossi Iyaaso kaaleththin kase ista gooddida dereta laattida wode dunkaneyo ekki geellida. Dawute wode gakkanaas dunkaneya he biittan de7adus.
44007046	Dawuteykka Xoossa sinthan boncho demmidi Yaqoobe Godas aqoso giigissanas woossides.
44007047	Gido attin Solomooney izas aqqoso keexxides.
44007048	“Gido attin wogga Goday asa kushey keexida keeththan deenna. Hessika nabey kase Geeshsha maxaafan xaafetida mala ‘Saloy ta uttiza alga; biittaykka ta tohon yedhdhizaso; histin inte taas ay mala keeththe keexxetii? woykko ta shempanasoy awayssee? Hayssa wursi ta kushey ooththibenee?’ gees Goday Xoossay.
44007051	“Inteno wozna muumeto! Haytha tulleto! Inteka inte aawata mala ubba wode Xillo Ayanara eqetteta.
44007052	Nabetappe inte Aawati gooddonta nabey oonee? Xilloza Yohannisa kaseti yootida nabetaka wodhida; inteka ha7i iza aaththi immidetanne wodhideta.
44007053	Kiitancha baggara intes imettida woga ekkideta attin naagibeekketa” gides.
44007054	Duulatan diza asay hessa siyida mala daro hanqettidi, iza bolla ba achchi garcides.
44007055	Gidinka Istifanoosi Xillo Ayanan kumidinne pude salo tishshi histi xeellishin Xoossa bonchon Yesusi Xoossa ushachchan eqqidayssa beyidi “Hekko ta saloy doyettidayssanne Asa Nay Xoossa ushachchan eqqidayssa beyays” gides.
44007057	Hessa wode asay qaala dhoqu histi waassishe ba haythe tucci oykidi izakko issife woxxides.
44007058	Istifanoose oykkidi katamappe gede kare olida. Shuchchan cach oykkida. Hessi wuri hanishin markatikka ba may7o Sawule geetettiza paantha achchan woththida.
44007059	Isti shuchchara iza caddishin Istifanoossi “Ta Goda Yesusaa ta shempoyo neekko ekka” giidi woossides.
44007060	Qasseka gulbatidi dhoqa qaalan “Godo! Haytanta nagara qoodoppa” giidi waassides. Hessa gidappe guye hayqqides.
44008001	Sawuleykka Istifanoose hayqon istara qofan gaaggides. He wode Yerusalamen diza ammanizayta bolla gita goodeteththi dendides. Hawaareti attaafe ammanizayti wuri Yuhuda awurajjaninne Samaariya awurajjan ubban laalettida.
44008002	Ayana ooson minni eqqida asati Istifanoose moogidi, izas daro yeekkida.
44008003	Sawuley qasse Woosa Keeththa dhayssanas gixxi dendides. Ammaniza asa issa issa keeththe gelidi macatanne addeta goochchi goochchi kessidi qasho keeththan gelthides.
44008004	Laalettidayti wuri ba bidason bidason Xoossa qaala yootida.
44008005	Piliphoosikka Samaariya geetettiza katama wodhdhidi asas Kirstoosa sabakides.
44008006	Daro derey Piliphoosi ooththiza malata beyidi izi yootiza qaala woznappe lo7ethi siydes.
44008007	Tuna ayanatikka daro asappe waassi waassi kezida. Daro toho silatinne wobetikka paxida.
44008008	Hessa gish he katama asay daro ufayetides.
44008009	Gido attin hessafe kase he katamayin maro marotidi Samaariya asa daro malalisizaz ooththiza issi Simoona geetettiza maroy dees. Izikka bana gita asa mala qoodizade.
44008010	Asay wuri guuthatappe gitata gakkanaas wurikka “Hayssi addezi gita wolqama geetettiza Xoossa wolqa” gishe izi gizayssa wursi woznappe siyees.
44008011	Daro wode ba marotetha ooson asa malalisida gish asay iza woznappe kaallishe gam7ides.
44008012	Gido attin Piliphoosi Xoossa Kawoteththa gishshinne Yesus Kirstoosa gish sabakidayssa siydi ammanida macasaynne attumasay xammaqetides.
44008013	Simoonikka ammanidi xammaqetides. Piliphoosakka kaalli biidi haniza gita malata beyidi malalettides.
44008014	Yerusalamen diza Hawaareti Samaariya asay Xoossa qaala ekkidi ammanidayssa siydi Phexroosanne Yohannisa Istako kiittida.
44008015	Istika Samaariya gakkidi ammanida asay Xillo Ayana ekkana mala asas woossida.
44008016	Gaasoyka he wode isti coo Yesusa sunthan xammaqetida attin buro Xillo Ayanay istafe issade bollakka wodhdhibenna.
44008017	Hessa gish Phexroosinne Yohannisi ba kushe asa bolla woththin asay Xillo Ayana ekkides.
44008018	Simoonikka Hawaareti kushe woththi woossin Xillo Ayanay imettizayssa beyidi Phexroosasinne Yohannisas miishe ekki yiidi,
