44008019	“Ta iza bolla ta kushe woththizadey wuri Xillo Ayana ekkana mala hayssa mala godateth taaska immite” giin,
44008020	Phexroosi izas zaaridi “Xoossa imota ne miishan shammana qoppida gish neni ne miishara issife dhaya.
44008021	Ne woznay Xoossa sinthan suure gidonta gish nees hayssa ha oosozan gishay woykko qaaday deenna.
44008022	Hayssa ne iitatetha gish ha7i elle maarotethan gela; ne wozna qofa nees atto gaanakkonne nees Goda woossa.
44008023	Gaasoyka neni iitatethan kumidayssinne makalan qasheta uttidayssi taas beettees” gides.
44008024	Simoonikka zaaridi “Inte gida yo7otappe aykkoykka ta bolla gakkonta mala taas Goda woossite” gides.
44008025	Phexroosinne Yohannisi Goda qaala markattidayssafenne qoncisi yootidayssafe guye daro Samaariya gutatan mishiraachcho qaala sabakishe Yerusalame simmida.
44008026	Goda kiitanchay Piliphoosa “Denda! Yerusalameppe duge baggara gede Gaaza efiza bazzo ogara ba” gides.
44008027	Izikka dendi bides. Hindeko geetettiza Tophiyappe gidida kawoya ba keeththaninne ba kawoteththan diza ubba miisha bolla alafetethan woththida issi Tophiya gundula asi izara gaaggides. He addezi Xoossas goynnana Yerusalame bides.
44008028	Izi heeppe simmishe para-gaaren uttidi nabe Isayaasa maxaafa nababes.
44008029	Ayanay Piliphoosa “Ba! Gede para-gaarezakko shiiqa” gides.
44008030	Piliphoosikka eesotidi para-gaarezakko biidi addezi nabe Isayaasa maxaafa nababishin siydi “Hessi ne nababizayssi nees gelizee?” gides.
44008031	Gundula addezikka “Tana erisiza asi baynda ta wosta eroo?” gides. Izikka gede iza gaarezan geldi iza achchan uttana mala woossides.
44008032	Izi nababiza maxaafay “Izi dorsa mala shukettana laagettides; dorsa laaqay isike qanxizayssa sinthan co7u giza mala hessathoka izi ba duuna pogibenna.
44008033	Bana kawushshidi pirday bayndade gidides. Iza shempoy biitta bollafe diggettides. Iza yeletetha gish haasayana dandayizay oonee?” gees.
44008034	Gundula addezikka zaaridi Piliphoosa “Nabezi hayssa oona gish gizee? Ba gish gizeyee? Woykko hara asa gish gizee? Hayana, taas yootarki!” gides.
44008035	Piliphoosikka ba duuna doydi he maxaafappe doommidi Yesusa Mishiraachcho qaala gish markattides.
44008036	Isti issife bishe haaththi dizaso gakkida. Addezikka “Hekko haaththi hayssan dees; histin ta xammaqetonta mala diggizay aazee?” gides.
44008037	Piliphoosikka “Ne kumeththa woznappe ammanikko xammaqettana dandayassa” gides. Addezikka “Yesus Kirstoosi Xoossa Naa gididayssa ammanays” gides.
44008038	Addezi para gaarezi eqqana mala azazin nam7ay issife haaththan wodhdhin Piliphoosi addeza xammaqides.
44008039	Isti haaththafe kezishin Xoossa Ayanay Piliphoosa denthi efides. Addezi hessafe guye iza beybenna. Gido attin ufayssan ba oge bides.
44008040	Hessafe guye Piliphoosi Azaxoone geetettizason beettides. Qisaariya geetettizaso gakkanaas izi biza oge bolla kataman ubban mishiraachcho qaala sabakides.
44009001	Sawuley Goda ammaniza asa wodhanas ceeqqettishe Qeeseta halaqakko bides.
44009002	Goda oge kaallizayta macasatanne addeta demmi qachidi Yerusalame ekki yaanas Damasqo geetettizason diza Ayhudata Woosa Keeththas babdaabe xaafana mala Qeeseta halaqa woossides.
44009003	Damasqo gakkana matishin qopponta saloppe poo7oy iza yuushon pol7u gides.
44009004	Izikka heerakka biitta bolla kundidi saloppe “Sawule, Sawule, tana aazas goodday?” giza qaala siydes.
44009005	Sawuleyka “Godo! Ne oonee?” gides. Izikka izas “Tani ne goodeththiza Yesusakko!”
44009006	Ne ha7i dendada gede katama gela; ne ooththanas bessizaz nees ta yootana” gides.
44009007	Sawulera issife biza asati qaala giiris sissafe attin oonakka beyonta gish ba duuna oykki eqqida.
44009008	Sawuley ba kundidasoppe dendidi ayfe doyi xeelliza wode aykkokka demmanas dandaybenna. Hessa gish izara diza asati iza kushe oykkidi kaalethi ekkidi Damasqo efida.
44009009	Heedzdzu gallas gakkanaas qooqidinne kath haaththe beybenna.
44009010	Damasqon issi Hananiya geetettiza ammanizadey dees. Izas Goday ajjutan “Hananiya” giidi xeygides; izikka “Yee Godo!” gides.
44009011	Godayka iza “Denda! Suure geetettiza ogeyra Yuhuda geetettizaso ba. Heen Sawule geetettiza issi Xarseese asi woossishe dees; ne iza koya demma.
44009012	Gaasoyka Hananiya geetettizayssi Sawuley dizaso yiidi izi xeellana mala iza bolla ba kushe woththishin ajjutan beyides.”
44009013	Hananiyaykka zaaridi “Godo! Hayssadey Yerusalamen diza geeshshata bolla ay mala iita meto gaththidakkonne ta daro asappe siyadis.
44009014	Izi haa yiday ne suntha xeygizayta wursi qachanas Qeeseta halaqatappe godateth ekkidikko” gides.
44009015	Godayka izas “Ne ba! Hayssi addezi Ayzaabeta sinthaninne kawota sinthan hessathoka Isra7eele dere sinthan ta sunth tookkana mala izi taas doorettidayssa.
44009016	Izi ta suntha gish ay mala waaye beyanakko ta iza bessana” gides.
44009017	Hananiyay biidi izas yootetidaso gelides. Sawule bolla ba kushe woththidi “Ta isha Sawule ne ha yishin nees oge bolla qoncida Goda Yesusi ne ayfey xeellana malanne neni Xillo Ayanan kumana mala tana neekko kiittides” gides.
44009018	Heerakka Sawule ayfeppe poqo malay poqeti wodhdhin izi xeellana dandayidessinne dendidi xammaqetides.
44009019	Kaththikka miidi minnides. Undena wode ammanizaytara Damasqon gam7ides.
44009020	Heerakka Yesusi Xoossa Naa gididayssa Ayhudata Woosa Keeththatan tamarso oykkides.
44009021	Siyida asay wuri “Hayssi Yerusalamen ha suntha xeygizayta dhayissiza addeza gidenee? Qasse izi ha yiday he asata qachi ekki Qeeseta Halaqatakko efanas deenee?” gishe malaletida.
44009022	Sawuley kaseppe minni minni bides. Damasqon diza Ayhudatas Yesusi izi Xoossi kiittidade gididayssa ammanthishe asa duuna oythides.
44009023	Daro gallassatappe guye Ayhudati Sawule wodhanas duulatida.
44009024	Izikka ista qofa erides. Istika iza wodhanas katama gelthiza ogen gallassinne qamma naagida.
44009025	Ammanizayti gidikko iza gidoth katama yuushon diza maskotezara keeshen duge woththida.
44009026	Sawuley Yerusalame yiidi ammanizaytara walakkettana koyin izi tumu ammanizade gididayssa isti ammanetonta gish izas babbida.
44009027	Gido attin Barnabaassi iza Hawaaretakko efin Sawuley izi Damasqo oge bolla Goda wosti beyidakko, Godayka izas ay yootidakkonne qasseka Damasqon dishe izi ay mala xalateththara Yesusa sunthan sabakidakko istas yootides.
44009028	Hessa gish Sawuley istara dides. Yerusalamen yuuyi yuuyi as babbonta Goda sunthan tamarsides.
44009029	Girike dereppe yida Ayhudatara haasayshe palametides; gido attin asaykka iza wodhanas koyides.
44009030	Ammanizayti hessa eridi duge Qisaariya geetettizaso woththidi Xarseese yeddida.
44009031	Hessa wode Yuhudaninne Galilan, Samaariyanka diza ammanizayti saron diidi kaseppe minnida. Qasseka Xoossa yashshatethan simeretishe Xillo Ayanan minetidanne kaseppe qoodan dari dari bida.
44009032	Phexroosi dereppe deren yuuyishe Liida kataman diza ammanizayta beyanas duge wodhdhides.
44009033	Heen Eniya geetettizayssa osupun layth hiixan qasheti uttida issi gunda as demmides.
44009034	Phexroosikka “Haysso Eniya! Yesus Kirstoosi nena pathana; denda ne hiixa dentha!” gides. Eniyay heerakka pusuku gi dendides.
44009035	Liidaninne Saroonan diza asay wuri iza beyidi Godan ammanides.
44009036	Iyophphe geetettizason Xaabita geetettiza issi ammanizara dawus. Izi suntha birsheththi Girike qaalara “Dorqa” geetettes. Iza ubba wode lo7o ooso minna ooththashenne manqota maaddashe dawus.
44009037	He wode iza hargada hayqqin asay aha meeci pude pooqen kessi woththides.
44009038	Liiday Iyophphes mata gidida gish ammanizayti Phexroosi Liidan dizayssa siydi nam7u asata kiittidi “Elle ha yarki!” gi woossida.
44009039	Phexroosikka dendidi kiitettida asatara gakkida wode iza pude he pooqe bolla kessida. Am7etikka wuri iza yuuyi aadhdhi eqqidi Dorqay paxa dashe istara ooththida qamisetanne may7ota bessishe yeekkida.
44009040	Phexroosikka asa wursi kiflezappe kessidi gulbati woossides. Ahakko simmidi “Hanne Xaabita denda!” gides. Izakka ba ayfe doyada xeelladus. Phexroosakka beyada denda uttadus.
44009041	Izikka izi kushe oykki denthides. Ammanizaytanne am7eta xeygidi izo istas pathidi immides.
44009042	He hanoy kumeththa Iyophphen eretidesinne daro asayka Goda ammanides.
44009043	Phexroosikka issi Simoona geetettiza galba qaacizadera Iyophphen daro wode de7ides.
44010001	Qisaariya geetettiza deren “Xaalane wotadarata” issi butte giddon mato halaqa gidida issi Qornoloosa geetettizayssi dees.
44010002	Izikka ba keeththa asa kumeththara Ayana hanon minonne Xoosse babbizadde; manqotaska daro muxuwata immizadenne daro wode Xoosse woossiza asa.
44010003	Issi gallas gallassafe uddufun saate bolla Xoossa kiitanchay izas ajjutan beettidi izakko yiidi “Qornoloosa” gi xeygishin qoncen beyides.
44010004	Qornoloosikka dagamara tishshi histi xeellishe “Godo hayssi aazee?” gides. Kiitanchaykka zaaridi “Ne woossaynne ne muxuwatay qofetanas pude Xoossa sinth gakkides.
44010005	Ne ha7i as Iyophphe yedada Phexroosa geetettiza Simoona xeygisa.
44010006	Izikka abba matan diza galba qaaciza Simoona soon imathateth dees” gides.
44010007	Qornoloosa haasayssida kiitanchay izappe shaaketidi bidappe guye ba ashkaratappe nam7ata qasse Ayana yo7os minone izas daro ammanettiza wotadaratappe issa xeygisidi,
44010008	izi beyidayssa wursi istas yootidi Iyophphe kiittides.
44010009	Kiitettida asati wontetha gallas gede katamaykko matishin Phexroosi usuppun saate bolla woossana pude Pooqe bolla kezides.
44010010	Hessa wode izi gafida gish qumay buro kaxxishin dhisko mala liphiphi histin ajjutara saloy doyettin issi gita xaaxettida may7o malay oyddu baggara oyketidi duge biittan wodhdhishin beyides.
44010012	He may7oza bolla oyddu tohoy diza dumma dumma do7ati biittara gooshettiza medhetethatinne salo bolla piradhiza kafoti deettes.
44010013	Hessa wode “Phexroosa denda hayta shukada ma” giza qaalay izas siyetides.
44010014	Phexroosi qasse “Godo hayssi hanenna! Geesh gidontayssa woykko tuna miisha ta mulerakka ma erikke” gides.
44010015	He kase qaalay qasseka nam7antho izakko yiidi “Xoossi geeshshidayssa ne tuna mala qoodoppa” gides.
44010016	Hessika heedzdzuto shireti shireti izakko yidappe guye may7o misatizayssi heerakka pude salo bides.
44010017	Phexroosikka ba beyida ajjutaza birsheththa eranas daro metotidi keehi qofo bolla dishin Qornoloosi kiittida asati Simoona keeththe koyishe demmidi pengen eqqida.
44010018	Qaala dhoqu histidi “Phexroosa geetettiza Simooni dizasoy hayssan awanee?” gi oychida.
44010019	Phexroosi ba beyidayssa keehi qoppishin Xillo Ayanay iza “Hekko heedzdzu asati nena koyeetes. Denda! Duge wodhdhada ista yeddiday tana gidida gish sidhey baynda istara ba” gides.
44010021	Phexroosikka duge wodhdhidi “Hekko inte koyizadey tanakko! Inte yiday aazasee?” gides.
44010022	Istika izas “Nuni mato halaqa Qornoloosa matappe yidos. Izikka Xoossas babbiza xillo asanne Ayhuda asa ubba matan daro bonchettida asa. Nekka iza keeththe baana malanne ne gizayssa izi siyana mala geeshsha kiitanchay izas yootides” gida.
44010023	Phexroosikka asata ba dizason mokki ekkidi ayssides. Phexroosikka wontetha gallas dendidi istara bides.Iyophphefe yida issi issi ammaniza asati izara issife bida.
44010024	Qornoloosikka ba dabbotanne mata laggeta ba soon shiishshidi naago bolla dishin izi nam7antho gallas Qisaariya gakkides.
44010025	Phexroosikka gede Qornoloosa keeththe gelin Qornoloossi iza mokki ekkidi iza toho bolla hokki goynnides.
44010026	Gido attin Phexroosi “Takka ne mala asakko! Denda” giidi denthides.
44010027	Phexroosikka iza haasayssishe izara so gelishin daro derey shiiqi uttidayssa beyides.
44010028	Izikka istas “Ayhuda asi hara dere asara gaaggonta mala woykko hara dere as gididayta mata shiiqonta mala nu wogay diggizayssa inte ereeta. Gido attin ta oonakka tuna woykko izi geesh deenna goonta mala Xoossi taas qoncisides.
44010029	Hessa gish ta xeeygetida wode hekko sidhonta yadis. Histin inte tana aazas xeygidakkone erana koyays” gides.
44010030	Qornoloosikka “Oyddu gallassafe kase likke hanni wode gallassafe uddufun saaten tani ta soon woossishin qopponta booththa may7o may7ida asi yiidi ta sinthan eqqidi
44010031	tana ‘Qornoloosa! Ne woossay siyetides; ne manqotas immiza muxuwatay Xoossa sinthi gakkides.
44010032	Hessa gish Iyophphe katama as kiittada Phexroosa geetettiza Simoona ehissa. Izi abba achchan galba qaaciza Simoona keeththan imathateth dees’ gides.
44010033	Takka heerakka neekko as kiittadis. Ne yuussaykka lo7o. Histikko Goday nena azazidayssa ne nuus yootikko Xoossi yootidayssa neeppe siyanas nu wurikka hayssan Xoossa sinthan doos” gides.
44010034	Phexroosikka “Xoossi oonaka shaakki maadontayssa ta tumappe eradis.
44010035	Gido attin Xoossas babbizaytanne xillo ooththizayta wursi oona baggafe gidinka izi ekkees.
44010036	Xoossi ubbas Goda gidida Yesus Kirstoosa baggara Isra7eele asas kiittida sarotetha Mishiraachcho kiitay hayssa.
44010037	Yohannisi xinqata gish sabakidappe guyen Galilappe doommidi kumeththa Yuhudan hanidayssa inte ereeta.
44010038	Xoossi Naazirete Yesusa Xillo Ayananinne wolqan tiyides. Izikka Xoossi izara diza gish ba gakkidason ubban lo7o ooththishe Xala7e godateththa giddon dizayta wursi pathides.
44010039	“Izi Ayhudata dereninne Yerusalame kataman ooththidayssa ubbas nu marka. Qasseka asay iza mitha bolla kaqqi wodhides.
44010040	Gido attin Xoossi iza heedzdzantho gallas heyqoppe denthidessinne asi iza beyana mala ooththides.
44010041	Izi qonciday asa ubbas gidonta hayqoppe dendin izara midaytassinne izara uyidaytas Xoossi koyro doorida nuus iza markatassa.
44010042	Izi nu derezas sabakana malanne hayqqidayta bollanne paxa dizayta bolla pirdanas Xoossi shuumiday iza gididayssa nu markattana mala nuna azazides.
44010043	Iza ammanidadey wuri iza sunthan nagara maaretidi geeyanayssa nabeti izas markatettes” gi yooto doommides.
44010044	Phexroosi hessa haasayishin qaala siyizayta ubba bolla Xillo Ayanay wodhdhides.
44010045	Qaxxaretidayta baggafe Phexroosara yida ammanizayti Xillo Ayana imotethi Ayzaabeta bolla wodhdhishin beyidi malaletida.
44010046	Hessika isti dumma qaalan haasayishininne Xoossa galatishin siyida gishassa. He wode Phexroosi,
44010047	“Hayti asati nu mala Xillo Ayana ekkida gish isti haaththan xammaqetonta mala ista digganay oonnee?” gides.
44010048	Hessa gish Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan xammaqettana mala azazides. Hessafe guye Phexroosi guuththa wode istara daana mala woossida.
44011001	Hawaaretinne Yuhudan diza ammanizayti Ayzaabeti Xoossa qaala ekkidayssa siyida.
44011002	Hessa gish Phexroosi pude Yerusalame kezin qaxxaretida Ayhudappe ammanizayti Phexroosa,
44011003	“Ne qaxxaretonta asata keeth gelada istara kath madasa” giidi walassida.
44011004	Phexroosi qasse istas gelana mala maarara hizgi yootides.
44011005	“Tani Iyophphe kataman woossishin dhisikko mala tana liphiphi histidi ajjutan gita may7o misatiza miishi oyddu baggara oyketidi saloppe ta dizaso wodhdhishin beyadis.
44011006	Ta tishshi hista xeellishin oyddu tohora diza meheta, wora do7ata, biitta bolla gooshettiza medhetethatanne salo bolla piradhiza kafota beyadis.
44011007	Heerakka tana ‘Phexroosa denda! Hayssa shukada ma’ giza qaala siyadis.
44011008	“Takka ‘Godo hessi hanenna; tani tuna woykko geesh gidontayssa mulekka ta duunakko shiisha erikke’ gadis.
44011009	“He kase qaalay qasseka ‘Xoossi geeshidayssa ne tunisoppa’ giidi saloppe taas yootides.
44011010	Hessika heedzdzuto shireti shireti yootetidappe guye wurikka simmidi pude salo bides.
44011011	“Qisaariyappe taakko kiitettida heedzdzu asati heerakka he saateyn yi gakkidi ta diza keeththa karen eqqida.
44011012	Ta aynne sidhonta istara baana mala Xillo Ayanay taas yootides. He usuppun ishati tanara issife biidi addeza keeththe geldos.
44011013	Izikka Xoossa kiitanchay iza keeththan eqqidi izas beettidayssanne ‘Iyophphe geetettizaso as yeddada Phexroosa geetettiza Simoona xeygisa.
44011014	Izi yiidi nenanne neso asa wursi ashshana qaala yootana’ gidayssa nuus yootides.
44011015	“Takka baada buro yooto oykkishin koyro Xillo Ayanay kase nu bolla wodhdhoyssatho ista bollaka wodhdhides.
44011016	Kase Goday nuus yootishe ‘Yohannisi haaththan xammaqides shin inte Xillo Ayanan xammaqettana’ gida qaalay heerakka taas qofetides.
44011017	Hessa gish nuni Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ammanishin nuus immida Xillo Ayana Xoossi istas immikko histin Xoossara eqqetanas tani oonee?” gides.
44011018	Isti hessa siyida wode istas gizazi dhayin co7u gi simmidi “Hayssa mala gidikko Ayzaabetikka ha ooratha de7okko yaana mala Xoossi asas maaroteth immides guussa” giidi Xoossa galatida.
44011019	Istifanoose bolla dendida goodeteththa gaason laalettida ammaniza asay qaala Ayhudatas xalala yootishe Pinqe, Qophiroosenne Anxokiya geetettizaso gakkanaas kanthi bida.
44011020	Qophirooseppenne Qareenappe yida issi issi asati Anxokiya biidi Giriketasikka Goda Yesusa Mishiraachcho qaala yootida.
44011021	Goda maadoykka istara dees; Qoodan keehi daro asay ammanidi Godakko simmides.
44011022	Hessa woreykka Yerusalamen diza Woosa Keeththa asa haythan wodhdhin Woosa Keeththaya Barnabaasa Anxokiya yeddadus.
44011023	Izikka he bi gakkidi Xoossi ba aadho kiyateth deraas immidayssa beyidi ufayetidessinne asay wurikka kumeththa woznappe Goda ammanon minnana mala zorides.
44011024	Izikka Xillo Ayananinne ammanon kumida lo7o asa. Daro derey Goda ammanon gujettides.
44011025	Hessafe kaallidi Barnabaassi Sawule koyana Xarseese bides.
44011026	Iza demmidi Anxokiya ekki yides. Nam7aykka heen diza Woosa Keeththa asara gididi layth kumeth daro dere tamarsida. Heen Anxokiyan ammanizayti koyro “Kirsaane” geetetti xeeygetida.
44011027	He wode issi issi nabeti Yerusalameppe duge Anxokiya wodhdhida.
44011028	Ista giddofe issoy Agaboossa geetettizayssi dendi eqqidi Xillo Ayanay iza bessin alame ubban gita koshay dendanayssa yootides. Hessika Oroome kawo Qalawodosa Qeesare geetettizayssa kawoteththa wode poletides.
44011029	Ammanizayti wuri issoy issoy ba wolqa keena miishe kesettidi Yuhudan diza ammaniza ishata maaddanas qachida.
44011030	Maado miisha kesettidi Barnabaasanne Sawule kushen cimatas gaththana mala yeddida.
44012001	He wode kawo Herdoossi issi issi ammaniza asa gooddi gooddi metothides.
44012002	Yohannisa isha Yaqoobe mashshan wodhisides.
44012003	Izikka hessa ooththiday Ayhudata ufaysidayssa beyidi Phexroosakka oythides. Hessika haniday Ayhudatas uketha ba7aale geetettiza ba7aale gallassa.
44012004	Phexroosakka qasho keeththe gelsidappe guye oyddu oyddu wotadarati taran taran naagana mala giigettida wotadaratas immides. Izi hessatho ooththiday Paaziga ba7aaley aadhdhida mala kessidi derey pirdana mala shiishanaasa.
44012005	Hessa gish Phexroosa qasho keeththe gelsidi naagetes. Gido attin Woosa Keeththa asay izas keehi mino woossa woossides.
44012006	Herdoossi Phexroosa dereza sinth shiishana qoppi utti dishin he qamma gidoth nam7u sansalatan qashetidi nam7u wotadarata giddon ichchides. Qasho keeththa naagizayti keeththa penge bolla eqqi naagishin,
44012007	Goda kiitanchay ezigonta istas beettides. Isti diza kifilen poo7oy poo7ides. Kiitanchazikka Phexroosa mille bochchi beeggoththidi “Elle denda!” gides. Heerakka sansalatay iza kusheppe gaden wodhdhides.
44012008	Kiitanchazi iza “Ne may7o may7a! Caammakka aaththa!” giin Phexroosikka azazettida mala ooththides; qasseka kiitanchay “Ne gaabe may7ada tana kaalla” gides.
44012009	Phexroosikka qasho keeththafe iza kaalli kezides. Gido attin izas agumo beyiza misatides attin kiitanchazi ooththizayssi tumu gididayssa eribenna.
44012010	Koyro zabetappenne nam7antho zabetappe aadhdhidi gede katama kessiza oge bolla diza birata pengako gakkida. Pengeykka barka doyetti wodhdhides. Isti kezi bida. Isti qeeri oge dizaaro aadhdhida mala kiitanchazi izappe shaaketides.
44012011	Phexroosas kahay simmishin “Goday ba kiitancha kiittidi iza Herdoosa kusheppenne Ayhudati ta bolla qoppida ubbafe tana kessidayssa ta ha7i tumappe eradis” gides.
44012012	Hessa akeekki eridappe guye daro asay issi bolla shiiqetidi woossiza Marqoosa geetettiza Yohannisa aayo Maaramiso bides.
44012013	Izi he biidi kare penge qooxin issi Roodo geetettiza garadeya kare ooni qoxxizakkonne eranas kare mata badus.
44012014	Qaalay Phexroosayssa gididayssa erada keeha ufayetida gish kare doyonta wothan guye simmada “Phexroosi Karen penge bolla eqqides” gadus.
44012015	Asaykka izo “Hanne gooyay!” gida. Iza qas zaara zaara istas yootin “Histikko hessi iza naagiza kiitancha gidonta aggenna” gida.
44012016	Phexroosi qas penge qoth gujjides. Istika penga doydi iza beyida mala malalettida.
44012017	Izikka isti co7u gaana mala ba kushen malati bessidi Goday iza qashosoppe wosti kessidakkonne lo7ethi yootides. “Hayssa wursi Yaqoobesinne hanko ammanizaytas yootite” gides. Hessafekka gede haraso bides.
44012018	Wontetha gallas wontara wotadarati “Phexroosi waanidee?” gishe ba giddon bul7akettida.
44012019	Herdoossi Phexroosa as yeddi koysidi izi dhayida gish naagizayta lo7ethi oychidappe guye ista wodhana mala azazides. Hessafe guye Herdoossi Yuhudappe duge Qisaariya wodhdhidi heen uttides.
44012020	Herdoosikka Xiroose asaranne Sidoona asara oosha. He dere asay kath demmizay Herodossa dereppe gidida gish he dere kawo xeellizade Bilasxoosappe maado qaala demmida mala issi bolla gididi Herdoosara maqaynthanas oychida.
44012021	Giigana barettida gallas Herdoossi kawoteththa may7o may7idi kawoteththa algan uttidi deraas haasayides.
44012022	Derezikka “Hayssi Xoossa qaalappe attin asa qaala deenna!” gi waassides.
44012023	Herdoosikka Xoossas boncho immoonta aggida gish Goda kiitanchay heerakka Herdoosa shoci yeggin guxuni hayqqides.
44012024	Xoossa qaalay gidikko diccidi akki akki bides.
44012025	Barnabaassinne Sawuley ba ekki bida kiita polidi Yerusalame simmidi Marqoosa geetettiza Yohannisaka banara ekki simmida.
44013001	Anxokiyan diza Woosa Keeththan nabetinne astamareti deettes. Heytikka Barnabaassinne Negeere geetettiza Simoonara, Qareena dere as Luqiyoosara, Herdoosara issife dicida Minaheranne Sawulera wuri issife deettes.
44013002	Heyti wuri Godas goynnishenne xoomishe dishin Xillo Ayanay “Barnabaasanne Sawule ta ista xeygida oosos taas shaakki kessite” gides.
44013003	Istika xoomi woossidi ba kushe ista bolla woththidappe guye moyzida.
44013004	Barnabassinne Sawuley Xillo Ayana kiitan duge Selawuqiya wodhdhida; heeppeka markaben geellidi Qophiroose bida.
44013005	Salmeena geetettizaso gakkidi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththatan Xoossa qaala sabakida; Marqoosa geetettiza Yohannisikka istara biidi ista maaddides.
44013006	Abba giddon diza biitta Qophiroose geetettiza dereyo ha gaxappe he gaxa gakkanaas kanthi kezidi Phaafa geetettizaso gakkishin issi Ayhuda asa shin maronne wordo nabe Bar-Yesusa geetettiza as demmida.
44013007	Izikka issi Sargoosa Phawuloosa geetettiza woznama dere ayssizayssara issife dees. Ha dere ayssiza addezi Xoossa qaala siyana koydi Barnabaasanne Sawule xeygisides.
44013008	Marozi Ellimaassi ba suntha birsheththa mala dere ayssizayssi ammanonta mala dhuphanas koydi istara eqqetides.
44013009	Phawuloosa geetettida Sawuley Xillo Ayanay izan kumin maroza tishshi histi xeelidi,
44013010	“Neno xillotetha ubbas morkezo! Geneynne iitatethi nenan kumidaysso haysso dabuloosa nawu! Goda suure oge geellaseththafe shempikii?
44013011	Hekko ha7i Goda kushey ne bolla dees. Ne qooqana; hannife guye awa arshe poo7o Issinokka beyakka” gides. Heerakka shaarumaynne dhumay iza bolla wodhdhides. Kushe oykki bana kaalethanade koshshi yaanne haanne gides.
44013012	Dere ayssizayssi ha hanida yo7oza beyidi goda gish siyida timirten malaletidi ammanides.
44013013	Phawuloosinne izara dizayti Phaafappe dendidi Phinfiliya geetettizason diza Phergene geetettizaso markaben geli bida; Yohannisi istafe shaaketidi guye Yerusalame simmides.
44013014	Isti gidikko Phergeneppe dendidi Phissidiya giddon diza gede Anxokiya bida; Sambata gallas Ayhudata woossa keeth geli uttida.
44013015	Muse woga maxaafatinne nabeta maxaafati nababetidappe guye Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqati “Nu ishato! Intes hayssa asa zorana qaalay diikko haasayte” giidi istako ase yeddida.
44013016	Phawuloosika dendi eqqidi ba kushera malatidi “Inteno Isra7eele asato! Qasseka inteno Xoossas yayyiza Ayzaabeto! siyite.
44013017	Ha Isra7eele dere Xoossay kase nu aawata doorides; isti Gibxe deren dishin ista dhoqu dhoqu histides. Ba wolqama qesera heeppe ista kessides.
44013018	Oyddu tammu layth kumeth ista bazzo biittan dandayides.
44013019	Kanaane biittan dizayta laapun kawota dhayssidi ista biitta ba deretas gade histi laattissides.
44013020	Hessi wuri poletiday oyddu xeetanne ichashu tammu laythata giddonna. Hessafe guye nabe Sameela wode gakkanaas ista pirdiza daannata immides.
44013021	“Hessafe guye derey ba bolla kawo kawoththana mala Sameela woossides; Xoossayka Biniyaame baggafe Qiise naa Sa7oole istas immides. Izikka ista oyddu tammu layth haarides.
44013022	Sa7oole shaaridappe guye Dawute kawothides; iza gish ‘Ta wozna mala hanizayssanne ta koyidayssa wursi ooththiza Iseeye naa Dawute ta demmadis’ giidi Dawute gish Xoossi markattides.
44013023	Xoossika ba caaqo qaalatho ha addeza zerethafe as ashshizayssa Yesusa Isra7eeles ehides.
44013024	Yesusi yaanappe kase Yohannisi Isra7eele derey wuri maarotethan gelidi xammaqettana mala sabakides.
44013025	Yohannisi ba kiitettidayssa polo bolla dishe ‘Ta intes oona misatazinaa? Ta kiitettidayssa gidikke haray attoshin ta izas toho caamma kire birshanas bessontayssi taappe guyera yaana’ gides.
44013026	“Inteno Abrahaame zerethafe yeletida nu ishato! Qasseka inte giddonka Xoossas yayyizayti wuri hayssi atotetha kiitay kiitettiday nuus ubbatassa!
44013027	Yerusalame asatinne ista halaqati Yesusa eribetenna; gido attin isti iza bolla pirdida; hessanka sambatan sambatan nababetiza kase nabeta qaalay iza bolla polettides.
44013028	Iza hayqos gaththiza issi gaasokka isti demmoonta aggikkokka Philaxoosi iza bolla hayqo pirda pirdana mala woossida.
44013029	Iza gish xaafetidayssa isti wursi polidappe guye iza kaqqettida mitha bollafe gaden woththidi duufon moogida.
44013030	Gido attin Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthides.
44013031	Galilappe Yerusalame gakkanaas banara dizaytas daro wode beettides; heytikka ha7i iza gish deretas markata.
44013032	“Nukka kase Xoossi nu Aawatas caaqida Mishiraachcho qaala intes sabakoos.
44013033	Yesusa kiittidi istas caaqida qaala nuus ista naytas polides; hessika mazamure maxaafan nam7antho shempon ‘Ne ta naaza; ta nena hach yeladis’ geetetti xaafetides.
44013034	Qasseka izi wooqontayssanne Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthidayssa shaakki erana mala ‘Anjettidayssanne ammanettida Dawute anjo ta intes immana’ gides.
44013035	Hessa gish harasonka ‘Ne geeshshay hayqqi wooqana mala ne koyakka’ gees.
44013036	“Dawutey ba woden Xoossa shene mala ooththidappe guye hayqides; kase ba aawatara moogetin iza ashoy wooqides.
44013037	Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthidayssi izi gidikko wooqibenna.
44013038	Hessa gish ta ishato! Nagaras maarotethi beettizay Yesusa baggara gididayssi intes sabaketidayssa erite.
44013039	Iza ammanizadey wuri kase Muse woga baggara demmoonta xilloteth demmana.
44013040	Hessa gish kase nabeti ‘Inteno qidhizayto xeellite, malaletitenne, dhayite, intes oonikka yootin ammananas intena metiza miish ta inte woden ooththana’ gida qaalay inte bolla gakkonta mala naagetite” gides.
44013042	Phawuloosinne Barnabaassi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththafe kezishin asay ista hessa isti yootida qaala kaalliza Sambata gallas zaari yootana mala woossides.
44013043	Shiiqoy laalettidappe guye daro Ayhudatinne Ayhudata ammanon gelidi Xoosse goynniza asati Phawuloosanne Barnabaasa kaallida. Phawuloosantika ista qofsishe isti Xoossa kiyatethan minni daana mala zorida.
44013044	Kaalliza Sambata gallas katama asappe guuththati xalala attin dariza baggay wuri Goda qaala siyana shiiqides.
44013045	Ayhudatikka daro dere beyidi qanatetethan kumida. Phawuloosa haasaya eqqetishe iza cayida.
44013046	Phawuloosinne Barnabaassi babbonta xalateththan “Xoossa qaalay koyro intes yootetanas bessees. Gido attin inte qaala leqqideta. Intes merna de7oy bessontayssa interka inte bolla pirdida gish ha7i nuni gede Ayzaabetakko baana koyoos. Qasseka Goday nuna ‘Asas atotetha qaala biitta gaxa gaththana mala ta nena Ayzaabetas poo7o hista kiittadis’ gi azazides” gida.
44013048	Ayzaabeti hessa siydi daro ufayetida. Goda qaalasikka boncho immida. Merna de7os giigettida derey wuri ammanides.
44013049	Goda qaalay heeran diza dere ubbaso gakkides.
44013050	Ayhudati qas Ayana hanon kaseppe minnizaytanne duussan bonchettida macasata hessathoka kataman diza gita asata dentheththidi Phawuloosa bollanne Barnabaasa bolla goodeteththi denthidi ba dereppe kessi gooddida.
44013051	Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi asay ista ixidayssa bessanas ba toho bolla diza gudulla pittidi Iqoniyoone geetettizaso bida.
44013052	Ammaniizayti ufayssaninne Xillo Ayanan kumida.
44014001	Iqoniyoonen Phawuloosinne Barnabaassi issife Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelida. Henka isti asa lo7eth tamarsida gish Girike asappenne Ayhuda asappe daroy ammanides.
44014002	Hinko ammanonta Ayhuda asay Ayzaabeta ista bolla dentheththidi asay ammanizayta ixana mala ooththides.
44014003	Phawuloosinne barnabaassi Goda gish xalatethara asas yootishe heen daro wode gam7ida. Godayka isti yootiza iza qaala gita malataranne wolqama ooson qoncisi markattides.
44014004	Katama asay ba giddon nam7u kezi shaaketidi baggay Ayhudata bagga baggay Phawuloosanta bagga gidides.
44014005	He wode Ayhudatinne Ayzaabeti bana kaaleththizaytara issife gididi ista waayssanassinne shuchchan caddanas koyda.
44014006	Istika hessa erida mala Listiranne Derbeene geetettizaso gede Liqa7ooniya katamatanne he heeran diza dere baqatida.
44014007	Henka mishiraachcho qaala sabako doommida.
44014008	Listiran yeeletosappe ba tohora hamuti eronta issi toho sila addey dees.
44014009	Hessadey Phawuloosi sabakishin utti siyees; Phawuloosikka izakko tishshi histi xeelidi addeza pathana ammanoy iza bolla dizayssa beyidinne qaala dhoqu histidi “Sitti gaada ne tohon eqqa!” gides. Addezi heerakka guppi dendidi hamuth oykkides.
44014011	Asay Phawuloosi ooththidayssa beyidi Liqa7ooniya qaalara “Eeqa Xoossati as misatidi ha nuukko wodhdhida” giidi waassides.
44014012	Barnabaasa “Diya” gida Phawuloosakka haasayiza waannay iza gidida gish “Hermeene” gida.
44014013	Katamappe asi bayndason diza Diya geetettiza eeqa keeththa Qeesey kormatanne xaaxeti giigida ciish gede katama geliza oge bolla efidi derezara issife gididi Phawuloosasinne Barnabaasas yarshana koyides.
44014014	Hawaareti Barnabaassinne Phawuloosi hessa siyida mala ba may7o daakkidi gede dereza giddo woxxida; ba qaala dhoqu histidi hizgida;
44014015	“Hayto asato! Hayssa aazas ooththetii? Nukka inte mala assako! Inteka qasse hayssa mela hada yo7oppe haakkidi salonne sa7a, abbaka, abbata giddon dizayta wursi medhdhida de7o Xoossakko inte simmana mala intes mishiraachcho qaala sabakoos.
44014016	Izi kase aadhdhida yeletethaynne derey wurikka ba koyda mala hananas yeddi bessides.
44014017	Gido attin Xoossi saloppe iranne hessaththokka kaththi kaxxiza wodeta immidi inte wozna kaththaninne ufayssa kunthides; ufayssaka intena kalthidi lo7o ooson bana markay baynda aggibenna” gida.
44014018	Hessa wursi haasayidi asay istas yarshonta mala waaydi diggida.
44014019	Ayhudati qas Anxokiyappenne Iqoniyooneppe yida asay asa zoridi Phawuloosa shuchchan caddana mala ammanthida. Phawuloosakka shuchchan caddidinne hayqqides gi goochchidi katamappe gede kare kessida.
44014020	Gido attin ammanizayti iza yuuyi aadhdhi naagishin Phawuloosi dendidi gede katama gelides. Wontetha gallas Barnabaasara issife Derbeene geetettizaso bida.
44014021	Phawuloosinne Barnabaasi Darbeen mishiraachcho qaala sabakida daro asa ammanthidappe guye gede Listira, Iqoniyoonenne Anxokiya simmida.
44014022	Ammanzayta wozna minthethishe isti ammanon minni daana mala zorishe “Nu Xoossa kawoteth gelanas daro meto giddora aadhdhanaas koshshees” gida.
44014023	Hessafe guye dumma dumma Woosa Keeththatan cimata dooridappe guye xoomaninne woossan ammanettida Godas hadara aaththi immida.
44014024	Phissidiyara aadhdhidi Phinfiliya simmida.
44014025	Phergenen qaala sabakidi duge Axaaliya geetettizaso wodhdhida.
44014026	Axaaliyappekka ha7i gakkanaas isti ooththida oosoza hadara istas imettida katama Sooriyan diza Anxokiya markaben gelidi simmida.
44014027	He gakkida mala Woosa Keeththa asa wursi shiishshidi Xoossi istara ooththidayssa qasseka Ayzaabetas ammano pengey waani doyettidakkonne wursi yootida.
44014028	Heen ammanizaytara daro wode gam7ida.
44015001	Issi issi asati Yuhudappe duge Anxokiya wodhdhidi “Inte Muse woga mala qaxxaretonta aggikko oonikka attanas dandayekketa” giidi ammanizayta tamarso doommida.
44015002	Hessika Phawuloosanne Barnabaasa gita palamaninne oosha giddo gelthides; hessa gish Phawuloosinne Barnabaassi hara issi issi ammaniza asatara Yerusalame kezidi ha yo7oza gish cimatanne Hawaareta oychana mala geetettides.
44015003	Hessa gish Woosa Keeththaya ista Yerusalame baana mala kiittin isti Pinqeranne Samaariyara aadhdhi bishe heen diza asa Ayzaabeti ammanon simmidayssa yootida; he wode ammanizayti hessa siydi keehi ufayettida.
44015004	Isti Yerusalame gakkin Woosa Keeththa asay Hawaaretinne cimati ista mokki ekkida; kiitetti bidaytikka Xoossi istara gididi ooththidayssa wursi istas yootida.
44015005	Farsaaweeta bagga asatappe ammanida issi issi asati dendidi “Ayzaabeti qaxxaretanassinne Muse woga naagana mala istas yootanas bessees” gida.
44015006	Hawaaretinne cimati he yo7oza giddo lo7eth xeellanas shiiqida.
44015007	Daro palamappe guye Phexroosi dendi eqqidi, “Ta ishato! Guuththa wodeppe kase Xoossi tana inte giddofe dooridi Ayzaabeti ta duunappe mishiraachcho qaala siydi ammanana mala ooththidayssa inte ereeta.
44015008	Asa wozna eriza Xoossi nuus immidayssa mala istaska Xillo Ayana immidi ista baas ekkidayssa markatides.
44015009	Ista woznakka ammanon geeshshidi nu giddoninne ista giddon aykko shaakkokka ooththibenna.
44015010	Hessa gish nu aawatinne nukka tookkanaas dandayonta qambara ammanizayta toossanas inte aazas Xoosse paacetii?
44015011	Nu attiday likke istaththokka Goda Yesusa aadho kiyatethan gididayssa ammanoos” gides.
44015012	Shiiqida asay wurikka co7u giin Barnabaassinne Phawuloosi Xoossi ista baggara Ayzaabeta giddon ooththida gita malatata gish yootishin malaletidi lo7ethi siyides.
44015013	Isti yooti wursishin Yaqoobey dendi eqqidi hizgides “Ta ishato! Ta gizayssa siyite;
44015014	Xoossi Ayzaabetappe baas gidana dere kasetidi izi wosti xeygi woththidako Simooni nuus lo7ethi yootides.
44015015	Kase nabetan hizgi xaafetida qaalay hayssara gaggees.
44015016	‘Hayssafe guye ta simmada laaletida Dawute keeththe keexana; laalettidayssa zaara essana; zaaradakka keexana.
44015017	Hessika attida asay Goda koyana malanne ta sunthan xeeygettida Ayzaabeti tana koyana mala gees wursi ooththida Xoossi;
44015018	Hayssa koyroppekka ersida Xoossi tana’ gides.
44015019	“Hessa gish ha Xoossako simmida Ayzaabeta nu metothonta mala hayssi ta baggara taas qasho.
44015020	Gido attin eeqas yarshettidi tunida kath mooppite; laymappe haakkite; bawuti hayqqida mehe asho mooppite; suuth uyoppite giidi nu istas xaafana bessees.
44015021	Muse wogay gidikko benisofe Sambata Sambata gallas Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan nabebetishenne katamay dizason sabaketishe dees” gides.
44015022	He wode Hawaaretinne cimati kumeththa Woosa Keeththa asara gididi ba giddofe issi issi asata dooridi Phawuloosaranne Barnabaasara gaththi Anxokiya yeddanas qachida. Ammaniza asa giddofe waannatizayta Barsabaasa geetettiza Yuhudanne Sillase doorida.
44015023	Ista kushen immi yeddida dabdaabezi “Inte ishatappe, Hawaaretappe, cimatappe, Ayzaabetappe ammanida Anxokiyaninne Sooriyan, Kilqiyanka diza ammanizaytas nu sarokay intena gakko.
44015024	“Issi issi asati nuuppe gidonta ba baggara nu achchafe biidi ba haasayan inte wozna yaanne haanne qaathidayssanne intena bul7akkidayssa nu siyidos.
44015025	Hessa gish guutha asata dooridi dosettida Barnabaasaranne Phawuloosara inteko yeddanas nu wurikka qaala gaaggidos.
44015026	Isti Goda Yesus Kirstoosa gish ba shempo aaththi immidayta.
44015027	Hessa gish nu intes xaafidayssa isti intes ba duunara lo7ethi yootana mala Yuhudanne Sillase inteko yeddidos.
44015028	Hayta intes koshshiza yo7otappe hara deexo tooho nu inte bolla wothonta mala nussinne Xillo Ayanas lo7o misati beettides.
44015029	Hessika inte eeqas shukettida ashoppe, suuthafe, bawuti hayqqida mehe ashoppenne laymappe inte hakkana mala; inte hayta misatizaytappe haakkikko intes lo7o; saron diite” gees.
44015030	Kiitettida asati moyzetidi duge Anxokiya wodhdhida; heen ammanizayta wursi shiishshidi ehida dabdaabeza istas immida.
44015031	Dereyka nababidi minthethiza qaalan ufayetides.
44015032	Yuhudaynne Sillassi nabeta gidida gish daro zoridi ammanizayta minthethida.
44015033	Heen guutha wode gam7idi ammaniza asay moyzin guye bana kiittidaytakko simmida.
44015034	Sillassi qas heen attanas koyides.
44015035	Phawuloosinne Barnabaassi hara daro asatara gididi Goda qaala tamarsishenne sabakishe Anxokiyan gam7ida.
44015036	Phawuloosi guutha wode gam7idi Barnabaasa “Nu kase Goda qaala yootida ubba katamata biidi ammanzayti ay mala dizaakkonne ane yuuyi beyoos, denda” gides.
44015037	Barnabaasikka Marqoosa geetettiza Yohannisi istara baana mala koyides.
44015038	Phawuloosi qas iza ekki baanas koybenna; gaasoyka kase Marqoossi istafe shaaketidi Phinfiliya gizason guye attidi istara oosos sinth kezonta aggida gishassa.
44015039	Histin daro palamay ista giddon medhetida gish ba giddon shaaketi wodhdhida; hessa gish Barnabaassi Marqoosa ekkidi markaben gelidi Qophiroose bides.
44015040	Phawuloosi qas Sillase doorides. Ammanzaytikka Phawuloosa Goda aadho kiyatethas hadara immidappe guye izi istafe shaaketidi bides.
44015041	Ammanizayta minthethishe Sooriyaranne Kilqiyara aadhdhi bides.
44016001	Phawuloosi Derbeene geetettizasone Listira gakkidi iza aaway Girike as, aayiya qas Ayhuda as gidida Ximtoosa geetettiza issi ammanizade heen demmides.
44016002	Izikka Listiraninne Iqoniyoon ammaniza asa achchan lo7o markateth dizadde.
44016003	Phawuloosikka Ximtoosa banara ekki baanas koyides. Hessa gish he heeran Ayhudata gish giidi Ximtoosa qaxxarides. Gaasoyka Ayhudati Ximtoosa aaway Girike as gididayssa eriza gishassa.
44016004	Isti issi katamappe hara katama aadhdhi aadhdhi bishe Hawaaretinne Yerusalame Woosa Keeththa cimati yeddida kiita asay ekkidi naagana mala ammaniza asas immi immi aadhdhida.
44016005	Woosa keeththa asay ammanon minni minni bides; qasse asaykka qoodan gallas gallas gujetti gujetti bides.
44016006	Phawuloosinne izara diza zatati qaala Iisiyan sabakonta mala Xillo Ayanay diggida gish Pirgiyaranne Galatiya derera aadhdhi bida.
44016007	Isti Miisiya geetettizaso gakkana matishe Bitiniya geetettizaso gelana qoppin Yesusa Ayanay ista diggides.
44016008	Hessa gish Miisiyara aadhdhidi Xiro7aada geetettizaso wodhdhida.
44016009	Issi Maqidooniya asi eqqidi Phawuloosa ha Maqidooniya pinnada nuna maadda gishin Phawuloosi omars ajjutan beyides.
44016010	Izikka he ajjuta beyidi Xoossi nu istas Mishiraachcho qaala yootana mala xeygides gi qachidi nu heerakka gede Maqidooniya baana koyidos.
44016011	Markabera Xiro7aada geetettizasoppe dendidi siti giidi Samotiraaqe geetettizaso bidos. Wontetha gallas Naaphule gizaso sinth hamuth gujjidos.
44016012	Heeppeka Oroome asay tooran haarida dere gidida Maqidooniya dere waanna katama gidida Piliphisiyoose geetettizaso gelidos. Heenka undena wode uttidos.
44016013	Sambata gallas woossa woossizaso koyishe katama gelizaso penge kezidi duge shaafa wodhdhos; nu heen uttidi shiiqi diza macasas qaala yootidos.
44016014	Qaala lo7ethi siyiza macasatappe issi Lidiya geetettizara izakka Xoosse goynzaronne Tiyaxiroone katamappe yaada zo7o Hare may7o zal7izaro Phawuloosi yootiza qaala iza woznan wotha siyana mala Goday izi wozna doyides.
44016015	Izanne iziso asaykka xammaqettidappe guye iza ista ta Xoosse ammanidi inte tumu erida gidikko ha taso yiidi guutha wode diishshite gaada ista mintha woossadus.
44016016	Issi gallas nu woossaso bishin kayo kayotta marotza issi garade naa dizaara nuna demmadus. Izakka ba maroteththan bana ayssizaytas daro miish gelthawus.
44016017	Hanna garade naya Phawuloosanne nuna kaalla kaalla “Hayti asati intes inte attana oge yootizayti wogga Xoossa oosanchata” ga ga waassadus.
44016018	Hessaka daro gallas shira shira gadus. Gido attin Phawuloosi ha Izi qaalan daro metotida gish izikko simmidi izi duunara haasayiza tuna ayanaza “Ne izippe kezana mala ta nena Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan azazays” gides. He ayanay heerakka yeggi izippe kezides.
44016019	Izo ayssiza asati istas miishe demmiza ogey duuxxin ista ufayssi qanxettidayssi istas gelin Phawuloosanne Silase oykkidi biittara goochchidi waannati dizaso giya giddo efida.
44016020	Dere ayssiza waannatakko shiishshidi “Hayti asati baas Ayhuda as gidi uttidi nu katama bulakketes;
44016021	qasse nu Oroome asati ekkanas woykko ooththanas nuus bessonta woga nu asa giddon laalettes” gida.
44016022	Dereyka issi bolla gididi Phawuloosa bollanne Sillase bolla dendides. Deraa ayssizayti Phawuloosanta may7o qaari ekkidi durqara qoxana mala azazida.
44016023	Iita buka bukkidi gede qasho keeththan yeggida. Qasho keeththa naagizayssika ista lo7ethi naagana mala azazida.
44016024	Izikka hessa mala mino azazo ekkidi qasho keeththas waanna giddo kifile gelthidi ista toho gita durumara shiishshi qachides.
44016025	Giddi gidoth gidishin Phawuloosinne Sillassi woossaninne mazamuren Xoossa galatishin qasho asay ista yethanne galata ezgi siyides.
44016026	Hassa7ay baynda dingate qasho keeththa xaphoppe qaathiza mino biitta qaathi hanides; heerakka qasho keeththa pengeti doyettida. Qashetida ubba asa qashoy birshettides.
44016027	Qasho keeththa naagizayssi dhiskofe beeggidi qasho keeththa pengeti doya dizayssa beyidi qasho asay wuri kessi ekkida misatin bana wodhana mashsha shoddides.
44016028	Phawuloosi qas ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Nu wuri haan doos! Ne bolla ayne iita ooththofa” gi waassides.
44016029	Qasho keeththa nagizayssi xompe woossi ekkidi gede giddo guppi gelides; kokkorshe Phawuloosa toho bollanne Sillase toho bolla kundides.
44016030	Ista ekki kare kezidi “Ha asato! Ta attana mala ay ooththoo?” gides.
44016031	Istika izas “Goda Yesusa ammana; nekka neso asaykka inte wuri attana” gida.
44016032	Hessafe guye izassinne izason diza asas ubbas Goda qaala yootida.
44016033	Qasho keeththa naagizayssi heerakka he gallas qamara efidi ista maduntha meecides. Heerakka izinne izaso asay wuri xaamaqetida.
44016034	Qasho keeththa naagizayssika ista ba keeththe efidi istas kath aaththides. Baso asa ubbara Xoossa ammanida gish addezi daro ufayides.
44016035	Gadey wontishin dere ayssizayti “Heyta asata birsha yedda” giidi ba shuumeta qasho keeththa naagizayssako yeddida.
44016036	Qasho keeththa naagizayssika istas “Dere ayssizayti inte birshettana mala azazida; hessa gish ha7i saron kezi biite” giidi Phawuloosas yootides.
44016037	Phawuloosi qas “Nu Oroome yeleteth gidishin pirday baynda dere sinthan durqara bukkidinne qasho keeththan yeggida. Histin ha7i qas nuna qotara asi eronta kessana koyizoo? Hessi hanenna; isti yiidi barka birshetto!” gides.
44016038	Shuumeti he izi gida qaala dere ayssizaytas yootida istika Phawuloosinne Sillassi Oroome yeletta gididayssa siydi daggammida.
44016039	Yiidi istafe maareteth oychidi woyneppe kessida. Isti he katamayo aggidi haraso baana mala ista woossida.
44016040	Phawuloosinne Sillassi qasho keeththafe kezidi Lidiyaso bida. Henka diza ammanizayti ista daro minthethidi heeppe kezi bida.
44017001	Phawuloosinne Sillassi Anfiphoolanne Apholooniya geetettiza derera aadhdhidi Tasolonqe geetettiza dere bida. Henka Ayhudata Woosa Keeththi dees.
44017002	Phawuloosikka izas dose gidida mala Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelides. Heedzdzu saaminta kumeth qaalappe ekki ekki istara haasayettides.
44017003	Kirstoosi waaye ekkanassinne hayqqi dendanas bessizayssa qoncisi ammanthon “Hayssi ta sabakiza Yesusi izi kiitetti yaana geetettidayssakko!” gides.
44017004	Ayhudatappe issi issi asay ba siyidayssa ammanidi Phawuloosaranne Sillasera issife gidides. Qasseka daro derey Xoosse babbiza Giriketappe daro eretida macasati ba siyida qaalan ammanidi istara issino gidida.
44017005	Ayhudati qasse ista qanatidi giyan diza wordo asata shiishshidi kumetha dereza ista bolla dentheththidi kataman shiro medhdhida. Phawuloosanne Sillase shiishshidi deraa sinthan essanas issi Iyaasoone geetettizayssaso koyanas elleli bida.
44017006	Gido attin ista Iyasoone keeththan demmoonta aggida gish Iyaasoonenne hara ammaniza asata katama daannata sinthara goochchishe “Hayti asati dere wursi bul7akki ka7iishe gam7idi qasse ha7i ha yida.
44017007	Iyaasooneyka ista ba keeththan woththides. Hayti asati wuri ‘Yesusa geetettiza hara kawoy dees’ giidi Qeesare woga ekketenna” gishe waassida.
44017008	Dereynne he katama daannati hessa siydi ba giddon buqqettida.
44017009	Iyaasoonenne harataka waase xeygisidi yeddida.
44017010	Ammanizayti heerakka Phawuloosanne Sillase qammara Beeriya yeddida. Istika he gakkida mala Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelida.
44017011	Beeriya asay Tasolonqe asaappe aadhdhidi akeekara diza asa. Gaasoyka hayssi yo7ozi tumeshaa? gi giidi Geeeshsha Maxaafata qaala wontin wontin pilgi xeelidi ufayssan ekkides.
44017012	Hessa gish istafe daro asay ammanides. Qasseka istara qoodan daroti bonchettida Girike dere macasatinne addetikka ammanida.
44017013	Tasolonqen diza Ayhuda asati Phawuloosi Xoossa qaala Beeriyanka sabakizayssa erida mala dereza dentheththanas qasseka gede istako bida.
44017014	He wode ammanzayti Phawuloosa ellesidi gede abba achchi yeddida. Sillasinne Ximtoossi heen attida.
44017015	Phawuloosa moyizida asati iza Atena gaththida. Qasseka Sillassiinne Ximtoossi izakko elleeli gakkana mala giza kiita Phawuloosappe ekkidi simmida.
44017016	Phawuloosi Atenan ista naagishin Atena kataman eeqati kumidayssa beyidi daro shenetides.
44017017	Hessa gish Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan Ayhudataranne Xoossas yayyiza Girike asara qasseka giyay dizason gallas gallas banara gaggiza asara haasayettides.
44017018	Efiqoroosenne Istoykko geetettiza eranchata bagga gididayti Phawuloosakko shiiqidi izara haasayettida Istafe issi issi asati “Hayssi lom7u lom7ay ay gaana koyizee?” gida. Baggati qasse Yesusa gishshinne hayqoppe iza dentha mishiraachcho izi sabakishin siydi “Heyssi hara ooratha eeqata gish yootiza misatees” gida.
44017019	Iza oykkidi Ariosfaagoose geetettiza dere duulata sinth efidi “Ha ne tamarsiza ooratha timirtey azzakkonne nu erana mala ne koyay?” gida.
44017020	Qasse ne nuna nu haythan sisiza yo7oy nu eronta oorath gidida gish izi azzakkonne nu erana koyoos.
44017021	Atena asay kumeth qasseka haan diza hara dere asaykka baas wode aaththanas ooratha yo7o haasayaninne sissan attin hara miishan aaththettenna.
44017022	Hessa gish Phawuloosi Ariyosfaagoose geetettiza duulatan shiiqida dereza sinthan eqqidi “Hayto Atena asato! Inte beetto miish wursi ammanizayta gididayssa ta beyays.
44017023	Ta yaane ha yuuyishin inte istas gooynniza miishata ta xeellishin ‘Eretonta Xoosse’ geetetti xaafetidayssa issi yarshoso demmadis; hessa gish hessa inte eronta gooyinnizayssa ta intena erissana.
44017024	Hayssa alamezanne iza giddonka dizayssa wursi medhdhida Xoossi izi salonne sa7a Goda. Hessa gish izi asa kushen keexxettida keeththan deenna.
44017025	Izi asa ubbas de7onne shempo; qasseka hara wursi immizayssa gidida gish izas paccizazi doonta gish izi asa kusheppe maado ekkenna.
44017026	Asa zeereth wursi issadefe medhidi asi biitta bolla daana mala ooththides; asay daana wodenne wursetha dhas woththides.
44017027	Hessika asi Xoosse koydinne pilgidi demmanakkonne giidi woththides; hessi hessa gidikkokka izi nuuppe issi issadefe haakki diza gish gidenna.
44017028	Nu de7o demmiday, dizaynne qaaxetizay izanna; inte deren yeth kessiza issi issi asati ‘Nukka iza nayta’ gida mala.
44017029	“Histikko nu Xoossa nayta gidikko Xoossi asa erateththan medhi kessida worqa woykko bira woykko shuch misatees giidi nu qoppanas bessenna.
44017030	Kasetidi Xoossi hayssa mala hanota asay eronta ooththidayssa dandayan aadhdhides; ha7i gidikko asi wuri ba dizason dizason maarotethan gelana mala azazees” gides.
44017031	Izi ba doosiddadde baggara biitta bolla xillotethan pirdana gallas bare woththides. Izakka hayqoppe denthidi asa ubbas hayssa tumatetha erissides.
44017032	Istika hayqqidayta dentha gish siyida mala issi issi asati iza qidhida; baggati qas “Hayssa qasseka neeppe hara gallas siyana koyoos” gida.
44017033	Heerakka Phawuloosi ista giddofe kezi bides.
44017034	Issi issi asati qasse Phawuloosa kaallidanne ammanida; heytappeka Diyonassiyoosa geetettiza Ariyosfaagoose duulata keeththa Abaale gidida Demarisso geetettiza macasayanne haratikka issife deettes.
44018001	Hessafe guye Phawuloosi Atenappe dendidi Qorontoose katama bides.
44018002	Henka Phanxoosan yeeletida Aqqila geetettiza Ayhuda as demmides; izikka Ayhudati wuri Oroomeppe kezana mala Qalawodoosa geetettiza Oroome kawoy azazida mala ba macheyo Phirsiqillara mata wode Ixaaliya dereppe yidayssa beyanas Phawuloosi he istako bides.
44018003	Izikka istaththo dunkane sikkizade gidida gish ista achchan uttidi dunkane sikkon gelides.
44018004	Sambata Sambata gallas Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan ayuhudetaranne Girike asatara hasayetishe ista ammanthanas baaxetides.
44018005	Sillassinne Ximtoossi Maqidooniyappe duge izakko wodhdhin Phawuloosi sabakon minnidi Yesusi izi Kirstoosa gididayssa Ayhudatas markattides.
44018006	Gido attin isti izara eqqetidi iza cayida gish Phawuloosi ba may7o qoqofidi “Ta intefe xillo; inte pirdettanay inte mooron gidida gish ta inte suutha gomen oyshetikke; hessa gish ta gede Ayzaabetakko bays” gides.
44018007	Heeppe kezidi Titoosa Iyosxoosa geetettiza Xoosse woossizayssaso bides; he addeza keeththay Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa achchan dees.
44018008	Ayhudata Woosa Keeththa halaqay Qerisphoossi baso asa ubbara Goda ammanides; Phawuloosi yootishin siyida daro Qorontoose katama asay ammanidi xaammaqeetides.
44018009	Goday qaman ajjutan Phawuloosa “Babbofa; Yoota; co7u gooppa;
44018010	ta nenara days; oonikka ne bolla dendi nena qohanas dandayenna; hanno ha katamayn taas daro asi dees” gides.
44018011	Hessa gish Phawuloosi Xoossa qaala asa tamarsishe issi laythinne bagga istara uttides.
44018012	Galyoosa geetettiza dere ayssizayssi Akaayan diza wode Ayhudati issife gididi Phawuloosa bolla dendida; pirda wombora sinth shiishshidi,
44018013	“Hayssi addezi wogappe karera asay Xoossas goynnana mala asa baleththees” gida.
44018014	Phawuloosi haasayana buro duuna doyishin Galyoossi Ayhudata “Inteno Ayhuda asato! Inte shiishida yo7oy dere dentheththo woykko dere gita meton yeggiza yo7o gididakko ta woznappe siyanashin.
44018015	Gido attin inte palamay issi issi qaalata gishshinne issi issi sunthata gish qasseka inte woga gishas gidida gish inte heen inte baggara wursite; ta hessa mala yo7o pirdanas koyikke” gides.
44018016	Hessa gish pirda wombora sinthafe ista kessides.
44018017	He wode wurikka Ayhuda Woosa Keeththa halaqa Sostineese geetettizayssa oykkidi pirda keeththa sinthan bukkida; Galyoossi gidikko hessa wudanka yeggibenna.
44018018	Hessafe guye Phawuloosi Qorontoose kataman daro wode gam7ides. Heeppeka ammaniza asay moyzin Phirsiqillaranne Aqilara issife markaben gelidi Sooriya geetettizaso bides; adina dizayssa gaththanas Kinkira7oose geetettizason ba hu7e meedettides.
44018019	Efesoone gakkida mala Phirsiqillanne Aqila heen aggagidi Phawuloosi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelidi Ayhudatara haasayettides.
44018020	Banara gam7ana mala isti oychin izi “Akay” giidi ixxides.
44018021	Gido attin izi istafe shaaketishe “Xoossa shene gidikko ta simmada yaana” gides; Efesooneppe dendidi markaben gelidi bides.
44018022	Qisaariya geetettizaso gakkidappe guye kezidi ammanizayta saro giidi heeppe Anxokiya wodhdhides.
44018023	Anxokkiyan guuththa wode takkidappe guye heeppe dendidi Galatiya baggaranne Firgiya geetettiza deretara yuuy aadhdhidi ammanzayta minthethides.
44018024	He wode issi Iskindiriya kataman yeletida Aphilosa geetettiza issi Ayhuda asi Efesoone yides; izikka tamaridadenne Geeshsha Maxaafata lo7ethi erizade.
44018025	Izi Goda oge tamaridadenne Yesusa gish balay baynda haasayizadenne Xillo Ayanan xuugetishe tamarsizade; gido attin izi lo7ethi erizay Yohannisa xinqate xalala.
44018026	Izikka Ayhuda Woosa Keeththan babbonta yooto oykkides; Phirsiqillaynne Aqqilay izi gizayssa siydinne iza gede baso efidi Xoossa oge iza kaseppe lo7ethi erissida.
44018027	Aphilossi gede Akaaya baanas koyin ammanizayti iza minthethida; heen diza ammaniza asaykka iza mokki ekkana mala izas dabdaabe xaafida; izi he gakkida mala izas diza immotappe dendidayssan ammanizayta daro maaddizade gidides.
44018028	Geeshsha Maxaafata yayssa hayssara gaththi markasi markasi Yesusi izi Kirstoosa gididayssa Ayhudatara daro palametidi dere sinthan ista laththides.
44019001	Aphilossi Qorontoosen diza wode Phawuloosi pudeha bagga derera kanthidi Efesoone yiidi heen diza issi issi ammaniza asata demmidi
44019002	“Inte ammanida wode Xillo Ayana ekkideti?” gides; Istika “Ekkibeykko haray attoshin Xillo Ayanay dizaakkonne nu sibeykko” gida.
44019003	Phawuloosikka ista “Histin inte aazan xammaqetidetii?” gides; Istika izas “Yohannisa xinqatan xammaqetidos” gida.
44019004	Phawuloosikka istas “Yohannisa xinqatay gidikko asay maarotethan simmidayssa bessiza xinqatakko! Yohannisi ba baggara asay izappe guyera yiza Yesusa ammanana mala yootides” gides.
44019005	Istika hessa siyidappe guye Goda Yesusa sunthan xammaqetida.
44019006	Phawuloosikka ista bolla ba kushe woththida mala Xillo Ayanay ista bolla wodhdhin isti dumma dereta qaalara haasayida; tinbitekka yootida.
44019007	He asati wurikka tammanne nam7u gidizayta.
44019008	Phawuloosi Ayhudata Woosa Keeththe gelidi Xoossa Kawoteththa gish hasayettishenne ista ammanthishe heedzdzu agina kumeth oonaska babbonta asaas qoncisi yootides.
44019009	Issi issi asay palama xin7i giidi ammananas koybenna; Goda oge qonccen ixida; hessa gish Phawuloosi ista aggidi haraso bides; ammanizaytaka dumma shaakki kessidi Xiranoose timirte keeththan gallas gallas istara haasayettides.
44019010	Hessa mala ooson nam7u layth gam7ida gish Iisiya awurajjan diza Ayhudatinne Girike asay wuri Goda qaala siyana dandayides.
44019011	Xoossi Phawuloosa baggara daro malalisiza malata ooththides.
44019012	Maarabe woykko iza asateth bochchida carqa efidi harganchata bochchikko hargey yeddees; tuna ayanatikka ba oykkida asappe kezeettes.
44019013	Yuuyi yuuyi asappe daydanthi kessiza issi issi Ayhuda asati “Phawuloosi sabakiza Yesusa sunthan inte kezana mala azazays” giidi Goda suntha tuna ayanati oykkida asata bolla xeeygana paacida.
44019014	Issi Ayhudatappe gidida Qeeseta halaqa Asqewes attuma naa laapunati hessatho ooththida.
44019015	Tuna ayanaykka “Ta Yesusakka erays; Phawuloosakka erays shin inte qas oonantee?” gides.
44019016	Qasseka tuna ayanay iza oykkidadey guppidi asata oykkides; ista bolla wolqatidi daro minnin madunxidi keeththafe mela kaallo baqatida.
44019017	Hessika Efesoonen diza Ayhudata achchaninne Girike asa ubba achchan eretin wurikka babbida; hessanka Goda Yesusa sunthi bonchettides.
44019018	Ammanida asappe daroy shiiqidi ba iita ooso qoncen paaxides.
44019019	Maro marotizaytappe daroti ba marotiza maxaafa shiishshidi dere sinthan taman xuugida; maxaafa waagay shiishshi qoodin ichashu tammu shi bira mala gidides.
44019020	Hayssa malan Goda qaalay keehi diccishenne xooni xooni bides.
44019021	Hayssi wuri hanidappe guye Phawuloosi Maqidooniyaranne Akaaya baggara aadhdhidi Yerusalame baanas qofa qachidi “Ta he gakkidappe guye ta Oroome qasseka beyana koshshees” gides.
44019022	Bana maaddizaytappe nam7ata Ximtoosanne Erisxoosa gede Maqidooniya geetettizaso kiittidi baas Iisiya awurajjan guutha wode heen de7ides.
44019023	He wode Goda oge gish daro shiroy medhetides.
44019024	Dimexiroosa geetettiza issi bira qoxizayssi Arxemise geetettiza eeqa misile birappe seeris medhi medhi hiillanchatas wodhe miishe demmises.
44019025	Izikka he hiillanchatan hessa mala ooson aqizayta hara asata issi bolla shiishshidi “Aso! Hayssi oosozi nuus miish kessizayssa inte ereeta;
44019026	hayssi Phawuloosa geetettizayssi Efesoonen xalla gidonta kumeththa Iisiya awurajjan diza daro dereza ammanthi ammanthi baleththizayssa inte wurikka beyizayssa malanne siyizayssa mala ‘Asa kushen oosettida eeqati mulekka Xoosse gidetenna’ gi yootees.
44019027	Hayssa nu oosozas lo7o suntha hiraayssizayssafe bollara kumeththa Iisiyaynne kumeththa alamey gooynniza wogga Arxemisse eeqa keeththaykka go7ay bayndayssa gidana; qasseka keehi dhoqu gida izi bonchoykka kawuyana” gides.
44019028	Asay hessa siydi iita hanqo hanqettidi “Efesoone Arxemissa wogga gita!” giidi waasso doommides.
44019029	Heerakka kumeththa katamay shirotides; dereyka wuri issi bolla gididi Maqidooniya asa gididaytanne Phawuloosara issife yuuyiza iza laggeta Gayiyoosanne Arisxirokoosa oykkidi derey kase ka7izaso wothan gelida.
44019030	Phawuloosikka kare kezidi asa sinth shiiqana koyin ammanizayti diggida.
44019031	He awurajja daannatappe issi issi Phawuloosa laggeti Phawuloosi asay kase ka7izaso xalidi gellonta mala as kiittidi woossida.
44019032	Shiiqida asay un7etidi issadey issi miish haasayishin haray qas hara hasayessinne asay wuri waassetes; dariza bagga asay aazas heen shiiqidakkonne erenna.
44019033	Ayhuda asay Iskindirosa geetettizayssa deraa giddofe sugereth gede sinth kessida wode issi issi asati ba gish izi haasayana mala waassida; izikka ista gish palamettana koydi asay co7u gaana mala malati bessides.
44019034	Gido attin izi Ayhuda as gididayssa erida wode wurikka issi bolla “Efesoone Arximissa wogga; gita!” gishe nam7u saate mala asay waassides.
44019035	He katamas waanna xaafey asa co7u histidi “Inteno Efesoone asato! Gita Arxemisi eeqa keeththaynne saloppe wodhdhida izi misile naagizay Efesoone katama asa gididayssa erontay oonee?
44019036	Hessa gish hayssi ha tumay kadettana dandayettontayssa mala inte guuthi yuushi qoppanassinne loddu gaanas bessees.
44019037	Hayta asata Xoossa Keeththa bonqonta woykko nu xoosse gididayssa bolla cashsha qaala denthonta dishin inte oykkidi ha gaththanas coo ehideta.
44019038	“Hessa gish Dimoxiroossinne izara diza bira seerisi ooththiza hiillanchati oona bollaka mootiza yo7oy diikko pirda keeththay istas doya dees; daannatikka deettes; koyidade mootanas dandayees.
44019039	Hayssafe hara gaanas inte koykko wogay diza shiiqoson beyetto.
44019040	Hessi attikko hach hanida shiroy nuna mootisonta mala hirgisees; mootos gathiza gaasoy baynda gish ha hanida shiroza gish nu oyshetikko gaanazi nuus deenna” gides.
44019041	Izi hessa gidappe guye shiiqoy laalettides.
44020001	Asay co7u gidappe guye Phawuloosi ammanizayta issi bolla xeygidi ista minthethiza qaalara zoridappe guye ista sarokidi Maqidooniya baana kezides.
44020002	Izi aadhdhi biza deren diza ammaniza asa lo7eth zoren minthethishe Girike dere bides.
44020003	Giriken heedzdzu agina takkidappe guye markabera Sooriya geetettiza dere baanas qoppides shin Ayhuda asati iza bolla iita ooththana zoretidayssa eridi Maqidooniya baggara baana qofa qachides.
44020004	Beeriyappe Phariyoosa naa Sophaxiroosa, Tasolonqefe Arisxirokoosanne Sikondoosa, Derbeeneppe Gayiyoossinne Ximtoossi Iisiyappe Xirofimoossinne Tiqiqoossi Phawuloosara issife bida.
44020005	Heyti wuri nuuppe kasetidi Xiro7aadan nuna naagida.
44020006	Nu qas uketha ba7aaleppe guye Piliphisiyooseppe markaben isti dizaso Xiro7aada geetettizaso ichashantha gallas gakkidi heen laapun gallas gam7idos.
44020007	Saamintafe koyro wogga gallas issife kath maanas nu shiiqi dishin Phawuloosi wonto baanas koshshiza gish shiiqida asas qaala yootishin izi yo7oza leela gidoth gakkanaas adussides.
44020008	Bolla fooqen daro poo7oy dizason nu shiiqidos.
44020009	Awuxekise geetettiza issi natetha nay maskote bolla utti dishin Phawuloosi yo7oza adussidayssafe dendidayssan iza dhiskoy ekki bides; wolqama dhiskon xoonetidi bolla heedzdzantho fooqeppe duge kundin asay denthiza wode hayqqidi beettides.
44020010	Gido attin Phawuloosi duge wodhdhidi naaza bolla hokki idimmidinne “Hayqibenna paxa dees, daggammofte!” gides.
44020011	Phawuloosi hessafe pude fooqe kezidi uketha menthidi ammanizaytara mides; gadey wontana gakkanaas asatara hasayettishe gam7idi bides.
44020012	Asaykka hayqoppe paxida naaza gede izaso efidi wurikka ufayetides.
44020013	Nu Phawuloosa Markaben gelthana koyda gish kasetidi markaben Asosa geetettizaso bidos; nu hessa ooththiday Phawuloosi Asosa gakkanaas tohora baana koyda gishassinne nu gede sinth baana mala izi azazida gishassa.
44020014	Nu izara Asosan gaaggidi izi markaben gelin izara issife Mixiline bidos.
44020015	Wontetha gallas heeppe dendidi sinthara diza Ki7oose geetettizaso gakkidos; qasse wontetha gallas Saamoose geetettizaso pinnidi heeppe wontetha gallas Miliixe gakkidos.
44020016	Phenxaqoste geetettiza Ayhudata Paaziga ba7aale baas dandayettida mala bonchana Yerusalamen bettana koydi izi Iisiyan wodey aadhdhonta dishin Efesoone aadhdhi baanas koydes. Iisiyan izas wodey aadhdhonta mala Efesoone yeggi aadhdhana koyides. Izi hessatho ooththana koyiday Phenxaqoste ba7aales Yerusalamen bettanas koyda gishassa.
44020017	Phawuloosi Miliixeppe Efesoone Woosa Keeththa cimata ase kiittidi xeygisides.
44020018	Istika yiin Phawuloosi ista “Ta Iisiya gelida gallassafe ha simmin ubba wode ta intenara waana waana de7idakkonne inte ereeta.
44020019	Ayhudati ta bolla asa denthidi hilida geedon daro metoy ta bolla gakkikkoka ta kumeththa ashketetharanne afunthara Godas ooththadis. Coo denbanka inte inteson ta intena tamarsashe go7izayssa wursa intes yootadis attin intena go7iza miishafe aykkokka ashshabekke.
44020020	Ayhuda asata gidinka Girike asa gidinka maarotethan gelidi Xoossako simmana malanne Goda Yesusan ammanana mala lo7etha yootadis.
44020022	“Ha7ikka ta he gakkishin ta bolla aazi gakkanakkonne erikeshin Xillo Ayanay tana azazida mala Yerusalame bays.
44020023	Heen dumma dumma tana qashoynne metoy naagizayssa Xillo Ayanay taas yootides.
44020024	Gido attin Goda Yesusi taas immida wotha woxxa wursana gakkanaassinne ooso ta polana gakkanaas tani ta shempos mishetikke; taas imettida oosoykka Xoossa mishiraachcho qaala yootokko.
44020025	“Ha7i gakkanaas ta inte giddon simeretashe Xoossa kawoteth sabakadis; Sima hayssafe guye intefe oonnikka mule ta ayfeso beyontayssa ta erays.
44020026	Hessa gish intefe issadeykka dhaykko ta oyshetontayssa hach ta intena erisays.
44020027	Ayssi giikko ta Xoossa qofa wursa intes yootadis attin aykkokka ta yootonta ashshidayssi deenna.
44020028	Xillo Ayanay intena Xoossa dorsata heemmanas shuumides; hessa gish inte hu7essinne Xoossa dorsatas naagetite; Goday ba suuthan wozida Woosa Keeththayo naagite.
44020029	Ta bidappe guye Xoossa dorsatas michetonta iita asati inte gars gellanayssa ta erays.
44020030	Hessathoka issi issi asati inte giddofe dendidi geella yo7o intena tamarsidi ammaniza asappe darota gede baako zaarana.
44020031	Hessa gish intena issa issa heedzdzu layth qammanne gallas afunxa zoridayssa yuushi qoppitenne naagetite.
44020032	“Ha7ikka intena Xoossas minthi essanassinne ammanizayta giddon intes laataso immanas dandayiza iza aadho kiyatetha qaalas ta hadara immadis.
44020033	Ta oona birakka worqa woykko may7o ammotabekke.
44020034	Ta ta kushen ooththa ooththada taas maaddetada tanara dizayitaka maaddidayssa inteka ereeta.
44020035	‘Ha ekkizadefe gede immizadey anjetidade’ giza Goda Yesusa qaala nu yuushi qoppidi nurka nu kushera nu ooththi demmidi hara daaburanchata gede maaddanas nuus bessizayssa ta intena daro dumma dumma ogera besadis” gides.
44020036	Hessafe guye Phawuloosi ubba asara gulbatidi woossides.
44020037	Asay wuri yeekkidi Phawuloosa idimmi oykkidi yeerides.
44020038	Harappeka isti daro mishetiday izi “Hayssafe guyen inte nam7antho tana beyekketa” gida gishassa; heeppeka iza markabekko gakkanaas moyzida.
44021001	Nu istafe shaaketidinne markaben gelidi siti giidi Qoose geetettiza abba giddon diza dere bidos; wontetha gallas hara Erodoose geetettiza abba giddon diza dere gakkidos. Heeppeka issi Phaxira geetettiza katama bidos.
44021002	Heen gede Pinqe geetettizaso biza markabe dizaaro demmidinne izin gelidi bidos.
44021003	Abba giddon diza Qophiroose geetettiza dereppe hadirsa baggan yeggidi Sooriya geetettiza dere biidi Xiroose geetettiza abba achchan diza dere bidos; hessas gaasoy markabeya ba caanettida caana heen wothanas koshshiza gishassa.
44021004	Heen ammanzayta koyi demmidi istara laappun gallas gam7idos; istika Xillo Ayana kaalethon Phawuloosa “Yerusalame booppa” giidi yootida.
44021005	Nu heen gam7ana wodey wurin istafe shaaketidi nu oge bidos. Isti wuri ba machetaranne ba naytara issife katamappe kare kezana gakkanaas nuna moyizida; abba achchan nu wuri gulbatidi woossidappe guye dendidi issoy issara saroketidi shaaketidos.
44021006	Hessafe guye nu markaben gelin isti gede baso simmida.
44021007	Nu Xirooseppe dendidi gede Phixilamaysse geetettizaso gakkidos. Henka ammaniza asara gaggidi saroketidi heen ista achchan issi gallas gam7idos.
44021008	Wontetha gallas heeppe kezidi Qisaariya geetettizaso bidos; Qisaariyan laapun daaqonetappe issa wongelaawe Philphoosaso gelidi iza achchan shempidos.
44021009	Izas nabe gidida oyddu gelonta geella7o nayti deettes.
44021010	Daro gallas nu heen gam7in issi Agaboossa geetettiza nabey Yuhuda dereppe yides.
44021011	He nabey nuukko shiiqidinne Phawuloosa danco ekkidi ba tohonne ba kushe qachidi “Xillo Ayanay hayssa dancaa goda Yerusalamen diza Ayhuda asati hayssatho qachidi Ayzaabetas aaththi immana gees” gides.
44021012	Hessa siydi nukka nunara diza asaykka Phawuloosi Yerusalame boonta mala woossidos.
44021013	Qas Phawuloosi “Inte aysi yeekki yeekkidi ta wozna aazas menthetii? Tani Goda Yesusa suntha gish Yerusalamen qasho xalala gidonta hayqqanaska giigetadis” gides.
44021014	Izi nu zore ekkonta ixin “Histikko Goda sheney hano” giidi aggagidos.
44021015	Nu heen guuththa gallassata gam7idappe guye nu miishe wursi giigissidi ekki Yerusalame bidos.
44021016	Qisaariyan diza issi issi ammanzayti nunara issife yida; istika nuni Minasoone keeththan daana mala nuna izaso kaalethida; Minasooni kasetidi ammanida Qophiroose dere asa.
44021017	Nu Yerusalame gakkida mala ammanzayti nuna ufayssan mokki ekkida.
44021018	Wontetha gallas Phawuloosi nunara Yaqoobekko bides; he wode Woosa Keeththa cimati heen deettes.
44021019	Phawuloosi asa wursi sarothidappe guye Xoossi iza baggara Ayzaabeta giddon ooththidayssa wursi issino ashshonta yootides.
44021020	Hessa siydi asay wuri Xoosse galatides; Phawuloosikka “Nu ishazo daro shiyan qoodetiza ammanizayti Ayhudata giddon dizayssanne wurikka Muse woga woznappe naagizayta gididayssa nekka eraasa.
44021021	Neni Ayzaabeta giddon diza Ayhudata ‘Inte nayta qaxxaroppite woykko wogata ooththofte gaada ne tamarsida asay Muse woga shaarana mala ooththes giza wore asay siydes.
44021022	Histin ha7i aaze lo7oy? Ha7i ne yuussa asay siyonta aggenna.
44021023	Hessa gish nu nena gizayssa ooththa; nu achchan tasala gaththana yida oyddu asati deettes.
44021024	Ne ista nenara ekkada istara gidada nena geeshsha; asati ba hu7e meedettana malanne Xoossa Keeththan imettiza muxuwata miisha ne istas qanxa; ne hessatho ooththikko ne bolla woretidayssi wuri mela gididayssanne nekka Muse woga pola naagizade gididayssa asay wuri erana.
44021025	Hinko Ayzaabetappe ammanidayta gish gidikko ‘Eeqqas shukettidi tunidayssa mooppite, suuthika uyoppite, bawuta hayqqida mehe asho mooppite, laymafe haakkite’ giidi cimati qachida qaala dabdaabe xaafidi nu istas yeddidos.”
44021026	Hessafe guye Phawuloosi he oyddu asata banara ekkidi wontetha gallas istara bana geeshshides; isti geeyiza gallassati aapun gallassikkonne issade issade gish imettiza miish immiza wodey aydekkonne erisanas Xoossa Keeththe gelides.
44021027	Laapun gallas kumana maatishin Iisiya dereppe yida Ayhuda asay Phawuloosa Xoossa Keeththan beyidi deraa iza bolla dentheththidi iza oykkida.
44021028	“Isra7eele asato! Nuna maaddite! Nu asanne nu woga hayssa nu dizasoza cayishenne derey dizason ubban asa tamarsizayssi hayssi izakko! Hessika gidenna giidi Ayzaabeta Xoossa Keeththe gelthidi hayssa geeshsha soza tunisides” gishe waassida.
44021029	Isti hessa gida gaasoy hayssafe kase Efesoone yeletta gidida Xirofimosa izara issife katama giddon beyida gish iza Phawuloosi Xoossa Keeththe ekki gelida misatida gishassa.
44021030	Kumeththa katamay ba giddon shirotides; derey wuri issife woxxi koydi Phawuloosa oykki ekkidi Xoossa Keeththa gibbefe gooshechi kessides; Xoossa Keeththa pengeti heerakka gordettida.
44021031	Asay Phawuloosa wodhana koyishin “Yerusalame diza kumeththa derey ba giddon shirotides” giza kiitay Oroome wotadarata azazizayssakko gakkides.
44021032	Hessa gish izi wotadaratanne mato halaqata kaaleththidi eeson woxxishe asay dizaso bides; asay olanchata azazizayssa beyidi Phawuloosa buka aggida.
44021033	Mato halaqazi izakko shiiqidi Phawuloosa oykkidi nam7u sansalatan qashettana mala azazidi izi oonakkonne ayy ooththidakone eranas iza oychides.
44021034	Dereyka ba giddon baggay hessa, baggay hayssa gides; Mato halaqazi dereza waasoppe dendidayssan tumay awayssakonne eranas dandayettonta ixin Phawuloosa gede wotadarati dizaso efana mala azazides.
44021035	Phawuloosi pude dhoqaso gakkishin derey daro hanqon iza bolla meto gaththanas koyda gish wotadarati iza hashen tookki efida.
44021036	Dereyka “Izi hayqqo! Hayqqo” gi waassishe iza kaallides.
44021037	Wotadarati Phawuloosa ba dizaso gelthana maatishin Phawuloosi wotadarata azazizayssa “Ta nees issi miish yootana mala dosay?” gides. Mato halaqazikka “Ne Girike qaala eray?”
44021038	Histin ha7i mata dere giddon meto dentheththida shempo wodhdhida oyddu shi asa ekkada bazzo baqatida Gibxe addezi nena diikkii?” gides.
44021039	Phawuloosikka “Tani Kilqiya giddon daro eretida Xarseese kataman yeletida Ayhuda asa; hayssa asas tana yoocharki” gides.
44021040	Izi haasayana mala ero giin Phawuloosi dhoqason eqqidi asay co7u gaana mala ba kushera malatides; asay co7u giin Isra7eeleta qaalara,
44022001	“Ta ishato! Ta aawato! Ta bolla wordo woththidayssas ta intes immiza zaaro siyite!”
44022002	Izi Ayhudata qaalara haasayishin siydi kaseppe asay co7u gides; Phawuloosikka haasaya gujjidi hizgides.
44022003	“Tani Kilqiya giddon diza Xarseese kataman yeeletida Ayhuda asa; tani dicciday gidikko hannin Yerusalamena; ta nu aawata woga wursa Gamalyaaleppe lo7etha tamaradissenne inte hach ooththizayssatho Xoossas suure woznappe ooththashe de7adis.
44022004	Hayssa ha ogeza kaalliza asata ubba wodhana gakkanaas goodaththiza asakkoshin; macatanne addeta qacha qacha qasho keeththe yeddizadekkoshin.
44022005	Hayssi wuri tumu gididayssa Qeeseta halaqatinne dere cimatikka wuri taas markattana; haray attoshin Damasqon diza ammaniza asa qacha Yerusalame ehada qaxayssanas Damasqon dizaytas xaafetida dabdaabe Qeeseta halaqataappenne dere cimatappe ekkadis.
44022006	“Tani Damasqo bishininne katama gelana matishin seeta gallas ta qopponta dishin saloppe wolqama poo7oy tana yuuy aadhdhi poo7ides.
44022007	He wode tani biitta bolla kundada Sawule! Sawule! Ne tana aazas goodday? giza qaala siyadis.
44022008	Takka ‘Godo ne oonee?’ gadis; izikka ‘Ta neni gooddiza Naazirete Yesusa’ gides.
44022009	Tanara issife diza asati poo7oza beyida attin izi tanara haasayishin qaala siybetenna.
44022010	Takka ‘Godo ta ayy ooththoo?’ gadis. Godayka ‘Dendada Damasqo ba, ne ooththanayssa isti nees heen yootana’ gides.
44022011	Poo7oza xolqetetha daroppe dendidayssan ta xeellanas dandayabekke; tanara diza asati ta kushe oykki goochchidi tana Damasqo gaththida.
44022012	Hananiya geetettiza issadey heen dees; Hananiyay Damasqon diza Ayhudata achchan daro galattettidayssanne woga bonchiza asa.
44022013	Izi ta ach shiiqi eqqidi ‘Ta isha Sawule ne ayfey qasseka xeello’ gides; heerakka ta ayfey iza xeellides.
44022014	Izikka tana ‘Nu aawanta Xoossi ne iza shene erana mala, iza xilloza ne beyana malanne izi gizayssa ne siyana mala nena kaseti doorides.
44022015	Izi hessa ooththiday ne beyidayssanne siyidayssa asa ubba sinthan izas ne markattanassa.
44022016	Histin ha7i aazas gam7ay? Dendada iza sunth xeeygada xammaqeta; ne nagarappekka meeceta’ gides.
44022017	Hessafe guye ta Yerusalame simmada Xoossa keeththan woossishin ajjutay taas beettides.
44022018	Godayka taas qoncidi ‘Ne ta gish immana markateth isti ekkonta gish ne gam7onta dashe Yerusalameppe ellela keza!’ gides.
44022019	Takka izas ‘Godo ta Ayhudata Woosa Keeththati dizaso baada nena ammanizayta ubba qachada ista bukkidayssa ba baggara istika eretes.
44022020	Ne gish markatiza Istifanoose asay wodhiza wode takka he wodhiza asata achchan eqqada isti wodhizayssa takka dosadissenne wodhizayta may7okka naagadis’ gides.
44022021	Godayka ‘Hahon diza Ayzaabetakko ta nena kiittiza gish dendada ba!” gides.
44022022	Asay hinno gakkanaas Phawuloosa haasaya woznappe lo7ethi siyishe aggidi ba qaala dhoqu histidi “Hayssa mala asi nu biittafe dhayo; hayssa mala asi nu biittan shempora daanas bessena” gishe waassides.
44022023	Asay waassishe ba may7o qaari qaari wuxxishenne biitta pude salo dharcides.
44022024	Mato halaqazi hessa beyidi Phawuloosa wotadarati dizaso gelthana mala azazides; dereyka iza bolla aazas hessa mala waassizakko erana mala iza garafidi paaxisana mala azazides.
44022025	Gido attin dafon waaxi qachidi iza garafana giigetishin Phawuloosi ba achchan eqqida issi mato halaqas “Oroome as pirday baynda garafanas intes fiiqadey dizee?” gides.
44022026	Mato halaqay hessa siyida mala gede halaqata azazizayssakko biidi “Ay ooththana gay? hayssi addezi Oroome asakko!” gides.
44022027	Hessa gish halaqata azazizayssi Phawuloosakko shiiqidi “Ane taas yoota, ne Oroome asee?” gides; izikka “Ee ta Oroome asa” gides.
44022028	Azazizaysikka “Ta Oroome asa gidanas daro miishe qanxada shaamadis” giin Phawuloosi “Tani gidikko Oroomen yelettadis” gides.
44022029	Hessa gish iza maramaranas giigettida asati heerakka iza achchafe haakkida; azazizaysikka izi Oroome as sansalatan qachidayssa yuush qoppidi babbides.
44022030	Wontetha gallas azazizayssi Ayhudati Phawuloosa mootiza ayfe yo7oy azakkonne eranas koyides; Qeeseta halaqatinne Ayhudata shango duulata asay wuri issadeykka attonta kumeth shiiqana mala azazides; Phawuloosakka qashoppe birshidi shiiqida asa sinth shiishshi essides.
44023001	Phawuloosi duulata asa tishshi histi xeelidi “Ta ishato! Hach gakkanaas ta Xoossa sinthan lo7o qofara dayssi” gides.
44023002	Qeeseta halaqa Hananiyay qasse Phawuloosa duunan shocana mala iza achchan eqqidayta azazides.
44023003	Heerakka Phawuloosi Hananiya “Haysso aannora tiyettida keeththazo! Nenakka Xoossi shocana; wogara pirdana uttada wogay baynda tana shocana mala azazay?” gides.
44023004	He wode heen diza asay Phawuloosa “Xoossa Qeeseta halaqa cayay?” gides.
44023005	Phawuloosikka istas “Ta ishato! Izi Qeeseta halaqa gididayssa ta erabeykke. gaasoyka ‘Ne dere halaqa bolla iita qaala gooppa’ gizayssi xaafetides” gides.
44023006	Phawuloosi heen diza asappe baggay Saduqaaweta, baggay Farsaaweeta gididayssa eridinne “Ta ishato! Ta Farsaaweeppe yelettadissinne; takka Farsaawe; hekko ha7i ta pirdettana shiiqiday hayqqidayti dendanayssa ta ufays ooththiza gishassa” giidi ba qaala dhoqu histidi duulata asa sinthan yootides.
44023007	Phawuloosi hessa yootida mala Farsaaweeta giddoninne Saduqaaweta giddonka ooshi dendin duulatay nam7u shaaketi wodhdhides.
44023008	Gaasoyka Saduqaaweti “Hayqqidaytas denthi deenna; kiitanchaykka baawa; Ayanaykka deenna gizayta; Farsaaweeti qasse heyti wurikka deettes” gi ammanizayta.
44023009	Hessa wode daro shiroy asa giddon hanides; Farsaaweeta baggata gidida issi issi Muse woga tamarizayti dendidi “Nu hayssa addeza bolla aykkokka iita miish demmibekko; ayanay woykko kiitanchay izas yootida gidana; nu ay erizoni?” giidi palametida.
44023010	Palamay minni minni bida gish asay Phawuloosa tarsherethonta mala babbidi halaqata azazizayssi “Duge wodhdhidi Phawuloosa asa giddofe ha kessi ekki yiidi gede wotadarati dizaso efite!” giidi wotadarata halaqata azazides.
44023011	Wontetha gallas leela gidoth Goday Phawuloosa achchan eqqidi “Aykkoy ba ne Yerusalamen taas markattidayssatho Oroomenka ne taas markattanas bessees” gides.
44023012	Gadey wontin Ayhuda asati shiiqetidi “Nu Phawuloosa wodhonta dishe kath mookko; haathika uyokko” gi caaqettida.
44023013	Hessa he maqozan issife gidida asa qooday oyddu tammafe bollara dees.
44023014	Istika Qeeseta halaqatakkonne dere cimatakko biidi istas “Nu Phawuloosa wodhonta dishe kath moonta mala minthi caaqidos.
44023015	Hessa gidida gish inte dere cimatara zoretidi iza keehi marammariza misatidi isti intes Phawuloosa ehana mala azazizayssa oychite; nukka izi ha hanno gakkanappe kasetidi iza wodhana giigettidos” gida.
44023016	Gido attin issi Phawuloosas michi nay hessa ista maqoza siyida gish wotadarati dizaso bi geellidi yo7oza Phawuloosas yootides.
44023017	Phawuloosikka Mato halaqatappe issa baako xeygidi “Hayssi naazi wotadarata azazizayssas yootiza yo7oy diza gish gede izakko efa” gides.
44023018	Mato halaqay naaza waana azazizayssakko ekki geellidi “Qashetida Phawuloosi tana baako xeygidi hayssi naazi nees yootiza yo7oy diza gish ta iza neekko shiishana mala tana woossides” gides.
44023019	Azazizaysikka naaza kushe oykki ekkidi haraso pooqidi “Ne taas yootanayssi aazee?” giidi iza dumma oychides.
44023020	Naazikka “Ayhuda asati Phawuloosa yo7oza lo7ethi maaramarizade misatissidi wonto ne iza istas shiishana mala oychanas qachi woththida.
44023021	Gido attin ne istas ero gooppa; gaasoyka ‘Nu iza wodhonta dishe kath mokko haathika uyokko’ giidi caaqqettidayti oyddu tammafe bolla gidiza asi iza wodhanas oge bolla zugges; ha7i isti naagizay ne zaaro xalala” gides.
44023022	Azazizaysikka “Ne hayssa taas yootidayssa hara oonakka erissofa” giidi naaza moyizides.
44023023	Hessafe guye wotadarata azazizayssi mato halaqatappe nam7ata xeygidi “Qammafe heedzdzu saate gidishin Qisaariya geetettizaso bana mala nam7u xeetu wotadarata, laapun tammu toganchatanne nam7u xeetu toora asa giigissite;
44023024	Phawuloosasikka para giigissidi dere haariza Filkisekko lo7on gakkana mala ooththite”gides.
44023025	Dabdabe hizgi xaafides;
44023026	“Dere haariza boncho Filkises, Qalawodosa Lusiyoosappe; saroy nees gido.
44023027	Hayssa addeza Ayhuda asati oykki wodhana gishin izi Oroome asi gididayssa ta gakka erida gish wotadaratara gakkada ashshadis.
44023028	Isti iza aazas mootizakkonne ta erana koyada dere duulatakko shiishadis.
44023029	Isti iza bolla shiishida mootoy ba woga gish gididayssa eradis; gido attin iza hayqos woykko qashos gaththiza miishi deenna.
44023030	Hayssa addeza wodhanas asay maqetidayssa ta siyada heerakka siyida mala nekko yeddadis; mootizaytikka heen ne sinthan ba mooto shishshana mala istas yootadis” gides.
44023031	Hessa gish wotadarati ba azazettida mala Phawuloosa qammara efidi Antiphaxxirose geetettizaso gaththida.
44023032	Wontetha gallas toganchati Phawuloosara baana mala ooththidi isti qas guye so simmida.
44023033	Toganchati gede Qisaariya gakkidi dabdaabeza dere haarizayssas immidi Phawuloosa iza sinth shiishida.
44023034	Dere haarizayssi dabdaabeza nababidinne Phawuloosa “Ne awa dereppe yadii?” gi oychides. Izi Kilqiya dere as gididayssa eridi;
44023035	“Nena mootizayti yishin ta ne yo7o siyana” gides; Herdoosa gibbe gaaththan izi naagettana mala azazides.
44024001	Ichashu gallassafe guye Qeeseta halaqa Hananiyay issi issi cimataranne Xarxuloosa geetettiza xabaqara Qisaariya bides; istika dere ayssiza Filkisekko shiiqidi Phawuloosa mootida.
44024002	Phawuloosi xeeygeti shiiqin Xarxuloossi iza hizgi mootides “Boncho Filkise! Nu ne baggara daro saroteth demmidos; ne lo7o aysonka nu deres lo7etethi beettides.
44024003	“Hessa ne lo7o oosoza nu awan gidin aydekka dhoqu gida bonchoranne galatara ekkoos.
44024004	Ta ha7i nena gam7isontanne daaburissonta qaanthara nees yootizayssa kiyatethan ne nu gizayssa siyana mala woossos.
44024005	“Hayssi addezi nuus iita harge gidides; alamen diza Ayhudata ubba bolla meto medhees, Naaziraawe geetettiza wordo asata waanna kaalethizadey izakko.
44024006	Izi Xoossa Keeththe tunisana gishin nu iza oykkidos. [Nu woga mala nu iza bolla pirdana qoppidos.
