44024007	Gido attin wotadarata halaqata azazizayssi Lusiyoossi gakkidi nu kusheppe iza wolqara woththi ekkides.
44024008	Iza mootiza asaykka neekko yaana mala azazides.] Hayssi nu iza bolla shiishida mootozi wuri tumu gididayssa ne ne baggara iza oycha gakkanaas dandayassa” gides.
44024009	Hinko Ayhuda asatikka “Ee hayssi yo7ozi wurikka tumukko” giidi ammanettida.
44024010	Dere ayssiza Filikkisey Phawuloosi haasayana mala ba kushera malati besides; Phawuloosikka “Ne daro wodesoppe hayssa dereza ayssizadde gididayssa ta eriza gish ta bolla shiiqida mootozas ta nees ufayssa zaaro shiishays.
44024011	Ta Xoossas goynnanas Yerusalame biin hachchi tammanne nam7u gallassafe darontayssa ne ne baggara eranas dandayassa.
44024012	Xoossa Keeththan gidin Ayhudata Woosa Keeththan woykko katama giddon ta oonarakka palametishin woykko dere giddon meto medhishin tana demmibetenna.
44024013	Ha7i ta bolla isti shiishida mootozas ay markaka shishshanas dandayettenna.
44024014	“Gido attin ta nees qoncisana koyizay isti wordo giza Goda ogera nu aawanta Xoossas gooynayssinne Muse woganne nabeta maxaafan xaafetidayssaka ubba ammanays.
44024015	Istika ufays ooththiza mala takka nagaranchatinne xilloti hayqoppe dendanayssa Xoossan ammanettays.
44024016	Hessa gish Xoossa sinthaninne asa sinthan sidhey baynda hanoy taas daana mala ubba wode minnays.
44024017	“Ta Yerusalameppe kezin taas daro layth gididappe guye ta dere asas maado miishenne Xoossas imettiza miishe ekka yadis.
44024018	Tana isti Xoossa Keeththan demmiday ta hessa gaththishinna; he wode ta geeyza woga polishin tanara daro asi deenna; ooshinne shiroykka deenna.
44024019	Gido attin Iisiyappe yida issi issi Ayhuda asati deettes; istasika tana mootos gaththizazi diza gidikko ne sinthan tana mootetto.
44024020	Hessafe guye ta duulata sinth shiiqikko ta ooththida qohoy diikko he asati yooteto.
44024021	Tana hayssas gaththida gaasoy ta ista giddon eqqada ‘Hayqqidaytas denthi dees ga yootida gish hach pirdas inte sinth shiiqadis’ ta gaada qaala dhoqu hista yootadis attin hara ta ooththida miishi deenna” gides.
44024022	Filkisey Goda oge lo7ethi eriza gish “Wotadereta halaqata azazizayssa Lusiyoossi yiza wode ta inte yo7oza gish qasho gidiza yo7o immana” giidi ista yeddides.
44024023	Phawuloosa naagiza mato halaqay “Iza daro waayssonta lo7etha naaga; iza laggeti izas koshshiza miishi ekki yiikko diggofa” gides.
44024024	Guuththa wodeppe kaallidi Filkisey Ayhuda as gidida ba macheyo Durissillara yides; Phawuloosakka xeygidi Yesus Kirstoosan ammano gish izi yootishin siydes.
44024025	Phawuloosi xillotetha gish, asi barka bana haaro gishshinne buroppe yaana pirda gish yootin Filkisey babbidi “Ha7i ne ba; hara wode taas giigishin ta nena xeeyga ekkana” gides.
44024026	Filkisey Phawuloosappe gubbo ekkanas ufaysi ooththi naagida gish daro wode gakkanaas xeygi xeygi hasayssides.
44024027	Nam7u laythafe guye Phorqiyossa Fisxoossi Filkise ollan shuumettides; Filkisey Ayhudata ufayssanas koydi Phawuloosa qashoson aggagides.
44025001	Fisxoossi ba ayssiza dere Qisaariya gelidi heedzdzu gallas aqetidi heeppe Yerusalame bides.
44025002	Heen diza Qeeseta halaqatinne issi issi Ayhudata giddofe gita gita asati Phawuloosa bolla ba mooto shiishida; “Phawuloosa ha Yerusalame ehidi nuus lo7o ooso ooththarki!” giidi woossida; isti hessa giday Phawuloosa naagidi oge bolla wodhanas koyda gishassa.
44025004	Gido attin Fisxoossi “Phawuloosi Qisaariyan qasho keeththan naagetes; takka ha7i elle simmada he izakko baana.
44025005	Inte giddofe daannateththi dizayti tanara Qisaariya betto; Phawuloosi ooththida qohoy diza gidikko heen mooteto” gides.
44025006	Fisxoossi osupun woykko tammu gallassafe daronta wode istara gam7idappe guye Qisaariya bides; he gakkida mala wontetha gallas pirda wombora bolla uttidi Phawuloosa izakko shiishana mala azazides.
44025007	Phawuloosi iza sinth shiiqin Yerusalameppe yida Ayhudati Phawuloosa giddoththidi markay baynda daro deexo mooto iza bolla shiishida.
44025008	Phawuloosikka “Tani Ayhuda woga bolla gidin Xoossa Keeththa bolla woykko Oroome Kawo Qeesare bollaka gaththida qohoy deenna” giidi ista mootoza shaariza zaaro istas immides.
44025009	Gido attin Fisxoossi Ayhudata ufayssanas koydi Phawuloosa “Ne Yerusalame baada hayssa yo7oza heen ta sinthan pirdettana koyay?” gides.
44025010	Phawuloosi qasse hizgidi izas zaarides “Hekko ta pirdettanas taas bessiza Qeesare pirda wombora sinthan eqqadis; nekka lo7etha eriza mala ta Ayhudata bolla ooththida aykko qohoykka deenna.
44025011	Ta qohida gidikko woykko tana hayqos gaththiza qoho ta ooththida gidikko ta hayqoppe attana giikke; gido attin isti shiishshiza mootoy mela hada gidikko oonikka tana istas aaththi immanas dandayenna; takka ta yo7oy Qeesare sinth shiiqana mala ‘Yigibayne’ gadis.”
44025012	Hessa wode Fisxoossi bana zorizaytara hasayettidi “Ne Qeesarekko ‘Yigibayne’ giza gidikko Qeesarekko baandasa” gides.
44025013	Guuththa gallassatappe guye kawo Agirphaynne Barniqey Fisxoosa “Hashshu lo7on yadassa” gi mokkanas gede Qisaariya bida.
44025014	Isti heen daro gallas uttida gish Fisxoossi Phawuloosa yo7oza Kawo Agirphas hizgi yootides “Filkisey qasho keeththan yeggi aggida issadey haan dees.
44025015	Ta Yerusalamen diza wode Qeeseta halaqatinne Ayhudata ciimati ha addeza yo7o taakko ehidi ta iza bolla pirdana mala oychida.
44025016	Ta qasse ‘Mootetidadey mootizayta sinthan eqqidi bana mootiza yo7ozas bessiza zaaro immoonta dishin mootetidade aaththi imoy Oroome kawoteththas woga gidenna’ gaada zaaradis.
44025017	“Hessa gish iza mootizayti shiiqetidi yida mala heerakka wontetha gallas pirda womboran uttada Phawuloosa ta sinth shiishana mala azazadis.
44025018	Iza mootizayti iza achchan eqqida wode isti iza bolla shiishida mootoy ta baggara izi iita oosonta aggenna gaada qoppida mala gidibenna.
44025019	Gido attin isti izara mootetizay ba ammano gishshinne Phawuloosi issi hayqqidayssa ‘Paxa dees’ giza Yesusa gish gidides.
44025020	Takka hessa mala yo7o qora xeellanas tana metida gish Phawuloosa ‘Ne Yerusalame baada hessa yo7oza heen pirdettana koyay?’ gadis.
44025021	Hizgin izi qasse yo7ozi Oroome kawo sinthan beyettana mala koydi ‘Ta yo7oy Qeessare sinth shiiqana mala oychays’ gida gish iza yo7o Qeesarekko ta yeddana gakkanaas izi qasho keeththan gam7ana mala azazadis” gides.
44025022	Agirphay Fisxoosa “Takka izi giza siyana koyays” gides. Fisxoosikka “Wonto siyandassa” gides.
44025023	Hessa gish wontetha gallas Agirphaynne Barniqey kawoti may7iza mayo may7idinne daro bonchora wotadarata halaqataranne he kataman diza gita asatan azhabetti yiidi pirda keeththe gelida. Hessafe guye Fisxoossi Phawuloosa xeygisides.
44025024	Fisxoossi hizgides “Kawo Agirpha, qas nunara diza asato! Ayhuda asati wuri ‘Hayssi addezi hayssafe guye paxa daana bessenna’ giidi waassishe Yerusalamenka haanka iza bolla pirdettana mala isti tana oychizay hayssa inte beyiza addeza gishassa.
44025025	Ta ta baggara iza hayqos gaththiza issi balakka iza bolla demmabekke. Izi ‘Ta yo7oy Oroome kawo sinth shiiqi beyetto’ gida gish ta iza he yeddanas qachadis.
44025026	“Gido attin iza gish tani ta godas xaafana giza erettida yo7oy deenna; hessa gish iza issi issi paace oyshota oychikko taas xaafanayssi daanakkonne gaada inteko, harappeka kawo Agirpha neekko shiishadis.
44025027	Gaasoyka qasho asi pude bollatiza dhoqa daannakko bishin izi mootetiza yo7o qoncisonta aggoy asa eeya kessizayssi taas beettides” gides.
44026001	Agirphi Phawuloosa “Neni ne gish haasayanas dandayassa” gides. Phawuloosikka ba kushe denthidi zaaro hizgi immides.
44026002	“Kawo Agirpha! Tana Ayhudati mootiza yo7o ubbas hach ta ne sinthan tana maaddana zaaro immiza gish tana daro ufaysses.
44026003	Gaasoyka ne Ayhudata woganne ista palama ubba lo7etha eraasa; hessa gish ne ta giza ubba dandayada siyana mala ta nena woossays.
44026004	“Tani guuththa natetha wodeppe doommada waana de7idakko Ayhuda asati eretes. Koyroppe ha7i gakkanaas tani ta dere asa giddoninne Yerusalamen ta de7ida duussi asay erees.
44026005	Qasseka isti markattana koykko nu ammano gish ta keeha mintha woga naagiza Farsaawe bagga gidada gam7iddadde gididayssa isti koyroppe denthidi eretes.
44026006	Ha7i qasse pirdas tana hayssan essiday Xoossi kase nu aawatas immida caaqo qaala ufaysa gishassa.
44026007	Ha ufayssakko gakkanaas nu zarketi tammanne nam7ati Xoossa gallassinne qamma goynnishe naagida. Kawo intes hoola! Ayhudati tana mootizay ha yo7oza gishassa.
44026008	Xoossi hayqqidayta denthanayssi waanidi Ayhuda gidida inte achchan ammanetibenee?
44026009	“Takka ta baggara Naazirete Yesusa sunthas eqqetanas bessees gaada qoppadis shin;
44026010	tani Yerusalamen ooththidaykka hessakoshin; Qeeseta halaqatappe ta ekkida godateththara ammanizaytappe darota qasho keeththan yeggiissadis; ista wodhishin wodhizaytara issife days.
44026011	Daro wode Ayhudata Woosa Keeththati dizason awanka isti qaaxayettana malanne ba ammano kadana mala ooththadis; ista bolla daro hanqetadakka Isra7eeleppe karen diza hara katamataka baada ammanizayta gooddadis.
44026012	“Hayssa ha yo7ozas Qeeseta hallaqatappe kumeththa godateththinne azazo ekkada Damasqo geetettizaso ta bishin;
44026013	Kawo intes hoola! Buro ta ogen dishin gadey seeta gallas gidishin awa arshe poo7oppe aadhdhiza poo7o beyadis; he poo7oy tananne tanara biza asata yuuy aadhdhidi saloppe poo7ides.
44026014	Nu wurikka biitta bolla kundi dishin Ayhudata qaalara ‘Sawule! Sawule! Tana aazas goodday? Neni qara mashsha bolla eqqiikko nerka nena qohassa’ giza qaala siyadis.
44026015	“Takka ‘Godo! Ne oonee?’ gadis; Godayka ‘Tani ne, gooddiza Yesusakko!
44026016	Ha7i dendada ne tohon eqqa; ta nees qonciday ne tana ha7i beyidayssaninne sinthafe ta nena bessanayssan ne taas markattizade gidana mala ta nena shuumana koyadis.
44026017	Isra7eele asa kusheppenne ta nena istako kiittiza Ayzaabeta kusheppekka ashshana.
44026018	Ne ista ayfe doyana malanne dhumappe poo7on kessana mala qasseka Xala7es haarettizasoppe Xoossakko ne zaarana mala ooththana; istika tana ammanida gish ba nagarappe maarettana qasse doorettidayta giddon isti laata gade demmana’ gides.
44026019	“Hessa gish kawo Agirpha! Saloppe taas imettida ajjutaas ta azazettadis.
44026020	Gido attin ta kasetada Damasqon diza asa kaalethada Yerusalameninne Yuhuda deren ubban dizayta qasseka Ayzaabetikka nagara ogeppe Xoossakko simmidi maarettana mala erisadis; isti nagarappe simmidayssa bessizazi ooththana mala ta istas yootadis.
44026021	Hessa gaason Ayhudati ta Xoossa Keeththan dishin tana oykkidi wodhana koyda.
44026022	Hachchi gakkanaaska taas Xoossafe maadoy pacci erenna. Hessa gish guuththaska gitaska markatashe hayssan eqqadis. Nabetinne Musey kasetidi hayssa malay hanana gidayssa yootoppe attin ta hara aykkokka yootabeykke.
44026023	Istika yootidayssi ‘Xoossi kiittidadey meto beyana. Hayqoppe dendon koyro gididi asi attana poo7o Isra7eele deressinne Ayzaabetas qoncana’ gizayssa” gides.
44026024	Phawuloosi hessa yootishin Fisxoossi “Phawuloosa! Ha7i ne gooyonta aggaka; ne daro tamaridayssi nena gooshshides” gi waassides.
44026025	Phawuloosi gidikko izas “Boncho Fisxoosa! Ta nees tuma erada yootays attin gooyabeykke.
44026026	Ta iza sinthan qoncera yootida kawoy hayssa yo7oza erees; hayssika qotara ooththetontayssa gidida gish kawoy eranayssa ta ammanettays.
44026027	Kawo Agirpha! Nabeta ammanasa gidikkii? Ne ammanizayssa ta erays” gi zaarides.
44026028	Agirphayka Phawuloosa “Hekko ne tana hanno guuththa wode giddon ammanthana koyasa” gides.
44026029	Phawuloosikka izas zaaridi “Guuththa woden gidinka woykko daro woden ne xalla gidonta dishin hach ta yootidayssa siyiday wuri hanno ta qashetethaya atta wurikka ta mala gidana mala ta Xoossa woossays” gides.
44026030	Hessafe guye kawoy, dere ayssizayssi, Barniqeynne istara uttida asaykka wuri dendides.
44026031	Isti heeppe kezi bishe ba giddon “Hayssi addezi hayqos woykko qashos gaththiza miishe aykkokka ooththibenna” gida.
44026032	Agirphayka Fisxoosa “Hayssi addezi yo7oza Qeesares shiiqo goontakko aykko wosoy baynda mela yedetanako shin” gides.
44027001	Nuni Xaalane dere markaben baana mala geetetti qashettida gish Phawuloosanne hara qasho asataka kawo Awugisxoosa wotadaratappe gidida Yuuliyoosa geetettiza mato halaqas aaththi immida.
44027002	Iisiya abba achchan diza dereta biza markaben gelidi bidos. Tasolonqen diza issi Maqidooniya as Arisxirokoosa geetettizayssi nunara dees.
44027003	Wontetha gallas Sidoona gizaso gakkidos; Yuuliyoossi Phawuloosas lo7o gidida gish Phawuloosi ba laggetakko biidi asay izas koshshiza maado ooththana mala piqade immides.
44027004	Heeppe dendi nu bishin sintha baggara carkoy nu bolla carkiza gish abba giddon diza Qophiroose deren gemmetidi gede sinthe bidos.
44027005	Kilqiya gizasonne Phinfiliya geetettiza dere achchan diza abba pinnidi Looqiya deren diza Muura geetettiza katama gakkidos.
44027006	Heen mato halaqay Ixaaliya dere biza Iskindiriya dere markabe demmidi nuna izan gelthides.
44027007	Daro gallas loddu gi gi biidi daro waayetidi Qandoose geetettiza katama achchi gakkidos; carkoykka nu sinth boonta mala diggin Salmoona achchara aadhdhidi Qarxeese geetettiza abba giddon diza deren gemettidi bidos.
44027008	Daro waayetidi lanqe lanqe oykki nu aadhdhidappe guye Laasiya geetettiza katama achchan diza “Lo7o” geetettiza markabey eqqizaso gakkidos.
44027009	Nu biza oge bolla daro daaburan xooma wodey aadhdhida gish ha7i abba bolla baanas daro meto gidida gish Phawuloosi banara diza asay naagettana mala hizgides;
44027010	“Aso! Hayssafe nu kaallidi baana buussay daro metora dizayssi taas bettes; markabezan diza caanaaza bollanne markabeza bolla xalala gidonta asa shempo bollaka gita qohoy gakkana.”
44027011	Mato halaqay qas Phawuloosa zoreppe bollara markabeza laaggiza waannazinne marakabeza goday gizayssa siydes.
44027012	He markabey eqqizasoy balgoy aadhdhana gakkanaas markabes lo7o shemposo gidonta gish dariza bagga asay “Hammutha sinth gujjanas dandayettikko awa arshey wullizasoppe dugeha baggaranne pudeha baggara diza Finqe geetettizaso Qarxeese markabe shemposo nu gakkidi balgo heen aaththoos” giidi ba qofa shiishida.
44027013	Dugeha baggara guuththa carkoy carkishin beyidi isti qoppida mala hanana misatin baana kezida; markabey eqqizasoppe baana dendidi Qarxeese achchara lanqe lanqe oykkidi aadhdhi bida.
44027014	Gido attin guuththa wodeppe guye “Awa arshey mokizasoppe pudehappe yiza gote carko” geetettiza iita wolqama carkoy abba giddon diza dereyippe dendidi istako abba giddo yides.
44027015	Markabeza carkoy sugin carkara eqqeettanas dandayonta ixin nu co7u giidi carkoy efizaso bidos.
44027016	Qeedda geetettiza abba giddonko diza dere dizaarin geemettidi nu bishin daro waayetidi markabeza qeeri wogoloyin oykkidi essanas dandayidos.
44027017	Markabeza laagizayti qeeri wogoloyo markabezako goochchi kessidi markabeza wodorora xaaxida. Markabezikka Sirtise geetettiza abba accey dari dizason kundonta mala babbidi iza bolla diza shara woththidi carkon laageti bida.
44027018	Gote carkoy minni bida gish wontetha gallas markabezan caanettida miishata issa issa abba giddo yegeth oykkida.
44027019	Heedzdzantho gallas markabezas koshshiza miishataka ba kushera kessi kessi yeggida.
44027020	Daro wode gakkanaas awa arsheka xoolinteka beyonta aggida gishshinne carkoyka kaseppe minni minni biza gish hayssafe guye nu attana dandayokko giza qofan ufays qanxidos.
44027021	Asay kath moonta daro gallas uttides. Hessa gish Phawuloosi asa giddon eqqidi “Ha asato! Inte ta gizayssa siydi Qarxeeseppe dendontakko ha qohoynne ha dhayoy inte bolla gakkenakkoshin.
44027022	Ha7ikka markabezi xalla qohettana attin intefe issade shempoykka dhayenna. Hessa gish aykkoy baawa; babbofte gaada intena zorays.
44027023	Qamma omars ta izas gidida ta goynniza Xoossay kiittida kiitanchay ta achchan eqqidi
44027024	‘Phawuloosa! Babbofa! ne Qeesare sinthan eqqana bessees; hekko nenara issife bizayta wursi Xoossi ne gish hayqoppe ashshana’ giidi taas yootides.
44027025	Hessa gish inteno ha asato aykkoy baawa; Xoossi taas hayssa yootidayssa polanayssa ta ammanays.
44027026	Gidikkoka hayssi gote carkozi gede issi abba giddon diza dere achchi efidi nuna yeggana” gides.
44027027	Tammanne oydantho qamma Andiriya Abba giddon carkoy nuna waayssishin bishe leela giddoth markabeza laaggizaytas abbafe biitta bolla gakkida misatides.
44027028	Hessa gish abba ciimmateththi eranas abban yeggi xeelliza wodoro isti yeggi xeellishin; abba ciimmateththi oyddu tammu metre keena gidi beettides; gam7ishe Ha7ikka yeggin heedzdzu tammu metre keena ciimma gididayssa demmida.
44027029	Nu diza markabey abba gaxan diza zaalla shuchchara icetonta mala babbidi markabezappe guye baggara markabey qaaxonta mala naagiza dhishikke duge abba giddo yeggida. Hessafe guye istas qamay wontana mala woossa oykkida.
44027030	Markabeza laagizayti markabezappe kezidi baqatana koyda gish markabezappe sintha baggara markabe naagiza dhishikke yeggiza misatidi markabeza bolla diza qeeri wogoloyo duge abba giddo yeggida.
44027031	Hessa wode Phawuloosi mato halaqanne wotadarata “Hayti markabezan diza asati markabeza bolla shempidi uttonta aggikko inteka attana dandayekketa” gides.
44027032	Hessa gish wotadarati wogoloyo oykkida wodoroza qanxi yeggin iza abba bolla tokkettana mala yeddi aggida.
44027033	Gadey wontana gishin wurikka kath maana mala Phawuloosi ista hizgi woossides “Inte aazi hananesha giidi hirgan kath moonta aggin hachchi tammanne oydantho gallasa.
44027034	Hessa gish inte kath maana mala ta intena woossays. Inte miikko minnana; mulekka aykko qohoykka inte bolla gakkenna” gides.
44027035	Izi hessa gidappe guye kath ekkidi Xoosse galatidi asa ubba sinthan kathi muus oykkides.
44027036	Hessa wode wurikka minetidi kath mida.
44027037	Markabeza giddon diza asay wuri nam7u xeetanne laapun tammanne usuppuna.
44027038	Wurikka mi kaallidappe guye markaban caanettida gisteza duge abba giddo yeggidi markabeza deexo kawushshida.
44027039	Gadey wontin ba dizaso eribeetenna. Gido attin accey dizaso abba kurqunthu demmida. Istas dandayettizakko markabeza he sugi shishshana qoppida.
44027040	Markabeza oykkiza dhishikke qanxidi abba giddo yeggida. He wode markabe laggiza miisha oykkida wodorota birshida. Ha baggara diza shaara carko bagga dhoqu histidi kezana abba gaxa bida.
44027041	Gido attin markabezi daro accey koretti uttidayssara icetidi duge gufannides; sintha bolla duge gufanni dhishikketidi qaaxontayssa gidides. Qas abba dambalay daroppe dendidayssan guye baggara meqereteth oykkides.
44027042	Qasho asappe issadeyka abban wodhdhidi kessi ekkonta mala wotadarati wodhana qoppida.
44027043	Mato halaqay qas Phawuloosa ashshanas koyda gish ista qofa ekkana koybenna. Gido attin haathe wodhdhi erizayti markabezappe duge abban guppi guppi wodhdhidi gede biitta bolla kezana mala azazides.
44027044	Hanko attidayti meqi wodhdhida sanqa bolla abba pinnana mala azazides; hessatho hanidi wurikka saron abba giddofe biitta bolla gakkida.
44028001	Nu Biittay dizaso sarotethan gakkidappe guye nu gakkida abba giddon diza derey Melaaxiya geetettiza dere gididaro eridos.
44028002	He dereyin diza asay daro malalisiza kiyateth nuus ooththides. He wode iray bukkida gishshinne meeggo gidida gish tama eththidi nuna mokki ekkida.
44028003	Phawuloosi afira giza mithi shiishshidi taman gujin tama seelappe dendidayssan shooshi kezidi iza kushe bolla xaaxxetides.
44028004	Malta asay shooshi Phawuloosa kushe bolla xaaxxetidayssa beyidi “Hayssi addezi shempo wodhidade; gaasoyka abba dambalappekka izi attidi yikkokka pirdiza Xoossafe kessi ekkidi paxa daana dandaybenna” giidi ba giddon haasayettida
44028005	Phawuloosi qas shoosha duge taman qoqof yeggidi aykkokka hanibenna.
44028006	Asaykka “Aydeppe ayde iza asatethay kixxanesha; woykko qopponta kundidi hayqqana” giidi naagides; gido attin isti daro wode naagishin iza bolla aykkoynne hanontayssa beyidi ba qofa lammidi “Hayssi addezi xoossa!” gides.
44028007	He nu dizaso matan abba giddon diza dereyo ayssiza Puppulyoosa geetettizades gadey dees; he addezi nuna mokki ekkidi bason heedzdzu gallas gakkanaas lo7ethi imattides.
44028008	Heen Puppulyoosa aawa miishaynne guso hargey sakkin ichchidi dees; Phawuloosi izakko gelidi izas woossidessinne iza bolla ba kushe woththidi pathides.
44028009	Hessi hessatho hanidappe guye he dereyn diza hara harganchati yiidi paxida.
44028010	Asaykka nuus daro miish ehidi nuna bonchizayssa nuna bessida; nu markaben baana dendin nuus koshshizayssa markaben wursi caanida.
44028011	Nu Milixinen heedzdzu agina gam7idappe guye balgoy aadhdhana gakkanaas abba giddon diza dereyin gam7idi Iskindiriyappe yiza markaben gelidi baana dendidos; he markabeza bolla Diyossiqoroosa geetettiza nam7u mente eeqata misiley dees.
44028012	Gede Sirakuuse geetettiza katama gakkidi heen heedzdzu gallas gam7idos.
44028013	Heeppe abba bollara biidi Regiyoome geetettiza katama gakkidos; heen issi gallas aqidi duge baggara yiza carkoy carkida gish nam7antho gallas Puttiyoloose geetettizaso bidos.
44028014	Heen ammanizayta demmidi istara nu laapun gallas gakkanaas uttana mala nuna woossida. Heeppe qasse Oroome bidos.
44028015	Oroomen diza ammaniza asay nu gish siydi Apiyoose geetettiza giyanne “Heedzdzu Aqosota” geetettizaso gakkanaas nuna mokkana yida; Phawuloosaykka ista beyidi Xoosse galatidessinne minetides.
44028016	Nuni Oroome gelida wode Phawuloosa naaganas issi wotadaray izas imettin Phawuloosi barka daana mala izas fiiqadey imettides.
44028017	Heedzdzu gallassafe guye Phawuloosi Oroomen diza Ayhudatappe gita asata baako xeygisides; istika izakko shiiqin “Ta ishato! Tani Isra7eele dere bollanne nu aawata woga bolla ooththida issi qohoykka deenna; gido attin Yerusalamen tana qachidi Oroome asatas aaththi immida.
44028018	Oroome asati tana qori oychidappe guye tana hayqos gaththiza miish demmoonta aggida gish birshi yeddana koyda.
44028019	Gido attin Ayhuda asay ta bolla issi wosoy baynda yeddetonta mala eqqettin ta yo7oy Qeesare sinth shiiqidi beetto gaanas taas gidde gidides. Gido attin tani ta dereta mootiza gaasoy taas deenna.
44028020	Ta qas ha7i intena xeygisiday intena beyanassinne hanno intes yootanassa. Hayssa sansalatan tani qashetiday Isra7eele naytas imettida ufaysa gaasonna” gides.
44028021	Istika izas “Ne gish Yuhuda dereppe xaafetida debiddabbey nuna gakkibeenna. Ha yida asatappe oonikka ne gish iita haasayiday baawa.
44028022	Hayssa ne kaalliza ammanoza gish awanka asay iita haasayizayssa nu eroos. Hessa gish ne qofay azakkonne nu siyana koyoos” gi zaarida.
44028023	Bare izas immidi hara gallas kushe kumidi izi diza keeththe yida. Izikka maladoppe omars gakkanaas Xoossa Kawoteththa gish markatethan ba qofa istas qoncisides. Muse wogappenne nabeta maxaafatappe xaqasi xaqasi Yesusa gish istas qoncisi yootides.
44028024	Istafe issi issi asati izi yootida qaala ammanida; baggayti qas ammanibetenna.
44028025	Istika ba giddon issoy issara qofan gaggonta shaaketida; Phawuloosi wursethan yootishe “Xillo Ayanay nabe Isayaasa baggara kase inte aawatas yootidayssi tumakko!
44028026	Izi yootida qaalay, ‘Hayssa derakko baada inte sisi siyana shin yuushi qoppeketa, ayfera beyana shin woznan wotheketa gaada yoota.
44028027	Gaasoyka he asata woznay muumides, ista haythayka tullides; ista ayfey qooqides. Hessatho hanontakko isti ba ayfera beyidi ba haythara siydi ba woznan yuushi qoppidi taakko ha simmananne takka ista pathanashin’ gides.
44028028	“Histikko Xoossi as ashshiza kiitay Ayzaabetaska kiitettidayssa inte erite; istika ero giidi ekkettes” gides.
44028029	Phawuloosi hessa yootidappe guye Ayhuda asati ba giddon daro palametishe kezi bida.
44028030	Phawuloosi kiratida keeththan nam7u layth kumeth de7ides; baako yiza as wursi mokki ekkides.
44028031	Xoossa kawoteth sabakon Goda Yesus Kirstoosa gish oonikka iza diggonta xalatethara asa tamarsides.
45001001	Yesus Kirstoosa ayllenne Hawaare gidanas xeeygetida Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas Phawuloosappe kiitettida kiita.
45001002	He mishiraachcho qaala gish kase nabeta baggara Geeshsha Maxaafatan ufaysi imettides.
45001003	Mishiraachcho qaalaykka ba naaza gish izi asho baggara Dawute zerethafe gididayssa yootiza gishassa.
45001004	Hessathoka nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi ba geeshshatetha Ayanan hayqoppe dendidayssi izi Xoossa naa gididayssi gita wolqan qoncides.
45001005	Kirstoosa suntha gish ammanonta derey ammanana malanne azazettana mala iza baggara nuni hawaratethas gaththiza kiyateth ekkidos.
45001006	Inteka Yesus Kirstoosayta gidana mala xeeygetidaytara deeta.
45001007	Xoossan dosettidaytanne geeshshata gidanas xeeygetida Oroome biittan diza intes ubbas nu Aawa Xoossafenne nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
45001008	Inte ammanoy alame kumeththan siyetida gishshinne inte gish ta Goda Xoossa Yesus Kirstoosa baggara galatays.
45001009	Ta inte gish ubba wode ay mala qoppizakkone Xoossa naa mishiraachcho sabakon ta kumeththa woznappe izas ooththiza Xoossay taas marka.
45001010	Tani ta woossan ubba wode intena qoppays. Ha7i qasse wursethan Xoossa shene gidikko ta inteko baana mala Xoossi taas oge doyana mala woossays.
45001011	Inte minnana mala maaddiza Ayana imotethi ta intes gishanassinne intena ayfera beyanas laamotays.
45001012	Hessika intenne tani issoy issara ammanon minettanassa.
45001013	Ta ishato! Harason ammanontayta matan taas hanida mala inte matanka taas ooso ayfey bettana mala daro wode qoppadis shin hanno gakkanaas ta diggettada dizayssa inte erana mala koyays.
45001014	Tamaridaytas gidin tamarontaytaska; eratasinne eeyatas ubbas ta bolla tamarsana accoy dees.
45001015	Intes Oroomen dizaytassikka ta mishiraachcho qaala yootanas ta amottizay hessassa.
45001016	Ammanzayti wuri attana mala Xoossa wolqa gidida gish ta mishiraachcho qaalan yeelatikke; hessikka koyro Ayhudatas kaallidi Ayzaabetassa.
45001017	“Xilloy Xoossa ammanon dees” geetettidi kase xaafettida mala Xoossa xilloteth mishiraachcho qaalan qoncinna; he xillotethi koyroppe wurseth gakkanaas ammanon hanana.
45001018	Tuma ba iitatethaninne makalan tucci oykkizayta iitatetha bollanne ista makalatetha ubba bolla Xoossa hanqoy saloppe qoncana.
45001019	Isti eranas bessizazi Xoossi wursi istas qoncisida gish isti Xoosse eranaas qonce.
45001020	Alamey medhetosoppe haa simmin asa ayfen beetti eronta Xoossa hanotethi hessikka izas diza merna wolqaynne Xoossatethay izi medhdhida medhetethan qoncen beettees. Hessa gish asay shiishana gaasoy deenna.
45001021	Isti Xoosse erikkoka iza Xoossatetha mala bonchibettenanne galatibettenna. Gido attin ista qofay mela go7ay bayndazi gididessinne yuushi qopponta mala ista woznay dhumides.
45001022	Isti bana “Era” gizayta gidikkoka eeyata gidida.
45001023	Merna Xoossa boncho hayqqiza asaninne kafotan; mehetaninne biitta bolla gooshettiza medhetethatan misatissidi laammida.
45001024	Hessa gish Xoossi ista ba giddon issoy issara barka ba asatethan tuna ooso ooththana mala geeshshatethi baynda laymatethas aaththi immides.
45001025	Isti Xoossa tumateth wordon laammida; medhdhida Xoossa aggidi medhetethas goynnidanne istas ooththida. Medhdhida Xoossi izi mernas galattettidayssa. Amiin.
45001026	Hessa geedon Xoossi ista yellachiza amotethas aaththi immides. Isti macasati banara zin7anas bessontaytara zin7ana mala bana aaththi immida.
45001027	Hessathoka attuma asay baasi bessiza macasatara zin7anas bessishin addey addera zin7anas amon xuugetidi macasatara zin7iza mala addey addera zin7idi pala miishi ooththida. Heytanti barka ba ooththida iita oosozas bessiza qixaate ba bolla ehida.
45001028	Qasseka isti ba qofara Xoosse eroy nuna maaddenna gida gish isti ooththanas bessontayssa ooththana mala Xoossi ista go7onta qofas aaththi immides.
45001029	Ubba baggara makalanne iitateth, yiiqenne iita ooson xalala kumida; qanatetethan, shempo wodhon, ooshan, baleththoninne genen kumidayta qasseka zigirzayta gidida.
45001030	Asa sunth moorizayta, Xoossa ixizayta, as cayzayta, otoranchatanne ceeqqettizayta gidida, ubba wode iita ooththanas oge koyizayta, bana yelidaytas azazettontayta,
45001031	yushi qoppontayta, gida qaala zaari laallizayta, asas mishetontayta; menxe iitata.
45001032	Hessa “Ooththizayti wurikka hayqqanas bessees” giza Xoossa woga isti erishe heytanta baasi ooso xalala gidonta hessathoka ooththizaytaka minthethetes.
45002001	Hessa gish neno hara bolla pirdizaysso neni ta hanni geedon ooththadis giza gaasoy nees deenna. Ne hara asa bolla pirdizayssan nerka nees kunane ekkaasa. Gaasoyka hara asa bolla ne pirdizayssa nekka zaarada iza ooththiza gishassa.
45002002	Hayta malata ooththiza asata bolla Xoossa pirday likke gididayssa nu eroos.
45002003	Hessa gish ne asa bolla pirdashe he ne pirdizayssa zaara ooththizade gidikko ne Xoossa pirdafe kessa ekka attana nees misatizee?
45002004	Woykko Xoossa kiyateth nena maarotethakko kaalethizayssa shaaka eronta dashe iza gita kiyatethanne iza dandaya duretetha ne leqqay?
45002005	Gido attin neni ne wozna muumetethaninne maaroteth koyonta ne wozna geedon tuma Xoossa pirday qonciza wode Xoossa hanqo gallassas ne bolla daro hanqo shiishasa.
45002006	Xoossi issas issas iza ooso mala immana.
45002007	Lo7o ooso aggonta ooththidi boncho sabanne merna de7o koyizaytas merna de7o immana.
45002008	Gido attin barka bana dosizaytassinne tuma aggagidi iita kaallizayta bolla pirdaynne hanqoy gakkana.
45002009	Iita ooththiza ay asa bolla koyro Ayhuda asa bolla kaallidi Ayzaabeta bolla waayeynne metoy gakkana.
45002010	Gidikkoka lo7o ooththizades oonaska Ayhuda asas gidin Ayzaabetas sabay, sarotethinne bonchoy gidana.
45002011	Xoossi oonakka shaakki maaddenna.
45002012	Kase wogay eqonta wode nagara ooththida asay wurikka wogay baynda dhayana; wogay eqi simmin nagara ooththidayti wogan oyketidi pirdettana.
45002013	Ayssi giikko Xoossa achchan xillo geetettizayti eqqida wogas azazetizaytappe attin woga sisi siyizayta xalla gidetenna.
45002014	Wogay baynda Ayzaabeti wogay yootizayssa coo mela hanotethafe eridi ooththishin istas wogay baynda aggikkokka istas medhetetha wogay diza gish isti ba ooththanayssa ereetes.
45002015	Ista woznay istas markattiza gishshinne ista qofay ista mootiza gish qasseka ista maaddiza gish wogay yootizay ista woznan xaafettidayssa ereetes.
45002016	Hessika ta Mishiraachcho qaalan tamarsiza mala Xoossi asa woznan qotetidayssa Kirstoosa baggara pirdiza gallassan qoncisana.
45002017	Ne nena Ayhuda as giikko wogan ammanettasanne nees Xoossara diza issifetethan ceeqqettasa.
45002018	Woga kaalliza gish Xoossa shene erada kumeth gidizaz shaaka erida gidikko,
45002019	ne qooqeta kaaleththizade; dhuman dizaytas poo7o gididayssa ne ammanettidade gidikko
45002020	wogappe ne demmida eratethaninne tumatethan hanko erontayta zorizade, guutha nayta tamarsizade gidikko
45002021	histikko neni harata tamarso agada ne hu7es aazas tamarikii? Ne hara asi kaysotoppa ga sabakashe nees kaysotay?
45002022	Ne hara asay laymatonta mala yootashe nees laymatay? Nees eeqa ixasashin Xoossa Keeththa miisha bonqay?
45002023	Nees wogan ceeqqettasa shin woga ne baggara ooththonta aggada Xoossa kawushshay?
45002024	Hessika “Inte geedon Xoossa sunthi Ayzaabeta achchan cayeettes” geetetti xaafettida mala hanides.
45002025	Ne woga naaga polizade gidikko qaxxaras go7ay dees. Ne woga ooththontade gidikko qasse ne qaxxaray coo hada.
45002026	Qaxxaretonta dishe wogay gizayssa polikko qaxxaretidadera gina qoodetenee?
45002027	Nees xaafettida wogaynne qaxxaray nees diikko diza woga ne naagontade gidikko hanko qaxxaretonta dashe wogas azazettiday ne bolla pirdana.
45002028	Issadey coo mela sunthas asa ayfen ta Ayhuda as gidana giikko izi Ayhuda asi gidenna. Tumappe qaxxeretethi coo karera asho ayfen beettiza qaxxara gidenna.
45002029	Gidikkoka issi asi Ayhuda as gidanas dandayizay izas gaaththa baggara Ayhuda as gidishinna. Qaxxaraykka qaxxara gidizay xaafettida woga xalala gidonta Ayanan woznappe gidida qaxxara gidikkokko! Hessa mala asi galata asappe gidonta Xoossafe demmees.
45003001	Histikko Ayhuda as gideththas aaza go7ay dizee? Qaxxaray ay go7izee?
45003002	Awarakka gidin go7ay daro. Harappe koyro Xoossa qaalay hadara Ayhudatas imettides.
45003003	Istafe issi issades ammanoy baynda aggikko Xoossa ammanoteth diggizee?
45003004	Mulekka diggenna! Asi wurikka wordancha q1 “Neni ne qaalappe dendidayssan tumancha; q2 pirdanka xoonizade gidaasa” hessatho geetetti xaafettida mala Xoossi qasse tumancha.
45003005	Nu makala oosoy Xoossa xilloteth qoncen bessizayssa gidikko histin nu ay ganee? Coo asa woga mala palametanas Xoossi ba hanqo nu bolla ehizaysi nuus bessenna ganeyee? Hessaka ta gizay asatho qofanna.
45003006	Tumappe hessatho hanenna. Hessatho haniza gidikko Xoossi alame bolla wosti pirdandee?
45003007	Ta wordoteth Xoossa tumateth qoncisizayssan iza boncho gede gujizayssa gidikko histin ha7i gakkanaas wosti ta bolla nagarancha mala pirdetizee? giidi palamettana asi daana dandayees.
45003008	Hessa guussi “Lo7oy yaana mala ane iita ooththoos” geettes giidi issi issi asati nu bolla woresizayssa mala. Hayta asata bolla gakkiza pirday tumu pirda.
45003009	Histin nu ay giinoo? Nuni istafe aadhdhizonii? Mulekka aadhdhokko. Ayhudata gidikkoka Ayzaabeta gidikkoka wurikka nagarappe garsa baggara diza gish ta wursaka kasetada istas yootadis.
45003010	“Xilloy oonikka deenna; issadeykka deenna.
45003011	Yuushi qoppizadey baawa; Xoosse koyizay issadeyka baawa.
45003012	Wurikka balettidanne issi bolla go7ontayta gidida. Lo7o ooththizay oonikka baawa; issadeykka deenna.
45003013	Ista duunay doya diza duufo mala; ista duunay ubba wode baleththo haasayees; ista metershay shoosha marzera dees.
45003014	Ista duunan qangethinne camo miish kumides.
45003015	Ista tohoy suuth gussanas eesotes.
45003016	Ista ogen dhayoynne laafateth dees.
45003017	Isti sarotetha oge erettenna.
45003018	Ista ayfeson Xoossas baboy baawa” geetetti xaafettida mala.
45003019	Hessa gish duunay wurikka gordettana mala derey kumeth Xoossas zaaro immana mala wogay gizay wurikka wogappe giddora dizaytas gididayssa nu eroos.
45003020	Hessa gish wogay nagaray aazakkone erisees attin woga naagon oonikka iza achchan xillo geetettanas dandayenna.
45003021	Ha7i qasse woga kase nabeti izas markattidays wogappe karera gidida Xoossa xillotethi qoncides.
45003022	Hessi Xoossa xillotethi Yesus Kirstoosa ammanon dummatethi baynda beettiza xillotetha.
45003023	Gaasoyka asi wurikka nagara ooththides. Xoossa bonchoyka asa naas paccides.
45003024	Asay Yesus Kirstoosi asa naa gish ooththida kiyatethafe dendidayssan coo mela xillides.
45003025	Iza suuthan gidida ammanon nagarappe maarettana yarsho histidi Xoossi Yesusa shiishshides. Izi hessa ooththiday kasetidi poletida nagara qaxayonta dandayan aadhdhida ba xilloteth bessanasa.
45003026	Izi hessa ha wodezan ooththiday ba xillotetha hessikka ba baggara xillo gidida Yesus Kirstoosan ammanizade xillisizayssa bessanassa.
45003027	Histin nuni izan ceeqqettiza miishi aazi dizee? Aykko miishanka ceeqqettokko. Nu ceeqqettana gaasoy aazee? Woga naagiza gishee? Gidenna, ammanonna.
45003028	Ay assikka ammanon attin woga naagon attontayssa nu geeshshi yootoos.
45003029	Xoossi Ayhudata Xoosse xalalaa? Ayzaabetaska Xoosse gidenee? Ee Ayzaabetaska izi Xoossa.
45003030	Qaxxaretidayssa ammanon qasse qaxxaretontayssakka he ammanonka xillisizaykka izi issi Xoossa xalla.
45003031	Histin hessi hessa gidikko ammano geedon woga go7ay baynda miish ooththinoo? Mulekka hessatho hanenna; Woga nu minthana attin.
45004001	Hessa gish qasse nu Abrahaamey hayssafe ay go7a demmide giinoo?
45004002	Abrahaamey ba ooson xillidakko izi ceeqqettanazi izas deessko shin; izi Xoossa sinthan ceeqqettanas dandayenna.
45004003	Geeshsha Maxaafay “Abrahaamey Xoosse ammanidesinne iza ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodettides” gees.
45004004	Issadey ooso ooththikko izi ekiza miishay izas coo kiyateth imettizaz gidonta izaades ooso waaga gides.
45004005	Gido attin ooso ooththonta nagarancha asi xillo kessiza Xoossan ammanizades iza ammanoy izas xillotethan taybetes.
45004006	Dawuteykka xillotethi izades qoodetizay lo7o ooson gidonta asa gish,
45004007	“Istas ista bala oosoy atto geetettidaytinne nagarappe maaretidayti anjettidayta!
45004008	iza nagara Goday mulekka qoodontadey izi anjettidayssa!” gides.
45004009	Ha anjozi qaxxaretidaytas xalalayee? Woykko qaxaretontaytassaraa? “Kase koyro nu aawa Abrahaame ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodettides” gidos.
45004010	Histin waani izas hessatho qoodettidee? Izi qaxxaretidappe guyee? Woykko qaxxaretanappe kasee? Izas xillotethan qoodettiday izi qaxxaretanappe sinthanna.
45004011	Izi kase qaxxaretanappe kase demmida xillotethay qaxxaras malata gidana mala xillotethas maatame ekides. Hessa gish qaxxaretonta ammanizaytas xilloteth qoodettanna mala ubbatas izi aawa.
45004012	Izi qaxxaretidaytaska aawa; qaxxaretidaytas xalala gidonta nu aawa Abrahaamey kase qaxxaretanappe sinthe izas diza ammano geedo kaallizaytas ubbassa.
45004013	Izi alame laattizade gidana mala Abrahaameynne iza zerethati ufaysa qaala ekiday woga baggara gidonta ammanon gidida xillotethana.
45004014	Woga naagizayti laattizayta gidikko ammanos go7ay deenna; hidotayka coo hada gidanashin;
45004015	wogay hanqo kaaleththes. Wogay bayndason wogappe aadhdheth deenna.
45004016	Hessa gish hidotay ammanon yides. Hessika iza hidotay iza kiyatethan gidana malanne Abrahaame zerethas ubbas ammanettizayssa gidana mala hanides. Hessika wogan izayta gididaytas xalala gidonta ammanon Abrahaame nayta gididaytas ubbatassa. Izikka nuus ubbaska aawa.
45004017	Hessika “Ta nena daro dere aawa ooththadis” geetetti xaafettida mala hanides. Izikka hayqqidaytas de7o immizaden bayndayssa qasse diza mala ooththizaden ammanida Xoossa sinthan izi nuus aawa.
45004018	Kase izas “Ne zerethi hessatho hanana” geetettida mala aykko hidotayka baynda dishin Abrahaamey Xoossi hanana gidayssa ammanidi daro dere aawa gidides.
45004019	Abrahaames yeletin xeetu layth gidichin Abrahaamey ba asatethay hayqetha mala gididayssanne Saaras yelo wodey aadhdhi bidayssa erishekka ammanon lepibenna.
45004020	Gede gujjidi ammanon minnidi Xoossas boncho immides attin Xoossi gida qaala sidhibenna.
45004021	Xoossi izas immida hidotay poletanayssa kumeththa woznappe ammanides.
45004022	Hessa gish izas xillotethan qoodetides.
45004023	“Izas xillotethan qoodettides” giza qaalay xaafettiday izas xalala gidenna.
45004024	Gido attin Xoossi nu xillotetha iza baggara tayibiza nu Goda Yesusa hayqoppe denthidayssan ammaniza nuussara.
45004025	Izi nu nagara gish hayqqanas aadhi imettides. Izi nuna xillisanas hayqoppe dendides.
45005001	Histikko nuni ammanon xillida gish nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus Xoossara saroteth dees.
45005002	Hayssa ha ammanozan minni diza kiyatethan nuni geliday iza baggara gidida gish ufayssan Xoossa boncho gishetti ekizayta gidida gish nu ufayoos.
45005003	Hayssan xalala gidonta nuna gakkiza waayenka ufayeettoos. Gaasoyka waayey dandayan gaththizayssa nu eroos.
45005004	Dandayay paacen minoteth imees; paacen minoteth hidota imees.
45005005	He hidotay qasse nuna yellachenna. Xoossi nuus immida Xillo Ayanan ba siiqo nu woznan gussida gish he hidotay nuna yellan gaththenna.
45005006	Nu daburanchata gidi dishin Xoossa wodey gakkida mala Kirstoosi nu nagara gish hayqqides.
45005007	Xillo asa gish hayqqana asi betanayssi daro metees. Lo7o asa gish hayqqanas xalana asi oonee erizay bettana dandayees.
45005008	Gido attin nu buro nagarancha gidi dishin Kirstoosi nu gish hayqqides. Hessika Xoossi nuna siiqiza ba siiqo hessan bessees.
45005009	Nuni iza suuthan geeyidayta gidikko harappeka iza baggara Xoossa hanqofe attana.
45005010	Nu Xoossas morketa gidi dishin iza naaza hayqon izara giigidayta gidikko nu izara giigidappe guye iza naaza de7o baggara nuni paxidayssi waani keehi darene!
45005011	Hessa xalala gidenna; qasseka nuni ha7i izara giiga demmida nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara Xoossanka ufays ooththoos.
45005012	Hessa gish nagaray issade gaason duge ha alameza yida mala hayqoyka nagara gaason yides. Hayqoyka hessa baggara asa ubbakko yides. Hessas gaasoy asi wurikka iza baggara nagara ooththida gishassa.
45005013	Wogay imettanappe kase nagaray biitta bolla dees shin wogay bayndason nagaray nagara gidenna.
45005014	Gido attin Addameppe ha simmin Muse wode gakkanaas diza woden Addame mala woga menthidi nagara ooththontayta bollaka hayqoy kawotides. Addamey buro yaana Kirstoosas leemiso.
45005015	Gidikkoka iza kiyatetha imotay asa qoho mala gidenna. Issadey mooridayssan daro asay hayqqikkoka Xoossa kiyatethaninne issi asi Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethan yida imotay darotas keehi dari imettides.
45005016	Qasseka Xoossa imotay issade baggara yida nagarappe beettida ayfe mala gidenna. Gaasoyka iza pirday issade nagara kaallidi pirda ekki yides. Iza imotay qasse daro qoho gaason xilloteth ehides. Hayqoy issade baggara kawotidayssa gidikko daro tirpa gidida Xoossa kiyatethinne xillotetha imota ekkidayti issade baggara hessikka Yesus Kirstoosa baggara xoondi de7on daana.
45005018	Histikko issade qoho geedon pirday asa ubba bolla gakkida mala hessathoka issade xillotetha ooson as ubbas de7o immiza xillotethi beettides.
45005019	Issadey azazettonta ixida gish daro asay nagarancha gidida mala issade azazetethan qasse daroti xillana.
45005020	Wogay yiin mooroy darides. Gido attin nagaray daroyssafe bollara Xoossa kiyatethi keehi darides.
45005021	Hessika haniday nagaray hayqo bolla kawotidayssa mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara qasse merna de7oy bettana mala iza kiyatethi xillotethan kawotanassa.
45006001	Histin nu ay giinoo? Xoossa kiyatethi darana mala nagara gujji ooththinoo?
45006002	Mulekka gidenna. Nuni nagaras hayqqidos. Histin hayssafe guye nu waani nagaran daanee?
45006003	Nuni Yesus Kirstoosara issino gidana mala xammaqetidayti iza hayqon nu issife gidanas xammaqetidayssa hayssa inte ereketii?
45006004	Hessa gish Kirstoosi ba Aawa bonchon hayqoppe dendida mala nunikka hessatho ooratha de7on daanas xinqaten hayqqidi izara moogetidos.
45006005	Nuni hessa mala hayqon izara issino gidikko qasse denthanka izara issino gidoos.
45006006	Hayssafe guye nu nagaras aylle gidonta mala nagara asatethay kichchana mala kase nu ceega asatethay izara issife kaqettidayssa nu eroos.
45006007	Gaasoyka hayqqida asi nagarappe shempides.
45006008	Nuni Kirstoosara hayqqidayta gidikko nu izara issife daanayssa ammanos.
45006009	Kirstoosi hayqoppe dendida gish nam7antho izi hayqqontayssanne iza bolla hayqos wolqay bayndayssa nu eroos.
45006010	Izi hayqqida wode issito wursi nagara gish hayqqides. Gido attin Xoossas paxa duus dees.
45006011	Hessathoka inte nagaras hayqqidi Xoossas Yesus Kirstoosa baggara paxa dizayssa erite.
45006012	Hessa gish iita ooththana koyiza iita asho qofa koydi hayqqida inte asatetha bolla nagaray kawotana mala ooththofte.
45006013	Inte asateth iita ooso ooththiza miish ooththi nagaras haarisofte. Hessa mala ooththanappe hayqoppe gede de7on pinnida asata mala intena Xoossas haarisite. Inte asatetha xillotetha miisha mala Xoossas haarisite.
45006014	Inte Xoossa kiyatetha garsan deeta attin woga garsan doonta gish intena nagaray haarenna.
45006015	Histin ay ooththinoo? Woga garsan gidonta nuni Xoossa kiyatetha garsan diza gish nagara ooththinoo? Mule ooththanas bessenna.
45006016	Inte intena aylle mala shiishshiza wode inte azazettizades aylle gididayssa ereeta. Hessathoka gede hayqokko efiza nagaras woykko xillotethako gaththiza azazetethas inte aylle gididayssa ereketii?
45006017	Inte kase nagaras aylleta gidikko intes imettida timirtezas inte woznappe azazetida gish Xoossi galatetto.
45006018	Inte nagarappe wozetidi xillotethas aylle gidideta.
45006019	Hayssa ta asa qaalan intes qonccen yootizay inte yeletethan daburancha gidida gishassa. Inte kase wode inte asatetha aylletethasinne kaseppe aadhdhi iitana mala ooththi immeta shin ha7i qasse gede geeshshatethakko efiza xillotethas aylle histi haariste.
45006020	Inte kase nagaras aylletidi diza wode inte xillotethafe mela attideta shin;
45006021	ha7i qasse inte yellatiza miishatappe he wode ay go7a demmidetii? Hessa he hanoza go7ay hayqo.
45006022	Ha7i qasse inte nagarappe wozetidi Xoossa aylleta gidideta. Hessika intena gede geeshshatethakko kaalethees. Wursethaykka merna de7o.
45006023	Nagara waagay hayqo; gido attin Xoossa imotay gidikko Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara merna de7o.
45007001	Ta ishato! Tani woga eriza asatas yootays. Wogay shempora paxa diza asa xalala haarizayssa inte ereketii?
45007002	Issi macassi azina gelikko ba azinara iza wogan qashetizay azinay paxa diza wode gakkanaassa. Azinay hayqqikko iza macho gidiza wogappe anjettawus.
45007003	Gido attin azinay paxa dishin iza hara azina gelikko layma geetettawus. Azinay hayqqikko qasse hara asi gelikko kase azina wogappe anjettadus attin “Layma” geetetuku.
45007004	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inteka Yesus Kirstoosa asatetha baggara wogas hayqqideta. Inte hayqoppe dendida Kirstoosa bagga gidin nuni Xoossas ayfe ayfanassa.
45007005	Nagarancha medhetetha shenen nu diza wode hayqos gathiza ayfe nu ayfana mala wogay dentheththida nagara amoy nu bolla ooththides.
45007006	Ha7i gidikko kase nuna waaxi qachida wogas hayqqida gish he wogappe wozetidos. Hessika kase ceega wogan xaafettidayssan gidonta dishe ooratha Ayana ogen nuni ooththanassa.
45007007	Histin nu ay giinoo? Ba hu7es wogay nagaraa? Mulekka gidenna. Woga baggara gidontakko nagaray azakkonne nu erokkokko shin; wogay “Amottofa!” goontakko amoy azakkonne tumappe ta erikke.
45007008	Nagaray qasse wogappe kezida azazoy bessida ogen go7ettidi ta giddon dumma dumma iita amo dentheththides. Wogay yaanappe kase nagaray hayqqidaza.
45007009	Wogay baynda kase tani paxa dayssishin wogay yiin qasse nagaray paxa gidides. Ta gidikko hayqqadis.
45007010	As ashshana qofetida azazoykka hayqo ekii yidayssa eradis.
45007011	Nagaray woga baggara beettida gaason go7ettidi tana baleththidesinne azazon wodhides.
45007012	Hessa gish wogay ba baggara geeshsha. Azazoykka geeshsha; xillonne lo7o.
45007013	Gido attin lo7os hanidayssi taas hayqos gididee? Mulekka gidenna. Gido attin nagaray ba nagaratethan erettana mala lo7o gidida hano baggara ta bolla hayqo ehides. Hessika nagaray azazo baggara kaseppe aaththi nagara darsides.
45007014	Wogay Ayana yo7o gididayssa nu eroos. Ta qasse nagaras aylle mala bayzettida asa.
45007015	Tani ta ooththizayssa erike. Ta ooththana koyizayssa ooththa erike shin ta ixiza miish ooththays.
45007016	Ta ooththana koyonta miish ooththiza gidikko wogay lo7o gididayssa ta markatays.
45007017	Hessa ooththizay tana gidonta ta gaaththan diza nagaray ooththes.
45007018	Tanan hessikka nagarancha gidida ta medhetetha giddon aykko lo7o miish bayndayssa ta erays. Lo7o ooththanas taas amoteth dees shin pola ooththa erikke.
45007019	Ta ooththizay ooththana gaada koyiza lo7o ooso gidenna. Gido attin ta ooththana koyonta iita ooso ooththays.
45007020	Tani ooththanas koyontayssa ooththiza gidikko hessa ooththizay tana gidonta ta giddon diza nagara.
45007021	Hessa gish hayssi wogay ooson dizayssi taas gelides. Hessika tani lo7o ooththana koyaysishin iita ooththays.
45007022	Tani ta gaaththara Xoossa wogan ufayetays.
45007023	Gido attin ta asatetha giddon ooththiza nagara wogay tana qachi oykidi ta qofa wogara olettiza hara wogay ta asatetha giddon ooththishin beyays.
45007024	Ta ay mala laafa asee! Hayssa hayqos imettida asatethafe tana ashshanay oonee?
45007025	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara galatay Xoossas gido. Histikko tani ta baggara ta qofan Xoossa wogas aylle gidashe tani ta medhetetha wogan nagara wogas aylle.
45008001	Hessa gish Yesus Kirstoosa ammanizayta bolla pirday deenna.
45008002	Gaasoyka de7o Ayana wogay Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nagarappe ista geeshida gishassa.
45008003	Nagarancha ashoppe dendidayssan wogay polanas dandayontayssa Xoossi ba naaza nagarancha asa leemison nagaras yarshettana mala yeddidi polides. Histidi nagara iza ashon pirdides.
45008004	Hessika nuni ashon gidonta Ayanan simeretiza nuuppe wogay koyiza xillotetha polanassa.
45008005	Asho shene mala daana koyiza asata woznay ashoy koyiza miishan shempees. Ayana shene mala dizayti qasse ba wozna Ayanay koyiza miisha bolla wothetes.
45008006	Ashos xalala qofay hayqo gidishin Ayana yo7os qofay gidikko de7onne sarotetha.
45008007	Nagaras haarettiza woznay Xoossara oosha. Gaasoyka izi Xoossa wogas haarettennanne haarettanas dandayenna.
45008008	Asho shene mala diza asatikka Xoosse ufayssas dandayettenna.
45008009	Inte qasse Xoossa Ayanay intenan diza gidikko ashon gidonta Ayanan deeta. Kirstoosa Ayanay iza bolla bayndadey Kirstoosas gidenna.
45008010	Kirstoosi inte giddon diikko qasse inte asatethay nagara geedon hayqeth gidikkoka inte Ayanay qasse xillotetha gaason de7on dees.
45008011	Yesusa hayqoppe denthida iza Ayanay inte bolla diza gidikko Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthidayssi inte giddon diza iza ayanay hayqqanas diza inte asatethas de7o immana.
45008012	Hessa gish ta ishato! Hessika hananay dosan gidenna shin nu asho shene mala daanas ashos gidokko.
45008013	Asho shene mala diza gidikko inte hayqqana; asho ooso iitaza inte Ayanan wodhikko inte de7on daana.
45008014	Xoossa Ayanan kaallizayti isti Xoossa nayta.
45008015	Inte ekkida Ayanay zaaridi intena aylletethan haariza ayana gidonta “Nu Aawawu” gi xeygisiza natetha Ayana ekideta.
45008016	Nuni Xoossa nayta gididayssa; he Ayanay ba baggara nu ayanara issife nuus markatees.
45008017	Nuni Xoossa nayta gidikko iza laattizayta. Nu Kirstoosa bonchoza laattizayta gidana mala addafekka izara iza metoza gishettizayta gidikko nu Xoosse laattizayta; Kirstoosarakka issife laattizayta.
45008018	Ha7i nu ekiza waayey buro nuus sinthan giigi uttida bonchozara gaththi xeellishin aykkokka gidenna gays.
45008019	Medhetethay wurikka Xoossa nayti qoncanayssa laamotethan naagon dees.
45008020	Medhetethi wurikka mela hada gidana mala pirdetides. Hessika ba dooron gidonta sinthafes haarettana mala izi ba shene mala haarisida gishassa.
45008021	Hessika medheteth wurikka dhayssa aylletethafe wozetidi Xoossa naytas gidida gede bonchettida shene mala dizaso gakkanaassa.
45008022	Ha7i gakkanaas medhetethi wurikka daro waayen miixatishe dizayssa nu eroos.
45008023	Iza xalala gidonta koyro Xillo Ayana imota demmida nunikka nu asatethay attana; nu iza naa gidanayssakka laamotishenne woznara miixattishe doos.
45008024	Hayssa ha hidotan xalala attidos. Hidotay qasse ayfen beettiza miish gidikko buroppe naagiza miish gidenna; ha7i ba ayfen beyiza miishi buroppes naagiizay oonee?
45008025	Gido attin nuni buro nu ayfen beyonta miish hidotan naagizaz gidikko saletay baynda naagoos.
45008026	Hessathoka qasse nu daaburishin Ayanay nuna maaddes. Nuni woossa wosti woossanakkone eronta gish Ayanay nuni qaalan qoncisanas dandayettonta qaalara nuus woosses.
45008027	Nu wozna paaci eriza Ayanay izi Ayana qofa eres. Gaasoyka Ayanay Xoossa shene mala ammaniza asas nuus woosses.
45008028	Xoossi bana dosizaytassinne iza shene mala xeeygetidaytas ubbas ooththiza miish wursikka lo7os ooththizayssa nu eroos.
45008029	Xoossi kaseppe ba erizayta isti iza naaza misatana mala kasekka doori woththides. Hessika daro ba ishata giddofe izi bayra gidanassa.
45008030	Kase koyroppe ba dooridayta ista xeygides. Qasseka xeygidayta xillisides. Ba xillisidaytakka bonchides.
45008031	Histin hessa nu ay giinoo? Xoossi nunara gidikko nunara eqetanas dandayizay oonee?
45008032	Ba naazas mishetonta nu gish aaththi immiday iza. Histin ubba miish nuus izara kiyatethan wursi aazas imenee?
45008033	Xoossi dooridayta mootizay oonee? Xillisizay Xoossa.
45008034	Histin pirdizay oonee? Hayqqidi hayqoppe dendidi Xoossa ushachchan uttida Yesus Kirstoosi nu gish gaannates.
45008035	Nuna Kirstoosa siiqoppe shaakanay oonee? Metoyee? Waayee? Woykko goodeteththee? Woykko gafaa? Woykko kallotethee? Woykko qopponta gakkiza metoyee? Mashshaa?
45008036	Hessika kase “Ne gish nu shukettiza dorsa mala qoodetidos. Gallas kumeth ne gish nuni hayqora baaxettana” geetetti xaafettidayssa mala.
45008037	Nuna aazika izappe shaakenna. Hayssa ubban nuna siiqidayssan xoonizaytappekka nu aadhdhos.
45008038	Hessa gish hayqo gidin, de7o gidin, kiitanchata gidin, woykko ha7i diza miish gidin, buro yaana miish gidin, woykko ay wolqama gidin,
45008039	dhoqa gidin woykko ziqa gidin, woykko ay medheteth gidin Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus diza Xoossa siiqoppe nuna shaakana dandayiza miishi bayndayssa ta shaaka eradis.
45009001	Ta Yesusa sunthan tumu gays; wordotikke; ta woznaykka Xillo Ayana baggara taas markatees.
45009002	Taas woznappe kichchonta gita qofaynne miishay dees.
45009003	Ta dabbota gish ta qangetadanne Kirstoosappe shaaketada wora wodhdhidakko dosays.
45009004	Istika Isra7eele nayta; isti Xoossa naa gidana mala Xoossa bonchoynne caaqo qaalay, wogaynne Xoossa Keeththa woga hidotay istas imettides.
45009005	Kase Aawatikka ista bagga Kirstoosi ista zeretha zarken qoodetes. Izikka ubbafe bolla gidida mernas galattettida Xoossa. Amiin.
45009006	Gido attin hessa guussi Xoossa qaalay attides gussi gidenna. Isra7eeleppe yeletiday wuri Isra7eele as gidenna.
45009007	Abrahaameppe yeletidayti izappe yeletida gish wurikka iza nayta gidettennashin “Ne zereth Yisaaqa baggara xeeygettana” geetettida mala hanides.
45009008	Hessa guussikka Xoossa naa geetettidayti isti ashon yelidayta gidettenna; gido attin naa gidanayti hidota qaalan yooteti uttidayta.
45009009	“Yiza layth hanni wode ta ha simmana; Saaraykka nees attuma naa yelana” geetetidi izas hidota qaalay imettides.
45009010	Hessa xalalaka gidenna. Irbiqa nayti issade naakko! Izikka nu aawa Yisaaqa.
45009011	Menteti yeletidi buro iita woykko lo7o ooththonta dishin Xoossa qofay minnana mala,
45009012	ooson gidonta xeygidayssafe gidida gish “Bayray kaalozas haarettana” geetettidi Irbiqas yootetides.
45009013	Hessika “Ta Yaqoobe dosadis; Eesawe ixadis” geetetti kase xaafettida mala hanides.
45009014	Histin nu ha7i ay giinoo? Xoossi bessonta ogera maaddi erizee? Mulekka maaddi erenna.
45009015	Xoossi Muses “Ta maarana koyidade maarana; ta mishettana koyizadeska mishettana” gees.
45009016	Hessa gish asi koyda mala gidonta woykko asa daburan gidonta Xoossi maarida mala hanees.
45009017	Geeshsha Maxaafay Faaroone “Ta wolqay ne bolla bettana malanne ta sunthi biitta ubba bolla yootettana mala ta nena hayssas denthadis” gees.
45009018	Hessa gish Xoossi maarana koyizade maarees. Iza wozna muumisana koyizade wozna muumises.
45009019	Intefe issadey “Histin hanoy hessa mala gidikko nuna hanno gakkanaas aazas waayssizee? Gaasoyka iza shene diggana dandayizay oonee?” gaada ne oychonta aggaka.
45009020	Gido attin Xoossas zaaro zaara immizay ne oonee? “Oosetida miish zaaridi ooththidayssa ne tana aazas hayssatho ooththadii?” gi erizee?
45009021	Urqa medhizadey he urqafe bagga bonchos bagga qasse coo hiraaysso oosos medhanas iza shene gidenee?
45009022	Xoossika ba hanqo besanasinne ba wolqa erisanas koydi iza hanqo qoncisizayta, dhayanas giigettidayta dhayssonta aggagikkochi!
45009023	Koyro bonchos giigissida iza maaroteth bessizaytaas iza boncho duretethay erettana mala izi ooththanassa.
45009024	Xeeygidadey Ayhudata baggafe xalala gidonta Ayzaabeta baggafe gidida nunakka ashshonta xeygides.
45009025	Hose7e maxaafan “Ta dere gidontayta tani ‘Ta dereta’ ga xeeygana; dosettontayta ista ta ‘Dosettidayta’ gaada xeeygana.
45009026	Qasseka ‘Inte ta dere deekketa’ geetetti yootetidason heenka ‘Isti de7o Xoossa nayta’ geetetti xeeygettana.”
45009027	Isayaassikka Isra7eele nayta gish “Isra7eele nayta qooday abba ace mala darikkoka guuthati xalala attana.
45009028	Goday ba pirda biitta bolla elle pirdana” gi yootides.
45009029	Hessika“Wogga Goday nuus zereth ashshontakko nukka soddome katama malanne Gamoora katama mala dhayanashin” geetettidi kase Isayaasa duunan yootidayssa mala hanides.
45009030	Histin nu ay giinoo? Ammanon beettida xilloteth demmanas Ayzaabey daaburonta demmides.
45009031	Gido attin xillotetha woga kaalliza Isra7eele nayti demmibettenna.
45009032	Hessi aazas hessatho hanidee? Isti ammanon gidonta ooson demmana kaallida gishassa. Istika dhuphe shuchchan dhuphetida.
45009033	Hessika “Hekko asa dhuphiza shuch ista kundisiza zaalla Xiyoone bolla ta wothana; izan ammanizadey yeellatenna” geetettidi kase Geeeshsha Maxaafan xaafettidayssa mala hanides.
45010001	Ta ishato! Isra7eele nayta gish ta amoynne ta Xoosse woossizay isti dhayonta attanassa.
45010002	Isti Xoossa yo7os mishetizayta gididayssa ta ista gish markattana dandayays; ista mishetethi gidikko eratethan gidenna.
45010003	Xoossi as xillisiza oge eronta aggidi ba xillotethas oge kaallida attin Xoossa xillotetha oge kaallibettenna.
45010004	Ammaniza asa ubba xillisanas Kirstoosi woga ubba polides.
45010005	Musey woga baggara beettiza xillotetha gish erisishe “Hayta wogata poli ooththizadey ha wogatan daana” gizayssa.
45010006	Ammanon beettiza xillotethi qasse hizgees “Ne woznara pude salo oonee kezanay? gooppa” hessatho guussi Kirstoosa saloppe duge ha wothana guussa.
45010007	Woykko “ ‘Duge ciimman oonee wodhdhanay?’ Gooppa!” hessikka Kirstoosa hayqoppe buro denthana guussa.
45010008	Gido attin qaalay ay gizee? “Qaalay ne achchan dees.” Ne duunaninne ne woznan dees. Nuni ammano gish sabakiza qaalay hayssa.
45010009	Neni ne duunara “Yesusi Goda” gaada markattikko Xoossi iza hayqoppe denthidayssa ne woznan ne ammanikko attana.
45010010	Neni xillanay woznan ammanikkonne attanay ne duunara markatiinna.
45010011	Geeshsha Maxaafay giza mala “Izan ammanizay wurikka yeellatenna.”
45010012	Ayhudata giddoninne Ayzaabeta giddon dummateththi deenna; issi Goday ubbaska Goda; iza woossizayta gujji anjees.
45010013	“Goda sunth xeygizayti wurikka attana” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides.
45010014	Histin iza ammanontayti iza wozgi xeeyganee? Qasse iza gish siyonta dishe wosti ammananee? Saabakey baynda dishin wosti siyanee?
45010015	Kiitetonta wosti sabakandetoo? Hessika “Mishiraachcho qaala ekkii yizayta yuussi ay mala lo7o” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala hanides.
45010016	Gido attin siyidayti wurikka Mishiraachcho qaala ekibettenna; Isayaassi “Godo nu yootidayssa ooni ammanidee?” gida mala hanides.
45010017	Hessa gish ammanoy beettizay yootiza qaala siyethanna. Yootetiza qaalaykka Kirstoosa gish yootiza qaalappe.
45010018	Gido attin asay siybeneshaa? gaada ta oychays; tumappe asay siydes; Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala “Ista qaalay biitta ubbaninne alame gaxa gakkanaas siyetides.”
45010019	Ta qasseka oychays; Isra7eele nayti qaala eribeteneshaa? Koyro Musey istas “Ta dere gidontaytan ta ista amosisana; yuushi qopponta deretan ta ista yiillochana” gides.
45010020	Isayaassikka xalatethan “Tana koyontaytas ta bettadis; tana oychontaytas tana qoncisadis” gides.
45010021	Isra7eele gish qasse “Taas azazetonta derekkonne taas eeno goonta derekko kumeththa gallas ta kushe micadis” gees.
45011001	Histin Xoossi ba dereta yeggi aggidee? Gaada ta oychays; mulekka aggibenna; takka ta baggara Biniyaame zarike, Abrahaame zereth gidida Isra7eele asa.
45011002	Xoossi koyroppe ba erida dereza yeggibenna. Elaassi Isra7eele nayta bolla mooto Xoossakko wosti shiishshidakkonne Geeshsha Maxaafay iza gish ay gizakko inte ereketii?
45011003	“Godo! Isti ne nabeta wodhida. Nees yarshizasotakka laallida. Qasse tani tarka attadis. Tanaka wodhana geetes” gides.
45011004	Xoossi izas “Ba7aale geetettiza Eeqas goynontayta laapun shi as tani taas ashshadis” gi zaarides
45011005	Hessa malaka ha7i ha wodezanka Xoossa kiyatethan Isra7eele asappe dooretti attida guuthati deettes.
45011006	Histin hessi Xoossa kiyatethan gidikko asa ooson gidenna. Asa ooson gididakko Xoossa kiyatethi kiyateth gidenna.
45011007	Histin ay gaanee? Isra7eele nayti lo7ethi koyidayssa demmibettenna. Xoossan doorettidayti gidikko demmida. Hanko attidayta woznay muumides.
45011008	Kase “Ista ayfey xeellonta mala, ista haythayka siyonta mala Xoossi hanno gakkanaas istas doccissiza Ayana immides” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala.
45011009	Dawuteykka “Ista maadday ista oykiza narxanne yarde; istas dhuphizazinne qixaate gido.
45011010	Ista ayfey xeellofo; goozzetto; ista zokkoy mernas kuunno” gides.
45011011	Ane qasse ta zaara oychays; Isra7eele asay nam7antho kundethafe dendennee? Dendana. Harappeka Isra7eele nayta qanatissana gish ista mooro gaason atotethi Ayzaabetas gakkides.
45011012	Gido attin qasse ista mooroy Ayzaabetas anjo gidides. Ista kundethikka qasse Ayzaabetas anjo gidikko isti simmi attidakko ay mala gita anjo gidandeshin!
45011013	Ayzaabeto! Ta intes yootays, ta Ayzaabetas kiitettidade gidida gish ta oosoza minnada polana.
45011014	Hessika ta bagga asati amozana mala denthethada istafe guutha asata ashshanas ufayssa ooththays.
45011015	Xoossi ista aggida Ayzaabeti Xoossara giigikko Xoossi Isra7eele nayta zaaridi ekkiza wode intes aazi hanana misatizee? Hessa guussi “Hayqoppe dendides” guussa mala.
45011016	Koyro bukeesoy lo7o gidikko hanko izappe oosettizays wurikka lo7o gides. Hessathoka issi mitha xaphoy lo7o gidikko hanko iza bolla diza haggatikka lo7o gidettes.
45011017	Keeththa matan diza wogara mitha haggata malati inte meqqi wodhdhin hanko woran diza wogara mithata misatiza Ayzaabeti inte kichchosan gididi inte haaronne inte anjo shaakki ekkizadenta gidikko;
45011018	heyta he meqqi wodhdhida haggata bolla otoretofa. Inte ista bolla otoretikko qasse hanno woznan woththite. He mitha tookkiday nena gidakka. Mithay nena tookkides attin.
45011019	Histikko “He haggati meqqi wodhdhiday nuni isti kichchosan gelana malassa” goonta aggeketa.
45011020	Tumu gideta shin isti meqiday ammano paceppe dendidayssanna. Inte qas ammanon eqideta. Babbite attin otoretofte.
45011021	Xoossi koyroppe diza haggatas mishetontade gidikko inteska mishetenna.
45011022	Hessa gish Xoossa kiyatethinne iza menxe iitatetha ane xeella. Iza menxe iitatethay kundidayta bolla. Iza kiyatethay qasse inte iza qadhetetha garsan diza wode gakkanaas xalala. Hessi baynda aggikko inteka qanxettana.
45011023	Isti ammanonta minni eqidasoppe simmikko kase baso simmi gelana. Xoossika ista zarsi gelthana dandayes.
45011024	Inte bazzo wogara mithafe qanxetidayti kase inte medhetethafe gidonta lo7o mithan inte gelana dandayikko koyroppe ba medhetetha haggata gididayti heyti kase iza bolla diza wogara mithan simmi geloy istas waani hannenee?
45011025	Ta ishato! Inte cinca as gididayssa intes misatonta mala hayssa gido xuura yo7oza inte eronta attana mala ta koyikke. Hessika Ayzaabetappe xeeygetidayti wuri ammanana gakkanaas Isra7eele nayta woznay muumides.
45011026	Hessa gish Isra7eele nayti wurikka attana. “Ashshizaddey Xiyooneppe yaana; Yaqoobeppeka iitateth diggana.
45011027	Tani ista nagara wursa dhayssidappe guye ta istara caaqon geliza qaalay hessa” geetettidi kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala hanides.
45011028	Intes Ayzaabetas Mishiraachcho qaalay gakkana mala Isra7eele nayti Xoossan ixettida as gidida. Gidikkoka kase dooro mala gidikko ba aawata baggara isti dosettidayta.
45011029	Xoossi dooridappenne ba kiyateth immidappe guye ba ooththida miishan simmidi modhetenna.
45011030	Inteka kase azazettontaytakko! Isti azazettonta ixin ha7i intena maaridayssatho;
45011031	Xoossi intena maarida geedon istika maarettana mala ha7i azazettontayta gidida.
45011032	Xoossi wursikka maaranas asi wurikka azazettonta mala gordides.
45011033	Xoossa duretethay, aadho eratethaynne iza eratethay ay mala ciimma! Iza pirday ay malakkonne paacetenna. Izi aadhdhida geedoyka eretenna.
45011034	“Goda wozna eriday oonee? Izas zore immiday oonee?
45011035	Xoossi zaari immana mala izas tal7e immiday oonee?” geetetti xaafettida mala.
45011036	Wurikka izappe, izan, izassa; izas bonchoy mernappe mernas gido! Amiin.
45012001	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte asatetha geeshshinne Xoosse ufayssiza de7o yarsho ooththidi inte shiishana mala ta intena Xoossa qadhetan woossays. Hessika woznama asa mala inte Xoossas ooththiza ooso.
45012002	Lo7o, ufaysizazinne kumeth gidida Xoossa sheney aazakkonne inte paaci erana mala inte qofan oraxidi laametite attin hayssa alame asa misatoppite.
45012003	Intes Xoossi immida ammano mala interka intena paaci xeellite attin ha7i dizayssafe bollara intena dhoqisi xeellonta mala tani taas imettida Xoossa kiyatethan intena issa issa zorays.
45012004	Nuuppe issi issi asas issi asatetha bolla daro billiteti diza mala heytikka he billiteti issi mala ooso ooththontayssatho;
45012005	hessathoka nuni darota gidi uttidi Kirstoosan issi asho; nuni issoy issas asho.
45012006	Nuus imettida imota mala dumma dumma imotethi dees. Issades buroppe hananaz yooto gidikko izaades imettida ammano mala yooto.
45012007	Ooththi maaddizadey ooththi maaddo; tamarsizadeykka tamarso.
45012008	Zorizadey gidikko zoro; bayndaytas immizadey gujji immo. Ayssizaddey minni aysso. Maarizadeykka ufayssan maaro.
45012009	Inte siiqotethi qoodheppe qommon gidoppo. Iita gididayssa wursikka ixite. Lo7o gididayssara issife oyketite.
45012010	Inte inte garsan issoy issara ishata mala lo7ethi siiqetite. Issoy issa bappe aaththi bonchizayta gidite.
45012011	Godas ooththana Ayanan xuugetizayta gidite attin hessa he minotethafe guye gooppite.
45012012	Hidotan ufayetizayta gidite; meto dandayite; woossan minnite.
45012013	Ammanishe waayetizaytas intes dizayssafe shaakki immite. Imath mokkite.
45012014	Intena qangizayta anjite attin qangofte.
45012015	Ufayetizaytara ufayetite; muuzotizaytara muuzotite.
45012016	Inte inte garsan doseteththan diite. Manqotara issifetethan daanas koyite attin otoretofitenne ceeqqettofte.
45012017	Oonaska iita gish iita zaaroppite. Asa ubba achchan lo7o miish ooththanas minnite.
45012018	Intes dandayettikko inte inte baggara asa ubbara saron diite.
45012019	Ta siiqoto! Inte halo Xoossi kesso attin interka halo kessofte “Halo kessanay tana gees Goday” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
45012020	Halo kessanappe “Neni ne morkey gafikko miza; izi saamotikko ushsha; ne hessatho ooththikko tama bonqo iza bolla koraasa” geetettidi Geeeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides.
45012021	Iita lo7o ooson xoona attin iitan xoonetofa.
45013001	Ay assikka bana ayssiza daannatas haarettanas bessees. Xoossafe imettonta dishin daannatethi deenna. Ha7i diza daannati Xoossafe daannattidayta.
45013002	Hessa gish daanna bolla makaliday Xoossa woga bolla makalees. He makalizaytikka ba bolla pirda eheetes.
45013003	Dere ayssizayti iita ooththizayta babisettes attin lo7o ooththizayta babisettenna. Ne dere aysizades babbonta aggana koyay? Histikko lo7o ooththa; izikka nena galatana.
45013004	Izi nees lo7o ooththanas Xoossa oosancha. Gido attin ne iita ooththida gidikko izas babba. Gaasoyka izi mashsha coo mela gixxibenna; izi iita ooththizade qaxayanas Xoossa oosancha.
45013005	Hessa gish iza qixaates babo xalala gidonta ne qofanka daannattizades azazettanas bessees.
45013006	Inte giira immizay hessassa. Ayssizayta hessa he oosoza bolla Xoossi ista woththides.
45013007	Istafe issas issas bessizayssa immite. Giira immana bessizaytas giira immite; qaraxa qanxanas bessizaytas qaraxa qanxite; babbanas bessizaytas babbite; bonchanas bessizayta bonchite.
45013008	Inte garsan issoy issara siiqetethafe attin oona bollaka accoy dooppo. As siiqiza asi izi woga polides.
45013009	“Laymatoppa, wodhoppa, amottofa” gizaytinne hara azazoti diikkokka “As ubbakka ne mala siiqa” giza hanno issi wogan wurikka kuuyettides.
45013010	Siiqoy asa bolla iita ooththenna; hessa gish siiqoy woga ubbas kuushsha.
45013011	Hayssa wodeza caddi xeelidi hessa ooththite. Ha7i hanna inte dhiskofe dendiza wode. Nu kase ammanosappe haa simmin ha7i nuus attiza wodey matides.
45013012	Qamay aadhdhin wontana gees. Hessa gish ane nu dhuma ooso wora yeggidi poo7o ola miishi may7os.
45013013	Gallassara hammuttiza mala ane wogara hammuttos. Magulthaninne mathon gidoppo; layma amoninne layman gidoppo; qanatetethaninne palaman gidoppo.
45013014	Hessa aggidi Yesus Kirstoosa may7ite. Asho amo polanas qoppofte.
45014001	Inte garsan ammanon buro minnontade shiishshi ekkite attin iza qofa bolla pirdofte.
45014002	Issi issi asi beettidayssa wursi maanas ammanoy dees. Qasse ammanon minnontadey atakilte xalala mees.
45014003	Bettidayssa wursi mizadey wursi moontade kadhoppa. Moontadey qasse mizade bolla pirdofo. Xoossi ubbakka ekides.
45014004	Hanko ooththizade bolla pirdizadey ne oonee? Izaadey kundikko woykko eqikkoka Godassa. Goday iza essanas dandayiza gish izi eqandes.
45014005	Issadey “Gallassatappe issi gallas hara gallassafe aaththidi baasi dumma gallas” gi qoppees. Hara asi qasse “Gallassati wurikka issi gina” gi qoppees. Issi issi asi ba woznan ammanida mala ooththo.
45014006	Issi gallassi hara gallassafe dummassi qoppizadey izi hessa ooththizay Goda bonchos gidikko mizadeyka Goda bonchos giidi mees. Miidi Xoosse galattees. Montadeyka Goda bonchos giidi muus aggessinne Xoossas galata imees.
45014007	Nuuppe oonikka baasi dizaddeynne bappe baasi hayqqizaddey deenna.
45014008	Nu diikkoka Godas doos. Hayqqikkoka Godas hayqos. Hessa gish diikkoka woykko hayqqikko nu Godassa.
45014009	Hessa gish hayqqidaytassinne paxa dizaytas Goda gidanas Kirstoosi hayqqidi hayqoppe paxi dendides.
45014010	Histin ne aazas ne isha bolla pirday? Aazas ne isha leqqay? Nu wurikka Xoossa pirda wombora sinth shiiqos doos.
45014011	“Ta paxa days. Gulbatey wurikka taas gulbatana. Inxarsi wuri Xoossas markattana” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
45014012	Hessa gish nuni issi issi asi Xoossa sinth shiiqidi nu ooso gish izas zaaro immana.
45014013	Hessa gish nuni nu garsan issoy issa bolla pirdanappe ane naagetos. Hessa aggidi nu ishas dhuphe gidizayssa woykko iza oykiza narxa wothonta mala ane nu naagetos.
45014014	Tani Goda Yesusan ammanada miza kaththan tunay bayndayssa eradis. Gido attin issadey issi miish tuna gi qoppikko he miishay izaadesi tuna.
45014015	Neni ne isha miza kaththa geedon dhuphe gidikko siiqon simeretabakka. Kirstoosi iza gish hayqqida ne isha ne miza kaththa gaason wodhoppa.
45014016	Inte lo7o giidi qoppiza miish iita getettana mala ooththofte.
45014017	Xoossa kawotethi Xillo Ayanan beettida xilloteth, sarotethinne ufayssafe attin muussa yo7onne ushsha yo7o gidenna.
45014018	Hayssatho Kirstoosas ooththizadey Xoosse ufayssessinne asa achchanka galattettes.
45014019	Hessa gish sarotethi beettiza ogenne nuni nu garsan lo7onas bessiza oge ane koyoos.
45014020	Nuni miza kaththa gish giidi Xoossa ooso ane laallokko. Kaththi wurikka geeshsha. Gido attin hara asas dhuphe gidiza kath muussi bala ooso.
45014021	Ne ishas dhuphe gidizazi gidikko ashokka maanappenne woyne cajje uyanappe woykko ay miishikka ne ooththonta aggikko lo7o.
45014022	Hessa gish, haytanta misatiza miishatas nees diza ammanoy ne giddoninne Xoossa giddon de7o. “Hayssi likkeko” giidi ammanon ekkida miishan barka ba bolla pirdontadey izaadey anjettidade.
45014023	Gido attin woznara sidhishe miikko izi ammanon moonta gish iza bolla pirdetides. Ammanon ooththontazi wurikka nagara.
45015001	Nuni ammanon minnidayti hanko ammanon minnotayta meto tookkanas bessees attin nu xalla ufayetizayta gidanas bessenna.
45015002	Nuni wurikka hara asi ba ammanon minnana mala iza go7izazinne ufaysiza miish ane ooththoos.
45015003	Kirstoosi bana ufaysibenna; harappeka “Asay nena cayida cashshay tana gakkides” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xafetidaysi poletides.
45015004	Nuni Geeshsha Maxaafatappe demmiza dandayaynne minotethi nuus daana mala koyroppe xaafettidayssi wurikka nu izappe nuus timirte demmana mala xaafettides.
45015005	Minotethinne dandaya immiza Xoossi inte Yesus Kirstoosa kaallishin intes inte giddon Ayana issifeteth immo.
45015006	Hessika inte issi woznaninne issi duuna gididi nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossa bonchanassa.
45015007	Hessa gish Xoossi intena Xoossa bonchon mokki ekkida mala inteka issoy issa ufayssan mokki ekkite.
45015008	Kase aawatas imettida hidota qaala polanas Xoossa tumatethi erettana mala Kirstoosi Ayhudatas ooththizade gididayssa ta intes yootays.
45015009	Hessathoka Ayzaabeti iza maarotetha gish Xoosse galatana mala; hessikka “Ta nena dere giddon galatana; ne sunthaska galata yeth yexana” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala.
45015010	Qasseka “Ayzaabeto! Inteka Xoossa deretara ufayetite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides.
45015011	Nam7anthokka “Ayzaabeti inte wurikka Goda galattite; derey wuri iza sabbite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
45015012	Hessatho Isayaasan “Ba dere asa bolla kawotiza Iseeye nay yaana. Alame asa ayssizaddey dendana; istika izan ufayettana” gees.
45015013	Inte izan ammaniza gish hidota Xoossi intenan ufaysinne saroteth kuntho. Hessika Xillo Ayana wolqa hidota intes daranassa.
45015014	Ta ishato! Inte lo7etethan; erateth ubban kumidaytanne harata zoranas eray dizayta gididayssa ta addafe shaaka eradis.
45015015	Ta Xoossafe ekkida imotetha gina qasseka intena qofisanas issi issi yo7ota xalatethan intes xaafadis.
45015016	Hessa he kiyatethay imettiday tani Xoossa Mishiraachcho qaala hanko deretas yootana mala; qasseka Qeese mala gidida Yesus Kirstoosas ooththanassa; hessa gish hanko dere asay Xillo Ayanan dummatidi Xoosse ufaysiza yarsho gididi shiiqana mala ooththays.
45015017	Hessa tani Xoossas ooththiza gish Yesus Kirstoosan ceeqqettays.
45015018	Ta yootidayssaninne ta ooththidayssan hanko dere asay Xoossas azazettana mala Kirstoosi tanan gididi ooththidazappe attin hara haasayana xalikke.
45015019	Hessika haniday Xillo Ayana wolqan malatata baggara hanides. Hessa malanka Yerusalameppe Ilwaqoore gakkanaas ta Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaala sabakadis.
45015020	Hara asi kase ooththidason ta gelonta mala gaada kase Kirstoosa sunthi xeeygeti erontason Mishiraachcho qaala sabakanayssi taas amo.
45015021	Harappeka “Iza gish istas yootetontayti iza beyana; siyi erontayti haasa7ana” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala hanides.
45015022	Hessa geedon ta inteko boonta mala daro wode diggettadis.
45015023	Ha7i qas taas haan oosoy baynda gish daro laythatappe haa simmin intena beyanas ta daro laamotadis.
45015024	Hayssa ta qofa tani Ispene biza wode polanas qoppays. Heera aadhdhashe intena beyanassinne intenara guutha wode gam7ada laamota aaththida mala inte tana maaddana gaada hidota ooththays.
45015025	Ha7i qas ammanizaytas imettiza maado gish ekkada Yerusalame bays.
45015026	Gaasoyka Maqidooniyaninne Akaayan diza manqota maaddana dendides.
45015027	Hayssa ha maadoza isti ba dosan immiday isti ooththanas bessiza gishassa; Ayzaabeti Ayhudatara issife Ayana anjo ekkizayta gidikko istika baasi diza biitta anjon Ayhudata maaddanas bessees.
45015028	Hessa gish hayssa shiiqida maado miisha Yerusalame immidappe guye inte achchan ta Ispene baana.
45015029	Ta he inteko bashe intes Kirstoosa anjo kuntha eka baanayssa ta erays.
45015030	Ta ishato! Tani Xoossa woossan baaxetiza mala inteka tanara baaxettana mala ta intena Goda Yesus Kirstoosaninne Xillo Ayana siiqon woossays.
45015031	Tani Yuhudan diza ammanonta asa kusheppe attana malanne Yerusalamen diza ta ooththoykka heen ammanizayta achchan ekettana mala taas woossite.
45015032	Hessika Xoossa shene mala he inteko ta ufayssara baana malanne intenara issife shempana mala.
45015033	Sarotetha Goday intenara ubbatara gido. Amiin.
45016001	Kinkira7oose Woosa Keeththan ooththiza ammanettida micheyo Pebeeno intes hadara gays.
45016002	Ammaniza asas bessiza mokko inte izo Goda sunthan mokki ekkana malanne iza intefe koyiza ay miishanka inte izo maaddana mala ta intena qofisays.
45016003	Kase tanara Goda Yesus Kirstoosas issife ooththida Phirsiqillassinne Aqilas ta sarokka gaththite.
45016004	Isti ta gish hayqqana gakkanaas bana aaththi immida; tana xalala gidonta Ayzaabetappe ammanidaytikka ista galatetes.
45016005	Ista keeththan diza ammaniza asaaka saro giite. Iisiyappe koyro Kirstoosan ammanida ta siiqoza Ephenexoose saro giite.
45016006	Intes daro daaburidaro Maaramo saro giite.
45016007	Tanara issife qashetida Andiraqonenne Yuniyase saro giite. Heytanti Hawaareta garsan lo7o sunthara dizaytanne Kirstoosa taappe kase ammanidayta.
45016008	Tani Goda baggara daro siiqiza Philyaxone saro giite.
45016009	Kirstoosa ooso tanara issife ooththiza Irobanoonenne ta siiqiza Senxakekka saro giite.
45016010	Kirstoosan iza ammanoy paacetidi galattettida Exessenesses ta sarokka gaththite. Arsixabaloso asaska ta sarokka gaththite.
45016011	Ta dabbo Herodiyaana saro giite. Godan diza Niriqaasoso asa saro giite.
45016012	Godan gididi minotethan ooththiza macasata Tirofimoononne Xirofimoono saro giite. Godas ooson daro daaburidaris Kirstoosan tani izo siiqiza Xarsidis ta sarokka gaththite.
45016013	Godan doorettida Ruufoones, taassinne izas aayo gididaris ta sarokka yootite.
45016014	Asqeroonessi, Afilasoonessi, Heromeenessi, Phaxirobaanessi, Hermaanessinne istara diza ishata ubbatas ta sarokka gaththite.
45016015	Filegoones, Yuuliyaas, Neeriyassinne iza micheys hessathoka Alxoones, istara diza ammanizaytaska ta sarokka gaththite.
45016016	Issoy issa yeeri yeer ekkidi saroketite. Kirstoosan ammaniza Woosa Keeththa asay wurikka intena saro gees.
45016017	Ta ishato! Asa garsan shaaketethi medhizaytappenne inte tamarida timirta ekkonta ixon intes dhuphe gidiza asatappe inte naagetite.
45016018	Heytanta mala asati Yesus Kirstoosas ooththizayta gidonta ba qantha kaththa gish ooththizayta. Shugo qaalara haasayaninne wozna kiya asata baleththetes.
45016019	Inte mishiraachcho qaalas azazettizayta gididayssa asi wuri siydes. Hessika tana daro ufaysides. Gidikkoka inte lo7o hanos cincata qasse iita oosos eeyata gidana mala ta koyays.
45016020	Sarotetha Goday Xala7e eeson inte toho gars aaththi dincereththana. Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethi intenara gido.
45016021	Tanara issife ooththiza Ximtoossi qasseka ta dabbo Luqiyoossi, Iyaasooneynne Susiphexiroossi intena saro saro geetes.
45016022	Hayssa kiita xaafiday tani Xerixiyoossi intena Goda sunthan saro gays.
45016023	Taninne hayssan diza kumeththa Woosa Keeththa asay mokki ekkiza Gayiyoossikka intena saro gees; katama miishsha oykkiza Erisxoossinne nu isha Qo7axiroossi intena saro geettes.
45016024	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyateth intenara ubbatara gido. Amiin.
45016025	Tani yootiza Mishiraachcho qaalay Yesus Kirstoosa gish yootetiza kiitaynne beni wodeppe doommidi qotan gam7idi ha7i qasse qoncida tuma xuura baggara izi intena ammanon essanas dandayees.
45016026	Ha7i qasse hayssi tumay qoncides. Merna Xoossa azazon wurikka ammanidi azazettana mala nabeta maxaafa baggara dereti wurikka iza erana mala hanides.
45016027	Izi xalala era gidida Godas Yesus Kirstoosa baggara merna bonchoy izas gido. Amiin.
46001001	Xoossa shenen Yesus Kirstoosas kiitetanas xeeygetida Phawuloosappenne nu isha Sostineeseppe;
46001002	Qorontoosen diza Xoossa Woosa Keeththas; Goda Yesus Kirstoosas dummatidaytasinne istassara nuussara Goda gidida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa suntha awan awanka xeygiza ammanizaytara gidanas xeeygetida asa ubbas.
46001003	Nu Aawa Xoossafenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne saroy intes gido.
46001004	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara intes imettida Xoossa kiyatetha gish ubba wode inte gishikka tani Xoossa galatays.
46001005	Gaasoy ay yo7onka; hessikka haasayan gidin eratetha inte ubban duretideta.
46001006	Kirstoosa gish nu intes markattidayssi inte achchan minnides.
46001007	Hessa gish inte Yesus Kirstoosi qoncana gallas naagishin Ayana imotethatappe aykkoykka intes paccenna.
46001008	Goda Yesus Kirstoosi nam7antho yaana gallassan inte inte bolla boroy baynda bettana mala wurseth gakkanaas izi intena lo7eth naagana.
46001009	Izi ba naaza nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa issifetethako intena xeygida Xoossi izi ammanettida Xoossa.
46001010	Ta ishato! Inte garsan shaaketethi doonta mala intes issi woznaynne issi qofay daana mala inte inte garsan issino gidana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan ta intena woossays.
46001011	Ta ishato! Inte garsan palamay dizayssa ta Qaalo7e so asappe siyadis.
46001012	Yo7ozikka hayssa mala; inte garsan issi issi asay “Ta Phawuloosa bagga” gees; baggay qasse “Ta Aphilosa bagga” gees; baggay qasse “Ta Keefa bagga” gishin haray qasse “Ta Kirstoosa bagga” gees.
46001013	Histikko Kirstoosi shaaketi wodhdhidee? Inte gish Phawuloosi kaqettidee? Woykko Phawuloosa sunthan xammaqetidetii?
46001014	Inte giddofe Qerisphoosappenne Gayiyoosappe attin hara oonakka ta xammaqonta gish Xoossa galatays.
46001015	Hessa gish oonikka “Ta Phawuloosa sunthan xammaqetadis” gaana asi deenna.
46001016	Tumukka Istifanoose so asa xammaqadis. Heytappe hara ta xammaqidakkone ta erizadey deenna.
