46001017	Kirstoosi tana kiittiday Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas attin xammaqanas gidenna. Kirstoosa masqaley hada gidonta mala ta asappe gidida cincateththan sabakikke.
46001018	Masqaleza kiitay dhayana dizaytas eeyateththa. Gido attin attana diza nuus gidikko Xoossa wolqa.
46001019	“Cincata cincatethi ta istafe dhayssana; eranchata eratetha ta hada ooththana” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
46001020	Cincay awan dizee? Tamarida eray awan dizee? Hayssa wodeza pilgi erizay awan dizee? Xoossi ha alameza erateth, eeyateth ooththibenee?
46001021	Xoossa eratethafe dendidayssan alamey ba eratetha gaason Xoossa eroy xoonin sabako eeyateththan ammanizayta ashshanas Xoossa shene gidides.
46001022	Ay wodekka Ayhudati dumma malata koyettes. Girike asati qasse erateth koyettes;
46001023	Nuni gidikko kaqettida Kirstoosa sabakoos. Hessika Ayhudatas dhuphe; Ayzaabetas qasse eeyateththa.
46001024	Xoossi xeygidaytas isti Ayhudata gidin woykko Girike dere asa gidikkoka Kirstoosi Xoossa wolqanne Xoossa eratetha.
46001025	Gaasoyka asa erappe Xoossa eeyateththi aadhdhida eratetha; asa minotethafe Xoossa laafatethi aadhdhees;
46001026	Ta ishato! Kase inte xeeygetiza wode inte ay mala asakkonne ane qoppite. Asa qofa mala gidikko intefe darizayti erata gidekketa. Intefe daroti wolqay bayndayta; darotikka gita keeththa asappe yeletibekketa.
46001027	Gido attin Xoossi erata yeelachanas deraappe eeyata doorides; Xoossi minota yeelachanas alamezappe daburanchata doorides.
46001028	Xoossi hanko ammanonta asa achchan deettes geetetti erettiza miishata baynda miisha mala ooththana hayssa alamezan leqettidaytanne kawuyidayta laafata doorides.
46001029	Hessakka izi ooththiday oonikka iza sinthan ceeqqettonta mala.
46001030	Intena qasse Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosara issifetethi daana mala ooththides. Hessa gish Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosa nu erateth, nu xilloteth, nu geeshshatethinne nuna ashshizade gidana mala ooththides.
46001031	Hessa gish kase “Ceeqqiza asi Godan ceeqo” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala.
46002001	Ta ishato! Ta inteko Xoossa xuura qoncisana biday taas duuna qaratethi woykko era daroy diza gish gidenna.
46002002	Ta inte giddon diza wode kaqettida Yesus Kirstoosappe attin hara eronta mala ta baggara murtadis.
46002003	Ta inteko daro daaburan, yashshatethaninne daro kokkorashe badis.
46002004	Ta qaalaynne sabakoykka Ayana wolqa qoncisethanppe attin cimoninne era daron gidenna.
46002005	Hessika inte ammanoy Xoossa wolqanppe attin asa cincateththa bolla xaphonta mala hanides.
46002006	Nu kaha kunthida asata achchan era haasaya hasayos; gido attin hayssa ha alameza erateth gidenna; woykko dhayana diza ha alameza haarizayta erateth gidenna.
46002007	Gido attin nu haasayizay kase qoteti diza Xoossa xuura eratetha; he eratethay Xoossi daro wodeppe kase nuna bonchos kasetidi wursi woththidayssa.
46002008	Ha alameza haarizaytappe oonikka ha eratetha eribenna; eridako isti boncho Goda kaqettenna.
46002009	Gido attin Geeshsha Maxaafan “Asa ayfey beyontaz, asa haythi siyontaz, asa woznaykka qoppontaz Xoossi ba dosizaytas giigissides” gees.
46002010	Xoossi gidikko hessa ba Ayana baggara nuus qoncisides. Ayanaykka Xoossas diza ciimma yo7o ashshonta wursi pilgi xeelles.
46002011	Asa garsan izaades diza ayanappe attin izaade wozna erizay oonee? Hessathoka Xoossa Ayanappe attin Xoossa qofa erizay oonikka deenna.
46002012	Xoossafe nuus imettidayssa nuni erana mala Xoossa Ayanay nuus imettides attin nuni hayssa ha alameza ayana ekibeekko.
46002013	Nu yootizay hayssa; nu asappe tamarida qaala gidonta Ayanappe tamarida qaala hasayos. Ayana tumatethakka nu qoncisizay Ayana qaalanna.
46002014	Xoossa Ayanay izan baynda asi Xoossa Ayanappe gididaz ekkanas dandayenna; Gaasoyka hessa mala yo7oy izas eeyateththa; izi baasi Ayanan paacetizade gidida gish izi eranas dandayenna.
46002015	Xoossa Ayanay izan dizadey qas wursikka paaces attin baasi oonanka paacettenna.
46002016	Hessika “Goda qofa eranas dandayizay oonee? Iza zoranas dandayizay oonee?” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala; nuus gidikko Kirstoosa woznay dees.
46003001	Ta ishato! Ta intena inte Kirstoosan buro guutha nayta malanne buro ammanoy gelonta asa malappe attin Ayanan kumida asa mala gaada intes haasayanas dandayabekke.
46003002	Inte buro minnonta gish ta intena maath paahadis attin buro mino kath mizabekke; ha7ikka gidikko inte burokko!
46003003	Inte ha7ikka buro ammanon minnontayta gidida gish inte giddon qanatetethinne palamay dees; histin inte buro ammanon minnonta asa mala gidekketii? Inte oosoy coo mela asi ooththizayssa mala gidenee?
46003004	Gaasoyka inte garsafe issoy “Ta Phawuloosassa” hankoys qas “Ta Aphiloosassa” giikko inte coo asho qofan xalala diza asa mala gidekketii?
46003005	Ero! Gido attin Aphiloossi aazee? Phawuloosikka aazee? Isti Goday istas issas issas immida mala ooththiza ooththanchata; inteka ista baggara ammanideta.
46003006	Ta tokkadis; Aphiloossi haaththe ushshides; dichchiday gidikko Xoossa.
46003007	Hessa gish dichchizay Xoosse attin tokkizadeykka, haaththe ushshizadeykka aykkokka gidettenna.
46003008	Tokkizade gidin woykko ushshizade gidin isti issino; istafe issadey issadey ba ooso mala woyto ekkana.
46003009	Gaasoyka nu Xoossara issife ooththizayta. Inteka Xoossa goshsha gadenne Xoossa Keeththata.
46003010	Xoossafe taas imettida imotetha gina Keeththe keexxiza hiilla mala keeththay eqqanas lo7etha giigissadis; iza bolla hara asi keeththa keexana. Gido attin keeththa keexxizadey wosti keexanakone naagetanas bessees.
46003011	Gaasoyka keeththay keexeteth oyketidappe guye hara woththi qasse keexana dandayizadey oonikka baawa; hessikka keeththas koyroy Yesus Kirstoosa.
46003012	Oonikka keeththay koyro keexettidayssa bolla worqan woykko biran bonchettida shuchchan woykko mithaninne maatan woykko maqan keexxikko,
46003013	izaade oosoy ay mala pirda gallas qoncana. Gaasoyka he gallassay iza ha poo7oy dizaso kessana. He oosoy taman paacettana gish issade issade oosoy ay mala buro taman paacettana.
46003014	Oonikka keexxida keeththi minni eqqiza gidikko hessadey ba woyto ekkana.
46003015	Iza oosoy xuugetidadey gidikko woytoy izas deenna shin izaadey ba hu7es attana. Gido attin izaade atethi tamappe asi waaydi attiza atetha mala gidana.
46003016	Inte inte hu7es Xoossa Keeththe gididayssanne Xoossa Ayanay inte giddon dizayssa ereketii?
46003017	Oonikka Xoossa Keeththe laallikko Xoossi izaade laallana. Xoossa Keeththi geeshsha. Hessika intenakko!
46003018	Oonikka barka bana baleththofo; intefe oonikka hayssa ha alamezan bana erancha mala qoppikko izaadey erancha gidana mala bana barka eeya mala qoodo.
46003019	Hayssa ha dereza eratethi Xoossa achchan eeyateththa. Kase Geeshsha Maxaafan “Izi eranchata ista gene ooso geedon zaaridi oykkana” geetetti xaafettides.
46003020	Qasseka harason “Eranchata qofay mela hada gididayssa Goday erees” geetetti xaafettides.
46003021	Hessa gish wurikka intes gidida gish oonikka asan ceeqqettofo.
46003022	Phawuloosa gidin, Aphlossa gidin, woykko Keefa gidin, alame gidin, de7o gidin, woykko hayqo gidin, ha7i dizaz gidin, woykko buro yaana miish gidin, wurikka intessa.
46003023	Inteka Kirstoosayta; Kirstoosikka Xoossayssa.
46004001	Hessa gidida gish asi wurikka nuna Kirstoosa oosanchata malanne Xoossa xuura qoncisanas hadara ekkida asa mala qoodanas bessees.
46004002	Hadara ekidaytika ammanettidayta gidanas bessees.
46004003	Ta bolla inte pirdinka woykko duulata asay pirdinka ta baggara taas aykkoy baawa. Haray attoshin tarka ta bolla pirdikke.
46004004	“Ta eriza mala tani ta woznara sidhiza miishi baawa; gido attin hessa guus ta bolla mooroy baawa” guus gidenna. Buro ta bolla pirdanay Goda.
46004005	Hessa gish pirdana wodey gakkonta haara ay yo7okka pirdofte. Goday yaana gakkanaas naagite; izi dhuma giddon qotetidayssa buro qonce kessana. Asa wozna giddon diza qofakka qonce kessana. He wode issi issi asi baasi bessiza galata Xoossa achchafe ekkana.
46004006	Hessa gish ta ishato! Ta intena go7ana mala ha yo7ozan tananne Aphiloosa intes leemiso shiishadis; ta hayssa ooththiday “Xaafetidayssafe aadhdhofa” gizayssa inte nuuppe tamarana mala gaada. Hessa gish inte issade sabbidi hara as kadhanas bessenna.
46004007	Neni aazan aadhdhay? Neni harappe ekkonta attida miishi aazee? Histin ne wursaka ekkiday hara asappe gidikko, hara asappe ekkonta asa mala aazas ceeqqetay?
46004008	Ha7i gidikko intes koshizaz inte wursi demmidetanne duretideta; nuupekka shaaketidi kawotideta. Inte tumukka kawotidakko nuka intenara kawotanakko shin.
46004009	Gaasoyka Xoossi nuna Hawaareta nu bolla hayqo pirday pirdetida asata mala asa ubbafe wursethi ooththidaz taas misatees. Hessa gish alames kiitanchatassinne asa ubbas kaassa miish gididos.
46004010	Nu Kirstoosa gish eeyata gididos. Inte qas Kirstoosan eranchata; nuni daburanchata; inte gidikko minota; inte bonchettidayta; nuni gidikko kawushshata.
46004011	Hanno gakkanaas nu gafoos; saamettoos; kallottoos; bukettoos; aqizaasoy dhayin waayetoos.
46004012	Nu kushera ooththi daaburi aqoos. Nuna qangishin nu qas anjos; nuna goodishin nu dandayoos.
46004013	Nu sunth isti moorishin nu qas lo7o zaaros; hanno gakkanaas nu biittafe pitetida buura gididos.
46004014	Ta hayssa intes xaafizay intena ta dosiza ta nayta mala zoranas gaada attin intena yeelachanas gidenna.
46004015	Intena Kirstoosan dichchiza daro asati diikkokka intes daro Aawati deettenna. Tani qas Yesus Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalan intena yeladis.
46004016	Hessa gish inte tana misatana mala ta intena woossays.
46004017	Godan daro dosettidayssanne ammanettida ta naa Ximtoosa ta inteko kiittiday hessa gaasonna. Izikka dumma dumma soon diza Woosa Keeththa asa wursi ta tamarsida timirtezara gaggizayssa Yesus Kirstoosan diza de7o oge gish intena izi qofisana.
46004018	Intefe issi issi asati ta nam7antho intena beyanas boontaz istas misatin otoretida.
46004019	Gido attin Goda shene gidikko matara ta inteko baana. Hee baada he otoranchati hasayizaz xalala gidonta istas aaza wolqay dizaakkonne beyana koyays.
46004020	Gaasoyka Xoossa kawotethi coo duuna xalala gidonta duunappe bollara Xoossa wolqa.
46004021	Ero! Inte koyizay awayssee? Durqa ekka boyee? Woykko siiqoranne ashketetha Ayanara boo?
46005001	Inte garsan yeellachiza laymay dizayssi woretees. Hessa mala tunatethi ammanonta dereta achchanka deenna. Ba aawa macho ekkida asi intekon dees.
46005002	Histin hessa mala yeelachiza miishi inte giddon dishin aazas otoretetii? Hessafe he yo7ozan inte muuzotanas intena bessenee? Hessa mala ooththidade inte garsafe diggite.
46005003	Ta intenara ashon issife doonta aggikkokka ayanan qas intenara days; ta ha7i intenara diza mala hessa ooththidade bolla pirdadis.
46005004	Inte shiiqizason ta intenara diza gish Goda Yesusa sunthaninne inte giddon diza nu Goda Yesusa wolqan he mooranchaza ashoy dhayin iza shempoy Goda gallassan attana mala hessa mala asi Xala7es aadhi imetto.
46005006	Inte ceeqqettizayssi lo7os gidenna. Guutha irshoy daro bukeeso dentheththiza erekketii?
46005007	Inte ha7i irshoy baynda ooratha bukeeso gidana mala kase caala irshoza inte giddofe diggite. Nu Paaziga dors gidida Kirstoosi nuus yarshetides.
46005008	Hessa gish ane nuni Paaziga ba7aaleza qohoynne iitatethi izan kumida kase caala irsho bolla gidonta irshoy baynda ukethan suuretethaninne tuman bonchos.
46005009	Intes laymatiza asatara issifetethi doonta mala ta intes kase dabdaabe xaafadiskoshin.
46005010	Inte mela ammanonta laymatiza asara gidonta woykko coo gaphigaphizaytara, kaysotizaytara, eeqas goynnizaytara gaaggofte guus gidonta dishin ha7i ta xaafiday ammanays gishe laymatizaytara woykko mathotizaytara, gaphigaphizaytara, eeqas goynnizaytara, asa sunth moorizaytara woykko cayzaytara, asa miish bonqizadentara intes issifeteth dooppo. Heytanta malara haray atto shin kaththika issife moopte.
46005012	Hanko ammanonta asa bolla pirdanas tana aazi gaththizee? Woosa keeththan dizayta bolla inte pirdeketii?
46005013	Woosa keeththafe karera dizayta bolla gidikko Xoossi pirdana “Inte inte giddofe iita as diggite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
46006001	Inte garsafe issades hara ammanizadera yo7oy diikko he yo7oza ammanizayta ach shiishanayssa wosti ammanonta asa sinthan pirdettana shiishshizee?
46006002	Ammaniza asay ammanonta asa bolla pirdanayssa inte ereketii? Inte buro alame bolla pirdandeta. Gidikkoka hessa guutha yo7o bolla pirdanas dandayekketii?
46006003	Hayssa biitta bolla diza pirday attoshin inte buro kiitanchata bolla pirdanayssa ereketii?
46006004	Inte inte garsan oyeetikko ammanizayta maabarappe karen dizaytaninne kadhettida asata sinthan wosti inte yo7o shiisheetii?
46006005	Ta hessa intes gizay intena yeelachanassa. Inte garsan ammanizayta giigissanas dandayiza waznama asi dennee?
46006006	Gido attin ammanizadey hara ammanizade mootanas alame pirda keeththe baanas bessizee?
46006007	Inte garsan issoy issa mootoy inte kundethas malata bessees. Inte qohanappe qohetikko lo7enee? Qasseka inte as baleththanappe intena asi baleththikko lo7enee?
46006008	Inte haa qohetanappe gede qoheetanne baleththeta. Hessika inte ishata.
46006009	Makalanchati Xoossa kawoteth gelontayssa ereketii? Hessa mala yo7on balettofte. Laymatana qaqatizayti, eeqa eqqizaytinne addey addera laymatizayti,
46006010	woykko kaysoti, gaphigaphizayti, mathotizayti, as cayzaytinne bonqizayti Xoossa kawoteth laatetenna.
46006011	Intefe issi issi asati heytanta mala shin ha7i qas Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthaninne nu Xoossa Ayanan mecettideta; dummatidetanne xillideta.
46006012	Haray wurikka taas imettides; Gido attin wurikka go7izaz gidenna. Wurikka taas imettides gido attin ay miishikka tana haarenna.
46006013	Qasse Kaththi ulossa; uloykka kathassa; gido attin Xoossi nam7aakka dhayssana; asatethi Godasfe attin laymas gidenna. Godayka asaatethassa.
46006014	Xoossi Goda hayqoppe denthida mala nunakka qasse izi ba wolqan hayqoppe denthana.
46006015	Inte asatethay Kirstoosa asateth billite gididayssa inte ereketii? Histin ta Kirstoosa asatethafe issa layman aqqiza asatara issino histoo? Mulekka bessenna.
46006016	Woykko laymatizaarira aqizadey izira issi asho gidizayssa inte ereketii? “Nam7ay issi asho gidettes” geetettides.
46006017	Gido attin Godara issino gidizadey izara issi Ayana gides.
46006018	Laymappe haakkite; asi ooththiza hara nagaray wuri izaade ashoppe karera hanees. Layma laymatizadey gidikko barka ba asateth bolla nagara ooththes.
46006019	Inte asatethay inte gaaththan diza Xillo Ayanas duussaso gididayssa inte erekketii? He Ayanaykka inte Xoossafe ekidayssa. Inteka intes gidekketa.
46006020	Inte miishan shametideta. Hessa gish inte inte asatethan Xoosse bonchite.
46007001	Inte taas xaafida mala asi macasakko gakkonta aggizakko lo7okko! Gido attin laymappe naagetanas attumasas issas issas macha du. Macasaska issineys issineys azinay do.
46007003	Azinay ba macheys koshshizaz wursi ooththo. Machaka ba azinas koshizaz wursa ooththu.
46007004	Machi asatethi izis xalala gidonta azinassara koththa. Hessathoka azina asatethi izas xalala gidonta macheyssara koththa.
46007005	Nam7ay dosan woossas giidi zoren gido giidi qachida gallassatappe attin hara gallas issoy issas akay gooppite. Hessa gaason intes intena haaroy xoonin Xala7ey intena paaconta mala nam7ay issife aqite.
46007006	Ta hessa gizay coo azazo mala gidonta zore zorays.
46007007	Asi wuri ta mala macho ekkonta dizaakko ta dosays. Gido attin issi issi asas Xoossafe imettida dumma imotay dees. Issas dumma issi imotay dees. Hankoyssas qas hara imotay dees.
46007008	Buro ekontaytanne gelontayta gish qasseka azinay hayqqida macasata gish ta gizay isti gelontanne ekkonta ta mala dizaakko istas lo7o gays.
46007009	Gido attin isti bana naaganas dandayontayta gidikko geletonne eketo; coo amon xuugetanappe ekoynne geloy lo7o.
46007010	Ekidaytasinne gelidaytas ta immiza azazoy hayssa. Hessika Goda azazoppe attin ta azazo gidenna. Azina gelida macasaya ba azinappe shaaketufu.
46007011	Shaaketiza gidikko hara azina gelonta uttu. Akay giikko ba azinara giigu. Azinaykka ba macho anji yeddofo.
46007012	Hanko asas qas ta hizgays. Hessa gizayka tana attin Goda gidenna. Ammanonta macha diza ammanizadey macheya izara daana dosikko izi izo anjanas bessenna.
46007013	Ammanonta azinay diza ammaniza macasiya he ammanonta azinay izira daanas koykko iza izappe anjeta baanas bessenna.
46007014	Gaasoyka ammanonta azinay ammaniza ba macheyin anjetes. Ammanonta macasayaka ammaniza ba azinan anjetawus. Hessatho hanonta aggikko inte yelida nayti tunata gidana shin ha7i qas anjettidayta.
46007015	Gido attin nam7afe issoy ammanontadey shaakettana koykko shaaketo. Adde gidin maca gidin ammanizadey hessa mala wogan qashetenna. Xoossi nuna saron daana mala xeygides.
46007016	Hanne neni ne azina ashshanakkonne ay eray? Woykko haysso ne ne macho ashshanakkonne ay eray?
46007017	Coo issi issi asi Xoossi xeygida malanne Goday woththida mala de7o. Woosa keeththatas ta woththiza wogay hessa.
46007018	Issadey ammananappe kase qaxaretidaz gidikko qaxaretonta asa mala hanoppo. Qas qaxaretonta dishe ammanidadeyka qaxaretofo.
46007019	Qaxxaretin qaxxaretonta aggin nam7aanka go7ay baawa. Waanna ayfe yo7oy Xoossa azazo polo.
46007020	Issi issi asi ba xeeygetida xeeygetethan minni de7o.
46007021	Ammaniza wode ne ayllee? Ne hessas daro metotoppa; wozettana dandayikko wozeta. Gaasoyka aylle gidi dishe Goda ammanidadey izi Goda goqa. Hessathoka ammaniza wode goqa gidontaddey izi Kirstoosas aylle.
46007023	Inte miishan shametideta. Hessa gish asa aylle gidoppite.
46007024	Ta ishato! Intefe issi issi asi ba xeeygetida mala Xoossara minni de7o.
46007025	Geela7otanne paanthata gish taas godappe imettida azazoy deenna. Gido attin Goda maarotethafe dendidayssan ta intes ammanettidade gidada intena zorays.
46007026	Hayssa ha7i wode meto gaason inte ha7i diza mala dizaakko taas lo7o misatees.
46007027	Ne machidade gidikko anjanas koyoppa. Machontade gidikko macho ekkanas koyoppa.
46007028	Macho ekikkoka nagara gidenna. Geela7oyaka gelikko nagara gidenna. Gido attin ekkiza asatanne gelizayta bolla hayssa alamezan ista daro metoy gakkana. Ta qas hessi inte bolla gakkonta agganayssa dosays.
46007029	Ta ishato! Ta qofay hayssa mala; wodezi qaanth gidida gish macha dizaddey macha bayndade mala de7o.
46007030	Yeekkizayti yeekkonta asa mala, ufayetizayti ufayetonta asa mala gidetto. Miishe shamidadenti shametida miisha baas gi qoppofeto.
46007031	Hayssa alameza miishan go7ettizayti wursi go7etonta asa mala gidi deetto. Gaasoyka Hayssa alameza hanoy aadhdhanas dees.
46007032	Inte hirgay baynda daana mala ta koyays. Machontadey Goda ufayssanas Goda gish qoppees.
46007033	Machidadey qas ba machiyo ufayssanas hayssa alameza miish qoppees.
46007034	Hayssan iza qofay nam7u kezi shaaketes. Gelonta macasaya woykko gela7oya Godaz xalala qoppawus. Izis gita qofaykka ashonikka, ayananka Godas dummateththa. Gelidara gidikko ba azina ufayssanas hayssa alameza hano xalala qoppawus.
46007035	Ta hessa gizay intes lo7anaz qoppadappe attin intena daro qofan yegganas gidenna. Taas gita qofay inte woznay shaaketi nam7u kezonta inte Godan minnidi wogara de7yanassa.
46007036	Issadey ba oychida gela7oyo wogara oykkonta aggikko izi wodeykka cimmi cimmi biikko ekkana koykko ba koyda mala ekko. Ekikkone gelikko lo7o. Nagara gidenna.
46007037	Gido attin hayssa ha yo7ozan iza woznay qaaxonta bana haaridi geela7oyo ekkike giidi murtida asi lo7o ooththides.
46007038	Hessa gish geela7oyo ekidadey lo7o ooththides. Ekontadeyka aadhdhetha lo7o ooththides.
46007039	Issi macassi azinay paxa diza wode kumeththan ba azinara qashetadus. Azinay hayqqikko ba koyda as gelana dandayawus. Iza gelanadey ammanizade gido attin gelu.
46007040	Ta qofa mala gidikko iza gelonta dizaakko daro ufayssan de7andus. Taaska tanan Xoossa Ayanay diza misatees.
46008001	Eeqas shukettida asho gish inte taas xaafidayssa mala gidikko tumukka nu wurikka eriza miishi dees. Eroy otorises; siiqoy qas go7ees.
46008002	Ta erays giza asi eranas bessiza mala buro eribenna.
46008003	Xoosse siiqizadey gidikko izi Xoossa achchan eretidade.
46008004	Hessa gish eeqas yarshetida asho muussa gish ta intes gizay hayssa alamezan eeqay hada gididayssanne issi Xoossafe attin hara Xoossi bayndayssa nu eroos.
46008005	Aydekka gidikko daro eeqatinne daro godati deettes shin salon gidin sa7a bolla Xoosse geetettiza daro eeqati diikkokka nuus gidikko haniday wurikka izan hanides. Nukka izas gidida issi Xoossi Aaway dees. Qasseka hanidazi wurikka izan haniday nuka izan hanida issi Goday Yesus Kirstoosi xalala nuus dees.
46008007	Gido attin hessa asi wuri erenna. Issi issi asati hanno gakkanaas eeqa goynno dosida gish hessa mala asho miishe addaka Eeqas shukettidayssa qoppeetes. Istas qofay laafa gidida gish isti tuneetes.
46008008	Gido attin kathi nuna Xoossa ach gaththenna. Nu moonta agikkoka nuus paccizay deenna. Nu mikkokka nuus wodhey deenna.
46008009	Gido attin inte metoy baawa guussan ooththizays ammanon minnonta asas dhuphe gidonta mala naagetite.
46008010	Nees hessa misatiza erateth diza gish hinko ammanon minnontadey eeqa keeththan ne mizayssa beyidi eeqas shukettidayssa maanas xalenee?
46008011	Hessa gish Kirstoosi iza gish hayqqida he ammanon minnonta ishay ne eratetha gaason dhayees guussa.
46008012	Hessathoka inte inte ishata qohoninne ista laafa qofa madunthon Kirstoosa qoheeta.
46008013	Hessa gish ta miza miishi ta isha dhuphizaz gidikko ta isha ta dhuphethonta mala mulekka asho miikke.
46009001	Tani goqa as gidikinaa? Ta Hawaare gidikinaa? Nu Goda Yesusa tani ta ayfera beyabekkinaa? Inteka Godan ta ooson bettida ayfe gidekketii?
46009002	Haratas ta Hawaare gidonta agikkokka ta intes tumappe Hawaare. Gaasoyka Godan ta Hawaaretetha bessiza maatamey intena.
46009003	Tana paacizaytas ta immiza malthey hessa.
46009004	Ero! Maanassinne uyanas nuus bessenee?
46009005	Hara Hawaareta mala Goda ishata malanne keefanta mala nuka ammaniza nu macheta ekki yuuyana dandayokkonii?
46009006	Woykko waayeti daaburidi daanas bessizay tananne Barnabaasa xalalaa?
46009007	Ero! Ba miishara wotadarateth ooththizay oonee? Woyne mithi tokkidi, he tokkida mitha ayfe moontay oonee? Mehe heemmishe ba heemmiza meheza maath uyontay oonee?
46009008	Ta hayssa gizay coo asa qofa mala xalalaa? Muse wogay hessatho genee?
46009009	Muse woga garsan “Kath bukkiza mehe duuna qachofa” geetetti xaafettides. Histin Xoosse metiday he meheza qanthee?
46009010	Izi hessa giday tumappe nu gish gidenee? Heessi xaafettiday addafe nu gishassa. Goshshanchaynne qasseka bukkizayssi ba ooso ayfeppe bana gakkizayssa ekkanas ufays ooththes.
46009011	Nu inte giddon Ayana zerethi zeridayti ashos gidizaz maxikko hessi gita miishee?
46009012	Hara asati intefe hessa mala go7a ekanas dandayikko nu qas hessafe daro demmanas bessennee? Gido attin nuni nuus bessiza mala go7ettibeekko. Harappeka nu Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalas dhuphe gidonta mala hanizaz wursikka dandayoos.
46009013	Xoossa Keeththan ooththizayti ba maanayssa Xoossa keeththafe ekkizayssa mala yarshoson ooththizaytikka he ba ooththiza yarshizayssafe mizayssa inte ereketii?
46009014	Hessathoka Mishiraachcho qaala sabakizayti baasi koshshizayssa Mishiraachcho qaala ooththizasoppe ekkana mala Goday woga woththides.
46009015	Tani gidikko hessa ubbafekka aykkokka go7etabekke. Ha7ikka ta intes hayssa xaafizay heytanta mala miish taas ooththeto gaada gidenna. Ayssi giikko oonikka tani ta Godan ceeqqettizaro taappe woththi ekanappe taas hayqoy lo7o.
46009016	Mishiraachcho qaala sabakidayssi tana ceeqqissenna. Ta sabakizay dosan gidida gish gidonta wolqara tana gakkida gishassa. Ta Mishiraachcho qaala sabakonta aggikko tana aayye-ana!
46009017	Mishiraachcho qaala ta dosan ta sabakikko taas woytoy dees. Tani ta dosan gidonta wolqara ooththizayssa gidikko hadara polana mala ooso xalala gidana.
46009018	Histin taas aaza woytoy dizee? Taas woytoy daanay Mishiraachcho qaala sabakashe taas bessizayta ta go7etonta aggikkokko.
46009019	Ta goqappe attin oonaska aylle gidikke. Gido attin darota Godakko zaarana gish asa ubbas aylle mala gidadis.
46009020	Ayhudata ashshanas Ayhudatara ista misatadis. Tani ta baggara Muse wogappe garasara gidonta dashe Muse wogappe garsara dizayta ashshanas ista misatadis.
46009021	Tani ta baggara Xoossa wogay dizaddenne Kirstoosa wogas haarettizade gidikkoka wogay bayndayta ashshanas ista mala wogay bayndade gidadis.
46009022	Daburanchata ashshanas gaada takka daburanchatara ista mala daburancha gidadis. Taas dandayettida mala ubban issi issi asata ashshanas asa ubbara isti hanizaz hanadis.
46009023	Ta hayssa wursa ooththizay Mishiraachcho qaala anjo istara gishettanas Mishiraachcho qaala gish ooththadis.
46009024	Gaadde woththi woxxizayti daro shin xoonidi shilmate demmizay issade xalala gididayssa inte ereketii? Hessa gish shilmate ekkanas woxxizade mala inteka woxite.
46009025	Gaadden wooxxi aadhdhanas giigettizaddey oonikka hano barka bana naagees. Heytanti aadhdhananne dhayana aklile ekanas daaburettes shin nu qas mernas dhayonta aklile demmanas daaburoos.
46009026	Hessa gish ta qas poloy baynda coo mela woxxizade mala woxxike. Qasseka carkora baaxetizadde mala coo mela gaden baaxetike.
46009027	Ta qas haratas sabaka pe7ada taas kunda attonta mala ta asateth shiisha oykkada haarays.
46010001	Ta ishato! Kase nu Aawati shaaray istafe bollara gididi kaalethidayssa malanne isti wurikka zo7o abba pinnidayssa ta intena qoppisanas koyays.
46010002	Isti Musera gidanas giidi shaaraninne abban xammaqetida.
46010003	Wurikka issi ayana quma mida.
46010004	Wurikka issi ayana ushshi uyida. Isti uyidaykka bana kaalliza ayana zaallafe pultidayssafe. He zaallayka Kirstoosa.
46010005	Gido attin Xoossi darotan ufayetibenna. Hessa gish ista ahay bazzon kundi attides.
46010006	Isti iita miish amottidayssatho nuka amottonta mala he ista hanoy nu naagettana mala nuus leemiso gidides.
46010007	“Derey maanassinne uyanas uttides; yexanaska dendides” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala ista garsafe issi issi asati ooththoyssatho inteka eeqa goynnizayata gidoppite.
46010008	Ista garsafe issi issi asati laymatidi issi gallas nam7u tammanne heedzdzu shi asay dippi gi wuroyssatho wuronta mala nuka ane laymatokko.
46010009	Ista garsafe issi issi asati Goda paacidi shooshan duketti hayqqi dhayidayssa mala nuka ane Goda paacokko.
46010010	Ista garsafe issi issi asati zuuzumetidi dhaysiza bosha kiitanchan dhayidayssatho inteka dhayonta mala zuuzumoppite.
46010011	Hessi wuri nuus leemiso gidana mala ista bolla gakkides. Wode wursethan diza nuus timirte gidana mala nuus xaafettides.
46010012	Hessa gish ta minna eqqa days gizaddey diikko kundonta mala baasi naageto.
46010013	Asa bolla gakkida paaceppe hara aadhdhiza paacey inte bolla gakkibeenna. Xoossi ammanettiza Xoosse gidida gish inte dandayonta inte wolqafe bollara inte paacetenna mala izi intena aggaggenna. Gido attin inte paacetiza wode he paaceza inte dandayana mala wolqa immidi paaceppe inte kessi ekkana oge izi intes giigissana.
46010014	Hessa gish ta siiqoto! Eeqas goynnoppite; izappe hakkite.
46010015	Ta intes hayssa gizay woznama gidida gishassa. Hessa gish ta yootizayssa ane inte interka pirdite.
46010016	Nuni Xoossa galatidi ekkiza ushshay Kirstoosa suuthara gaggoteththi dizayssa gidenee? Hessathoka nu baththi baththi gishetti miza ukethay Kirstoosa ashora gaggoteththi dizayssa gidenee?
46010017	Ukethay issino gidida mala nunikka daro gidi uttidikka wurikka issi asho. Nu wurikka issi ukethaza gishetti moos.
46010018	Ane inte Isra7eele nayti ooththidayssa qoppite. Shiiqza yarshozappe mizaytas yarshoy shiiqzasora gagoteththi denee?
46010019	Histin eeqas yarshetida yarsho gidin woykko eeqay ba baggara go7ara dees gazinaa?
46010020	Gidenna! Ammanonta asay shiishshiza yarshoy Xoossas gidonta Xala7esa. Intes Xala7era issifetethi daana mala ta koyikke.
46010021	Xala7e ushshinne Goda ushshi inte issife gaththi uyana dandayekketa. Goda maaddafenne Xala7e maaddafe gaththi maana dandayekketa.
46010022	Nuni Goda hanqethinoo? Nu izappe minnizonii?
46010023	Wurikka taas imettides shin wurikka tana go7izaz gidenna. Wurikka taassa shin wurikka tana maaddenna.
46010024	Asi wurikka ba lagge go7anaz gaaththi xeello attin bana go7anaz xalala koyoppo.
46010025	Giyan bayzettiza asho wursi sidhey baynda miite.
46010026	Biittaynne biitta bolla dizay wurikka Godayssa.
46010027	Ammanonta asi intena baso xeygidi shiishida kath wursi aykkokka sidhonta miite.
46010028	Gido attin issadey “Hayssi eeqas yarshetida kaththa” giikko he kaththaa he addeza qofa gishshinne intena sidhisikko mooppite.
46010029	Ta intes hessa gizay he yootidade qofa gish gadis attin inte qofa gish gabeyke. Ta xillo gida dishin aazas hara asa qofa geedon ta bolla pirdetizee?
46010030	Ta Xoosse galatada mizade gida uttada aazas hara asan pirdetoo?
46010031	Histikko inte ay miikkoka, ay uyikkoka woykko aykko ooththikko wursikka Xoossa bonchos ooththite.
46010032	Ayhuda asas gidin Ayzaabetas gidin woykko Xoossa Woosa Keeththas oonaska dhuphe gidoppite.
46010033	Ta as wursaka ay ogerakka ufayssana koyiza mala inteka hessatho ooththite. Daroti attana mala ta tana go7izaz gidonta ista go7izaz koyays.
46011001	Tani Kirstoosa misatada iza kaallizayssatho inteka tana misatidi kaallite.
46011002	Inte taas wursi qoppiza gishshinne taappe ekkida timirteza lo7ethi oykkida gish ta intena galatays.
46011003	Gido attin ta inte erana mala koyizay attumasas ubbas hu7ey Kirstoosa gididayssa mala attumasay macasas ubbas hu7e. Qasse Xoossi Kirstoosas hu7e.
46011004	Ba hu7e gulluntidi Xoosse woossizadey woykko qaala yootizadey oonikka barka bana kawushshees.
46011005	Ba hu7e goozonta woossiza macasiya woykko tinbite qaala yootiza ay macaska barka bana kawushshawus. Hessi iza ba hu7e bulissiddadera gina.
46011006	Macassi ba hu7e goozonta aggikko meedetu woykko qanxisu. Izis ba hu7e meedetethi woykko qanxisethi yeelachizaz gidikko goozu.
46011007	Addey ba hu7e gulluntanas bessenna. Attumasi Xoossa leemisonne Xoossa boncho. Macassi gidikko addes boncho.
46011008	Gaasoyka macassi addefe medhetadus attin attumasi macasappe medhetibenna.
46011009	Qasseka macassi addes medhetadus attin addey macasas medhetibenna.
46011010	Hessa gish kiitanchati beyanas naagiza macasas imettida maata bessiza goosse ba hu7en goozu.
46011011	Goda achchan gidikko macassi addey baynda, addeyka macassi baynda deyettenna.
46011012	Macasi addefe bettidayssatho addeyka macasappe yelettes. Gido attin nam7aykka Xoossafe bettida.
46011013	Macassi ba hu7e goozonta Xoosse woossanas bessizakone ane inte pirdite.
46011014	Attumasi ba hu7e adussi dichchikko borso gididayssa intena medhetetha hanotethi erisuwee?
46011015	Macay gidikko ba hu7e binana dichchikko hessi izis boncho gidenee? Izis adusa hu7e binanay imettiday seelo gidanassa.
46011016	Hessa gish oonikka hayssa ha yo7ozan palamettana koykko nuus gidinka Xoossa Woosa Keeththatas hayssafe hara wogay deenna.
46011017	Inte issi so shiiqetiza wode qohos attin go7as gidonta gish ta hayssa azazoza intes aaththizay intena galatashe gidenna.
46011018	Inte Woosa Keeththan shiiqiza wode inte garsan shaakotethi dizayssa ta kaseta siyadis. Ta siyoyssafe baggay tumu gidanayssa ta ammanays.
46011019	Inte giddofe tumanchati shaaketi erettana mala hessa mala shaakoy inte giddon daanayssi dosa gidenna.
46011020	Inte issife shiiqetidi mizay Goda kawo gidenna.
46011021	Inte shiiqetidi issoy issa naagonta dishe kath meeta. Intefe issadey gafan dishin hankoyssi qas mathottes.
46011022	Histin intes uyanasoynne maanasoy baawee? Woykko Xoossa Keeththe leqqidi aykkoykka bayndayta yeelachetii? Histin ta intena ay goo? Hayssa ha hanozas intena galatoo? Mulekka galatikke.
46011023	Ta Godappe ekkidayssa intes aaththadis. Hessika Goda Yesusi aadhdhi imettida omars uketh denthidinne Xoosse galati baththidi “Heyite! Miite! Hayssi intes gidiza ta asho. Tana qoppanas inte hayssa ooththite” gides.
46011025	Hessathoka kawoppe guye ushsha denthidi “Hayssi ushshay ta suuthan haniza ooratha caaqo. Hessa gish ushshafe inte uyiza wode hayssa tana qoppana mala ooththite” gides.
46011026	Hayssa uketha inte miza wodenne hayssa ushshakka uyiza ubba wode Goday yaana gakkanaas inte iza hayqo yootana.
46011027	Hessa gish oonikka bessonta dishin hayssa uketha miikko woykko Goda ushsha uyikko izaadey Goda ashonne iza suutha kawushshida gish izi oyshettana.
46011028	Oonikka hayssa ha uketha mannappenne ushshafe uyanappe kaseti barka bana paaco.
46011029	Gaasoyka oonikka Goda asho baasi gelonta dishin miikkonne Goda ushsha uyikko izaadey barka ba bolla pirda ehees.
46011030	Inte garsan daro asay daaburidaynne saketiday qasseka baggay hayqqiday hessa gaasonna.
46011031	Nu nurka nuna paacizakko nu bolla pirdana.
46011032	Gido attin Goday pirdiza wode nu hanko ammanonta asara pirdetonta mala izi nuna kaseti murees.
46011033	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte maana shiiqiza wode issoy issara naagetite.
46011034	Inte shiiqiza shiiqoy pirdas gidonta mala intefe oonikka gafiddaddey diikko kasetidi ba soon mo. Hanko attidayssa tani hara wode he inteko baada woga wothana.
46012001	Ta ishato! Ayanay immiza imotetha gish inte issi miish erana mala ta koyays.
46012002	Inte ammananappe kase coo mela yaanne haanne guussan inte eronta kaalethettidi duuna duude gidida eeqatakko bidayssa inteka ereeta.
46012003	Hessa gish oonikka Xoossa Ayanan haasayishe “Yesusi qangetidade” geenna. Hessathoka Xillo Ayanan gididi attin oonikka “Yesusi Goda” gaana asi doontayssa ta intes yootays.
46012004	Asas imotethi dumma dumma gidishin Ayanay gidikko issino.
46012005	Oosoykka dumma dumma gidishin Goday gidikko issino.
46012006	Dumma dumma ooso ogeti diikkokka wursikka ooththizay issi Xoossa.
46012007	Gido attin Xillo Ayana qonciso imotay issades imettizay issife go7ettanassa.
46012008	Issades hiillan haasayana eratethi imetees. Hara asas qas he Ayananka eratetha qaalan haasayana qaalay imetees.
46012009	Issades he Ayanan ammanoy imetees. Hara asas qas he Ayananikka hargizayta pathiza imotay imetees.
46012010	Issades malalisiza ooso ooththiza imotay; qasseka hara asa buro tinbite qaala haasaya imotay; hara asa qasseka ayanata shaakki eroy; hara asas dumma dumma qaalan hasayay; qasseka hara asas hara dumma dumma qaalan haasayettidayssa birshana imotay imetees.
46012011	Heyti wurikka he issi Ayanay immiza imota gidishin issi issi asas ba koyda mala immees.
46012012	Issi asatetha bolla daro billiteti diikkokka asatethay issino. Gido attin billiteti daro gidikkoka asatethay issino xalala. Kirstoosikka hessa mala.
46012013	Ayhuda asata gidinka Girike asata gidinka, aylle gidinka woykko goqa asata gidinka nu wurikka issino gidanas issi Ayanan xammaqetidos. Nu wurikka ha issi Ayanappe uyidos.
46012014	Asatethi medhetiday daro billitetappe attin issi billiteppe xalala gidenna.
46012015	Tohoy “Ta kushe gidonta gish asatetha giddon diikke” giikko izi hizgida gish izas asatethan duussi attanee?
46012016	Haythi “Ta ayfe gidonta gish asatetha giddon diikke” giikko hessa gish asateth giddon duussi izas attanee?
46012017	Asatethi wurikka ayfe xalala gididakko aazan siyanee? Asatethi wurikka haythe xalala gididakko aazan singanee?
46012018	Gido attin Xoossi issa issa ba koyda mala asatetha giddon daanas bessizason woththides.
46012019	Billitey wurikka issino gididakko kumeththa asatethi awappe betanee?
46012020	Hessa gish billiteti daro shin asatethi gidikko issino xalala.
46012021	Ayfey kushe “Nena ta koyikke” gaanas dandayenna. Hu7ey toho “Nena taas koshshenna” gaana dandayenna.
46012022	Haray attoshin ubbafe laafa misatiza billiteti daro koshshizayta.
46012023	Nuni laafa gi leqqiza billiteta hankoytaappe aaththi bonchos. Qasseka nu istan yeelatiza billiteta harappe aaththi naagos.
46012024	Nu istan yeelatonta billitetas gidikko hessa mala boncho koshshenna. Xoossi gidikko asateth billiteta issi bolla oythethidi bonchoy paacizaytas aadhdhetha boncho immides.
46012025	Izi hessa ooththiday asatetha billiteta garsan shaakotethi doonta isti ba garsan issoy issa banara gina gi qoppanassa.
46012026	Issi billitey saketikko hanko billiteti wurikka izara issife saketetes. Issi billitey bonchettikko biilliteti wurikka issife ufayetetes.
46012027	Histikko inte wurikka Kirstoosa asateth; inte issoy issoy iza asatetha billiteta.
46012028	Xoossi Woosa Keeththa giddon koyro Hawaareta, nam7antho qasse nabeta, heedzdzantho astamareta, kaalethidi malata ooththizayta, paathiza imotethi dizayta, harataka as maaddiza imotay dizayta, dere ayso eratethi dizaytanne dumma dumma qaala haasayana imotethi diza asata woththides.
46012029	Wurikka hawaratee? Wurikka nabetee? Wurikka astamaretee? Wurikka malalisiza miishe ooththizoo?
46012030	Ubbaska hargizayta paathiza imotay dizee? Asi wurikka dumma qaalan hasayizee? Dumma qaalan hasayettoyssa asi wuri birshizee?
46012031	Gido attin inte wurikka ubbafe aadhdhiza imoteth lo7ethi koyite. Qasseka hara ubbafe aadhdhiza oge ta intena bessana.
46013001	Ta asa qaalaninne salo kiitanchata qaalan hasayikkoka taas siiqoy baynda aggikko coo mela birata giirissa mala woykko daala giiretha mala.
46013002	Tinbite haasayiza imotay taas diikkokka, woykko xuura yo7otanne erateth wursa ta erikkoka, zumay izi dizasoppe dhooqada haraso diggiza ammanoy taas diikkokka hessa wursaka siiqoy baynda ta ooththikko hessi mela hada.
46013003	Taas dizaz wursa manqotas ta immikkoka, ta asateth ta taman xuugikkokka, siiqoy baynda aggikko tana hessi aykkokka maaddenna.
46013004	Siiqoy dandaya, qasseka kiya; siiqoy miqaynenna; ceeqqettenna; otoretenna;
46013005	bessontaz ooththenna, barka ba go7a xalala xeellenna. Qoho qoodan yeggenna.
46013006	Siiqoy tumanppe attin makalan ufayetenna.
46013007	Siiqoy ubba wode dandayees. Ubba wodekka ammanees. Ufays ooththessinne minni eqees.
46013008	Siiqoy mulekka kundenna. Tinbitey gidikko attana. Hara qaalan haasayayka attana. Eratethika shaarettana.
46013009	Gaasoyka nu erizay wursi gidonta shaakki eroos. Tinbite haasaya gidikkoka bagga hasayos.
46013010	Gido attin wursethi gakkiza wode kumeth gidonta imotay he wode shaarettana.
46013011	Ta guutha naatetethan dashe naa mala haasayayssinne naa mala qoppays. Naa malaka yuusha qoppays. Kaha kunthidappe guye kase naatethan hanizayssa wursaka yegga aggadis.
46013012	Nuni ha7i beyzayssi haaththan xeelliza mala coo bozhi bozhes shin he wode gidikko nu iza ayfeso lo7ethi beyana. Ta ha7i kumeth gidonta bagga xalala erays. He wode gidikko tani ta hu7es eretidayssa mala erana.
46013013	Hessa gish ammanoy, hidotaynne siiqoy hayti heedzdzati eqi daana. Hayta ubbafe aadhdhizay siiqo.
46014001	Siiqo kaallite; ayana imotethata harappeka tinbite haasayiza imotata lo7ethi koyite.
46014002	Hara qaalan hasayizaddey Xoossas attin asas hasayenna. Xuura gidida yo7o Ayanan haasayiza gish izi gizay asas gelenna.
46014003	Tinbite hasayizaddey asa minthethanas, dentheththanassinne go7anas haasayees.
46014004	Hara qaalan hasayizaddey qas barka bana minthethes. Tinbite hasayizaddey gidikko Woosa Keeththa go7ees.
46014005	Inte wurikka hara qaalan hasayizakko ta dosays shin hessafeka bollara inte tinbite qaalan hasayizakko ta dosays. Woosa keeththay minnana mala hara qaalara hasayizaddey ba haasayizayssa birshonta izi hara qaalara hasayizayssafe tinbite hasayizaddey aadhdhees.
46014006	Hessa gish ta ishato! Ta inteko biza wode ta intes qoncisethan woykko eratethan woykko tinbiten, woykko timirten yootonta hara qaalara yootikko hessi intena ay go7anee?
46014007	Hessi coo susul7e malanne diiththa mala shempoy baynda ista giirissas dummateththi shaaketi eretonta aggikko iza wosti eranee?
46014008	Qasseka xurumbay aazas punetizakko woykko zayey aazas zayettizakonne shaakki eretonta ogera punetikko ooni olas giigetanee?
46014009	Inteka hessa mala. Inte duunappe erettiza qaalay kezonta aggikko inte gizayssa ooni eranee? Coo mela carkon dhayana.
46014010	Alame bolla daro dumma dumma qaalay dees shin birsheththi baynda qaalay baawa.
46014011	Hessa gish issadey haasayiza qaala birsheththi ta eronta aggikko hasayizades ta imathe gidays. Izaadeyka taas imath gides.
46014012	Inteka hessa mala Ayanan imotethata demmanas koyiza gish Woosa Keeththa go7iza imoteth demmanas lo7ethi koyite.
46014013	Hessa gish hara qaalan haasayiza asi ba haasayidayssa birsheththi erana mala baasi woosso.
46014014	Tani hara qaalara woossiza wode ta Ayanan woossays attin ta izappe aykkokka erike.
46014015	Histin ta ay ooththana mala taas bessizee? Tani ta Ayananka woossana. Woznan wothadakka woossana. Ta Ayananka yexana. Woznarakka yexana.
46014016	Hessatho gidonta aggikko ne Xoosse Ayanan galatiza wode hessa eronta issi imatha asi ne galata woossa wosti “Amiin” gaanas dandayizee?
46014017	Ne bessiza mala galatanas dandayassa. Hankoyssi gidikko izan go7ettenna.
46014018	Tani intefe bollara hara qaalan haasayiza gish Xoosse galatays.
46014019	Gido attin Woosa Keeththan eretonta daro shi qaalata haasayanappe hara asata tamarsanas asay eriza ichash qaala haasayana dosays.
46014020	Ta ishato! Inte inte qofan guutha nayta mala gidoppite. Iita oosos gidikko guutha nayta mala gidite. Qofan gidikko kaha kunthida asata gidite.
46014021	Kase woganka “ ‘Ista qaalay imath gidida alaga asata qaalara ta hayssa asas yootana. Hessatho yootinka ta gizaz isti siyettenna’ gees Goday” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
46014022	Hessa gish hara qaalan haasayay ammanonta asas malata gides attin ammanizaytas malata gidenna. Tinbitey gidikko ammanizaytas attin ammanontays gidenna.
46014023	Histikko Woosa Keeththan ammaniza asay issife shiiqidason wurikka eronta hara qaalan hasayishin imatha asati woykko ammanonta asay shiiqidi hasayizaso gelikko “Hayti goyeettes” geettenee?
46014024	Gido attin asay wuri tinbite qaala haasayettishin imaththi woykko ammanontadey gelikko ba siyidayssa ubba erananne he qaalan pirdettana.
46014025	Izaadey ba woznan qotti woththidazi wuri qoncananne izikka ba baggara “Tumappe Xoossi intenara dees” giidi gufannidi Xoossas goynnana.
46014026	Hessa gish ta ishato! Histin ay giinoo? Inte issife shiiqiza wode intefe issi issi asas yeth qasse issi issi asas timirtey dees. Issi issi asas qonconta xuura miishata qoncisiza imotay dees. Hara asas dumma qaalan haasayana imotay dees. Haras qasse he qaala birsheththa imotay dees. Hessi he imotay wurikka ammanizayta go7anas bessees.
46014027	Hara qaalara haasayizay diikko nam7u as woykko dari darikko heedzdzu gididi taran taran yooteto. Hara asi qasse birsho.
46014028	Birshizaddey baynda aggikko shiiqida asa giddon co7u giidi baasi xalalanne Xoossas xalala yooto.
46014029	Tinbite haasaya imotay dizayti nabeti nam7ati woykko heedzdzati tinbite hasayetto. Hanko asay yootetidayssa lo7ethi paaco.
46014030	Uttida asa garsafe issadey issi miishi qoncikko koyro hasayizayssi co7u go.
46014031	Inte garsafe issi issi asi tamarana malanne minettana mala inte wurikka taran taran tinbite yootanas dandayeeta.
46014032	Nabeta ayanay nabetas azazetes. Gaasoyka Xoossi sarotetha Xoossafe attin wocama Xoosse gidenna. Ammanizayta Woosa Keeththe ubbasonka hessa mala.
46014034	Ammaniza asay goynnos shiiqizason macasati co7u getto. Muse wogay kase gida mala isti azazetteto attin shiiqoson isti haasayana mala istas imettibenna.
46014035	Macassati eranas koyiza issi issi yo7oti diikko ba keeththan ba azinata oycheto. Gaasoyka macassi shiiqoson haasayay yeelachizaza.
46014036	Xoossa qaalay intefe kezidee? Woykko inteko xalala gakkidee?
46014037	Oonikka bana “Nabe” giikko woykko “Taas Xillo Ayanappe imotethi dees” gizaddey diikko hayssi ta intes xaafidayssi Goda azazo gididayssa ero.
46014038	Hayssa eronta asi diikko izi ba hu7es eretenna.
46014039	Hessa gish ta ishato! Buro tinbite haasayanas lo7eth koyite. Dumma dumma qaalan haasayaka diggofte.
46014040	Gidikkoka wurikka maararanne wogara gido.
46015001	Ha7ikka ta ishato! Ta intena sabakin inte ekkidinne izan minni eqqida Mishiraachcho qaala ha7i qofisana koyays.
46015002	Ta intes sabakida qaala inte lo7ethi oykkikko he Mishiraachcho qaalan inte attana. Hessa mala gidonta aggikko inte ammanoy coo mela hada.
46015003	Tani taas ekkidayssanne ubbafe aadhdhizayssa intes aaththa immadis. Geeshsha Maxaafati gizayssa mala Kirstoosi nu nagara gish hayqqides.
46015004	Moogetides; Geeshsha Maxaafatan xaafettidayssa mala heedzdzantho gallas hayqoppe dendides.
46015005	Hessafe kaallidi Phexroosas beettides. Qasseka Yesusa kaalliza tammanne nam7atas beettides.
46015006	Hessafe guye ichashu xeetuppe bollara diza ammanizaytas issito beettides. He iza beyda asappe dariza baggay paxa dees. Baggay qasse hayqqides.
46015007	Hessafe guye Yaqoobes beettides. Kaallidika kumeththa Hawaaretas beettides.
46015008	Tani Hawaareta ubbafe laafanne kase Xoossa Woosa Keeththe goodida gish Hawaare geetetanas tani bessontadekko shin asa wursofe awucaya misatiza taaska beettides.
46015010	Gido attin Xoossa kiyatethan ha7i ta hananayssa hanadis. Taaska imettida Xoossa kiyatethi mela hada gidibenna. Tani oonappekka bollara daro minna ooththadis. Gido attin hessa ooththiday tana gidonta Xoossa aadhdho kiyatethi ooththides.
46015011	Hessa gish tana gidin istaka gidin nu wurikka sabakizay hessa. Inteka ammaniday hessa.
46015012	Kirstoosi hayqoppe dendidayssa nu tamarsikko histin inte garsafe issi issi asati waanidi hayqoppe dendoy baawa gizoo?
46015013	Hayqqida asas denthi doontaz gidikko Kirstoosikka dendibenna guussakaa?
46015014	Kirstoosikka hayqoppe dendontaz gidikko nu sabakos go7ay baawa. Inte ammanoyka coo mela hada.
46015015	Hessafekka bollara “Xoossi Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthides” giidi nu markattida markaykka nuna wordo Xoossa markata kessideskaa? Hayqqida asay hayqoppe dendontaz gidikko Xoossi Kirstoosakka denthibenna guussa.
46015016	Gaasoyka hayqqidayti dendontaz gidikko Kirstoosikka hayqoppe dendibenna.
46015017	Kirstoosi hayqoppe dendontaz gidikko inte ammanoy coo mela. Inteka hanno gakkanaas inte nagarara deeta guussa.
46015018	Hanoy hessa mala gidikko Kirstoosa ammanidi hayqqidayti wurikka dhayida guussa.
46015019	Nuni Kirstoosan ufays ooththizay hanno biittay bolla duussas xalala gidikko nu asa ubbafe laafata.
46015020	Gido attin Kirstoosi hayqqidaytas ubbas bayra gididi hayqoppe tumu dendides.
46015021	Hayqoy issi asa Addame baggara yida mala hayqqidayta denthi Kirstoosa baggara.
46015022	Asi wurikka Addame baggara hayqqida mala hessathoka asi wurikka Kirstoosa baggara hayqoppe dendana.
46015023	Gido attin wurikka ba tarara tarara dendana. Koyro bayra gidida Kirstoosi dendides. Izappe kaallidi izi yiza wode Kirstoosas gidizayti dendana.
46015024	Hessafe guye haarettiza dereta godateththinne wolqamata wursi dhayssidappe guye kawota Xoossa Aawas aaththi immiza wode he wode wurseth gidana.
46015025	Izi ba morke wursikka ba toho gars aaththana gakkanaas izi kawotanas bessees.
46015026	Buro wursethan xooneti dhayana morkey hayqo.
46015027	“Xoossi wursikka iza godateththafe garsan woththides” gizazi Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides. Gido attin “Wurikka iza Godateththa garsan gidides” gishin wurikka iza godateththa garsan ooththida Xoossa Aawa gujjenna.
46015028	Wurikka izas haarettidayssafe guye Xoossi wursofe bolla gidana mala Xoossa nay qasse ubba baasi haarisidayssas Xoossa Aawas haarettana.
46015029	Hayqoppe denthi doonta aggikko histin hayqqida asa gish giidi xammaqetiza ubbas go7ay aazee? Hayqqidayti mulekka dendontaz gidikko histin asay ista gish aazas xammaqetizee?
46015030	Nu qas ubba wode iita metos aadhi imettizay aazasee?
46015031	Ta ishato! Hach hach hayqoy tanara gaaggees. Hessaka nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa geedon inte bolla diza ammaneteth ta intes qoncisays.
46015032	Tani Efesoonen do7a misatiza asatara baaxetidayssi asi beyana mala xalala gidikko taas izan aaza wodhey dizee? Hayqqidaytas denthi doonta aggikko “Nu wonto hayqqana gish ane moos, ane uyoos” gizayta mala nuka ista mala gidoos.
46015033	Inte balettofte! Iita laggetethi lo7o amalera dizayta moores.
46015034	Woznama gidite; nagara ooththofte; Xoosse erontayta issi issi asati inte garsan diza gish ta hessa intena yeelachanas gays.
46015035	“Hayqqidayti waani dendanee? Ay mala ashora dendanee?” gizadey daana dandayees.
46015036	Neno eeyazo! Ne zeriza zerethay hayqqonta dishe caarenna.
46015037	Neni zeriza kaththa modheya giste woykko hara kaththa ayfe gidikkoka guyeppe ne ekkanara ha7i ne zeroro gidukku.
46015038	Xoossi qasse ba koyda mala he zerethas iza mala medho immees. Zeretha qommotas issas issas iza misatiza asateth immees.
46015039	Ashoy wurikka issi mala gidenna. Asa ashoy issa gidishin mehe ashoy qasse hara; kafo ashoy hara; mole ashoykka hara qommo.
46015040	Hessa malaka salon dizaytassikka ista misatiza medhoy dees. Biitta bolla dizaytassikka ista misatiza medhoy dees. Gido attin saloyta bonchoy issi mala. Biitta bolla dizayta medho bonchoyka dumma.
46015041	Awa arshe bonchoy issino. Gido attin agina bonchoy qasse dumma. Xoolinteta bonchoyka hara. Issi xoolinte bonchoy hara xoolinte bonchofe dummates.
46015042	Hayqqida asa denthikka hessa mala. Wooqiza medhoy zeretin wooqonta medhoy dendana.
46015043	Kawushshatethan zerettana shin bonchon dendana. Daabursan zerettana shin wolqama gididi dendana.
46015044	Medheteth medhoy zerettana shin Ayana medhoy dendana. Medheteth medhoy diikko qasseka Ayana medhoykka dees.
46015045	Hessa gish “Koyro as Addamey de7oy diza medheteth gidides” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides. Nam7antho Addame gidida Kirstoosi gidikko asas de7o immiza Ayana.
46015046	Gido attin koyro yiday Ayanayssa gidonta medhetethayssa. Ayanayssi qas guyeppe yidayssa.
46015047	Koyro yida Addamey biittafe medhetida gish izi biittafe. Nam7antho yidayssi saloppe.
46015048	Biittafe gididayti isti biittafe medhetidayssa mala. Saloppe gididayti saloppe yidayssa mala.
46015049	Nuni biitta asa medha mayo7oyssathoka saloyssa medhaka may7ana.
46015050	Ta ishato! Ta hayssa intes yootays ashoynne suuthi Xoossa kawoteth laattettenna. Dhayanayssi dhayontayssa laattenna.
46015051	Ane ta intes issi xuura yo7o yootays. Nuni wurikka hayqokko. Gido attin nu wurikka laamettana.
46015052	Hessika hananay nu qopponta dishin wursetha xurumbay punetiza wode qiphida ayfey xeelliza mala issito hanana. Xurumbay punettana; hayqqida asay wooqontayta gididi dendana. Nunikka laamettana.
46015053	Dhayizayssi dhayontayssa may7anas, hayqqizay hayqqontayssa may7anas bessees.
46015054	Dhayizay dhayontaz, hayqqizay hayqqontaz may7iza wode “Hayqoy xooneti mitetides” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida qaalay polettana.
46015055	Hessathoka “Hayqo! Kase ne xoonoy awan dizee? Hayqokko! Ne izara caddiza yiishay awan dizee?” geetetti xaafettides.
46015056	Hayqoy izara dukkiza wolqay nagara; nagara wolqay woga.
46015057	Gido attin Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus xoono immiza Xoossas galatay gido.
46015058	Hessa gish ta siiqo ishato! Minni eqite. Ay miishanka yark yarkofte. Goda oosos inte daaburiza daabursay hada gidontayssa eridi ubba wode pacey baynda Godas ooththanas minetite.
46016001	Ha7i qasse ammanizaytas miisha keso gish Galatiyan diza Woosa Keeththatas tani immida azazo mala inteka ooththite.
46016002	Miishay kezanay buro ta hee biin gidonta mala intefe issi issi asi baasi diza mala saamintan saamintan issi gallas wogga wogga kessi wotho.
46016003	Ta he biza wode inte doorida asatas ta moyzo dabdaabe xaafa immada, isti inte immida imota Yerusalame gaththana mala haappe ta kiittana.
46016004	Ta istara baanas koshshizaz gidikko tanara baandettes.
46016005	Tani bashe Maqidooniyara aadhdha buussi taas attonta gish ta Maqidooniya gakkada heera inteko baana.
46016006	Ta awakka bishin tana ogey waayssonta mala inte tana maaddana mala bashe ta inte achchan gam7onta aggike.Oone erizay balgoy aadhdhana gakkanaas ta inte achchan balgoza aaththonta waaya aggana.
46016007	Ta inte achchan daro wode gam7anas koyiza gish intena coo ogera aadhdha bashe beyanas koyikke. Goda shene gidikko inte achchan adussa wode gam7anas koyays.
46016008	Gido attin Phenxaqoste geetettiza ba7aale gallas gakkanaas ta Efesoonen gam7ana.
46016009	Ta heen gam7ana gaasoyka taas heen gita ooso pengey doyettides shin tanara eqetizayti daroti deettes.
46016010	Ximtoosi inteko biikko izi ta mala Goda oosancha gidida gish izi baboy baynda daana mala inte iza maaddite.
46016011	Hessa gish oonikka iza kadhoppo. Izi taakko saron simmana mala inte maaddite. Nukka hara ammanizaytara iza yuussa naagon doos.
46016012	Nu isha Aphilosi hara ammanizaytara inteko baana mala keeha woossadis shin izi qas ha7i inteko baanas koybenna. Gido attin baana ogey giigishin izi inteko baana.
46016013	Beeggite! Ammanon minni eqqite; minnite; goobte.
46016014	Inte ooththizaz wursikka siiqon ooththite.
46016015	Ta ishato! Akaaya biittan koyro ammaniday Istifanooseso asa gididayssanne ammaniza asa maaddanas isti bana aaththi immidayssa inteka ereeta.
46016016	Ista misatiza asatasinne istara issife daaburiza asatas ubbas azazettana mala ta intena woossays.
46016017	Istifanoossi, Ferdonaxoossinne Akayqoosi yida gish ta daro ufayetays. Gaasoyka inte haan tanara doonta gish isti taas paccizaz wursi kunthida.
46016018	Ta woznanne inte wozna wursi shempisida. Hessa gish hessanta mala asata mule baloppite.
46016019	Iisiya biittan diza Woosa Keeththati intena saro geetes. Aqilaynne Phirsiqillaykka ista soon shiiqiza ammaniza asay Goda sunthan boncho sarota intes shiisheetes.
46016020	Haan ammanizayti wurikka intena saro geetes. Inte inte giddon issoy issara siiqo yeereteth yeeretite.
46016021	Hayssa sarokka ta kushera xaafiday tana Phawuloosa.
46016022	Goda dosontadey diikko izi qangetidade gido! Godo haaya!
46016023	Goda Yesusa kiyatethi intenara gido.
46016024	Ta siiqoy Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara intes ubbas gido. Amiin.
47001001	Xoossa shene mala Yesus Kirstoosas kiitettida Phawuloosappenne nu isha Ximtoosappe Qorontoosen diza Xoossa Woosa Keeththeys qasseka Akaaya biittan ammaniza kumeththa asas.
47001002	Nu Aawa Xoossafenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne saroy intes gido.
47001003	Maariza Aawasinne wursikka minthethiza nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossas galatay gido.
47001004	Nuka nu baggara Xoossafe demmida minotethan metotetizayta minthethanas dandayana mala nu meton izi nuna minthethes.
47001005	Kirstoosa waayey nu bolla daridayssa mala nuuska Kirstoosa baggara minthethoy darees.
47001006	Nu meton inte atotethinne minoteth demmeeta. Nuni metotishin qasse inteka kase ekkida metoza mala genci ekkidi minettandeta.
47001007	Nu meto inte nunara shaakki ekkida mala nunarakka inte minettanayssa nuni eriza gish nuus inte bolla diza ufayssi gita.
47001008	Ta ishato! Iisiya biittan nu bolla gakkida meto gish inte erana mala nu koyoos. He nu bolla gakkida metozi nu tokkanappe deexo gidida gish hayqqonta paxa daana giidi qoppibeekko.
47001009	Addafekka nu bolla hayqo pirday pirdetida misatides; hessi wurikka nu bolla gakkida gaasoy nuni hayqqidayta denthiza Xoossan ammanettanassafe attin nu wolqan ammanetonta mala hanides.
47001010	Izi nuna hessa mala qopponta hayqoppe ashshides. Ha7ikka wodeppekka izi nuna ashshanayssa nu ammanettos.
47001011	Inteka inte woossan nuna maaddite. Daro asa woossan nuus imettida imotassinne nu gish daroti Xoossa galatetes.
47001012	Histikko nu ceeqeteththi hayssa mala. Ha alamezan harappeka intessara nuussara diza gaytoteththan Xoossafe gidida geeshshatethaninne suuretethan nu de7idayssa nu woznay nuus markatees. Hessika asa cincateththan gidonta Xoossa kiyatethanna.
47001013	Inte nababidi eranas dandayonta miish nu intes xaafokko. Inte wursikka nababidi eranaysa nu eroos.
47001014	Inte nunan ceeqqettizayssa mala nuka intenan ceeqqettizayssa ha7i wursi eronta aggikkokka Goda Yesusi simmi yiza gallas wursikka erana.
47001015	Tani hayssa shaaka eriza gish nam7uto inte go7ettana mala koyro intena beyana qoppadis.
47001016	Hessika ta kase Maqidooniya bashe intena beyada Maqidooniyappekka simmashe inte achchara aadhdhada ta Yuhuda bishin inte tana maaddana mala qoppadisikkoshin.
47001017	Hayssi ta qofay intes ta lo7etha qopponta qofa misatizee? Woykko Ayzaabetas dose gididayssatho takka issito “Ero ero qasseka akay akay” giza misatizee?
47001018	Xoossi ammanettida Xoosse gidida mala nu intes yootiza qaalayka “Ee” giidi “Akay” gizaz gidenna.
47001019	Gaasoyka tana gidin woykko Silwaanoosenne Ximtoosa gidin nu intes sabakida Xoossa Naa Yesus Kirstoosi “Eenne akay” gidenna. Gido attin ubba wode izan “Ee” xalalay dees.
47001020	Xoossafe imettida hidotati wurikka “Ee” gididay izanna. Nuka iza baggara Xoossa bonchos “Amiin” gizay hessa gishassa.
47001021	Hessa gish inteka nunikka Kirstoosan minni eqana malanne ba oosos dooriday Xoossa.
47001022	Nu izayta gididayssa erisanas ba maatame nu bolla shocidaynne nu sinthafe demmana miishas Ayana waaseteth nu woznan woththiday iza.
47001023	Tani Qorontoose simmada inteko boonta aggiday intena mishisikke gaadakko; qasse hessi tumu gidonta wordo gidikko Xoossi ta bolla markato.
47001024	Inte ammanon eqqida gish intena ufayssanas nu intenara ooththana attin inte ammano bolla godatanas gidenna.
47002001	Ta intena mishisanas koyonta gish qasseka inteko biikke gaada qofa qachadis.
47002002	Ta intena mishisidaz gidikkoka mishetida intefe aadhi ufaysizay taas haray ooni dizee?
47002003	Ta kase intes xaafiday ta inteko biza wode tana ufayssanas bessiza asati tana mishisoppeto gaada xaafadis. Gaasoyka ta ufayetikko intes ubbaska ufays gidanayssa ta ammanays.
47002004	Ta intes hessatho xaafishin ta woznan daro miishaynne daro qofay kumi dishin daro afunxashe xaafadis. Hessaka ta ooththiday ta intena daro siiqizayssa inte erana mala gaada attin intena mishisanas gidenna.
47002005	Oonikka ase qohida gidikko gujecho gidonta mala he qohidadey tana xalala gidonta guuthara gidikkoka intenaka wursi qohides.
47002006	Hessa mala asas daro asay iza bolla woththida qixaatey izaades gidana.
47002007	He addey keehi muuzotidi hidota qanxonta mala inte hessades atto iza giidi minthethanas bessees.
47002008	Hessathoka inte iza siiqizayssa zaarethidi iza bessana mala ta intena woossays.
47002009	Ta hayssa intes xaafiday inte intena gakkiza paace xoonidi ubban inte azazettizakkonne eranasa.
47002010	Inte atto gizades takka atto gays. Qasse ta tumappe atto gaanazi diza gidikko Kirstoosa sinthan ta atto gizay inte gish gaada.
47002011	Ta hessatho ooththizay Xala7ey geliza xoo7e demmoonta mala gaadakko! Nu iza gene qofa balokko.
47002012	Tani Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas Xiro7aada bida wode Goday taas ooso oge doyides.
47002013	Gido attin tani ta isha Titoosa heen demmoonta aggida gish ta woznay shemponta ixida gish isti tana heeppe moyzin Maqidooniya dere badis.
47002014	Gido attin Kirstoosa baggara ubba wode nuna xoono ogen kaalethi yuushizanne ba lo7o eratetha nu baggara ubba soon qoncisiza Godas galatay gakko.
47002015	Gaasoyka nuni dhayanaytassinne attanaytas giddon Kirstoosa baggara Xoossas shiiqida sawo tunnu giza exane mala.
47002016	Dhayanaytas nuni wodhiza xinqo. Atanaytas qasse hayqoppe gede de7oso efiza de7o sawo. Histin hayssas bessizadey oonee?
47002017	Nuni Wodhe demmanas giidi Xoossa qaala shaqaca mala walakerethidi bayziza daro asata mala gidokko. Gido attin Xoossafe kiitettida suure asa mala gididi Kirstoosan Xoossa sinthan suure yootos.
47003001	Nuni ha7i nurka nuna zaaridi galatinoo? Woykko hara asata mala intes gidin woykko intefe haa nuus xaafettida galata dabdaabe koshshizeshaa?
47003002	Inte qasse asi wuri erizaynne nababetiza nu wozna garsan xaafettida dabdaabeta.
47003003	Inte qalamen xaafettidayta gidonta de7o Xoossa Ayanan xaafettidayta; qasseka shuchcha bolla wooceti xaafettidayta gidonta asa woznan xaafettidaytanne inte nunan go7ettida Kirstoosas qonce dabdaabeta.
47003004	Kirstoosa baggara nuus Xoossa bolla diza ammanoy hessa misatees.
47003005	Nuna hessas gaththiday Xoossafe attin nuni nu wolqan ooththidos giza miishi issinaka baawa.
47003006	Hessika pidalen xaafettida wogan gidonta Ayanan xaafida ooratha caaqo qaala oosanchata nu gidana mala ooththides. Gaasoyka pidalen xaafettida wogay wodhees; Ayanay gidikko de7o immees.
47003007	Hessa gish Isra7eele nayti iza ayfeson diza boncho gaasoteththan Muse ayfeso tishshi histi xeeloy ista xoonana gakkanaas hessi guyeppe dhayanayssinne shuchcha bolla pidalen wooceti xaafetidi hayqo oosos gididayssi bonchon qoncizayssa gidikko;
47003008	histin Ayana oosos waanidi hessafe aadhdhiza bonchoy denee?
47003009	Asi izan pirdetiza oosoy hessa mala bonchettizayssa gidikko asi izan xilliza oosoy hessafe keehi aadhdhiza bonchoy izas waani deenee?
47003010	Hayssafe kase bonchettidayssi hara izappe aadhdhiza bonchoy dizayssara giigissishin bonchoy bayndayssa gidides.
47003011	Dhumi dhumi bizayssas hessa mala bonchoy diikko mernas minni eqqi daanayssas hessafe keehi aadhdhiza bonchoy waani dennee?
47003012	Hessa gish hessa mala hidotay nuus diza gish nuni xalatethan hasayos.
47003013	Isra7eele nayti Muse ayfesoy xoliqizayssa aggi aggi bishin isti wursetha beyonta mala izi ba ayfeso goozida Muse mala gidokko.
47003014	Gido attin kase gal7a caaqo qaalay nababetishin he wode goossazi hach gakkanaas kichchonta gish ista woznay doccida mala dees. He goossay ha7ikka kichchibenna. Izikka kichchanay Kirstoosan xalala.
47003015	Hach gakkanaassikka Muse maxaafati nababetiza wode he wode goossay ha7ikka ista wozna goozi oykkees.
47003016	Gido attin issadey Godakko simmiza wode goossazi qaareti kichchees.
47003017	Goday Ayana. Goda Ayanay dizason aylleteth deenna.
47003018	Nunikka Goda boncho mastoote mala xolqettishe iza misatanas ha bonchofe gede hara bonchon laamettana. Hessika Ayana gidida Godappe.
47004001	Xoossa maarotetha daroppe dendidayssan hayssi ha oosozi nuus diza gish nuni hidota qanxokko.
47004002	Gido attin geemara haniza yeelasiza yo7ota nu aggidos. As baleththokko; Xoossa qaala wordora walakkokko. Hessa histanappe tumu yo7ota qoncera yootishe asi wurikka nu gizayssa ekkana mala nunatetha Xoossa sinth shiishoos.
47004003	Nu Mishiraachcho qaalay gordettikkokka izi gordettiday dhayanaytassa.
47004004	Xoossa leemiso gidida Kirstoosa boncho Mishiraachcho qaala poo7oza ha alame asay beyonta mala hayssa ha alameza Xoossi ammanonta asa wozna muumisides.
47004005	Nuni Yesus Kirstoosi Goda gididayssa sabakoos attin nuna sabakkokko. Nuka nu baggara Yesusa gish intes ooththizadenta gididos.
47004006	Kirstoosa sinthan Xoossi ba boncho eratetha poo7o nuus immanas “Poo7oy dhuman poo7o” gida Xoossi ba poo7o nu woznan poo7isides.
47004007	Gido attin hayssi gita wolqay nuus Xoossafe imettides attin nuuppe gidontayssa bessana mala hayssi boncho miishay nunan oto misatizayta giddon dees.
47004008	Awa baggarakka nuna sugikkokka nuni tinth gi meqokko. Nuus yo7oy tippi giikkokka hidota qanxokko.
47004009	Nu goodetikkokka wora wodhdhi attokko. Isti nuna shoci gendersikkoka nu dhayokko.
47004010	Yesusa de7oy nu asatethan qoncana mala nuni iza hayqo ubba wode tookki yuuyoos.
47004011	Yesusa de7oy hayqqiza nu asatethan qoncana mala paxa diza nuni ubba wodekka Yesusa gishas hayqos aadhdhi imettoos
47004012	Hessa gish nu hayqos aadhdhi imettishin inte qas de7on gakkeeta.
47004013	Kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala “Ta ammanida gish haasayadis” geetettidaysa nuka hessa he ammano Ayanan ammaniza gish hasayos.
47004014	Gaasoyka Goda Yesus Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthidayssi nunakka izara issife denthidi intenara ba sinth shiishanayssa nu eroos.
47004015	Daro asa gakkishe diza kiyatethi Xoossa bonchos galata bolla galata gujjana mala hayssi wurikka intena go7anas hanides.
47004016	Hessa gish nu hidota qanxokko; nuus kare bagga asatethay dhay dhay biikkoka nuus gaaththa bagga asatethay gallas gallas ooraxi ooraxi baasi.
47004017	Hessas ha7i guutha wodes nuna gakkiza waayey izara giiganas dandayonta mernas gidiza bonchon nuna gaththana.
47004018	Hessa gish nu tishshi histi xeellizay ha7i ayfen beettiza miisha bolla gidonta ha7i ayfen beettonta miisha bolla dees. Ha7i betizayssi izi ha7is xalala. Ha7i ayfen beettontays gidikko izi mernassa.
47005001	Nuni izan biitta bolla diza dunkaney laalettikkokka asa kushen gidonta Xoossa kushen oosettida merna keeththi nuus salon dizayssa nu eroos.
47005002	He wodey gakkanaas nu keeththa saloyssa may7anas nu laamoti naagos.
47005003	Tumappe hessa nu may7idappe guye kallottokko.
47005004	Nuni hayssa ha dunkanezan diza wode ubban izi deexxiza gish daabura piidhi goos. Hessas gaasoyka hayqqizayssi de7on laamettana mala nuni salon daana soza may7ana attin nuuppe qaarettana mala nu koyokko.
47005005	Hessas nuna giigissiday Xoossa. Buro yaanayssas waase gidana mala nuus ba Ayana immiday iza.
47005006	Nuni ashon diza wode Godappe haakki dizayssa erikkoka izan ammanettidi doos.
47005007	Nuni diza duussay Godan ammanidi attin ayfen be7on gidenna.
47005008	Nuni ashoppe shaaketidi Godara duus dooranayssa ta sidhonta yootays.
47005009	Hessa gish nu ashon diikko woykko ashoppe shaaketikkokka nuus waanna qofay Goda ufayso.
47005010	Nuni wurikka Kirstoosa pirda wombora sinthi shiiqanayssi attenna; nuuppe issoy issoy biitta bolla ba ooththida iita gidin woykko lo7o gidin ba ooso mala bessiza waaga ekkana.
47005011	Hessa gish Godas babo guussi ay guussakkonne nu eriza gish asay nu yootizayssa ero gi ekkana mala ooththanas daaburoos. Nuni oonantakkonne Xoossa achchan qonce. Qasseka inte woznanka qonce gididayssa ta ammanays.
47005012	Ta hessa gizay nuna inte sinthan galatanas gidonta dishin inte nunan ceeqqettana mala attin woznappe gidonta ayfen beettiza miishan ceeqqettizaytas inte zaaro immanas dandayana mala gaada gays.
47005013	Nu goosh gidikko Xoossa gish giidi gooyidos. Erata gidikkoka intes giidikko!
47005014	Kirstoosi ubbas issito hayqqoyssanne haray wurikka izara issife hayqqidayssa nu erida gish Kirstoosa siiqoy nuna wolqara oosises.
47005015	Shempora paxa dizayti wurikka he hayqqidayssassinne hayqoppe dendidayssas daana malappe attin hayssafe guye isti baasi doonta mala Kirstoosi ubbas hayqqides.
47005016	Hessa gish hayssafe guye nuni oona assikka asho ayfen xeellokko. Nuni hayssafe kase Kirstoosa asho ayfen xeelliday coo mela asa mala xeello, gidikkoka hayssafe guye sinthas gidikko hessatho xeello.
47005017	Hessa gish oonikka Kirstoosa bagga gidikko izi ooratha medhetetha. Kase ceega medhetethay aadhdhides. He iza kichchosan hara ooratha medhetethi gelides.
47005018	Hessi wuri haniday izi nuna banara Kirstoosa baggara maqaynthidinne maqayntho ooso nuus immida Xoossana.
47005019	Hessika Xoossi Kirstoosa baggara hanko alame asa wursikka banara maqayinthides guussa. Isti qohozakka qoodibenna. Nuuska nu asa Godara maqayinthana qaala immides.
47005020	Xoossi nu baggara as xeygiza gish nuni qasse Kirstoosa ogathata. Hessa gish “Inte Xoossara maqaynite!” giidi nu intena Kirstoosa sunthan woossos.
47005021	Nuni Kirstoosa baggara Xoossa xilloteth gishetti ekkizayta gidana mala Xoossi iza bolla nagaray baynda Kirstoosi izi nu nagara tookkana mala ooththides.
47006001	Nuni Xoossara ooththizayta gidida mala inte ekkida Xoossa kiyatetha coo mela ashshofte gishe nu intena woossos.
47006002	Xoossi “Tani taas giigida gallas nena siyadis! Attiza gallas ta nena maaddadis!” giza gish lo7o wodey hekko ha7i! Atetha gallassikka ha7ikko!
47006003	Nu oosoy leqetonta mala ay wodekka oonaska nuni dhuphe gidokko.
47006004	Hessafe aaththidi waayenne meto un7oka dandayan Xoossas ooththiza asata mala ay ogerakka nunatetha aaththi immos.
47006005	Nuni Xoossas ooththizayta gididayssa bessizay garafeteththan, qashetethan, hirgan, daaburi ooson, dhisikko dhayoninne gafanna.
47006006	Hessathoka geeshshatethan, eratethan, dandayan, kiyatethan, Xillo Ayana kaaloninne qoodheppe qommon gidonta siiqon,
47006007	tuma qaalaninne Xoossa wolqanna. Nu Izan gede oli xooniza ola miishinne kametti attiza gondalley xillotetha.
47006008	Bonchos gidin woykko kawushshas, qoodhetanas woykko galatanas nuni giigetidayta. Nuni tumanchata shin ase baleththizayta geetettidos.
47006009	Nuni eretidayta shin eretontayta gididos. Isti hayqqidaytakko gishin nuni paxa doos. Asay nuna bukki bukkinka nu hayqqibeekko.
47006010	Muuzoy nuna gakkikkoka ubba wode ufayetoos. Nu manqokko shin daro manqota dure Kessoos. Nuus aykkoyka bayndayta shin wurikka nuus dees.
47006011	Inteno Qorontoosen dizayto! Ta kase intes qonccen yootadis. Nuni nu wozna intena wursi bessidos.
47006012	Inte qasse nuna inte siiqo bessanas uuzetideta attin nu intena nu siiqo bessanas uuzetibekko.
47006013	Aaway ba naas yootiza mala takka intes ane yootays. Nuni nu wozna keehi doyidi nu qofa intes qoncisoyssatho inteka nuus hessatho qoncisite.
47006014	Ammanonta asara giigay baynda issifetethan oyketofte. Xillotethinne nagaray waani issifettanas dandayizee? Poo7oynne dhumay issife waani daana dandayizee?
47006015	Kirstoosinne Dabuloosi waani gaagganas dandayizoo? Ammanizadey ammanontadera aazan laagettanas dandayizee?
47006016	Xoossa Woosa Keeththas eeqatara aaza gaaggoy dizee? Xoossika “Tani ta duussaso ta dereza giddon ooththana; takka istara daana; istasika Goda gidana. Istika ta dereta gidana” giidi kase yootida mala nuni issoy issoy de7o Xoossa Keeththata.
47006017	Goday “Inte ista giddofe shaaketidi kezite! Tuna miish bochchofte; takka intena ekkana.
47006018	Ta intes Aawa gidana; inteka taas attuma naytanne maca nayta gidandeta” gees wursikka dandayiza Goday.
47007001	Hessa gish ta siiqoto! Hayssi hidotay nuus imettida gish ashonne ayana tunisiza ay miishafekka ane nuna geeshshoos. Xoossas yashshan nu geeshshatetha ane kumeth histoos.
47007002	Inte nuna ufayssan mokki ekkite. Nuni oonakka qohibeekko; oonakka naaqibeekko; oona go7akka nuus baleththi ekkibeekko.
47007003	Tani hessatho gizay inte bolla pirdanas gidenna. Hayssafe kase ta intes yootida mala inte nu woznan deeta. Hessa gish hayqonka gidin paxanka ubba wode nu intefe shaaketokko.
47007004	Taas inte bolla diza ammanoynne ceeqeteththi daro gita. Ta intenan minetays. Nuna gakkiza meto ubban tani keeha ufayetays.
47007005	Nuni Maqidooniya gakkida wodekka dumma dumma baggara metoy nuna gakkides attin nuni aykkokka shempo demmibeekko. Nuus soora hirgay, karera qas ooshi dees.
47007006	Gido attin muuzotidayta minthethiza Goday Titoosa yuussan nuna minthethides.
47007007	Nuni minetiday iza yuussan xalala gidonta dishin inte iza minthethidayssa nu gujji siyida gishassa. Inte tana laamotidayssa taas qadhetizayssa qoppizayssakka izi nuus yootin siyada tani daro ufayetadis.
47007008	Tani hayssafe kase intes xaafida kiitay intena mishisida gidikkoka he kiita xaafida gish tani hessatho aazas xaafadina gaada modhetikke. Modhetikkokka ta modhetanay guutha wodes inte tana mishisida gishassa.
47007009	Ha7i gidikko ta ufayetays. Tani ufayetida gaasoy tani intena michisida gish gidonta inte he miishappe dendidayssan maarotethan gelidi laamettida gishassa. Hessa gish inte mishetikkokka Xoossa shene mala gidida gish nuni intena aykkokka qohibeekko guussa.
47007010	Xoossa shene mala gidida mishetethi gede maareti attanaso gaththees. Hessaska modhetethi deenna; woznappe gidonta maareteth gidikko hayqon gaththees.
47007011	Hayssi inte muuzotethay Xoossa shene mala gidida gish hessi ay mala minotethan, ay mala oysha zaaron, ay mala elle hanqetethan, ay mala yashshatethan, ay mala laamotethan, ay mala lo7o amon, ay mala muran intena gaththidakkonne ane inte woznan yuushi qoppite. Inte qasse hanida ubbanka he hanozappe geesh gididayssa markasideta.
47007012	Hessa gish ta intes xaafidayssi inte nuus ay mala ammanettizaytakkone inte intena Xoossa sinthan beyana malappe attin qohidade gishshinne qohetidade gish gaada gidenna.
47007013	Nuni minetidayssafe bollara Titoosi demmida ufayssan daro ufayetidos. Nuni ufayetidaykka inte wurikka Titoosa minthethida gishshinne iza wozna shempisida gishassa.
47007014	Tani intenan ceeqqettizayssa kase Titoosas yoota wothadis. Inteka tana yeelasibeykketa. Ubba wode ta intes tuma xalala yootashe days. Hessika nuni inte gish Titoosas yootida yo7oy tumu giidi ammanettides.
47007015	Inte wurikka azazettizayta gididayssa, yashshatethaninne kokkorishe inte iza mokki ekkidayssa Titoosi qoppi ekkidi izi intena siiqizayssas zaway baawa.
47007016	Takka ubba baggara intenan ammanettanas dandayida gish ta daro ufayetadis.
47008001	Ta ishato! Xoossi Maqidooniyan diza ammaniza asas immida kiyatetha inte eranayssa ta koyays.
47008002	Isti daro metoti dishe daro ufayetida. Keehi manqota gidikkoka daro kiyattida.
47008003	Isti baasi dandayettizayssa malanne baasi dandayettizayssafekka aaththi immidayssa ta ista gish markatays.
47008004	Yuhudan diza ammanizaytas maado immanas diggettonta mala nuna keehi woossida.
47008005	Isti nuni qoppidayssafe bollara aaththi ooththida. Isti koyro bana Godas immida. Zaardika Xoossa shene mala banaka nuus immida.
47008006	Hayssa oosoza koyro Titoosi doommida gish ha7ikka hayssa maado imoza izi polana mala nu iza woossidos.
47008007	Inte ammanon, haasayan, eratethan, mino ooson, inte nuna siiqiza siiqon, ubba yo7on aadheta. Hessathoka kiyatetha oosonka aadhdhizayta gidite.
47008008	Ta hessa gizay intena coo mela azazanas gidenna. Gido attin hanko hara asay minni immizayssa intenara gaththa beyshin inte siiqoy tumu gididayssa shaaka erenasa.
47008009	Inte nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyateth ereeta.
47008010	Hayssa ha hanozan taas lo7o gidi bettida zore ta intes immays. Zilaythi inte imo xalala gidonta dishin immanas koyroppe qoppiday intena.
47008011	Hessa gish inte immanas koydayssi polettana mala intes diza mala kase inte qoppidayssa ha7i ooththite.
47008012	Asi immanas woznappe koykko izaadey kiyatethan immizayssi ekketizay asi baasi dizaari mala immikko attin baasi bayndayssafe immishin gidenna.
47008013	Ta hayssatho gizay inte wurikka gina gidana mala attin inte imon waayetishin harati shempana mala gaada gidenna.
47008014	Inte waayetishin ista miishay inte meto ashshana mala ha7i qasse inte miishay ista meto ashsho. Hessa malan inte giddon ginatethi daana.
47008015	Hessika “Daro shiishshidades wodhdhibenna; guuth shiishshidadesikka paccibenna” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala.
47008016	Tani intes qoppizayssa mala Titoosaykka intes woznappe qoppana mala ooththida Goday galattetto.
47008017	Titoosi inteko bizay barka ba qofan ufayssanpe attin nuni iza woossida gish xalala gidenna.
47008018	Mishiraachcho qaala ooson Woosa Keeththatan ubban dosettida ishaza nu izara gaththi yeddoos.
47008019	Hessafekka bollara hayssi nu ishay nuni hayssa lo7o oosoza Goda bonchos ooththishininne nuni ooththanas koyizayssa izas qoncisishin izi nunara biidi ooththanas Woosa Keeththati dooridade.
47008020	Hayssa kiyateth imettida miishaza nuni oykkishin nu bolla aykko boroykka gakkonta mala nuni naagetos.
47008021	Gaasoyka nuus waanna qofay Goda sinthan xalala gidonta asa sinthanka lo7o ooththanassa.
47008022	Daro wode daro miishan paacetidi mino gidida nu isha Titoosara nu iza yeddiday hessassa. Izas inte bolla diza ammanoy daro gita gidida gish izi ha7i intena maaddanas kaseppe aaththi koyees.
47008023	Inte Titoosa gish eranas koykko izi intena maaddanas tanara ooththizade. Izara issife biza hanko ishati qasse Woosa Keeththati ba gish yeddida Kirstoosa bonchos eqqidayta.
47008024	Hessa gish inte istas inte siiqo bessite. Inte hessatho histikko inte siiqoynne nu intenan ceeqqettiza ceeqeteththay coo mela gidontayssa inte Woosa Keeththatas bessandeta.
47009001	Yuhudan diza ammanizaytas kessiza miisha gish ta intes xaafanas koshshenna.
47009002	Intes Akaayan diza asas maaddana lo7o qofay dizayssa ta erada “Akaaya asay zilaythafe oykidi maados giigettides” gaada Maqidooniya asas yootadis. Harappeka inte maaddanas koyda suure qofay darota lo7o oosos dentheththides.
47009003	Hayssa ha hanozan nu intenan ceeqqettizayssi coo mela gidonta mala hayta nu ishata ta kiittadis. Inteka ta Kase intes gida mala naageti uttite.
47009004	Maqidooniya asati tanara inteko bishin inte giigetonta dizayssa beekko nuni intenan ceeqqettizayssan yeelatana. Inte qasse daro yeelatana.
47009005	Hessa gish inte kase immana gidayssa kasetidi giigissana mala intena qofisanas gaada hayti ishati taappe kasetidi inteko gakkana mala koshshizayssi taas beettides. Hessathoka tani biza wode inte immanayssi giigi uttidaz gidana. Inteka immanayssi wolqara gidonta dosan gididayssa bessana.
47009006	“Guuth zerida asi guuth shiishana; daro zeridadey qas daro kath shiishana” giza qaala yuushi qoppite.
47009007	Xoossi dosizay ba dosan immizade gidida gish issi issi asi immanas ba woznan qoppidaro ufayssan immo attin modhetishe coo wolqara immofo.
47009008	Ubba wode haniza ubban inte intes gidi palahidi hara lo7o oosos gidana mala Xoossi intes ba anjo gujji immanas dandayees.
47009009	Hessika “Manqotas kiyatethan immides; iza Xillotethi mernas deyana” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettida mala.
47009010	Zerizades zerethi, maanas kath immiza Goday inte zeriza zeretha izi keehi darsi immana. Izi inte kiyatetha oosoza ayfe intes darsana.
47009011	Inte kiyatethan immoyssi nu baggara ista gakkiza asati Xoosse galatana mala inte ubba wode kiyatethi immana mala Xoossi intena ubbasora duresana.
47009012	Hayssi inte immiza kiyatetha oosoy ammanizayta meto maadoppe bollara asay Xoossa darsi galatana mala ooththes.
47009013	Hayssi inte kiyatetha oosozi inte Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalan ammanidi ammanettidayta gididayssa, istasinne harataska inte kiyateth immidayssa erissizaz gidida gish isti wurikka Xoosse galatana.
47009014	Isti qasse Xoossi intes immida gita kiyatetha geedon intena siiqiza gish intes woossana.
47009015	Asa qaalan qoncisethafe bolla gidida Xoossa imotetha gish Xoossi galattetto.
47010001	Ta Phawuloosi intenara dishin izi ashike geetettadis shin ta intefe haakkishin qas inte bolla xalidade geetettida ta Phawuloosi Kirstoosa ashketethaninne iza lo7etethan intena woossays.
47010002	Tani intena woossizay ta inteko hee biza wode inte tana xalatethan hasayissonta aggana mala. Nuni asho qofan simeretiza mala nuna xeelliza issi issi asata sinthan tani xalatethan haasayanas koyays.
47010003	Nuni dizay hayssa alameza bolla gidikkoka nu oletizay ha alameza asa ola mala gidenna.
47010004	Nu ola miishayka ola miixa laallanas dandayiza Xoossa wolqay dizayssa attin hayssa alameza ola toora gidenna.
47010005	Xoosse eronta mala dhuphe gidi dendiza palamanne otoreteth nu laalloos. Asa qofa wursi di7i ekkidi Kirstoosas azazettana mala ooththoos.
47010006	Inte azazetethi poletiza wode azazettonta ay miisheka qaxayanas nuni giigeti uttidos.
47010007	Inte xeellizay kare baggara beettizazi xalala. Oonikka tani Kirstoosasko gi ammanettikko zaarethi qoppo. Nuka iza malaka Kirstoosayta gididayssa izaadey woznan woththo.
47010008	Goday nuus immida maata gish tani izan ceeqqikkokka yeelatikke. Hessi maatay taas imettiday nuni intena minisanas attin laallanas gidenna.
47010009	Tani ha kiitan intena babisos ooththiza misatoppo.
47010010	Oone erizay issi issi asati “Phawuloosa kiitati deexxonne wolqama; gido attin izi nu achchan diza wode izi laafa; Iza haasayayka leqettidazakko!” gizazi gidana.
47010011	Hessatho giza asati nuni hahon dishe xaafi kiittidayssassinne qas intenara dishe nu ooththizayssa giddon aykko dummateththi bayndayssa shaakki eretto.
47010012	Gidikkoka barka bana nashshiza issi issi asatara nuna nurka gaththi xeellanas woykko istara nuna giigissanas xalokko. Isti qasse barka bana banara gaththi xeelliza gish isti yuushi qoppizayta gidettenna.
47010013	Nu qasse inteko gakkana gakkanaas Xoossi nuus immida ooso zawan simeretos attin wogappe aaththi ceeqqettizayta gidokko.
47010014	Inte qasse nu ooththizason diza gish Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaala tamarsanas nu inteko bida wode nuni hee nu zawappe aadhdhibeekko.
47010015	Hessa gish Xoossi nuus immida zawappe aadhdhidi hara asata ooththon gelidi wogappe aadhdhi ceeqqettokko. Hessafe bollara inte ammanoy diccana malanne nu oosoykka Xoossi nuus immida zawan inte giddon aakkanayssa naagon doos.
47010016	Hessa gish nu hara asi ooththiza zawa aadhdhidi kasetidi ooththettida ooson ceeqqettonta dishe intefe henin diza deretas Mishiraachcho qaala yootanas dandayoos.
47010017	Gido attin Xoossa Maxaafay “Ceeqqettiza asi Godan ceeqqetto” gides.
47010018	Asi galattettanas dandayizay Goday gaalatikko attin barka bana gaalatin gidenna.
47011001	Ta guutha eeyateththa inte dandayana mala ta hidota ooththoyssa hayana dandayite.
47011002	Issi gelonta geeshsha geela7oya ba geela7ottethan issi azinas giigiza mala takka intena Kirstoosas giigissida gish ta inte gish lo7o qofa qoppays.
