47011003	Shooshay ba genera Hewaano baleththidayssatho oone erizay inte qofaykka mooretin Kirstoosas diza suurenne geesh gidida ammanetetha intena aggagandeto gaada ta hirgays.
47011004	Issi asi inteko yiidi nu kase intes sabakidayssa gidonta hara Yesusa sabakikko woykko kase ekkida Ayana gidonta hara ayana ekkikko woykko kase inte ekkida Mishiraachcho qaala gidonta hara Mishiraachcho qaala ekkiko coo mela inte xoonetideta guussa.
47011005	Gidikkoka tani hayta gita Hawaaretappe aykonka guuxiza taas misatenna.
47011006	Haasayan cinca gidonta aggikkokka taas eray paccibenna. Hessa nuni intes dumma dumma ogera qoncen ersidos.
47011007	Tani intes Xoossa Mishiraachcho qaala damozay baynda sabakidaynne intena dhoqu histanas tani tana kawushshidayssi oone erizay taas nagara gidi qoodetideshaa?
47011008	Intes ooththanas hanko Woosa Keeththatappe tani maado ekkidayssi istafe shiisha ekkadakko.
47011009	Tani intenara dishin tana metin Maqidooniyappe yida ishati taas koshshizazan tana maaddida gish oonaska tooho gidabeekke. Hanno gakkanaaska ay miishanka intes tooho gidabeekke. Sinthafekka ta intes tooho gidikke.
47011010	Kirstoosa tumatethi tanan diza gish tani ceeqqettonta mala tana diggizay Akaaya deren oonikka baawa.
47011011	Hessas gaasoy aazee? Tani intena siiqonta gishee? Ta intena siiqizayssa Xoossi erees.
47011012	Heyti wordo Hawaareti “Nuka istatho ooththoos” gishe isti ceeqqettizayssa digganas ta ha7i ooththizayssatho sinthafekka ooththana.
47011013	Heytanta mala asati Kirstoosa Hawaareta misatanas barka bana laammiza wordancha Hawaaretanne baleththiza oosanchata.
47011014	Hessika daro malalisizazi gidenna. Xala7eykka bana poo7o kiitancha misatisidi laamettes.
47011015	Hessa gish heyti Xala7e oosanchati hanko xillo oosanchata misatanas barka banateththa laammikko aykkokka malalisenna. Wursethan isti ba ooso waaga ekkana.
47011016	Oonaska tani eeya gididazi misatoppo gaada qasseka yootadis. Ta istas eeya misatikkokka guutha wodes ta ceeqqettana mala tana inte eeya mala qoodite.
47011017	Tani hessatho duuna kuntha haasayizay Goda shene mala gidonta eeya asa mala gidada.
47011018	Daroti ba asho qofan ceeqqettizayssaththo takka ceeqqettana.
47011019	Inte qas yuushi qoppizayta gidida mala hanko eeyata ufayssanas dandayeeta.
47011020	Hessathoka oonikka intena baasi aylleskonne oonikka intena bonqikko, oonikka intenan go7ettikko, oonikka intena leqqikko, oonikka intes shagalan baqqikko inte dandayeeta.
47011021	Izi tana yeelasizazi gidikkoka hayta ha hanota ooththanas nuni mino gidontayssa tani intes qoncisays. Gido attin oonikka ceeqqettanas xaalikko takka izatho xaalada ceeqqettana. Tani hessa gizay ha7ikka eeya gidada.
47011022	Heytanti isti Ibraawe asatee? Takka Ibraawekko! Isti Isra7eele asatee? Takka Isra7eele asakko! Isti Abrahaame zerethatee? Takka Abrahaame zerethikko!
47011023	Heytanti Kirstoosa oosanchatee? Tani qas istafe bollara Kirstoosas ooththizade. Ta hessatho gizay gooshsha mala gidadakko! Tani istafe daro wode ooson daaburadis; daro wode qashetadis; daro wode garafettadis; daro wode hayqos gakkadis.
47011024	Heedzdzu tammanne uddufun xuurqafe ichashuto Ayhudatan garafettadis.
47011025	Heedzdzuto durqan bukettadis; issito shuchchan cadettadis; heedzdzuto markabe giddon ta bolla metoy gakkides; issi omarsinne issi gallas abba giddon gam7adis.
47011026	Ta hammutha daro gaason haaththa kixxaynne di7oy, pangatappe metoy tana gakkides. Ta qommo Ayhuda asappenne Ayzaabetappe waayeynne metoy tana gakkides. Katamanka bazzonka abba bollanka tana metoy gakides; hessathoka wordo ammanizaytappe metoy tana gakkides.
47011027	Daro ooththa daaburadis; daro wode dhiskabeekke; gafaninne haaththa saamon waayetadis; daro wode miza kathi taas dhayides, meeggoynne kalloteth tana gakkides.
47011028	Tani hara miishi qopponta, gallas gallas tana qoppisizay Woosa Keeththata ubba gish qoppiza qofa.
47011029	Issi asi daaburishin tani izara daaburonta ayde aggadinaa? Issi asi nagaran kundishin ta qasse iza hanqettonta ayde aadhdha erazinaa?
47011030	Ceeqqettanas koshshizazi gidikko ta ceeqqettanay ta daburancha gididayssa tana bessiza miishan ceeqqettays.
47011031	Mernas galattettida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossi ta wordotontayssa erees.
47011032	Tani Demasqo kataman dishin kawo Arsixosiyossappe garsara dere ayssizayssi tana oykkanas koydi he katama pengeta zabetan naagissides.
47011033	Gidikkoka asay tana keeshen yeggidi he katama ginbe maskotera duge woththi yeddin kessa ekka attadis.
47012001	Ceeqeteththan aynne go7ay baynda agikkoka ceeqqettanas koshshikko Goday taas qoncisi immidayssaninne izi bessida ajjutan ta ceeqqettana.
47012002	Kirstoosas gidida issade ta erays. He addezi tammanne oyddu laythafe kase heedzdzantho salo ekketi bides. (Izi ekkettiday ba ashora gidin woykko ashora gidonta aggin erikke shin Xoossi qasse eres.)
47012003	Gidikkoka izi ba ashozara biin woykko mela biin ta erike. Xoossi qasse erees.
47012004	Izaadeyka pude Gannate ekketidi asa qaalan qoncisanassinne asi gaanas dandayontaz izi siydes.
47012005	Tani hessa mala asan ceeqqettays. Ta hu7es gidikko ta dabursafe hara ta izan ceeqqettana miishi taas deenna.
47012006	Histin tani tuma haasayiza gish ceeqqettanas koyikkokka ta eeya gidikke. Gido attin oonikka ta bolla ba beyizazappenne taappe siyizayssafe bollara qopponta mala gaada ceeqqettanappe naagetays.
47012007	Hayta taas qoncida gita hanota gaason tani otoretonta mala ta asateth aguntha mala caddiza sakoy taas imettides. Hessika Xala7eppe kiitetidi tana cachchan waayssidi ta ceeqqettonta mala diggees.
47012008	Hayssi tana waayssizaysi taappe kichchana mala tani Goda heedzdzuto woossadis.
47012009	Gido attin Goday qasse “Ta wolqay kumeth gidi qoncanay ne daabursan gidida gish ta kiyatethi nees gidana” gides. Hessa gish Kirstoosa wolqay ta bolla gidana mala ay wodeppekka bollara tani daaburshin he wode ufayssan ceeqqettanas dosays.
47012010	Tani wolqa demmizay daaburiza wode gidida gish ta Kirstoosa gish daaburishin, cayettishin, metotishin, goodetishin, muuzotishin tana ufaysses.
47012011	Tani eeya asa mala haasayadis! Tani hessatho haasayana mala ooththiday intenakko! Inte tana galatanas besseesikko shin ta oonakkonne eretontade gidikkoka hanko gita geetettida Hawaaretappe tani aazanka guuxikke.
47012012	Tani tumu Hawaare gididayssa erissiza hanoti ta intenara dashe dandayan polida oosota. Heytikka malatata, gita ooratha miishetanne malalisiza oosota.
47012013	Tani intes tooho gidonta aggorippe attin hanko hara Woosa Keeththatappe intena aazan paccisadinaa? Hessika mooro gidikko inte tana maarite.
47012014	Tani he inteko baanas giigettishin hayssi heedzdzantho. Tani intes toho gidanas koyikke. Tani intena koyays attin inte miisha koyikke. Aawati naytas miisha shiisheetes attin nayti Aawatas miisha shiishshi erettenna.
47012015	Tani inte gish tanaka taas dizaz wursa intes aaththa immidako tana daro ufaysses. Histin tani intena hayssa mala daro siiqishin inte qas tana waani guuthara siiqetii?
47012016	Ay gidikkoka ta intes tooho gidabeekke shin intes ta intena coo genen baleththa oykkidazi misatees.
47012017	Ta inteko kiita yeddida asataappe issade baggarakka intefe go7ettadinaa?
47012018	Titoosi inteko baana mala ta iza woossadis. Hessa nu ishazaka izara gaththa yeddadis. Histin Titoosi intefe aykko go7ettidee? Taninne izi intes ooththiday issi woznan gidenee? Kase nu hanoy issi mala gidenee?
47012019	Inte wurikka ha7i gakkanaas qoppizay nu inte sinthan nuna ashshanas haniza miisha mala xeelletii? Nuni Kirstoosan gididi intes yootizaysi Xoossa sinthanna. Ta siiqoto! Nu hayssa wursi yootizay intena go7anas giidikko!
47012020	Tani hee biza wode oone erizay inte ta koyda mala hanonta aggikko takka inte koyiza mala gidonta dashe gaggettanesha gaada hirgays. Hessathoka inte giddon ooshi, qanatetethi, hanqoy, zupetethi, asa sunth iisoy, zigirsi, otoretethinne kachchi duus aggenna gaada hirgays.
47012021	Tani qasseka he inteko bishin oone erizay ta Goday tana inte sinthan kawushshande gaada hirgays. Hayssafe kase nagara ooththidi he ooththida tunatethan, laymaninne coo mela yeda duussas maarotethan gelonta asata gaason ta muuzotethan wodhandina gaada hirgays.
47013001	Histikko tani inteko bishin hayssi taas heedzdzantho. Aydekka gidin yo7oy minnizay nam7u markan woykko heedzdzu markanna.
47013002	Intena beyanas ta nam7antho boyssan ta intenara dashe inte naagettana mala ta intes mintha yootadiskoshin; ha7ikka qasse hahon daada hayssafe kase nagara ooththidaytassinne hankoytas mintha yootays. Ha7i ta inteko hee simma biikko istafe oonaska mishetikke.
47013003	Hessika qasse tanan gididi intes yootizay Kirstoosa gididayssa inte shaakki eranas koyizayssa besses. Inte achchan diza Kirstoosi wolqama attin laafa gidenna.
47013004	Izi masqale bolla kaqettidi daburan hayqqikkoka ha7i qas Xoossa wolqan paxa dees. Nuka izara laafata gidikkoka inte gish giidi Xoossa wolqan minni doos.
47013005	Inte ammanon minni dizaakkonne eranas ane interka intena paaci xeellite. Yesus Kirstoosi intenan dizayssa shaakki eribeyketii? Hessatho hanonta aggikko inte paacen kundideta guussa.
47013006	Nuni paacen kundontayssa inte shaakki erana gaada hidota ooththays.
47013007	Inte iita miishi ooththonta mala nuni Xoosse woossos. Nuni woossizaykka nu aykkokka dandayizayta gidonta aggikkokka inte ubba wode lo7o ooso ooththanappe attin nu goobateththi intena bessanas gidenna.
47013008	Nuni tumatethas ooththos attin tumappe karera aykkokka ooththana dandayokko.
47013009	Nuni daburanchata gidin inte qas minota gidishin nuna ufaysses. Nu woossay inte bolla wosoy bayndayta gidana malassa.
47013010	Tani hayssa intes yeddiza kiitaza intefe haakka dashe xaafiday hessa gishassa. Hessa malan ta inteko biza wode taas Goday immida Aawatethan ta intena waayssikke. Goday taas Aawateth immiday intena minthanas attin laallanas gidenna.
47013011	Ane ha7i ta ishato! Saro diite; inte duussa lo7ethite; ta intena zoroyssa kaallite; asay issoy issara sigetite. Saron diite; siiqonne saro Goday intenara gidana.
47013012	Siiqo yeereteth yeeretidi issoy issara saroketite.
47013013	Ammaniza asay wurikka intena saro gees.
47013014	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethi, Xoossa siiqoynne Xillo Ayana issifeteth intenara ubbatara gido.
48001001	Asi kiittidade gidonta Yesus Kirstoosa hayqoppe denthida iza aawa Xoossafe kiitettida Phawuloosappe.
48001002	Tanara diza ishata ubbafe Galatiyan diza Woosa Keeththatas.
48001003	Nu Aawa Xoossafe Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe Xoossa kiyatethinne saroy intes gido.
48001004	Nu Aawa Xoossa shene gidin iita alamezappe nuna ashshanas bana aaththi immidayssas,
48001005	merppe merna gakkanaas izas bonchoy gido.
48001006	Inte Kirstoosa kiyatethan xeygidayssa aggagidi hara dumma shaako Mishiraachcho qaalakko simmidayssi tana daro malalises.
48001007	Ta hessa gida gaasoy intena baleththizaytinne Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaala mirqiza issi issi asati diza gishassa; tuma giikko Mishiraachcho qaalay issino xalla.
48001008	Gido attin nuna gidin woykko salo kiitancha gidinka nu intes sabakida Mishiraachcho qaalappe hara dumma Mishiraachcho qaala sabakikko hessadey mernas qangetidade gido.
48001009	Ta kase gida malaka Ha7ikka zaaradakka kase inte eko Mishiraachcho qaalappe hara dumma Mishiraachcho qaala sabakikko izaadey mernas qangetidade gido gays.
48001010	Ha7i ta asi tana eroshsho! Hashshu gaana mala koyazinayee? Xoossi hashshu gaana mala koyazinaa? Woykko as ufayssana koyazinaa? Ta as ufayssana koyizakko Kirstoosa oosancha gidikke.
48001011	Ta ishato! Ta intes sabakida Mishiraachcho qaalay asa ooso gidontayssa inte erana mala koyays.
48001012	Hayssa ha Mishiraachcho qaalaza Yesus Kirstoosi taas qoncisides attin ta oonappekka ekkabeekke; woykko oonikka tana tamarsibenna.
48001013	Tani kase Ayhudata ammanon waana dizaakkonne Xoossa Woosa Keeththe ta ay mala goodidakkonne qasse mule dhayssanas ta ay mala dafettidakkonne inte siyideta.
48001014	Kase ta diza woden diza daro Ayhuda asata darotappe ammanon aadhdhays. Kase nu aawata woga naaganas daro dafettayssishin.
48001015	Gido attin kase koyro tani ta aayi ulon dishin baasi dooridi ba kiyatethan tana xeygida Xoossay
48001016	Ayzaabeta giddon iza naaza gish ta sabakana mala ba naaza tanan qoncisanas dosida gish ta oona asarakka zoretabeekke.
48001017	Taappe kase Hawaare gididaytakko Yerusalame babeekke shin ammanida mala heerakka Arabe biitta badis; heeppeka Damasqo simmadis.
48001018	Heeppeka heedzdzu laythafe guye Phexroosara gaagganas Yerusalame badis. Izara gaaggada tammanne ichashu gallas gakkanaas heen gam7adis.
48001019	Gido attin Goda isha Yaqoobeppe attin Hawaaretaappe oonakka beyabekke.
48001020	Hayssa ta intes xaafizayssan ta wordo hasayontayssa Xoossa sinthan yootays.
48001021	Hessafe guye gede Sooriyanne Kilqiya geetettiza dere badis.
48001022	Yuhuda deren diza Kirstoosan ammaniza asay tana beybenna.
48001023	Gido attin “Beni nuna ammano gish goodi dhayssana koyiza addezi ha7i he ammano zaari sabakkes” giza wore xalla siyida.
48001024	He asay ta gaason Xoosse galatides.
48002001	Tammanne oyddu laythafe guye qasseka Yerusalame badis; he wode Barnabaasara days; Titoosakka tanara ekka badis.
48002002	Taas qoncida gish he badis. Ayzaabeta giddon ta sabakiza Mishiraachcho qaalakka istas yootadis. Gido attin ta kase mela woxxidakko gaadanne qasseka sinthafe coo mela woxxonta mala hirgada waannatizaytas dumma erisadis.
48002003	Haray attoshin tanara diza Titoossi izi Girike as shin izi qaxxarettana mala wolqathibetenna.
48002004	Hayssi ha yo7ozi dendiday issi issi wordo ammanizayti nuni Yesus Kirstoosan demmida geeshshatetha yuuyi yuuyi paaci beyanassinne nuna aylletethan zaari gelthanas loddara nuukko salli gelida gishassa.
48002005	Hayta he asatas nuni issitokka haarettibeekko. Hessika inte Mishiraachcho qaala tumatethan eqi daana mala giidikko.
48002006	Waanna misatiza asati taas aykkokka misatetenna; Xoossi asa ayfeso beyidi maado ooththi erenna. Heyti he asati ta kiittiza yo7otas taas aykkokka gujjibettenna.
48002007	Gido attin Phexroossi qaxaretidaytas Mishiraachcho qaala sabakanas hadara ekidaysa mala takka qaxxaretontaytas Mishiraachcho qaala sabakanas hadara ekidaysa isti erida.
48002008	Phexroossi Ayhudatas Hawaare gidi ooththana mala ooththida Xoossay takka Ayzaabetas Hawaare gida ooththana mala taas ooththides.
48002009	Waannati Yaqoobey, Phexroossinne Yohansikka taas imettida Xoossa imota akeekidi taasinne Barnabaasas ba ushacha kushe immida; hessafe guye nuni Ayzaabetas isti qas Ayhudatas qaala yootanas qaala ero gi ekkida.
48002010	Isti nuus hadara giday manqotas qofa nu aggonta mala. Ta amoyka hessa ooththanasa.
48002011	Phexroossi Anxokiya yida wode eretida bala ooththida gish ta iza qoncen qophadis.
48002012	Issi issi asati Yaqoobe achchafe yaanappe kase Phexroossi Ayzaabetara issife kath mizayssa aggidi asati yidappe guye qaxxaretida asatas babbidi Ayzaabetappe shaakettida guye guye gussi oykkides.
48002013	Barnabaassikka istatho qoodheppe qommon hanon ekettana gakkanaas hara Ayhuda baggafe ammanida asaykka izara issifettides.
48002014	Ista oosoy Mishiraachcho qaala tuman gidontayssa ta erada kumeththa asa achchan Phexroosa “Ne Ayhuda as shin Ayzaabeta wogan attin Ayhudata wogan dabeyikka; histin Ayzaabeti Ayhudata woga kaallana mala aazas wolqathay?” gadis.
48002015	“Nuni nu yeletethan Ayhudatappe attin Ayzaabeta mala nagarancha gidokko.
48002016	Asi Yesus Kirstoosan ammanon xillana attin woga naagon xillontayssa nu eroos. Hessa gish woga naagon gidonta Kirstoosa ammanon nu xillana mala nukka qasse Yesus Kirstoosa ammanidos. Woga naagon oonikka xillenna.
48002017	Nu Kirstoosan xillana koykko nu nagaranchata gididayssi qonci erettides. Histin Kirstoosi nagaray dari dari baana mala koyizee? Koyenna.
48002018	Tani laallidayssa zaarada tarka ta kushera keexxikko takka woga mooridade gididayssa ammanetays.
48002019	Tani Xoossas daana mala woga baggara he wogas hayqqadis.
48002020	Tani Kirstoosara kaqettadis; hayssafe guye tani taas diikke; gido attin Kirstoosi ta giddon dees. Ha7ikka ta ashon diza duussay tana dosidi bana ta gish aaththi immida Xoossa Naa bolla diza ammanon diza duussa.
48002021	Tani Xoossa kiyateth kawushshikke. Xillotethi woga naagon beettiza miish gidikko Kirstoosi mela hada hayqqides guussakka!”
48003001	Inteno yuushi qopponta Galatiya asato! Intes balettonta mala iza kaqetetha ta inte sinthan misile mala giigissa bessadisko shin intena oone bitiday?
48003002	Inte Xillo Ayana ekiday woga naagoneyee? Sabaketida qaala ammanonee? Ta hanno issiniyo intefe erana koyays.
48003003	Inte hessa mala qoppi eronta asee? Xoossa Ayanan oykkidayssa zaaridi asho hanon polanas waayetetii?
48003004	Tumu inte hanno gakkanaas daaburida daabursay coo melaa? Coo mela gidikko hada daaburideta.
48003005	Xoossi intes Ayana immidaynne inte achchan malata ooththiday inte woga naagida gishsheyee? Woykko inte siyida qaalan ammanida gishee?
48003006	Ane inte Abrahaame gish qoppite; geeshsha Maxaafan “Izi Xoosse ammanin ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodettides” geetetti xaafettides.
48003007	Hessa gish ammanizayti Abrahaame nayta gididayssa woznan woththite.
48003008	Ayzaabey ammanon attanayssa eridi Xoossi kase Geeshsha Maxaafan “Derey wuri ne baggara anjettana” giidi Mishiraachcho qaala Abrahaames yooti woththides.
48003009	Hessa gish ammanizayti wuri ammaniza Abrahaamera issife anjettidayta.
48003010	“Woga naagon ammanettizayti wurikka qangetha garsan deettes. Woga maxaafatan xaafettidayssa wursi ooththontadey izi qangetidade” geetetti xaafettides.
48003011	“Xillo asi ammanon de7ees” giza gish oonikka Xoossa sinthan wogan attontayssi geeshsha.
48003012	Wogay ammanon xaphibenna. Gido attin “Wogata wursi naagizadey he izi naagidayssan de7on daana” geetettides.
48003013	“Mitha bolla kaqettiza asi qangetidade” geetetti xaafettida gish Kirstoosi nu gish qangetidade gididi nuna woga qangethafe wozides.
48003014	Abrahaames imettida anjoy Yesus Kirstoosa baggara deres gakkana mala nuna wozides. Hessika nuni ammanon Xillo Ayana ekkana mala hanides.
48003015	Ta ishato! Ane ta intes asi ba duussan haniza miish leemiso immays. Haray atto shin asi issito caaqida qaala issito caaqidappe guye oonikka shaaranas woykko hara iza bolla gujjana dandayontayssa mala hayssika hessa mala.
48003016	Xoossi Abrahaames yootida qaalay Abrahaamesinne iza zerethassa. Geeshsha Maxaafay daro asas yootiza mala “Iza zerethatas” geenna; gido attin issi asas yootetiza mala “Ne zerethas” gees. Hessika Kirstoosa.
48003017	Ta gizayka hayssa; oyddu xeetanne heedzdzu tammu laythafe guyen imettida wogay kasetidi Xoossi minthida caaqqoza laallidi buro hanana hidota qaala shaarenna.
48003018	Laatay wogan hanizakko hidota qaalan gelanas koshshenna shin; Xoossi ba kiyatetha qaalan Abrahaames immides.
48003019	Histin wogay aazas imettidee? Wogay imettiday asay woga yedhi aadhdhiza gish he ufayssay bessiza zerethay yaana gakkanaasa; wogay yidaykka kiitanchata baggara gaanna gidiza issade baggara yides.
48003020	Gidikkoka gaannazi issa bagga xalla xeellizade gidenna. Xoossi gidikko issa xalla.
48003021	Histin wogay sinthafe Xoossi wothana qaala diggizazee? Mulekka diggenna. Wogay imettiday asi izan de7o demmanas gididakko tumukka xillotethi woga baggara beettanakoshin.
48003022	Qasse Geeshsha Maxaafay hayssi alamey wurikka nagaran qashetidayssa awajjes. Hessika asi wurikka Yesus Kirstoosa ammanon beettiza hidotay ammanizaytas ubbas imettanassa.
48003023	Hayssi ammanoy yaanappe kase nuni wogan qashetidi gordan doos.
48003024	Hessa gish nu ammanon xillana mala wogay nuna Kirstoosakko gaththanas naagizade mala gididi nuna naagides.
48003025	Ha7i qasse he ammanoy yida gish hayssafe guye nuni woga garsan dookko.
48003026	Inte wurikka Yesus Kirstoosa ammanon Xoossa nayta.
48003027	Inte Kirstoosara issino gidanas xammaqetidayti wurikka Kirstoosa may7o mala may7ideta.
48003028	Inte wurikka Yesus Kirstoosan issino attin Ayhudanne Girike, Ayllenne goqa, macanne adde giza dummateththi deenna. Inte wurikka Yesus Kirstoosan issino.
48003029	Inte Kirstoosayta gidikko inte Abrahaame zerethata; kase imettida hidota qaala mala inte laattanayta.
48004001	Ta gizay yeletida nay laatay izas gidikkoka izi biidi laattana gakkanaas ayllefe dumma gidenna.
48004002	Iza aaway gida wodey gakkanaas izi bana dichchizayta, tamarsizayta kushen gam7ees.
48004003	Nuka kase Ayana yo7os guutha naa mala diza wode hayssa ha alameza woga garsan haaretti de7idos.
48004004	Gido attin kase ba qoppi woththida wodey gakkin Xoossay macasappe yeletidi woga naagida ba naaza nuus yeddides.
48004005	Hessika nuni iza nayta gidana malanne woga garsan dizayta wozzana mala hanides.
48004006	Inte iza nayta gidida gish Xoossa “Abbo” giidi xeygiza ba naaza Ayana nu woznan yeddides.
48004007	Hessa gish hayssafe guye ne naappe attin aylle gidakka. Neni naa gidida gish Xoossi nena bayssa laattizade histides.
48004008	Inte Xoosse eranappe kase Xoosse gidonta eeqatas aylleta.
48004009	Ha7i gidikko Xoosse erideta; qasseka Xoossan erettideta. Histin qasseka guye simmidi gede go7ay baynda coo daaburissiza timirtekko waanidi simmidetii? Simmidi qasseka aylletetha qambaran waaxettana koyetii?
48004010	Dumma gallassata, aginata, wodetanne laythata inte boncheta.
48004011	Ta intenara daaburidayssi coo mela gidande gaada babbays.
48004012	Ta ishato! Ta intena misatida mala inteka tana misatana mala ta intena woossays. Inte tana aykkokka qohibeykketa.
48004013	Inte eriza mala ta intes koyro Mishiraachcho qaala sabakiday sako gaasonna.
48004014	Ta sakoy intes meto gidinka tana saletibeyketa woykko tana harasettibeyketa; gido attin inte tana Xoossa kiitancha malanne hessafeka bollara Yesus Kirstoosa mala mokki ekideta.
48004015	Histin ha7i he inte ufayssay awa bidee? Intes hanizaz gididakko inte inte ayfe taas kessi immanas guye goontayssa ta intes markatays.
48004016	Tani tuma intes kessa yootida gish intes morke gidadinashaa?
48004017	Heyti asati intena bakko ekkanas daaburettes attin lo7os daaburettenna. Isti koyizay intena nuuppe shaakkidi ba as histanasakko!
48004018	Lo7os mindatethi lo7o; hessikka hananas bessizay ubba wode gidikkofe attin ta intenara diza wode xalla gidoppo.
48004019	Ta nayto Kirstoosi inte woznan xaafetin ta beyana gakkanaas inte gish ta miixatays.
48004020	Ta inte gish qofan metotadis. Ta dandayizakko ha7i inte giddon bettada intena lo7etha tamarsizako ay mala dosazina!
48004021	Inteno! Woga garsan aqana koyizayto ane taas yootite; wogay ay gizakkone siybeykketii?
48004022	Abrahaames issoy ayllefe issoy qas goqayfe yeletida nam7u nayti dizayssi Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
48004023	Ayillefe yeletida naazi asho woga mala yelettides. Hanko goqaype yelettidayssi ufayssa qaala mala yelettides.
48004024	Hayti nam7u macasati nam7u caaqota bessizayta gidida gish hayssi leemisos imettides. Koyro caaqoya siina zuma bolla gidashe aylletethas gidiza nayta yelizaro; izakka Aggaro.
48004025	Hessa gish Aggara Arabe biittan diza siina zuma gish gidada ha7i diza Yerusalame katamayo misatawus; iza ba naytara aylletethan dawus.
48004026	Pude bolla salon diza Yerusalamey gidikko goqa gidada dawus; Izakka nu aayo.
48004027	“Neni yelonta makaraye ufayeta! Hanne miixata erontare! ‘Illili’ ga waassa; azinay dizaarippe azinay bayndari nayti darida” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettides.
48004028	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inteka Yisaaqa mala ufaysa qaala naytakko.
48004029	Asho shene mala yeletidayssi Ayana wolqan yeletidayssa goodides; ha7ikka goodethon dees.
48004030	Gido attin Geeshsha Maxaafay qasse ay gizee? “Aylleyo izi naazara digga; aylle nay goqay naara lattenna” gees.
48004031	Hessa gish ta ishato! Nuni goqay nayta attin aylle nayta gidokko.
48005001	Nuna Kirstoosi geeshiday nuni geeshshatethan daanassa. Hessa gish minni eqite; nam7antho aylletetha qambaran geloppite.
48005002	Ta intes gizayssa woznan woththite; Inte qaxxarettana koykko Kirstoosi intena aynne go7enna gaada ta Phawuloosi intes yootays.
48005003	Qaxxarettana koyizayti wuri woga wursi polanayssi dosa gidontayssa ta intes issas issas qoncen yootays.
48005004	Inteno! Woga naagon xillana waaytizayto; inte Kirstoosappe shaaketideta; iza kiyatethafeka haakkideta.
48005005	Nu qas ufayssa naagetiza xillotetha Xoossa Ayana baggara ammanon laamotethan naagon doos.
48005006	Asi Yesus Kirstoosan diikko qaxxaretin woykko qaxxaretonta aggin aynne go7enna; go7ay dizay siiqon qonciza ammanon xalla.
48005007	Kase lo7o woth woxxeta shin; ha7i intes dhuphe gididi tumas inte azazetonta mala intena diggiday oonee?
48005008	Hessa mala baleththoy intena xeygida Xoossafe gidenna.
48005009	“Guutha irshoy liixe wursi denthees” geetettiza mala.
48005010	Intes hara qofay deenna gaada tani Godan ammanettays; intes tikki gizaz ooththizay oona gidikkonne izi ba pirda ekkana.
48005011	Ta ishato! Hanno gakkanaas ta sabakizayssi asi attanas qaxxarettana bessees gizaz gididakko histin hanno gakkanaas aazas tana goodizoo? Hessa mala gididakko Kirstoosa masqaley asas dhuphe gidenakkoshin.
48005012	Intes tikki gizaz ooththiza asati coo wogara qaxxareteth aggidi mulera qanxi yeggeto.
48005013	Ta ishato! Inte geeshshatethas xeeygetideta; inte inte geeshshatetha zaaridi intes asho amo polanas go7ettofte. Hessafe inte inte garsan siiqon issoy issa maaddite.
48005014	Wogay wuri shiiqetidi issi qaalan qashetees; hessikka “Neni ase ne mala dosa!” gizayssa.
48005015	Gido attin inte issoy issara saxetizayta gidikko inte inte garsan wuronta mala naagetite.
48005016	Hessa gish ta intena Ayanan simeretite; qasseka asho amoka poloppite gays.
48005017	Ashoy Ayanay koyontaz amottes. Ayanaykka ashoy koyontaz amottes; hayti issoy issara ba garsan ixxettiza gish inte inte koyda mala ooththeketa.
48005018	Inte Ayanan dizayta gidikko wogas haarettizayta gidekketa.
48005019	Asho oosoy qoncen eretes; hessikka laymateth, tunateth, layma kaas,
48005020	Eeqas goynno, bita, ixeteth, oosh, qanateteth, hanqo, bana xalla doso, shaaketeth, zupeteth,
48005021	qanateteth, mathoteth, alame yeth yexethinne heytanta misatizayta. Tani intes kase yootida mala ha7ikka inte naagettana mala qofisays. Hessa mala duus dizayti wurikka Xoossa kawoteth laatetenna.
48005022	Ayana ayfey gidikko siiqo, ufays, saroteth, dandaya, kiyateth, lo7eteth, ammanetteth,
48005023	ashketeth, barka bana haaro; haytanta mala diggiza wogay baawa.
48005024	Yesus Kirstoosas gididayti asho iza iita qofaranne iza iita amotethara issife kaqqida.
48005025	Nu Ayanan daana koykko ane Ayanan simeretoos.
48005026	Nuni issoy issa iitas dentheththishenne qanatettishe coo mela ceeqqettizayssa ane aggos.
48006001	Ta ishato! Issi asi nagara ooththi bettikko inte qas Ayanan lo7o dizayti iza ashiketethara zaaranas bessees; gido attin nekka izade mala paacetonta mala ne hu7es naageta.
48006002	Inte issoy issa deexxo tooho tookkite; hessa mala ooson Kirstoosa woga poleeta.
48006003	Issadey aynne hanonta dishe bana gitasiza misatikko hessadey barka bana baleththes.
48006004	Issi issi asi ba ooso barka paaci xeello. Hessafe guye hara asara bana ginasonta dishe izi bana ceeqqisizazi demmana.
48006005	Issi issi asi barka ba tooho tookkanas bessees.
48006006	Qaala tamarizay oonikka ba tamarida lo7o miisha ba astamarezara gishetto.
48006007	Baletofte Xoossi qilica erenna. Asi ba zeridaro izo zaari maxana.
48006008	Ba asho amo kunthanas zerizadey ashoppe dhayssi maxana. Ayana ufayssanas zeridadey gidikko ayanappe merna de7o maxana.
48006009	Ane nu lo7o ooso ooththanas azallokko; nu ufaysi qanxonta agikko wodey gakkishin gakkida kath nu maxana.
48006010	Hessa gish nuus dandayettikko asa ubbas harappeka ammaniza asas ane lo7o ooththoos.
48006011	Tani ta kushera intes ay mala gita pidalen xaafidakkone ane xeellite.
48006012	Coo kare baggara bettana koyiza asati inte qaxxarettana mala wolqathana koyeettes. Isti hessa ooththizay Kirstoosa masqale gish giidi goodetonta malassa.
48006013	Isti inte qaxxarettana mala koyizay inte ashon ceeqqettanas koyiza gish attin qaxxaretidayti woga naagizayta gidettenna.
48006014	Qasse alamey taas; takka alames; kaqettida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa masqalenppe attin haran ceeqoy taappe haakko.
48006015	Qaxxaretin woykko qaxxaretonta aggin izas go7ay baawa. Go7ay ooratha medheteth gideththa.
48006016	Hayssa ha azazoza kaalliza ubbatasinne Xoossa dere gidida Isra7eele asatas sarotethinne maaroteth gido.
48006017	Tani Yesusa malata ta asatethan tookkadis; hessa gish ha7i tana oonikka waaysenna.
48006018	Ta ishato! Goda Yesus Kirstoosa aadho kiyatethi intenara gido! Amiin.
49001001	Xoossa shene mala Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe. Yesus Kirstoosan diza ammanettizaytas Efesoonen ammaniza asas.
49001002	Nu Aawa Xoossafenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
49001003	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara salon Ayana anjo ubban nuna anjida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aaway Xoossi anjeto.
49001004	Nu iza sinthan geeshshinne wosoy bayndayta gidana mala buro alamey medhetanappe kase ba siiqon Kirstoosa baggara nuna doorides.
49001005	Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nu iza naa gidana mala ba lo7o qofan koyro wursi woththides.
49001006	Hessika ba dosizadde baggara coo mela nuus imettida boncho kiyatethay galatettana mala.
49001007	Xoossa aadho kiyatetha duretethafe dendoyssan Yesusa suuthan wozetidi nagarappe nu maaretidos.
49001008	Izi ba kiyatetha, hiillatethaninne erateth ubban nu bolla keehi darsides.
49001009	Xoossi qoppida xuura ba qofa Kirstoosa baggara ba lo7o qofa mala nuna erisides.
49001010	Buroppe wode wursethan hananas diza iza qofay sallo bollanne biitta bolla dizaytas ubbas hu7e gidida Yesus Kirstoosappe wursi gars aaththanassa.
49001011	Wursikka ba shene mala ooththiza iza shenen koyrokka izi qoppi woththidayti nuni izan doorettidos.
49001012	Nuni kasetidi Kirstoosa baggara ekana giidi ufayssaN naagizayti Xoossa boncho galatan qoncisanasa.
49001013	Inteka qasse tuma qaala hessikka intena ashshiza Mishiraachcho qaala siydi Kirstoosan ammanideta. Iza ammanidi kase imettana geetettida Xillo Ayana matamen atamettideta.
49001014	He Ayanazikka iza boncho galatan qoncisana mala Xoossi erays gididayta ubbata wozana gakkanaas nu laatas oytho.
49001015	Hessa gish inte Goda Yesusa amannida gishshinne ammaniza asa inte siiqizayssa ta siyosappe ha simmin intena qoppa qoppa ekada tani ta woossan inte gish Xoossas galata shiisho aggabeyke.
49001017	Boncho Aawa gidida nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossa inte lo7ethi erana mala Qoncisiza Ayanaynne Eratetha Ayanay intes imettana mala ta intes pacey baynda woossays.
49001018	Hessathoka inte izan xeeygetida ufayssay hessikka ammanizayta achchan diza iza duretethay aazakkone inte erana mala inte wozna ayfey poo7ana mala woossays.
49001019	Nuus ammanizaytas ubbafe bolla gidida iza wolqa dhoqateth inte erana mala ta woossays. He wolqaykka iza gitateththa minotetha ooson bessidaysi hayqoppe Kirstoosa denthidi salon ba ushachchan uttissida Kirstoosa baggara.
49001021	Ayssizaytappe, godateththappe, wolqafenne kawoteththafe qasseka ha7i xalla gidonta buroppe yaana wodekka gidin sunth ubbafe izi bolla.
49001022	Xoossi hara wursi iza tohoppe garsan haarisides. Woossa keeththanka ubba bolla hu7e ooththides.
49001023	Woossa keeththiya Kirstoosa asatetha. He izakka ubbason ubba miish kunthiza he iza kumetha.
49002001	Inte inte qohida qoho gishshinne inte nagara gaason hayqqideyta shin,
49002002	hessa inte hayssa alameza iita ooge kaallideta. Bolla carko bolla diza wolqama haarizayssas ha7ikka Xoossas azazettonta asa bolla ooththiza iita ayanas inte azazettishe gam7ideta.
49002003	Hayssafe kase nuni nu asho amoteth polishe ashoy koyiza oge kaallishe istara doos. Nunikka hanko asa mala nu medhetethafe Xoossa hanqo giddon de7oos.
49002004	Gido attin Xoossi keehi siiqida gish ba maarotetha daron nuni nu qoho dareteththan hayqqidayta gidi dishin Kirstoosa baggara nuna ashshides. Inte paxiday iza kiyatethanna.
49002006	Xoossi nuna Kirstoosara gaththi denthides. Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuna salon banara uttissides.
49002007	Hessika hayssafe guye yaana wodezan Yesus Kirstoosi nuus ba kiyatethan qoncisida zaway baynda ba kiyatetha duretetha nuna bessanasa.
49002008	Inte Xoossa kiyatethan ammanon attideta. Hessika Xoossi intes mela coo imidazappe attin inte oosoppe gidenna.
49002009	Oonikka ceeqqettonta mala oosoppe gidenna.
49002010	Hessika Xoossi kase koyro giigissi woththida lo7o ooso nuni ooththana mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuni nam7antho medhetidaytanne Xoossa medhetethata.
49002011	Hessa gish inte kase inte yeletethan Ayzaabeti inte asatetha bolla asa kushe ooso geedon “Nuni qaxxarettidos” giza asati intena “Qaxxaretontayta” gizayto! Inte hessa ane woznan woththite.
49002012	Inte he wode Kirstoosappe shaaketidi, Isra7eele naytappe hakkidi, caaqo qaalassikka alaga gididi, hayssa alameza bolla hidotaynne Xoossi baynda inte kase dizayssa yuushi qoppite.
49002013	Ha7i qasse inte kase hahon dizayti Yesus Kirstoosan gididi iza suutha baggara shiiqideta.
49002014	Nam7ata issi bolla gaththidi giddon shaakki ooshiza miisha laallida nu saroy iza.
49002015	Woga, woga azazora gaththi issife ba ashon shaarides. Hessa izi ooththida gaasoy izas waanna qofay nam7atappe issi ooratha as ba baggara medhidi saroteth ehanasa.
49002016	Izi masqale bolla hayqqidi morketeth diggides. Nam7ataka issi asho histidi Xoossara maqayinthides.
49002017	Izi yiidi intena hakki dizaytassinne matan dizaytas gaththi saroteth sabakides.
49002018	Nu wurikka iza baggara issi Ayanan Aawa ach shiiqana.
49002019	Hessa gish inte ammanizaytara issife issi dere asanne Xoossas so asa attin hayssafe guye betetanne imathata gidekketa.
49002020	Inte Hawaaretanne nabeta baasan keexettideta; keeththas wursetha kuushshay Yesus Kirstoosa.
49002021	Keeththazi wurikka issife oyketidi Godas dumma keeththe gidanas diccees.
49002022	Intenka Xoossi ba Ayanan daanas izas duussaso gidana mala issife keexxetishe deeta.
49003001	Hessa geedon ta Phawuloosi intes ammanontayta gish Yesus Kirstoosi qachidade gidadis.
49003002	Ta intena go7ana mala Xoossi kiyatethan taas oosos exxa immidayssa inte tumappe siyideta.
49003003	Hayssafe kase ta intes qaanthara xaafida mala taas qoncin ta eranas dandayida xuuray hayssa.
49003004	Hessa gish inte hessa nababishe Kirstoosa xuura ta ay mala eridakkone inteka eranas dandayeeta.
49003005	He xuuraykka ha7i ammaniza Hawaaretassinne nabetas qoncida mala kase beni aadhdhida wode diza asataska qoncibenna.
49003006	Hessi he xuuray Ayzaabeti Mishiraachcho qaala baggara Isra7eele naytara issife laattizayta; issife issade asateth mala gididi Yesus Kirstoosa baggara beettida hidota issife gishetti laattizayta gidanassa.
49003007	Takka iza wolqa ooso mala taas imettida Xoossa kiyatetha imota mala hayssa Mishiraachcho qaala oosancha gidadis.
49003008	Ta qas hanko ammaniza asappe laafa gidikkokka oonikka zaway baynda Kirstoosa dureteth Ayzaabetas sabakana mala Xoossa kiyatethan hayssi taas imettides.
49003009	Hessathoka wursikka medhdhida Xoossan beni wode qoteti diza Xooossas xuura qofay aazakonne ubbas ta qoncisana mala taas Xoossa kiyatethi imettides.
49003010	Iza qofay ha7i wode Woossa Keeththa baggara dumma dumma medhay diza Xoossa hiillatethi salon diza halaqatassinne godatas erettana mala hanides.
49003011	Xoossi nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara hayssa poliday merna ba qofa mala.
49003012	Nuni izayta gidida gishshinne izan ammanida gish geeshshateththaranne hirgay baynda nuni Xoossako shiiqana dandayoos.
49003013	Hessa gish inte bonchettana mala tani inte gish ta bolla gakkida waayezan inte ufays qanxonta mala ta intena hadara gays.
49003014	Hessa gish tani Xoossa sinthan gulbatays.
49003015	Salon dizaynne biitta bolla diza izaso asay wurikka izi sunthin summes.
49003016	Inte garsa baggara minnana mala Ayana baggara iza boncho duretethay intes imettana mala ta woossays.
49003017	Hessika Kirstoosi inte woznan ammanon daana malanne qasseka inte izan xaphidi siiqon minnana mala.
49003018	Kirstoosa siiqos aahotethay, adusatethay, dhoqatethaynne cimateththay ay ginakko inte ammaniza asa ubbara issife shaakki erana mala.
49003019	Inte Xoossa kumeththara shaakki eridi izan kumeth gidana mala asa erappe bolla gidida Kirstoosa siiqo inte erana mala ta woossays.
49003020	Hessa gish nu giddon ooththiza ba wolqa gina nu woossizayssafenne woykko nu qoppizayssafe ubbafe bollara keehi darsi ooththanas dandayiza Xoossas,
49003021	Woossa keeththan qasseka Yesus Kirstoosa baggara wode ubban mernappe merna gakkanaas izas bonchoy gido. Amiin.
49004001	Hessa gish Goda sunthan qashetida tani inte xeeygetida xeeyssas bessiza duus daana mala intena woossays.
49004002	Mulekka ashketanne shugota gidite. Issoy issara siiqon diitenne issoy issa dandayite.
49004003	Saroteth immiza Ayana issifeteth naaganas minnite.
49004004	Inte xeeygettida gallas issi hidotaako xeeygetida mala issi asatethinne issi Ayanay dees.
49004005	Issi Goday, issi ammanoynne issi xinqatay dees.
49004006	Ubbafe bollara gididay, ubba bolla ooththizay, ubbason dizay, ubbas Aawa gidida issi Xoossi dees.
49004007	Gidikkokka Kirstoosi immana gi qachida mala nuus issas issas dumma dumma imotethi imettides.
49004008	Hessa gish “Izi pude kezida wode di7o di7ides; Asas kiyatetha imota immides” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xafetidees.
49004009	Histin “Izi pude kezides” guussi qasseka duge biitta gars wodhdhides guus gidonta agikko hessi ay guussee?
49004010	Izi duge garse wodhdhidayssi kumeth alame medheteth kumana mala saloppekka bolla keziday iza.
49004011	Issi issi asati Hawaareta, baggati Nabeta, harati Mishiraachcho qaala sabake, baggayti qasse heemmizaytanne tamarsizayta gidana mala izi imota immides.
49004012	Hessika Kirstoosa asateth gidida Woossa Keeththiya keexettana mala ammanizayta ammano oosos giigissanassa.
49004013	Hessika hananay nu wurikka Xoossa Naa ammanoninne iza eron beettiza issifetethako gakkidi kumeththa as gidanas Kirstoosan nuni Kirstoosatho kumeththinne polo gidana mala.
49004014	Hessa gish abba bolla dendiza gote carkoy heenne ha shocechiza mala dumma dumma timirte carkon asa geneninne baleththon ane nuni heenne ha phonqetishe qeeri guutha nayta mala hanokko.
49004015	Hessatho hano aggidi tuma siiqon haasayishe hu7e gididayssakko hanizazan ubban ane diccoos. He hu7ezika Kirstoosa.
49004016	Iza geedon asatethi wuri xaphon oyketidi issi issi asatethi ba ooso ooththishe wurikka siiqon diccessinne banaka minthes.
49004017	Ayzaabeta mala coo mela qofan mela simeretanas intes bessenna gaada ta intena zorays.
49004018	Ista woznay muumida gishshinne yuushi qopponta gish ista wozna ayfey qooqides. Isti Xoossa de7oppe shaaketida.
49004019	Ista woznay doccida gish kalloy baynda ba koyda mala bana kalthonta amoninne tunatethan daanas wogay baynda iita oosos bana aaththi immida.
49004020	Inte qasse Kirstoosa hessa malan eribeyketa.
49004021	Ee tumukka inte iza gish siyidetanne Yesusan diza tuma izappe tamarideta.
49004022	Inte kase diza dussay baleththiza amon qitattida gish kase ceega asateth intefe qari yeggana mala tamarideta.
49004023	Qasseka inte qofay Ayanan ooraxo.
49004024	Tumu xillotethaninne geeshshatethan Xoosse misatana medhetida ooratha asateth may7ite.
49004025	Nu wurikka issi asho gidida gish wordoteth diggidi nuni nu garsan issoy issara ane tuma hasayos.
49004026	Hanqettite shin nagara ooththofte; inte hanqon dishin awa arshey wullofo.
49004027	Xala7es soho immofte.
49004028	Kase kaysotizadey hayssafe guye kaysotoppa. Gido attin metotetidi iza woossizaytas immiza miish iza kushen daana mala lo7o miish ba kushera ooththi demmanas daaburo.
49004029	Koshshiza mala hanko siyizayta go7izazinne maaddiza qaalappe attin go7oy baynda qaalay inte duunappe kezoppo.
49004030	Inte attana gallassas atamettida Xoossa Xillo Ayana mishisoppite.
49004031	Camo yo7o wursi hanqokka, yiillo, oosh, cashshe, qasseka hanko hara iitateth wursi intefe diggite.
49004032	Intena Xoossi Kirstoosa baggara atto gida mala inteka inte garsan atto atto geetettite; issoy issara kiyatanne issoy issas qadhetizayta gidite.
49005001	Hessa gish inte dosettiza nayta mala Xoosse misatite.
49005002	Kirstoosi nuna siiqida mala qasseka nu gish bana sawiza yarsho ooth Xoossas immida mala inteka siiqon simeretite.
49005003	Laymay woykko tunatethi woykko uuzetethi mulekka inte giddon betoy attin zigirsikka siyetofo. Hessa malay geeshsha Xoossa asas bessenna.
49005004	Inte galata galatizayta gidite attin ase yellachiza laafa haasayay coo eeyateththa yo7oy intes besontaa gish hessa malay inte garsan dooppo.
49005005	Qasseka inte laymatizaytas woykko tunatas woykko uuzetizaytassinne eqqas goynnizaytas Kirstoosa kawoteththaninne Xoossa Kawoteththan istas laatasoy bayndayssa inte erite.
49005006	Intena oonikka wordo hasayon baleththofo. Gaasoyka Xoossa hanqoy izas azazettonta nayta bolla yaanay haytanta malanna.
49005007	Hessa gish hessanta malara zupetoppite.
49005008	Kase inte dhuma shin Godan ha7i inte poo7o. Inte poo7o nayta mala diite.
49005009	Poo7os ayfey lo7etethan, Xillotethaninne tumatethan ubban dees.
49005010	Hessathoka Goda ufaysiza miish koyite.
49005011	Ayfey baynda dhuma oosora intes aykko gagoteththi dooppo. Hessafe iita ooso qonce kessite.
49005012	Dhuman diza asati geeman ooththiza miisha gish haasayayka yellaches.
49005013	Poo7oy poo7idazi wuri qonceen bettes.
49005014	Gaasoyka wursi bessizay poo7o. Hessa gish “Neno, dhiskizaysso beegga! Hayqoppe denda, Kirstoosi nees poo7isana” geetettides.
49005015	Hessa gish eratethi bayndayta mala gidonta inte waanidi erata mala daanakkonne naagetite.
49005016	Hayssi wodezi iita gidida gish hessa lo7ethi eritte.
49005017	Hessa gish eeyata gidopite; Goda sheney azakkonne yuushi qoppite.
49005018	Ayanay kumidayta gidite attin mathosiza ushshan mathotofte. Hessi mela miisha laaleththa.
49005019	Ayana yethan galatara gaththi yexishe inte giddon issoy issara hasayettite. Inte sabaninne yethan kumeththa woznappe Goda galattite.
49005020	Hessan Xoossa Aawa, Goda Yesus Kirstoosa suntha ubba miishas ubba wode galattite.
49005021	Inte Kirstoosa bonchos giidi yashshara issoy issas azazetite.
49005022	Macheto inte Godas haarettiza mala inte azinatas haarettite.
49005023	Kirstoosi ba asho gidida Woossa Keeththays hu7e gidida mala azinaykka ba macheysi hu7e.
49005024	Hessa gish Woossa Keeththiya Kirstoosas azazettiza mala machetikka ba azinatas ay hanonka azazettanas bessees.
49005025	Azinato! Kirstoosi Woossa Keeththayo siiqida malanne bana izi gish aaththi immida mala inteka inte macheta siiqite.
49005026	Ba qaala baggara haaththan meeci geshshidi erays dummasida mala.
49005027	Hessathoka qitay woykko ayfeso xirphotethi woykko issi iitay izi bolla beettonta geeshinne balay izi bolla bayndaro boncho Woossa Keeththe histidi erays shiishanassa.
49005028	Azinatikka hessatho ba macheta ba asho mala siiqanas bessees. Ba macho siiqizadey bana siiqees.
49005029	Barka bana ixizadey oonikka baawa. Ba ashos meessinne bana naagees. Kirstoossikka Woossa Keeththas hinnitho ooththides.
49005030	Nuni Kirstoosa asatetha.
49005031	Hessa gish “Asi aayonne aawa aggidi ba macheyra issino gides; nam7aykka issi asho gidettes” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xafettides.
49005032	Hayssi daro xuura yo7o, takka hayssa Kirstoosa gishshinne Woossa Keeththa gish yootays.
49005033	Gidikkokka intefe issi issadey ba macho bana siiqiza mala siiqo; machakka ba azina bonchu.
49006001	Nayto! Inte intena yelidaytas Godan azazetite. Hessi intes bessees.
49006002	“Ne aawanne ne aayiyo boncha” giza azazo giddon diza hidotay koyro azazo.
49006003	Ne hessatho ooththikko nees lo7ananne nees laythay biitta bolla aduqana.
49006004	Yelidayto! Inteka inte nayta hanqeethofte; gido attin inte nayta Goda zoreninne seeran dichchite.
49006005	Oosanchato inte Kirstoosas azazettiza mala biitta bolla intena ooththisizaytas yashshatethaninne bonchon suure woznappe azazetite.
49006006	Coo asa ayfen bettana malanne ooththisizaytappe duna anjo ekanas gidonta inte Kirstoosa aylleeta mala Xoossa shene kumeththa woznappe polana mala woznappe azazetite.
49006007	Asas ooththiza mala gidonta Godas ooththiza mala inte kumeth woznappe ooththite.
49006008	Gaasoyka aylle gidin woykko goda gidin ba ooththiza lo7o oosos ubbas woyto ekkanayssa inte ereeta.
49006009	Inteno godato! Inteka inte ooththisizaytas hessatho ooththite. Istasinne intes Goda gididay bolla salon dizayssa; izikka as ayfeso xeelli maadontayssakka inteka eriiza gish oosanchata babiso aggidi lo7o ooththite.
49006010	Hara baggara mino Godaninne iza gita wolqan minnite.
49006011	Dabulosa gene ooso inte eqetanas dandayana mala Xoossa ola may7ota mayte.
49006012	Gaasoyka nu oletanay ashoranne suuthara gidonta hayssa dhuma alameza haariza godataranne wolqamatara qasseka sallo bolla diza tuna ayana olanchatara olettos.
49006013	Iita gallassay gakkishin inte morke wolqara eqetanas dandayana mala Xoossa ola may7ota kumeth may7ite. Inte ubbakka polidappe guye minni eqqanas dandayeeta.
49006014	Hessa gish inte xeessan tuma zinnare mala dancettidi xillotetha xurureta mala tiran may7idi,
49006015	sarotetha Mishiraachcho qaala tohon caamma mala aaththidi giigeti eqiite.
49006016	Heytantafeka bollara tama mala poppol7u giza iita ayana wondafeta inte wursi toyssana dandayana mala ammano gondalle mala denthite.
49006017	Atoteth birata qoobe mala hu7en woththite. Ayana giththa mashsha oykkite; hessikka Xoossa qaala.
49006018	Woossan ay hanonka Ayanan woossite. Hessa qoppidi beeggite; ammanizayta ubba gish qanxonta woassite.
49006019	Tani Mishiraachcho qaala xuura asas qoncisanas duna doyiza ubba wode yashshi baynda ta xalatethan yootana qaalay taas imettana mala taas woossite.
49006020	Tani Mishiraachcho qaala gish sansalatan qashetada kiitettidade gididay hessassa. Hessa gish ta yootanas bessizaysa babbonta yootana mala taas woossite.
49006021	Ta ay mala dizaakkonne ay ooththizakko inte erana mala dosettida ta ishay Godas ammanettida oosanchay Tiqiqoossi intes hanidayssa wursikka intes yootana.
49006022	Inte nu hanoteth erana malanne inte wozna izi minthethana mala ta iza intekko yeddadis.
49006023	Aawa Xoossafe, Goda Yesus Kirstoossappe sarotethinne siiqoy ammanora intes ta ishatas gido.
49006024	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa pacey baynda siiqiza ubbas sarotethi gido. Amiin.
50001001	Yesus Kirstoosa oosancha gidida Phawuloosappenne Ximtoosappe Woossa Keeththa cimataranne daaqonetara issife Pilphisiyoose deren diza ammanizaytas Yesus Kirstoosas dummatidaytas ubbas;
50001002	nu Aawa Xoossafe, Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
50001003	Intena qoppiza ubba gallas tani ta Xoossa galatays.
50001004	Ubba gallas inte gish ta woossiza wode ufayssan woossays.
50001005	Koyro gallassafe ha simmin hanno gakkanaas Mishiraachcho qaala ooson inte tanara deeta.
50001006	Intenan lo7o ooso doommidayssi izi Yesus Kirstoosi wursetha pirdas yaana gakkanaas intena dandayissanayssa ta ammanays.
50001007	Ta ha7i qasho keeththan dishininne ta qashetanappekka kase Mishiraachcho qaala tuma naaganassinne minthethanas Xoossi taas ba kiyatethan immida maadon inte wurikka tanara issife ooththidayta gidida gish inte ubba gallas ta woznappe dhayekketa. Hessa gish ta inte gish qoppanas taas bessees.
50001008	Ta intena Yesus Kirstoosa siiqon wosta laamotizakkonne Xoossi taas marka.
50001009	Inte siiqoy eratethaninne akeekan keehi darana mala ta woossays.
50001010	Hessika inte ubbafe aadhdhizayssa shaakki erana malanne Yesus Kirstoosa yuussa gallas gakkanaas inte geeshshatanne wosoy bayndayta gidana mala koyays.
50001011	Xoossa bonchisizayssanne galatissizayssa inte ooththana mala Yesus Kirstoosan beettiza geeshshatetha ayfen inte woznay kumo.
50001012	Ha7ikka ta ishato! Ta bolla gakkida metoy Mishiraachcho qaalay kaseppe dari aakkanas gididayssa inte erana mala ta koyays.
50001013	Hessa gish ta qashetethay Kirstoosa gish gididayssi kawo keeththa zabetassinne harataska erettides.
50001014	Ta qashetidayssa geedon ammanizayti Xoossa qaala babbonta xalatethan asas markattanas minoteth demmida.
50001015	Issi issi asati coo nu izappe waanidon geethaninne hoollotethan sabakettes. Baggayti qasse lo7o qofara Kirstoosa gish sabakettes.
50001016	Baggayti ta Mishiraachcho qaala gish mootettana haan dizayssa eriza gish siiqon sabakettes.
50001017	Hankoyti qasse lo7o qofan gidonta tana gakkida qashoza bolla hara waaye gaththanassinne ba iita qofa polanas Kirstoosa sabakettes.
50001018	Hessa gidikko ay meto dizay! Waanna ayfe yo7oy suuretethan gidin woykko misatisson gidinka awarakka Kirstoosa sabakiza gish ta ufayetays. Qasseka ta ufayettana.
50001019	Ta bolla gakkida metoppe ta aadhanay inte woossaninne Yesus Kirstoosa Ayana maadon gididayssa ta erays.
50001020	Ta ay ogerakka yeellatonta mala mino ufaysinne laamotay taas dees. Gido attin kasekka hachchika; ta hayqqinka paxa diinka Kirstoosi ta ashon bonchettanayssa ta xalatethan haasayays.
50001021	Taas duus guussi Kirstoosa. Hayqoyka taas go7a.
50001022	Gido attin tani hayssa asho duussan guja dizaakko ayfe immiza ooso ooththays guussa. Ta awayssa dooranakkonne taas erettenna.
50001023	Ha nam7u Hanotan metotetadis. Ta baada Kirstoosara daanas laamotays. Hessi hara ubbafe keehi lo7o.
50001024	Gido attin taas ashon duussi intes keehi koshshees.
50001025	Hessa akeekada inte ammanon diccana malanne ufayettana mala inte ubbata matan gam7anayssanne daanayssa ta erays.
50001026	Ta he baada inte achchan deyikko ta gaason intes Kirstoosan diza ceeqeteththi darana.
50001027	Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalas bessiza mala diite. Hessatho hanka ta intena hee baada beydakko woykko hahon daada inte gish ta siyizakko inte Mishiraachcho qaala ammanos issino oletishe issi Ayanan inte minni eqnayssa ta erays.
50001028	Ay ogerakka intenara eqetizaytas hirgofte. Hessi isti dhayanayssassinne inte atanayssas Xoossafe imettida malata.
50001029	Inte Kirstoosa ammanizayta xalala gidonta iza gish waaye ekizayta gidana mala hayssi Xoossa kiyatethi intes imettides.
50001030	Inte kase beyida mala ha7ikka ta bolla dizayssa inte siyizayssa mala hessatho intenaka waayison dees.
50002001	Intes Kirstoosa baggara beettida issifetetha gaason issoy issa minthethizaz siiqo gidinka woykko Ayana issifeteth woykko maaroynne asas misheteth inte garsan diikko inte as siiqon issi Ayananinne issi qofan gididi ta ufays polite.
50002003	As ubba intefe bollara xeellite attin interka intena doson woykko go7ay baynda galata ekanas issi mishika ooththofte.
50002004	Intefe issi issi asi hara as go7izayssa xeellite attin inte go7a xalala xeellofte.
50002005	Yesus Kirstoosas diza ashketethi inte achchanka do.
50002006	Izi erays Xoossakoshin bana Xoossara ginisanas koybenna.
50002007	Gido attin aylle medha ekkidi as misatidi barka bana eeya as kessides.
50002008	As gidi qoncidikka bana asappe ziqa ooththides. Hayqqana gakkanaas hessikka masqale bolla kaqeti hayqqana gakkanaas azazettides.
50002009	Hessa gish Xoossi iza daro dhoqu histides. Suntha ubbafe dhoqu gida sunth izas immides.
50002010	Hessika salonka biitta bollan biittafe garsanka diza medhetethinne gulbatey wuri Yesusa sunthas gulbatana mala.
50002011	Asa inxarsi wurikka Xoossa Aawa bonchos Yesus Kirstoosi Goda gididayssa markattanassa.
50002012	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte kase ubba wode azazettizayta gidida mala ha7ikka ta matan doonta intefe haahon diikkokka inte atethay kumeth gidana mala yashshatethaninne bonchon polite.
50002013	Xoossi intes azazeteth immishe ba qofa wurseth gakkanaas inte giddon ooththes.
50002014	Ay miishikka zuuzunthinne palamay baynda ooththite.
50002015	Hessika inte iitanne geella asa giddon geeshshatanne wosoy baynda Xoossa nayta gididi alame bolla awa arshe mala dere ubbas poo7anassa.
50002016	Inte ekkida de7o qaala lo7ethi oykkikko Kirstoosi ha simmi yiza wode ta mela daaburontayssa gish ta ceeqqettanazi taas dees.
50002017	Qasseka intes Godan diza ammanoy inte Xoossas shiishada dumma yarsho mala ta shempoy inte yarshora issife yarsho mala gukkizakko intenara takka ufayettana.
50002018	Hessathoka inte intes ufayetidi tanaka ufayssanas bessees.
50002019	Goday maaddikko Ximtoosa inteko yeddada inte lo7etetha gish lo7o wore siyanas koyays.
50002020	Inte lo7etetha gish qoppiza asi hara iza malay oonikka baawa.
50002021	Haray wurikka Yesus Kirstoosayssa gidonta ba go7as woxxizade xalala.
50002022	Gido attin inte erizayssa mala Ximtoossi izi ay mala asakkone ba gish markasides. Nay ba aawara ooththiza mala tanara Mishiraachcho qaala yootides.
50002023	Hessa gish hayssafe sinthan ta waananakkonne shaaka eridappe guye iza ta inteko kiittana qoppays.
50002024	Takka inteko mata wode baanayssa Godan ammanettays.
50002025	Hessathoka inte tana koshshiza miishan ubban maaddana malanne lo7ethi oykkana mala yeddida Afrodixo ta inteko zaara yeddana mala koshshizayssi taas eretides.
50002026	Gaasoyka izi intena kumeththata beyanas laamotida gishshinne qasseka inte iza sakoza siyidayssas qoppida gishassa.
50002027	Tumappekka hargidi hayqqishe attides. Gido attin Xoossi iza maarides. Ta kase muuzotizayssa bolla hara muuzoy gujettonta mala tanaka maaddides.
50002028	Hessa gish inte iza beydi ufayettana malanne takka hirgafe shempana mala amottays.
50002029	Inte iza keehi ufayssan mokki ekkite. Iza mala asataka bonchite.
50002030	Inte tana matan diidi ooththi maaddanas dandayonta gish izi ba shempos mishetonta tana ooththi maaddidi Kirstoosa ooson hayqqishe attides.
50003001	Ta ishato! Hayssafe hara ta intena gizay Godan ufayetite. Ha7ikka zaarada izo ta intes xaafikko tana salethenna. Intenaka go7ana.
50003002	Heyta kana mala huskatizaytappe, iita ooththizaytappenne asas meqeth menthiza asataappe naagetite.
50003003	Tumu qaxxarettidayti, Xoosse woossizayti, Yesus Kirstoosan ceeqqizayti, ashon ceeqqettontaytinne ashonka ammanetontayti nuna.
50003004	Ta ceeqqana koykko asho baggara ceeqqana miishi taaska dees. Oonaska ashon ceeqqiza miishi diza misatikko ta izappe aadhdhays.
50003005	Tani yeletida ospuntha gallas qaxxarettadis. Ta Isra7eele zerethinne Biniyaame kochchafe yelettadis. Ibraaweeta giddon takka adda Ibraawe. Woga baggara oychizadey diikko ta kase Farsaawe.
50003006	Muse wogas zil7etizayssa gidikko tani kase Woossa Keeththa goodizadde. Woga naagon beettiza xillotethi gidikko kase ta bolla issi wosoykka deenna.
50003007	Gido attin taas go7a gididayssa ubba Kirstoosa gish gaada go7ay baynda miisha mala qoodadis.
50003008	Hessafeka ta goda Yesus Kirstoosa eroppe aadhdhizay haray aykkoykka bayndayssa ta ammaniza gish ubbakka coo mela go7ay baynda miisha mala qoodadis. Tani iza gish gaada ubbakka aggadis. Ta Kirstoosa demmana gaada ubba miishakka wora wodhdhida iita miisha mala qoodadis.
50003009	Tani hessatho ooththiza gaasoy kase Muse wogan taas diza xillotetha aggada ammanon beettiza Xoossa xilloteth Kirstoosan ammanada demmanassinne ta izara issife de7anassa.
50003010	Kirstoosanne izi hayqqi dendida dentha wolqa ta erana mala iza waayekka ta izara gishettana malanne hayqonka ta iza misatana mala amottays.
50003011	Hessathoka ta hayqqa dendidappe guye mernas daanas koyays
50003012	Ta hayssa wursa demmadis woykko hayssatho hanadis guus gidenna. Gido attin Yesus Kirstoosi tana erays histidi taas giigissida woyto ekkanas minna wotha bolla days.
50003013	Ta ishato! Ta ha7i ta koyizayssakka oykkida mala qoodikke. Gido attin ta issi miishi ooththana. Taappe guyera dizayssa agga aggada taappe sinthan dizayssa oykkanas zaradhays.
50003014	Xoossi tana Yesus Kirstoosa baggara pude xeygida gish woyto gakka ekkanas elelays.
50003015	Hessa gish nuni ammanon minnidayti wurikka haniza yo7o wursi hessatho xeellanas bessees. Issi issi dumma qofay intes diikko hessaka Xoossi intes qoncisana.
50003016	Gidikkokka nu ha7i gakki eridazan ane simeretoos.
50003017	Ta ishato! Ane inte ta haniza mala tana kaallitenne haratarakka issife de7ite. Nu nuna intes leemiso histi bessida mala diza asata woznan woththite.
50003018	Gaasoyka hayssafe kase ta intes zaara zaara yootida mala ha7ikka zaarada afunthara intes yootays. Daroti Kirstoosa masqales morke gididi simeretetes.
50003019	Ista wurseth dhayo. Ista uloy ista Xoossa. Istas kawushshatethay istas boncho. Ista woznay shempiday ha biitta duussanna.
50003020	Nu derey gidikko salona. Heeppe buro yaanayssa nuna ashshida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa yuussa laamotethan naagon doos.
50003021	Izikka wursi baappe garsan haarissana dandayiza ba wolqana, daaburanchcha gidida nu asateth bonchettida ba asateth misatissidi laammana.
50004001	Ta intena dosizayto! Ta intena laamotizayto! Taas ufayssinne ooso zawude gidida ta ishato! Godan minni eqqite.
50004002	Inte qofay Godan issino gidana mala Ewodiyanne Sinxekey ba garsan siiqettana mala ta ista woossays.
50004003	Ero! Neno! Tanara issife ammanettida oosanchazo, Mishiraachcho qaala yootos tanaranne Qalamenxoosara qasseka ista sunthay de7o maxaafen xaafetida hanko tanara ooso laggetara issife waayidayta he macasata ne maaddana mala ta nena woossays.
50004004	Ay wodekka Godan ufayetite. Qasseka ta intena ufayetite gays.
50004005	Inte kiyatethi asa ubba achchan ereto. Goday yaana matides.
50004006	Haniza yo7on ubban galatan, woossaninne gaannateththan Xoossa sinthi shiiqite attin ay miishanka hirgofte.
50004007	Asa qofappe bollara diza Xoossa sarotethi inte woznanne inte qofa wursi Yesus Kirstoosan naagees.
50004008	Wursetha bolla ta ishato! Tumu gidida yo7o wursi, boncho gidida yo7o wursi, adda gidida yo7o wursi, geeshshi gidida yo7o wursi, dosettida miishi wursi, lo7o gidida yo7o wursi, lo7etethi gidinka galataka haytanta misatizaz wursi qoppite.
50004009	Inte taappe tamaridayssa woykko inte taappe ekkidayssanne siyidayssa woykko beydayssa ay gidikkokka wursi ooththite. Goday intenara gidana.
50004010	Daro wodeppe guye ooratha qofara inte ta gish qofo oykkideta. Hessika Goda baggara tana keehi ufaysses. Tumukka inte taas qofo aggibeyketashin inte qoppida mala ooththanas intes hano ixxides.
50004011	Tani hessa gizay tana metida gish gidenna. Gaasoyka ta ay hanikkokka “Dizayssi taas gidana” guus tamaradis.
50004012	Pacekka ta erays; demmadakka erays; ta gafadakka, kalladaka erays; diinka dhayinka erays; ay gidikkokka taas dizay taas gidana guussa xuura ta lo7etha erays.
50004013	Taas wolqa immiza Kirstoosan tani ubba miishe ooththanas dandayays.
50004014	Gidikkokka inte tana ta waayen maaddida gish lo7o ooththideta.
50004015	Inte Piliphisiyoose asati hessafe bollara inte erizay koyro Mishiraachcho qaala inte ekkida wode tani Maqidooniyappe dendashe intefe attin gede immidikka haa ekkidikka maaddetidinne maaddidi giza Woossa Keeththi taas deenna.
50004016	Haray atto shin ta kase Tasolonqen diza wodekka tani metotin inte zaari zaari taas maado yeddideta.
50004017	Ta hessa gizay immida gish intes anjoy darana mala gaada attin ta intefe maado ekkanas amottada gidenna.
50004018	Taas koshshizayssanne tana koshshizayssafekka bollara ekkadis. Inte taas yeddida maado miisha Afrodixo kusheppe ekkin ta pacey kumides. Hayssi daroppe Xoossa achchan eketida daro lo7o sawiza yarsho mala.
50004019	Xoossi ba duretetha gina intena koshshizayssa Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara intes kunthana.
50004020	Nu Aawasinne nu Xoossas mernappe mernas bonchoy gido. Amiin.
50004021	Ammaniza asa ubba Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan saro giite. Tanara diza ishati wurikka intena saro geetes.
50004022	Ammanizayti wuri harappeka Qeesareso asappe ammanizayti wurikka intena saro geetes.
50004023	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa aadhdho kiyatethi intenara gido. Amiin.
51001001	Xoossa shenen Yesus Kirstoosan kiitettida Phawuloosappenne nu isha Ximtoosappe,
51001002	Qolassiyaasen diza Kirstoosan dummatidaytassinne ammanettida ishatas nu Aawa Xoossafe sarotethinne kiyateth intes gido.
51001003	Nu inte gish woossiza ubba gallas nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aawa Xoossa galatoos.
51001004	Gaasoyka intes Yesus Kirstoosan diza ammanoninne ammaniza asa inte wursi siiqizayssa nu siyida gishassa.
51001005	Hessi wurikka haniday salon intes giigetida hidotappe dendidayssanna. Hessa he hidota gish Mishiraachcho qaala inte kasetidi siyideta.
51001006	Hessika hee inteko gakkides. Hessa Mishiraachcho qaala inte siyosappenne Xoossa kiyatetha tumatetha inte ero gallassafe haa simmin alame yuushon izi ooththishe dizayssa mala inte achchan ayfe ayfishenne diccishe dees.
51001007	Hessaka ha7i nu gish gididi Kirstoosas ammanettida oosancha gididayssinne nunara issife ooththizanne siiqiza Ephapiray intena tamarsides.
51001008	Qasseka izi intenan diza Ayana siiqotetha nuus yootides.
51001009	Nu qasse hessa siyosappe haa simmin inte Xoossa shene eratethaninne akeekan intena kunthana mala inte gish woossa qanxibeekko.
51001010	Hessathoka Godas bessiza duus daana mala inte iza poli ufayssana mala lo7o ooso ubban ayfe immana malanne Xoosse eron dicci dicci baana mala nu intes woossos.
51001011	Goday ba gita wolqan ba minoteth ubba intes immo; wursikka inte dandayana malanne ufayssan giigettidayta gidana mala intena izi maaddo.
51001012	Ammanizayti laattizaso poo7o kawoteth laattizayta nu gidana mala nuna gathida nu Aawa inte galatanassa.
51001013	Izi nuna dhuman haareteththafe ashshidi gede ba dosiza naaza kawoteththan nuna pinthides.
51001014	Nu izan wozetidi nagarappe maaretidos.
51001015	Kirstoosi ayfen beettonta Xoossas tumu leemiso; medhetetha ubbafe gitanne bayra.
51001016	Medheteth wuri izan medhetides. Saloninne sa7an dizayti, ayfen beettizaytinne beettontayta gidinka, wolqamata gidinka, haarizayta gidinka woykko godateth dizayti haniday wurikka izan izas medhetides.
51001017	Izi ubbafe kase dees. Wurikka issi bolla oykketi minniday izanna.
51001018	Izi ba asateth gidida Woossa Keeththays hu7e. Ubbas bolla gidana mala izi hayqqida asa ubbafe koyro dendides.
51001019	Hessika haniday kumeththa Xoossatethay iza naazan de7ana mala Xoossa Aawa shene gidida gishassa.
51001020	Masqale bolla izappe gukkida suuthan saroteth medhidi biitta bolla gidin salo bolla dizayssa wursi iza baggara banara maqayinthides.
51001021	Inte iita amale gaason kase inte Xoossafe shaaketidi inte inte qofara izas morketakkoshin.
51001022	Ha7i qasse inte bolla balaynne wosoy baynda geeshshata ooththidi intena ba sinth shiishshanas Kirstoosa asho hayqo baggara Xoossi intena banara maqayinthides.
51001023	Hessika hananay inte ammanon xaphidinne giigettidi inte inte ammanon ekkida mishiraachcho qaalappe qaaxonta minni eqqikkonna. Intessinne salo gufanthon diza medhetethas sabaketida Mishiraachcho qaalay hessa. Ta Phawuloossikka hayssa ha mishiraachcho qaalas oosancha gidadis.
51001024	Ta inte gish waaye beydayssi ha7ikka tana ufaysses. Kirstoosi ba asateth; hessikka Woossa Keeththa gish izi ekkida waayezappe ekkishin paciday diikko tani ta ashon kunthana.
51001025	Xoossa qaala ta intes pacey baynda gaththana mala taas Xoossafe imettida hadara mala ta Woossa Keeththa oosancha gidadis.
51001026	Ha qaalay beni wodeppenne kase yeletethafe geemmidi xuura gidi gam7ides. Ha7i gidikko ammanizaytas ubbas qoncides.
51001027	Xoossi ba asas qoncisanas koyda xuuray iza boncho duretethay ayzaabe gidida inte giddon ay mala gitakkonne bessanassa. Izikka iza boncho hidota gidida inte giddon diza Kirstoosa.
51001028	Nuka issi issi as Kirstoosas kumeththa as histi shiishshanas dandayana mala as wursi hiillara zorishenne tamarsishe Kirstoosa gish sabakoos.
51001029	Takka ta garsan mintha ooththiza iza wolqan wursa baaxetashe he qofa polanas dafettays.
51002001	Inte gishinne Lodoqiyan dizaytanne hessathoka tana ba ayfera beyi eronta asa ubbas ta ay mala baaxetikkonne inte erana mala ta koyays.
51002002	Qasseka ista woznay minnana malanne isti siiqotethan issoy issara oykkettana mala kumeth gididayssa yuushi qoppi ero dureteth demmidi Xoossa xuura gidida Kirstoosa isti erana mala ta dafettays.
51002003	Qotan diza cincateththinne eratetha haaroy wurikka beettizay Kirstoosa achchanna.
51002004	Oonikka intena duuna mal7eththon baleththonta mala ta intes yootays.
51002005	Ta intefe asho ayfen haakka diikkokka Ayanan intenara issife days. Inte wogara dizayssanne inte Kirstoosa lo7eth ammanizayssa beyada ta daro ufayetays.
51002006	Hessa gish inte Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ammanida mala izan de7ite.
51002007	Inte izan tokketidinne keexettidi inte tamarida mala ammanon minni daro tirpa galata izas shiishshishe diite.
51002008	Kirstoosan xaphidaz gidonta asa woganinne go7ay baynda ha alameza laafa wogan eqqida asa eratethaninne coo mela baleththo haasayan intena oonikka di7onta mala naagetite.
51002009	Gaasoyka kumeththa Xoosateth iza asatethan dees.
51002010	Inteka haarizaytassinne godata ubbas hu7e gidida Kirstoosan kumeth gidite.
51002011	Inte izan qaxxaretideta. Hessi he qaxxarazika nagara gidida asho qofa digganas Kirstoosan hanidayssa attin asa kushen hanibenna.
51002012	Xinqatan izara issife moogetideta. Iza hayqoppe denthida Xoossa wolqan ammanidi qasseka izara issife dendideta.
51002013	Inte kase inte mooroninne inte asho nagara hanotetha intefe diggonta aggida gish hayqqidaytakko shin Xoossi intena Kirstoosa baggara pathides; inte nagarakka ubba atto gides.
51002014	Kase nuna mootishenne nunara eqetishe diza Muse wogan acco mootos xaafetidayssa qucci diggides. Masqale bolla torgidi nu bollafe diggides.
51002015	Halaqatanne godatizayta godateth istafe woththi ekkidinne masqale bolla hayqqidi xooni dendidi di7ettidayta qoncen yuushi bessides.
51002016	Hessa gish muussan woykko ushshan, issife bonchon woykko agina xeeroninne Sambata gallas boncho gish inte bolla oonikka pirdofo.
51002017	Heyti wurikka buro yaana hanotas eeshota gidishin waanna asatethay gidikko Kirstoosa.
51002018	Bessonta ashketethinne kiitanchatas goynno dosiza asi oonikka intena dhuphidi mela ashshonta mala naagetite. Hessa mala asi ba beyida agumos wogay baynda bana nashishe hada asho qofan kumidi otoretes.
51002019	Hessa mala asas hu7e gidida Kirstoosara aykko gaytoteththikka deenna. Kumeththa asateth shayaninne koldze gaththi oythethi dichchiza hu7ey Kirstoosa. Xoossi Kirstoosa asateth kumeth dichchizay hessa malanna.
51002020	Hayssa ha alameza wogas inte Kirstoosara hayqqidayta gidikko histin ha7i aazas he wogas haarettetii?
51002021	Oykkofa, laaca beyoppa; bochchofa gizayta mala.
51002022	Hayti wuri asa azazoninne asa timirten wodhdhida wogata gidida gish ooththetidappe guye coo dhayanas deettes.
51002023	Ha azazoti barka bappe medhi ekkida goynno qofay coo bessonta ashketethinne ba asateth naaqi oythan istas tumu aadho erateth dizayta misatetes. Gido attin asho amoteth shiishshi oykiza wolqay istas baawa.
51003001	Histikko inte Kirstoosara issife dendidayta gidikko Kirstoosi Xoossa achchan uttidason puden diza hanotetha koyite.
51003002	Inte qofay pude bollan diza miisha bolla gido attin ha biitta yo7o bolla gidoppo.
51003003	Gaasoyka inte hayqqidetanne inte de7oyka Kirstoosara Xoossa achchan qotetides.
51003004	Intes de7o gidida Kirstoosi qonciza gallas inteka he wode izara issife bonchora qoncana.
51003005	Hessa gish intes biitta bolla diza amoteth diggite. Heytikka layma, tunateth, asho amo, iita amotethinne eeqas goynno mala gidida gaphigapho.
51003006	Heytanta gaason Xoossa hanqoy Xoossas azazettontayta bolla yaana.
51003007	Inteka kase diza duussan he miishata ooththideta.
51003008	Ha7i gidikko hanqo, yiillo, cashshe, zigirsinne yeellasiza haasaya heytanta misatizayta wursi diggite.
51003009	Kase ceega asateth iza oosora gaththi intefe qaari yeggida gish inte inte garsan issoy issara wordo hasayoppite.
51003010	Bana medhdhidayssa misatana mala eran ooraxida ooratha asateth may7ideta.
51003011	Heen Girike as gidin woykko Yuhuda as woykko qaxxarettidayta woykko qaxxaretontayta woykko tamaridaytanne tamarontayta woykko maaretontayta woykko aylle woykko goqa geetettiza dummatethi deenna. Kirstoosi heytanta ubbassa. Qasse ubbanka dees.
51003012	Hessa gish dumma gididi dosettidayto, inte Xoossas doorettidayta gidida mala mishetethinne kiyateth, ashketeth, bonchonne dandaya may7ite.
51003013	Inte issoy issa dandayite, intefe issadey issade bolla mishetikko yo7oykka iza bolla diikko issoy issas atto atto geetettite. Godayka intes atto gida mala inteka hara asas atto giite.
51003014	Hessa ubba bolla ubba kumeththa issifetethan shiishshi qachchiza siiqo may7ite.
51003015	Inte wurikka issi asho gididi sarotethas xeeygetida Kirstoosa sarotethi inte woznan kawoto. Inte galatizayta gidite.
51003016	Kirstoosa qaalay intenan kumeth gido. Inte inte garsan aadho eratethan tamaritenne zoretite; mazamureninne saban Ayana yethan galatara gaththi inte woznara Xoossas yexite.
51003017	Iza baggara Xoossa Aawas galata shiishshishe qaalan gidin woykko ooson inte ooththizayssa wursi Goda Yesusa sunthan ooththite.
51003018	Macheto! Goda achchan intes bessiza miish gidida gish inte azinatas azazetite.
51003019	Azinato! Inte inte macheta siiqitenne istas menxe iitoppite.
51003020	Nayto! Inte Goda ufayssana mala inte intena yelidaytas ubba miishan azazetite.
51003021	Aawato! Nayti hidota qanxonta mala inte nayta hanqethofte.
51003022	Aylleto! As ufayssasinne coo ayfeson betanas gidonta suure woznappe inte Godas babbite. Hayssa biittan haariza godataska hano ubban azazetite.
51003023	Inte ooththiza miish wursi asas gidonta Godas ooththiza mala taybidi kumeththa woznappe ooththite.
51003024	Inte Goda achchafe inte ooso mala ekkanas laatay dizayssa inte ereeta. Inte ooththizay Goda Yesus Kirstoosassa.
51003025	Qoho ooththidadey ba ooththidari kushe ekkana. Iza achchan dumma maadoy deenna.
51004001	Godato! Intes salon Goday dizayssa inte eriza gish intes ooththizaytas tumaninne suuretethan ooththite.
51004002	Beegidi galatara gaththi pacey baynda Xoossa woossite.
51004003	Ta iza gish qashetida Kirstoosa xuura awajjanas dandayana mala Xoossi nuus qaala yootanas oge doyana mala nu gishikka woossite.
51004004	Qasseka haasayanas bessiza qaala qonccen ta haasayana mala taas woossite.
51004005	Ammanonta asatara intes diza hanotethan aadho eratethan Simeretite. Intes beettida lo7o qaadan go7ettite.
51004006	Issos issas inte zaaro wosti immanakone inte erana mala inte haasayay maxinera kaxxida kaththa mala mal7o gido.
51004007	Tiqiqoossi ta duussa gish wursi intes yootana. Izi daro dosettida ishanne Godas tanara issife ooththiza ammanettida oosancha.
51004008	Nu duussa gish inte erana malanne inte wozna minthana mala tani iza inteko kiittadis.
51004009	Izi inte bagga gididi ammanettidadenne dosettidade gidida nu isha Anasmoosara inteko erays. Istika haan diza hanoza wursi intes yootana.
51004010	Barnabaasa aawa michey naa Marqoossinne tanara issife qashetida Arxirokoossi intena saro geetes. Marqoosa gish inte ay ooththanakkonne kase intena ta qofisa woththida mala izi inteko gakkishin mokki ekite.
51004011	Iyosxoosa geetettiza Iyaasoyka intena saro gees. Ayhuda asa giddofe Xoossa Kawoteththas tanara ooththizayti haytanta xalla. Isti tana minthethida.
51004012	Inte baggafe gidida Yesus Kirstoosa oosancha Ephapiray intena saro gees. Izikka intena Ayana duussan lo7ethi minnidinne mulera woppu giidi Xoossa shenen minni eqqana mala ubba wode inte gish woossan baaxetees.
51004013	Qasseka inte gish hessathoka Lodoqiyaninne Iyarpolise kataman dizaytas izi pacey baynda ooththizayssa ta izas markatays.
51004014	Daro dosettida aakkime Luqaassinne Deemaassi intena saro geetes.
51004015	Lodoqiyan diza nu ishataas, Nimpussinne izi keeththan shiiqiza ammaniza asatas ta saroka yootite.
51004016	Hanna ta kiitaya intes nababetida mala qasseka Lodoqiyan diza Woossa Keeththayn nababettana mala ooththite. Inteka qasse Lodoqiyappe intes kiitettida kiita nababite.
51004017	Akiriphas “Neni Godappe ekkida oosoza wurseth gaththanas minna” giite.
51004018	Hayssa saroka tani Phawuloosi ta kushera xaafadis. Ta qasheta dizayssa doggoppite. Xoossa kiyatethi intenara gido.
52001001	Phawuloosappe, Silwaanooseppenne Ximtoosappe; Xoossa Aawasinne Goda Yesus Kirstoosayta gidida Tasolonqen diza ammaniza asas nu Aawa Xoossafenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethinne saroteth intes gido.
52001002	Nu intena nu woossan qoppishe ubba wode Xoossa inte gish galatoos.
52001003	Ammanoninne mino siiqotethan inte ooththida ooso gish Goda Yesus Kirstoosa bolla diza inte mino ufayssan beettida inte minotetha gish nu Goda Xoossa, nu Aawa sinthan ubba gallas inte gish qoppoos.
52001004	Xoossan dosettida nu ishato! Izi intena dooridayssa nu eroos.
52001005	Gaasoyka Mishiraachcho qaalay inteko yiday wolqara Xillo Ayananinne lo7ethi shaakki erin attin coo qaala xallan gidenna; qasseka nu inte gish giidi waani de7idakkone inte ereeta.
52001006	Ha7i inte nunanne Goda misatideta. Inte bolla ay metoy gakkida gidikkokka Xillo Ayana ufayssa qaala inte ekkideta.
52001007	Hessafe dendidayssan inte Maqidooniyaninne Akaayan ammaniza asa ubbas lo7o leemisota gidideta.
52001008	Goda qaalay intefe kezidi Maqidooniyaninne Akaayan siyeteth xalla gidonta intes Xoossa bolla diza ammanoy ubbason eretides; hessa gish nu intes yootanas aykkokka koshshenna.
52001009	Inte nuna wosti mokki ekkidakkone de7on diza tumu Xoossas ooththanas inte eeqatappe Xoossakko waani simmidako asay inte gish haasayees.
52001010	Qasseka Xoossi hayqoppe denthidayssa buro yaana hanqofe nuna ashshana Saloppe yaana Xoossa Naa Yesusa yuussa inte wosti naagizakkone asay haasayees.
52002001	Nu ishato! Nu intekon gam7ida gam7oy coo mela gidontayssa inteka ereeta.
52002002	Inteka erizayssa mala hayssafe kase Piliphisiyoosen nu waayenne meto beydossinne cayettidos; gido attin aynne mino waayey nuna gakkikkoka Xoossa Mishiraachcho qaala intes yootanas nu Godappe xalateth demmidos.
52002003	Nu intena zorida zorey iita qofara woykko intena baleththanas koydi gidenna.
52002004	Gido attin nu Mishiraachcho qaala hadara ekkanas dandayiza asata mala Xoossi nuna qoodida gish nu hasayos; hessaka nu ooththizay nu wozna paaci eriza Xoossa ufayssanas attin as ufayssanas giidi gidenna.
52002005	Nu mulekka baleththo qaala yootibeekko woykko nu uuzeteth kammanas giidi baleththo hano nu hanotayssa inte ereeta. Hayssaska nu markay Xoossa.
52002006	Intefe gidin woykko haratappe oonappekka asappe imettiza boncho nu koybekko.
52002007	Nu Kirstoosi kiittidayta gidida gish intes tooho gidanas dandayoos; gido attin aaya ba nayta dichchiza mala nukka inte giddon ashketethan simeretidos.
52002008	Xoossa qaala xalla gidonta dishin nu shempoka inte gish ufayssan immana gakkanaas intena siiqidos. Gaasoyka nu intena daro siiqida gishassa.
52002009	Nu ishato! Nu dafetteththanne nu daabura inte ereeta; oonaska tooho gidonta mala qammanne gallas nuus ooththishe Mishiraachcho qaala intes yootidos.
52002010	Nu intenara ammanizaytara diza wode xillotethaninne geeshshatethan qasseka wosoy baynda nu waani de7idakkonne inteka Xoossika nuus marka.
52002011	Aaway ba naytas haniza mala nukka intes issas issas ay hanidakkonne inte ereeta.
52002012	Inte intena ba kawotethassinne ba bonchos xeygida Xoossas bessiza mala inte daana mala nu intena minthidos; lo7ethi zoridossinne hadara gidos.
52002013	Inte nuuppe siyida Xoossa qaala ekkida wode ammaniza inte achchan tumu ooththiza Xoossa qaala mala ekkideta attin coo asa qaala mala inte ekkonta aggida gish nu Xoossa qanxoy baynda galatoos.
52002014	Nu ishato! Yuhuda biittan Yesus Kirstoosa ammaniza Xoossa Woossa Keeththata misatideta; isti Ayhudatappe metonne waaye ekkida mala inteka inte asappe waaye ekkideta.
52002015	Isti Goda Yesusanne kase nabetaka wodhida; nunakka goodida; Xoossaka ufaysibetenna; asa ubbara eqetizayta gidida.
52002016	Hessika Ayzaabeti siydi attana qaala nu istas yootonta mala digganassa. Hessa mala ooson ba nagara ubba wode ba bolla wurseth gakkanaas gujji gujji beetes; Xoossa hanqoyka ista bolla wodhdhides.
52002017	Gidikkokka nu ishato! Nu guutha wodes intefe Ayanan gidonta ashon shaakketikkokka inte laamotay nuna wodhiza gish inte ayfeso beyanas daro dafetteththan doos.
52002018	Nu inteko baanas daro laamotidos shin harappeka ta Phawuloosi daro wode dafettadis shin Xala7ey nuna diggides.
52002019	Goda Yesusi ha yiza wode iza sinthan nu amoy woykko nu ufaysi woykko nu zawudey nuus intefe haray oonee?
52002020	Tumappekka nu ufaysinne nu bonchoy intena.
52003001	Hessa gish nuus dandayettonta ixin he wode Atenan nurka nu attanayssi nuus lo7o gidi beettides.
52003002	Intena ammanon minthana mala nunara asas Kirstoosa mishiraachcho qaala yootiza Xoossa ashkara gidida Ximtoosa inteko yeddidos.
52003003	Hessika hayssa paacezan oonikka ammanoppe qanxonta mala; nukka hayssas doorettidayssa inteka ereeta.
52003004	Nu qasse intenara diza wode waayey nu bolla gakkanayssa kasetidi intes yootidos; inte eriza malaka hanides.
52003005	Hessa gish aykkokka ta gencecin taas dandayettonta ixida gish inte ammano gish eranas gaada Ximtoosa kiitadis. Ta hessa ooththiday ooni erize paacizadey ista paacin hanni wode nu daaburay wurikka mela gidonta aggenna gaada babbida gishassa.
52003006	Ha7i qasse Ximtoossi inte achchafe nuukko yiidi inte ammano gishshinne inte siiqotetha gish lo7o wore nuna sisides. Qasseka inte ubba wode nuna lo7ethi qoppizayssanne nukka intena beyanas laamotiza mala inteka nuna beyanas laamotizayssa nuus yootides.
52003007	Hessa gish nu ishato! Nu dizay waayeninne meto garsan gidikkokka inte ammano gaason intenan ha7i nu minetoos.
52003008	Inte Godan minni eqqida gish tumappe ha7i nu paxa daana.
52003009	Inte geedon nu Xoossa sinthan nu demmida ufaysa ubba gish Xoossa ay mala galatanas dandayizonii?
52003010	Qasseka nu intena beyanassinne inte ammanoppe paccidayssa kunthanas omarsinne gallas keehi woossos.
52003011	Ha7ikka nu inteko baana mala nu Aaway Xoossi Goda Yesus Kirstoosi ogeza izi nuus suuriso.
52003012	Nu intena siiqiza mala intes inte garsan diza siiqonne inte harata siiqiza siiqoza Goday darsonne keehi gujjo.
52003013	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi geeshshata ubbatara yiza wode nu Aawa Goda Xoossa sinthan inte wosoy bayndaytanne geeshshata gididi bettana mala inte wozna izi miniso.
52004001	Ha7i wursethan ta ishato! Inte Xoossa ufayssanas inte waani waani daana bessizakkone nu intena tamarsidos. Tumappekka nu tamarsida mala deeta; hessa gish Goda Yesus Kirstoosan nu intena woossizaynne zorizay hayssafeka aadhdhiza hanora inte sinthe gujjana mala.
52004002	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa wolqan nu intes ay azazo immidakkone inte ereeta.
52004003	Xoossa sheney inte laymappe hakkidi dummatanassa.
52004004	Qasse issi issi asay ba macho geeshshatethaninne bonchon ayso bessizayssa shaakki ero.
52004005	Hessika Xoosse ammanonta Ayzaabeta mala layma qaqetethan gidoppo.
52004006	Hessa malan oonikka balettidi ba isha baleththofo; gaasoyka hayssafe kase nu intes yootida malanne naagetanas akeekissida mala Goday heytanta mala nagara ooththiza ubbata bolla ba hanqo ehana.
52004007	Xoossi nuna geeshshateththas xeygides attin tunatethas xeygibenna.
52004008	Hessa gish hayssa ha zoreza kadhidi ekkontadey Xillo Ayana izas immida Xoossa kadhees attin as kadhizade gidenna.
52004009	Ishata siiqotetha gish intes oonikka xaafanas koshshenna; gaasoyka inte inte giddon siiqettana mala inte inte baggara Xoossafe tamarideta.
52004010	Kumeththa Maqidooniyan diza ammaniza asa inte wursi siiqizays eretidayssa. Gido attin nu ishato! Sintha baggan inte hayssafe aaththi siiqettana mala nu intenna zoroos.
52004011	Nu hayssafe kase intena azazida mala inte inte kushera ooththite; woppu gi diite; intes gidizayssa lo7ethi xeellite.
52004012	Hessika gallas gallas inte duussay hanko ammanonta asa achchan intena bonchissana malanne inte ayy asaska tooho gidonta mala.
52004013	Ta ishato! Inte ashon hayqqidayta gish eronta attana mala nu koyokko. Qasseka hidotay baynda hara asata mala inte kayottana mala nu koyokko.
52004014	Yesusi hayqqidi dendidayssa nu ammaniza gidikko Yesusa ammanidayta Xoossi Yesusara hessathoka zaari ha yeddana.
52004015	Nu Goda qaalan intes gizay hayssa. Nuni hayqqonta paxa dizaytinne Goday yaana gakkanaas gam7anayti kase hayqqidaytappe sinthatokko.
52004016	Goday ba hu7era gita azazon kiitanchata halaqa giirissara Xoossa xurumba giirissan saloppe wodhdhana. Kase Kirstoosa ammanidi hayqqidayti isti kaseti dendana.
52004017	Hessafe guye nu qasse paxa dizayti Goda carko bolla gaagganas istara issife shaarara dendana; hessathoka nu mernas Godara daana.
52004018	Hessa gish hayssa qaalan issoy issara minetite.
52005001	Ta ishato! Hessi hanana wodeza gish nu intes xaafanas koshshenna.
52005002	Kaysoy qamman yiza mala Goda gallassikka hessa mala yaanayssa inte inte baggara lo7ethi ereeta.
52005003	Asay “Gadey saronne lo7okko” gishin miixay qanthara diza macas oykkiza mala hessathoka as dhayssizay qopponta asa bolla gakkana. Oonikka kessi ekkenna.
52005004	Inteno ishato! He gallassay kayso mala intena daganthanas inte dhuman deekketa.
