52005005	Inte wurikka poo7o nayta; nuni dhuma woykko qamma bagga gidokko.
52005006	Histikko ane beeggoos; ane nurka nuna haaros attin hanko dhiskiza asa mala nukka ane dhiskokko.
52005007	Dhisikizayti qamara dhisikeetes; mathotizaytikka qamara mathottettes.
52005008	Nu qas gallasa asata gidida gish ammanonne siiqo, tiran may7iza xurure may7o mala may7idi atotetha hidota hu7en woththiza birata qoobe mala hu7en woththidi ane nunatetha haaridi de7oos.
52005009	Xoossi nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara atoteth demmana mala attin nuna hanqos xeygibenna.
52005010	Nu hayqqikkoka woykko paxa diikkokka izara daana mala izi nu gish hayqqides.
52005011	Hessa gish tumappe inte ha7i ooththizayssa malaka issoy issara minetitenne minthethite.
52005012	Histikko ta ishato! Inte giddon minni ooththizayta Godan intefe bollara diza halaqatanne intena zorizayta inte bonchana mala nu intena woossos.
52005013	Ista ooso gishikka ista siiqora lo7ethi bonchite; inte inte giddon saron diite.
52005014	Ta ishato! Nu intena “Ooso ooththonta asata hanqettite; babbizayta minisite; daaburanchata maaddite; as ubba dandayite” gi zoroos.
52005015	Oonaska iita gish iita zaaronta mala naagetite; gido attin inte inte giddon gidin hara asara gidin ubba wode lo7o gidizayssa ooththanas baaxetite.
52005016	Ubba wode ufayetite.
52005017	Qanxonta woossite.
52005018	Ay hanonka galattite Xoossa sheney intes Yesus Kirstoosa baggara hessa.
52005019	Xillo Ayana tama toyssofte.
52005020	Tinbite qaala kadhoppite.
52005021	Wursikka paaci xeellite, lo7o gididaz oykkite.
52005022	Iita gidida ay miishappekka haakkite.
52005023	Sarotetha Goday izi intenatetha erays dummaso; inte ayanay, inte shempoynne inte ashoy Goda Yesus Kirstoosi yiza wode wosoy baynda naageto.
52005024	Intena xeygidayssi ammanettidade gidida gish izi hessa ooththana.
52005025	Nu ishato! Nu gishikka woossite.
52005026	Ammanizayta ubba geeshsha yeeretethan sarokite.
52005027	Ha kiitay ammanizaytas ubbas nababettana mala Goda sunthan hadara gays.
52005028	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa aadhdho kiyatethi intenara gido.
53001001	Phawuloosappe, Silwaanooseppenne Ximtoosappe; nu Aawa Xoossaninne Goda Yesus Kirstoosan gidida Tasolonqen ammaniza asas.
53001002	Xoossa Aawappenne Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne saroteth intes gido.
53001003	Ta ishato! Inte ammanoy wodeppe woden dicci dicci biza gishshinne inte siiqoyka kaseppe gujeti gujeti biza gish nu inte gish Xoossa lo7ethi galatanas bessees.
53001004	Hessa gish inte bolla gakkida goodeteththaninne meto ubban inte minnida gish nuni nu baggara inte dandaya gishshinne inte ammano gish ammaniza asa ubba achchan ceeqqettos.
53001005	Hessi wurikka Xoossa pirday suure gididayssa besses. Hessa geedon waaye beyiza inte Xoossa Kawoteththas bessizayta gidi bettideta.
53001006	Xoossi xillo gidida gish intena waaysizayta izi waayssana.
53001007	Waaye ekkida intessinne nuus shempo immana. Hessika Goda Yesus Kirstoosi wolqama salo Xoossa kiitanchatara salo bolla qonciza wode hanana.
53001008	He wode Xoosse eronta asatanne Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Mishiraachcho qaalas azazettonta asata bolla izi ba halo laco taman kessana.
53001009	Istika Goda sinthafenne iza boncho wolqa achchafe kichchidi mernas dhayon qaxayettana.
53001010	Isti qaxayettanay izi geeshshata achchan bonchettanassinne ammanizayti wuri izan malalettana mala izi yiza gallassan hanana. Inteka he ammaniza asara daana; gaasoyka nu intes markattidayssa inte ammanida gishassa.
53001011	Nu hessa qoppishe nu Xoossi intena ba xeeyssas gidizayta histi qoodana mala inte lo7o ooththanas amottiza amozanne ammanon inte ooththida oosoza wursi izi intes ba wolqan polana mala nu intes ubba wode woossos.
53001012	Qasseka nu Goda Xoossanne nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatetha mala Yesus Kirstoosa sunthi inte achchan bonchettana malanne inteka izan bonchettana mala nu intes woossos.
53002001	Ta ishato! Goda Yesus Kirstoosa yuussa gishshinne nu izakko baana buussa gish nu intena qofisoos.
53002002	Ayanay qoncisides woykko qaalay gees giidi woykko nuuppe intes kiitettida kiita mala “Goda yuussa gallas gakkides” giidi inte qofan yark yarkofitenne daggammofte.
53002003	Oonikka ay hanonka intena baleththofo. Daro asay ammano kadanappe sinthe dhayanas bessiza issi makala asi qonconta dishin he gallassay gakkenna.
53002004	Izikka Xoosse geetetti gooynettiza eeqa xoossata ubbafe bollara bana dhoqu dhoqu histizadenne Xoossara eqettizade. Izikka Xoossa Keeththan uttidi bana “Tani Xoossa” giidi awajja awajjisana.
53002005	Ta intenara diza wode hayta ha yo7ota intes ta yootidayssi intes qofetizeshaa?
53002006	Izi ba woden qoncana gakkanaas ha7i izi qonconta mala aazi diggizakkonne inte ereeta.
53002007	Makalancha xuuray haray attoshin Ha7ikka ooso bolla dees. Gido attin hayssi hananay izi ha7i ooththonta mala iza diggizaddey iza ogeppe kichchana gakkanaas xalla.
53002008	Hessafeka kaallidi Goda Yesusi ba duuna peenoninne ba boncho yuussan dhayssana; makalanchay qoncana.
53002009	He makalancha yuussi Xala7e wolqan hessikka as baleththiza malatataninne malalisiza miishatan hanana.
53002010	Hessathoka ekkidi attonta mala tuma ixidi dhayiza asata baleththanas dumma dumma iita oosoy yaana.
53002011	Hessa geedon isti wordo yo7o ammanana mala Xoossi ista bolla bala ooso kiittana.
53002012	Hessi hananay tuma ammanonta ixidinne wordo yo7on ufayetizayti wuri pirdettanasa.
53002013	Godan dosettida ta ishato! Nu gidikko ubba wode inte gish Xoosse galatanas nuus besses. Gaasoyka Xoossi intena koyroppe oykkidi inte Xillo Ayanan dummatidaytanne tumu ammanidi inte attana mala intena doorides.
53002014	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi boncho gishettizayta inte gidana mala nu yootida mishiraachcho qaala baggara intena xeygides.
53002015	Hessa gish ta ishato! Inte minni eqqite, nu nu duunan gidin woykko kiitan woykko nu intes aaththi yeddida timirteza lo7ethi oykkite.
53002016	Izi nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi qasse nuna siiqidaynne ba kiyatethan merna minthethonne lo7o hidota izi nuus immida nu Aawa Xoossay,
53002017	izi inte wozna lo7o oosoninne qaalan mintho.
53003001	Wursethan ta ishato! Qasseka Goda qaalay inte achchan hanoyssathoka eleeli ubbaso gakkana malanne bonchettana mala nuus woossite.
53003002	Qasseka asi wuri ammanizayssa gidonta gish makalanchatappenne iita asatappe nu attana mala nuus woossite.
53003003	Goday gidikko ammanettidayssa. Izikka intena minthana; Xala7epaka intena naagana.
53003004	Nu intena azazidayssa inte ha7i ooththideta shin sinthafekka inte ooththanayssa nuni Godan ammanettos.
53003005	Goday inte wozna Xoossa siiqokkonne Kirstoosa dandayakko kaaletho.
53003006	Ta ishato! Ooso ooththonta asappenne inte nuuppe ekkida timirteza mala doonta ammanizaytappe inte haakkana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan intena nu azazoos.
53003007	Inte nu leemiso wosti kallanakkonne inte inte baggara ereeta. Nu intenara diza wode ooso ooththonta coo de7ibekko.
53003008	Qasseka oona soppekka kath coo mela mibeekko. Gido attin intefe oonasika nu tooho gidonta mala qammanne gallas daaburan ooththi midos.
53003009	Nu hessa ooththiday inte nuna kaallana mala intes lo7o leemiso gidana giidippe attin nuus koshshizayssa intefe ekkana nuna diggiza wogay diin gidenna.
53003010	Nu intenara diza wode “Ooso ooththanas dosonta asi kath mooppo” giza azazo intes immidos.
53003011	Inte giddon issi issi asati ooso ooththontayssa nu siyidos. Heytanti ooso ooththonta mela asa yo7on geliza asata.
53003012	Heyta mala asati ba ooso co7u gi ooththana malanne ba kath maana mala Goda Yesus Kirstoosa sunthan nu ista azazoossinne zoroos.
53003013	Inte gidikko ta ishato! Lo7o ooso ooththanappe mulekka azaallofte.
53003014	Hayssa nu kiittida qaalas azazettontay oonikka diikko hessa misatizade lo7ethi kaallitenne izi ba ooson yeelatana mala izara gaggofte.
53003015	Gido attin iza inte isha mala hanqite attin morke mala xeellofte.
53003016	Sarotetha Goday izi ba baggara yo7o ubban intes saroteth immo. Goday intenara ubbara gido.
53003017	Hayssa saroka ta ta kushera intes xaafiday tana Phawuloosa. Ta kiitas dumma malatay hayssa; izikka hayssa tani ta kushen xaafoyssa.
53003018	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa aadhdho kiyatethi intenara ubbara gido.
54001001	Nuna ashshida Xoossan, nuus hidota gidida Yesus Kirstoosa azazon Hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe
54001002	Ammanon taas tumu naa gidida Ximtoosas Xoossa nu Aawappe nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyateth, maarotethinne saroy nees gido.
54001003	Tani Maqidooniya bashe nena hadara gida mala hayssafe sinthan issi issi asati wordo timirte tamarsonta mala ne azazanas Efesoonen daashsha.
54001004	Qasseka asay yootin wuronta beni wode haysi7en ba wode wursonta mala azaza. Heyta mala yo7oy palama dentheththes attin ammanon oosettiza Xoossa oosos aykkokka go7enna.
54001005	Ha azazozas waanna ayfe yo7oy gidikko geeshsha woznappe lo7o qofara hessathoka tumu ammanoppe beettiza siiqo.
54001006	Issi issi asay haytappe pooqi eqqidi go7ay baynda yo7otakko simmides.
54001007	Woga tamarsizayta gidana mala koyeettes. Gidikkokka isti ba yootizayssa woykko keehi mootetiza yo7oza lo7ethi eretenna.
54001008	Gido attin asi maaran go7ettizakko wogay lo7o gididayssa nu eroos.
54001009	Qasseka wogay imettiday xillo asas gidonta woga yedhi aadhdhizaytas, azazettontaytas, Xoossas babbontaytas, nagaranchatas, geeshshatethi bayndaytas, Xoosse leeqqizaytas, ba aayonne ba aawa wodhizaytasinne shempo wodhizaytas gididayssa nu eroos.
54001010	Hessathoka laymatizaytas, addera aqqiza addetas, as bayzizaytasinne shaamizaytas, wordanchatas, asas wordora caaqizaytas, lo7o timirtera eqqettiza ubbatassa.
54001011	He lo7o timirtey anjetida Xoossi taas hadara immida boncho mishiraachcho qaalara gaaggizayssa.
54001012	Tana ba oosos shuumidinne ammanettizade ooththi ekkidinne taas minoteth immida nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ta galatays.
54001013	Hayssafe kase ta ay mala as cayizadenne goodeththizade, qasse makala as gidikkokka hessa ta erontanne ammanonta dashe ooththida gish Xoossi tana maarides.
54001014	Yesus Kirstoosappe gidida ammanoranne siiqora nu Goda kiyateth taas keehi darides.
54001015	Yesus Kirstoosi nagaranchata ashshanas duge hayssa ha alame yides giza qaalay tumanne asi wurikka ekkanas bessizayssa. Nagaranchatappekka aadhdhiza nagaranchay tana.
54001016	Gido attin ta maaretidaykka Yesus Kirstoosi zaway baynda ba dandaya, ubbafe aadhdhida nagarancha gidida ta bolla bessiday izan ammananaytassinne merna de7o demmanaytas leemiso gidana mala.
54001017	Hessa gish mernas hayqqi eronta, ayfen beetti eronta barka xalla Xoosse gidida kawos mernappe merna gakkanaas izas bonchoynne galatay gido. Amiin.
54001018	Ta naa Ximtoosa ne gish kasetidi yootetida mala hayssa azazoza ta nees immadis. Hessika ne he qaala kaallashe lo7o baaxe baaxetanassa.
54001019	Ammanoynne lo7o qofay nees de7o. Issi issi asati ba lo7o qofa yedhi aadhdhidi abba bolla metoy iza bolla gakkin waayetiza markabe mala ba ammano dhayssida.
54001020	Ista giddon Xoossa cash aggidi tamarana mala tani Xala7es aaththa immidayti Hemenewoossinne Iskindirosi deettes.
54002001	Hessa gish ubbafe koyro hara asas shoobetha woossa, gaannateththa woossanne galata woossa asa ubbas kawotassinne dere ayssizaytas ubbas woossana mala ta nena qofisays.
54002002	Hessika Tumu Ayana duussaninne geeshshateth ubban nuni sarotethaninne wogan daana malassa.
54002003	Hayssi nuna ashshiza Xoossa achchan lo7onne ufaysizaza.
54002004	Izi asi wuri attana malanne tuma erana mala koyees.
54002005	Issi Xoossi xalla dees. Qasseka Xoossasinne asas giddon issi giigisiza gaannay dees. Izikka as gidida Yesus Kirstoosa.
54002006	Izi bana asa ubbas aaththi immides. Hessika heerakka wodey aadhdhonta izas markatides.
54002007	Takka hayssas mishiraachcho yootanas kiitettidade. Qasseka deretas tumu ammano astamare gidada shuumetadis. Hessaka ta wordotonta tumu yootanassa.
54002008	Hessa gish attuma asay ubba soon hanqoy bayndanne palamay baynda ba geeshsha kusheta pude dhoqu histidi woossana mala ta koyayis.
54002009	Hessathoka macasati bonchora bana shiishshi ekkidi bessiza may7o may7eto, attin ba hu7e daddi ekkidi woykko al7o may7o, worqanne inqu aaththidi walq walq gooppetto.
54002010	Gido attin Xoosse woossos giza macasati istas ooththana bessiza lo7o ooson lo7etto.
54002011	Macassi co7u gaada kumeththara azazeteth tamaru.
54002012	Macassi co7u gaanappe attin iza tamarsana mala woykko adde bolla godatana mala ta koyikke.
54002013	Gaasoyka koyro Addamey medhetides; kaallada Hewaana medhetadus.
54002014	Qasseka koyro balettiday Addame gidenna. balettada Xoossa wogappe aadhdhiday macasayo.
54002015	Gidikkokka macassi ammanoninne siiqon geeshshatethan barka bana haaron minnikko naa yelon attana.
54003001	“Oonikka Woossa Keeththa cima gidana koykko lo7o ooso amottes” giza qaalay tuma.
54003002	Hessa gidikko Woossa Keeththe kaalethizadey borey bayndade; issi macha diza adde; ginara dizadde; bana haarizade; wogara aqqizade; imath mokkizade; tamarsanas dandayizadde;
54003003	Mathotontade, oosh oyeetontade, qas maarage as, asara palametontade, miish goodontadde, gidanas bessees.
54003004	Ba nayta azazettizaytanne as bonchizayta histi dichchidi ba keeththa asa wogara ayssizade gidanas bessees.
54003005	Issadey ba keeththa asa wogara ayso eronta aggikko Xoossa Woossa Keeththe wosti naagana dandayizee?
54003006	Otoretethan puurdi Xala7ey kundida pirdan izi kundonta mala oorath ammanizade gidoppo.
54003007	Qasseka iza sunthan boretonta malanne Xala7e narxan izi gelonta mala ammanonta asa achchan lo7o markateth daanas koshshees.
54003008	Daaqonetikka hessatho bonchettidaytanne ba gida qaala laammi laammi yeggontayta, daro woyne ushshas amottontayta, ogey baynda go7a goodontayta gidanas bessees.
54003009	Ammano xuura, lo7o qofara naaganas bessees.
54003010	Haytantikka koyrotti paaceteto. Issi iitay ista bolla beettonta aggikko hessafe guye daaqoneteththan ooththeto.
54003011	Maca daaqonetikka bonchettidayta, zigirontayta, qas wogara dizayta, hano ubban ammanetidayta gidanas bessees.
54003012	Daaqoneti issi mach adde gidanas bessees. Qasseka ba naytanne ba keeththa asa wogara ayssizayta gidanas bessees.
54003013	Wogara ooththidayti erays gita bonchonne Yesus Kirstoosan istas diza ammanon daro xalateth demmana.
54003014	Ta neekko elle baana koykkokka hayta azazota nees xaafays.
54003015	Ta hanno nees xaafizay ta gam7iza gidikkokka asay Xoossa Keeththan waani daanakkonne ne erana mala gaadakko! Keeththay de7o Xoossa Woossa Keeththa; hessikka tumu tuussinne xapho.
54003016	Tumu Ayana duussa xuuray sidhey baynda gita; izikka “Ase gidides; iza Xillotethi Xillo Ayanan qoncides; kiitanchatas beettides; dere ubbas sabaketides; alamen dizaytan ammanettides; bonchora pude dendi bides” gizayssa.
54004001	Wode wursisetha bolla issi issi asay ammano aggidi baleththiza ayanatanne iita ayana timirte kaallanayssa Xillo Ayanay qoncera yootees.
54004002	Hessa mala timirtey ista qofay bonqo biratan xuugetida mala geellatethan doccida qoodheppe qommon haniza wordancha asatappe yaana.
54004003	He asati asay ekkonta malanne gelonta mala diggana. Ammanizaytinne tuma shaakki eriza asay Xoossi medhdhida kath galatarakka ekkizayti moonta mala diggananne azazana.
54004004	Xoossi medhdhiday wurikka lo7o. Asi galatara ekkikko wora wodhdhizay issinaka baawa.
54004005	Wurikka Xoossa qaalaninne woossan geeyana.
54004006	Hayssa ha azazoza ammaniza asa ne qofsikko, ammano qaalaninne ne ekkida lo7o timirtezan minnada Yesus Kirstoosas lo7o oosancha gidandassa.
54004007	Xoosse bonchisonta go7ay baynda hayssi7eppenne cima macasata hayssi7eppe haakkada tuma ayana oosos ne asateth giigissa.
54004008	Asatetha asho ogen dosisoy guutha wodes go7ees shin Tumu Ayana duussas bana tamarsoy gidikko hayssa ha alamezassinne buro yaana duussas hidotay diza gish ubbas go7ees.
54004009	Hayssi ha qaalay ammanettidayssanne wursi ekkanas bessiza qaala.
54004010	Nu hessas giidi dafettossinne daaburos. Hessika asa ubbas harappeka ammanizaytas ashshiza de7o Xoossan nu hidota ooththiza gishassa.
54004011	Hayta yo7ota azazanne tamarsa.
54004012	Ne yalagatetha oonikka leqqofo; gido attin ne haasayan, ne duussan, siiqon, ammanoninne geeshshatethan ammanizaytas lo7o leemiso gida.
54004013	Ta he baana gakkanaas qaala nababanas, zoranasinne tamarsanas minna.
54004014	Cimati ne bolla ba kushe woththi woossishin, nees imettida tinbite imotetha lepi hista aggofa.
54004015	Asi wuri ne dichchaa beyana mala ha yo7ota lo7etha minthada dandayan pola.
54004016	Ne duussa gishshinne ne tamarsiza timirtezas naageta, haytan minna. Ne hessa ooththikko nenanne ne gizayssa siyizayta ashshana.
54005001	Cima asa ne Aawa mala bonchora zora attin dom7ofa. Naatetha attuma nayta ne ishata mala xeella.
54005002	Hessathoka cima macasata, ne aay mala, naatetha macasata qasse ne micheta mala suure woznappe xeella.
54005003	Addafe metotettida am7eta lo7etha naaga.
54005004	Issi am7eys nay woykko naa nay diza gidikko, he nayti baso asata maaddanassinne bana yelidaytas kase isti ooththidayssa kushe zaaron harappe kasetidi ba ammano ooson bessanasinne tamaranas bessees. Hessika Xoossa ufaysizayssa.
54005005	Qasse tumappe maadoy baynda, barka diza am7eya Xoosse xalla xeellawus. Woossassinne Xoossafe maado demmanas gallassinne qamma minetawus.
54005006	Ha biitta lo7o duussi xalla koyiza am7eya gidikko iza paxa dashe hayqqidaro.
54005007	Oona bollakka wosoy doonta mala hayssa azazoza asas aaththa.
54005008	Issi asi ba dabbota harappeka baso asa maaddontayssa gidikko izi ammano kaadidadenne ammanonta asappekka aadhdhi iita asa.
54005009	Izis layththay usuppun tammu layththafe garsan diza am7ey sunth, am7eta mazgaban xaafoppa. Qasseka iza kase issade xalla geldaro gidanas bessees.
54005010	Nayta dichoninne imatha mokkon, ammanizayta toho meechan, metotidayta maadoninne lo7o ooson ubban bana aaththa immada lo7o oosonka keeha erettidaro gidanas bessees.
54005011	Naatetha am7eta gidikko hessa mala mazgaban xaafoppa. Gaasoyka istas diza azinara daana amoy isti Kirstoosas ooththana gi gelida qaalappe bollara aadhdhiza wode adde gelana koyeetes.
54005012	Isti kase caaqida qaala miza gish he yo7ozan ba bolla pirda ehettes.
54005013	Hessafeka ooso ooththanappe yuuyi yuuyi asa keeththe gelana doossettes. Ooso ixo xalla gidonta haasayanas bessontayssa haasayishe zigirzaytanne koshshonta asa yo7o giddo coo woxi gelizayta gidettes.
54005014	Hessa gish azinati hayqqida naatetha macasati adde gelana mala, nayta yelana malanne baso as ayssana mala, morkeyka ista bolla woththiza miishe demmoonta mala ta zorays.
54005015	Addaka hayssafe kase issi issi asati Xala7e kaallana guye sher7i gida.
54005016	Ammaniza macassi oonikka baso asa giddon am7eti diza gidikko Woossa Keeththi tumu am7eta xalla maaddana mala izakka ba baggara ba am7eta maaddu attin Woossa Keeththas tooho gidana mala aaggagupu.
54005017	Woossa keeththa lo7ethi ayssizayti harappeka sabakkoninne tamarson minniza cimati gidikko dakko maado maadettanas bessees.
54005018	Maxaafan “Kath bukkiza boora duuna qachchofa” qasseka “Ooso ooththizadey damoza ekkana bessees” gees.
54005019	Nam7u markay woykko heedzdzu markay markatonta dishin cima bolla shiiqiza mooto ekkofa.
54005020	Harati beydi naagettana mala nagara ooththizayta asa ubba sinthan hanqa.
54005021	Xoossaninne Yesus Kirstoosan doorettida kiitanchata sinthan hayta azazota oonakka maaddonta ne naagana malanne issi miishikka ta goorippe ziqqi dhoqu histonta mala ta nena hadara gays.
54005022	Xoossa oosos dooranas, oona bollakka ne kushe wotha woossanas eesotoppa. Qasse haratara nagara ooththanas zupetoppa. Nagarappe nena xillotethan naaga.
54005023	Nena qanthan sakkizayssassinne dentha sakkoza gish woyne cajefe guuth guujada uya attin hayssafe guye haaththe xalla uyoppa.
54005024	Issi issi asa nagaray pirday yaanappe kasetidi qoncees; baggayta nagaray qas pirdafe guye qoncees.
54005025	Lo7o oosoykka hessa mala qonce. Qoncontay diikkokka qoteti attenna.
54006001	Xoossa sunthinne iza timirtey cayettonta mala aylletetha qambara giddon dizayti wuri ba godas kumeththa bonchoy bessizayssa eretto.
54006002	Ammaniza godati diza ammaniza ashkarati godati istas ishata gidida gish godatas bessiza boncho imetto. Harappeka ista ooson maaddetiza ammaniza godati istas dosettidayta gidida gish nekka haytanta mala yo7ota tamarsanassinne zoranas bessees.
54006003	Oonikka wordo timirte tamarsko Goda Yesus Kirstoosa lo7o qaalanne Ayana tumatetha minisiza timirtera gaaggontayssa gidikko,
54006004	hessadey otoretethan kumidesinne aykkokka yuushi qoppenna. Issi issi qaalata gish paalametanassinne ooyetanas iita amoy izan dees. Heytikka qanateteth, oosh, cash, iita sidhe kaaleththettes.
54006005	Tumay istafe ekketi gidin erays Ayana ooson wodhe demmana misatiza asatanne qofa pace asata giddon gooshettidi duuxxonta oosh eheettes.
54006006	Gido attin Tumu Ayana as gideth nuus dizayssan woppu giidi duussara gita wodhe.
54006007	Gaasoyka nu hayssa ha alameza yishe aykkokka ekki yibekko; bishekka qasse aykkoka ekki bookko.
54006008	Gido attin nuus maanayssinne nu may7anays diikko gidana.
54006009	Dure gidanas koyizayti gidikko gede paaceninne narxan gelidi oyketizayssa mala daro hadaninne iita amon un7etetes.
54006010	Gaasoyka miisha siiqoy iitateth ubbas xapho. Issi issi asati dure gidana giidi amoppe dendidayssan ammano ogeppe balettidi haraso bidanne barka bana daro meto giddo gelthida.
54006011	Neno Xoossa aso! Ne hessa ubbafe baqata. Xilloteth, Tumu Ayanan duus, ammano, siiqo, dandayanne ashketeth kaalla.
54006012	Ammano baaxe lo7etha baaxeta. Daro markata sinthan lo7o ammanetethan ne markattidayssanne ne izas xeeygetida merna de7oza lo7etha oykka.
54006013	Ubbaska de7o immiza Xoossa achchan hessathoka Phanxoosa Philaxoosa sinthan tuma markattida Yesus Kirstoosa sinthan ta nena hadara gizay,
54006014	Goda Yesus Kirstoosi qoncana gakkanaas nees imettida oosoza wosoy baynda ne polana mala.
54006015	He qoncethay anjettidayssi barka ubba haarizayssinne kawota kawoy, godatas Goday izi ba woden bessana.
54006016	Izi xalla hayqqontayssa. Oonikka shiiqanas dandayonta poo7o giddon dees. Iza beyida asi oonikka baawa, beyana dandayizaddeykka deenna. Izas wolqaynne bonchoy mernappe mernas gido. Amiin.
54006017	Hayssa ha alamezan duretidayti otoretonta mala azaza; nu ufayettana mala wursikka darsi tirfisidi nuus immiza Xoossan attin ammanthonta miishan ammanetonta mala asas yoota.
54006018	Lo7o ooththana malanne lo7o ooson dureta gidana mala, kiyatanne shaakki immanas dosizayta gidana mala asa azaza.
54006019	Hessathoka tumu gidida de7o demmana mala buroppe yaana wodes asay mino xapho gidiza haaro erays shiishana.
54006020	Ximtoosa, ne hadara ekkidayssa wursa naaga. Xoossa bonchisonta hada duuna lom7u lom7appenne wordo erateth geetettiza asi bappe medhi kessida timirtefe haakka.
54006021	Nuus hessa mala eratteth dees giza, issi issi asati hessatho ooson ammano ogeppe balettida. Xoossa kiyatethi intenara gido.
55001001	Yesus Kirstoosara issifetethan diza de7o hidota qaala gish yootana mala Xoossa shenen Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe,
55001002	dosettida ta naa Ximtoosas kiyatethi, maarotethinne sarotethi Xoossa Aawappe Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe nees gido.
55001003	Pacey baynda gallassinne qamma ne gish woossan qofisashe kase Aawati ooththida mala geeshsha woznara ta gooynniza Xoossa ta galatays.
55001004	Kase ne afuntha qoppa ekkada ta nena beyada ufayettana laamotays.
55001005	Qoodheppe qommon gidonta ne ammanoza ta qoppays. He ammanoyka koyro ne aayey aayn Loydininne qasseka ne aayeyn Ewonqen dees. Ha7i qas ne bolla dizayssakka ta eradis.
55001006	Hessa gish tani ta kushe ne bolla woththin ne ekkidayssa ne bolla diza Xoossa imota ne dentheththana mala ta nena qofissays.
55001007	Xoossi nuus nuni nu hu7e haaranas Xoossa wolqa eranasinne siiqettana Ayana immides attin babo ayana immibenna.
55001008	Hessa gish Goda gish markatanas woykko Goda gish qashetida tanan yeellatoppa. Gido attin Xoossa wolqara mishiraachcho qaala gish tanara meto ekka.
55001009	Nu aykkokka ooththida gish gidonta dishin ba qofa malanne ba kiyatetha mala nuna ashshidaynne nuna erays dummasidi izi xeygides. He iza kiyatethay merna wodeppe kase Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nuus imettides.
55001010	Ha7i qas izi hayqo wursi dhayssidi mishiraachcho qaala baggara nuna poo7on kessida nu dhale Yesus Kirstoosa yuussan qoncides.
55001011	Takka hayssa ha mishiraachcho qaala yootizade, kiitettidadenne astamare gidada shuumetadis.
55001012	Tani meto beyizaykka hessa gishassa. Gidikkokka ta oona ammanizakkone tani ta ammanizade shaaka eriza gish izan yeellatikke. Ta izas immida hadara he gallassiya gakkanaas izi naaganas dandayizayssa ta shaaka eradis.
55001013	Ne taappe siyida timirteza Yesus Kirstoosara issifetethan diza ammanoninne siiqon leemiso histada oykka.
55001014	Nees imettida lo7o hadara nunan diza Xillo Ayanan naaga.
55001015	Iisiya awurajja giddon dizayti wurikka tana aggidayssa ne eraasa. Filgoossinne Hermogeenessi tana aggida asa giddon deettes.
55001016	Heneessifore so asa Goday maaro; aysi giikko izi tana daro wode minthethidessinne; ta sansalatan qasheta dishin tana beydi yeellatibenna.
55001017	Harappeka izi Oroome yida wode tana koy koydi demmides.
55001018	Wursetha pirda gallas Goday iza pirdafe ashsho. Izi tana Efesoonen ay mala maaddidakkone ne lo7etha eraasa.
55002001	Hessa gish, ta naazo neni Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethan minna.
55002002	Daro markata sinthan ne taappe siyidayssa harata tamarsanas dandayizaytassinne ammanettida asatas hadara imma.
55002003	Yesus Kirstoosas ammanettida lo7o wotadera mala tanara meto ekka.
55002004	Wotadaratethan ooththizadey ba halaqa ufayssanas dafettes attin hara bana qaxethiza ooson geli erena.
55002005	Hessathoka gaadde woxxizadey wotha woga naagonta woxxikko xoono aklile ekkenna.
55002006	Gooba goshshanchay ba goyi kessida kaththa xeera mizade gidanas bessees.
55002007	Ta nees gizayssa ne woznan wotha siyikko Goday nees yo7o ubban akeekka immana.
55002008	Hayqoppe dendida Dawute zereth gidida Yesus Kirstoosa qoppa; ta yootiza mishiraachcho qaalaykka hessa.
55002009	Hessa geedon iita ooththida asa mala qashettana gakkanaas waaye beyays. Gido attin Xoossa qaalay qashetenna.
55002010	Hessa gish Kirstoosa baggara diza atottethinne merna boncho demmana doorettidayta gish gaada wursakka dandayadis.
55002011	“Nu izara issife hayqqikko qasse nu izara de7on daana.
55002012	Dandayan minnikko nu izara kawotana. Nu iza kaadikko izikka nuna kaadana.
55002013	Nu izas ammanetontayta gidikko izi mernas ammanettida mala daana. Izi barka bana kaadana dandayenna” geetettida qaalay ammanettidayssa.
55002014	Hayta ha yo7ota gish asa qofiso aggofa. Asay ba giddon issoy issara qaala geedon paalametonta mala Xoossa sunthan zora. Hessa mala yo7oy siyizayta moores.
55002015	Tumu Xoossa qaala yootizade, yeellachonta oosanchanne asi ne gish lo7o markattizade gidada nenateth wursa Xoossa sinth shiishshanas minna.
55002016	Coo mela duuna lalabeteththafe haakka. Hessa mala yo7on waaxetida asati Xoossafe haakki haakki bettes.
55002017	Ista timirtey sakidi paxonta gede gujji gujji daakketti biza maduntha mala. Hemenewoossinne Filxoosa geetettizayti hessa mala timirte tamarizayta giddon deettes.
55002018	Heyti tumatethafe haakkidi coo mela waayetes. Istika hayqoppe denthi hayssafe kase hanni aadhdhides giidi issi issi asa ammano guye shiri yeggeetes.
55002019	Gido attin “Goday erays gidizayta erees” qasseka “Goda sunth xeygizay wuri iitappe haakko” giza matamey iza bolla diza laamettonta Xoossa koyro qofay laamettibenna.
55002020	Issi gita keeththan worqafenne birappe xalla gidonta mithafenne urqafe oosetidayti dizayssaththo heytantafeka baggayti boncho oosos, baggayti qas hiraaysso oosos ekkettettes.
55002021	Hessa gish oonikka hayta ta gida iita yo7otappe bana geeshshikko hesadey boncho oosos gidizaddenne anjettidade; Goda go7izaddenne lo7o oosos giigettidade gidana.
55002022	Paanthatetha iita amotethafe baqata. Geeshsha woznara Goda xeygiza asatara xilloteth, ammano, siiqonne saroteth kaalla.
55002023	Go7aynne hidotay baynda eeyata palamappe haakka. Ayssi giikko hessanta malay oosh kaaleththizayssa ne eraassa.
55002024	Goda oosanchay asara oyeetanas bessenna. Hessafe asa ubba achchan kiya, as tamarsanas dandayizadenne mino as gidanas bessees.
55002025	Izi banara eqqetiza asata ashketethara oykkizade gidanas bessees. Oone erizay isti tuma erana mala Xoossi istas maarettanas wode immana dandayees.
55002026	Hessika isti yuushi qoppi simmidi iza shene kunthana mala ista di7i efida Xala7e narxafe isti keessi ekkana.
55003001	Gido attin wode wursethan as metiza wodey yaanayssa ne era.
55003002	Asay bana dosizadde gidana, miishe siiqizayta, banan ceeqqettizayta, otoranchata, cashshanchata, bana yelidaytas azazetontayta, galatontaytanne geeshshatethi bayndayta,
55003003	siiqoy bayndayta, atto gi maarontayta, asa sunth moorizayta, barka bana haarontayta, menxe iita, lo7o miish dosontayta,
55003004	kaadizayta, naagetontayta, coo mela otoretethan kumidayta, Xoossafe aaththidi lo7o deeth dosizayta gidana.
55003005	Ammaniza as misatana shin ammanos diza wolqa kadana. Heyta malatappe ne haakka.
55003006	Heytanti issi issi keeththe kalxi gelidi daro deexo nagaraninne dumma dumma iita amotetha gars gelidi heene ha qaaxiza ammanon laafa macasata qaxi oykettes.
55003007	Heyta mala macasati ubba wode tamareetes shin tuma eri erettenna.
55003008	Iyaneessinne Iyanbaraassi Muse bolla dendida mala haytikka ista qofay mooretin erays ammanoppe kundida gish tumateth ixettes.
55003009	Gido attin ista qofay kumenna. Gaasoyka Iyaneessanne Iyanbarasa eeyateth asas qoncida malaka hayta hanoykka ubbas qoncana.
55003010	Ne gidikko ta timirteza, ta duussa, ta waanna qofa, ta ammanoza, ta dandaya, ta siiqozanne ta minotetha wursa eraasa.
55003011	Ta goodeteththanne ta waayeza Anxokiyan, Iqoniyooninne Listiranka ta bolla gakkidayssa wursa ta dandayan ekkidayssa ne eraassa. Gidikkokka Goday hessa ubbafe tana ashshides.
55003012	Tumappe Yesus Kirstoosa geeshsha woznappe ammani daana gizayti wurikka goodettizayta gidana.
55003013	Iita baleththiza asati erays balettidi asa baleththishe iitatetha bolla iitateth gujji gujji baana.
55003014	Ne gidikko kase ne tamarada erida ogen minna. Hessa oonappe tamaridakkone ne eraasa.
55003015	Ne guutha naatethafe ha7i gakkanaas Yesus Kirstoosa ammanon atotethi beettiza timirte immiza Geeeshsha Maxaafata lo7etha eraadasa.
55003016	Geeshsha Maxaafaati wurikka Xoossa Ayanay kaalethin xaafetidayta; istika as tamarsanas, hanqanas, suurisanas qasseka xillotetha ogen kaalethanas go7ettes.
55003017	Hessika Xoossa asi lo7o ooso ubbas bessizade gidana malassa.
55004001	Xoossa sinthaninne hessathoka paxa dizayta bollanne hayqqidayta bolla pirdanas diza Yesus Kirstoosa sinthan iza qoncethanne iza kawoteththa qofara hayssa nees hadara gays.
55004002	Qaala sabaka; nees giigin woykko gigonta aggin neni ne baggara giiga utta. Daro dandayara tamarson asa suurisa; hanqanne zora.
55004003	Gaasoyka asay wuri suure gidida timirte ekkonta ixana wodey yaana. Hessafe bollara asay ba amora gaaggizayssa ista haythey siyana koyizayssa xalla istas yootana mala bana tamarsana daro astamareta ba achchi shiishana.
55004004	Tuma siyanappe ba hayth haraso zaaridi hayssi7e bagga simmana.
55004005	Ne gidikko haniza yo7on ubban loddu ga; meto dandaya; mishiraachcho qaala yooto nees ooso hista; ne ooththozakka pola.
55004006	Ta qas yarshetanas mata uttadis; hayssa ha alamezappe shaaketta buussa wodey taas gakkides.
55004007	Lo7o baaxe ta baaxettadis; ta woxxana wothe wursisadis. Ammanokka naagadis.
55004008	Sinthafe taas akliley giigi uttides; hessikka xillotetha. Hessaka tumu pirdiza Goday he gallas taas immana. Hessika taas xalla gidonta iza yuussa laamotizaytas ubbaska immana.
55004009	Taakko ellela yaanas nees dandayettida mala ooththa.
55004010	Deemaassi hayssa alameza siiqidi tana yeggi aggidi Tasolonqe bides. Qarqissi Galatiya bides. Titoosi gede Dalmaaxiya bides.
55004011	Luqaassi xalla tanara dees. Marqoossi tana ooson maaddiza gish iza nenara ekka ya.
55004012	Tiqiqoosa Efesoone yeddadis.
55004013	Ne ha yashe ta Xiro7aadan Akirpha achchan woththida ta Maaqanne maxaafata harappeka galban xaafetida maxaafata taas ekka ya.
55004014	Xarqimala qoxxiza Iskindiroosi ta bolla daro qoho gaththides shin Goday izas iza ooso mala immana.
55004015	Izi nu yootiza qaala keehi ixxides. Nekka izappe naageta.
55004016	Tana mootiza yo7ozas koyro tana ashshana marka ta shiishshin oonikka tana maaddana yibenna. Gido attin wurikka tana yeggidi bida. Hessaka ista bolla Xoossi qoho ooththi qoodoppo.
55004017	Gido attin qaala kiitay ta baggara kumeth yootettana malanne dere asay wuri siyana mala Goday ta achchan eqqidi tana minisides; Gaammo duunappekka tana ashshides.
55004018	Goday iita yo7o ubbafe tana ashshana. Gede ba salo kawoteththas tana sarora gaththana. Izas mernappe merna gakkanaas bonchoy gido. Amiin.
55004019	Phirsiqillas, Aqilas, Heneessifore so asaska ta sarokka gaththa.
55004020	Erisxoossi Qorontoosen attides. Xirofomoosi saketida gish iza ta Miliixen aggadis.
55004021	Balgoy gakkanappe sinthetada taakko ha gakkanaas nees dandayettida mala ooththa. Ewuguloosi, Phuddeesi, qasseka Linoosi, Qilawudiyaynne ammanizayti wurikka nena saro saro gida.
55004022	Goday nenara gido. Goda kiyatethi intenara gido.
56001001	Xoossas doorettidayta ammanoninne Tumu Ayanan kaaleththiza tuma eratethan dichchana mala Xoossa ayllenne Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaare gidida Phawuloosappe.
56001002	Iza ammanoynne eratethay kaseppe oykkidi wordotonta Goday daro wodeppe kase ba immida merna de7o hidota mala.
56001003	Izi kase gida wodey gakkida mala nuna ashshida Xoossa azazon taas sabakanas imettida hara baggara Xoossi ba qaala qoncisides.
56001004	Nuus koththe gidida ammano issifetethan ammanon taas tumu naa gidida Titoosas “Xoossa Aawappenne nuna ashshida Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne saroteth nees gido” gides.
56001005	Ta nena Qarxeesen aggiday buroppe giigana bessiza daro miishi dizayssa gish ne giigissanassinne ta nena azazida mala katamay dizason Woossa Keeththa cimata ne dooranassa.
56001006	Cimateththan doorettanayti ista bolla boroy bayndayta, issi machi azinata, nayti ammanizaytanne waayssontayta woykko azazettiza nayta aawata gidetto.
56001007	Woossa keeththa cimay Xoossas ooththana hadara ekidade gidida mala iza bolla wosoy bayndade gidanas bessees. Hessika ceeqqettizadde, guutha miishan yiillotizadenne mathotizade, ushshanchanne izas bessonta ogera go7a gididaz goodi eki bizadde gidanas bessenna.
56001008	Hessafe bollara izi imath mokkizade, lo7o ooso dosizade, barka bana haarizade, suure as, xillonne erays naagetizade gidanas bessees.
56001009	Hara asata lo7o timirten minthethizadenne he lo7o timirteza ixizayta hanqanas ba tamarida mala qaalan minnizade gidanas bessees.
56001010	Waayssizaytinne duunan xalala baleththizayti daroti deettes; harappeka heyti qaxxaretida Ayhuda asatappe ammanida asata baggata.
56001011	Heytanta co7u histeth bessees. Gaasoyka isti besonta ogera baassi go7a demmanas bessonta timirte tamarson keeththa asa wursi mooron deettes.
56001012	Ista nabetappe issadey ista gish haasayishe “Qarxeese asay ubba wode wordanchata, iita do7ata, ganjamatanne azallata” gides.
56001013	He markatethay tuma; hessa gish ne ista lo7etha hanqetta. Gaasoyka istas tumu ammanoy daana malanne,
56001014	Ayhudata hayssi7e woykko tumu yo7oppe hakkida asata azazo isti siyonta malassa.
56001015	Geeshshatas miishi wurikka geeshsha shin tunatasinne ammoontaytas gidikko wurikka tuna. Harappeka ista qofay wurikka tunides.
56001016	Isti bana nu Xoosse eroos geettes shin ba hanotethan gidikko kadetes. Isti shuunizayta, azazetontaytanne lo7o oosos besontayta.
56002001	Ne gidikko asa tumu gididaz tamarsa.
56002002	Cima asay woznama, bonchettidayta, bana barka haarizayta; amanoninne siiqon dandayanka lo7o gidana mala ista zora.
56002003	Hessathoka cima macasati ba diza duussan bonchora dizaytanne lo7o hanoteth asa tamarsizayta gidetto attin asa sunth iissizayta woykko woyne cajje ushsha suuken waaxetidayta gidonta mala ista tamarsa.
56002004	Hessatho ooththikko natetha macasati ba azinatanne ba nayta dosana mala tamarsanas dandayettes.
56002005	Xoossa qaalay oona achchanka cayettonta mala isti barka bana haarizaytanne geeshshata, keeththa giddon ista oosoy oykkidaytanne asas kiyata, ba azinatas azazettizayta gidana mala cima macasati ista tamarsetto.
56002006	Hessathoka yalaga attumasay barka bana haarana mala ne ista zora.
56002007	Ay hanonka ne asas lo7o leemiso gida. Ne asa tamarsiza timirteza nekka woznappe tamarsizadenne naagizade gida.
56002008	Nu gish iita haasayiza asay haasayanas iita demmoonta aggidi yeelatana mala ne haasayiza haasaya giddon borso yo7oy dooppo.
56002009	Aylleti aazanka ba godatas haarettana malanne ufayssana mala; qasseka awute zaaronta mala tamarsa.
56002010	Hanizazan ubban nuna ashshida Xoossa timirtey dossettana mala isti lo7o markateth bessana mala ba godata miish kaysotoppeto.
56002011	Asas izappe maaroy beettiza Xoossa kiyatethi asa ubbas qoncides.
56002012	He kiyatethaykka nuni nagaran duussinne ha alame amotetha kadidi hayssa ha wodezan nurka nuna haaridinne xillotethan Tumu Ayana duus daanayssa nuna tamarses.
56002013	Hessika nuus anjetida hidota gidida wogga Xoossanne nuna ashshida Yesus Kirstoosa bonchoy qoncanayssa naaganassa.
56002014	Izikka nuna iitatethafe wozanasinne lo7o ooththanas minniza ba dere erays dooranas bana nuus aaththi immides.
56002015	Hessa gish ne tamarsanayti heytanta. Hessaka ne kumeththa godateththara zoranne hanqa; nena oonikka leqqofo.
56003001	Asay dere ayssizaytas haarettana malanne lo7o gidida miish wursi ooththanas giiga gidana mala asa qofisa.
56003002	Qasseka oonikka asa bolla iita haasayonta malanne lo7o asa gidana mala asa ubbas kumeththa woznappe ba ashketeth bessana mala ubba qofisa.
56003003	Nukka kase qofay bayndayta, azazettontayta, balettizayta, dumma dumma amoninne lo7o dussas aylletethan haarettizayta. Asaranne nurka nu garsanka oyeetishe iitatethaninne miqaynetethan doos.
56003004	Gido attin nuna ashshida Xoossa kiyatethinne iza siiqoy qoncida wode nu ooththida Xillotethan gidonta dishin iza maarotetha daron attidos, izi nuna ashshiday nam7antho yeleteth gidida meechaninne Xillo Ayanan ooraxetethanna.
56003006	Hessaka Xillo Ayanay nu bolla nu Goda Xoossi nuna ashshida Yesus Kirstoosa baggara darsi gussides.
56003007	Hessika nu iza kiyatethan xillidi merna de7o hidota oykkidi laattizayta gidanassa.
56003008	Hessika ammanettida qaala. Xoossa ammanizayti lo7o oosos bana aaththi immana mala hayssa wursa ne lo7etha yootana mala ta koyays. Hessika lo7onne ay assikka koyizaza.
56003009	Qasseka coo hada palamappenne asay ba qommo qoodizazappe, marshefenne woga gish dendiza ooshafe ne haakka. Heytanti go7oy baynda pathonta yo7o.
56003010	Asa giddon shaakoteth medhiza as issito nam7uto ne zorin ekkonta ixikko izaadera nees issifetethi dooppo.
56003011	Hessa mala asi balettida nagarancha asa; izaadey barka ba bolla pirdidayssa ne era.
56003012	Arximoone woykko Tiqiqoosa ta neekko kiittikko ne taakko Niqopholiyoone yaanas nees dandayetizazi wursa ooththa. Tani halaytha balgo heen aaththana gaada qachadis.
56003013	Woga eriza Zeemassinne Aphillossi bishin istas koshshizaz wursa kuntha maadda.
56003014	Nu baggatas hachchis hachchis ista koshshizaz isti demmana malanne ista deeththay go7ay bayndazi gidonta mala isti lo7o ooso ooththi minnana mala tamaranas koshshees.
56003015	Tanara dizayti intena saro geettes. Ammano geedon nuna siiqizayta wursi saro giite. Xoossa kiyatethi intenara gido.
57001001	Yesus Kirstoosa gish qashettida taappe Phawuloosappenne nu isha Ximtoosappe nu siiqo isha gididi nunara issife ooththiza Pilmoonas;
57001002	ne keeththan shiiqiza ammaniza asassinne nu micheyo Ampibyas qasseka nunara issife Kirstoosa wotadara gidida Arkiphasses;
57001003	Nu Aawa Xoossafe nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
57001004	Tani ta woossan nena qoppashe ubba wode Xoossa galatays.
57001005	Gaasoyka ne Xoossa asa siiqizayssanne Goda Yesus Kirstoosan ne ammanizayssa ta siyadis.
57001006	Nuni Kirstoosas gididayssanne nuus diza lo7o yo7oy wuri qonccen erettana mala nekka ne ammano hara asas bessana mala ta nees minna woossays.
57001007	Ta ishazo! Ne hanon Xoossa asa woznay ooraxida gish ne siiqoy ta wozna keehi minthides.
57001008	Hessa gish ne ooththanas beesizayssa ooththana mala nena azazanas taas Kirstoosan xalateth deesskoshin.
57001009	Gidikkoka ta nena azazanappe siiqora woossays. Gaasoyka tani Yesus Kirstoosa gish qashetada qasho keeththan diza Phawuloosa.
57001010	Ta nena woossizay ta qasho keeththan dashe Yesus Kirstoosan yelida naa Anasmoosa gishassa.
57001011	Anasmoossi hayssafe kase nena go7ibenna shin ha7i gidikko izi nenakka tanakka go7izade.
57001012	Ta ha7i iza neekko zaara yedadis. Ta neekko yeddizay iza gidonta ta wozna neekko zaara yeddiza mala qoodays.
57001013	Mishiraachcho qaala gaason ta haan qasheta dishin ne tana ooththa maaddanayssa izi tanara deyidakko tana ufaysses.
57001014	Gido attin ne lo7o oosoy ne dosanpe attin wolqara gidonta mala gaada nena oychonta aykkokka ooththana koyabeykke.
57001015	Anasmoossi hanno gakkanaas neeppe guutha wode shaaketikkokka oone erizay hayssafe guye ubba wode nenara daana dandayees.
57001016	Hayssafe guye izi nenara daanay aylle mala gidonta ayllefe aadhdhi nees asho isha mala gidana. Izi taas dosettida isha. Gido attin izi nena ooththi go7ana as gidida gishshinne izi nees Kirstoosa baggara isha gidida gish nees keehi dosetidade gidana.
57001017	Nuus diza issifetetha gaason ne tana nees isha mala qoodiza gidikko tana ne mokka ekkiza mala izakka mokka ekka.
57001018	Izi ne bolla gaththida qohoy diikko woykko ne accoy iza bolla diikko iza accoza ta bolla qooda.
57001019	Hekko ta Phawuloosi “Iza accoza ta nees qanxana” gaada ta kushera xaafadis. Gidikkokka ne Kirstoosa ammaniday ta baggara gidida gish haray attoshin nekka taas qanxana accoy dizadde gididayssa ta nena erissanas koshshenna.
57001020	Hi7a ta ishazo hessa lo7o ooso ne taas ooththana mala Goda sunthan Kirstoosa gish gaada ne ta wozna shempissana mala nena woossays.
57001021	Ta nees hayssa xaafiday ne taas azazettanayssa ammanadakko! Ta nena oychidayssafe ne aaththa ooththanayssa ta erays.
57001022	Xoossi inte woossa siydi ta inteko baana mala taas hidotay diza gish ta baada intekon shempanaso taas hayana giigissa.
57001023	Yesus Kirstoosa gaason tanara qashettida Ephapiray nena saro gees.
57001024	Hessathoka tanara ooththizayti Marqoosi Arsixirokoosi, Deemaassinne Luqaasi nena saro geettes.
57001025	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kiyateth intenara gido.
58001001	Beni wodeppe oykidi Xoossi dumma dumma ogera nabeta baggara kase nu Aawatas daro wode yootides.
58001002	Qasse hayssa wursetha wode bolla wursi laatisidadenne ha alameza medhdhida ba naaza baggara nuus yootides.
58001003	Izikka Xoossa boncho bessizadenne Xoossa Xoossatethas lo7o leemiso gididi ba wolqama qaalan wursikka shiishshi oykkides. Izi asa nagarappe geeshidappe guye salon boncho Xoossa ushachchan uttides.
58001004	Hessa gish izas imettida sunthay kiitanchata sunthafe aadhdhizayssa mala izikka kiitanchatappe keehi aadhdhees.
58001005	Xoossi kiitanchappe “Neni ta naa; Ta nena hachchi yeladis. Woykko ta izas Aawa gidana; izikka ta naa gidana” oonas gidee?
58001006	Qasseka Xoossi ba bayra Naaza duge ha biitta bolla yeddishe “Xoossa kiitanchati wurikka izas goynnetto” gides.
58001007	Kiitanchata gish haasayishe qasse “Kiitanchata ayanata; ba oosanchataka tama laco kesses” gides.
58001008	Naaza gish qasse “Godo! Ne zufaney mernappe merna gakkanaas minni daana. Neni ne kawoteththa likke kaaleththasa.
58001009	Neni xilloteth dosadassa; makalaka ixxaasa; hessa gish Xoossi ne Goday nena ne laggetappe bolla kessides. Nena ufayssa zayte tiyides” gees.
58001010	Qasse “Godo neni koyro biitta medhadasa. Salotikka ne kushen oosettida.
58001011	Isti dhayana, neni gidikko minna daana. Isti wurikka may7o mala gal7ana.
58001012	Neni ista may7o mala qalam7ana. Istika may7o mala laamettana. Ne gidikko aydekka neni nena. Ne duussas wursethi deenna” gees.
58001013	Xoossi kiitanchatappe “Tani ne morketa ne toho garsan yedhisana gakkanaas ne ta ushachchan utta” Oona gidee?
58001014	Kiitanchati wurikka atotetha laattana asata ooththanas Xoossafe kiitetiza oosancha Ayana gidettennee?
58002001	Hessa gish nuni siyida qaalappe balettidi kundonta mala nu siyida qaala lo7ethi naaganas bessees.
58002002	Aazas giikko kase kiitanchata baggara yootetida qaalay tumu gidida he qaala yedhi aadhdhiday baas bessiza qixaate ekees.
58002003	Nu qasse hessa mala gita maaroteth coo lep histikko waani attanee? Hayssi maarotethay koyro Goda baggara nuus yootetides. Izappe siyidaytikka nuus geeshi yootida.
58002004	Xoossi qasseka malatata, malalisiza miishata, dumma dumma malatata oosoninne ba shene mala immida Xillo Ayana imotata baggara ista markatetha minthides.
58002005	Xoossi hayssa nu iza gish haasayiza buro yaana alameza kiitanchas haarsibenna.
58002006	Gido attin Geeshsha Maxaafay harason “Ne izas yuusha qoppanas asi aazee? Izas ne qoppanas asanay izi aazee?
58002007	Ne iza kiitanchatappe guuthara guuthadasa. Boncho zawudenne galata iza hu7en wothadassa. Neni iza ne kushe oosota bolla shuumadas.
58002008	Ne wursaka iza toho garsan haarisadassa; Xoossi ubbaakka izappe garsara izas haarisishin attiday ay miishikka deenna. Gido attin ha7i qasse wurikka izas haarettishin nu beybeekko” gides.
58002009	Gido attin Xoossa kiyatethan asa ubba gish hayqqanas kiitanchatappe guutha wode guuxida Yesusi waaye hayqo hayqqidi ha7i bonchonne galata zawude ba hu7en woththidayssa nu beyoos.
58002010	Hanizay wurikka izappe izas medhetida Xoossi daro nayta bonchos efanas ista maarotethas hu7e gidida Yesusi waayen polanas koshizaz gidides.
58002011	As geeshizaynne izan geeyiza asay heyti issi keeththa asata. Hessa gish Yesusi ista “Ta ishato” gi xeeyganas yellatenna.
58002012	“Tani ne sunthan ta ishatas yootana shiiqida dereza sinthan nena galatiza yeth ta yexana.”
58002013	Hessathoka “Ta izan ammanettana” qasseka “Taninne taas Xoossi immida nayti nu haan doos” gees Geeshsha Maxaafay.
58002014	Naytas ashoynne suuthi diza mala izikka ista mala asa. Hessika hayqo bolla izas wolqay diza dabulosa izi ba hayqo wolqan zaaranassa.
58002015	Hessathoka ba diza wode ubban hayqos babon haaretti qashetidayta hayqoppe wozanassa.
58002016	Izi ha yiday kiitanchata maaddanas gidonta Abrahaame zerethata maaddanas yides.
58002017	Hessa gish ubba baggara izi ba ishata misatanas bessizaade gidides; izi hessa ooththiday maarizadenne ammanettida waanna Qeese halaqa gididi Xoossas ooththanassinne dereza nagarappe maaranassa.
58002018	Izi ba hu7en paacetidi meto ekkida gish paacetizayta maaddanas dandayees.
58003001	Hessa gish saloppe xeeyssi intena gakkin ammaniza nu ishato! Nu ammanos Hawaarenne Qeeseta halaqa gidida Yesusa qoppite.
58003002	Musey Xoossa Keeththa ubba bolla ammanettidade gidida mala Yesusikka bana shuumidades ammanettidade.
58003003	Keeththe keexxidades keeththafe bollara bonchoy diza mala Yesusasikka Museppe aadhdhiza bonchoy bessizade gidanas bessees.
58003004	Keeththe ubbaska keexxidadey dees; gido attin wursikka ooththidadey Xoossa.
58003005	Musey tinbite markatishe Xoossa Keeththa ubba bolla issi ammanettida oosancha mala gidi de7ides.
58003006	Kirstoosi gidikko Xoossa Keeththa bolla ammanettida naa mala. Nunikka iza bolla ammanettiza ufayssaynne ceeqqettiza hidota lo7ethi oykikko nu izas duussa keeththa.
58003007	Hessa gish Xillo Ayanay giza mala “Inte hach iza qaala siyikko
58003008	bazzo biittan inte tana paacida wode makalidayssatho inte wozna muumisoppite.
58003009	Inte aawati kase heen tana paacidanne tanara eqetida. Ta ooththidayssa wursi oyddu tammu layth gakkanaas beyida.
58003010	He wode yeletethata bolla ta hanqettada; ista woznay ubba wode balettees; isti ta oge eribeytenna.
58003011	Qasse ‘Ta istas immiza shemposo isti mulekka geletenna!’ gaada tani ta hanqon caaqadis” gees.
58003012	Ta ishato! Intefe oonikka de7o Xoossafe haraso intena haassiza iitanne ammanonta woznay doonta mala naagetite.
58003013	Harappeka inte garsafe oonikka nagaran balettidi ba wozna muumisonta mala “Hach” geetettishin hach hach inte inte garsan minetite.
58003014	Nuus kase koyroppe diza ammano nuni wurseth gakkanaas lo7ethi minthi oykikko nuni Kirstoosara issife laattana.
58003015	Hessika “Inte hach iza qaala siyikko kase makalidaytayssa mala ha7ikka inte wozna inte minthonta mala” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafettidayssatho hanides.
58003016	Siydi makaldayti isti oonantee? Musey Gibxeppe kaaleth kessidayta ubbata gidettennee?
58003017	Xoossi ista bolla oyddu tammu laytha hanqettidayti isti oonantee? Nagara ooththin ista ahay bazzo biittan kundi attidayta gidettennee?
58003018	Izas azazettonta ixidaytappe attin iza shemposo gelonta mala izi caaqi diggiday haray oonantee?
58003019	Hessa gish isti gelonta attiday ammanoy baynda gish gididayssa nu eroos.
58004001	Gede shemposo gelanas imettida hidotay ha7ikka naageti diza gish inte giddofe oonikka hessas bessontade gidonta mala ane naagetos.
58004002	Heytantas sabaketida mala nuuska mishiraachcho qaalay sabaketides. Gidikkoka siyida asatara siyida qaalay istara ammanon walaketonta aggida gish ista maaddibenna.
58004003	Nu qas ammanizayti he shemposoza gelana. Xoossi “Hessa gish tani ta hanqon ‘Isti ta shemposo mulekka geletenna’ gaada ta caaqadis” gides. Gido attin hayssi alamey medhetosappe ha simmin iza oosoy poletides.
58004004	Issi soon laapuntho gallasa gish “Laapuntho gallassi Xoossi ooso ubbafe shempides” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides.
58004005	Qasseka he sozan “Tumappe isti ta shemposo mulekka geletena” gees.
58004006	Iza shemposo buro gelana issi issi asati deettes. Kase istas mishiraachcho qaalay sabaketidayti azazettonta ixida gish iza shemposo isti gelibeetena.
58004007	Hessa gish Xoossi “Hach” giidi qasseka hara gallas woththides; hessika daro laythatappe guye Dawute baggara “Hach inte iza qaala siyikko inte wozna muumisoppite” geetetti kase yootetida mala hanides.
58004008	Iyaasoy istas shempo immidako Xoossi hara gallas giidi yootenakoshin.
58004009	Hessa gish Sambata gallas shempoy Xoossa deres ha7ikka dees.
58004010	Gaasoyka Xoossa shemposo gelizay wuri Xoossi ooththi shempida mala izikka ba oosoppe shempana.
58004011	Hessa gish oonikka heytanta mala azazettonta ixidayssa leemiso kaallidi kundonta mala he shemposoyo gelanas ane minnos.
58004012	Xoossa qaalay paxa dizayssanne ooththiza qaala. Nam7u bagga qara mashshafeka aadhdhi qara; shemponne ayana, shayanne koldzekka shaakkana gakkanaas caddees; wozina qofanne amotethaka paaci xeelles.
58004013	Xoossa ayfeppe geemetida medhetay mulekka deenna. Nu izas nu gish zaaro immanas bessiza iza sinthan hanoy wurikka kallo qoncen beettana.
58004014	Hessa gish pude salo bida Qeeseta halaqa Xoossa Naa Yesusi nuus diza gish ane nuni nu ammano minthi oykkos.
58004015	Nu daaburishin nuus qadhettana dandayiza Qeeseta halaqay nuus dees. Izi nu mala ubba miishan paacettides; gidikkokka izi aykko nagarakka ooththibenna.
58004016	Hessa gish nuni maaroteth ekkanassinne nuna koshshiza wode nuna maaddiza iza kiyateth nu demmana mala gede iza maarotetha algako ane ammanon shiiqos.
58005001	Qeeseta halaqa gidi shuumetizadey daro asa giddofe doorettessinne asa gish gididi imotanne nagara gish yarsho shiishshanaas doorettes.
58005002	Izikka ba baggara daburancha gidida gish eronta asatasinne oge balidaytas qadhettana dandayees.
58005003	Izi ba nagara gishshinne hara asata nagara gish yarsho shiishshanaas izas bessizay hessa gishassa.
58005004	Aaroney xeeygetidayssatho izi Xoossi xeygidade gidanas bessees attin hessa he bonchoza barka baas ekkizadey deenna.
58005005	Hessathoka Kirstoosi Qeeseta halaqa gidana boncho barka baas ekkibenna. Gido attin “Ne ta naakko; ta nees hach Aawa gidadis” gida Xoossafe ekides.
58005006	Hessathoka harason “Malkexeedeqe shuumeta mala neni mernas Qeeseta halaqa” gees.
58005007	Yesusi hayssa biitta bolla diza wode iza hayqoppe ashshana dandayizayssakko afunxishe gita qaalara woosa woossides. Addafe ashketethara izi azazettida gish iza woossa Xoossi siyides.
58005008	Izi Xoossa Naa gidikkokka ba ekkida waayezappe azazeteth tamarides.
58005009	Hessa baggara pacey bayndade gidi beettidayssafe guye bana azazettizaytas ubbaas merna atotethas gaaso gidides.
58005010	Malkexeedeqe shuumetetha mala Qeeseta halaqa geetetti Xoossan shuumettides.
58005011	Hessa gish nu haasayana miishi buro daroy dees. Gido attin inte dota7ata gidida gish intena erisoy meto.
58005012	Inte hanni wode astamare gidanas bessishin Xoossa qaala buro koyroppe denthidi intena tamarsiza as intes koshshees. Intes koshshizay mino kath gidonta maatha.
58005013	Maath paahettizay qii guutha naa gidiza gish lo7onne iita shaakkiza timirte shaakki erenna.
58005014	Mino kath gidikko lo7onne iita shaakkanas banateththa dosisida wozna kunthida asatassa.
58006001	Hessa gish koyroppe Kirstoosa gish imettida timirteza aggidi ane gede mino timirteko boos. Hayqqida oosoppe maarotethan gelo gishshinne Xoossan ammano gish buro ane izan wodhdhi maadhoko.
58006002	Hessathoka xinqate gishshinne kushe asa bolla wotho gish qasseka hayqqidayata dentha gishshinne merna pirda gish buro woththi doommokko.
58006003	Xoossa shene gidikko nu hessatho ooththana.
58006004	Ba ammano kaddida asata ista maarotethan wosti zoranee? Poo7oy istas issito poo7idayta salo imotetha ekki beyidayta, Xillo Ayana ekki beyidayta,
58006005	lo7o Xoossa qaalanne buro yaana alameza wolqa ekki beyidayta;
58006006	zaaridi kadidayta ista nam7antho zaaridi maarotethan ekoy dandayettenna. Gaasoy isti ba mooros Xoossa Naa zaari kaqettessinne kawushettes.
58006007	Ubba wode ba bolla ira uyiza biittay qasseka iza goyzades ayfe immiza biittiya Xoossa achchan anjetadus.
58006008	Gido attin agunthinne odoroy mokiza biittaya go7ay beyidaaro gidana. He biittays qangetethi matan dees. Izi wursethi taman xuugeteth gidana.
58006009	Ta ishato! Nuni hessatho hasaykkoka intes inte atotethara oyketida lo7o miish dizayssa nu sidhokko.
58006010	Kase gidin woykko ha7i gidinka inte ammanizayta maaddidayssanne iza suntha gish inte bessida siiqotetha balanaas Xoossi makalancha gidenna.
58006011	Intes imettida hidotay polettana gakkanaas intefe issi issi asi hessa mala ooso wurseth gakkanaas gencidi ooththana mala nu amottos.
58006012	Ammanoninne dandayan inte iza hidota qaala laattizayta misatanappe attin dota7ata gidanayssa nu koyokko.
58006013	Xoossi Abrahaames hidota immida wode caaqishe hara izappe aadhdhizadey baynda gish barka banan, “Ta nena tumappe anjana; tani ne zereth darsana” gi caaqides.
58006015	Abrahaameyka genci naagidappe kaallidi izas imettida hidota demmides.
58006016	Asay caaqo caaqishe bappe dhoqan caaqqees. Caaqqozikka geetettidayssi poletanna mala minthiza gish caaqidayta giddon palamay dendikko kase caaqqo qaalay diggees.
58006017	Xoossi laamettonta ba qofa hidota qaala laattanaytas qoncisana mala koyda gish caaqo qaalan minthides.
58006018	Xoossi ay wodekka wordotanas dandayenna; izi laamettonta nam7u miishatan nu sinthan diza hidota oykkanas izakko shiiqida nuni gita minoteth demmana mala ooththides.
58006019	Nuka shempo teqe gidida minonne ammanthiza hidota demmidos; he hidotayka magalashazappe guye baggara diza gede Xoossa Keeththa gido gelees.
58006020	He sozikka nu gish Yesusi kaseti gelida so; izikka Malkexeedeqe shuumetetha mala mernas Qeeseta halaqa gidides.
58007001	Hessi Malkexeedeqey Saaleme kawonne Xoossa Qeese; izikka Abrahaamey kawota oli xoonidi simmishin demmidi Abrahaame anjides.
58007002	Abrahaameyka baas diza ubbafe tammu kusheppe issi kushe izas immides. Koyro iza sunthas birsheththi “Xillo kawo” guussa. Kaallidi qasse “Saaleme kawo” guussi “Sarotetha kawo” guussa.
58007003	Izas aayaka, aawayka woykko iza yeletethas zarkeykka baawa. Izi ayde yeletidi ayde hayqqidakkonne eretibenna; izas doomeththinne wursethi baawa; gido attin Xoossa naa mala mernas izi Qeese gididi dees.
58007004	Ane inte izi ay mala gitakkonne qoppite. Haray attoshin aawatas ubbas koyroy Abrahaamey ba di7i ekkidayssa ubbafe tammafe issa kessi immides.
58007005	Istas Qeesetethi imettida Lewe nayti ista ishati Abrahaame zerethata gidikkokka derappe hessika ba ishatappe tammafe issa ekkana mala istas wogan azazettides.
58007006	Hayssa ha addeza zerethi Lewe zereth gidenna. Gido attin izi Abrahaameppe tammafe issa ekkides. Kase izas hidota qaalay imettida Abrame anjides.
58007007	Bayray kaallo anjizayssi woga.
58007008	Issi baggara tammafe issa ekkizayti hayqqizayta. Hara baggara qasse tammafe issa ekkizadey hayqqonta paxa diza mala izas markattidadey Malkexeedeqe.
58007009	Haray attoshin Leweyka Abrahaame baggara tammafe issa kessides gaanas dandayettes.
58007010	Gaasoyka Malkexeedeqey Abrahaame gaaggiza wode Lewey buro ba aawa Abrahaameppe yeletibenna.
58007011	Paacey baynda poloy bettidaynne wogay derezas imettiday Lewe Qeesetetha mala gididakko Aarone mala gidonta Malkexeedeqe shuumetetha malay hara Qeesey yaanas aazas koshshidee?
58007012	Qeesetetha zarkey laametiza wode wogaykka laamettanayssi attonta miisha.
58007013	Hessi wurikka izas yootetida Qeesey izi hara zeretha. Iza zerethafe oonikka yarshoson ooththi erizadey baawa.
58007014	Nu Goday Yuhuda baggafe yidayssi tuma. Musey Qeeseta gish yootishe ha zeretha gish yootidayssi issi miishika baawa.
58007015	Malkexeedeqe malay hara Qeesey dendikko nu kase yootida yo7oy daro qonce gidenna.
58007016	Izi Qeese gididay dhayonta de7o wolqan attin zerethafe yida wogappe gidenna.
58007017	Izas “Ne Malkexeedeqe shuumetetha mala mernas Qeese” gi markatides.
58007018	Kase azazoy laafanne go7ontayssa gidida gish attides.
58007019	Wogay oonakka geeshshanaas dandayonta gish nu Xoossa achchi shiiqanas izappe aadhdhiza hara hidotay nuus imettides.
58007020	Hessika caaqoy baynda hanbenna; hanko Qeese gididayti caaqoy bayndayta.
58007021	Izi gidikko Qeesetetha caaqon ekkides. Gaasoyka Xoossi iza gish “Goday caaqides; ba qofa izi laammenna, ‘Ne mernas Qeese” ’ gides.
58007022	Hessa mala caaqoppe dendidayssan Yesusi hessafe aadhdhiza caaqo qaalas waase gidides.
58007023	Kase Qeeseti ba ooson sinthe gujjonta mala hayqoy ista diggida gish qooday istas daro.
58007024	Yesusi gidikko mernas dizadde gidida gish iza Qeesetethi shaaretonta Qeesetetha.
58007025	Hessa gish izi ista giigissana gaannatishe ubba wode hayqqonta paxa eqqi diza gish iza baggara Xoossako yizayta wursi ashshanas dandayees.
58007026	Hessa gish nuus koshshiza Qeeseta halaqay hessa mala geeshshinne wosoy iza bolla baynda xillonne nagaranchatappe shaaketidi salotappe bollara bonchettida Qeeseta halaqa.
58007027	Izi hanko Qeeseta halaqata mala koyro ba nagara gish qasseka kaaleththidi hanko dereza nagara gish gallas gallas yarsho shiishshanaas iza koshshenna. Izi bana aaththi immida wode asa nagara gish issito sintha baggassara yarsho wursi polides.
58007028	Wogay daburancha asata Qeesetas waanna halaqa histi shuumees. Wogappe kaallidi yida caaqo qaalay gidikko mernas iza bolla wosoy baynda naaza shuumides.
58008001	Hessa gish nu ha7i ooththana waanna yo7oy hayssa. Hayssa mala salo bolla Xoossa boncho alga ushachchan uttida Qeeseta halaqay nuus dees.
58008002	Izi asi tokkida dunkane giddon ooththizade gidonta Goda Xoossi tokkida tumu dunkanen geeshshason ooththizade.
58008003	Qeeseta halaqay shuumetizay asay Xoossas immizayssa Xoossas shiishshanaassinne yarsho yarshanassa. Hessa gish hayssi ha Qeeseta halaqayka Xoossas shiishshanaas issi shiishshiza miishi izas koshshees.
58008004	Izi biitta bolla dizaakko Qeese gidenna. Aazas giikko wogay giza mala yarsho shiishshiza hara Qeeseti deettes.
58008005	Isti kase salon diza Xoossa Keeththays leemisonne eesho. Musey dunkaneza ooththana gishin “Nees zuma bolla qoncidayssatho wursa ooththanas naageta” giza azazoy hessa gish izas imettides.
58008006	Gido attin Yesusi giddo geli gaannatizay caaqo qaalay kaseyssafe aadhdhizayssa mala izi ekkida oosoykka kaseyta oosoppe aadhdhees. Hessika kaseyssafe lo7iza hidota qaalanna.
58008007	Kase caaqo qaalan pacey bayndakko nam7antho hara caaqanas koshshenna.
58008008	Gido attin Xoossi dereza bolla pacey dizayssa demmida gish “Isra7eele asaranne Yuhuda asara tani ooratha caaqo caaqettana wodey yaana.
58008009	Hessika ta ista Gibxeppe kessanas ista kushe oykkada kase ista aawatara caaqettida qaala mala gidenna. Gaasoyka isti kase ta caaqo qaalan eqqibetenna. Takka ista yedda bessadis.
58008010	Hessafe guye Isra7eele asara ta caaqettana qaalay hayssa mala gees Goday. Tani ta woga ista woznan wothana. Ista wozna bollaka xaafana. Ta ista Xoosse gidana. Istika ta dere gidana.
58008011	Hayssafe guye asi ba guta asa woykko ba isha ‘Ne Goda era’ gi tamarsenna. Gaasoyka asi guuthafe gitata gakkanaas wurikka tana erana.
58008012	Ista qohoza ta maarana. Hayssafe sinthan ta asa nagara nam7antho zaara qoppikke” gees.
58008013	Hayssa ha caaqoza izi “Ooratha Caaqo” giidi kase caaqoza gal7a kessides. Hessa gish gal7idi wuridayssi dhayana wodey matides.
58009001	Koyro caaqo qaalazan Xoossas goynniza wogaynne biitta bolla diza Xoossa Keeththi dees.
58009002	Kase nam7u kifilera diza dunkaney giigeti dees. Koyro kifilezan xompe wothizasoynne xaraphezay qasse ukethi dees. Hessa he kifilezi dumma kifile geetettes.
58009003	Nam7antho kifilezi nam7antho magalashappe guye baggara diza kifiley ubbafe dumma geetettes.
58009004	Hessa giddon worqafe oosettida exane cuwasiza qeeri shel7e malaynne worqan meeshettida caaqo taabotay dees. He taabotaykka iza giddon mannay diza worqa leematey, cililida Aarone guufeynne caaqo qaalati iza bolla xaafetida shuchcha masethi dees.
58009005	He taabotaza bolla diza nagarappe maarotetha kamaza bolla ba qefera kammiza boncho kurubeti deettes. Ha7i qasse nu heytanta issa issa gish shaakki shaakki haasayanas dandayokko.
58009006	Wurikka hessatho giigetidappe guye Qeeseti ba ooso polanas dunkanas koyro kifile geletes.
58009007	Gidikkokka ubbafe gidotiza kifile Qeeseta halaqay xalala gelees. Hessika layththan issito xalala gidishin izi ba nagara gishshinne derey eronta ooththida nagara gish shiishshiza yarsho suuth oykkonta mulekka gelenna.
58009008	Koyro dunkanezi kase diza wode gede ubbafe dumma geetettizaso efiza ogey he wode qonce gidontayssa Xillo Ayanay bessees.
58009009	Hessika hayssa ha wodezas leemiso gidishin kase shiiqiza yarshotinne coo imettiza imotati immizayta wozna shempissanassinne mule geeshshanas dandaybeetenna.
58009010	Heytanti wurikka ooratha wogay yaana gakkanaas coo mela duuna haasaya mala. Qasseka isti muussa gishshinne ushsha gish qasseka dumma dumma geesho wogata xalala.
58009011	Gidikkoka Kirstoosi buroppe yaanas diza lo7o miishatas Qeeseta halaqa gididi qoncides; izi izan gelida dunkanezi gitanne geeshsha. He dunkanezi asa kushen oosetontayssanne hayssa ha medhetethafe gidenna.
58009012	Izi he dunkanezan gelishe deyshata suuthunne woppano boorata suuth ekki gelibenna. Gido attin as ashshanas mernas ba suuth ekkidi ubbafe dumma geetettiza kifile hara wode nam7antho gelonta mala wursetha gelo gelides.
58009013	Istas kare bagga asatethay tunida asata bolla araciza deysha suuthinne woppano boorata suuthi hessathoka yarshos xuugettida ussa bidinthi ista geeshshizayssa gidikko,
58009014	Merna Ayanan bana wosoy baynda yarsho ooththi Xoossas shiishida Kirstoosa suuthi nuni de7o Xoossas goynnanas hayqetha oosoppe nuna ay mala aaththi geeshshandee?
58009015	Hessa gish xeeygetidayti istas immana geetettida merna laata ekkana mala Kirstoosi ooratha caaqos gaannatizadde gidides. Koyro caaqoza garsan diza wode isti ooththida nagarappe geeyana mala ista gish izi hayqqides.
58009016	Bazay bazettizayssa gidikko bazidade hayqo shaakki eranas bessees.
58009017	Gaasoyka bazay minnizay bazidaddey hayqqinna. Bazidaddey paxa dishin bazay aykkokka ooththenna.
58009018	Hessa gish koyro caaqo qaalay suuthi baynda minnibenna.
58009019	Musey ba azazo woga deraas yooti simmidi deyshata suuthinne woppano boorata suuth haaththara ekkidi zo7o dorsa isiken ecere wurce mala hesophe geetettiza mithara ekkidi ba xaafida woga maxaafa bollaninne dereza bolla wuxxides.
58009020	“Inte naagana mala intena Xoossi azazida caaqo qaala suuthay hayssa” gides.
58009021	Hessathoka dunkanezanne iza giddon diza ooso miisha bolla ubba suuth wuxxides.
58009022	Addafeka guutha miishati attishin hanko daro miishay suuthan geeyanas bessizayssa wogay azazes. Suuthi gukkonta dishin maaroy baawa.
58009023	Hessa gish salo miishatas leemiso gididayti haytantan geeyanays attenna shin. Salon diza miishati gidikko hayssafeka aadhdhiza yarshon geeyanas bessees.
58009024	Kirstoosi tumu dunkaneys leemisonne asa kushen oosettida Xoossa Keeththe gelibenna; gido attin ha7i nu gish Xoossa sinthan beettanas pude salo gelides.
58009025	Qeeseta halaqay ba suuth gidonta suuth ekkidi laythan laythan ubbafe dumma kifile gelizayssatho Kirstoosi bana yarshanas pude salo shireti shireti gelibenna.
58009026	Hessa mala gidizakko Kirstoosi alamey medhetosappe haa simmin daro wode meto ekkanas bessees; ha7i qasse wode wursethan bana yarshidi nagara digganas wursethas issito qoncides.
58009027	Hessathoka asi issito hayqqees; hessafe kaallidi pirda sinthan eqqanas giigi uttides.
58009028	Kirstoosi daro asa nagara digganas issito yarshetides. Nam7anthokka izi qoncana; hessi iza naagizaytas atotethi ekki yaanas attin nam7antho zaari nagara tookkanas gidenna.
58010001	Muse wogay buro sinthara yaana lo7o hanotas eeshoppe attin tumu adda medhay izas deenna. Hessa gish laythan laythan pacey baynda shiri shiri shiishshiza yarshoy Xoosse goynnanas shiiqiza asa geeshshanas mulekka dandaybenna.
58010002	Asa mulera geeshshana dandayizayssa gididakko isti yarsho yarshanayssa aggagettenee? Qasseka Xoosse goynnana shiiqiza asay issito geeyizakko ba woznara nagarancha gididayssa sidhana.
58010003	Gido attin heyti yarshoti laythan laythan nagara zaari zaari qofisetees.
58010004	Gaasoyka woppanotanne deyshata suuthi asappe nagara digganas dandayenna.
58010005	Hessa gish Kirstoosi hayssa ha alameza yiidi “Neni imotanne yarsho koyabeykka shin ne taas asho giigissadassa.
58010006	Taman xuugetiza yarshonne nagara gish shiiqiza yarshon ufayetabeykka” gides.
58010007	He wode tani “Ta gish Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetida mala ‘Xoosso hekko tani ne shene ooththanas yadis’ gadis” gides.
58010008	Muse wogay hessi hessatho hanana mala azazikkokka izi qasse koyro “Yarsho, imota, xuugetiza yarshonne nagara gish shiiqiza yarsho ne koyabeykanne izan ufayetabeykka” gees.
58010009	Kaalethidikka “Hekko ta ne shene ooththana yadis” gides. Nam7anthoza essanas koyroyssa diggides.
58010010	Hayssa ha “Iza shene” giza qaala mala hara yarsho zaarethi shiishshanaas koshshonta mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara issito shiiqida yarshon geeyidos.
58010011	Qeesey hach hach eqqidi ba ooso polees. As nagarappe geeshshanas dandayontayata wontin wontin shiishshees.
58010012	Kirstoosi gidikko yarsho issito mernas gidanayssa shiishshidi Aawa ushachchan uttides.
58010013	He gallassafe simmin iza morketi iza toho garsan yedhettana gakkanaas naagon dees.
58010014	Gaasoyka issito shiishida yarshon geeyana asata mernas geeshshides.
58010015	Hessa he hanoza gish Xillo Ayanaykka nuus markatees. Koyro,
58010016	“Hessafe guye ta istara gelana caaqo qaalay hayssa. Ta woga ta ista woznan wothana. Ista woznan ta xaafana” gees Goday.
58010017	Qasseka “Ta ista nagaranne makala nam7antho qoppikke” gees Goday.
58010018	Heytanti wurikka atto geetettidappe guye nam7antho nagaras shiiqana hara yarshoy deenna.
58010019	Hessa gish ta ishato; nuni Yesus Kirstoosa suutha baggara gede ubbafe dumma geesh geetettizasoyo gelanas xalateth demmidos.
58010020	Hessika magalasha baggara; hessika izi ba asho baggara nuus doyida oorathinne de7o gidida ogenna.
58010021	Xoossa Keeththa bolla shuumetida Qeeseta halaqay nuus diza gish,
58010022	nuni nu iita qofappe geeyanas nu wozna aracettidi nu asatethaka xillo haaththan meecetidi tumu woznappenne kumeththa ammanon Xoossako ane shiiqoos.
58010023	Nuus hidota qaala immidadey ammanettizade gidida gish nuni ammanidi iza gish markattiza hidotappe hee haa goonta ane lo7ethi oykkos.
58010024	Siiqoninne lo7o ooson nu minni daana mala ane issoy issa qofisos.
58010025	Ane nu ubba gallas issoy issara gakki gakki issoy issa minthethos attin issi issi asati shiiqo aggida mala ane nuni shiiqoza aggokko; harappeka Goda Yesusi matatidayssa qoppishe kaseppe minni shiiqite.
58010026	Nuni tuma shaakki eridi ekkidayssafe guye erishe nagara ooththikko hayssafe guye nagaras shiiqanas hara yarshoy deenna.
58010027	Hara buro hananay daro babisiza pirday Xoossa morketa xuugana naagiza mino tamay xalala dees.
58010028	Muse woga kadhida asi nam7u woykko heedzdzu markati markattikko maaroy baynda hayqon qaxayeetes.
58010029	Histin Xoossa naa kadhida asi izan geeyida caaqo suutha hiraaysso miisha mala qoodidadessinne iza kiyatetha Ayana isethidades ay mala hessafe aadhdhiza pirday izas bessiza intes misatizee?
58010030	Tani izas halo kessana; izaade ooso mala izaades ta zaarana” gidayssa nu eroos. Qasseka “Goday ba dereza bolla pirdana” gees Goday.
58010031	De7o Xoossa kushen kundethi daro babises.
58010032	Intes issito poo7oy poo7idappe guye meto wode daro baaxen inte kase minni eqqida beni wodeza yuushi qoppite.
58010033	Issi issi wode inte duulata dere sinthan cashshassinne goodeteththas aadhdhi imettideta. Qasse hara wodekka hessa mala waayey ista bolla gakkida asatara inteka issife waaye beydeta.
58010034	Inte intes harappe aadhdhiza mernas daana haaroy dizayssa eriza gish qashetidaytas mishetidetanne inte haaroy bonqettishin ufayssan dandaydeta.
58010035	Hessa gish gita waagay diza kase inte ammanetetha aggofte.
58010036	Inte Xoossa shene polidi izi intes immida ufaysa qaala ekkanas minni eqqanas intena koshshees.
58010037	Gaasoyka guutha wodeppe kaallidi “Yaanayssi izi yaana; gam7enna”
58010038	Xillo asi gidikko ammanon de7o demmana; guye undudizadey diikko ta shempoya izaade bolla ufayetuku.
58010039	“Nuni gidikko ammanidi attidayta bagga attin gede guye undudi dhayizayta bagga gidokko” gides.
58011001	Ammano geethi issi miishe hanana giidi nu sidhonta dishe beyonta miisheka beyida mala ero gi ekko.
58011002	Kase Aawati galattettiday hessa mala ammanonna.
58011003	Hayssi ha alamey Xoossa qaalan medhetidayssa nu ammanon eroos. Hessathoka ayfen beettizayssi medhetiday beettiza miishafe gidontayssa nuni eroos.
58011004	Aabeeley Xoossas Qayeele yarshofe aadhdhiza yarsho ammanon shiishshides. Xoossi iza yarshoza gish haasayishe izi ammanon geesh gididayssa markattides. Izi hayqqinka iza ammanoy ha7i gakkanaas hasayettes.
58011005	Henookey hayqo beyonta mala hayssa alamezappe ammanon eketides. Xoossi iza ekkida gish izi bettibenna; eketanappe kasetidi izi Xoossa ufaysidayssi yootetida gish izi ekettides.
58011006	Qasseka ammanoy baynda dishin Xoossa ufayssanas mulekka dandayettenna. Gaasoyka Xoossako shiiqizadey wurikka Xoossi gizayssanne woznappe iza koyizaytas izi waaga immanayssa ammananas bessees.
58011007	Nohes Xoossi buro Nohey ba ayfen beyonta miisha gish naagettana mala yootin Nohey Xoossa babbidi baso asa ashshanas ammanon markabe keexxidi alame asa pirdisides; ammanon beettiza xilloteth laattizade gidides.
58011008	Abrahaamey baas laata biitta ekkanas xeeygetida wode ammanon azazetides. Awa bizakkonne eronta aggikkokka ero giidi bides.
58011009	Alaga biittan bete asa mala buro nees imettana geetettida biittan ammanon uttides. Izas imettida hidota qaala izara issife laattana Yisaaqa malanne Yaqoobe mala dunkanen de7ides.
58011010	Gaasoyka minna dizaaro Xoossi izo qoppi medhdhida katamayo ekkana naagides.
58011011	Abrahaames wodey gede biddade gidikkokka Saaraykka yelonta makara gidikkokka hidota istas immidadey ammanettidade histi xeelidi ammanon naa aawa gidanas gakkides.
58011012	Hessa gish hayssa hayqqida asa mala qoodetida issi Abrahaameppe salo xoolinte malanne abba ace mala qooday baynda daro zerethay beettides.
58011013	Heyti wurikka istas imettida hidota qaala demmoonta ba ammanon naagida mala hayqqida. Gidikkoka isti hayssa biitta bolla imathenne bete as gididayssa erida gish haahon dishe beyidi kushen aaththida mala ufayssan ekkida.
58011014	Hessa mala giza asati ista derey awakkonne ba dere naagizayssa qonccen bessetes.
58011015	Isti ba yeggi kezida dere zaari qoppizakko guye simmi baana dandayeettes.
58011016	Ha7i hessafe aadhdhiza pude salon diza dere laamotettes. Hessa gish Xoossi istas salon katama giigissida gish “Ista xalla Xoossa” geetetti xeeygetanas yeellatibenna.
58011017	Xoossi Abrahaamey ba naaza Yisaaqa shukana mala paacin Abrahaamey Yisaaqa yarshanas ammanon shiishshides. Xoossi izas immana gidayssa izikka ba naa issineza shukanas giigetides.
58011018	Hessika Xoossi izas “Ne zerethi Yisaaqa baggara xeeygettana” gidayssa mala.
58011019	Xoossi hayqqidadde denthanas dandayizayssa Abrahaamey ammanida gish Yisaaqakka hayqoppe dendida asa mala nam7antho demmides.
58011020	Yisaaqay buroppe hananayssa qoppi ekkidi Yaqoobenne Eesawe ammanon anjides.
58011021	Yaqoobey hayqqana gish Yoosefe nayta issa issa ammanon anjidaynne ba guufe bolla darti eqqidi goynniday ammanona.
58011022	Yoosefi hayqqana gish Isra7eele asay Gibxeppe kezanayssa izi yootidaynne ba meqetha gish isti ay ooththanakkonne ista azaziday ammanona.
58011023	Musey yeletin izas malay lo7o gididayssa beyidi iza yelidayti iza heedzdzu agina gakkanaas kawoza azazo babbonta qotiday ammanona.
58011024	Musey dicci gakkidi “Paaroones nay naa” geetetanayssa ammanon ixxides.
58011025	Guutha wodes nagaran beettiza ufayssafe aaththidi Xoossa asara meto beyanas doorides.
58011026	Gibxe deren diza haaroppe bollara Kirstoosa gish waaye ekoy daro aadhdhiza haaro gididayssa yuushi qoppides. Gaasoyka izi sinthafe ekanayssa buro haahon beyida gishassa.
58011027	Kawo hanqqos babbonta ammanon Gibxe yeggi kezides. Buro beettontayssa beyiza mala qoppidi he qofan minni eqqides.
58011028	Bayrata wursi wodhizayssi Isra7eeleta bayra nayta wodhonta mala ammanon Paaziganne suutha wuxxetha woga woththides.
58011029	Isra7eele asay mela biitta bolla hamuttiza mala Zo7o Abba giddora ammanon pinnides. Gibxe asay qasse istatho hanana gish abban mitetides.
58011030	Isra7eele asay Iyarko gimbeza laapun qamma yuuyi yuuyi aadhdhidappe guye gimbeza ammanon laallides.
58011031	Layman aqiza Era7aaba dere xomoosana yidayta saron mokka ekkida gish hanko azazettonta asara dhayonta ammanon attadus.
58011032	Hayssafe aadhdheth hara ay gaanee? Geedoone gish, Baaraqe gish, Samsoone gish, Yofitahe gish, Dawute gish, Sameela gish qasse nabeta gish ta yootonta mala taas wodey deenna.
58011033	Heytanti ammanon kawota xoonida; suure pirda pirdida; baas imettida hidota qaala ekkida; gaammota duuna gordida;
58011034	tama wolqa toyssida; qara mashshafe kessi ekki attida; daaburappe minnida; Olason goobata gidida; alaga asa ola goodida;
58011035	Macasatas hayqqidayti paxida; baggayti qasse hessafe aadhdhiza hayqoppe denthi demmanas giidi hayqoppe atethi leqqidi hayqos bana aaththi immida; waayeppe attanas koybetenna.
58011036	Issi issi asati asan kaa7ettida; garafettida; baggayti qasse qasho keeththi gelida.
58011037	Shuchchan cadettida; magazenka nam7u kezi phaliqettida; mashshan shuketi hayqqida; waayetishe, goodetishenne daaburshe dorsa itenne deysha ite may7idi waayetida.
58011038	Ha alamey istas bessontayssa gidida gish bazzoninne gezzen gongoloninne olla giddon waayetida.
58011039	Heytanta ubbata ammano gish markattikkokka istafe oonikka imettana geetettida hidota qaala gakkidi ekkidadey deenna.
58011040	Xoossi nuus hessafe aadhdhizaz giigissida gish nu baynda isti xalala kumeth gidana dandaybeetenna.
58012001	Hessa gish shaara mala nuna yuuy aadhdhida daro markati nuus dishin nuna deexxiza toohonne qasse nuna qachi oykiza nagara wursi nuuppe wora yeggidi nu sinthan diza wotha gencaninne dandayan ane wooxos.
58012002	Nu ammaniza ammanozas koyronne polo gidida Yesusa ane xeelloos. Izi ba sinthan diza ufaysa gish masqale bolla hayqo dandayidi masqale bolla bana gakkana kawushshatetha leqqidi Xoossa algas ushachchan uttides.
58012003	Histikko inte daaburidi hidota qanxonta mala hessathoka nagaranchatappe kase iza bolla gakkida hessa mala eqeteth dandayida Yesusa qoppite.
58012004	Suuthi gukkana gakkanaas nagarara inte buro eqettibeyketa.
58012005	Inte Xoossa nayta gidi uttidi qaalay gizayssa balideta. “Ta naazo Xoossa seera kawushshan xeellofa; nena izi seeriza wode hidota qanxofa.
58012006	Gaasoyka Goday ba dosizadde hanqees; izi ba dosizadde seeres. Izi ba naa mala xeellizade qaxayees” gides.
58012007	Xoossi intena ba naa mala qoodiza gish hanqo dandayite. Aaway hanqonta nay oonee?
58012008	Nay wuri seeran diccizaththo inte dicconta aggikko inte Karen yeletida naa attin so naa gidekketa.
58012009	Hessa ubbafe bollara hayssa biitta bolla nuna hanqi dichchida asho aawati deettes. Nuka ista bonchos. Histin de7on deyanas nuus Ayana Aawa gididayssas aazas hessafe aaththi azazettokkonii?
58012010	Nu aawati nuna baas lo7o misati bettida mala guutha wodes qaxayettes. Xoossi gidikko nuni iza geeshshatetha izappe demmana mala nuna go7anas qaxayees.
58012011	Qixaatey wurikka ha7is ufaysonta iita misatees shin guyeppe qasse dosi ekkida asatas sarotethi izan kumida xillotetha ayfen gaththes.
58012012	Hessa gish daaburida inte qesenne inte gulbate minisite.
58012013	Wobey paxana mala attin kaseppe aaththi wobonta mala inte tohos lo7o oge giigissite.
58012014	Asi ubbara saro daana mala intes dandayettizayssa wursi ooththite. Geeyana mala koyite. Geeshshatethi baynda Goda beyanas dandayettenna.
58012015	Intefe issadeska Xoossa kiyatethi pacconta mala qasseka camo ayfe ayfiza mithi mokkidi meto medhonta malanne darota mooronta mala naagetite.
58012016	Issito maana kaththas ba bayrateth bayzida Eesawe mala intefe oonikka laymatizade woykko Xoosse bonchontadde gidi beettonta mala naagetite.
58012017	Eesawey guyeppe kase ba anjoza laattanas zaari koyin izas imettonta diggettidayssa inte ereeta. Izi bana gakkiza anjozaska daro yeekkishe koyidikka zaari demmanas dandaybenna.
58012018	Kushen bochchikko boshettiza tamay iza bolla exxiza Siina zumakko he dhumakko, he tulalezakkonne he gote carkozakko inte gakkibeyketa.
58012019	Inte zaye giirissakko woykko haythan siyetiza qaala giirissakko gakkibeyketa. Hessa siyida asatikka hara qaala gujjonta mala woossida.
58012020	Hessas gaasoyka “Haray attoshin meheykka zuma bochchiza gidikko shuchchan cadeti hayqo” giza azazoza asay naaganas dandaybenna.
58012021	He wode heen hanizayssi wurikka daro babisizayssa gidida gish Museykka “Ta babbada kokkoradis” gides.
58012022	Inte qasse ha Xiyoone zuma bolla, pude salo Yerusalame, de7o Xoossa katama ufayssan shiiqida qooday baynda kiitanchatako yiddeeta.
58012023	Ista sunthi salon xaafetida bayrata maabaranko; ubbas daanna gidida Xoossako ista bolla wosoy baynda xillo asata shempoy dizaso matideta.
58012024	Ooratha caaqon maqayinthiza Yesusakko hessathoka Aabeeley shiishida suuthafe aadhdhiza caaqo qaala yootiza aracettida suuthako gakkideta.
58012025	Intes yootizayssa inte akay goonta mala naagetite; heytanti Xoossi biitta bolla diza asa baggara istas yootizayssa ekkonta ixidi izappe attanas dandayonta aggikko nuni saloppe yidayssi nuus yootishin nu ekkonta ixikko izappe waanidi attanee?
58012026	He wode qaala giirissan biitta qaathides. Ha7i qasse biitta xalala gidonta ta salokka qasseka zaarada issito qaathana” giza qaala yooti woththides.
58012027	Hayssi “Qasseka ta zaarada issito” giza qaalay nuna bessizay qaaxontayti minni daana malanne qaxizayti heytikka medhetidayti kichchanayssa bessees.
58012028	Hessa gish nuni mulekka qaaxonta kawoteth laattana gish ane Xoosse galatoos. Qasseka iza ufaysiza ogera bonchossinne yashshatethan ane izas goynnoos.
58012029	Nu Xoossay xuugiza tama mala.
58013001	Inte inte giddon ishata mala dosettite.
58013002	Imatha moko baloppite; issi issi asati hessatho ooththishe eronta kiitanchata imathateth mokki ekkida.
58013003	Qasho keeththan dizaytara inteka qashettida mala istas qoppite. Hessathoka asa kushen waayetizaytara inteka waayetiza mala istas qoppite.
58013004	Ekoy geloy ubba asa achchan bonchetto. Inte hiithey geesh gido. Gaasoyka layma amoy dizaytanne laymatizayta bolla Xoossi pirdana.
58013005	Mishsha siiqoppe naagetite. Intes dizayssi gidana; hessas gaasoy Xoossi “Ta intena mulekka aggikkenne yeggike” gides.
