58013006	Hessa gish kumeththa woznappe nuni “Goday taas maado; ta babbike. Tana asi ay ooththana dandayizee?” goos.
58013007	Intes Xoossa qaala koyroppe yooti kaalethizayta baloppite. Ista duussan beettiza lo7o ayfey dizayssa yuushi qoppite. Inteka ammanon ista misatite.
58013008	Yesus Kirstoosi hachchika wontoka mernaska izi izakko!
58013009	Dumma dumma imatha timirte ekkofte; nu woznay minni eqqizay Xoossa kiyatethan attin kaththa woga naagon gidenna. Hessa he woga naagizaytikka izan go7ettibeetenna.
58013010	Nuus yarshosoy dees. Gidikkoka dunkaneza giddon ooththiza Qeeseti he yarshosoza bolla diza kathafe ekki moonta mala diggettida.
58013011	Qeeseta halaqay nagara teqiza mehe suuth ekkidi ubbafe dumma geetettiza kifile geeles. Meheta ashoy gidikko katamappe Karen xuugetes.
58013012	Hessathoka Yesusi ba suutha baggara asa geeshshanas katama pengefe Karen meto beyides.
58013013	Hessa gish nuka izi tookkidi kawushshatetha tookkida nu dizasoppe gede izakko kare ane kezoos.
58013014	Gaasoyka hayssan eqqi daana Katamay nuus deenna. Gido attin buro sinthafe yaana katamayo naagos.
58013015	Hessa gish ubba wode galata yarsho hessika iza sunthas markattiza nu duunappe beettiza ayfe gididaz Yesusa baggara Xoossas ane shiishoos.
58013016	Qasseka lo7o oosonne intes dizayssafe haratas imo baloppite. Xoossi heytanta mala yarshon ufayetes.
58013017	Intena kaalethizaytas azazetitenne haarettite. Hessas gaasoyka inte gish ista alafetethan daro oychiza guday diza gish inte shempo gish daro baaxetetes. Hessa gish isti ba ooththiza oosoza lancettishe gidonta ufayssan ooththana mala inte istas azazetite. Inte hessatho histonta aggikko intes lo7enna.
58013018	Nuuska woossite. Ubbasorakka lo7o duus daanas laamotiza lo7o qofay nuus dizayssa nu sidhokko.
58013019	Harappeka ta inteko ellen simma baana mala taas inte woossana mala hadara gays.
58013020	Dorsata henthanchay wogga Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ba merna caaqo qaala suuthan iza hayqoppe denthida sarotetha Xoossi,
58013021	inte iza shene polana mala lo7etethan intena gixiso. Xoossa ufaysizayssa Yesus Kirstoosa baggara nunan ooththo. Izas mernappe mernas bonchoy gido. Amiin.
58013022	Ta ishato! Intes xaafida zore qaalay guuth gidida gish inte hanqettonta mala ta intena hadara gays.
58013023	Nu isha Ximtoossi birshettidayssa inte erana mala ta koyays. Izi eeson taakko yiikko ta izara hee baada intena heen beyana.
58013024	Intena kaalethizayta ubbatasinne ammaniza asa ubbas ta saroka yootite. Ixaaliyan diza ammaniza asaykka intena saro gees.
58013025	Xoossa kiyatethi intenara gido. Amiin.
59001001	Xoossa oosanchanne Yesus Kirstoosa oosancha gidida Yaqoobeppe biitta bolla laalettida tammanne nam7u kochchatas sarotethi intes gido.
59001002	Ta ishato! Inte bolla dumma dumma waayey gakkikko hessa wursi ufayssan qoodite.
59001003	Gaasoyka inte ammano paacetethi intes dandaya immizayssa inte ereeta.
59001004	Inte dandayan minni eqanayssi intes issi miishikka pacconta kumeththa asinne wosoy bayndayta gidana mala ooththo.
59001005	Inte giddofe oonaska eratethi paccikko oonakka leqqonta ba kiyatethara ubbas immiza Xoossa woosso; izaadeska imettana.
59001006	Gido attin sidhey baynda ammanon woosso. Gaasoyka sidhizadey abba qaathiza dambala carko mala.
59001007	Hessadey Godappe aykkokka demmana giidi qoppofo.
59001008	Hessadey nam7u qofan oykketidi ba biza oge bolla yaanne haanne giza asa mala.
59001009	Kase ziqa duussan dizade Xoossi dhoqu histana gish ufayetto.
59001010	Asa dureteth maata ciishsha mala qokana gish duussan dhoqu gidadey Xoossi iza ziqqi histikko ufayetto.
59001011	Awa arshey xuugidi maata shullisees; maata ciishshaykka shullees; iza lo7etethikka dhayees; hessathoka durey hach hach daabursan dishin iza duretethi dhayees.
59001012	Paacen minni eqidadey izi anjetidade. Gaasoyka izi paacera eqetishin Xoossi bana dosizaytas immida hidota de7o aklile izi ekkana.
59001013	Oonikka paacetiza gidikko tana Xoossi paaces gooppo; gaasoyka Xoossi ase iitan paacenna; izi oonakka paaci erenna.
59001014	Gido attin issi issi asi paacetizay barka ba iita amo kaallishenne balettishe paacetes.
59001015	Amoy qanthatidi nagara yelees; Nagaraykka diccidappe guye hayqo yelees.
59001016	Ta siiqo ishato! Inte balettofte.
59001017	Lo7o imotethinne kumeththa anjoy wuri bolla salo poo7ota Aawappe wodhdhetes. Iza achchan heene ha yuuyiza eeshoykka deenna.
59001018	Nu iza medhetethas koyro bayrata gidana mala ba sheneninne ba tuma qaalan nuna yelides.
59001019	Dosettida ta ishato! Hayssa yuushi qoppite; asi wurikka siyanas eesoto; haasayassinne hanqos eesotoppo.
59001020	Asa hanqoy Xoossa xilloteth ooththenna.
59001021	Hessa gish tunatethinne dalgida iitateth intefe kessi yeggidi inte shempo ashshanas dandayiza inte giddon tokketida qaala ashketethara ekkite.
59001022	Qaalay gizayssa ooththite attin mela sisi xalala siyizadenta gididi interka intena baleththofte.
59001023	Qaala siyishe siyida qaalay gizayssa ooththontadey ba ayfeso mastootera xeelliza asa mala.
59001024	Bana xeelli beyidi bees; izi ay misatizakkone heerakka balettiches.
59001025	Gido attin bana geeshshiza lo7o woga xeelli beyidi izan minnizadey ba siyidayssa ooththizadeynne balontaddey izi ba ooson anjettidade gidana.
59001026	Ba duuna naagonta barka ba wozna baleththishe ta ammanays gizaddey barka bana baleththees. Iza ammanoyka mela hada ammano.
59001027	Xoossa Aawa sinthan iitatethi baynda lo7o ammanoy; “Aayanne aaway hayqqida nayta, ista azinati hayqqida macasata metotetishin maadonne hayssa alameza tunatethafe bana naago.
59002001	Ta ishato! Inte bonchettida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa ammanizayta gidida mala ase bessonta ogera maaddofte.
59002002	Worqa yiich biradhdhen aaththidi lo7o may7o may7ida asi inte shiiqizaso yiikko hessathoka qita may7o may7idadey he shiiqizaso yiikko qasseka hara qita may7o may7ida manqo asi gelikko lo7o may7idayssa dumma boncho bonchidi “Nees bessiza lo7o uttizaso hessa beya” giidi hanko manqoza qasse “Ne heen hessan eqa; woykko haa ya, ta garsan wugen utta” inte giikko,
59002004	inte inte giddon bessonta maado ooththeta gidekketii? Qasseka inte iita qofan oykketida iita pirda pirdizayta gidekketii?
59002005	Ta siiqo ishato! Ane siyite; isti ammanon dureta gidana mala Xoossi bana dosizaytas hidota istas immida kawoteththa isti laattana mala hayssa ha alamezan diza manqota dooribennee?
59002006	Inte qasse manqota kawushsheeta. Intena waayssizay dureta gidettennee? Intena pirdaso goochchizay ista gidettennee?
59002007	Intenan xeeygetida boncho Xoossa suntha zigirzayti ista gidettennee?
59002008	Maxaafan “Ne lagge ne hu7e mala siiqa” geetetti xaafetida kawo woga inte polikko lo7o ooththeta.
59002009	Inte bessonta maado maaddikko nagara ooththeta. Woga sinthanka inte woga yedhidade gidi qoodettana.
59002010	Gaasoyka woga wursi polizadey qasseka wogappe issineyin dhuphetiza asi wursikka mooridade mala qoodetes.
59002011	“Laymatoppa” gidadey izikka zaaridi “Wodhopa” gides. Ne laymatonta agikkokka ne asa wodhikko wogappe aadhdhidade gidassa.
59002012	Inte haasaya haasayishe woykko issi miish ooththishe intena xillisiza asa mala gidite.
59002013	Gaasoyka maarontay wurikka maaroy baynda pirdettana. Maaroy pirda Xoonees.
59002014	Ta ishato! Issi asi taas ammanoy dees giikko qasse ooson bessontade gidikko iza ay maaddanee? Hessa mala ammanoy iza ashshanee?
59002015	Ane qoppite, issi ishay woykko issi michiya may7oy woykko mizayssi baynda aggikko intefe issadey “Inte saron biite! Intena meggofo! Kallite!” giikko ista ashos koshshizayssa immoonta aggikko ay maaddanee?
59002017	Hessathoka oosoy baynda ammanoyka baas hayqqidayssa.
59002018	Gido attin issadey “Taas oosoy dees nees ammanoy dees. Neni ne ammano oosoppe shaakada tana bessa; ta qasse ta ammano ooson nena bessana” giikko,
59002019	ne “Issi Xoossi dizayssa ammanaasa” hessika lo7o; daydanthatikka hessa mala ammanettesinne keehi kokkoreettes.
59002020	Neno eeyazo! Oosoy baynda ammanos go7ay bayndayssa eranas marka koyay?
59002021	Nu aawa Abrahaamey ba naa Yisaaqa yarshizasoza bolla shiishida wode ooson xillibennee?
59002022	Hessan ammanoza oosora gaththi ooththizayssa ne beyassa; ammanoyka ooson poletides.
59002023	“Abrahaamey Xoosse ammanides; he ammanoy izas xillotethan qoodetides” giza maxaafa qaalay poletides; izikka Xoossi dosiddadde geetettides.
59002024	Hessa gish asi ammanon xalala gidonta oosonka xillizayssa inte beyeeta.
59002025	Hessathoka layman diza Era7aaba kiiteti bida asata mokka ekada hara ogera moyiza yeddida gish ba ooson xillabeykkee?
59002026	Shempofe shaaketida ashoy hayqeth gidida mala oosoppekka shaaketida ammanoy hayqetha.
59003001	Ta ishato! Intefe daroti astamareta gidoppetto; gaasoyka nu astamare gididayti aadhetha pirda ekkanayssa inte ereeta.
59003002	Nu wurikka daro miishan dhuphetos. Haasayan dhuphetontadey diikko izi ba asateth lo7ethi naaganas dandayiza kumeththa asa.
59003003	Nuni parata azazanas bixala barsidi nu koyda mala ista azazoos.
59003004	Woykko ane markabeta xeellite. Isti ay gitatanne carkon sugeti bizayta gidikkokka markabe laagizadey qeeri laafa laagiza miishara ba koyizaso efees.
59003005	Hessathoka asatetha garsan inxarsi guuth gida uttada gita wolqama otoro otoretawus; qeeri tamay gita wora wosti xuugi dhayssizakkonne ane yuushi qoppite.
59003006	Inxarasika ba baggara tama mala; Nu asatetha giddon diza iita alame. Asatetha wursa tunisawussinne asatetha bolla tama gujawus; baska gaanname taman xuugettana.
59003007	Mehey, do7ay, kafoti hayssathoka biitta bolla gooshetizaytanne abba giddon diza medhetethata wursi asi haarana dandayees; istika haarettida.
59003008	Gido attin inxars haaranas dandayidadey oonikka deenna. Wodhiza mardzey izin kumidaronne iza shempa ekkonta iita miisha.
59003009	Nuni nu inxarsayra Godanne Aawa anjjoos. Izinka Xoossa leemison medhetida asa nayta zaaridi qangoos.
59003010	Anjoynne qangethi issi duunara kezees. Ta ishato! Hessi hessatho hananas bessenna.
59003011	Issi pulto ollafe mal7o haaththinne camo haaththi pulti erizee?
59003012	Ta ishato! Balase geetettiza mithi wogara ayfe woykko woyne mithi balase mitha ayfe ayfanas dandayizee? Hessathoka cammiza haaththafe mal7iza haaththi bettana dandayenna.
59003013	Inte garasafe akeekara diza era asi oonee? Eray diza gidikko ane ba ooso ashketethaninne aadhdho eratethara ba lo7o dussan besso.
59003014	Qasse camonne qanatey, intena xalala dosiza hanoy inte woznan diza gidikko otoreteth intes siyetofo. Tumakka kadofite.
59003015	Hinni mala eratethaya saloppe gidikku. Hinna qasse biittafe, ashoppenne Xala7eppekko!
59003016	Qanateynne barka bana siiqoy dizason waasoynne iita oosoy wuri dees.
59003017	Saloppe gidida eratethaya gidikko koyro geeshsha, guyeppekka saroteth dosizaaro, dandayizaaro, ero gizaaro, maarotethinne lo7o ayfey kumidaaro; qasse wordo maadontaaronne ulon geney bayndaaro.
59003018	Saroteth dosiza asati sarotethan zeridi xillotetha ayfe maxeettes.
59004001	Inte giddon diza olaynne ooshay awappe yidee? Inte woznan diza amotethafe dendida ola gidenee?
59004002	Inte amotteta shin demmekketa. Inte as wodheetanne keehi amotteta shin demmana dandayekketa. Inte inte garsan ooyetiza gishanne olletiza gish qasse woossonta gish intes imettenna.
59004003	Inte inte asho ufayssanas iita qofan woossiza gish woossidayssa inte ekeketa.
59004004	Inteno laymatizayto! Alamera siiqetethi Xoossara morketeth gididayssa ereketii? Hessa gish hayssa alamezara siiqetethi koyizay wurikka Xoossas morke.
59004005	Woykko Geeshsha Maxaafa giddon “Nunan izi ayssida Ayanay nu izayta gidana mala daro amottes” gizayssi intes coo mela gida misatizee?
59004006	Gido attin izi ba kiyateth nuus gujji imees. Maxaafaykka “Xoossi otoranchatara eqettees, ashketas qasse ba kiyateth imees” giday hessassa.
59004007	Hessa gish intena Xoossas haarisite. Dabulossara eqetite, izi intefe baqatana.
59004008	Xoossako shiiqite; izikka inteko shiiqana. Inteno nagaranchato! Inte inte kushe geeshshite, inte nam7u qofan qaxizayto! Inte inte wozna geeshshite.
59004009	Darsi qoppite; muuzotite; yeekkite; inte miichay yeehon; ufayssay qasse muuzotethan simmo.
59004010	Goda sinthan inte intena kawushshite; qasse izi intena dhoqu dhoqu histana.
59004011	Ta ishato! Inte inte garsan issoy issa mootoppite; ba isha mootizadeynne ba isha bolla pirdizadey woga bolla iita hasayessinne woga bolla pirdees. Histiko ne woga bolla pirdizade attin woga naagizade gidakka.
59004012	Woga woththidadeynne pirdizadey issade xalala. Izikka dhayssanassinne ashshanas dandayizadde. Gido attin neni ne lagge bolla pirdizadey oonee?
59004013	“Inte hachchi woykko wonto hanno ha katamayo woykko hinno he katamayo nu baana; biidi heen izin issi layth utananne zal7i wodhisana” gizayto! Ane haa siyite.
59004014	Wonto hananayssa inte erekketa. Inte shempoy iza aazee? Inte guutha wode ayfen beettidi dhayiza haaththa penta mala.
59004015	Hayssa gaanappe “Goda shene gidikkonne nu paxa diikko hessaka hayssaka ooththana” gaanas intes bessees.
59004016	Ha7i gidikko inte otoretethan ceeqqetteta. Hessa mala otoretethi wurikka iita.
59004017	Hessa gish lo7o gidizayssa ooththanas bessizaysa erishe ooththontades nagara gidana.
59005001	Histikko inteno dure asato! Ane siyite. Buro inte bolla gakkana metoza gish yeekkite; wuu wuy! gi waassite.
59005002	Inte haaroy buuqqides, inte may7oka bilay mides.
59005003	Inte worqaynne inte biray shiydes. He shiydaysikka inte bolla markattesinne inte asho tama mala xuugees. Inte wode wursethas miishe shiishshideta.
59005004	Inte inte woznan woththite; inte kath maxishe peydaytas ista wolqa waaga inte qanxonta aggida gish inte bolla waassishe inte achchan deettes. Kath maxizayta waasoy ubba dandayiza Goda haythan gakkides.
59005005	Inte biitta bolla ishalonne al7etethan de7ideta, inte wozna shukas dhiikkida mehe mala modhisideta.
59005006	Inte intenara eqetonta xillo asata bolla wordo woththidi wodhideta.
59005007	Hessa gish ta ishato! Goday ha yaana gakkanaas dandayite. Goshshe goyizaddey biittay lo7o kaththi kaxxana gakkanaas waani dandayizakkonne koyro iranne wursetha ira izi wosti naagizakko ane akeekite.
59005008	Inteka hessatho dandayite. Inte wozna minthite. Gaasoyka Goda yuussa gallassi matides.
59005009	Ta ishato! Inte inte giddon zigretofite; inte zigretikko inte bolla pirdettana. Pirdanadey hekko inte penge bolla eqqides.
59005010	Ta ishato! Goda sunthan intes yootida nabeta waayetethinne ista dandaya intes leemiso histi xeellite.
59005011	Dandayan gencida asata nu ista “Isti anjettidayta” gi qoodizayssa inte ereeta. Iyoobey waani dandayidakkonne inte iza gish siyideta. Goday iza wursethan ay ooththidakkone inte beydeta. Goday asas keehi mishetizadenne maarizade.
59005012	Harappeka ta ishato! Salon gidin woykko sa7an gidin woykko ay miishanka caaqqofte; “Ee” gaanas bessiza miish gidikko “Ee” giite. “Akay” gaanas gidikko “Akay” giite hessafe hara giikko inte bolla pirdettana.
59005013	Inte garsan metotiza asi dizee? Diza gidikko izi woosso. Ufayetizadey dizee? Diza gidikko ufaysa yeth yexo.
59005014	Inte giddon saketiza asi dizee? diikko Woosa Keeththa cimata xeeygo. Istika Goda sunthan zayte iza bolla tiydi izas woosseto.
59005015	Ammanon woossida woossay hargidade pathana. Godayka iza denthana. Izi nagara ooththidade gidikkokka Xoossi iza maarana.
59005016	Hessa gish inteka inte garsan issoy issara inte nagara paaxetite; paxana mala issoy issas woossite. Xillo asa woossay wolqara dees; wolqama oosokka ooththees.
59005017	Elaassi nu malaka asa. Izi iray bukkonta mala minthi woossin biitta bolla heedzdzu laythinne bagga gakkanaas iray bukkibenna.
59005018	Qasseka zaari woossin iray saloppe biitta bolla bukkides. Biittaykka kath immides.
59005019	Ta ishato! Intefe issadey tumappe balettin hara asi iza zaarikko hessa woznan woththite. Nagarancha izi balettida ogeppe iza zaaridadey hessade shempo hayqoppe ashshesinne izaade nagara darozakka kammees.
60001001	Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaare gidida Phexroosappe, asa biittan beten dizaytas Phanxoosan, Galatiyan, Qaphodooqiyan, Iisiyaninne Bitiniya biittan laaletti diza intes,
60001002	Aaway Xoossi kase intena erida mala doorettidaytas, Yesus Kirstoosas azazettanasinne inte iza suuthan aracettidi geeyana mala Xillo Ayanan dummatida intes kiyatethinne sarotethi daro.
60001003	Yesus Kirstoosi hayqoppe dendida gish nuus de7o gidida hidota immidayssi ba gita maarotethan nuna baas ooratha nayta histida nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Aaway Xoossi galattetto.
60001004	Izi dhayonta, mooretontanne ceeggonta laataso intes salon giigissi woththides.
60001005	Inteka wursetha gallassan buro qoncana atotethas ammano geedon Xoossa wolqan naagetideta.
60001006	Ha7i guutha wodes dumma dumma paaceti intena waayssikkokka inte hessan ufayetite.
60001007	Hessi he paacezi inte bolla gakkizay inte ammanozi tumu gididayssa qoncisanassa. Dhayana worqayka taman paacetes. Worqafe aadhdhi boncho gidida inte ammanoyka hessatho paacetanas bessees. Hessi he paacetida inte ammanoy Yesus Kirstoosi qonciza gallas galatas, bonchossinne sabas intena gaththana.
60001008	Inte Yesus Kirstoosa ayfera beyonta aggikkokka inte iza dooseeta; ha7ikka inte iza beyonta aggikkokka iza ammaneta; coo qaalan qoncisana dandayonta gita boncho ufays inte ufayeteta.
60001009	Inte naagiza inte shempoys atoteth inte ammanon demmideta.
60001010	He atotethaza gish intes imettana kiyatethas kase nabeti lo7ethi woznappe pilgi xeellida.
60001011	Kase istan diza Kirstoosa Ayanay Xoossafe tiyettidayssa bolla gakkana waayezanne he waayezappe guye izi demmana bonchoza gish kase baas woththides. Isti qas hessi wurikka ayde waani hananakkonne yuushi qoppida.
60001012	He kase nabeti intes ooththida attin isti baas ooththontayssi istas qonccen erettides. Isti intes ooththiday bolla saloppe kiitettida Xillo Ayana baggara ha7i intes Mishiraachcho qaala yootida asati intes yootidayssa qoncisanassa. Hessa ne qaala kiitanchatikka beyanas amottida.
60001013	Hessa gish inte inte wozna suurisidi oosos giigettite. Wogara de7ite. Yesus Kirstoosi qonciza wode inte iza kiyatetha demmanas intes kumeththa hidotay de7o.
60001014	Inte azazettiza nayta gididi eronta dishe inte kase izan diza iita qofa kaallofte.
60001015	Intena xeygida Xoossay dumma gidida mala inteka inte duussan ubban dummatite.
60001016	Gaasoyka “Tani geesh gidida gish inteka geesh gidite” geetetti Geeshsha Maxaafan kase xaafettides.
60001017	Oonakka dumma shaakki maadonta issa issas izaade ooso mala pirdiza Xoossa “Izi nu Aawa” giidi inte xeygikko hayssa alamezan inte imathenne bete as gididi diza wode ubban izas babbite.
60001018	Inte kase inte aawatappe laattida coo mela hada duussafe wozetiday dhayiza biran woykko worqan gidontayssa inte ereeta.
60001019	Gido attin inte wozetiday iitaynne wosoy iza bolla baynda geeshsha dorsa mala gidida Kirstoosa boncho suuthanna.
60001020	Izi erettiday hayssi alamezi medhetanappe kase gidishin ha7i qas wursetha woden intes qoncides.
60001021	Intes ammanoynne inte hidotay Xoossan gidana mala Yesus Kirstoosa baggara he iza hayqoppe denthidi izas boncho immida Xoossan inte ammanetteta.
60001022	Inte ammanizayta suure woznappe siiqana mala tumas azazetethan inte inte asateth geeshideta. Hessa gish inte inte giddon issoy issara lo7ethi siiqetite.
60001023	Inte nam7antho yeletiday mernas minni diza dhayonta de7o Xoossa qaalan dhayonta zerethafe attin dhayiza zerethafe gidenna.
60001024	Geeshsha Maxaafay giza mala “Asho may7iday wurikka maata mala; iza bonchoyka wurikka wora ciishsha mala; maataykka melees; ciishshaykka qokkees.
60001025	Goda qaalay gidikko mernas eqqi dees.” Intes sabaketida Mishiraachcho qaalayka hessa.
60002001	Hessa gish iitateth wursi, baleththo wursi, qoodheppe qommon hano, qanateteth aykko qommo zigirs intefe diggite.
60002002	Ha7i yeletida guutha nayti maath amottizayssa mala inteka attanas, izan dicci dicci baanas geeshi gidida Ayana timirte laamotite.
60002003	Inte laamotanas bessizay Goday kiya gididayssa shaakki erkkokko!
60002004	Hessa gish gede de7o shuch gidida Yesusakko shiiqite. He shuchchay asay leqqi aggidayssa shin Xoossa achchan qas doorettidayssanne boncho waagay dizayssa.
60002005	Inte gede Goda Yesusakko shiiqanayka de7o shuchcha mala Xillo Ayana duussaso gidana mala ooseteta; hessathoka inte Yesus Kirstoosa baggara ufaysiza Ayana yarsho Xoossas shiishshanaas geeshsha Qeeseta gidandeta.
60002006	Geeshsha Maxaafan “Hekko doorettida boncho gidida keeththas maazenen uttiza shuch tani Xiyoonen wothana. Izan ammanizadey yeellatenna” giza qaalay xaafeti uttides.
60002007	Hessa gish intes ammanizaytas he shuchchay boncho shuchchikko shin hinko izan ammanontaytas qas “Shuchchan keexxiza keeththa hiillati leqqi wora yeggidays izi keeththa maazenes hu7e gidides”
60002008	Qasseka “Hekko ase dhuphiza shuchchay hayssich! Asa dhuphi kundisiza zaalla shuchchay hayssakko” gees. Isti qaala ammanonta ixida gish dhuphetetes. Kasekka isti hessas dizayta.
60002009	Inte qas dhumappe gede daro malalisiza iza poo7okko xeygida malalisiza Xoossa ooththo awajjanas doorettida yeleteth, Kawo Qeeseta, Xoossi intena baas histida inte dumma dereta.
60002010	Inte kase Xoossa dere gidekketa shin ha7i gidikko inte Xoossa dere. Inte kase intes Xoosse qadhetonta derekko shin ha7i gidikko qadhetides.
60002011	Ta siiqoto! Inte hayssa alameza bolla imathenne bete as gidida gish shempora olettiza asho amotethatappe haakkana mala ta intena hadara gays.
60002012	Oone erizay “Intena isti iita ooththetes” giidi asay zigirikkokka Xoossi nuna beyanas yiza gallas Ayzaabeti inte oosoy lo7o gididayssa be7idi Xoosse galatana mala inte istara diza wode inte amaley lo7o gido.
60002013	Inte Goda Yesusa gish giidi dere ayssizaytas azazetite. Kawoy qas ubbafe bollara diza gish kawossika azazetite.
60002014	Dere ayssizaytas azazetite. Isti iita ooththizayta qaxayanassinne lo7o ooththizayta galatanas Kawoppe kiitetizayta.
60002015	Inte lo7o ooson hanko eray baynda eeyateththan haasayizayta co7u histana mala hessika Xoossa shene.
60002016	Inte Xoossas ooththiza asata mala gididi hirgay baynda de7ite attin inte inte shene mala diza duussa iitatetha kammiza miish histofte.
60002017	As ubbakka bonchite. Ammanizayta siiqite. Xoossas babbite. Kawo bonchite.
60002018	Inteno Asas ooththi aqizayto! Intena oosissiza godatas bonchon azazetite. Inte azazettanay lo7otasinne ashketas xalala gidonta hanko iitatassarakko!
60002019	Asi galatettizay coo mela qohettishe; hessika Xoossa gish giidi dandayanna.
60002020	Inte iita ooththida gish qaxayetishe dandayikko intes aaza galatay daanee? Inte lo7o ooththidi waaye ekkishe dandayikko inte Xoossafe galata ekkandeta.
60002021	Inte xeeygetidaykka hessassa. Inte iza leemiso kaallana mala Kirstoosi inte gish waaye ekkidi intes leemiso gidides.
60002022	Izi aykko nagarakka ooththibenna. Iza duunan geney bettibenna.
60002023	Asay iza cayishin izi zaari cayibenna. Waayetishe bana tumu pirdiza Godas hadara aaththi immides attin halo kessana mandibenna.
60002024	Nuni nagarappe shaakatidi xillotethan daana mala izi barka ba ashon nu nagara masqale bolla tookkides. Inte iza madunthan paxideta.
60002025	Inte dhayida dorsata mala coo mela tuuyru tuuyrideta shin ha7i qas inte shempo heemmizayssakonne naagizayssako simmideta.
60003001	Hessathoka macheto! Inte inte azinatas azazetite. Hessatho issi issi azinati Xoossa qaala ammanontayta gidikkokka coo mela ba macheta lo7etethan xalala simmonta aggettenna.
60003002	Isti simmana dandayizay inte geeshshatethanne inte ase bonchiza duus dizayssa beyidikko.
60003003	Inte lo7etethi coo mela hu7e daththaninne worqan geexetethan, al7o mayo may7on, coo mela ayfen beettiza geexen gidoppo.
60003004	Inte lo7oy Xoossa sinthan waagara diza keehi bonchettidazinne dhayonta geexen, ashketethan, addatethaninne Ayanan geexettida wozna garsan qoteti diza giddo wozna lo7eteth gido.
60003005	Beni wode ba hidota Xoossan ooththida geeshsha macasati geexettiday hayssa malanna. Isti ba azinatas azazettida.
60003006	Isti azazettidaykka Saaray Abrahaame “Ta Godo!” gaada azazettidayssa mala. Inteka lo7o miish ooththikkonne issi iita miishi intena daganthonta aggikko inte Saara nayta.
60003007	Azinato! Inte inte machetara akeekan issife de7ite. Isti intefe daburancha medheteth gidida gishshinne qasseka Xoossi coo mela kiyatethan immiza de7o isti intenara issife laattanayssa gish inte ista bonchite. Inte heyssatho ooththikko inte woossa dhuphiza miishi deenna.
60003008	Hessafe asa baggara qas inte issoy issara siiqon diite. Hara asa bolla gakkiza meto inte meto mala xeellite. Inte inte garsan ishanta mala siiqetite. Ashiketanne kiyata gidite.
60003009	Anjite attin istas iita cashshas cash zaaroppite. Inte xeeygetiday hessatho ooththidi anjo laattanassa.
60003010	Geeshsha Maxaafay giza mala “De7on daana koyizaynne lo7o gallassata beyanas koyiza asi ba duunappe iita haasayonta malanne ba metershatikka gene haasayonta mala naageto.
60003011	Iita yo7oppe hakko, lo7o ooththo; saroteth koyonne kaallo.
60003012	Goda ayfeti xillota bagga xeelletes. Iza haythetika ista woossa siyanas doya deettes. Hinko iita ooththizayta qas Goday ba hanqo ayfeso bessana” gides.
60003013	Inte lo7o ooththanas minetikko inte bolla iita miish gaththanay oonee?
60003014	Inte lo7o ooththida gish waaye be7ikkoka inte anjo ekkana. Asay inte bolla iita ooththanas mandetizayssas babbofitenne daro qoppofte.
60003015	Goda Kirstoosa inte woznan bonchitenne iza inte de7os Goda histite. Intes diza hidota gish intena oychizaytas ubbas zaaro immanas ubba wode giigeti uttite.
60003016	Inte istas immana zaaroy qas ashketethaninne bonchon gido. Inte Kirstoosayta gidida gish intes diza lo7o amaleza gish iita haasayiza asay ba iita haasayan yeellatana mala intes lo7o qofay de7o.
60003017	Xoossa shene gidikko inte iita ooso ooththidi waayetanayssafe lo7o ooso ooththidi waayetikko lo7o.
60003018	Kirstoosikka nuna Xoossako shiishshanaas izi ba hu7es Xillokko shin hanko Xillo gidonta nu nagara gish nam7anthetonta mala issito waayetidi hayqqides. Izi ashon hayqqides shin Ayanan qas paxides.
60003019	Hessa he Ayanan qasho keeththan diza shempotakko biidi istas Mishiraachcho qaala yootides.
60003020	Heyti heen woyne keeththan diza shempoti kase Nohe wode markabezi ooththeti giigishin isti simmana mala Xoossi dandayan naagishin nuni nees azazettokko gidayta. He markabezan gellin haaththefe attidayta qooday osupun gidida guutha asata xalala.
60003021	Hessi he haaththay ha7i qas inte izan attiza xinqate leemiso. Hayssi xinqatey qita bolla geeyanas mecetethi gidonta geeshsha qofa ekanas Xoossako shiishshiza woossa. Izi intena ashshanayka Yesus Kirstoosa dentha baggara.
60003022	Izi pude salo biidi ha7i Xoossa achchan dees. Kiitanchatinne godateththi istas dizayti wolqamatakka izas haarettida.
60004001	Kirstoosi ba ashon waaye ekkida gish inteka ola olettiza miishe gixxida asa mala hayssa ha qofan minnidi giigettite. Ba ashon waaye beyida asi nagara ooso aggides.
60004002	Hessafe guye ba diza wode ubban izi daanay iita asho amotethi ooson gidonta dishe Xoossa shene polona.
60004003	Hinko dere asati ooththizayssa mala inte coo mela yeda duussan asho amon, mathon, ogey baynda kaassan, wogappe aaththi uyidi durusaninne harassiza eeqa goynnon kase inte aaththida wodezi intes gidana.
60004004	Ha7i qas inte ha yo7ozan istara wogay baynda qiixi qiixonta gish isti malaletetessinne intena cayeettes.
60004005	Gido attin hayqqidayta bollanne paxa dizayta bolla pirdanas giigi uttidayssas isti zaaro immana.
60004006	Hayqqidaytassara Mishiraachcho qaalay yootetiday hessa gishassa. Hessathoka ay asa bollaka pirdiza mala ista asho bolla pirdana. Ista shempoy qas Xoossi diza mala de7on deyana.
60004007	Hessa gish wode wursethi matides. Inte minni woossanas dandayana mala wogara diitenne woppu gida qofay intes de7o.
60004008	Siiqoy daro nagara kammiza gish harappe bollara inte inte garsan lo7ethi siiqetite.
60004009	Zuuzunthi baynda issoy issa imathateth mokki ekkite.
60004010	Dumma dumma gidida Xoossa kiyatetha imotata ammanetethan oykkidi intefe issi issi asi baas imettida Xoossa kiyatetha imotan hara as maaddo.
60004011	Tamarsizadey Xoossa qaala tamarsiza mala tamarso; hagazizadey Xoossi izas immiza wolqan hagazo; hessa malan Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosa baggara haniza ubban galattettana. Bonchoynne godateth mernappe merna gakkanaas izas gido. Amiin!
60004012	Ta siiqoto! Inte tama mala paaciza meto giddon geliza wode hessa malay kase baynda ooratha miishi gakkidaz intes misatin malaletofte.
60004013	Hessafe bollara Kirstoosa bonchoy qonciza wode inte keehi ufayettana mala inte izara iza waayeza ekkizayta gidida mala ufayetite.
60004014	Inte Kirstoosa suntha gish cayettikko boncho Ayanay hessika Xoossa Ayanay inte bolla shempiza gish ufayeetite.
60004015	Intefe oona bollaka metoy gakkikko hessadey shempo wodhida asa mala, kayso mala, iita ooththida asa malanne asa yo7o giddo coo woxxi gelidade mala gidoppo.
60004016	Izi ammanizade gidida gish iza bolla gakkiza metoy diikko qas Kirstoosa sunthan izi Xoossa galato attin yeellatoppo.
60004017	Pirday doomettanas wodey matides. He pirday doomettanay koyro Xoossa asa bollakko! Histin pirday nunan doommikko Xoossa Mishiraachcho qaalas azazettonta ixida asa wursethi ay gidanee?
60004018	Geeshsha Maxaafay “Xilloykka waaydi attanaz gidikko, hanko Xoossas goynnonta asaynne nagaranchati waanandetoo?” giza mala.
60004019	Hessa gish Xoossa shene mala waayetiza asati banateththa wursi ammanettida bana medhdhidayssas hadara immidi lo7o ooso ooththonta aggofeto.
60005001	Hessa gish takka istara issife Woosa Keeththas cimanne Kirstoosa waayezas marka gidida tani qasseka buroppe qoncana bonchoza gishettanas diza tani intenara diza Woosa Keeththa cimata zorays.
60005002	Intes hadara imettida Xoossa wude naagite. He iza wudeza wolqara gidonta Xoossi koyiza ogera dosara heemmite. Miishes yiqetethan gidonta hagazanas woznappe koshshan gido.
60005003	Hessathoka inte alafetetha garsan dizayta yedhi haaron gidonta wudezas lo7o leemiso besson gido.
60005004	Inte hessatho ooththikko hanko waanna heemmizayssi qonciza wode inte mooretonta boncho aklile ekkana.
60005005	Hessathoka inteno naatethato! Inte cimatas azazetite. Inte wurikka ashketeth afala mala may7idi issoy issas ooththite. “Xoossi otorizayta ixees. Ashketas qasse ba kiyateth imees” geetetti kase Geeshsha Maxaafan xaafetides.
60005006	Hessa gish Xoossi ba woden dhoqu histana mala mino Xoossa kusheppe garsara intena ziqqi histite.
60005007	Izi intes qoppiza gish intena metiza qofa wursi iza bolla yeggite.
60005008	Wogara de7ite! Beeggite! Inte morke Daabulossi baas mittana miish koyishe xaagiza gaammo mala inte yuushon harbuqqees.
60005009	Alame kumeththan diza inte ishati hessa mala meto ekkana dizayssa inte eridi ammanon minni eqqidi izara eqetite.
60005010	Inte guutha wodes waayetidayssafe guye intena Kirstoosa baggara gede merna bonchos xeygida kiyateth ubbas Goday izi barka intena gakkida waayezappe ashshana, maaddananne minthethana qasseka dazgisana.
60005011	Bonchoynne wolqay mernappe merna gakkanaas izas gido. Amiin.
60005012	Tani izan ammanettida isha ga qoppiza Silwaanoose baggara hayssa kiitaza qaanthara intes xaafadis. Ta hessa xaafiday intena zoranassinne hayssi tumu Xoossa kiyateth gididayssa intes qoncisanas gaada. Hessa gish inte hayssan Xoossa kiyatethan minni eqqite.
60005013	Inte mala doorettidara Baabiloonen diza micho gidida Woosa Keeththaya intes saroka shiishawus. Ta naa Marqoosikka intena sarokes.
60005014	Ammano siiqotethan inte issoy issa yeeri ekkidi saroketite. Intes Kirstoosaytas ubbas saroy gido.
61001001	Yesus Kirstoosa oosanchanne izan Hawaare Simoona Phexroosappe, nu Godappenne nu dhale Yesus Kirstoosappe bettida xillotetha baggara nu demmida ammano mala bonchettida ammano demmidayto!
61001002	Xoossanne nu Goda Yesusa eron kiyatethinne saroy intes gido.
61001003	Ba bonchoninne ba kiyatethan nuna xeygidayssa nuni iza erida gish iza Xoossatetha wolqay de7ossinne Xoosse goynnanas nuus koshizaz wursi immides.
61001004	Ba bonchoninne ba kiyatethan boncho wogay dizayssanne keehi gita gidida iza hidota nuni demmidos. Heytanta baggara inte iita amo gaason hayssa ha alamezan diza dhayoppe kessi ekkidi Xoossatetha hanozappe izara gishettizadenta gidideta.
61001005	Hessa geedon hayssafe kaalliza miishati intes gujettana mala ane minnite. Ammano bolla kiyateth, kiyatetha bolla erateth;
61001006	eratetha bolla bana haaro bana haaro bolla dandayan mineteth; dandayan minetetha bolla Xoosse goynno,
61001007	Xoosse goynno bolla ishanta doseteththi, ishanta doseteththa bolla siiqo gujite.
61001008	Hayti intes dari dizaz gidikko heyti intena inte Goda Yesus Kirstoosa eron go7aynne ayfey bayndayta gidonta mala naagana.
61001009	Hayti ha miishati baynda asi gidikko haahon diza miish demmoonta qooqe asa mala. Hessadey kase aadhdhida ba nagarappe geeydayssaka balettides.
61001010	Ta ishato! Hessa gish inte xeeygetidayssanne doorettidayssa shaakki eranas keehi amottizayta gidite. Inte hessatho ooththikko mulekka dhupheteketa.
61001011	Inte hessatho hanikko mernappe mernas diza nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa kawoteththan gelanas intes kumeththa maatay imettana.
61001012	Inte hayta ha yo7ota eridinne he inte erida tuman minni de7ikkoka heyta tani intena qofisanappe guye giikke.
61001013	Tani paxa diza wode ubban intena ubba wode dentheththanayssi bessizaz misatidi taas beettes.
61001014	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi taas qoncisida mala tani hayssa alammezappe elelada hayqqanayssa ta erays.
61001015	Tani ha7i minetizay ta hayqqada intefe shaaketidappe guye inte hayta ha yo7ota ubba wode qopana malassa.
61001016	Goda Yesus Kirstoosa wolqafe izas yuussa gish nu intes yootida wode nuni nu ayfera iza bonchoza beyidi markattos attin asi coo mela medhi ekkidi gene haasayiza hayssi7e mala gidenna.
61001017	“Tani izan ufayetizadey ta dosiza ta naazi hayssa” giza qaala giirissay gita bonchora izas yida wode izi Xoossa Aawappe bonchonne gitateth ekides.
61001018	Nuni izara anjettida zuma bolla dishe hayssa ha saloppe yida giirissa nuni nu haythan siyidos.
61001019	Hessi wurikka kase nabeti yootidayssi tumu gididayssa lo7eth qoncisees. Hessa gish inte dhumason xompes lo7eth naagetizayssa mala kase nabeti yootidayssa lo7ethi naagetite. Inte hessatho ooththanay gadey wontanas, bazzoy zo7ana gakkanaassinne wont maaththa xoolintezi inte woznan poo7ana gakkanaassa.
61001020	Inte harappe aaththi qoppanas bessizay Geeshsha Maxaafan diza tinbite qaalan yootettida ay miishikka oonikka baas misatida mala birshanas bessenna.
61001021	Ay tinbiteykka asa shene mala mulekka yibenna. Gido attin tinbitey wurikka Xillo Ayanay kaalethin iza kaallida asati Xoossafe ekkidi yootidaza.
61002001	Gido attin beni wode wordo nabeti dereza giddon dizayssa mala hessathoka ha7i inte giddon wordo astamareti de7andettes. Heytanti asa dhayssiza wordo timirte qotara diccana mala ooththetes. Bana ashshida Godakka kaddidi bana eeson dhayssizaz ba bolla eheetes.
61002002	Hessa geedon daro asay yeelachiza ista ogeza kaallees. He ista oosoza geedon tuma ogey cayettes.
61002003	Heyti wordo astamareti miishas gaphigaphiza gish barka medhi ekkida yo7o yooti yootidi intes dizaz baas bonqi ekkettes. Beni beni wodesoppe pirday istas giigeti uttides. Addafe ista dhayoy naagees.
61002004	Haray atto shin nagara ooththida kiitanchatas Xoossi mishetonta isti ciimma gidida dhuma olla giddon de7idi pirda gallas gakkanaas naagettana mala gede gaannamen yeggides.
61002005	Hessathoka xillotetha gish saabake gidida Nohe hanko laapun asatara ashshidi Xoossas goynnonta asati diza alameza bolla dhayssiza haathe ehishe qadhetidi kase he wode alameza maaribenna.
61002006	Qasseka Xoosse goynnontayta qaxayanas ubbas leemiso gidana mala Soddomeynne Gamoora katamati bidinth gidana gakkanaassinne xuugeti dhayana gakkanaas ista bolla pirdides.
61002007	Wogay baynda yeellachiza ooso ooththiza asata ooson ubba wode so7u gishe diza xillo Looxe gidikko ashshi ekkides.
61002008	He xillo addezi ista giddon dishin gallas gallas izi beyizayssaninne siyizayssan he wogay baynda asata oosozan iza shempoya waayetadus.
61002009	Histin hessi wurikka hessa mala gidikko Goday baas goynnishe diza asata paaceppe ashshanayssanne nagaranchataka wosti qaxayanakkonekka pirda gallassas wosti ista naagidi gaththanakkonne hessa izi erees guussa.
61002010	Harappeka heyti tuna gidida ba asho amo kaallizaytanne Xoossa Godateth kadhizayta pirda gallassas naagi woththides. Heyti wordo astamareti isti xalatanne otoranchata gidida gish salo bolla istas godateththi dizayta cayishe babbeetenna.
61002011	Kiitanchati istafe bollara wolqaynne godateththi dizayta gidikkokka Goda sinthan ista bolla kadhe qaala kessi mootetenna.
61002012	Heyti wordo astamareti qas baas erettonta ixida miish wursi cashshi cayeettes. Heytanti narxan oyketanassinne hayqqanas yeletida. Coo mela ba shenen dizaytanne qofay baynda do7ata mala. Do7ati coo mela dhayizayssatho istika mulera dhayana.
61002013	Qoho ooso ooththida gish isti mulera ba ooso waaga ekkana. Ista ufayssi seeta gallas mathotethinne wogay baynda buraqo. Isti hessa mala wogay baynda gufan intenara issife xeeygetiza wode as balethiza ba asho oosozan isti iitanne yeellachizayta.
61002014	Istas nagara oosoppe naagetonta amottiza ayfey dees. Istas nagara ooso siiqiza amotethi ay wodekka simmenna. Ammanon buro minni eqqonta asata baleththettes. Miishshas gaphigaphettes. Isti qangetidayta.
61002015	Isti suure ogeza aggagidi dhayida. Iita ooso ooththidi demmiza miish siiqida Bi7oore naa Bala7ame oge biidi balettida.
61002016	Bala7amey gidikko ba ooththida nagara gish seeretides shin haasaya eronta hareya asa qaalan izas haasayada he nabeza balappe seera zaaradus.
61002017	Heyti he asati haaththi baynda pultota. Gote carkon biza shaara mala; ista sakana dhumay naagees.
61002018	Kase bala garsan diza asata giddofe kessi ekki yiidi daro gam7onta asata, coo mela hada gidida otoro qaala haasayan, asho amoninne layman baleththettes.
61002019	“Inte wozettana” gishe intes ufays imettes. Xoonetida asi bana xoonidades aylle gidi haarettizayssatho istika baas nagaras aylle.
61002020	Nu Godanne nuna ashshida Yesus Kirstoosa eridi ha alameza tunatethafe kessi ekkidappe guye qasseka guye simmidi he kase tunatethan xoonetidi gelikko istas kaseyssafe guyeyssi aadhdho iita gidana.
61002021	Isti xillotetha oge shaakki eridappe guye istas imettida geeshsha azazozappe guye simmanappe isti kase he xillotetha ogeza eronta aggidakko istas lo7oshin.
61002022	“Kanay ba cooyida cooshsha maanas guye simmees” hessathoka “Guddunthi meecetidi guye simmi urqan genderettes” geetettiza tumu leemisoy ista bolla gakkides.
61003001	Ta siiqoto! Tani intes xaafishin hayssi nam7antho kiita. Tani intes nam7u kiitataka xaafiday hayta ha yo7ota akeeki ekkidi inte suure qofa qopana mala intena beeggothana gaada.
61003002	Hayssafe kase geeshsha nabeti yootida qaalanne qas inte Hawaareta baggara inte demmida nu Godanne nuna ashshidayssa azazo inte yuushi qoppana mala ta koyays.
61003003	Hara ubbafe kasetidi hayssa yuushi qoppite. Wursetha gallasatan qidhizaytinne ba iita amo kaallishe asa kadhizayti yaana.
61003004	Isti qas “Goda Yesusi ‘Yaana’ giza hidotay yootettibennee? Histin izi awan dizee? Beni nu aawati hayqqossappe ha simmin, haniza miishi wurikka medhetosappe ha simmin hekko kase ba diza mala dees” geetes.
61003005	Heyti he asati kase daro wodeppe kase saloy Xoossa qaalan medhetoyssanne biittaykka haaththafenne haaththan dizayssa erishe kaadetes.
61003006	He wode diza alamezi haaththan miteti dhayides.
61003007	Hessathoka ha7i diza saloynne biittay nagaranchati dhayana diza pirda gallas gakkanaas tamas giigi uttida.
61003008	Ta siiqoto! Inte gidikko Goda achchan issi gallassi shi laytha mala, qasseka shi laythi issi gallasa mala gididayssa hessa he hanoza baloppite.
61003009	Issi issi asatas misatiza mala Goday ba yootida hidota qaala polanas gam7enakko shin asi wurikka maarettana malanne ay asikka dhayonta mala koydi izi inte gish takkes.
61003010	Goda gallassay qasse kayso yeetha mala qopponta dishin gakki wodhana. He gallas saloti gita giirissan aadhdhana. Medheetethi wurikka taman xuugeti dhayana; biittaynne iza bolla dizazi wurikka xuugettana.
61003011	Hessa gish heyti wurikka hessatho dhayanazi gidikko histin inte geeshshatethan Xoossas goynnishe daanas intes waani bessenee?
61003012	Hessa gish Xoossa gallassay yaanayssa inte lammotizaytanne izi elelli yaana mala ooththizayta gidite. He gallas saloy taman xuugeti dhayana. Medhetethatikka tama seelan seerana.
61003013	Gido attin nuni izi nuus immida hidota mala xillotetha oosoy oosetizaso ooratha salonne ooratha biitta naagos.
61003014	Hessa gish ta siiqoto! Hessi wurikka hanana gallas inte naagishe diikko Goday intena inte bolla boroy baynda dishin sarotethan demmana mala minni diite.
61003015	Nu Goda dandayay intena ashshanas gididayssa inte erite. Nu siiqo isha Phawuloosi baas imettida eratetha mala izi intes xaafidayssi hayssa.
61003016	Izi hayssa ha hanoza gish ba kiitatan ubban hayssathoka xaafides. Iza kiitata giddon eranas waayssiza issi issi hanoti deettes. Eratethi istas paccidaytinne nam7u qofan yooqu gizayti hara Geeshsha Maxaafata mirqizayssathokka haytaka isti mirqana. Isti hessatho ooththizay baas dhayanassa.
61003017	Ta ishato! Inte qas hessa kasetidi erida gish hanko makalata bala geedon goosheti biidi kase inte minni dizasoppe kundonta mala naagetite.
61003018	Hessafe bollara nu Godanne nu dhale Yesus Kirstoosa kiyatethaninne iza shaakki eron pude diccite. Izas ha7ikka mernaska bonchoy gido. Amiin.
62001001	De7o qaala gish koyroppe dizayssa nuni nu haythan siyidayssanne nu ayfera beyidayssa lo7ethi xeellidayssa, nu kushera oykki beyidayssa gish hasayos.
62001002	De7oykka qoncides; nukka nu ayfera beyidi markattos. Izas iza Aawa achchan dizayssanne nuuska qoncida merna de7o gish nu intes yootos.
62001003	Inteska nunara issifetethi daana mala nuni beyidayssanne siyidayssa intes yootos. Nu issifetethayka Aawaranne iza Naa Yesus Kirstoosara.
62001004	Nu ufayssay kumeth gidana mala nu hayssa intes xaafos.
62001005	Nu izappe siydi intes yootiza kiitay “Xoossi poo7o; iza achchan mulekka dhumay deenna” gizayssa.
62001006	“Nu dhuman simeretishe izara nuus issifetethi dees” giikko wordotos attin tuman dookko.
62001007	Gido attin izi poo7on diza mala nukka poo7on simeretikko nu garsan nuus issifetethi dees; iza naa Yesus Kirstoosa suuthi nuna nagara ubbafe geeshshees.
62001008	Nu nunan nagaray baawa giikko nurka nuna baleththoos; tumaykka nunan deenna.
62001009	Nuni nu nagara paaxikko izi nu nagara atto gaanassinne nu qohoppe nuna wursi geeshshanas izi ammanettidadenne xillo.
62001010	Nu nagara ooththibeekko giikko iza nu wordancha kessossinne iza qaalayka nunan deenna.
62002001	Ta nayto! Ta intes hayssa xaafizay inte nagara ooththonta malassa. Gido attin oonikka nagara ooththikko Aawa achchan nuus xabaqay dees. Izikka xilloza Yesus Kirstoosa.
62002002	Izi nu nagaray atto geetettana mala oge giigissizade; hessika nuna xalala gidonta kumeththa alame asassara attin nuus xalla gidenna.
62002003	Nu iza azazota polikko nu iza eridaysa hessan ammanettos.
62002004	“Ta iza erays” gishe iza azazo polontade gidikko hessadey wordo asa attin tumay izaden deenna.
62002005	Qasse oonikka iza qaala naagikko tumu Xoossa siiqoy izaden poletides. Nuni izan dizayssa erizay hessanna.
62002006	Ta izan days giza asi oonikka Yesusi simerettida mala simeretanas bessees.
62002007	Ta siiqoto! Ta intes xaafizayssi kase intes dizaaro intekon gam7ida azazoyo attin hara ooratha azazo gidenna; gam7ida azazoya kase inte siyida qaala.
62002008	Hara baggara ta intes xaafizay Kirstoosa achchaninne inte achchan tumu gidida ooratha azazo; gaasoykka dhumay aadhdhin tumu poo7oy poo7o bolla dees.
62002009	Poo7on dayssi gishe ba isha ixizadey ha7ikka dhuman dees.
62002010	Ba isha siqizadey poo7on dees; hessades dhuphe gidiza miishi deenna.
62002011	Gido attin ba isha ixizadey gidikko dhuma giddon dees; dhuman simeretees; dhumay iza qooqisida gish izi awa bizakkonne ba bizaso erenna.
62002012	Ta nayto! Inte nagaray Yesus Kirstoosappe dendidayssan atto geetettida gish ta intes xaafays.
62002013	Aawato! Kase koyroppe dizayssa iza inte eriza gish ta intes xaafays; natethato! Inte iita gidida Xala7e xoonida gish ta intes xaafays.
62002014	Natetha nayto! Inte Aawa erida gish ta intes xaafays. Aawato! Koyroppe dizayssa iza inte erida gish ta intes xaafays. Natethato! Inte minota gidida gishshinne Xoossa qaalay intenan diza gish inte iita gidida Xala7e xoonida gish ta intes xaafays.
62002015	Hayssa alameza woykko ha alamezan diza ay miishekka dosoppite. Oonikka ha alameza dosikko Aawa siiqoy izaade achchan deenna.
62002016	Gasoykka ha alamezan dizay wuri asho amoteth, ayfes lo7onne duussan ceeqeteth; hayti alameppe attin Xoossa aawappe yizayta gidettenna.
62002017	Alameynne alamen diza amotethi aadhdhana shin Xoossa shene polizayti gidikko mernas daana.
62002018	Nayto! Hayssi wursetha saate. Inte siyida mala Kirstoosara eqetizadey yaana. Ha7ikka Kirstoosara eqetiza daroti yida. Hayssi wursetha saate gididayssa nu hayssan eroos.
62002019	Isti nu giddofe kezida. Gido attin isti kasekka nu bagga gidettenna. Isti nu bagga gididakko nunara minni eqqanakoshin; gido attin isti wuri nu bagga gidontayssi erettana mala nuuppe shaaketida
62002020	Intena qasse Kirstoosi Xillo Ayanan tiyides; hessa gish inte wurikka tuma ereeta.
62002021	Ta intes xaafizay inte tuma eronta gish gidenna; gido attin inte tuma eriza gishshinne tuma garsafe aykko wordoykka beettontaysa inte eriza gishassa.
62002022	Yesusa izi Kirstoosa gidenna gi kaadizadefe hara wordanchay oonee? Hessadey Aawanne Naaza kadiza Kirstoosara eqetizade.
62002023	Naaza kaadizades oonasika Aaway deenna; Naaza ekizades ubbas izas Aawayka dees.
62002024	Inte koyro siyida qaalaya intenan du; inte koyro siyidara intenan diikko inteka Naazanne Aawan daana.
62002025	Merna de7oy izi nuus immana gida hidota qaala.
62002026	Intena baleththiza asata gish hayssa intes xaafadis.
62002027	Inte qasse izappe ekkida Xillo Ayanay intenan diza gish haray oonikka intena tamarsanas bessenna. Izi intena tamarsanayssi tumu attin wordo gidenna; Hessa gish Xillo Ayanay intena tamarsida mala Kirstoosan de7ite.
62002028	Hessa gish nayto! Izi qonciza wode nuus xalatethi daana mala izi yiza wodekka nu iza sinthan yeeletonta mala inte izan de7ite.
62002029	Izi xillo gididayssa inte eriza gidikko xillo ooththizay wuri izappe yeletidayssa inte ereeta.
62003001	Nuni Xoossa nayta geetettana mala Aaway darsi siiqida iza siiqoy nuus ay mala gitakkone ane beyite! Tumukka nu iza nayta. Alamey nuna eronta aggiday iza eronta aggida gishassa.
62003002	Ta ishato! Nuni ha7i Xoossa nayta; buro nu ay hananakkonne ha7i qoncibenna; Kirstoosi qonciza wode nu iza beyananne nuka iza misatanayssa nu eroos.
62003003	Hayssa izan hidota ooththizay wuri izi geesh gidida mala bana geeshshees.
62003004	Nagara ooththizay wurikka makala ooththes; nagaraykka makala.
62003005	Izi nagara dhayssanas qoncidayssa inte ereeta. Izan nagaray baawa.
62003006	Izan diza asi oonikka nagara ooththenna. Nagara ooththizadey oonikka gidikko iza beybenna woykko eribenna.
62003007	Ta nayto! Intena oonikka baleththonta mala naagetite. Izi xillo gidida mala xillo ooththizadeykka xillo.
62003008	Nagara ooththizay Xala7eppe; gaasoyka Xala7ey koyroppekka nagara ooththizade. Xoossa nay qoncidaykka Xala7e ooso laallanassa.
62003009	Xoossafe yeletiday wuri nagara ooththenna. Xoossa zerethi izan diza gishshinne izi Xoossafe yeletida gish nagara ooththana dandayenna.
62003010	Xoossa naytinne Xala7e nayti shaaketi eretezay hessanna. Xillo ooththontaynne ba isha siiqontay wuri Xoossafe gidenna.
62003011	Inte koyro siyidara “Nu nu garsan siiqettana bessees” geetettida kiitaya hanno.
62003012	Iita bagga gididi ba isha wodhida Qayeele mala gidoppite. Izi aazas wodhidee? Gaasoykka iza oosoy iita; isha oosoy lo7o gidida gishassa.
62003013	Ta ishato! Intena alame asay ixikko malaletofte.
62003014	Nuni nu ishata dosiza gish hayqoppe gede de7on pinnidayssa nu eroos. Siiqoy bayndadey wuri hayqo giddon dees.
62003015	Ba isha ixizadey shempo wodhida asa. Shempo wodhidades merna de7oy bayndayssa inte ereeta.
62003016	Yesus Kirstoosi ba shempo nu gish aaththi immida gish siiqoy azakkonne nu hessan eroos. Nukka nu shempo nu ishata gish aaththi immanas nuus bessees.
62003017	Miishi dizadey oonikka ba ishay waayetishin beyidi izas mishetonta agikko Xoossa siiqoy izan waani danee?
62003018	Ta nayto! Tumu oosonpe attin coo duunaninne qaalan xalala siiqeteth ane aggos.
62003019	Nuni tumu bagga gididayssa hayssan erossinne nu woznakka iza sinthan shempisos.
62003020	Hessika nu woznay nu bolla pirdiza miishan ubban Xoossi nu wozna qofappe bollara gidida gish izi wursi erees.
62003021	Ta ishato! Nu woznay nu bolla pirdonta aggikko nuus Xoossa sinthan babbiza miishi deenna.
62003022	Nu azazota naagiza gishshinne iza ufayssizaz ooththiza gish nu iza woossizaz wursi nu izappe ekana.
62003023	Iza azazoykka nu iza Naaza Yesus Kirstoosa ammananasinne izi nuna azazida mala nuni nu giddon dossettana malassa.
62003024	Iza azazota naagizayti wuri izan deettes; izikka istan dees. Izi nunan dizayssa nu izi nuus immida Ayanan eroos.
62004001	Ta ishato! Ayana wursi ammanoppite; gido attin ayanati Xoossafekonne paaci beyte. Gasoykka daro wordo nabeti biitta bolla laalettida.
62004002	Inte Xoossa Ayana erana ogey “Yesus Kirstoosi asa asho may7idi yides” giza Ayanay wuri Xoossafeko!
62004003	“Yesus Kirstoosi asa asho may7idi yides” goonta ayanay Xoossafe gidenna; kase izi yaana gishin inte siyida Kirstoosara eqetiza ayanay hessa; ha7ikka izi alame bolla dees.
62004004	Ta nayto! Inte Xoossayta. Inte ista xoonideta; gaasoyka intenan dizay alamen dizayssafe aadhdhees.
62004005	Isti alame baggakko; hessa gish isti haasayizay wuri alameppe kezizayssa; alame asay isti gizayssa siiyees.
62004006	Nu qasse Xoossa bagga; Xoosse erizay nu gizaz siyana shin Xoossa bagga gidontaddey gidikko nu gizaz siyenna. Tuma Ayananne wordo ayana nu shaakki erizay hayssana.
62004007	Ta ishato! Siiqoy Xoossafe gidida gish nuni ane siiqetos. Asa siiqiza asi wuri Xoossafe yeletidadenne Xoosse erizade.
62004008	As siiqonta asi Xoosse erenna. Aazas giikko Xoossi siiqo.
62004009	Xoossay nu giddon ba siiqo qoncisiday nu iza baggara de7o demmana mala ba naa issineza ha duge ha alamezan yeddidayssanna.
62004010	Nuni Xoosse siiqibeykko shin izi nuna siiqides. Nu nagara dhayssana mala ba naaza yeddides. Siiqo guusikka hessa.
62004011	Ta ishato! Xoossi nuna hayssatho siiqikko nukka nu giddon siiqetanas bessees.
62004012	Xoosse beyida asi oonikka baawa. Nuni nu giddon siiqetiza gidikko Xoossi nunan daana. Iza siiqoykka nunan polettana.
62004013	Izi nuus ba Ayana immida gish nu izan dizayssanne izikka nunan dizayssa nu hessan eroos.
62004014	Aaway ba naaza hayssa ha alame asa ashshanas yeddidaysa nu beydossinne iza gish maarkatoos.
62004015	Yesusi Xoossa naa gididayssa ammanidi markattiza ubban Xoossi deessinne, izaadeyka Xoossan dees.
62004016	Hessa gish Xoossi nuna siiqiza siiqo nu eroos. Nu iza siiqon ammanettos. Xoossi siiqo. Siiqon dizadey Xoossan dees. Xoossika hessaden dees.
62004017	Nuni hayssa biitta bolla de7izay Kirstoosi de7ida mala gidida gish nuus pirda gallas baboy deenna. Hessanka siiqoy nunan kumeth gidees.
62004018	Siiqo giddon baboy baawa; tumu siiqoy gidikko babo kessi wora yeggees. Baboy qixaatera issife oykketi dees. Babbizade siiqoy kumeth gidenna.
62004019	Izi kasetidi nuna siiqida gish nukka iza siiqos.
62004020	Oonikka Xoosse siiqays gishe ba isha ixikko hessadey wordo. Ba ayfera beyiza ba isha siiqonta asi ba ayfen beyonta Xoossa siiqanas dandayenna.
62004021	“Xoosse siiqiza asi wurikka ba isha siiqanas bessees” giza ha azazoza izi nuus immides.
62005001	Yesusi izi Kirstoosa gididayssa ammanizay wuri Xoossafe yeletides. Aawa dosizay wuri naazakka izatho dossees.
62005002	Nuni Xoosse dosikkonne iza azazo naagikko nu Xoossa nayta siiqizayssa hessan eroos.
62005003	Xoossa doso guussi iza azazo naago; iza azazoti deexxo gidettenna.
62005004	Gaasoykka Xoossafe yeletiday wuri alame xoonees. Alame xoonizaykka nu ammano.
62005005	Yesusi Xoossa naa gididayssa ammanizadefe attin alame xoonizay haray oonee?
62005006	Haaththaninne suuthan yiday hayssa Yesus Kirstoosa. Izi haaththaninne suuthan yides attin haaththan xalla yibenna. Hessaka iza gish markattizay Ayana. He Ayanay Tumu Ayana.
62005007	Hessa gish izas heedzdzu markati deettes.
62005008	Heytikka ayana, haaththenne suutha; heedzdzata qaalayka issino.
62005009	Nu asa markateth ammanikko Xoossa markatethi hessafe adhees. Hessika izi ba naaza gish immida Xoossa markatetha.
62005010	Xoossa naan ammanizade ubba woznan iza gish markay dees. Xoosse ammanontay wurikka Xoossi ba naaza gish immida markatetha ammanonta gish iza wordoses.
62005011	Iza markatethaykka Xoossi merna de7o nuus immides; he de7oyka iza naazan dees gizayssa.
62005012	Naazi dizades de7oy dees; Xoossa nay bayndades de7oy baawa.
62005013	Intes Xoossa naan ammanizaytas merna de7oy dizayssa inte erana mala ta hayssa intes xaafays.
62005014	Nu Xoossa sinth shiiqanas nuus diza xalatethi hayssa. Nu ay miishikka iza shene mala woossikko izi nu woossa siyana.
62005015	Nu iza woossiza miish izi wursi siyizayssa nu eriza gidikko nu woossida miisha wursi ekkanayssa nu eroos.
62005016	Oonikka ba ishay bana hayqos gathonta nagara ooththishin beyikko izas woosso. Xoossika hayqos gathonta nagara ooththidaytas de7o immana. Hayqos gaththiza nagaraykka dees. Hayqos gaththiza nagara gish woosso giikke.
62005017	Makalay wurikka nagara; hayqos gathonta nagaraykka dees.
62005018	Xoossafe yeletiday wuri nagara ooththenna; gaasoykka Xoossa nay iza naagizayssanne iitay iza bochontayssa nu eroos.
62005019	Nuni Xoossafe gididayssanne alamey kumeth iita asa kushen dizayssa nu eroos.
62005020	Xoossa nay yidayssa tumu gidida iza nu erana mala akeeka izi nuus immidayssa nu eroos. Nuka tumu gidida iza naaza Yesus Kirstoosan doos; Izikka tumu Xoossan merna de7o.
62005021	Nayto! Intenatetha eeqatappe naagite.
63001001	Taappe cimazappe; tumappe ta dosiza doorettida godatteyssinne izi naytas; tana xalla gidonta tumu erizayti wuri dosizaaris kiitettida kiita.
63001002	Gaasoykka hayssi tumay ha7ikka nu giddon dizayssanne sinthafekka mernas daanayssa.
63001003	Xoossa Aawappenne iza Naa Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethi, maarotethinne saroy tumaninne siiqon nunara gido.
63001004	Ne naytappe baggati Aawappe nuus imettida azazoza mala tuman minni dizayta ta beyida gish daro ufayetadis.
63001005	Ha7ikka godatteye! Kaseppeka dizaaro attin ta nees hara ooratha azazo xaafikke; hessika nuni nu giddon siiqetanayssa.
63001006	He siqoykka nu iza azazoza mala daanayssa. Azazozikka inte koyro siyida mala siiqon daana mala.
63001007	Yesus Kirstoosi asa asho may7idi yibenna giza ammanonta daro baleththizayti alame bolla laalettida. Heyta malay ay asikka as baleththizadenne Kirstoosara eqetizade.
63001008	Inte gidikko inte daabura waagappe mela attonta malanne kumeththa woyto ekana mala inte hu7es naagetite.
63001009	Kirstoosa timirte mala doonta asinne iza timirtefe balettidi kare keziza as oonanka Xoossi deenna. Kirstoosa timirten dizaddey gidikko izas Aawaynne Aawa Nay deettes.
63001010	Oonikka inteko yishe hessa he timirteza ekki yoonta as mokki ekoftenne saroka gooppite.
63001011	Mokki ekkidi baso gelthizadey hessade ooson izara issino gides.
63001012	Ta intes xaafanaas koyiza daro miishi deessishin waraqataninne qalamen xaafana mala koykke. Gidikkoka nu ufayssay kumeth gidana mala ta inteko baada inte sinthan intenara haasayanas hidota ooththays.
63001013	Doorettida ne michey nayti nena saro geetes.
64001001	Taappe cimazappe tumappe ta siiqiza ta siiqo lagge Gayiyoosas.
64001002	Ta ishazo! Ne shempoy lo7on diza mala ne asatethay lo7o daana malanne ne ooththizazi wurikka nees giiga gidana mala ta nees woossays.
64001003	Ne tumas ammanettidade gidida mala qasseka ne hanoy wuri tumu gididayssa issi issi ammaniza asati taakko yiidi ne gish yootin siyada ta daro ufayetadis.
64001004	Gaasoykka ta nayti lo7onne tuman simeretishin siisafe aadhdhiza hara ufaysi taas deenna.
64001005	Ta ishazo! Isti nees imath gidikkokka neni ne ishatas ooththida miishe ubban ammanettadasa.
64001006	Ne bolla ay mala siiqoy dizaakkonne isti ne gish Woosa Keeththa asa sinthan markattida. Isti biza ogen Xoosse ufaysiza hanon ne ista maaddikko lo7o ooththassa.
64001007	Ayssi giikko isti Xoossa ammanontaytappe aykkokka ekkonta Kirstoosa suntha gish mela kezida.
64001008	Hessa gish nu issife tumas ooththana mala heytanta malata mokki ekkanas bessees.
64001009	Ta Woosa keeththas hayssafe kase xaafadis. Gido attin kaaleththizade gidana koyiza Diyoxiraxoosi nu gizaz ekenna.
64001010	Hessa gish, ta he biikko izi ba iita qaalan nu sunth mooranas ooththidaysa ta intes qoncisana. Hessika izas gidonta ixin ammaniza asa mokki ekenna; mokki ekana koyizaytaka diggessinne Woosa Keeththafe kessi gooddes.
64001011	Ta ishazo! Lo7ota misata attin iita asata misatoppa. Lo7o ooththizadey wurikka Xoossa asa. Iita ooththizadey qasse Xoosse beybenna.
64001012	Dimexiroosas asi wuri lo7o markatees. Tumaykka izas markatawus. Nukka izas markattos; inteka nu markay tumu gididayssa ereeta.
64001013	Ta nees xaafana buro daro yo7oy dees shin ta nees waraqatan xaafanaas koyikke.
64001014	Ta nena mata wode beyanas hidota ooththays; he wode nu issife utti haasayana.
64001015	Ane saron da; ne laggeti nena saro saro geettes; ta laggeta sunthan sunthan xeeygada saro ga.
65001001	Yesus Kirstoosas ooththiza Yaqoobe isha Yuhudappe, intes xeeygetidaytas, Xoossi Aaway siiqizaytassinne Yesus Kirstoosi naagidaytas ubbatas;
65001002	maarotethi, sarotethinne siiqoy intes daro.
65001003	Ta siiqoto! Nu issife attida atotetha gish ta intes xaafanas daro koyadisishin ha7i qasse nam7anthonta issito Xoossi asas immida ammano gish inte daro baaxettana mala ta intena zorays. Ta intes xaafanas taas tooho gidides.
65001004	Ista bolla pirdetanays daro wodeppe kase ista gish xaafetida asati inteko kalxi gelida. Heytanti Xoosse erontayta; nu Goda kiyatetha coo mela laammizaytanne Xoossa goynnontayta. Izi barka nuna haarizayssanne nuus Goda gidida Yesus Kirstoosakka kaadettes.
65001005	Inte hessa ubbakka kaseti erikkoka Goday ba dereza Gibxeppe kessidi ashshidayssanne hanko ammanontayta guyeppe dhayssidayssa ta intena akeekissana koyays.
65001006	Hessathoka ba boncho naagonta ixidi ba dizaso yeddida kiitanchata inte yuushi qoppana mala; Xoossi ista gita pirda gallas gakkanaas merna qashos gird gida dhuman naagi woththides.
65001007	Hessathoka Soddomeynne Gamoray qasseka ista heeran diza katamatikka laymatidanne salo medhetethatara laymatanas amottida. Hessa gish isti merna taman xuugetanaytas leemiso gidida.
65001008	Hessathoka heyti he asati barka ba agumo kaallidi barka ba asho tuniseetes. Bappe bollara dizaytas azazettettenna. Isti salon bonchora dizaytaka cayeettes.
65001009	Haray attoshin salo kiitanchata halaqay Mikaaley Muse asho gish izara palametishe “Nena Goday hanqetto!” gides attin izas cashsha qaala zaaribenna.
65001010	Hayti asati qasse istas eretonta ixida miish wursi cash cayeettes. Aykkokka eronta meheta mala coo mela qoppi ekkida miishi istas diikko isti hessan dhayana.
65001011	Isti Qayeele ogen bida gish miishas giidi Bala7ame mala balan kundida. Qasse Qoorey eqettida mala istika eqettidi dhayida gish istas aayye-ana!
65001012	Hayti ha asati yeellay baynda layma hanora issi bolla inte diggisseson beettiza wode intes dhuphe gidettes. Isti baas xalala qoppeetes. Isti carkon biza iray baynda shaara mala. Ayfey ayfiza woden ayfey baynda xaphoppe dhoqalletidi nam7uto melida mitha mala.
65001013	Isti yeellachiza ba oosoza wolqama abba dambala mala gopponto copu histizayta. Gird gida dhumay ista mernas naagizayssanne coo mela waayetiza xoolinteta malakko!
65001014	Addameppe ha simmin laapuntho yeleteth gidida Henookey “Hekko Xoossi qooday baynda geeshsha kiitanchatara asa ubba bolla pirdanas yaana.
65001015	Heyta Xoossas goynnonta asati ooththida iita ooso geedon ista izi qaxayana. Addafeka Xoossi heyta baas goynnonta nagaranchata bolla isti haasayida iita miishata gish izi ista bolla pirdana” gides.
65001016	Heyti he asati ubba wode zuuzumetizaytanne ay miishanka ufayeti erontayta. Isti ba iita amo kaallizayta; ista duunan otoretetha qaalay kumides. Baas ba go7a koyishe as addasheettes.
65001017	Inte ta siiqoto! Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosa Hawaareti hayssafe kase yootida qaala akeekite.
65001018	Isti “Wode wursethan Xoossa sheneppe haakkidayti barka ba iita amo kaallishe as qidhizayti yaana” giidi intes kase yooti woththida.
65001019	Heyti asa issa issafe shaakkizayta; asho amoteth kaallizaytanne istan Xillo Ayanay bayndayta.
65001020	Ta ishato! Inte qasse ubbafe bollara inte geeshsha ammanon minni eqqite; Xillo Ayananka minni woossite.
65001021	Nu Goda Yesus Kirstoosi ba maarotethan intena merna de7on gaththanayssa naagetishe intenatetha Xoossa siiqon naagite.
65001022	Sidhishe diza asatas mishetite;
65001023	issi issi asata tamappe kessi ashshite; haratas yashshatethan mishetite shin nagaran tunida ista asateth bochchida mayokka wursi ixite.
65001024	Intena kundethafe ashshanassinne intena wosoy bayndayta histidi ufayssan ba boncho sinthi shiishshanaas dandayizayssas;
65001025	izi xalala nuus Xoossanne dhale gidida Goda Yesus Kirstoosa baggara benippe doommidi ha7i gakkanaassinne mernaska bonchoynne gitateth, wolqaynne godateththi izas gido. Amiin.
66001001	Hayssi ajjutazi mata wode biitta bolla hananayssa baas ooththizayta bessana mala Xoossi Yesus Kirstoosas immidayssa. Yesus Kirstoosikka ba kiitancha kiittidi ba oosanchaza Yohannisas hayssa ajjutaza qoncisides.
66001002	Yohannisikka Xoossa qaala gishshinne Yesus Kirstoosi tamarsida tuma gish qasseka izi ba ayfen beyidayssakka wursi markattides.
66001003	Hayssi wurikka hananay mata woden gidida gish hayssa tinbite qaala nababiza asi anjettidade. Hessathoka tinbite qaala siyizaytinne ha tinbite qaala xaafettidayssa poli ooththizayti isti anjettidayta.
66001004	Iisiyan diza laapun Woosa Keeththatas Kasekka dizayssafe, ha7ikka dizayssafenne, burokka yaana Xoossafe iza alga sinthan diza laapun ayanatappe hessathoka hayqoppe denthan bayra gididayssafe, ha biitta kawotas kawonne ammanettida marka gididayssafe, nuna siiqizayssafenne ba suuthan nuna nu nagarappe geeshshida Yesus Kirstoosappe kiyatethinne sarotethi intes gido.
66001006	Nuni Yesus Kirstoosa aawa Xoossas ooththana mala nuna izi kawotanne Qeeseta kessida Yesus Kirstoosas bonchoynne wolqay mernappe merna gakkanaas izas gido! Amiin.
66001007	Hekko izi saloppe shaarara gita bonchora yaana. Kase iza caddi wodhidaytikka attonta asi wurikka iza beyana. Biitta bolla diza dereyka wurikka iza gish yeekkana. Hayssi ha yo7ozi tumukko! Amiin.
66001008	Kasekka, ha7ikka dizayssi buroppeka Yaanayssi wursi dandayiza Goda Xoossi “Alfaynne Oomegay, Koyroynne Wurseththi tana” gees.
66001009	Tani Yesusa waayeza iza kawoteththa qasseka iza dandayan intenara issife gidida ta inte ishay Yohannisi Xoossa qaalaninne Yesusas markattida gish qashetada Fiiximo geetettiza abba giddon diza dere daarin days.
66001010	Tani Goda gallas Xillo Ayanan dhisko mala coo liphiphi gishin dinke giirissa malay gita giiris taappe guyera,
66001011	“Neni beyizayssa waraqatan xaafada laapun Woosa Keeththatas heytikka Epesoones, Samerneeses, Phergamoones, Tiyaxiroones, Sardeeses, Piladelfiyassinne Lodoqiyas yedda” gishin siyadis.
66001012	Hessa taas ooni yootidakkonne erana gaada ta guye yuuya xeelliza wode xompe ista bolla woththiza worqafe oosettida laapun ballata beyadis.
66001013	He ista bolla xompe woththiza ballata giddon asa naa misatizade demmadis. Izikka hirki toho qirphe gakkiza aduussa may7o may7ides; tira bollakka worqa may7o may7ides.
66001014	Iza hu7eynne iza hu7e binanay qas booththa shach misatiza booththa suufe geetettiza katha mala. Iza ayfetikka tama laco misatetes.
66001015	Iza tohoti tama bonqon qoxeti kezida xarqimala misatetes. Iza qaalaykka wolqama piissa haaththe giiriza mala giirees.
66001016	Izi ba ushachcha kushen laapun xoolinteta oykkidi uttides. Iza duunappe nam7u baggara qara mashshay kezees. Iza ayfesoy awa arshe mala xolqetees.
66001017	Tani hessa beyada hayqqida as misatada iza toho garsan kundadis. Izi qas ta bolla ba ushachcha kushe woththidi “Ne babbofa! Koyroynne wursethi tana.
66001018	Tani paxa days. Kase hayqqadiskoshin hekko tani hayssafe mernaas paxa daana. Hayqo bollanne Si7ole bolla tani Goda.
66001019	Hessa gish neni beyidayssa ha7i dizayssanne guyeppe hananayssa xaafa.
66001020	Neni ta ushacha kushen beyida laapun xoolintetanne xompe ista bolla woththiza worqafe oosettida laapun ballata xuuray hekko hayssa. Laapun xoolinteti laapun Woosa Keeththata kiitanchata. Xompe ista bolla woththiza laapun worqa ballati laapun Woosa Keeththata.’
66002001	“Efesoonen Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas ‘Hayssi laapun xoolinteta ba ushachcha kushen oykkidadefenne ista bolla xompe woththiza laapun worqa ballata giddon simeretizadefe yootetides.
66002002	Tani ne oosoza, dafeteththanne dandayakka erays. Neni qas iitata yegga aadhdhanas dandayontayssa Hawaareta gidonta dishe bana Hawaareta gizaytaka shaakada isti wordanchata gidoyssa ne gakka demmidayssa ta erays.
66002003	Neni dandayan minna eqqidayssanne ta suntha gish saletonta ne waaye beyidayssa ta erays.
66002004	Gidikkoka ta nena kadhiza issi miishi dees. Hessika neni kase ne siiqoza aggadasa.
66002005	Neni kase ay mala dhoqason dashe ha7i qas ne waana kundidakkonne ane yuushsha qoppada maarotethan simma gela. Ne kase ooththiza beni ne oosoza zaara ooththa. Ne hessa wursa zaara ooththonta ixxikko ta neeko yaana. Neni maarotethan gelonta ixxiko ne xompe iza bolla woththiza balla he izi dizasoppe ta denthayichana.
66002006	Gido attin ta nena galatiza issi miishi dees. Hessika tani ixiza Niqola bagga asa ooso nekka ixxadasa.
66002007	“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizadey wurikka siyo! ‘Xoonidadey Xoossa Gannate giddon diza de7o mitha ayfe maana mala ta ooththana.’
66002008	“Samerneese Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas, hayssi koyronne wurseth gididayssafe kase hayqqidayssafenne ha7i qas paxa dizayssafe yootetidaza.
66002009	Tani ne waayezanne ne manqotetha erays. Gidikkoka neni dureko. Ayhuda gidonta dishe bana nuni Ayhudakko giza Xala7e maabara gididayti heyti ne sunth mooroyssa ta erays.
66002010	Buro sinthafe ne bolla gakkana metos babbofa. Inte paacettana mala intefe issi issi as dabuloosi qasho keeththe gelthana. Tammu gallas gakkanaas inte waaye beyanashin ne hayqqana gakkanaas ammanettidade gida. Tani nees merna de7o aklile hista immana.
66002011	“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizadey siyo! xoonidadey nam7antho hayqon qohetenna” ga xaafa gides.
66002012	Phergamoone Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas “Hayssi nam7u baggara qara mashsha oykkidayssafe yootetidaza.
66002013	Neni Xala7e algay dizason dizayssa tani erays. Gido attin neni ta suntha lo7etha oykkadasa. Ne tana ammanizayssa aggabeyka. Taas ammanettida marka gidida Antiphasi Xala7ey diza inte kataman asa kushen hayqqida wodekka ne tana ammano agabeyka.
66002014	Gidikkoka ta nena kadhiza issi miishi ne bolla dees. Hessika Bala7ame timirte oykkida issi issi asati inte giddon deettes. Hessi Bala7amey Isra7eele asay eeqas yarshettida kath miidinne layma laymatidi dhuphettana mala Baalaqe zoridade.
66002015	Hessathoka Niqola bagga asata timirte oykkida asatikka inte giddon deettes.
66002016	Hessa gish maarotethan gela; akkay giikko tani ellesada neeko baada nena ta duunappe keziza mashsha misatiza qaalara olana.
66002017	“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizadey siyo! Xoonidades ta qotan diza mannafe immana. Izi taas gididayssa bessanas iza bolla ooratha sunthi xaafetida booththa shuch izas ta immana. Hessaka ekkidadefe attin hara asi oonikka erenna.
66002018	“Tiyaxiroone Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas hizga xaafa ‘Hayssi tama laco misatiza ayfeti dizaddefenne bonqida taman geli qoxeti kezida xarqimala misatiza tohoti dizadefe Xoossa naappe kiitettidaza.
66002019	Tani ne oosonne ne siiqo, ne ammanonne ne haggazo, ne dandayan minnoyssakka erays. Kase oosozappe guyeyssi aadhdhizayssaka ta erays.
66002020	Gido attin ta nena kadhiza miishi dees. Hessika bana ‘Ta nabe’ giza macasayo Elizabeelo neni bessa aggida gish iza taas ooththizayti layma laymatana malanne eeqas yarshetida kath maana mala iza tamarsada baleththadus.
66002021	Iza maarotethan gelana mala ta izis wode immadisshin, iza qas ba laymatethafe simmanas koyabeykku.
66002022	Hessa gish ta izo waaye alga bolla yeggana. Izira ooththida asati ba iita oosoppe maarotethan simonta ixikko izira issife laymatida ubbata bolla gita meto ta ehana.
66002023	Tani izi nayta hayqon qaxayana. Woosa keeththati wurikka asa qofanne asa amo shaaka erizay tana gididayssa erana. Tani intes issas issas izaade ooso mala immana.
66002024	“Tiyaxiroonen dizaytas intessinne hayssa iita timirte tamarontaytas ubbas hessathoka issi issi ‘Xala7es hayssi ciimma xuura’ geetettizayssa kaallontayta intena tani hara tooho toossikke.
66002025	Gidikkoka ta hee baana gakkanaas intes dizaz wursi minthi oykkite.
66002026	Xoonidadessinne ta ooson wurseth gakkanaas minnizades Ayzaabeta bolla ta godateth immana.
66002027	Izi ista birata guufera haarana. Urqafe medhetida miisha mala izi bukkidi liiqisana. Hessi he godateththayka tani ta Aawappe ekko godateththa mala.
66002028	Ta izas wonta bolla keziza xoolinteza immana.
66002029	Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizay wuri siyo!” gaada xaafa gides.
66003001	Sardeese Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas, “Hayssi Xoossa Ayana laapunatappenne xoolinteta oykkidadefe yootettidaza. Ta ne ooso erays. Neni sunthan paxa daasa shin qas hayqqadasa.
66003002	Beegga! Hayqqana matidayssanne nees wurashe guuth attida wolqayo zaara mintha. Tani ta Goda sinthan ne oosoy kumeth gidin beyabeekke.
66003003	Hessa gish neni ay mala timirte ekkidakkone ne siyoyssa yuusha qopanne naaga. Maarotethanka gela; neni beeggonta aggiko qas ta kayso mala ne qopponta putu gaana. Ta ay saaten neeko yaanakkonne ne erakka.
66003004	Gido attin ba may7o tunisontayti Sardeesen guutha asati nenara deettes. Heyti bootha may7o may7anayssi istas bessiza gish isti booththa may7o may7idi tanara baana.
66003005	Xoonidadey istathoka bootha may7o may7ana. Izaade sunth tani ta Aawa sinthaninne kiitanchata sinthan erisana. De7on dizayta sunthi xaafetida de7o mazgabappe quccikke.
66003006	“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa haythi dizaddey siyo!
66003007	Filadelfiya Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas “Hayssi geeshshinne tumancha gididayssafe Dawute keeththa qulpe oykkidayssafe yootetidayssa. Izi doyidayssa oonikka gordenna. Izi gordidaz oonikka doyenna.
66003008	Tani ne ooso erays; hekko oonikka gordanas dandayonta doya penge ne sinthan woththadis; ne wolqay guuth gididayssa ta erays; gidikkoka ne ta qaala naagadasa; ta sunthaka ne kadabeykka.
66003009	Hessa gish baas Ayhuda gidonta dishe bana Ayhuda gizayti heyti Xala7e maabarappe gidida wordoti yiidi ne toho bolla kundana mala ta ooththana. Tani nena siiqidayssa isti erana mala ta ooththana.
66003010	Neni dandayizadde gida gaada ta nees yooto qaala ne naagida gish takka buro biitta bolla diza asa paacanaas kumeththa alame bolla yaana waayeza gallassafe ta nena naagana.
66003011	Hekko ta eeson yaana. Ne aklile oonikka ekkonta mala nees dizaz lo7etha oykka.
66003012	Xoonidade tani ta Goda Xoossa Keeththan tuus ooththana. Izi heeppe mulekka kezenna. Ta Goda sunthinne ta Goda katamaza sunthikka ta iza bolla xaafana. Hanna katamaya saloppe ta Goda achchafe wodhdhana ooratha Yerusalame. Takka ta ooratha suntha he izaade bolla xaafana.
66003013	Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas yootizayssa hayth dizaddey siyo!
66003014	“Lodoqiya Woosa Keeththa kiitanchas ‘Hayssi amiin’ gidayssafe tumu ammanettida marka gididaddefe Xoossa medhetethi wuri izappe bettidadefe yootetidaza.
66003015	Tani ne ooso erays. Neni irxa woykko misha gidakka. Neni irxa woykko misha gididakko lo7okkoshin.
66003016	Irxa woykko miisha gidonta ne coo donbola gidida gish ta nena ta duunappe kessa cuttana gays.
66003017	‘Ta durekko; taas daro haaroy dees; taas aykkoykka paccibenna’ gaasa shin ne qas gilqa; aykkoy baynda hiyeesa, manqo, qooqenne ne kallo dizadde gididayssa erabeekka.
66003018	Ne dure gidana koykko taappe taman paacetida worqa shammana mala neni ne kallotetha yeellatetha kammanas booththa may7o may7ana malanne xeellanaska dandayana mala ayfe dhale shammada ne tiyettana mala ta nena zorays.
66003019	Tani ta dosizayta wursa hanqayssinne qaxayays; hessa gish neni minna; maarotethanka gela.
66003020	Hekko! Tani pengen eqqada xeygays; oonikka ta qaala siydi ba pengeza taas doyikko ta izakko gelada izaadera maana. Izaadeyka tanara maana.
66003021	Tani xoonada ta Aawara iza algan uttidayssatho xoonidadey tanara issife ta alga bolla ta uttissana.
66003022	“Ayanay Woosa Keeththatas gizayssa hayth dizay siyo!” ga xaafa gides.
66004001	Hessaf guye tani salon doya diza penge beyadis. Tani koyro siyiday dinke giirisa mala giiris “Haa pude keza, buroppe hanana miishata ta nena bessana” gides.
66004002	Tani heerakka Ayanan liphiphi gaada salon diza alga beyadis. He algaza bollaka issadey uttides.
66004003	He alga bolla uttidayssa medhay Iyasiphidenne Serdinoone inqu misatiza algaza yuuyi aadhdhidi Margide geetettiza inqu misatiza zuullay dees.
66004004	Hessathoka he algaza yuuyi aadhdhida nam7u tammanne oyddu algati deettes. He algata bolla qas booththa may7o may7idi ba hu7e bolla worqa aklile woththida nam7u tammanne oyddu cimati uttida.
66004005	He algafe qas wolqanthinne daada giiris kezees. He alga sinthan poo7iza laapun xompeti deettes. Heytikka Xoossa Ayana laapunata.
66004006	He alga sinthan geesh milxi gida xolqiza mastoote misatiza abbay dees. Iza giddon alga yuushon daro ayfera diza oyddu do7ati deettes.
66004007	Koyro do7azi gaammo misatees. Nam7anthozi qas boora misatees. Heedzdzanthoza ayfesoy asa ayfeso misatees. Oydanthozi qas piradhiza golle kafo misatees.
66004008	He oyddu do7ati issoy issoy usuppun qefera deettes. Qefeta yuushoninne qefeta giddon ayfey kumides. Isti qammanne gallas, “Geeshshawu! Geeshshawu! Geeshshawu! Wursa dandayiza Godo! Kasekka ha7ikka dizaysso, burokka yaanaysso guussafe shempi erettenna.
66004009	He do7ati he alga bolla uttidayssassinne mernappe merna gakkanaas dizayssas gitateth, bonchonne galataka shiishshiza wode ubban,
66004010	nam7u tammanne oyddu cimati mernappe merna gakkanaas diza ba alga bolla uttidayssa sinthan gupannidi izas goynnettes. Ba akliletaka he alga sinthan woththidi,
66004011	“Nu Goda Xoosso, Neni wursa medhdhida gish Medheetethi wurikka medhetidaynne shempora dizay ne shenen gidida gish gitateththi, bonchoynne wolqayka nees bessees” gida.
66005001	He alga bolla uttidayssa ushachcha kushe qaa7a garsaninne bolla baggara xaafeti uttida laapun maatamen gordettida issi xaaxeti uttida maxaafa beyadis.
66005002	Issi mino kiitancha dayssi gita qaalara “Hayta maatameta birshidi ha xaatha maxaafa doyanas bessizadey oonee?” gi haasayishin ta beyadis.
66005003	Gido attin salonka gidin woykko sa7a bolla woykko biittafe garsa bagganka he xaatha Maxaafa doyidi iza giddon dizayssa xeellanaas dandayida asi oonikka bettibenna.
66005004	Takka he xaatha maxaafa birshidi iza giddo xeellanas bessizadey bettonta aggida gish daro yeekkadis.
66005005	He wode cimatappe issadey taas “Ne yeekkofa! Hekko Yuhuda bagga gidida Dawute zarkefe dendida gaammoy izi kase xoonides. Izi he xaatha Maxaafazanne he laapun maatameza doyanaas dandayees” gides.
66005006	Hessafe guye alga bollan oyddu do7ata giddon he cimata giddonka shukettida dorsa misatizayssi eqqidayssa ta beyadis. He dorsazas laapun kaceynne laapun ayfey dees. He ayfetikka kumeththa alame kiitettida Xoossa Ayana laapunata.
66005007	He dorsay yiidinne alga bolla uttidayssafe, ushacha kushen diza xaatha maxaafa ekides.
66005008	He xaatha maxaafaza ekkida mala oyddu do7atinne nam7u tammanne oyddu cimati he dorsa sinthan ba liiphen gupannida. Istika issoy issoy ba kushen diiththa mala miish oykkides. Hessathoka geeshshata woosa gidida izan exaney kumida worqa xaaro ba kushen oykki deettes.
66005009	Ooratha yeth hizgi yexida “Neni asa dumma dumma kochchafe, dumma dumma qaalan haasayizaytappe, dumma dumma qommofenne dumma dumma dereppe Xoossas wozanaas ne shukettida gish he xaatha maxaafaza ekkanasinne maatametaka doyanaas bessizade gidadasa.
66005010	Ne ista nu Goda Xoossas Kawotanne Qeeseta ooththadasa. Istika biitta bolla kawotana.”
66005011	Tani gede zaara xeellishin he algaza, do7atanne cimata yuuyi aadhdhida daro kiitanchata qaala giiris siyadis. Istas corateththay daro shiyaninne daro milonen qoodetees.
66005012	Isti daro gita qaalan “Ha shukettida dorsay wolqa, dureteth, erateth, minoteth, gitateth, bonchonne galata ekkanas bessees” gida.
66005013	Salonka sa7a bollaka, biittafe garsanka, abba giddon diza medhetetha ubban “Alga bolla uttidayssassinne dorsaas galataynne dhoqatethi, bonchoynne wolqay mernappe merna gakkanaas izas gido!” gishin ta siyadis.
66005014	Oyddu do7atikka “Amiin” gida. Cimatikka ba liiphen gufannidi izas goynnida.
66006001	Hessafe guyekka he dorsay laapun maatametappe koyro maatameza doyishin ta beyadis. He oyddu do7atappe issoy dada guguntha mala qaalara “Haa ya!” gishin siyadis.
66006002	Qasseka booththa para beyadis. He paraza bolla ba kushen wondafe oykkidadey dees. Izas qas aklileyka imettides. Izikka xoonizade gididi xoonoppe gede xoonon baanas kezides.
66006003	He dorsay nam7antho maatameza doyda mala nam7antho do7azi “Haa ya!” gishin ta siyadis.
66006004	Qasseka hara xeeqa zo7o paray kezides. He para togidadey biitta bollafe saroteth dhayssana malanne asay ba garsan issoy issa wursana mala ooththisanas izas godatethinne wogga gita mashshay imettides.
66006005	Dorsazi heedzdzantho maatameza doyin heedzdzantho do7azi “Haa ya!” gishin ta siyadis. Qasse karetha para beyadis. He para bolla uttidayssi ba kushen maka miish oykkides.
66006006	Oyddu do7ata giddofe yida misatiza qaala siyadis; he giirissayka “Bagga kilo gidiza giste issades issi gallasa damoza; qasse issi kilo kumana sayso pace gidiza bangay issi gallasa damoza gido. Gido attin zaytenne woyne mith qohoppa” gishin ta siyadis.
66006007	He dorsay oydantho maatameza doyin oydantho do7aza qaalay “Haa ya!” gishin siyadis.
66006008	Qasseka Cololo para beyadis. Para togidayssa sunthi hayqo geetettes. Iza qas duufoy kaallees. Hayqoynne Duufoy biittafe sayso olan, gafan, boshaninne bazzo do7an wodhana mala godateththi istas imettides.
66006009	Ichashantho maatameza izi doyin Xoossa qaala gishshinne ba markattida markatetha gish hayqqidayta shempota yarsho yarshizasoza garsan beyadis.
66006010	Isti qas qaala dhoqu histidi “Geeshshanne tumancha Godawu! Neni biitta bolla diza asaa bolla pirdontaynne nu suutha gish ne halo kessontay ayide gakkanaassee?” giidi waassida.
66006011	Istas issas issas booththa may7oy imettides. Ista malatika buro hayqqana. Ista mala oosancha gidida ista lagettinne ista ishata qooday kumana gakkanaas isti guutha wodes shempidi takana mala istas yootetides.
66006012	Hessafe guye he dorsay usupuntho maatameza doyin tani gede izakko xeelladis; hekko Biittay wolqama qaath qaaxides. Awa arshey asi kayos may7iza karetha may7o mala karexxides. Aginayka kumeththara suutha mala zo7adus.
66006013	Wolqama assura carkoy carkidi mitha ayfe qoqofiza mala saloppe xoolintey qoqofetides.
66006014	Saloykka waraqata mala xaaxettidi kichchides. Zumatinne abba giddon diza gadeti wurikka ba dizasoppe dhayichida.
66006015	Biitta bolla diza kawoti biitta haarizayti, ola halaqati, dureti, wolqamati, ashkaratinne godati wurikka gongolo giddoninne zumata garsan zaallata garsan qotetida.
66006016	Zumatanne zaallatakka “Nuna kammite! Alga bolla uttidayssa sinthafe, he dorsaza hanqofe nuna qottite.
66006017	Wolqama hanqo gallassay gakkides. Iza oone dandayanay?” gida.
66007001	Hessafe guye oyddu kiitanchata biitta bolla oyddu baggara eqqidayta beyadis. Istika biitta bolla gidin woykko abba bolla woykko mitha bolla ay carkoyka carkonta mala oyddu baggara yiza bosha carko wursi oykkida.
66007002	De7o Xoossa maatama oykkida hara kiitanchay awa arshey mokkiza baggara ha yishin ta beyadis. Biittanne abba qohanaas istas godatethi imettida oyddu kiitanchata ba qaala dhoqu histidi,
